chapter.head: * śrī *
oṃ namaḥ śivāya parasmai brahmaṇe
śrībhavadevaviracitaṃ
tautātitamatatilakam
prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamamarthavādādhikaraṇam

lg.l: ramate sarasvatī saha tasmai cā'syai namaskurmaḥ ।।
ajitā naiva subodhā saṃkṣiptaṃ nā'nupadamato lokāḥ ।

chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “so'rodīdyadarodīttadrudrasya rudratvaṃ” (tai. saṃ. 1. 5. 1.) “sa ātmano vapāmudakkhidat” (tai. saṃ. 2. 1. 1.) “devā vai devaya- janamadhyavasāya diśo na prājānan” (tai. saṃ. 6. 1. 5.) ityevamādīni samāmnātāssamāmanantivākyāni । tāni kiṃ kañciddharmmaṃ pramimata uta neti bhava (+ ti vi)cāraṇeti । nanvadhāyayopakrame “codanālakṣa- ṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” (jai. sū. 1. 1. 2.) iti codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñātam, na tu mantrārthavādādeḥ । pravartakaṃ ca vacanaṃ codanā । taduktam-“codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravarttakaṃ vacanaṃ” (śā. bhā. pṛ. 3. paṃ. 9. cau. saṃ.) iti । tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca (+prathamapā)de pratipādi- tameva । tat kathaṃ siddhārthānāmarthavādānāmapratijñātāprastutaprāmāṇyā- prāmāṇyavicārasaṃgatiriti ?
tatraike samādhānamevamabhidadhati—prathamapādasiddhamapi coda- nāprāmāṇyamartavādaikavākyatāvaśenā'pratipādakatayā punarākṣipyata iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
tatrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhiprāyaḥ-vṛddhavyavahāre hi śabdānāṃ kāryā- rthatayaiva vyutpatterartha(+vādānā)mapi kāryārthatvam । na cā'rthavādānāṃ sā- kṣāt kāryārthatvaṃ saṃbhavati । saṃbhavati tu codanaikavākyatayā । na ca lakṣa- ṇayā prāśastyapratipādanena codanaikavākyatvam । prāśastyasya vidhyanape- kṣitatvenā'sambandhāt, artha(+vādānāṃ pa) rokṣavṛttitāpatteśca । siddhā- rthasādhyārthatayoścaikavākyatvaṃ tadarthayorhetuhetumadbhāvena dṛṣṭam । yathā— malinassnāyāt malināni me vasanāni, rājakulaṃ mayā na gantavyami- tyādiṣu loke tathā darśanāt (+na hi rudraro) danādīnāṃ hetutvaṃ kara- ṇetikarttavyatayoranyatararūpeṇā'pūrvotpattau saṃbhavati । apūrvoddeśapra- vṛttakṛtisādhyatvābhāvāt । nā'pi vrīhyāderiva kārakatayā; utpa- nnātivṛttasya rudrarodanādervyāpārayituma(+śakyatvā)t । tena jñaptā- veva hetutvaṃ vaktavyam । tatrā'pi na viṣayatayā, nā'pi niyājya- tayā । yataḥ kṛtyavacchedakatayā hi yāgādīnāṃ viṣayatvam । na ca kṛtyasādhyānāṃ kṛtyavacchedakatvam । evaṃ svakṛtiprayojanatvena hi niyoga....yojyaḥ । na cā'rthavādānāṃ tathābhāvo'stīti pāriśe- ṣyāddhūmādivajjñaptihetutvaṃ vaktavyam । tatra yadi hetusvarūpatatpratiba- ndhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇamasti, tadā pratibandhabalenā'numānavākyamiva hetu- dvāreṇā'rthaṃ vyavasthāpayantī codanā'numānavākyavadeva svato na pramā-
ṇam । atha hetusvarūpādigrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nā'sti, tadā liṅgabhāve- nā'pi jñaptau hetutvāsambhavādapratipādakatvādevā'prāmāṇyaṃ codanāyā iti pāramārthikaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ । na cā'ruṇaparāśarādiśākhāsvarthavādā- bhāvānna tadekavākyatayā kṛtsnavedāprāmāṇyamiti vaktavyam, yataḥ ‘sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ karme’ti nyāyena kvacitpratipāditasya pradhānasya vā'ṅgasya vā śākhāntarīyasārthavādāḍgapradhānaikavākyatayā sarvākṣepopapattiḥ । tathā coktam—

nanu yadyapi vṛddhavyavahārata eva vyutpattiḥ, tathā'pi sarvaśa- bdānāṃ kāryānvitābhidhānasāmarthyaṃ hitvā''kāṅkṣitayogyasannihitā- nvitamātrābhidhānasāmarthyenaiva sāmānyavyutpattau liṅādiyuktavākyeṣu kāryasyaiva tathābhūtatvāttadanvitāvagaterna sarvaśabdānāṃ viśeṣaśakti- kalpanā, vyutpattikālāvagatatvamātreṇa viśeṣaśaktikalpane śābdasanni- hitenaiva vyutpattāvanvayadarśanāt ‘dvāraṃ dvārami’ tyādāvaśrutādhyāhāra- śabdakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ । tena yathā holākādhikaraṇe sāmānyaśāstra- nyāyo'yaṃ śākhāntarādhikaraṇa ( . mī. 2. 4. 2.) siddhaḥ । ﻿
kalpanayaiva viśeṣācāropapattau na viśeṣaśāstrakalpanā, evamihāpi ākāṅkṣādimanmātraśaktikalpanaiveti ।

tadayuktam; na hi vṛddhavyavahāradṛṣṭatvamātreṇa kāryānvitābhi- dhānaśaktikalpanam । kiṃ tarhi ? svasantānavyutpatyanusāreṇa । svasa- ntāne ca kāryasyaivā'nekaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya pravṛttihetutvāvagamādvya- vahāravākye'pi tadarthatvanirṇayaḥ । na ca svasantāne ākāṅkṣādima- nmātre śabdasannihite vā vyutpattiḥ । holākādhikaraṇe tu vyabhi- cāreṇa tattaddeśādiviśeṣapratipādakopapadavacchāstrakalpanāpramāṇābhā- vāt । bhavatu sāmānyaśāstrakalpanā । na hi tatrā'nuṣṭhātṛmātrānuga- tamananuṣṭhātṛvyāvṛttaṃ ca kiñcidvyavasthākāraṇamasti । tathācoktam-
tathā vārttikakārapādairapyuktam—
(taṃ. vā. 1. 3. 7. pṛ. 245. pū. saṃ.)

tena holākādhikaraṇanyāyamabhidadhatā ubhayadarśanānabhijñataiva
jñāpiteti । athocyeta—yathā ‘gāmānaye’tyādiṣu kāryārthānvayo'va- gataḥ, tathā ‘gaurgacchatī’tyādiṣu siddhārthānvayo'pyavagata eva । teno- bhayatrā'pi prayogadarśanādubhayānugatākāṅkṣādimanmātra eva śaktirava- dhāryate, na kāryamātre । yathā devadattasya putra iti napteti ca sākṣā- tsambandhe paramparāsambandhe'pi prayogadarśanāt ṣaṣṭhīvibhakterubhayānuga- tasākṣātpāramparyodāsīnasambandhamātre śaktiḥ । yathā ca tavaiva dvitīyāvibhakterīpsite'nīpsite ca prayogadarśanādubhayānugatakriyāja- nyaphalabhāgitvamātra eva śaktiḥ, na tu bhaṭṭasyevepsitamātra iti । tadayuktam; svavyutpatyanusāreṇa tāvat, sarvaśabdānāṃ kāryānvaya- paratvamevā'vagataṃ paścātsiddhārthaparatvamavagamyamānaṃ na vyutpattikālā- vagatamananyathāsiddhaṃ kāryānvayaparatvaṃ bādhitumutsahate, siddhānvayā- vagamasya lakṣaṇayaivopapatteḥ ।

nanu vyutpattikālāvagatamapi kriyākāryavācitvaṃ paścādbhāvi- sthāyikāryāvagamena bādhyata eva, tathā'trā'pi bhaviṣyatīti । maivam; paścādbhāvino'pi sthāyikāryāvagamasyā'nanyathāsiddhatvāt । pūrvāvaga- tārthe hi lakṣaṇādikaṃ bhavati । na cā'pūrvasya pūrvāvagatirasti, apū- rvatvavyāghātāt । asti tu kriyākāryasya pūrvāvagatiḥ । tenā'nanya- thāsiddhena paścādavagatenā'parasyā'siddhasya pūrvāvagatasyā'pi bādhita-
tvādbhavati kriyākāryasya lākṣaṇikatvam, apūrvakāryasyaiva ca mu. khyatvam । na ceha tatheti vaiṣamyam ।

yattu ṣaṣṭhīdvitīyāvibhaktyarthanidarśanam, tadasambaddhameva । na hi tatra niyamena prathamaṃ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sākṣātsambandhaṃ paramparāsambandhaṃ vā, dvitīyāyā īpsitatvamanāpsitatvaṃ vā kaścidavagacchati, yena mukhyā- rthatvameva bhavet । aniyamena tu pratītau sādhāraṇārthatvameva yuktam ।

athaivamabhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi vyutpattau sarvaśabdānāṃ kāryā- nvayaparatvamevā'dhigataṃ bhavet । ‘putraste jāta’ ityādiṣu siddhārthapara- tvenā'pi vyutpatteḥ । yathā hi ‘gāmānaye’ ti śabdaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ viśiṣṭārthaviṣayavyavahāradarśanācchabdajanitaviśiṣṭārthaviṣayakāryāvaga- mānumānam, tathā putrajanmapratipādakavākyaśravaṇānantaraṃ pitṛgatamu- svaptasādaromaharṣādidarśanena pramāṇāntarāvagatatatpumapatyajanmano vyu- tpadyamānasya śabdajanitaharṣahetusiddharūpaputrajanmāvagamānumānamapi sa- mbhavatīti kva kāryānvayaḥ ? evaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ vyutpattiriti ।

tadayuktam; vikalpāsahatvāt । kiṃ sarvathā śabdavyavahārāvyu- tpannasyeyaṃ siddhārthavyutpattiḥ ? arddhavyutpannasya vā ? tatrā'vyutpannasya harṣahetūnāmānantyād viśeṣānavagatireva । yathā hi tatra harṣahetutayā putra- janma sambhāvitam, tathā subhagāgarbhavimokasukhaprasavaśubhalagnajanmā-
dīnāmanekeṣāmupaplavānna śabdasya putrajanmapratipādanāvadhāraṇe pramā- ṇamasti । nā'pyarddhavyutpannasya, pūrvasiddhavyutpatyanusāreṇā'vyutpanna- śabdasyā'pi kāryaparatvasyaivā'vagamāt । kāryaparatvāsambhave ca lakṣa- ṇayā siddhārthānvayaparatvasyocitatvāt । tena vyutpatyanusāreṇa sa- rvaśabdānāmeva siddhe kāryānvayaparatve'rthavādānāmaprapi kāryākāṅkṣāyāṃ svatantrakāryābhāvāt samabhivyāhṛtavidhyuddeśaikavākyatayā kāryaparatvaṃ vācyam । na ca tadyujyate, pūrvoktadūṣaṇagrāsāt । tasmādarthavādaika- vākyatāvaśādapratipādakatvāt siddhamaprāmāṇyaṃ codanāyāḥ । tena prathamapādasiddhamapi codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyamarthavādaikavākyatāvaśenā'pra- tipādakatayā punarākṣipya samādhīyata iti bhavati saṅgatiriti । (prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ)

atrocyate—sarvaśabdānāṃ tāvadvyutpattisiddhaṃ kāryaparatvaṃ svā- bhāvikamavagatam । tacca kvacidanāptavākye doṣavaśāttirodhiyetā'pi । na ceha nityanirddoṣavākye tathā sambhavati । ato yena prakāreṇā'sya kāryaparatā sambhavati, tadanusandheyam । tasya ca yadyapi karaṇetika- rttavyatāviṣayaniyojyarūpārthapratipādanena nā'nvayo'sti, tathā'pi prāśastyapratipādanena bhaviṣyati । prāśastyasya ca kramavadvidheyopala- kṣaṇatayā kāryaviśeṣapratītyupayogasambhavāt ।

nanvekakarttṛkānekapadārthānuṣṭhānasya kramaviśeṣamantareṇā'sambha- vāt, kramasya prayogopalakṣaṇatvenā'nvayasyā''kāṅkṣitatvādyu- ktastathā'nvayaḥ । prāśastyaṃ tu phalasādhanatādirūpaṃ vidhita eva siddhaṃ na kramavadākāṅkṣitamiti kathaṃ tadanvayaḥ ? maivam; ekavākya- tābalena raktapaṭavadākāṅkṣotyāpanenaivā'nvayopapatteḥ । na ca vācyaṃ raktasyā'nanyalabhyasya bhavattvākāṅkṣotthāpanena paṭaviśeṣakatvādanvayaḥ, prāśastyasya tu vidhibodhyatvenā'nadhikatvānnākāṅkṣeti । yato nā'dhi- kārthatve'pi ‘ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayedi’tyādiṣu brāhmaṇapadasthadvitī- yāvibhaktyabhidheyaikatvābhidhāyināmapyekādipadānāmanuvādarūpeṇā'- pyekavākyatābalenā'nvayāpalabdhiḥ ।

tenaitadadhikaraṇavyutpādyametadeva—yatsvarasato viddhyanākā- ṅkṣite'pi sarvathā pravṛtyanupayoginyanyalabhye'pyartha ekavākyatābalenā- ''kāṅkṣotthāpanenā'pi śabdasyā'nvayabodhanatātparyamiti । tacca prāśa- styaṃ lakṣyamāṇamarthavādapadāni pratyekaṃ vā lakṣayanti । sarvaśa- bdānāṃ kāryānvitasvārthābhidhāyakatve teṣāṃ svato'nabhidhāyakatayā nyāyasampādanayā ca prathamamavagataprāśastyalakṣaṇāsambhavāditi । tena sārthavādakasyaiva vidhyuddeśasya kāryaparatayā siddhaṃ prāmā- ṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatakhaṇḍanam
chapter.p: tadetau pūrvapakṣasiddhāntāvevā'nupapannau । tathā hi—kāryaparatva- meva sarvaśabdānāmiti yadupavarṇitam, tattāvadasambaddham । yato, yathā hi svasantāne stanapānādau viśiṣṭakāryāvagamasya pravṛttihetutva mavagatam, tathā siddhānvayarūpasyā'pi jananīgātrasamparkāderharṣahetu- tvamavagatameva । tena yathā ‘gāmānaye’tyādiśabdaśravamānantaraṃ prayo- jyavṛddhasya viśiṣṭavyavahāradarśanena viśiṣṭakāryāvagamamunnīya viśi- ṣṭakāryāvagamaparatvaṃ vidhiśabdasamabhivyāhṛtaśabdānāmadhyavasīyate, tathā atidūrasthaputrāgamane satya‘yaṃ te putraḥ samāyāta’ iti śabdaśravaṇā- nantaraṃ mukhaprasādādidarśanena pitṛgataṃ siddhaṃ harṣahetumunnīya siddhārthā- nvayāvagamaparatvamapyevaṃvidhaśabdānāṃ tadbhāvabhāvitayā pratīyata eva ।

atha ‘mālave te rājyaṃ bhaviṣyatī’ti jyotirvidākhyāte bhaviṣya- drājyāvagamasyā'pi harṣahetordarśanānna siddhārthānvayāvagamasya sarvatra harṣa- hetutvam । evaṃ tarhi bhavatāmapyevaṃvidhavākyaśravaṇānantaraṃ mālavādiga- manapravṛttisandarśanena vyabhicārāt, kathaṃ sarvatra kāryānvayaparatvam । athā'sya kāryānabhidhāyakatve'pi kāryapadādhyāhāreṇa vā, svabuddhi- prabhavakāryādhyavasāyena vā pravarttanam, evamatrā'pi svagatamāla- varājyayogyatāpratipādakaśabdādhyāhāreṇa vā, svabuddhiprabhavarājya-
yogyatādhyavasāyena vā siddhānvayāvagamasyaiva harṣahetutvopapattiḥ । tena harṣahetūnāmānantye'pi siddhārthānvayāvagamastāvanna vyabhicarati । viśeṣāvadhāraṇamapi yathā tvatpakṣe viśiṣṭārthaviṣayaceṣṭādarśanāt sampadyate, tathā mamā'pi viśiṣṭa bhūtārthānvayadarśanānantaraṃ śabdaprayo- gātsetsyati ।

atha pratītamapi harṣahetubhūtaṃ putrāgamanaṃ putragataharṣahetuguṇotkarṣā- dyabhidhānaśaṅkayā tadvākyānna niścīyate, tadā tavā'pi ‘gāmānaye’- tyādau godarśanānantaraṃ gogataguṇotkarṣādikāryapratipādanasambhāva- nayā''nuṣaṅgikaṃ gavānayaṃ manyamāno nā''nayanakāryapratipādanaṃ niścinuyāt । āvāpoddhārabhedena ca tattatpadārthāvagamo'smākamapi samāna eva । tenā''dyavyutpattāveva kāryānvayasyeva siddhānvayasyā'pi darśanādākāṅkṣāyogyatāsannidhimātrayuktapadārthānvayapratipādana eva sarva- śabdānāṃ sāmarthyamiti niścīyate । tena yaduktaṃ śālikena—
(pra. paṃ. vākyārthamātṛkā, pṛ. 5.)

tvanmate'pyetadeva sādhu na punassarvaśabdānāṃ kāryānvayaparatva-
miti । kiñca bhavatu tāvadvṛddhavyavahāreṇa vidhiśabdasamabhivyāhṛta- padānāṃ kāryānvitārthapratipādana eva vyutpattiḥ, tathā'pi ‘gaurgaccha- tī’tyādiṣu siddhārthānvayāvagatiḥ kathaṃ lākṣaṇikī ? avagatamukhyā- rthānupapatyā hi lakṣaṇā bhavati । na cā'tra kāryānvayarūpo mukhyo'rthaḥ pratīyate, kāryābhidhāyakaśabdābhāvāt । na cā'bhidhāyakaśabdā- bhāve'pyaucityopasthitasya kāryānvayasya gacchatīti siddhārthākhyāta- pade satyasambhavādyogyasiddhānvayasyaiva lākṣaṇikatvamiti vācyam । tathā sati samīhitaphalārthiniyojyānvayasyaiva sarvatraucityaprāptatvā- nnityādhikāre tadasambhavena niyojyamātrānvayasyā'pi lākṣaṇika- tvaprasaṅgāt । tena siddhārthānvayaparatvamapi śābdasyā'vaśyāṅgīka- raṇīyam । atassarvaśabdānāṃ kāryānvayapratipādanaparatvādarthavādānāṃ vidhyuddeśaikavākyatayā pūrvasiddhāntapakṣayoraprāmāṇyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ cetyu- bhayamapyanupapannameva ।

kiñca bhavatu sarvaśabdānāṃ kāryānvayaparatvam, tathā'pyarthavā- dānāṃ vidhyuddeśaikavākyatayā pūrvapakṣo nopapadyate । yato, yathā hi ‘gāmānaye’tyatra vyavahārasandarśanena kāryaparatvamavagatam, tathā ‘aṅgulyagre kariyūthaṃ nivāsayedi’tyatra vidhiśabdayoge'pi vyavahārādarśanānna kāryaparatvamavagatam । tena vyutpattāvevaitatsamadhigataṃ, yat kāryānvaya-
yogyānāmeva kāryaparatvaṃ na tvayogyānāmiti । na cā'rthavādānāṃ kenā'pi prakāreṇa kāryānvayayogyatā samasti, utpattijñaptihetutvaprakā- raporasambhavāt । tena kāryaparatvāsambhavādbhavatvarthavādānāmevā'ṅgulya- grādivākyavadaprāṇāṇyam ।
yattu tadekavākyatāmāropya kṛtsnavedasyā'prāmāṇyaṃ, tadatīva hāsyāspadam—
ato vidhyuddeśaikavākyatayā pūrvapakṣādākṣepo'yaṃ mandākṣavya- vahāriṇa eva śobhata iti ।

tathā prāśastyapratipādanadvāreṇaikavākyatayā siddhānto'pyanupa- panna eva । tvanmate vidhyavabodhitatvena prāśastyasyā'natiriktatayā'- nākāṅkṣitvāt । na ca raktapaṭanyāyenā''kāṅkṣotthāpanenā'nvayaḥ । anatiriktārthasyā''kāṅkṣotthāpanāsambhavāt । na hyuccarite raktapade punaruccaritaṃ rohitapadamākāṅkṣāmutthāpayati । ‘ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhojaye- di’tyādiṣu tu loke samudāyaparasyā'pyekavacanaprayogasya ‘bhaktaṃ bhuṅakṣve’tyevamādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt sandehavyudāsaprayojanena bhavatyekapada-
syākāṅkṣotthāpakatvam, na tviha tathā kiñcitprayojanamastīti vaiṣa- myamityalamativistareṇa । ato'sya vicārasyā'saṅgatatvādyathāvā- rttikamanyathaiva sarvaṃ varṇanīyamiti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p: atra hi codanāsūtre kṛtsnavedaprāmāṇyameva pratijñātam । sarvatra paurvāparyapratisandhānena hi śabdārthavyavasthitirbhavati । atra ca “athā'to dharmajijñāse”ti kṛtsnavedādhyayanasyaiva dharmmajijñāsāhe- tutvaṃ prathamamupavarṇitam । tacca tadaiva sambhavati-yadi kṛtsna eva vedo dharmme pramāṇamityabhimatam । tathā paścādapyautpattikasūtrābhidheyasya “anapekṣatvādi”ti hetoḥ padapadārthasambandhasaṃhatinityatāvyutpādanasya ca kṛtsnavedaprāmāṇyopapattitvādupariṣṭādapi kariṣyamāṇānekavicā- rasya vedamātraviṣayatvāt । tena kṛtsnavedaprāmāṇyapratijñānamevaitat । vedapade tu prayoktavye yaccodanāpadaṃ prayuktaṃ tatprāmāṇyaśaktipradarśa- nārtham । ataḥ kṛtsna eva vedaścodanātvena rūpeṇa dharmme pramāṇamiti sūtrārthaḥ ।

tatra prathame pāde sakalena prāmāṇyapratipādanaprabandhena yadyapyartha- vādānāmapi prāmāṇyaṃ pratipāditameva, tathā'pi codanātvarūpānabhi-
vyakteḥ punarākṣipya codanāntargatisamarthanārthopayāpapratipādanena sa- mādhīyata iti saṅgatiriti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । “tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samā- mnāya” (jai. sū. 1. 1. 25.) ityupasaṃhārāccodanāsveva cetprā- māṇyaṃ kriyārthatayā pratipāditaṃ, tadā'rthavādānāṃ siddhārthānāṃ sādhya- sādhanetikarttavyatānāmanyatararūpāpratipādanānna kriyārthatvaṃ sambha- vati । na ca kriyānaṅgatve'pi vidheyastutidvāreṇa pravṛtyatsāhajana- katayā kriyāviṣayavidhyaṅgatayā kriyārthatvam, arthavādataḥ stutyana- vagamāt । nā'pi lakṣaṇayā stutyarthatvam, vinā'pi lakṣaṇayā bhūtārthānāṃ padānāmanvayasyopapannatvāt । nā'pi vidhyekavākyatā- nupapatyā lakṣaṇā, bhinnārthatayā vidhyekavākyatāyā evā'sambhavāt ।

athaivamabhidhīyate—apekṣitadṛṣṭārthāvabodhārtho'yamadhyayanavidhiḥ kṛtsnasvādhyāyādhyayanaṃ vidadhānaḥ sākṣādarthavādeṣvapekṣitamarthamapaśyan vidheyastutilakṣaṇayā teṣāmapekṣitārthaparatvamāpādayatīti । tadayu- ktam; vidhimantareṇā'pyuccaritācchabdādarthāvagatidarśanena vidhivai- phalyāt । taduktam—“aprāpte śāstramarthavadi”ti । na cā'rthāvabodhā-
rthānāmadhyayanamupāyo niyamyate । upaśrutyavagatāllipyakṣarānumitācca svādhyāyādarthadhīdarśanena pramāṇavirodhāt । avaghātādiviṣayastu niyamo'pūrvasādhanāṃśanipātī na dṛṣṭāṃśopanipātīti na tatra pramāṇa- virodhaḥ । na cehāpyapūrvasādhanāṃśalakṣaṇā, yato'dhyayanasya yāgapra- karaṇe'nāmnānāt । na ca parṇatāyā ivā'vyabhicaritakratusamba- ndhajuhūdvāreṇā'pūrvārthatvam, svādhyāyasya kratusambandhavyabhicārāt । atha kratūpakāritāmātreṇa kratau niyamyeta, tadā dravyārjanasyā'pi kratūpakārakatayā kratau niyamaḥ prasajyeta ।

kiñca yadyayaṃ kratau niyamastadā 'dhyayanāvagatasyaiva svādhyāyā- rthasyā'bhyudayakaratvam । tathā ca sati tadahaḥkṛtopanayanasya māṇava- kasya saṃdhyopāsanāgnihomādikarmmaṇāṃ tatprakāśakavedasyā'navagame vaiphalyāt sarveṣāmevā'brāhmaṇyamiti mahānanartho niyamavādinā- māpatitaḥ । kiñcā'numitaśruteranadhītatvena tadarthasyā'nanuṣṭheyatvāt smṛtikārāṇāṃ sakalasmṛtipraṇayanavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ । śūdrasya cā'na- dhītavedatvena śrāddhādisakalavedārthānuṣṭhānavaiphalyaprasaṅgaḥ । kiñcā'na- dhītaniṣedhavākyasya niṣiddhabrahmavadhādyanuṣṭhāne'pi pratyavāyo na bhavet । adhītavedāvabuddhasyaiva nivṛttirūpārthasyā'pi tathā sati pratyavāyaparihārahetutvāt ।

atha “anadhīyānā hi vrātyā bhavantī”ti vacanāt puruṣe niyamo nā'rthajñāne । tenā'yamarthaḥ—dvijātissvādhyāyamadhīyītaiva na tvana- dhītenaivā'rthaṃ jānīyāditi । tatra yadyapi pratyavāyaparihāreṇa prayojanavānayamadhyayanavidhiḥ, tathā'pi bhāvanā bhāvyākāṅkṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭa- tvātprayojanavadarthajñānameva bhāvyaṃ gṛhṇāti । na cavaṃ śūdrasyā'pyadhi- kāraprasaṅgaḥ । yato labdhavidyatraivarṇikakalpanenaiva nirākāṅkṣāḥ kamiśrutayo na śūdrasya vidyāsambandhamākṣeptumalam । evañca sati traivarṇikasyopāyāntaranivṛtterarthādayamarthajñāne niyamo na tu tanniyamā- rtho'yaṃ vidhiriti । tathā sati prayojanavadarthajñānasyā'dhyayanabhāvanā- bhāvyatvādarthavādeṣu ca mukhyārtheṣu tadasambhavāt stutilakṣaṇādvāre- ṇaiva vidhyuddeśaikavākyatayā prāmāṇyamarthavādānāmiti ।

tadayuktam—evaṃ satyadhyayanavidheḥ pratyavāyaparihāraprayojane- naiva caritārthasya kiṃ bhāvanābhāvyasvīkāre'pi vyāpāro'sti ? na vā ? yadyasti tadā dṛṣṭe vidhivaiphalyāt na dṛṣṭamarthajñānaṃ bhāvanābhāvyaṃ sambhavati । kratusambandhitayā ca niyamavidheraniṣṭa- tvāt । uktasakaladāṣānatikrameṇa ca tasyā'sambhavāt । athā nā- 'sti, tadā nikṛṣṭabhāvanāmātrasya lokadṛṣṭabhāvyākāṅkṣāyāṃ nānta- rīyakatayā'rthajñāne sambadhyamāne, arthavādakṛtamapi bhūtārthajñānaṃ samba-
dhyeta । na tu puruṣasamīhitamarthajñānam, vidhitātparyābhāvāt । ato- 'rthavādānāṃ mukhyabhūtārthopapannatvānna lakṣaṇayā'pi stutiparatvam ।

tena pratyavāyaparihāraprayojanenā'rthavato'dhyayanavidherbhāvanāmā- vye'rthajñāne tātparyavirahe'pi prathamapāde vidheyakriyārthatvena codanā- prāmāṇyapratipādanāt, yasmin svādhyāyaikadeśe vidhyuddeśarūpe prāmāṇyocitaṃ vidheyarūpakriyājñānaṃ sambhavati tad bhavatu pramāṇam । yatra punararthavādabhāge bhūtārthānvayajñānamātraṃ tadvidheyarūpakriyārthatvā- bhāvādapramāṇameva ।

etenaitadapi na śaṅkanīyam—kimarthamarthavādādhyayanamiti । kṛtsnasvādhyāyādhyayanasyaiva pratyavāyaparihāraprayojanenā'rthavatvāt । etadeva cā'syā'dhikaraṇasya pāramārthikaṃ pūrvaparakṣahasyam । tasmāt “āmnāyasya” vedasya vidheyarūpa “kriyārthatvāt” pṛthagavasthitānā- marthavādānāṃ “ānarthakyaṃ” vidheyakriyānarthatvam । “tasmādanityaṃ” apramāṇaṃ “ucyata” ityevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhaṭṭamena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedetadevaṃ yadi stutidvāreṇa vidheyakriyārtha-
tvamarthavādānāṃ na syāt । vidhirhi śabdabhāvanā । sā cā'rthabhāvaneva sādhyasādhanetikarttavyatākāṅkṣiṇī । tatra puruṣapravṛttirūpaṃ bhāvyaṃ, sambandhabodhaṃ ca karaṇamāsādyetikarttavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ lokānusāreṇa pravṛtyutsāhajanakaṃ viṣayaprāśastyajñānameva svīkurute । dṛṣṭaṃ ca loke krayavikrayādivyavahāre pravṛtyutsāhajanakaṃ viṣayaprāśastyajñānameva । yathā-iyaṃ gauḥ kreyā'naṣṭaprajā bahukṣīrā stryapatyā, yathā vā-ayaṃ kretavyaḥ puruṣo na puruṣamātraṃ kintvayaṃ matto hastī, yathā vā-pratigra- hādipravṛttau nā'yaṃ brāhmaṇamātram, kintu vasiṣṭho'yamityādiṣu । tadyathā loke sadasadarthapratipādakasya padanicayasya lakṣaṇayā'pi vṛtyā prāśastyapratipādanena vidhyekavākyatvam, tathā'trā'pyarthavādānāṃ prāśastyalakṣaṇayā śabdabhāvanetikarttavyatāṃśapūraṇena vidhyuddeśaikavā- kyatvena bhavati kriyārthatvam । na cā'rthabhāvanārūpakriyāyāṃ sādhya- sādhanetikarttavyatānāmeva paramanvayaḥ, anevambhūtasya vidherananvaya- prasaṅgāt । vidheśca saparikarasyaivā'nvayāttatpraveśādeva prāśastyānvayo na tu svātantryeṇeti nā'nupapannam ।

nanu bhavatu loke puruṣābhiprāyavaśenā'nyārthasyā'pi śabdasya lakṣaṇayā'nyaparatvam । apauruṣeye tu vede kathamarthavādaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā'pi prāśastyaparatvam । maivam; bhavedevaṃ yadi vede puruṣa-
sthānīyo'dhyayanavidhirna syāt । sa hi “svādhyāyo'dhyetavya” iti śrūyamāṇo'dhyayanabhāvanābhāvyamākāṅkṣamāṇo'dhyayanaṃ dhātvarthatayā sa- nnihitamapyapuruṣārthabhūtaṃ bhāvyāṃśe nirasya karaṇāṃśe niveśayati । tataścā'dhyayanena puruṣaḥ samīhitaṃ bhāvayediti sthite dṛṣṭāsambhave cā'dṛṣṭakalpanāvasarāt, ‘yacchakyata’ ityupabandhāllokāvagataśaktyanu- sāreṇā'dhyayanasyā'kṣaragrahaṇakrameṇa puruṣābhilaṣitārthajñānahetutva- darśanāttadeva bhāvyatayā'numanyate, na tu svargādikamadṛṣṭam । na ca dṛṣṭe vidhyānarthakyānnā'rthajñānaṃ vidhyavaruddhabhāvanābhāvyam । vedasyā- 'dhyayanavidhimantareṇa arthatātparyāvadhāraṇāsambhavāt । gurūccāra- ṇādhīnaṃ hyuccāraṇamadhyayanamityucyate । uccāraṇasyā'rthaparatve śabdā- nāmarthaparatvaṃ sambhavati, na tūccāraṇamātreṇa ।

nanu lokavyutpattisiddhameva śabdānāmautsargikamarthaparatvaṃ kvaci- tpuruṣadoṣādapodyate । vede tkpauruṣeye doṣābhāvādutsargasiddhamanapodi- tamastyeva kiṃ vidhinā ? maivam; dvividho hi śabdānāmarthaḥ-kevalo viśiṣṭaśca । tatrautsargike'pi kevalārthaparatve viśiṣṭārthaparatvaṃ viśi- ṣṭārthapratyayasamuddeśatassamuccāraṇānniyatasamabhivyāhārakalpanāt nā'- nyataḥ sidhyati ।

tathā hi—‘gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastī’ti paramparāsambaddhārtheṣvapi
padārtheṣu yadā viśiṣṭārthapratītitātparyakamuccāraṇamunnīyate, tadā jagha- nyavṛtyāśrayaṇenā'pi ‘ayaṃ gauḥ, ‘aśvo vegabān’ ‘puruṣo'pyaniya- taceṣṭaḥ’ ‘hastī mahābala’ iti viśiṣṭārthabodho bhavati । tathā'nekā- rtheṣvapi akṣādiśabdeṣvarthaviśeṣāvadhāraṇaṃ na śabdasvabhāvakṛtam, ane- karūpavākyārthāvagamaprasaṅgāt । kintūccāraṇatātparyakṛtameva ।

tathā hi—gaurityayamāhetyuccarite na gośabdenā'rthapratyayaḥ, kintūccāraṇasya śabdaparatvācchabdapratyaya eva paraṃ bhavati । tena viśiṣṭārthajñānaṃ na śabdasvabhāvakṛtam । nā'pyuccāraṇasvabhāvakṛtam, kintu viśiṣṭārthapratyayatātparyakāduccāraṇabhedādeva । taccoccāraṇa- tātparyyaṃ yathā loke puruṣābhiprāyavaśādunnīyate । tathā vede viśi- ṣṭārthajñānārthoccāraṇavidhivaśādeva paraṃ pratīyata iti dṛṣṭārthatve'pi bhavatyadhyayanavidhisāphalyam ।

nanūccāraṇasyā'rthabodhahetutve'vagate dṛṣṭārthatvādadhyayanavidherartha- paratvam । adhyayanavidhau cā'rthapare uccāraṇādarthāvagatirityanyonyā- śrayam । maivam; lākāvagataśaktyanusāreṇa hi dṛṣṭārthatvamaṅgīkriyate । lokadṛṣṭyā coccāraṇasyā'kṣarādigrahaṇakrameṇa samabhivyāhṛtapadārthā- nvayajñānamutpadyata eva, kintu tātparyāvadhāraṇapramāṇābhāvādavasī- dati । adhyayanavidhestu tātparyāvadhāraṇe sati vyavatiṣṭhate । tenā-
'grato lokānusāreṇa śaktyavadhāraṇamātramadhyayanavidhitastātparyāva- dhāraṇamiti netaretarāśrayam ।

na ca vācyam—ciravṛtte'dhyayane mīmāṃsādiparicayottarakāla- marthajñānaṃ bhavati, nā'dhyayanānantaram । ataḥ kathaṃ dṛṣṭatvādarthajñānārtha- tvapradhyayanavidheriti । yato'kṣarādigrahaṇakrameṇa hyadhyayanasyā'rtha- jñānārthatvaṃ, tena ca krameṇottarakālamapi smṛtisamārūḍhasyaiva svādhyā- yasyā'rthāvabodhahetutvamaviruddham । na hi loke'pi śabdaśravaṇāna- ntarameva viśiṣṭārthāvabodhaḥ, kintu smṛtistheṣveva padeṣu nyāyasambhāva- nāsambhāvitānvayeṣu । tathehā'pīti nā'nupapannam ।

nanu dvitīyāvibhakteḥ kṛtyācca svādhyāyasyā'dhyayanasādhyatvama- vagamyate । tatkathamarthajñānasyā'pi sādhyatvam । na hyekasmin vākye sādhyadvayasamāveśassambhavati, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । maivam; bhavedevaṃ yadi vidhimeyamubhayasādhyatvaṃ bhavet । atra caivamarthāvabodhasyaiva sā- dhyatvaṃ dṛṣṭatvānna tu svādhyāyasyā'pi, tasyā'rthāvabodhasamuddeśisamu- ccāraṇavidheḥ prāganavadhāritārthatātparyasya kāryāntare ca śrutyādibhi- raviniyuktasya niṣprayojanatayā sādhyatvāyāgāt । vidhitastvavadhṛte 'dhyayanasyā'rthaparatve svādhyāyasyā'rthaparatye siddhe tadvyaktiphalaṃ samu- ccāraṇaṃ “yaistu dravyaṃ cikīṣyarta” (jai. sū. 2. 1. 3.) iti
nyāyāt । vastutaḥ svādhyāyasaṃskāra eva bhavatītyarthasiddhameva svādhyāyasya saṃskāryatvarūpeṇa sādhyatvaṃ dvitīyayā kṛtyena cā'nū- dyate । tena vidhimeyamasya pradhānakarmatvaṃ, arthasiddhaṃ tu guṇakarmatva- mityavirodhaḥ । taduktaṃ bādaryadhikaraṇe—(3. 1. 3.) “iti siddhamarthāvabodhārthamadhyayanaṃ svādhyāyasaṃskāraśce”ti ।

na ca vācyam-yathā prathamamanavagatopayogasyā'pyagneḥ “agnī- nādadhīte”ti saṃskāravidhānam, tathā svādhyāyasyā'pi prathamamana- vagatopayogasya saṃskāravidhirevā'yaṃ bhaviṣyati । tadupalabdheḥ paścā- davabodhopayogitvaṃ liṅgato bhaviṣyatīti । yato na śabdasya svabhāvakṛtamarthaparatvam, nā'pyuccāraṇasvabhāvakṛtamiti prāgevoktam । asya tūccāraṇavidherubhayatātparye sphuṭa eva vākyabhedaḥ । ādhāna- saṃskṛtasya tvagneḥ “yadāhavanīye juhoti” (tai. brā. 1. 1. 10.) iti vidhyantarasya viniyojakasya vidyamānatvānnā'yaṃ doṣaḥ । na cehā'pi tathā vidhyantaramastīti vaiṣamyam ।

evaṃ tāvatsarvaśabdānāmuccāraṇasya viśiṣṭārthāvabodhanatātparyama- ntareṇa na viśiṣṭārthajñānavyavasthetyuktam । vede tvadhyayanavidhiṃ vinoccāraṇaniyamābhāvāduccāraṇaviplave sati phalaśabdasyā'ṅga- sambandhitayā'pi uccāraṇasambhavānnā'ṅgapradhānavyavasthā । evaṃ pāṭha-
krameṇā'pyanuṣṭhānakramaḥ prayājādīnāṃ na syāt । tathaikasminnapi vākye “yo hotā so'dhvaryuri” (tāṃ. brā. 25. 4. 4.) tyādau vyati- krameṇā'pi yo'dhvaryussa hotetyuccāraṇasambhavānna prathamāvagatatvena hotṛpadārthasvīkārādadhvaryupadasya kāryalakṣaṇāparatvam । evaṃ vikṛ- tāvaindrapañcaśarāve prākṛtacaturmuṣṭinirvāpe “caturo muṣṭīnnirvapatī” (āpa. śrau. 1. 18. 2.) tyatra prathamāvagatasaṃkhyānurodhena muṣṭi- bādho na bhavet । evaṃ sakalavedārthaviplava evā''padyeta । niyatoccāraṇa- vidhau tvarthapare sati naivamādyuccāraṇaviplavakṛto'nyathārthāvabhānadoṣaḥ । tathā sati yathoccāriteṣvevā'rthatatpareṣu yathāsamabhivyāhṛteṣveva nyāyasa- mpādanavaśādākāṅkṣādyupasaṃhārādbhavatyapekṣitārthapratyayo nā'nyatheti ।

na cā'nyathoccāritasyā'vedatvādanādirevā'yamuccāraṇaniyamaḥ padoccāraṇaniyamavaditi vācyam । asatyadhyayanavidhau puruṣe- cchātantratvādarthābhidhānaśaktitantratvāccoccāraṇasya tayoścoccāvaco- ccāraṇenā'pi sambhavāduccāraṇaniyamānupapatteḥ । pade tvanyathoccāri- tasyā'pratipādakatvādyukto niyamaḥ । vedaśabdo'pi tadā nityānume- yavedavādina ivā'bhidhānatantro vedayatīti vedaḥ, na tu svādhyāyaśa- bdavadadhyayanaparatantraḥ । vedanaṃ ca yathātathoccāritādapi bhavatīti no- ccāraṇaniyamahetussambhavati । arthajñānapare punaradhyayanavidhau sambhavati
gurūccāraṇādhīnasyaivoccāraṇasyā'dhyayanapadārthatvāt । atassarvathā mānāntarāprāptamevedamadhyayanasyā'rthāvabodhakatvaṃ vidhinā jñāpyata iti । evañca satyadhyayanavidhinā kṛtsnasyaiva vedasya samīhitārthāvabodhaparatve susthite'rthavādānāṃ ca mukhyārthatve tadasambhavāllakṣaṇāśrayaṇam ।

nanvakṣarādigrahaṇakrameṇā'pekṣitadṛṣṭopayogamanusandhāyā'dhyayana- vidherapekṣitārthāvabodhārthatvam । arthavādabhāge cā'kṣaragrahaṇakrameṇā'pi nā'pekṣitārthāvabādhassambhavati । adhyayanavidhivaśādapekṣitārthāva- bodhe satītaretarāśrayatvam । tena dṛṣṭārthāvabodhasyā'vyāpitvānna kṛtsnasvādhyāyādhyayanavidherapekṣitārthāvabodhārthatvaṃ pramāṇavaditi ।

maivam; vidhyuddeśasyevā'rthavādabhāgasyā'pi lokānusāreṇā'grata eva vidheyaprāśastyalakṣaṇāśrayaṇādapekṣitārthāvabodhanaparatvasya nyā- yasampādanāpasthitatvāt । ataḥ siddhaṃ prāśastyapratipādanadvāreṇa vidhyuddeśaikavākyatayā prāmāṇyamarthavādānāmiti ।

tacca prāśastyaṃ lakṣyamāṇaṃ na pratyekaṃ padairlakṣyate । ekaikasmin pade prāśastyapratyayānutpādāt । na hi vāyupadamātre prāśastyāva- gatiḥ । kintarhi ? “vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā” (tai. saṃ. 2. 1. 1.) iti samasteṣu kṣipraphaladātṛtvalakṣaṇaprāśastyāvagatiḥ ।

prayojanam—yadyarthavādānāmaprāmāṇyam, tadā “aktāḥ śarkarā” (tai. brā. 3. 12. 5.) ityatra viśeṣopanāyakapramāṇābhāvādya- tkiñcidañjanasādhanadravyopādānam । arthavādaprāmāṇye tu “tejo vai ghṛtaṃ” (tai. brā. 3. 12. 5.) ityarthavāde ghṛtastutidarśanādghṛto- pādānameva ।
sūtranta—“vidhinā” vidhyuddeśena “ekavākyatvātstutyarthenā'rtha- vādāḥ” pramāṇaṃ syuriti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitāyaṃ vidhivannigadādhikaraṇam ।।
prabhākaramatena viṣaya śayau
chapter.p: iha ye vidhivannigadā arthavādāsta udāharaṇam । “audumbaro yūpo bhavatyūrgvā udumbara ūrkpaśava ūrjai vā'smā ūrjaṃ paśūnāpnotyūrjo- 'varudhyā” (tai. saṃ. 2. 1. 1.) iti । kimasya vidhiḥ kāryaṃ ? utā'syā'pi stutiḥ ? iti ।
atra prabhākareṇa sākṣātsaṅgatilobhena “audumbaro yūpo bhavati urjjaṃ paśūnāpnotī”tyubhayamudāhṛtya vicāritam ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“audumbaro yūpo bhavatī”ti vidhirvyava- sthita eva । “ūrjaṃ paśūnāpnoti”ityatrā'pi vidhyapekṣitapaśurūpasādhya- darśanānmukhyārthatve ca sambhavati stutyarthatvāyogāt, prayojanavatvācca vidhitātparyyaṃ tāvatpratibhāti । tathorkchabdābhidheyasyaudumbarasyā- 'nirdiṣṭavyāpārasya paśusādhanatvaṃ na sambhavatīti vidhipakṣe'pi yūpo- tpattirūpāśrayalābhāyā'paśyambhāvisannihitayūpaudumbaravidhisāpekṣa- tvāt “paśūnāpnotī”ti varttamānāpadeśapratibhātasya pañcamalakāra- tvakalpanādūrgudumbarādyarthavādapadānāṃ ca sannidhānāviśeṣādāvṛtyā'pi vidhidvayaśeṣatvakalpanādoṣāt ekārthatātparyamapi sphurati । atastā- tparyasandehenā'nadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
siddhāntastu—yadyapi niyojyaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ vidhyapekṣitasā- dhyāvabhāso'trā'sti, tathā'pi “sambhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedaśca naṣyata” iti nyāyenaikavākyatvānugrahāya yasmin pakṣa ekavākya-
tvamanuruddhaṃ bhavati, tadeva svīkaraṇīyamityanadhyavasāyābhāvāt, stutyarthatvameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadetadavicāritasakalanyāyasyā'bhidhānam । sarvatraiva hi saṃśa- yapūrvo nyāyāvatāraḥ । tatrā'nyatarapakṣaparityāgenā'nyataragrahaṇamiti sthitam । saṃśayena tvaprāmāṇyamāśaṅkya siddhāntābhidhāne sarvatraiva tathāsambhavāt sakalanyāyeṣvevā'prāmāṇyenaiva pūrvapakṣaḥ prasajyeta । tenā'trā'pi saṃśaye sati vidhitvena pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvārthavādatvaṃ siddhā- ntayitumucitam । yattvaprāmāṇyena pūrvapakṣābhidhānaṃ tadasambaddhameva । ato yathāvārttikamevedamadhikaraṇaṃ varṇanīyamiti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: pūrvatrānarthaṃkyapratiyogināmarthavādānāṃ vidhyekavākyatayā prāmā- ṇyaṃ pratipāditam । idānīṃ teṣāmeva vidhipratiyogināṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādyate । tatra “audumbaro yūpo bhavati ūrjo'varudhyā” ityatra sandehaḥ—kimayaṃ phalavidhiḥ ? utā'rthavādaḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamatra pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yadyapyatrorgavarodhasya phalatva-
pratipādikā kamiśrutirnā'sti, tathā'pi “audumbaro yūpo bhavati” kimarthamityākāṅkṣāyāmūrkchabdābhidheyasyaiva sannihitasya yogyatayā sambandhaḥ । viśeṣato yathā-‘randhanāya sthālī’ ‘mūtrāya yavāgūḥ’ tathehā'pi tādarthyapratipādikā caturthīśrutiḥ kamiśrutisamānārthā samasti । tenā'tra samabhivyāhārādeva tṛtīyāntasyā'pyaudumbaratvasya yāgasyeva svargakaraṇatvenaiva niveśaḥ, annaprāpteḥ svargasyeva sādhya- tvena । na ca stutitvenaivā'syā'nvayaḥ, phalārthatvena vidhyupayoge sati stutyarthatvāyogāt । na cā'tra vidhireva nā'sti, “audu- mbaro yūpo bhavatī”tyatraudumbarayūpasya svayaṃ bhavanāyogādapratipādyatvenau- dumbaraṃ yūpaṃ bhāvayediti siddhānte'pyavaśyakalpanīyatvāt ।

na ca cāturthagataparṇamayyadhikaraṇenā'sya gatārthatvam । tasyā- 'pyatraiva tulyanyāyatayā siddhe'rthavādatve'pāpaślokaśravaṇasya rātrisa- tranyāyena vipariṇāmakalpanayā phalatvamāśaṅkya “dravyasaṃskārakarmasu pharārthatvāt phalaśrutirarthavādaḥ” (jai. sū. 4. 3. 1.) ityanenā- 'nyārthasya dravyādeḥ phalaśrutiḥ phalākāṅkṣābhāvānna vipariṇamayituṃ śakyata ityuktam । iha tvarthavādatvameva guṇaphalasambandhanirāsena pratipādyata ityapunaruktiḥ ।

nanvaudumbarasyā'pyakriyārūpatvādguṇaphalasambandhā vaktavyaḥ ।
na cā'sau sambhavati, yataḥ kriyāśrito guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati, guṇa- sādhyā ca kriyā guṇāśrayaḥ । yathā-dadhnoddomaḥ, godohanasya praṇa- yanam । cā'tra prakṛto yāga udumbarasādhyaḥ । na ca yūpasamba- ndhopasthitā yūpotpattiḥ paśuniyojanaṃ vā''śraya iti vācyam, yataḥ phale guṇavidhiḥ prakaraṇe vihitaṃ viparivarttamānaṃ karmā''śrayati । yathā—dadhigodohanavidhiḥ । na ca yūpotpattiḥ paśuniyojanaṃ vā vikṛtivihitam, prakṛtau śrutatvāt । kiñca lokāvagatasambandho hyā- śrayo bhavati । yathā dadhigodohanayorhomapraṇayanakriye । atra tūdumba- rasya yūpasambandha eva nā'vagatapūrvaḥ, yūpasyā'laukikatvāt ataḥ kathaṃ tadvāreṇa yūpotpattipaśuniyojanāśrayatvam । anenaiva vākyena yūpasambandhakaraṇe ca vākyabheda iti ।

ucyate—yūpasambandhopasthitā yūpotpattiḥ paśuniyojanaṃ vā- ''śrayaḥ । prakaraṇaśrutenaivā''śrayeṇa bhavitavyam, nā'tidiṣṭeneti kimiyaṃ rājājñā ? buddhiviparivṛttirhyāśrayatve kāraṇam । sā ca prakaraṇavihitasyeva codakaprāptasyā'pi na viśiṣyate । tena yatra godohanādau prakaraṇavihitameva labhyate, tatra tathābhūtasyaivā''śraya- tvam । yatra codakaprāptaṃ labhyate, tatra codakaprāptasyaiva । nā'pi yūpa- syā'laukikatvenaudumbarasambandho nā'vagataḥ । yato, yadi viśeṣeṇa
prakṛtakratvapūrvīyayūpasambandho nā'vagataḥ, tadā godohanasyā'pi prakṛtāpūrvīyapraṇayanasambandhaḥ pūrvaṃ nā'vagata eva । atha tatra sāma- rthyataḥ sāmānyena pūrvamavagataḥ, tadā'laukikatve'pi yūpasya kāṣṭhama- yatvaṃ tāvadavagatameva, audumbarasyā'pi kāṣṭhamayatvātsāmānyasamba- ndhāvagā'trā'pi vidyata eveti na viśeṣaḥ । tena guṇaphalasambandha- vidhirevā'yam । tathā satyapūrvo'rtho vihito bhavati । itarathā tvanu- vādamātramanarthakamanatiprayojanamityevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: bhaṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate; ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi kamiśrutivyatire- keṇorggavarodhasya phalatvaṃ pratīyate । na ca rātrisatranyāyena kamiśruti- virahe'pi phalatvam । yūpasambandhanirākāṅkṣasyaudumbaratvasya phalākā- ṅkṣāviraheṇa vipariṇamābhāvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt । na ca tādarthyacatu- rthīvaśena randhanāya sthālītivat phalatvāvagatiḥ, vyabhicārāt । na hi ‘devāya puṣpam, brāhmaṇāya dugdhami’tyādiṣu phalatvamavagamyate । kintarhi ? prayojanatvamātram । tacca stutidvāreṇā'pyaviruddham । ‘randha- nāya sthālī’tyatra pramāṇāntaravaśādbhavatu phalatvenaiva prayojanaviśeṣa-
nirṇayaḥ । na tviha tathā pramāṇāntaraṃ phalaviśeṣanirṇayāya prakramata iti na phalārthatvenā'pyupayogassambhavati । bhavatu vā yathākathañci- tphalatvāvagatiḥ, tathā'pi kathamudumbaratvasya kriyāmanāśritasya phala- sādhanatvasambandhaḥ ।

nanvatra vikṛtau yūpastadutpattistatsambaddhaṃ paśuniyojanaṃ ca coda- kaprāptamasti । ato yūpadvāreṇa tadutpattiḥ paśuniyojanaṃ vā''śritya phalaṃ sādhayiṣyati । maivam ; vikṛtau codakaprāptasya guṇaphalavi- dhāvāśrayatvāyogāt । tathā hi-upakāradvāreṇa vikṛtau padārthaprāptiḥ । prākṛtaścopakāro yathābhūtaiḥ prākṛtapadārthairjanitastathaābhūtairevā'tra jana- yitavyaḥ । na ca prakṛtāvudumbarajātiviśiṣṭaiḥ padārthairasāvupakāro janitaḥ । tena yadi puruṣārthatvena śrutaudumbaratā prākṛtatarujātibā- dhena yūpotpattiṃ paśuniyojanaṃ vā''śrayate, tadā prākṛtopakāralābha eva vikṛtau na bhavet ।

yatra punaḥ “śamīmayyaḥ sruco bhavantī”tyādiṣu tatparaśśabda eva prākṛtatarujātibādhena jātyantaraṃ niveśayati, tatra tathābhūtasyaiva śabdena prākṛtopakārajanakatvajñānāttathaiva svīkriyate । na ceha tathā- bhūto'nyaḥ kaścicchabdo'sti । asyaiva tu śabdasya prākṛtatarujāti-
bādhenodumbaratāyā yūpasambandhapratipādanaparatve phalasambandhapratipāda- naparatve ca vākyabhedaḥ ।

na caivaṃ sati puruṣārthagodohanena kratvarthacamasabādhānna darśapūrṇa- māsopakarāsiddhiriti vācyam । yataḥ prakṛtau padārthapṛṣṭhabhāvena upa- kārakalpanā । tatra copakārākāṅkṣī vidhiḥ kratvarthapuruṣārthobhayapadārtha- niṣpādyaṃ praṇayanaṃ paśyan ubhayapadārthaniṣpādyapraṇayanasādhyamevopakāraṃ kalpayati । vaikṛtastu vidhiḥ khadirādiprakṛtikayūpasādhyasyaiva paśu- niyojanasyopakārasādhanatvena klṛptasyaivā'tideśeneha prāptatvāttathābhūta- meva svīkurute, na tvanyathābhūtam । tasyopakārajanakatvena tatrā'nava- gatatvāt । tasmādudumbaravidhirevā'yaṃ yūpasambandhena śamīvidhiriva sruksambandheneti । “ūrgudumbara” ityādipadānāṃ “ūrjjo'varudhyā” ityantānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ stutiparatvameveti । tasmādevaṃvidhānāmarthavā- datvameva, na tu phalavidhitvamiti siddham ।

na ca “nivṛttirvā karmmabhedāt” (jai. sū. 8. 1. 24.) itya- ṣṭamādhyāyagatādhikaraṇena vikṛtau guṇaphalapravṛtternirākṛtatvādidamanā- rabhyamiti vācyam । yatastatra prakṛtiśrutasya godohanāderguṇasya puruṣārthatvādvikṛtāvatideśo nirākṛtaḥ । taduktaṃ ṭupṭīkāyām— “yatkratvarthaṃ tadatidiśyate । na ca godohanādīnāṃ kratvarthatā” (ṭu. ṭī.
8. 1. 14. pṛ. 1597. pū. saṃ.) iti । iha tu vikṛtiśruta- syaivodumbarādiguṇasyā'tidiṣṭāśrayamāsādya phale vidhānaṃ nirākri- yata iti vaiṣamyam ।

ata eva yairvidhyanupayogena pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā vidhyupayogena siddhā- ntitaṃ tairatidiṣṭāśrayo guṇavidhiranirākṛta eva syāt । na ca vidhyu- payogavarṇanamapyanyatra na kṛtam, tasyautpattikasūtraviṣayatvenaiva prathamapāda eva varṇitatvāt । taduktaṃ tatraiva—
(ślo. vā. pṛ. 221 cau. saṃ.)
tena pakṣavikalpamātreṇa yaduktaṃ vārttikakṛtā tadeva vicāryatvena bhrāntairanumitamiti nā''daraṇīyameveti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe guṇaphalārthinaiva paramaudumbaro yūpaḥ kāryaḥ । siddhānte tvaudumbaratāyāḥ prākṛtajātibādhena kratvarthatvā- nnityamevaudumbaro yūpaḥ karttavya iti ।
sūtrantu—evaṃvidhānāṃ “vākyaśeṣatvaṃ” arthavādādhikaraṇa evoktamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ hetuvannigadādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha ye hetuvannigadāḥ “śūrpeṇa juhoti, tena hyannaṃ kriyate” (śa. brā. 2. 4. 3. 23) ityevamādayaḥ, teṣu sandehaḥ— kiṃ stutisteṣāṃ kāryam ? uta hetuḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam— “tena hyannaṃ kriyata”ityatra hiśabdaprayogādannakaraṇasya śūrpahome hetutva- mavagamyate-yasmādannakaraṇaṃ śūrpaṃ, tasmāttena hotavyam । annakara- ṇatvaṃ ca darvīpiṭharādiṣvapi sādhāraṇamiti tairapi hotavyam । evaṃ ca sati hiśabdasya heturūpaḥ śrauto'rtho'nugṛhīto bhavati, pravṛttivi- śeṣakaratvaṃ ceti । ato hetusāpekṣakāryapratipādakatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ
codanāyā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । na cā'rthavādādhikaraṇenaiva gatārthatvam, tatra hi siddhasādhyasamabhivyāhārakalpyo hetubhāvaḥ pradhānabhūta- kāryavirodhena tyajyatāṃ nāma । iha tu śabdāvagatatvāviśeṣeṇa hi- śabdāvagato hetubhāvaḥ kāryāvagamānurodhānna tyaktuṃ śakyata iti na gatārthatā ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—yadyapīha hetupratipādakaḥ śabdo'sti, tathā'pi vyāpteḥ pramāṇāntarānavagatatvānnā'tra hetubhāvo ghaṭate । na ca śabda- balenaiva hetutvam, nirapekṣaśabdāvagatasya kāryasya hetvapekṣābhāvena sambandhābhāvāt । tenaivaṃvidhānāṃ stutidvāreṇaiva prāmāṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadetadasaṅgatam, arthavādādhikaraṇagatatvenā'nārabhyatvāt । anena vā daṇḍāpūpīyanyāyainā'rthavādādhikaraṇasyā'nārabhyatvāditi yatkiñcidetat । tasmādyathāvārttikamevedamadhikaraṇaṃ varṇanīyam ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: vidhipratiyogikamarthavādatvaṃ nirūpyedānīṃ hetupratiyogikaṃ ni- rupyate-kimayaṃ hetuvidhiḥ ? utā'rthavādaḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—juhotītyatra vidhīyamāne home hiśabdopāttahetutvānurodhena yasmādannakaraṇatvaṃ śūrpe vidyate, tataḥ śūrpaṃ sādhanamiti śūrpasambandho'vagamyate । na ca vedapratipannārthasya hetvapekṣāvirahādapekṣāvaśācca śabdārthasambandhasya sambandha eva heto- rnā'vagata iti vaktavyam । svarasato hetvapekṣāyā abhāve'pi raktapa- ṭanyāyenā''kāṅkṣotthāpanenaiva hetusambandhopapatteḥ । na caitadupapadyate । na hi homasyā'nnakaraṇasambandhaḥ kenacidavagatacaraḥ । na cā'nava- gatasambandho heturbhavati । tena yatra yathopapadyate, tatra tathā kalpanī- yam । tadā copapadyate hetuḥ, yadyannakaraṇamātrasya home viniyogo- 'sti । tena śrutārthāpatyā yadannakaraṇaṃ, tena hotavyamiti hetusiddhaye viniyojikā śrutiḥ kalpanīyā । tasyāṃ ca daśāyāṃ “śūrpeṇa juhotī” ti ekadeśānuvāda evā'yamiti । tathā ca sati darvīpiṭharādīnāma- pyannakaraṇatvāttairapi hotavyamiti ।

na ca vācyam—“tena hyannaṃ kriyata”ityetasyā'rthavādatvānabhyu- pagame kathaṃ varttamānāpadeśarūpasya “śūrpeṇa juhotī”tyasya pañcamalakā- ratvakalpanayā vidhitvamiti । yataḥ “tena hyannaṃ kriyata” iti hetuprati- pādanapareṇā'pyanenā'rthato'nnakaraṇarūpasya prāśastyasyā'pi pratipādi-
tatvāt । etāvataiva vidhitvasiddherna prāśastyārthamarthavādāntarāpekṣā ।

atha vā “tena hyannaṃ kriyata” ityarthavāda evā'yaṃ, tadunnītaṃ ca “śūrpeṇa juhotī”tyasya vidhitvam, tathā'pyannakaraṇatvarūpeṇa stu- tiviṃdhiṃ vyavasthāpayatīti । ‘na nimittaṃ vidhirapabādhata’ iti nyā- yādannakaraṇameva śūrpaśabdalakṣitaṃ homasādhanamiti pratipādayati । yathā rātrisatre “ya etā rātrīrupayanti te pratitiṣṭhanti” (tāṃ. brā. 23. 20. 4.) iti phalaprakāśakārthavādabalena vidhirvyavasthāpya- mānaḥ pratiṣṭhāphalaka eva vyavatiṣṭhate, na tvanyathā । tenā'syā'rtha- vādasyaiva sato'nnakaraṇamātrasya homasambandhe hetutvenā'pyupayoga iti । tathā ca sati yadyadannakaraṇaṃ tena tena hotavyamiti darvīpiṭharāderapi homasādhanatvam । asmin pakṣe “śūrpeṇa juhoti” ityenenaiva vākyenā- nnakaraṇamātrasya home vidhānaṃ śūrpapadaṃ ca lakṣaṇāvṛttam । pūrvatra tu śrutārthāpattikalpitena vidhānaṃ śūrpapadaṃ caikadeśānuvāda iti । ato heturevā'yam । tathā ca satyarthavādatvaṃ sāpapattikaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi śrutārthāpattikalpitena vacane-
nā'nnakaraṇamātrasya home viniyogo bhavet । na cā'sau sambha- vati, kalpanāhetorasambhavāt । annakaraṇahetukaḥ śūrpasya homasambandho nopapadyata iti cet-na; sambandhāvagaterabhāvāt । ākāṅkṣāditraya- nibandhana hi śābdaḥ sambandho bhavati । na ca vedāvabodhitaśūrpaho- masambandhe hetvapekṣā samasti, yena hetusambandho bhavet । na ca rakta- paṭanyāyenā''kāṅkṣāmutthāpya sambandha iti vaktavyam । yatassatī khalvākāṅkṣā'nudbhūtā padāntareṇotthāpyate । yathā—paṭasya rakta- padena । iha tu hetvapekṣā śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantā'satī notthāpayitu- mapi śakyā । ataḥ kalpanābījābhāvānnā'nnakaraṇamātrasya homa- sambandhaḥ ।

abhyupetyā'pyucyate-bhavatu vā'nnakaraṇatvasya hetutvaṃ, tathā'pi dvividhaṃ hi śūrparūpam । yattaṇḍulaprasphoṭanasamarthantadannakaraṇam । yattvadṛḍhamasamarthaṃ tannā'nnakaraṇam । tena yadannakaraṇaṃ śūrpaṃ, tena hota- vyamityetāvataivā'nupapattipraśamanādeṣaiva kalpanā yujyate । na tu darvī- piṭharādisādhāraṇī । ataḥ “tena hyannaṃ kriyata” ityasya hetuvidhitvaṃ tāvadanupapannam । na cā'syā'rthavāde'nnakaraṇatvena stutidarśanāttada- nurodhena śūrpaśabde'nnakaraṇamātralakṣaṇā । yato, na hi yatra yenā- ''kāreṇa stutirbhavati, tatra tenaiva rūpeṇa vidhiriti loke pratītam ।
na hi ‘yuddhāya devadattamānayā'tisubhaṭo'sā’viti stutau yāvatsubhaṭā- nayanavidhiṃ lokāḥ pratipadyante । kintarhi ? devadattastutimeva । tathā śūrpastutyarthatvamevā'sya pratyetumucitam, na tu yāvadannakaraṇa- viniyogārthatvam । evaṃ satyarthavādasyaiva prāśastyalakṣakatvaṃ bhavati, na tu ‘vidhau na paraśabdārtha’ itinyāyaviruddhatvāt vidhyuddeśavarttinaḥ śūrpaśabdasya । anirddiṣṭaphale karmmaṇyapekṣāvaśādārthavādikaphalasa- mbandho loke'pi dṛṣṭa eva । yathe‘māṃ gāṃ krīṇīhi, bahukṣīrā hīya’- mityukte bahukṣīrakāma eva tatra pravarttate । tenā'nirddiṣṭaphale rātri- satre lokānusāreṇā'pekṣāvaśādbhavatvārthavādikaphalatvameva । na cā'tra lokānusāro'sti । na cā'vagataśūrpasambandhe home sādhanā- ntarāpekṣā samastīti śūrpastutireveyamiti ।
prayojanam-yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā darvīpiṭharādibhirapi hota- vyam । yadi siddhāntastadā śūrpeṇaiva ।
sūtraṃ tu—śūrpasya “śabdapūrvatvāt” śūrpasyaiveyaṃ “stutiḥ” । na tvanena darvīpiṭharāderannakaraṇasya “codaneti” ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ mantrādhikaraṇam ।।
tadarthaśāstrāt ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: athedānīṃ kiṃ vivakṣitavacanā mantrāḥ ? utā'vivakṣitavacanāḥ ? iti । kimarthaprakāśanena yāga upakurvanti ? utoccāraṇamātreṇa ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhādityamupavarṇitamadhikaraṇam— “uru prathā uru prathasveti puroḍāśaṃ prathayati” (śa. brā. 1. 1. 6. 8.) ityatra “uru prathā uru prathasve”ti mantrasya yadyartho vivakṣitastadā tatsāmarthyādeva liṅgātpuroḍāśaprayane tasya viniyogasiddheḥ “puroḍāśaṃ prathayatī”ti tadarthaśāstramavivakṣitārthaṃ syāt । atha tadarthaśāstraṃ vi- vakṣitārthaṃ, tadā mantrasyā'vivakṣitārthateti parasparavyāghātādaprāmā- ṇyaṃ codanāyā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
siddhāntastu—kiñcitkarasya kiñcitkārye kiñcitkriyādvāreṇa viniyogo bhavati । yathā'vaghātasya kiñcitkarasya kiñcitkārye vrī- hau dvitīyābhidheyaphalabhāgitārūpakriyādvāreṇa । tena yatraitatritayaṃ
śrutito'vagamyate, tatra śrutita eva viniyogāvagamo bhavati । iha punaḥ “iti puroḍāśaṃ prathayatī”ti śrutau itikaraṇena kiñcitkarā ma- ntraḥ pratīyate । ‘puroḍāśaṃ prathayedi’ti puroḍāśaprathanaṃ kiñcitkāryaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca kiñcitkriyāviśeṣaḥ śruteḥ । pratīyate tu mantrasyābhidhā- nasāmarthyarūpālliṅgādabhidhāyakasya mantrasya kiñcitkaratā । abhi- dheyasya ca prathanasya kiñcitkāryatā । abhidhānasya ca prakāśanarū- pasya kiñcitkriyātvamiti । tena mantraliṅgādeva tritayopasthitermantra- liṅgameva puroḍāśaprathane mantraviniyojakam । tathā ca sati “puroḍāśaṃ prathayatī”ti śrutiranuvādikaiva ।

yatra tu śrutyaiva tritayopasthitiḥ, yathā—“aindrā gārhapatyamupa- tiṣṭhata” (mai. saṃ. 3. 2. 4.) ityaindrīmantrasya kiñcitkāryatā, upa- pūrvasya tiṣṭhateḥ prakāśanārthatvāt, prakāśanasya kiñcitkriyātvami- ti, tatra śrutireva viniyojikā । na ceha mantraliṅgasya viniyo- jakatvācchrutervaiyarthyam, anvitakāryapratipādanenaiva prayojanatvāt । na hi sarvatraivā'nvitakāryapratipādanādanyatprayojanamasti । anuvāde'pi tadavyāhatameveti na parasparavyāghātādaprāmāṇyaṃ codanāyā iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p:
tadetadasaṅgatam; parasparavyāghātahetorabhāvena pūrvapakṣābhāvāt ।
tulyabalayorhi vyāghāto bhavati । mantrasya tu sāmarthyānusāreṇa kalpanīyaḥ śrutyā viniyogaḥ । tadarthaśāstraṃ tu śrutirūpatayā svata eva viniyojakam । tadevaṃ pratyakṣaśrutivaśānmantrasyā'vivakṣārthatva- meva । pūrvapakṣoktaḥ parasparavyāghātastu kutaḥ ?

na ca vācyam—yadyapyadhyāpanavidhiprayuktamadhyayanaṃ, tathā'pi nāntarīyakatayā gamyamānasyā'rthasyā'pyantaraṅgatayā'dhyetradhikāraparyava- sānārthamapekṣitasyā'dhyayanavidhinā vivakṣitvāt kṛtsnasyaiva mantrasya vivakṣitārthatvena bhavati vyāghāta iti । nirvāpamantre “devasya tvā savituḥ prasava” (tai. saṃ. 1. 1. 4.) ityādīnāmavivakṣitārthā- nāmapi darśanāt । na ca teṣāmarthavādatvam, vidhyekavākyatāyā abhāvāt । yathā ca teṣāmuccāraṇaṃ, humādipadānāṃ coccāraṇaṃ prayo- gasamavetārthābhāvenā'dṛṣṭārthaṃ, tathā tadarthaśāstreṇa tādrūpyaparicchedāda- trā'pyadṛṣṭārthameva mantroccāraṇamiti yuktam ।

bhavatu vā mantrasya vivakṣitārthatve tatkārita eva mantravini- yāgaḥ, tathā'pi tadarthaśāstrasya nā'vivakṣitārthatvam । yato'rthavā- dādhikaraṇa evaitannirūpitam-yadvidhiprāptaprāśastyānuvādakasyā'pya- rthavādasyā'dhyayanavidhivaśādanuvādakatvenaiva vivakṣitārthatvam । ata- stulyanyāyatayā tenaiva gatatvāttulyārthayormantratadarthaśāstrayoranyatara-
syā'nuvādakatvena vivakṣitārthatve sati yadetadvyāghātābhidhānaṃ, tat pūrvāparānavahitasyaiveti yatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikamevedamadhika- raṇaṃ varṇanīyam ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: arthavādānāṃ vidheyastutyupayogadvāreṇa prāmāṇye nirūpite satī- dānīṃ mantrāṇāṃ vihitārthaprakāśanopayogadvāreṇa prāmāṇye pratipāda- yitavye kiṃ vivakṣitārthā mantrāḥ ? utā'vivakṣitārthāḥ ? iti nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvadvihitārthaprakāśanena ma- ntrāṇāṃ kratūpayogassambhavati, dhyānādibhirapi tadupapattau mantravayarthyāt, viparītatvācca । arthe hi prathamamavagate tadvācakaśabdasmaraṇaṃ bhavati । sa cedarthaḥ prathamamavagata eva, kiṃ mantreṇa ? na ca mantrasmāritānuṣṭhitenaiva kratūpakārassidhyatīti niyamassambhavati । yato vivakṣitārthatve sati mantrāṇāmavaghātādivanniyamādṛṣṭakalpanopapattiḥ । na caiṣāmartho vivakṣitaḥ, tadarthaśāstravirodhāt । yadi hi“uru prathā uru prathasve”ti mantro vivakṣitārthassyāttadā tadabhidhānasāmarthyādeva puroḍāśaprathane viniyogasiddheranena mantreṇa “puroḍāśaṃ prathayatī”ti viniyogaśruti-
ranarthikā bhavet । tenaitadavagamyate—naiva mantrā vivakṣitārthā iti । taduktaṃ bhāṣye-“sākṣaścedanyena nīyate nūnamakṣimyāṃ na paśyati” (śā. bhā. 1. 2. 4. pṛ. 39. cau. saṃ.) iti ।

kiñca kvacinmantraliṅgaviparīte'rthe śrutyā viniyogo dṛśyate । yathā—aindrīmantrasya gārhapatye । tadapi mantrasya vivakṣitārthatve na ghaṭeta । evaṃ nirvāpamantre “devasya tvā”dipadānāṃ prayogāsamavetārthānā- mavaśyamavivakṣitārthatvaṃ vaktavyam । tathā humādipadānāṃ cā'rthābhā- vādavivakṣitārthatvaṃ siddhameva । tena yatrā'pyartho'vagamyate, tatrā'pya- nuṣṭheyasmṛteranyataḥ siddhatvenoktatvādavivakṣitārthatvaṃ siddhameva mantrā- ṇāmiti । ataḥ prakaraṇapaṭhitānāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ śrutivākyaprakaraṇādiviniyuktānāṃ pradhānavidhinā svarū- pamevā'ṅgīkṛtam । tacca svarūpamakriyārūpatvādyadyapi netakarttavyatātva- madhikurute, tathā'pi svarūpāṅgatvārthamavaśyābhyupetavyoccāraṇakriyā- dvāreṇa kārakatvenaiva svīkriyate । uccāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭāsambhavādadṛṣṭārthameva prayājādivaditi ।

nanvapekṣitārthāvabodhārtho'dhyayanavidhiḥ kṛtsnasvādhyāyasyaiva vivakṣitārthatvamāpādayan mantrasyā'vivakṣitārthatve viruddhyeta । maivam; humādivat svādhyāyāvināśasidhyarthamevā'dhyayanopapatteḥ ।
atha vā mantrabhāge'pyapekṣitārthāvabodhārtha evā'dhyayanavidhiḥ । mukhyārthatvaṃ hi śabdānāmautsargikam । tadanupapattau lākṣaṇika- syā'pi śābdatvaṃ bhavati । tadatrā'pi tadarthaśāstrādibhirmukhyārthatvā- nupapatteḥ pratipādakatvena mukhyārthasambaddhaṃ svarūpameva mantrā lakṣaya- nti । tacca svarūpaṃ dṛṣṭāsambhavāduccāraṇadvāreṇā'dṛṣṭenopakāreṇa kratāvupayujyata iti bhavatyatrā'pyadhyayanavidherapekṣitārthāvabodha- paratvam ।

nanu bhinnayorhi lakṣyalakṣakabhāvo bhavati, yathā prāśastyārtha- vādayoḥ । iha tu tadeva mantrasvarūpaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣakamiti svātmani vṛttivirodhānna sambhavati । maivam; mantrāṇāmapyubhayarūpasvīkārāt । yathā hyasya pramāṇatvaṃ rūpam, tathā prameyatvamapyasyā'styeva । tena pramāṇatvena rūpeṇa lakṣakatvaṃ, prameyatvena ca lakṣyatvamiti kimanupa- pannam । etena śābdāśābdayorananvayāt, kathamaśābdasya mantrasya śābdakratubhāvanānvaya ityetadapi pratyuktam । ekasyaiva mantrasya pratipādyapratipādakarūpeṇa lakṣaṇayā śābdatvasyoktatvādityetattadartha- śāstrādibhiravivakṣitārthatvena mantrāṇāmadṛṣṭārthatvamevetyevaṃ prāpto; abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi mantrāṇāmavivakṣitārthatvaṃ bhavet । tathā hi—adhyayanavidhinā hi pṛthagaghītānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ kratumadhyagataṃ cā'dhyayanaṃ vidhīyate । na tatra svarūpajñānārthatvaṃ, mantrasamāmnāyaga- tenaiva pāṭhena tasya siddhatvāt । tena kratūpayogajñāpanārthameva taditi niścīyate । kratūpayogaśca teṣāṃ prayājādivākyavannārthasamarpaṇena, nivṛttavyāpārāṇāṃ tadarthasya vidhivākyādevā'vagate । ataḥ svarū- peṇaiva teṣāṃ kratūpayogo vaktavyaḥ । tacca svarūpaṃ svayamakriyātvā- dyadyapi netikarttavyatārūpeṇa prakaraṇena gṛhyate, tathā'pi kārakatvena rūpeṇa grahītuṃ śakyata eva । kiṃ kurvatastasya kārakatvamityapekṣāyāṃ, yacchaknuyāditi dṛṣṭaśaktyanusandhāne vākyārthapratītistatkāryamupa- lakṣyate, anuṣṭheyavihitapadārthasmaraṇaṃ ca prayogavidhirapekṣate । mantra- vākyārthaśca pratītassannekadeśadvāreṇā'pi śaknoti tatsmārayitu- miti vihitapadārthasmaraṇaphalavākyārthajñānameva kurvatāṃ bhavati prakara- ṇena kārakatayā grahaṇam । tenoccāraṇamevaiṣāṃ svarūpābhivyaktaye prayogakāle'vaśyakaraṇīyaṃ, na tu prayājādivākyānāmapi prakaraṇagra- haṇaṃ, teṣāṃ svarūpasyā'grahaṇāditi viśeṣaḥ ।

yadi tu smṛtiphalamapekṣitaṃ dṛṣṭamarthajñānaṃ nopalabhyeta, tadā
kevalādṛṣṭaphaloccāraṇakriyayaivā'sya kārakatvaṃ bhavedapi । sati tu paramparayā'pi dṛṣṭalābhe nā'dṛṣṭakalpanopapattimatīti vivakṣitārthā eva mantrā iti । na ca dhyānādibhirapi smaraṇopapattau mantravaiyarthyam । niyamādṛṣṭainaiva'rthavatvāt । yathā hi prakārāntareṇā'pi vaituṣyasiddhau niyamārtho'vaghātādividhirarthavān bhavati, tathā'yamapīti nā'nupapa- nnam । ato vivakṣitārthatvānmantrāṇāṃ na svādhyāyāvināśārthaṃ mantrādhyayanam । nā'pi mukhyārthānupapatyā lakṣaṇayā svarūpaparatvam, kintarhi ? mantrādhyayanamapekṣitavākyārthāvabādhārthameva ।

nanu kathaṃ tarhi siddhānte'pi aśābdasya mantrasya kratubhāva- nayā samanvayaḥ ? tatra kecicchābdatvasidhyarthaṃ siddhānte'pi lakṣaṇayā svarūpaparatvaṃ vadanti । tadayuktam; mukhyārthaparityāgena tatsambaddho- papādakārthāntarakalpanā hi lakṣaṇeti lakṣaṇātatvam । na cā'tra pūrvapakṣavādimata iva siddhānte'pi mukhyārthaparityāgo'sti, vivakṣi- tārthatvānmantrāṇām । kintu prayogabhāvanā'nuṣṭheyasmṛtimantareṇā'nu- papadyamānā prakaraṇāmnātamantrārthavatvāya smṛtisamarthaṃ mantrameva smṛti- hetutayā'ṅgīkurute । tacca mantrasyā'śābdatve na sambhavatīti tadarthaṃ śrutārthāpatyā tatparaśabdakalpanamevocitam । viśvajidādāvivopapā- dakatvena tarkitasya svargasya tatparaśabdakalpaneneti nā'nupapannam ।

na ca tadarthaśāstrādibhiravivakṣitārthatvam, tadarthaśāstrasyaivā'bhā- vāt । tatra “barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi” (mai. saṃ. 1. 1. 2.) ityādau tāvattatsambhāvanaiva na samasti । yatrā'pi tatsambhāvanā samasti abhryādānamantreṣu, tatrā'pi na śrutermantraviniyojakatvam । kintarhi ? sāmarthyato mantrāstadādāne prāptāḥ, “tāṃ caturbhirādatta” (tai. saṃ. 5. 1. 1.) iti śrutyā catussaṃkhyā'pyādāne vihitā । tayoścaikādāna- kriyānvaye satyaruṇaikahāyanīnyāyena parasparaniyame sati samuccitaireva caturbhirmantrairādānaṃ karttavyamiti vākyārthassampadyate । tena catussaṃkhyā- śravaṇaṃ tatra guṇārthameva । taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa—“guṇārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ” (jai. sū. 1. 4. 41)iti ।

evaṃ “imāmagṛbhṇanraśanāmṛtasyetyaśvābhidhānīmādata” (tai. saṃ. 5. 1. 2.) ityādau ca mantrasya sāmarthyatā garddabharaśanāyāmapi prāptirbhava- tyeva, tathā'pi liṅgaviniyogasya śrutyanumānena viprakṛṣṭatvāt “ityaśvābhidhānīmādatta” iti pratyakṣaśrutivaśādeva mantrasyā'śvaraśa- nāyāṃ viniyogānmantraprakaraṇinornairākāṅkṣye jāte na liṅgadvāreṇa sāmānyaśrutikalpanam । ataḥ pratyakṣaśrutireva mantraviniyojiketi । kintu vinā'pi vidhinā prāpsyataḥ kiṃ vidhineti prayojanagaveṣa- ṇāyāṃ liṅgasya raśanāmātraviṣayatvādgardabharaśanāyāmapi mantraprasaktau
tannivṛttireva prayojanam । taduktaṃ grahādhikaraṇe—

lg.l: prayojanaṃ vidheḥ kiṃ syādasyeti tu nirūpaṇe ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā. 3. 1. 7. pṛ. 711. pū. saṃ.)

taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā—“parisaṃkhyā” (jai. sū. 1. 4. 42.) । “uru prathā uru prathasveti puroḍāśaṃ prathayati yajñapatimeva tatprajayā paśubhiḥ prathamayatī”tyatra tu puroḍāśaprathanamevā'prāptaṃ vidhīyate । na ca puroḍāśānyathānupapatyā prāptatvātprathanamavidheyam । aprathitenā'pi tvarāviśeṣavaśāt piṣṭakaniṣpattidarśanāt । prathanavidhau tu tasyā- 'vaśyakarttavyatvānmantrasyā'pi liṅgatastatprakāśakatvaṃ bhavati । udā- haraṇāntarāṇi bhāṣyavārttikayoreva sugamānīti neha pradarśyante ।

yatra punaḥ śrautaviniyogavaśādeva mantrasya tatprākāśanasāmarthyaṃ vṛttyantareṇā'pi kalpanīyam, tatraiva śruterviniyojakatvam । yathā—
“aindrā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata” iti, “dhānyamasi dhinuhi devāniti dṛṣadi taṇḍulānāvapatī”tyādau । nirvāpamantrādau tu “devasya tvā”dipadānā- masamavetārthatve'pyekavākyabhāvabalenaivambhūtārthaprakāśanenaiva smāritānāṃ vidheyārthānāmanuṣṭhānamabhyudayāyeti niyamādṛṣṭamevā'pi dṛṣṭānuro- dhātkalpanīyam । yathā—prokṣitābhyāmevolūkhalamusalābhyāmava- hataireva vituṣairvrīhibhirniṣpāditaḥ puroḍāśo'pūrvasādhanamiti prokṣaṇa- mapi niyamādṛṣṭāṃśapatitam, tathehā'pīti । tena humādīnāmeva para- marthābhāvenā'vivakṣitārthatvādadṛṣṭārthameva viniyogaḥ svādhyāyarakṣaṇārthaṃ cā'dhyayanavidhinā pāṭho na tvanyatrā'pīti ।

nanvevaṃ bhavatu vivakṣitārthatvaṃ, prāmāṇyaṃ tu katham ? vidhyuddeśā- vagatārthānuvādakatvenā'nadhigatārthagantṛtvābhāvāt । maivam; na hi prativedavākyamanadhigatārthagantṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpādanīyam । “ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate” “ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajata” (tai. saṃ. 1. 6. 9.) ityādāvanuvādarūpatvena tadabhāvāt । kiṃ tarhi ? dharmapramityupayogitvam । tacca paramparayā vidvadvākyasyeva mantrasyā'stīti kimanupapannam ।
prayojanam—yadyavivakṣitārthā mantrāstadā dhyānādibhireva saṃsmṛtānāmanuṣṭhānam । atha vivakṣitārthāstadā, mantrasmāritānāmeveti ।
sūtrantu—na hi laukikavākyānāṃ mantravākyānāṃ ca kaścidvi- śeṣo'sti, yena pratīyamāno'pyartho na vivakṣyata iti ।।

lg.l: yo nāma kaścidiha saṅkalitaṃ prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।
matkartṛtāmananukīrttya sa kīrttilopāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāt ।।

chapter.trailer: iti bālabalabhībhujaṅgāparanāmno bhavadevasya kṛtau tautātitamatatilake prathamasyā'dhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
chapter.head: * śrīḥ *
prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
tatra prathamaṃ smṛtyadhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: evaṃ tāvatkṛtsnasya vedasya prāmāṇyamuktam । athedānīṃ yatra vaidikaṃ śabdamupalabhante, atha ca smarantyevamayaṃ padārtho'nuṣṭhātavya etasmai prayojanāyeti, kimasau tathaiva syānneti bhavati vicāraṇā । yathā—“aṣṭakāḥ kartavyāḥ” “gururupagantavyaḥ” “taṭākaṃ khanitavyam” “prapāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ” “śikhākarma katavyami”ti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atra prābhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam— atra sarveṣāmeva smṛtivākyānāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ vidhyarthavādamantraikavā- kyatā pratīyate । tathā hi—“ācāntena karma kartavyam” “dakṣiṇā- cāreṇa kartavyam” “yajñopavītinā karma kartavyami”tyādismṛtivā-
kyānāṃ vedavihitasakalakarmoddeśenā''camanādividhānātsakalavidhyu- ddeśaikavākyatvam । tathā “prapāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ”ityādismṛtivā- kyasya “sthalayodakaṃ parigṛhṇantī”ti prapāstāvakārthavādenā''kāṅkṣayā yogyatayā vaikavākyatā । evamaṣṭakākarmaṇo rātridevatatvāt“aṣṭakāḥ kartavyā” iti smṛtivākyasyā'pyaṣṭakākarmapratipādakasya—

lg.l: saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā no'stu sumaṅgalī” ।।

chapter.p: iti mantreṇa rātrirūpadevatāprakāśanenā''kāṅkṣayā yogyatayā vaikavākyatvam ।
nanu “yadi rakṣobhyo bibhiyādetayā niśi yajete”ti pratyakṣave- davihitasyaiva niśīṣṭirūpakarmaṇo rātrikāle vihitasya vidyamāna- tvāttatra kālaprakāśanenaiva nirākāṅkṣasya kathaṃ smṛtyekavākyatvam ।

naitat; pratinandantīti mantraliṅgavirodhāt । devatāṃ hi janāḥ pūjādibhiḥ pratinandanti, na tu kālam । dṛṣṭārthatvācca, devatāprakā- śane hyanuṣṭheyārthatvaṃ bhavati, kālasya cā'nanuṣṭhetvādadṛṣṭārthatvam । kāryapratyāsatteśca sākṣādyāgaśarīrasampādakatvena devatā kāryapratyā- sannatarā, na kālaḥ । ato mantrasya devatābhūtarātriprakāśanena rātri-
devatākāṣṭakākarmapratipādakasmṛtyekavākyatvameva । na caivaṃ sati nityā- nityasaṃyogavirodhādasambandhaḥ, smṛtiparamparāyā api pravāhanitya- tvena sambandhopapatteḥ । smṛtiśca nirmūlatvādapramāṇam । ataśca tade- kavākyatāpannasya trividhasyaiva vedasyā'prāmāṇyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—āptatarāṇāṃ manvādīnāṃ bhrāntivipralambhādya- sambhavādatīndriyārtaviṣayatvena ca pratyakṣādimūlatvānupapatteḥ pāri- śeṣyādanumānasiddhaṃ vedamūlatvameva । sa ca vedaḥ sarvaśākhāsu kenā- 'pyanadhīyamānatvena nityānumeya eva । ato vedamūlatvātsmṛtīnāṃ tadekavākyatve'pi trividhasya vedasya prāmāṇyameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p:
tadetadasambaddham; kimatra pūrvapakṣī manvādivākyeṣvapūrvakāryā- bhidhānaṃ svīkurute ? na vā ? na tāvatsvīkurute । yo hi puṃvākyeṣu kriyākāryābhidhānamapi nā'numanyate, sa nirmūleṣu manvādipuruṣavā- kyeṣu vaktṛjñānānumānenā'pyarthāpratipādakeṣvapūrvakāryābhidhānaṃ vadannā- tmamanoyogaviyukta eva pratibhāti । atha na svīkurute, tadā katha- mācamanādismṛtīnāmakāryārthānāṃ kāryārthavaidikavākyaikavākyatvam ?
kathañca ‘prapāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ’ iti smṛtyā saha stutidvāreṇa ‘sthala- yodakaṃ parigṛhṇantī’tyarthavādasyaikavākyatvam ? kathañcā'ṣṭakāsmṛtyā saha vaidikamapi niśīṣṭiviṣayaṃ kāryaṃ parityajyā'vyavahitakāryasamba- ndhalobhena devatābhūtarātriprakāśanena “yāṃ janā ”mantrasyaikavākyatvam । tasmātrividhasyā'pi vedasya smṛtyekavākyatvābhāvānnirmūlatvena smṛ- teraprāmāṇye'pi na vedasyā'prāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣastāvadanupapannaḥ ।

tathā nityānumeyavedamūlatvena siddhānto'pi hṛdayaśūnyasyaivā'- vabhāti । na hu varṇamātraṃ padamātraṃ vā vedaḥ, kintu niyatasvarānu- pūrvīkamapauruṣeyaṃ vākyam । tatraiva vedaśabdaprayogāt । na cā'nuccā- ryamāṇasya nityānumeyasya vākyasyaivaṃ rūpatvaṃ sambhavati, svarakra- mādīnāmuccāraṇādhīnatvāt । ata eva liṅgānumeyā'pi śrutirna- vedaḥ । kintarhi ? liṅgavanmantrānumānādvedasamānatā । tena yadyāva- cchrutārthāpatyā kalpyate, tatsakalamanupapadyamānaśabdabhāgādhyayanasyaiva tātparyam । tasmādveda iva vedo na tu veda iti sthitiḥ ।

atha vā bhavatu yathā tathā'pi vedatvaṃ, tathā'pi pauruṣeyādvacanā- ‘devamayaṃ puruṣo vede’tyanumīyate । vaktṛdhīhetuniścayāccā'rthaniścaya iti bhavato darśanam । smṛtivākye cā'rthaniścayāya vaktṛdhīhetvanusa- ndhāne kriyamāṇe na sākṣādarthasamarpako vedo labhyate, kintu prākta-
nasmṛtikāravākyameva । tasyā'pi vaktṛdhīhetuniścayāvadhāraṇapūrvaka- tvādarthaniścayasya smṛtikārāntaravākyam, tasyā'pyevamityandhaparampa- rāyāṃ vyavasthāhetvabhāvādaprāmāṇyameva siddhānte'pi smṛtīnāmiti yathāvārcikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate iti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atra hi codanāsūtre dharme veda eva pramāṇamiti pratijñātam । idānīṃ manvādismṛtivihitānāmaṣṭakādikarmaṇāṃ dharmatvena traivarṇika- parigṛhītānāṃ pramāṇabhūtavedānupalambhānna vedapramāṇakaḥ kṛtsno dharma ityāśaṅkāyāṃ kimaṣṭakādayo dharmā eva na bhavanti ? atha vā smṛti- mūlabhūto vedo'sti, tataśca dharmā eva ? iti cintyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvadatra smṛtimūlabhūto vedo'dyatanairnānāśākhādhyetṛbhirupalabhyate । na caitāsveva śākhāsva- dyatanairanupalabhyamāno manvādibhirupalabdha iti sambhāvayitumapi śakyate । na cā'nantāsu śākhāsūtsannaivā'sau śākheti kalpa- nopapattimatī, pramāṇābhāvāt । na ca vedaikapramāṇatvameva dharmasya smṛtimūlaśākhocchedakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇam, ihā'ṣṭakādīnāṃ dharmatva-
syaiva vivādāspadatvenaitadadhikaraṇaprasādhyatvāt । nā'pi nityā- numeyavedamūlatvam, tasya vedatvāsambhavena pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt । nā'pyanekaśākhāviprakīrṇavedamūlatvam, paṭyamānaśākhāsu tathābhū- tavedānupalambhāt ।
kiñca tathā sati viprakīrṇavedāpanyāsenaiva nirvicikitsatrai- varṇikavyavahārasiddhau smṛtinibandhanaprayāsavaiyarthyācca । taduktam—

lg.l: kasmāttenaiva tanmūlaṃ codanā na samarpitā ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā. 1. 3. 1. pṛ. 163. pū. saṃ.)
ato “dharmasya” veda “śabdaikamūlatvāda” vidyamānamūlabhūtavedaśa- bdamaṣṭakādikaṃ dharmatvenā'napekṣitavyam, na bhavatyeva dharma ityevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—sarvathā tāvatsannibandhanā manvādismṛtayaḥ pūrvavijñānapūrvikāḥ । tatra na tāvatsmṛterbhrāntivijñānapūrvakatvaṃ sambha- vati । bhrāntirhi kalpyamānā nyāyābhāsanibandhanā vā vaktavyā,
duḥśrutaśabdanibandhanā vā । na ca sakalanyāyatatvavediṣu ṣaḍaṅgasakala- vedādhyāyiṣu tathāvidhānekamunijanopāsyamāneṣu tadubhayamapi sambha- vati । nā'pi pratyakṣādyanubhavapūrvakatvam, teṣāmatīndriyaviṣa- yatvābhāvāt । nā'pi smṛtyantarapūrvakatm, tasyā'pi smṛ- tyantarāpekṣatvenā'vyavasthayā andhaparamparānyāyavadagaprāmāṇyāt । taduktam-

lg.l: yo yo gṛhīto jātyandhaḥ sa svayaṃ nopalabdhavān ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā. 1. 3. 1. pṛ. 162. pū. saṃ.)

nā'pi vipralambhapūrvakatvam; na hyekāntena sakalavedavyavahāri- bhirāptatvenā'vadhāriteṣu paramadhārmikeṣu vānaprasthavratacāriṣu tathāvi- dhānekamunipraśnānantaraṃ dharmaśāstrapraṇayanapravaṇeṣu niṣkāraṇaṃ viprala- mbhārthamabhidhānaṃ śaṅkāpadamapyadhirohati, sarvaśabdavyavahārocchedapra- saṅgāt । sa ca vipralambho'dyāpi vedavedāṅgavidbhistraivarṇikaira- saṅkhyātairnā'vadhāryata iti garīyasī kalpanā । tacca kalpanīyaṃ yatra virodho na bhavati, adṛṣṭāntarakalpanañca nā''patati । ato vedakāraṇakameva pūrvavijñānasmṛtermūlabhūtamiti kalpanīyam । taduktam—

nanu yogyānupalambhādvedo'pi mūlaṃ na bhavatītyuktam । maivam; viprakīrṇanānāśākhāgatatvenā'dyatanānāmupalambhayogyatābhāvāt । na hyarvācīnaiḥ sarvā vedaśākhā adhīyante । adhītya ca mīmāṃsyante, yena nānāśākhāsu kvacitpradhānaṃ kvacidaṅgaṃ pratītya mīmāṃsayā ni- rṇīya saṅkalayye‘damanenetthaṃ kuryādi’ti pratyetuṃ śakyate । śaknuvanti tu sāṅgasamastavedādhyāyinastapaḥprabhāvāhitavijñānātiśayaśālinaḥ karatalāmalakamiva sakalavedārthatatvaṃ nirīkṣamāṇā maharṣayo manvādaya eva । na ca sa eva vedaḥ smṛtimūlatassaṅkalayya kimiti tairnā- 'dhyāpita iti vaktavyam, kramānyatvena svādhyāyavināśaprasaṅgāt ।

kiñca na hi sarvāḥ smṛtayo vidhiniṣedhaśrutimūlā eva, arthavā- damūlānāmapi darśanāt । tathā hi—“prācī hi devānāṃ digi” (mā. śa. brā. 3. 1. 1. 2.) tyetadarthavādamūlā smṛtiḥ—“na pratīcīśirāḥ śayīte”ti । na caivambhūtārthavādādhyayane'pyevambhūtaniṣedhonnayanamadyatanā- nāṃ sambhavati । tena mandabuddhīnāṃ lokānāmanadhyayanaṃ paśyanto'dhītave- dānāmapi pramādabāhulyena vismaraṇamāśaṅkamānā nānāśākhāsu kratva-
rthapuruṣārthavidhiniṣedhasaṅkīrṇaṃ tattadvākyamadhītya mīmāṃsāniruktakalpa- nādibhirnirṇīya saṅkalayya jagadupakṛtaye svakīrtikhyāpanāya ca svanibandhanairmanvādaya eva vedārthamupadarśitavanta ityeṣaiva kalpanā jyāyasīti । tena bhāṣye'pi yaduktaṃ “athedānīṃ yatra na vaidikaṃ śabda- mupalabhante” (śā. bhā. 1. 3. 1. pṛ. 44. cau. saṃ) iti, tadi- dānīntanapuruṣābhiprāyam । “atha ca smarantī”ti manvādyabhi- prāyamiti ।
prayojanam—yadi pūrvapakṣaḥ, tadā'ṣṭakādayā nā'nuṣṭheyāḥ । siddhānte tvanuṣṭheyā iti ।

sūtrantu—ya eva vedādhyayanasya kartārasta eva smṛtinibandha- nānāṃ manvādayaḥ । ato vedārthajñānavatāṃ teṣāṃ smṛtimūlāntareṇā' nupapadyamānā satī śrutimūlatvamevā'rthāpatyā kalpayatīti । anumāna- vācoyuktistu paścānmānasāmyeneti na kiñcidanupapannamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ virodhādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: yatra śrutivirodhastatra katham ? yathā audumbaryāssarvaveṣṭanam, “audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvā udgāyedi”ti śrutiviruddham । “aṣṭācatvāriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi vedabrahmacaryacaraṇam” (bau. dha. sū. 1. 3. 1.) “kṛṣṇake- śo'gnīnādadhīte”ti śrutiviruddham । “krītarājako bhojyānna” iti “tasmādagnīṣomīye saṃsthite yajamānasya gṛhe'śitavyaṃ” (mai. saṃ. 3. 7. 8.) iti śrutiviruddham ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam— iha pratyakṣānumitaśrutyoḥ parasparavyāghātādaprāmāṇyam । na cā'gropasthitayā pratyakṣaśrutyā vilambopasthitāyā anumitaśrute- rvirodhādvādha eveti vaktavyam । vilambabhavenā'pi jvālābheda- grāhiṇā'nanyathāsiddhenā'numānenā'gropasthitasyāpi jvālaikatva- grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasyā'nyathāsiddhasya bādhadarśanāt । iha tu pratyakṣānumitaśrutyordvayārapyanyathāsiddhisambhāvanā samasti । yathā
hi pauruṣeyatvena smṛtau bhrāntyādimūlatvasambhāvanā, tathā vede'pyu- ccāraṇasya pauruṣeyatvāt “audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyedi”ti śrutau nakā- rānuccāraṇena spṛṣṭvodgāyediti pratītisambhāvanā samastyeva । ato vinigamanakāraṇābhāvāddvayorapi pratyakṣānumitaśrutyoranyathāsiddhatva- sambhāvanayā na bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ, nā'pi vikalpaḥ ।

atha dvayorapi śrutatvāviśeṣādananyathāsiddhatvam, tathā'pi na tāvattulyabalatvādbādhyabādhakabhāvassambhavati, nā'pi vikalpaḥ । yuga- padupasthitayārhi prayogaviśeṣānvayavyavasthayā vikalpo bhavati । iha tu prathamopasthitenā'nupajātavirādhinā sakalaprayogavyāptervilambopa- sthitenā'pyananyathāsiddhena tathaiva vyāpteḥ parasparavyāghātādaprāmāṇyame- veti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—bhavedevaṃ yadi pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe smṛteḥ śrutyanu- mānaṃ bhavet । tadeva tu na sambhavati । bādhitaviṣayatvenā'numānodayā- sabhavāt, vahrāviva śaityānumānādayasya । ataḥ śrutyanumānāsambha- vānna parasparavyāghātaḥ, kintu smṛterbādha eveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadetadbālajalpitam—yadi hi pratyakṣānumitaśrutyāratulyabalatvaṃ tadā bādhyabādakabhāvaḥ । atha tulyabalatvam, tadā vikalpa eva । parasparavyāghātastu kutaḥ ? na ca dvayorapyanyathāsiddhisambhāvanayā parasparavyāghātaḥ, tatra pratyakṣaśrutau tāvannakārādyanuccāraṇasambhā- vanā'nādisakalādhyetṛgatādhyayanaparamparāparāhataiva । evaṃ manvādi- smṛtiṣvapi bhrāntyādimūlatvasambhāvanābhidhānamanantaroktasmṛtyadhi- karaṇasiddhāntavismaraṇena manovaiklavyamevā'bhivyanakti ।

na cānanyathāsiddhatve'pyagrapaścātpravṛttayoḥ pratyakṣānumitaśrutyoḥ sakalaprayogavyāptyavagamānna bādhyabādhakabhāvo nā'pi vikalpa iti vācyam । yugapadupasthitayorapi yavavrīhiśāstrayārekaikaśāstraparyāloca- nena sakalaprayogavyāptyavagamāt । taduktam—
“niyamārthe hyubhe śāstre yavavrīhyorvidhātṛṇī” iti ।

atha tatrā'nanyathāsiddhaśāstradvayadarśanātprayogavidhinā vikalpa āśrīyate, tādihā'pi samānam । yā'pyagrata upasthitiranyataraśruteḥ, sā'pyadhyayanakrameṇa yavavrīhiśāstrayorapyaranyatarasyā'viśiṣṭeti tayo-
rapi parasparavyāghātādaprāmāṇyamāpadyateti yatkiñcidetat । siddhānta- yuktistu bhaṅgāvasara eva nirasanīyeti yathābhāṣyameva tāvadadhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p: pūrvatra manvādismṛtīnāṃ vedamūlatvena prāmāṇye nirūpite idā- nīṃ vedavirodhe sati tadapodyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na hyekamanvādipraṇītānāṃ kvacidvedamūlatvaṃ kvacidbhrāntyādimūlatvamiti śakyate vaktum, sarva- traivā'nāśvāsaprasaṅgāt । taduktam—

tatrā'pi yadi śrutiviruddhārthaviṣayiṇī śrutirna sambhavatyeva, tadā na kalpyetā'pi । na tvevam; dṛśyante hi parasparaviruddhārthāḥ śrutayaḥ- uditahomānuditahomaṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇādiviṣayāḥ sahasraśaḥ । ta-
duktam—
ataḥ pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhā'pi smṛtiḥ śrutimūlatayā pramāṇameve- tyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate-smṛtito hi śrutivijñānamānumānikaṃ vaktavyam । anumānasya ca vyāptipakṣadharmatāvadabādhitaviṣayatvamapi sāmagrīmadhya- niviṣṭam । tena yadyapi smṛtitvarūpeṇā'ṣṭakādismṛtitaḥ sarvaveṣṭana- smṛternā'sti viśeṣaḥ kaścit, tathā'pyaudumbarīsparśanaśruteḥ pratya- kṣatvenā'grapravṛttatvādasarvaveṣṭitaivaudumbarī kratvapūrvasādhanamityavaruddhabuddheḥ puruṣasyaudumbarīsarvaveṣṭanaśrutyanumānaṃ bādhitaviṣayatvādutpattumeva no- tsahate, agnāviva pratyakṣāvagatoṣṇatvāvaruddhabuddheḥ śaityānumānam । itarathā tu “aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata” ityādiśrutivirodhe'pi mantraliṅgācchrutyamānaṃ prasajyeta । taduktam—“siddhena hi sādhyamutpa- ttimukhanirodhena bādhyata iti bādavido naiyāyikā” iti । na caivaṃ satyanaikāntikatvādaṣṭakādismṛtāvapi na vedānumānamiti vaktavyam ।
pratyakṣaśrutyaviruddhāyā eva smṛterliṅgatvenā'naikāntikatvābhāvāditi । ataḥ pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhā smṛtayā na pramāṇamiti ।
prayojanam—yadi pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ, tadā ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavadvi- kalpaḥ । siddhānte tu—sparśanamātramanuṣṭheyamiti ।
sūtrantu—pratyakṣaśruti “virodhe”liṅgabādhena smṛtiprāmāṇyaṃ “anapekṣyaṃ”anādaraṇīyam । yasmāt “asati” virodhe smṛ- tito vedā“numānami”ti ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ dṛṣṭamūlakasmṛtyaprāmāṇyādhikaraṇam ।।
bhāṣyakāramatam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
adhikaraṇāntaraṃ vā । “vaisarjanahomīyaṃ vāso'dhvaryurguhṇāti” “yūpahastino dānamācaranti” iti, tatpramāṇaṃ kartṛsāmānyādapramāṇaṃ vā ? atra pūrvādhikaraṇe sarvaveṣṭanādihetubhūtasya lobhādereva darśanānna
sarvaveṣṭanādismṛteḥ śrutimūlatvamiti liṅgadarśanaparatayā sūtraṃ vyā- khyāyedānīmadhikaraṇāntaraparatayā vyākhyāyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā'bhisandhiḥ—bhavatūktanyāyena śrutiviru- ddhānāṃ sarvaveṣṭanādismṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyam । evamādismṛtīnāntu śrutivirodhābhāvāt smṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyena prāmāṇyamevetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavede yadyatrā'pi smṛtihetubhūto lobho na sambhāvyeta । tathāhi—“vaisarjanahomīyaṃ vāso'dhvaryurgṛhṇātī” tyasyā- yamarthaḥ—agnīṣomīyapraṇayanārthavisarjanahomakālasambandhiyajamānā- cchādanaṃ vāso'dhvaryurgṛhṇātīti । tathā “yūpahastino dānamācarantī” tyasyā'rtho yūpaparivyāṇaśāṭakamadhvaryave dadyāditi । atra ca spaṣṭa eva lobhaḥ klṛptaḥ pratīyate । kalpanīyā ca śrutiriti klṛptalobha- mūlatvamevaivaṃbhūtasmṛtīnām । na caivaṃ sati tulāpuruṣādimahā- dāneṣvācāryaṣaṣṭhabhāgagrahaṇādismṛtīnāmapi lobhamūlatvam, lobhaśūnya- snānadānopavāsādipratipādakasaṃhitāntargatāyā manvādimaharṣipraṇī- tāyā lobhamūlatvāsambhavāt । na ceyamapi tathābhūtā । muktakasmṛti-
tvena lābhaprayuktādhvaryukartṛkatvasyā'pi sambhāvitatvāt । tasmāde- bhūtāssmṛtayo na pramāṇameveti ।
prayojanaṃ-pūrvapakṣe smṛtyarthānuṣṭhānam, siddhānte tvananuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu-lobhasyaiva hetutvena “darśanāt” na pramāṇaṃ smṛtiriti ।।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatam
chapter.p: tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇadvayaṃ siddhāntahetvabhāvādvārtikakāra- pādā nā'numanyante । ayañca teṣāmabhisandhiḥ—virodhidarśanena hya- numānaṃ bādhitaviṣayaṃ bhavati । yayā vahneruṣṇatvadarśanena śaityānumā- nam । yadi tu vahnirapi śītoṣṇasvabhāvo bhavatīti sambhāvyeta, tadā śaityānumānasyā'pi bādhitaviṣayatvaṃ na bhavedeva । virodhaśca siddha- vastvāśrayo bhavati, ekasya tadatadrūpāsambhavāt । kāryantu śāstrārthī- bhūtamekamapi prayogabhedopapāditaviruddhānekasādhanakaṃ dṛṣṭameva । yathā uditānuditahomaṣoḍaśigrahaṇādisādhyam । ato'tra kārya- viṣayatvena sarvaveṣṭanasparśaśāstrayorvirādhābhāvādabādhitaviṣayamanumāna- mutpadyata eveti ।

athocyate—uditānuditahomaṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇādīnāṃ yuga- padupasthitervāśabdārthaṃ vikalpamantarbhāvya pākṣika evā'nvayaḥ śāstrā-
rthībhūte kārye svīkriyata ityavirodho yukta eva । iha tu prathamāva- gataniṣpratipakṣaśrautasparśanenaiva sakalajyotiṣṭomaprayogavyāpternirviṣayaṃ sarvaveṣṭanaṃ bādhyata eveti ।

tadayuktam; tathāhi—keyaṃ yugapadupasthitiḥ ? yadyekajñānaviṣaya- tvam, tanna; adhyayanakrameṇoditānuditahomaśrutyorapi bhinnajñāna- viṣayatvāt । nā'pyekadobhayaviṣayajñānatvam, jñānayaugapadyaniṣedhāt । nā'pyekaviniyogaśāstraviṣayatvam, uditānuditahomaśāstrayorbhinna- tvāt । athaikaprayogaśāstraviṣayatvam, tadatrā'pi samānam । lokā- cāraparyantanirīkṣaṇapravṛttaṃ hi prayogaśāstraṃ smārtamevā'rthaṃ pariha- ratīti bālajalpanam ।

atha yugapadupasthitapramāṇāpanītatvamabhimatam, iha tu jaghanyapra- māṇopasthitaṃ virodhibhūtaṃ sarvaveṣṭanaṃ bādhyata eveti । tanna; asambha- ve hi balavatā durbalaṃ bādhyate । itarathā pratyakṣāvagatajalasambandhinaḥ parvatasya dhūmānumitadhūmadhvajasambandhabādhanaprasaṅgāt ।

atha satyapyekaparvatāvayavitve'vayavabhedena vyavasthāsambhavā- dabādhaḥ, tathā'trā'pi prayogabhedena vyavasthāsambhavānnā'nupa- pannam । tathā yadapyagrapravṛttatvātsparśanaśāstraṃ sakalaprayogavyāpaka- muktam ।

tadapyayuktam; tathāhi—na tāvatsparśanaśāstrameva sakalaprayo- gavyāpitvamabhidhatte । na cā'nabhihitamapi śāstrasvabhāvādevā'vāpyate, yavavrīhiśāstrayorapi sakalaprayogavyāpitvena miśritānuṣṭhāna sa- ṅgāt । kintu niṣpratipakṣaśāstrasvabhāvo'yaṃ vaktavyaḥ । sa ca prati- patrā niṣpratipakṣatvāvadhāraṇapurassara evā'vadhāraṇīyaḥ । na ca para- sparaviruddhārthānekaśrutidarśinaḥ sparśanaśāstraśravaṇamātreṇa niṣpratipa- kṣatvāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavati । tena niṣpratipakṣatvāvadhāraṇapravṛttasyaiva ni- rūpitavedamūlamanvādipraṇītānanyathāsiddhasarvaveṣṭanasmṛtidarśano niṣpra- tipakṣatvāvadhāraṇāsambhavāt na sarvaprayogavyāpitvāvadhāraṇasambhava iti yatkiñcidetat ।

athaivamabhidhīyeta—bhavedetadevam, yadyananyathāsiddhāḥ smṛtayo bhaveyuḥ । nyāyābhāsamūlā api hi tā nirantaraṃ dṛśyanta eva । yathā “adhītya snāyāt” “aṅgaṃ vā samabhivyāhārādi” tyevamādayaḥ । atra hyadhyayanavidherarthajñānaparyantatvenā'dhyayanānantaraṃ snānasyā'dhyayanavi- dhiviruddhatvādadhyayanavidhipūrvapakṣanyāyamūlatvameva । evaṃ “pitṛyajñaḥ svakālatvādi” (jai. sū. 4. 3. 28) ityatra caturthādhyāyā- dhikaraṇe piṇḍapitṛyajñasya viśvajidādivatphalakalpanayā sva- tantrādhikārasyāktatvādyadetaddarśakarmāṅgatvasmaraṇaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣanyā- yamūlameva । ato nyāyābhāsamūlatvasyā'pi sambhavātsamprati
virādhe smṛtayo bādhyanta eveti na bādhitaviṣayamanumānamutpa- dyata iti ।

naitat; dvayorapi śrutimūlatvāt । tathā hi-brahmacāriṇo hyasnā- nādiniyamā vihitaḥ । sa cā'vadhisāpekṣaḥ । tasya smṛtikārairaya- mavadhirupadarśitaḥ “adhītya snāyādi” ti । adhītyetyadhipūrvasyeṇ dhātoḥ prayogaḥ । tenā'yamarthaḥ—adhyayanavidhyarthamarthajñānaṃ niṣpādya snānaṃ kuryādityadhyayanavidhimūlatvamevā'syāḥ smṛteḥ । taduktam—
(ślo. vā. pṛ. 33 cau. saṃ.)
tathā—
(ślo. vā. pṛ. 32 cau. saṃ.)

yattu nyāyābhāsamūlatvamuktam, tadyathābhāṣyamiti mantavyam ।
tathā “tulyassarveṣāṃ paśuvidhiḥ prakaraṇāviśeṣāt” itivat “aṅgaṃ vā samabhivyāhārādi”tyapi vyākhyeyam ।

tadayamarthaḥ—darśākhyakarmāṅgaṃ pitṛyajñassyādyadi tenā'sya samabhi- vyāhāro bhavet । na cā'sya karmaṇā samabhivyāhāraḥ, “amāvasyā- yāmaparāhṇe piṇḍapitṛyajñena carantī” ti mukhyakālavacanatvādamāvā- syāśabdasya kālasabhivyāhāro'yamiti, tenaitacchrutimūlatvamevā'syā- ssmṛterapīti na kiñcidanupapannam ।

idantu sakalamabhyupetyavādenoktam । paramārthatastvarthāpattireve- yam । na hi aṣṭakādismṛtimūlabhūtā api śrutayo'numānagamyāḥ । tatpratibaddhaliṅgaviśeṣādarśanāt । yathā cā'ṣṭakādiviṣayiṇī smṛtiḥ śrutiṃ vinā'nupapadyamānā śrutiṃ kalpayati, tatheyamapīti na tato bhidyate । na cā'rthāpatteranyathāpyupapattyā anyathaivopapattivyatiriktaṃ dūṣaṇāntaraṃ sambhavati ।
na ceha tadastīti pūrvādhikaraṇa evoktam । na ca dūṣaṇadvaya- rahitamanupapadyamānaṃ na bhavati, tadupapādakaviṣayaśca vicāro bhavatī- tyutprekṣitumapi śakyam । taduktam—

lg.l: smṛtyā śrutiryā parikalpyate'smin liṅgādibhiryā viniyojikā ca ।
phalādibhiryatparipūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛktatra na kācidasti ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: (ślo. vā. pṛ. 472. cau. saṃ.)
ato na śrutyā smṛtirbādhyata iti siddham ।
sūtrantu—pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā vedaviruddhabuddhādismṛtiviṣaya- meva vyākhyeyam । taduktam—

yattu“vaisarjanahomīyaṃ vāso'dhvaryurguhṇātī”tyādismṛtīnāṃ lobhamūla- tvādaprāmāṇyamuktam, tadasambaddham; avigatiśiṣṭācāropagṛhītāyāḥ smṛteḥ śiṣṭācārānumitaśrutimūlatvenaiva prāmāṇyopapatteḥ । nanu lābhā- diśūnyo hi śiṣṭācāraḥ pramāṇamityanantarādhikaraṇa eva vakṣyate । atra
tu lobhasyaiva sambhāvitatvāt kathaṃ śrutyanumānamiti । maivam; syā- devaṃ yadyadhvaryorācāraḥ pramāṇamiti vadāmaḥ । kintarhi ? yajamānasya । na cā'dhvaryuṇā lobhataḥ pravartito'pi paramaprāmāṇiko yajamāno mūla- pramāṇagaveṣaṇamantareṇa pravartate । sa cā'dyayāvadācārastathaivā'vigī- taḥ parāparaprāmāṇikairanuṣṭhīyamānassamastīti śakyate vaktum । yathā tathā sambhāvanāmātreṇā'prāmāṇye tu kutra kiṃ sambhāvayituṃ na śakyate । taduktam—

lg.l: kva vā notprekṣituṃ śakyāḥ smṛtyaprāmāṇyahetavaḥ ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: tasmādevamādismṛtīnāmapi śiṣṭaparigṛhātānāṃ prāmāṇyameveti ।
sūtrantu—pūrvavadeva bauddhādismṛtiviṣayaṃ vyākhyeyamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ śiṣṭākopādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “ācāntena karma kartavyam” “yajñopavītinā karma kartavyam” “dakṣiṇācāreṇa karma kartavyam” ityevaṃlakṣaṇakānyudāharaṇāni । kimetāni śrutiviruddhāni na kartavyāni ? utā'viruddhāni kāryāṇi vā ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena viṣayasaṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntāḥ
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthaṃ saṃśayo darśitaḥ—kiṃ “vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ karoti” ityādipratyakṣaśrutipratipāditakramaviro- dhena madhye kṣutādinimittācamanādismṛtervirodhādhikaraṇanyāyenā' prāmāṇyam । tataśca tadekavākyatāpannaṃ prayogaśāstramapi apramāṇam । atha vā'ṣṭakādismṛtivatpratyakṣavedavirodhābhāvātsmṛtyadhikaraṇanyā- yenā''camanādismṛtervedamūlatvena prāmāṇyam । tataśca tadekavākyatā- pannasya prayogaśāstrasya prāmāṇyamiti । pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayuktayastu yathābhāṣyameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadidamayuktam—smṛtyadhikaraṇoktasaṅgatidūṣaṇenaiva gatatvāt । yathā hi tatra pauruṣeyamanvādivākyasyā'pūrvakāryānabhidhāyino'pūrva- kāryābhidhāyinā vedavākyena sahaikatātparyābhāvenaikavākyatvābhāvā- nmanvādismṛtyapramāṇye'pi na “yāṃ janā” mantrasyā'prāmāṇyam, tathe- hācamanādismṛtyaprāmāṇye'pi na prayogaśāstrasyā'prāmāṇyamiti ya- tkiñcidevaitaditi, yathābhāṣyameva tāvadadhikaraṇaṃ varṇyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena saṅgatisaṃśayau
chapter.p: pūrvaṃ hi smṛtyadhikaraṇavirodhādhikaraṇayorvedāvirodhe virodhe ca kratvarthapuruṣārthasādhāraṇameva prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyañca pratipāditam । idānīṃ kratvarthānāmevā''camanādismṛtīnāṃ kiṃ virodhādhikaraṇanyā- yaviṣayatvaṃ, tataścā'prāmāṇyam ? uta smṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyaviṣayatvaṃ, tataśca prāmāṇyam ? iti viṣayavyāptyarthamevā'dhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇāya nyāyāntaraṃ prastūyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
tatra smṛtipratipāditaudumbarīsarvaveṣṭane sati śrutivihitasya spa- rśanasyā'sambhavādbhavatu sarvaveṣṭanasya śrutiviruddhatvam, iha tu smārtā-
camanādipraveśe'pi śruti “śiṣṭasya”śrutivihitasya kasyacit “a- kopāt” abādhāt na śrutiviruddhatvamācamanādismṛtīnāmiti siddhā- ntenopakramya pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—

atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—kratvarthāḥ khalvācamanādi- padārthāḥ śrautakrameyattākālabādhenaiva kratumanupraviśanti । tathāhi— “vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ karoti” iti śrutyavagataḥ kramaḥ kṣutādinimittānā- mācamanādīnāṃ madhyaniveśe bādhito bhavet । tathā yāvantaḥ padārthāḥ kratvarthatayā śrutivihitāsteṣāmiyattā tadadhikasmārtācamanādiniveśe bādhitā syāt । evaṃ prayogavidhibādhitasya pradhānapratyāsattirūpa- sya prāśubhāvātmakasyā'pi kālasya vilambahetusmārtācamanādipra- veśena bādha upasampadyeta । taduktam—
