lg.l: śāstreṇa hi padārthānāṃ parimāṇaṃ tridhā gatam ।

chapter.p:
ataḥ śrutirūpaśāstreṇaivā'nuṣṭheyapadārtaparimāṇasya kṛtatvāt ta-
dadhikasmārtapadārthapraveśe sati virodha eveti virodhādhika- raṇanyāyaviṣayatvamevā''camanādismṛtīnāmityevaṃ prāpte abhidhī- yate—
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-bhavedevaṃ yadi smārtācamanādipadārthapraveśe śruti- pratipāditārthavirodhī bhavet । kramādayo hi prayogopakaraṇabhūtāḥ pra- yogavidhyapekṣayā prayogāvasthāyāmeva sambadhyante । prayogavidhiścāpūrva- siddheranirjñātopāyaparimāṇatvena śruteḥ prabhṛti sambhavadvedamūlasmṛtyā- cāraparyantamapūrvasādhanaṃ pratīkṣamāṇastatpratipāditaṃ padārthajātaṃ parigṛhya tadanuguṇameva krameyattāśunirmāṇaṃ parikalpya prayogaṃ vidadhāti, na tvagrata eva śrautapadārthamātrameva gṛhītvā kramādikaṃ kalpayati, yena paścādbhāvinā smārtācamanādipadārthena virudhyeta । kiñcā'naṅgaṃ tulyakakṣyaṃ vyavadhākaṃ bhavati । iha tu kṣutādinimittaṃ kartṛśucitvā- pādamācamanaṃ sakalapadārthāṅgameva । tenā'nācāntena kṛtā vedireva viguṇī bhavet । ācāntena tu kṛtā vedireva saguṇībhavatīti na tena vyavadhānam । taduktam—

lg.l: tāmeva saguṇāṃ kartuṃ śudhyā na vyavadhāsyate ।।

chapter.p: ato virodhābhāvātsmṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyaviṣayatvamevā''camanā- dismṛtīnāmiti ।
prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe-smārtapadārthahānam, siddhānte tūpādānamiti ।
sūtrantu—smṛtikāraiḥ praṇītānyetāni lobhādi “kāraṇāgrahaṇe” pramāṇānīti “pratīyeran” ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatam
chapter.p: tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṃ vārtikakārapādā nā'numanyante, pūrva- meva virodhe satyapi smṛtiprāmāṇyapratipādanenā'sya vicārasyā'na- vakāśatvāt । tena smṛtyadhikaraṇasyaivā'yaṃ kṛtsnaḥ prapañcaḥ । tathā hi—“dharmasya śabdamūlatvādaśabdamanapekṣyaṃ syāt” (jai. sū. 1. 3. 1) ityetena smṛtyācārayorevā'vidyamānavedaśabdatvādanādaraṇīyatvena pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā “api vā kartṛsāmānyātpramāṇamanumānaṃ syāt” (jai. sū. 1. 3. 2) ityanumitavedamūlatvena prāmāṇyamiti siddhāntitam ।
chapter.head: bauddhagranthānāmaprāmāṇyanirūpaṇam
chapter.p: tatra smṛtiprāmāṇye sati bauddhādismṛtīnāmapi prāmāṇyamityā- śaṅkya “virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānaṃ” (jai. sū. 1. 3. 3.) ityanena vedāviruddhasmṛtīnāmeva prāmāṇyamityuktam । idānīṃ yattarhi vedāviruddhaṃ bauddhādismṛtivacanaṃ na śiṣṭān kopayati vihārārāmama- ṇḍalokaraṇavairāgyadhyānābhyāsāhiṃsāsatyavacanadamadānadayādiviṣayaṃ, tattarhi pramāṇamityāśaṅkyate “śiṣṭākope'viruddhami”ti ।
atrottaram—“na śāstraparimāṇatvāt” । parimitānyeva hi dharmaśā- strāṇi caturdaśavidyāsthānāni vedavyavahāribhirmanvādibhiḥ parigṛhī- tāni । taduktam—
tenaitānyeva paraṃ dharmaṃ prati pramāṇāni । buddhādismṛtivacanantu ghuṇākṣaranyāyena vedāviruddhamapīdānīntananirūpitāptavacanamivā'pramā- ṇamiti ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatena sadācāraprāmāṇyanirūpaṇam
chapter.p: evaṃ smṛtiviṣayasakalaśaṅkānirāse satīdānīṃ śiṣṭācāragatā- śaṅkā “api vā”ityanena sūtreṇa nirasyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yathā buddhādismṛtīnāṃ veda- saṃvādinīnāmapi bahutaravedaviruddhasmṛtimiśritatvādaprāmāṇyam, tathā śiṣṭācārasyā'pi bahutaravedaviruddhāhicchatrabrāhmaṇīmadyapānādidu- rācāramiśritatvena na vedānumānadvāreṇa prāmāṇyam । kiñca itareta- rāśrayāt śiṣṭācāratvamapyaśakyanirūpaṇameva । taduktam—

lg.l: ke śiṣṭā ye sadācārāḥ sadācārāśca tatkṛtāḥ ।

chapter.p: nanu—

lg.l: surā vai malamannānāṃ pāpmā ca malamucyate ।

chapter.p: (manu. a. 11. ślo. 93.)

ityevamādivacanairhi surāpānaṃ pratiṣiddham । tacca liṅganirde- śātpuruṣāṇāmeva pratiṣiddham, na tu strīṇāmapi । na caivaṃ sati ‘brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyādi’ tyatrā'pi puṃsa eva brāhmaṇasya hananaṃ pratiṣi- ddham, na striyā iti vaktavyam । hananapratiṣedhe karmabhūtasya brāhmaṇa-
syoddeśyatvena liṅgasyā'vivakṣitatvāt । tathā hyubhayathā tatra vā- kyārthaḥ sambhāvyate—niṣedharūpo vidhirūpo vā । tatra niṣedharūpe vākyārthe krodhādinimittabrāhmaṇahananakartavyatāmanūdya tadviṣayo naña- rthaḥ pratipādyate—yadbrāhmaṇahananaṃ kuryāttanneti । yasya tu sarvatraika- rūpavākyārthalobhena ‘brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyādi’ tyatrā'pi vidhirūpa eva vākyārtha ityabhimatam, tasyā'pi rāgataḥprāptahananānuvādena nañartha eva vidhīyate—‘yadbrāhmaṇahananaṃ tanna kuryādi’ti । tenobhayathā' pi brāhmaṇasyoddeśyatvāttadgataviśeṣaṇānāmavivakṣitatvameva ।

ayaṃ ca vidhipakṣo vārtikakārapādaiḥ sambhāvanāmātreṇopanyasto vicārāsahatvāt । tathā hi-pravartakaśśabdavyāpāro vidhirityucyate । pravṛttiśca sarvatra kriyāviṣayiṇī । tatkathamakriyārūpasya nañarthasya vidheyatvam ? kathañca pravṛttiphalasya vidhernivṛttiphalatvam ?

athocyeta niṣedho vidhīyata iti nañarthaviṣayiṇī bhāvanaiva vidhīyate । tenā'trā'pi vidheḥ kriyāviṣayatvameva । tasyāṃ ca bhā- vanāyāṃ vidheḥ pravartakatvātpravartakatvamapyavyāhatam । saiva ca naña- rthaviṣayabhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttiḥ pūrvasaṅkalpaviparītatvānnivṛttirityucyate । nivartakatvamapi pūrvasaṅkalpaviparītapravṛttijanakatvameva, na tvarthāntaram । ato niṣedhavidhireveti ।

tadayuktam; nañarthasya bhāvanāviṣayatvāsambhavāt । bhāvanāni- ṣpādyaṃ hi bhāvanāviṣayaḥ । na hanyādityatra tu nañartho niṣedhyahana- nakriyāprāgabhāvaḥ । na cā'sau bhāvanāniṣpādyaḥ । kiñca bhāvyotpā- danā hi bhāvanā । sā ca vidhyavaruddhā samīhitameva bhāvyaṃ gṛhṇāti । viṣayamapi tadeva svīkurute, yatsamīhitopāyarūpam । na cā'tra niṣedha- vidhau samīhitaṃ kiñcidbhāvyamasti । na cā'bhāvarūpasya nañarthasyā- 'pi tadupāyatvaṃ sambhavatīti yatkiñcidetat ।

yattu prabhākareṇa nivṛttirnañartha ityabhyupagamya nañarthasya vidheya- yatvamuktam, tadapi nivṛtterakriyārūpatvādeva tāvadanupapannam । kiñcā- ''khyātāntarasambaddhasya naño nivṛttyarthatvānavagatervidhisambandhādeva tadarthasya nivṛttirūpatvaṃ vaktavyam । tathā ca vidhisambandhānnañarthasya nivṛttirūpatvaṃ, nivṛttitve ca sati vidheyatvamiti vaktavyamitītareta- rāśrayatvamityetadapi yatkiñciditi ।

nanu niṣedhapakṣo'pyanupapanna eva । eṣā hi tatra vacanavyaktiḥ- ‘yadbrāhmaṇahananaṃ kuryāttanne’ti । vidhirapyatra rāgataḥ prāpto'nuvādya- koṭiniviṣṭaḥ । na caitatsambhavati । yataśśabdavyāpārarūpo vidhiḥ sa kathaṃ rāgato labhyate । tathā vidhyanuvādayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvā- dvidhiranūdyata ityetadapi vyāhatam । kiñcābhāvavacanatā'nyavacanatā
virodhivacanatā vā nañśabdasyā'vagatā । niṣedhavacanatāyāntu śaktyantarakalpanā'pi prasajyeta । tathā satyekasyaivā'khaṇḍasya nañ- śabdasya pratyayasambandhalabhya evā'rtho'dhyāropaṇīyaḥ svātmanyeva na kuryāditi, taccā'nupapannamiti ।

ucyate—nā'tra vidhirasti, kintu vidhyabhidhānasamartho liṅ- śabdo nañarthasya vidhiviṣayatvāsambhavāt tatsambandhayogyaṃ vidhiphalaṃ kuryāmityanāgatapravṛttisaṅkalparūpamarthaṃ lakṣayati, gaṅgāśabda iva tīra/?/ । sa ca rāgataḥ prāptatvādanuvādyakoṭiniviṣṭa eva । nañ- śabdo'pyatra na sākṣānniṣedhavacanaḥ, kintarhi virodhivacana eva vidhi- pratyayasambaddhastatpratipādyaṃ kuryāmityanāgatapravṛttisaṅkalpavirodhinaṃ na kuryāmiti pratyayamādadhāno niṣedhako bhavatīti na nañaḥ śaktyantara- kalpanam । nā'pi svātmanyeva na kuryādityadhyāropaṇamiti niṣedha- rūpa eva vākyārtho yuktaḥ ।

anyathā vā niṣedhasya vākyārthatvaṃ varṇayāmaḥ—nā'tra nañśa- bdasya vidhiśabdalakṣitānāgatapravṛttisaṅkalpavirodhiparatayā niṣedha- katvam, kintu liṅādividhiśabdo hi pravartanārūpaṃ vidhimācaṣṭe । tatsamabhivyāhṛtaśca nañśabdaḥ tadviparītamarthaṃ nivartanārūpamabhidhatte, dharmaśabdasamabhivyāhṛta iva tadviparītamadharmam । yathā ca pravartanā pravṛ-
ttiviṣayasya sukhaphalatvaṃ bodhayantīcchopahāradvāreṇa pravartayati, tathā nivartanā'pi nivṛttiviṣayasya duḥkhaphalatvaṃ bodayantī dveṣopahāradvāreṇa nivartayatīti niṣedhārthaḥ । na cā'khyātayogino nañśabdasya niṣedhavacanatvameva prasiddham, virodhivacanatvaṃ tu kutaḥ ? maivam; ni- ṣedhavacanatve śaktyantarakalpanāprasaṅgāt । kintūktanyāyena virodhi- vacanasyaiva sata ākhyātayogena nivṛttiphalatvānniṣedhakatvam, na tu niṣedhavācakatvamiti ।

nanu kā punariha nivartanā ? ucyate-pravartanāviparītā hi niva- rtanā । pravartanā ceṣṭopāyatā vā uddiṣṭapuruṣapravṛttiśabdavyāpāro vā । tatra yadā iṣṭopāyatā pravartanā, tadā'niṣṭopāyatā nivartanā । yadā coddiṣṭapuruṣapravṛttiḥ śabdavyāpāraḥ pravartanā, tadoddiṣṭapuruṣanivṛttiḥ śabdavyāpāra eva nivartaneti nā'nupapannam । kintvasmin pakṣe vi- dhyākhyātasamabhivyāhṛtasyaiva naño nivartanārūpaniṣedhārthatvādvacanavya- ktirniṣedhavidhivādivadeva ‘yadbrāhmaṇahananaṃ tanna kuryādi’ti । tada- trā'pi rāgataḥ prāptaṃ brāhmaṇahananamuddiśya nivartanārūpaniṣedhopadeśā- duddaśyabhūtasya brāhmaṇasya liṅgādikamavivakṣitameveti । taduktam—

lg.l: na coddiṣṭasya śakyete liṅgasaṃkhye vivakṣitum ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā. 1. 3. 3. pṛ. 212. pū. saṃ.)

surāpāne tu “brāhmaṇo na surāṃ pibedi”ti brāhmaṇasya kartṛtve- nopādānāt upādeyasya ca “paśunā yajete”tivalliṅgasyā'pi viva- kṣitatvādāhicchatrabrāhmaṇīnāṃ surāpānasyā'niṣiddhatvānna durācā- ratvam । taduktam—

atrocyate-vidheyaviśeṣaṇaṃ hi vivakṣitaṃ bhavati, yatā vidheya- syā'pūrvavacchabdaikavedyasya yāvadupāttaviśeṣaṇagrahaṇena viśiṣṭavidheya- pratītiparyavasāne satyanyataraparityāgakāraṇābhāvāttathābhūtameva vidheyaṃ vidhirvivakṣati । anuvādyantu nā'pūrvavacchabdavedyam, kintu tatra vidheyaṃ vidhātuṃ yathājñātameva śabdenopasthāpyate । tasya yena kenaci- dupalakṣaṇena yathājñātasyopasthitau satyāṃ vidheyāropitavyāpāro vi- dhirnānuvādārthaṃ viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ vivakṣitumutsahate, anākāṅkṣita- tvāt । nā'pi vidhānārtham, vidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇavākyabhedaprasaṅgāt ।

yatra punaranuvādyasyā'pi viśeṣaṇavivakṣāmantareṇoddeśyatvameva na sambhavati, tadasambhave ca vidhiravasīdan viśeṣaṇamapyākāṅkṣati, tatrā'nuvādyaviśeṣaṇamapi vivakṣitameva । yathā-“yasyobhayaṃ havirārti-
mārcchet” (tai. brā. 3. 7. 1.) ityatroktam—“mṛṣyāmahe haviṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ” (śā. bhā. 6. 4. 6. sū. 23.) iti, na tvanyatra । te/?/na vivakṣāyāṃ sarvatra vidhyapekṣaiva kāraṇam, avivakṣāyāṃ ca tadanapekṣaiya । upādeyatvoddeśyatve tu prāyike । taduktam—

tadatrā'pi ‘brāhmaṇo na surāṃ pibedi’ ti rāgataḥ prāptabrāhmaṇaka- rtṛkasurāpānānuvādena niṣedhopadeśāt, tasya ca jātimātrābhidhānena paryavasānānna liṅgādivivakṣeti strīṇāmapi surāpānaṃ niṣiddhameveti । kurvate cāhicchatrabrāhmaṇyaḥ surāpānam । ato durācāramiśritatvā- nnā''cāraḥ pramāṇamityevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ-na hi sarveṣāṃ śiṣṭakṛtācārāṇāṃ dharmaprāmāṇyam, kintarhi yeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ pravṛttikāraṇatvena nā''śritaṃ, ye ca dharmabudhyā kriyante ta eva pramāṇam । na hi mūlabhūtaṃ vedamantareṇa vedavyavahā-
riṇāmevaivaṃvidhācāro'yamanādiparamparāsiddhassambhavati । taduktam—

lg.l: arthārthaṃ vā na teṣvasti śiṣṭānāmeva dharmadhīḥ ।।

chapter.p: tenāhicchatrabrāhmaṇīsurāpānādīnāṃ na dharmatvam, dṛṣṭakāraṇa- syaiva rāgasya pravṛttihetutvāt । itaradurācārodāharaṇāni ca vārtika- eva supariharāṇi ।

yadapi “ke śiṣṭāḥ ye sadācārāḥ sadācārāśca tatkṛtā” itya- nyonyāśrayatvamuktam, tadapyayuktam; anyataḥ paricchedasambhavāt । vedavihitārthakriyākāritvaṃ hi śiṣṭatvam । tacca pratyakṣāvagatasmṛtya- numitavedārthakriyākāritvenā'grata evā'vagatamiti nā'nupapannam ।
prayojanaṃ—pūrvapakṣe śiṣṭācāraviṣayāṇāṃ karmaṇāmananuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tvanuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantū—dṛṣṭaphalasya pravṛtti“kāraṇatvāgrahaṇe” sati yāni dha- rmatvena “prayuktāni” tāni dharmapramāṇatvena “pratīyeran” iti ।
chapter.head: iti sadācāraprāmāṇyanirūpaṇam
atha pañcamaṃ yavavarāhādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “yavamayaścaruḥ” “vārāhī upānahau” (mai. saṃ. 4. 4. 6) “vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān sañcinoti” iti yavavarāhavetasaśabdān samāmananti । tatra kecit dīrghaśūke yavaśabdaṃ prayuñjate, kecitpriya- ṅguṣu । varāhaśabdaṃ kecitsūkare, kecitkṛṣṇaśakunau । vetasaśabdaṃ ke- cidvañjule kecijjambvām । tatrobhayathā śabdārthāvagamādvikalpa iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p:
atra saṅgatilobhātprabhākareṇa bhāṣyakārīyo vikalpaśabdo'na- dhyavasāyaparo vyākhyātaḥ । evaṃ hi manyate—nirapekṣaśāstradvayavi- hitayārhi vrohiyavayorvikalpo bhavati । iha tu “yavamayaścarurbhavatī”tye-
kamidaṃ vākyaṃ nānāvṛttaṃ dīrghaśūkapriyaṅgurūpobhayārthavidhāyakaṃ sa- mbhavati । āvṛttau ca vākyabhedāpattiḥ । na caikasya mukhyatvamapara- sya gauṇatvamiti nirdhārayituṃ śakyate vinigamanāpramāṇābhāvāt । na ca vākyaśeṣo vinigamanāpramāṇam, “yavamayaścarurbhavati”ityatra vā- kyaśeṣasyā'śravaṇāt । kintu bhāṣyakāramate vāruṇaprāghāsikayavama- yakarambhapātravidhiśeṣo'yamarthavādaḥ । vartikakāramate tu yavamatībhi- radbhiraudumbaryāḥ prokṣaṇe vidhīyamāne “yatrā'nyā oṣadhayo mlāya- nte athaite modamānā ivottiṣṭhantī”ti । (śa. brā. 3. 6. 1. 10) tena yasminnevā'yaṃ śrūyate, tasminneva yāge vākyaśeṣo'yaṃ yava- śabdasya dīrghaśūkaparatve vinigamanāpramāṇam, na tvanyatrā'pītyato- 'trānadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktam; vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpenaiva pramāṇyo- papattāvaprāmāṇyāpādakasyā'nadhyavasāyasyā'sambhavāditi yatkiñci- detaditi yathābhāṣyameva tāvadadhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate ।
śrutivirodhāvirodhayoḥ smṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ prāmāṇyañca nirū- pyedānīṃ deśabhedenāryamlecchayornānārthaviṣayaikaśabdaprayogarūpācāra- vipratipattau kathamiti nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yavavarāhavetasaśabdeṣu deśa- bhedena nānārthaprasiddheṣūktanyāyena vinigamanāpramāṇābhāvādvikalpa e- veti । na ca yavādipadāvṛttirūpavākyabhedaprasaṅgānna vikalpassa- mbhavatīti vaktavyam । agatyā vākyabhedasyā'pyadhyayanavidhyanuma- tatvāt । yathā—“yasya havīṃṣi naśyeyurduṣyeyurapahareyurvā''jyena tā devatāḥ parisaṃkhyāya yajete”ti pratinimittamājyavidhyāvṛttirūpavā- kyabhedo'dhyayanavidhyanumata eva । taduktam—

lg.l: vedoyamāśrayatyarthaṃ ko nu taṃ pratikūlayet ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: ato vikalpenaiva pūrvapakṣo yukta ityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedaṣṭadoṣaduṣṭo'pi vikalpo yadyubhayābhidhā- na bhavet । iha punaranyatarābhidhānenaivā'nyatarasya sādṛśyādgauṇyā-
śrāyaṇena pratītyupapattau nobhayābhidhānam, śaktidvayakalpanāpramā- ṇābhāvāt । asti cā'nyatarābhidhāne satyanyatra gauṇatvanimitta- m । yatassadṛśastambāḥ priyaṅgavo dīrghaśūkāśca । na cā'nyatarābhi- dhāne vinigamanāpramāṇaṃ nā'sti, vākyaśeṣasyaiva vinigamanāpramā- ṇatvāt ।

nanu vākyaśeṣo yatra śrūyate tatraiva vinigamanāpramāṇamityuktam । satyam; yatrā'kṣādipadasyeva nirūpitaivā'nekatra śaktistatraiva । iha vākye kutrā'sya tātparyamiti sandehe yatraiva vākyaśeṣaḥ śrūyate tatraiva vinigamanāpramāṇaṃ bhavati, iha punaśśaktikalpanāvasare ekatra śakti- kalpanenaivā'nyatra pratītiprayogayorupapattau śaktikalpanānirṇāyakatvameva vākyaśeṣasyeti nā'nupapannam । tathā “varāhaṃ gāvo'nudhāvanti” (mai. saṃ. 1. 6. 3.) ityarthavādādvarāhaśabdasya paśuviśeṣābhidhāne । evaṃ “apsujo vetasa” ityarthavādādvetasaśabdasya vṛkṣaviśeṣābhidhāne ni- rṇāyakatvamiti ।
prayojanaṃ—yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā vikalpenā'nuṣṭhānam, atha siddhāntastadā dīrghaśūkādīnāmeveti ।
sūtrantu—“śāstrasthā” prasiddhirbalīyasī anādiśāstra “ni- mittatvādi”ti ।।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatam
chapter.p: tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṃ vārtikakārapādā nā'numanyante । yavavarāhavetasaśabdeṣu sarvadeśeṣvabhidhānavipratipattyanupalambhāt । ta- duktam—

lg.l: jambūṃ na vetasaṃ prāhurvarāhaṃ naiva vāyasam ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: kiñca “sandigdheṣu vākyaśeṣānnirṇaya” ityanenaiva labhyamānatvā- danupapanna evā'yaṃ vicāraḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: vakṣyatyeva na tenā'pi pṛthakkāryā vicāraṇā ।। iti ।।

chapter.p:
athocyeta—na vayamudāharaṇabhedādadhikaraṇabhedaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu pratipādyabhedādeva । tathā hi-“aktāśśarkarā” (tai. vrā. 3. 12. 5.) ityatra kimañjanasādhanamupādeyamityupādanagatasya sandehasya “tejo vai ghṛtam” ityarthavādabalena nirṇayaḥ kriyamāṇastadvākyagatāktapada- syaiva kriyate, na tu vākyantaragatasyā'ktapadasya । tenopādānasandehe
samabhivyāhṛtavidhyu śevartipadagatasandehanirṇāyakatvameva vākyaśeṣa- syeti tadadhikaraṇapratipādyam । iha punaḥ kimatra yavaśabdāsyā'bhi- dheyamityabhidhānasandehe vākyaśeṣānnirṇayaḥ kriyamāṇo yāvadvākya- gatayavaśabdagocarāmevā'bhidhānaśaktiṃ vyavasthāpayatīti pratipādyabhe- dādadhikaraṇabhedo yukta eveti ।

tadayuktam; nyāyatulyatvāt । tatropādānasandehanirṇaye khalvayaṃ nyāyaḥ, vidhistutyossamānaviṣayatvāt stutyasyaiva vidheyatvamiti । tathā'bhidhānasandehe'pi dīrghaśūkastutidarśanāddīrghaśūkasyaiva vidheya- tvam । taccā'śābdasya na sambhavatītyanadhigatamukhyabhūtārthāntarasya śabdasya vācakaśaktimevālambyā'vatiṣṭhate । sarvasyaiva saṃśayasyaika- tarapakṣānugrāhinimittadarśanenaiva nivartanīyatvāt । na codāharaṇabhe- dena kiñcidvailakṣaṇye satyadhikaraṇabhedo bhavati । tathā sati “ya- smin prītiḥ puruṣasya tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇāvibhaktatvāt” (jai. sū. 4. 1. 2.) ityatrā'pi phalayāgayoḥ puruṣārthatvapratipādane'vāntara- hetuvailakṣaṇyādadhikaraṇabhedaprasaṅgaḥ । svargasya hi puruṣārthatvaṃ svabhā- vādeva, yāgasya tu tatsādhānatvena ।

atha tatraikanyāyaviṣayatvam, tadehā'pyupādānasandehe stutisa- mbandhamātrādeva ghṛtādīnāṃ vidheyatvanirṇayaḥ । abhidhānasandehe tu
trikālanirastamukhyabhūtārthāntarādarśanānugṛhītādeva stutisambandhā- dabhidheyaṃ niścitya vidheyanirṇaya iti yatkiñci detaditi । taduktam-

na caivaṃ priyaṅgāvapi prayogadarśanādarthāpattyā tatrā'pi śaktiḥ kalpanīyeti vaktavyam । yatastatsiddhinyāyenaiva gauṇatvāśrayaṇenaiva priyaṅgau prayogasyā'nyayā siddhatvenā'rthāpatteḥ parikṣayāditi ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatena pīlvadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: ato'nyathaitadadhikaraṇaṃ varṇyate—avidyamānavākyaśeṣā ā- ryamlecchaprayogavipratipattibhājaḥ pīlvādiśabdā evā'trādāhara- ṇam । āryā hi pīluśabdaṃ vṛkṣaviśeṣe prayuñjate । tadāha gautamaḥ— “pailavaudumbarau vaiśyasya daṇḍau” (gau. dha. 1. 33) iti । mlecchā- stu hastini । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ dvayorapi pīluśabdābhidheyatvam ? utā'nyatarasyā'bhidheyatvaṃ anyatarasya gauṇatvamiti ?
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—ubhāvetāvarthau pīluśabdātpra- tīyete । pratītiścobhayatrā'pi śaktiṃ kalpayati, viśeṣābhāvāt । na ca laukikaśabdārthavyavahāre āryamlecchakṛtaḥ kaścidviśeṣo'sti । na hi ghaṭādijātīyeṣvāryā eva paraṃ ghaṭaśabdaṃ prayuñjate, na mlecchā iti śakyaṃ vaktum । tasmādevaṃvidheṣu śabdārthavyavahāreṣu vedaviro- dhābhāvenā''ryamlecchayārvipratipattessamatvātpīlvādiśabdānāmubhaya- vācakatvamityevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhāyate—āryāṇāmeva prasiddhirbalīyasī । śāstrasthā hi te pāramārthikaśāstrārthānuṣṭhānāya pāramārthikameva śabdārthamavadhā- rayanti । tena yeyamāryāṇāmanādiśabdārthāvadhāraṇaparamparā saiva vācyavācakasambandhāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam । mlecchānāntu yādṛcchi- kavyavahāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaśabdārthatatvanirūpaṇānabhijñānāṃ hastigo- caratvenā''ryaprayuktapīluśabdārthavṛkṣasthūlatvaśyāmalatvasādṛśyādgau- ṇapīluśabdāśrayaṇena mukhyatvabhramādeva śabdasya vyavahāropapattau na pāramārthikaśabdārthādhyavasānam ।
taduktam-

lg.l: te te yatra prayuñjīran sa so'rthastatvato bhavet ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: tasmādāryaprasiddhireva śabdārthāvadhāraṇe pramāṇam, na mleccha- prasiddhiriti ।
prayojanam—“pailavaudunbarau vaiśyasye” tyatra hastibhavāsthidaṇḍena saha pīluvṛkṣadaṇḍasya vikalpaḥ pūrvapakṣe । siddhānte tu pīluvṛkṣa- daṇḍa eva ।
sūtrantu—ye “śāstrasthāḥ” teṣāmeva prasiddhirbalīyasā । teṣāmeva śāstrārthānuṣṭhānāya śabdārthanirūpaṇe “nimittatvādi”ti ।।
chapter.head: iti vārtikakāramatena pīlvadhikaraṇam
vārtikakāramatena smṛtyācārayorbalābalanirūpaṇam
pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
athavā smṛtyācāravirodhaviṣayametadadhikaraṇam । atrā'yaṃ
pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yathā hi manvādismṛtīnāṃ śrutimūlatvaṃ tathā sadācārāṇāmapi śrutimūlatvaṃ nirūpitameva । tatra smṛtiviruddhānā- mapyadṛśyamānalobhādimūlānāṃ vedavyavahāribhirevā''caryamāṇatvena sadācāratvāviśeṣāt “api vā kartṛsāmānyātpramāṇamanumānaṃ syā- t” (jai. sū. 1. 3. 6) ityanena nyāyena smṛtivirodhe'pi vedaviro- dhābhāvena vipratipattessamatvātsadācārasya vedamūlatvameva ।

athavā ''cārasyaiva balīyastvam । sa hi śrutyanumāne liṅga- bhūtaḥ pratyakṣeṇaivā'vagamyate । smṛtiḥ punarmanuvacanādanumitā śrutima- numāpayatīti viprakarṣāddurbalā । yeṣāmapi manuvacanameva śrutyanumāne liṅgam, teṣāmapi vaktṛjñānānumānadvāreṇa śrutyanumānamiti viprakṛṣṭa- tvameva smṛterācārāditi ।
taduktam—
evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi smṛtyācārayostulyarūpatvaṃ bhavet । kintu smṛtirbhrāntyādiśūnyāptataramanvādipraṇītā sopanibandhanā cā'nanyathāsiddhā vedameva mūlabhūtaṃ kalpayatīti yuktam । ācārasya tu vedavyavahāribhirdharmabudhyā prayuktasyā'pi kālaviprakarṣāt nyāyā- bhāsādimūlatayā cā'nyathābhāvaśaṅkayā na smṛtivirodhe prāmā- ṇyam । dṛśyate cā'dyatve'pi vedavyavahāriṇāmeva dharmabodhe'nācā- rāssmṛtiviruddhāḥ । yathā dākṣiṇātyabrāhmaṇīnāmanumaraṇam । tathā ca smaranti—

na ca smṛtermanuvacanānumitāyā apratyakṣatvenā''cārasyaiva bala- vatvamiti vaktavyam, yatassmṛteḥ sākṣādeva śrutyanumānam । ācā- rasya tvasmaryamāṇasyā'nācaraṇīyatvāttadviṣayaṃ tāvadācaritṛsmaraṇam, tataścā'parāparapūrvapūrvabhāvinānāvidhācaritṛsmṛtyanumānaparamparayā manvā- dismṛtyanumānam, tataśca śrutyanumānamiti bahutaraviprakarṣānna tulya- balatvam, na tarāmācārabalīyastvamiti ।
taduktam—

lg.l: tena dvyantaritaṃ tasya prāmāṇyaṃ viprakṛṣyate ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: na ca manvādismṛterivā''caritṛsmṛterapi sākṣādeva śrutimūla- tvam । manvādayo hi maharṣayaḥ prakṛṣṭajñānatayā viprakīrṇanānāśākhā- gatāṃ tattadācāramūlabhūtāṃ śrutimanusṛtya smṛtvā svanibandhanaiḥ prati- pādayantīti yuktam, na tvācaritārassarve nānāvedaśākhānusaraṇa- kṣamāḥ । kintu manvādimaharṣisaṅkalpitamevā'rthaṃ pūrvapūrvācaritṛpara- mparāyātamavagamya smṛtvā''carantīti sambhavati । tena yatpūrvādhi- karaṇe śiṣṭācārasya śrutimūlatvena prāmāṇyamabhihitaṃ tanmanvādi- smṛtyaviruddhasyaivetyetadadhikaraṇavyutpādyam । tena na vaktavyaṃ-vyabhi- cārāspadatvādācārasya kvacidapi na prāmāṇyamiti, evaṃ bhūtācāra- syā'vyabhicārāditi ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe smṛtivirodhe'pi yathācāramanuṣṭhānaṃ karta- vyam । siddhānte tu na kartavyamiti ।
sūtrantu-“śāstrastā” ye manvādayasteṣāmeva smaraṇaṃ balavat “ta- nnimittatvādeva” śiṣṭācārasyeti ।।
chapter.head: iti smṛtyācārayorbalābalanirūpaṇam
trivṛccarvaśvavālādhikaraṇam
pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atha vā trivṛccarvaśvavālādiśabdā evā'tra lokavedayorvipra- tipatto nirūpyante । atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—trivṛcchabdo hi loke ‘trivṛdrajjuḥ, trivṛdgranthiḥ’ iti triguṇarajjvādau prasiddhaḥ । vede tu “trivṛdbahiṣpavamānaṃ” (tā. brā. 20. 1. 1.) ityuktvā tṛcatrayaṃ samanukrāntam । tṛcaśabdaśca stotrīyaṛktrayavacanaḥ । tena vede stotrīyānavakavacanastrivṛcchabdaḥ pratīyate । tathā caruśabdaśca loke sthālīvacanaḥ prasiddhaḥ । vede tu “ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaścaruḥ” iti vidhāya “aditimodanena” iti vacanā- dyājñikaprasiddheścā'navasrāvitāntarūṣmapakvaudanavacanaścaruśabdo vijñā- yate । evaṃ “āśvavālaḥ prastara” ityatrā'pi lokaprasidhyā aśvavālasturagakeśaḥ pratīyate । vede tu kāśeṣvaśvavālaśabdaprasi- ddhiḥ । evaṃ hi śrūyate—“yajño vai devebhyo'śvo bhūtvā'pākrāmata,
so'paḥ prāviśat, sa vāladhau gṛhīto vālānamocata, te vālāḥ kā- śatāṃ gatā” iti । tena laukikavaidikaprayogavipratipattau vinigama- nāhetvabhāvādvikalpa eveti ।
na ca lokaprasiddherdharmaṃ pratyanaṅgatvādvedaprasiddhārthasvīkāra eva yuktaḥ, padārthāvadhāraṇe viśeṣābhāvāt । taduktam—

lg.l: naitadevaṃ padārtheṣu na hi vedo viśiṣyate ।
adṛṣṭārthe tu vākyārthe lokātsa hyatiricyate ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: atha vā laukikyeva balīyasī । sā hi vedanirapekṣaiva prava- rtate । vedaprasiddhistu vākyaśeṣagatalokaprasiddhapadasamabhivyāhāra- sāpekṣā । tena lokaprasiddherbalīyastvādyatra lokāvirodhastatra bhavatu vaidikārthasvīkāraḥ, lokavipratipattau tu lokaprasiddhārthasvīkāra eva । tathā satyarthavādasyā'pi “ādityo vai yūpaḥ” “yajamānaḥ prasaraḥ” (mai. saṃ. 3. 8. 6.) “svargo loka āhavanīyaḥ” itivadgauṇyā vṛttyā laukikārthapraśaṃsāparatvameveti । tathā śāstra- sthamanvādiprasiddhirapyetatpakṣānuguṇā । yadāha—

na ca lokaprasiddhasya trivṛcchabdasya bahiṣpavamānasāmānādhi- karaṇyāsambhavena vaidikārthaparigraha iti vācyam । yatastātrīyāna- vakavacanatve'pi bahiṣpavamānastotrasya tatsādhyatvātsāmānādhikara- ṇyānupapattestadavasthatvāt । atha tatra kāryakāraṇayorekatvopacā- rātsāmānādhikaraṇyam, tadatrā'pi triguṇayajñopavītasyā'pi “yajño- pavītinā karma kartavyaṃ” ityadhikārahetutvātkāryakāraṇabhāvopapatte- rnā'nupapannam । tenoktanyāyena lokaprasiddherbalīyastvāllaukikārtha- parigraha eva । atha prasiddhitulyatvam, tadā laukikārtheṣvapi veda- virodhābhāvena vipratipattau samatvādvikalpa evetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra laukikavaidikapadārthayostulyatvaṃ bhavet । apūrvasidhyarthaṃ hi vedārthānuṣṭhānam । tatra vākyārthavatpadā- rtho'pi yatra vedanaiva pratipādito'sti, tatra vaidikapadārthānuṣṭhānāde- vā'pūrvasiddhiḥ । anyathā vedasya tatpadārthapratipādanavaiyarthyaprasa- ṅgāt । yatra punarvaidikaḥ padārtho nā'sti tatra laukikapadārthānu- ṣṭhānādevā'pūrvasiddhirvedānumateti yuktam । tadatra “trivṛdbahiṣpava- mānami”tyuktvā tṛcatrayānukramaṇaṃ tadaivā'rthavadbhavati, yadi laukika- padārthaparityāgena stotrīyānavakavacanastrivṛcchabdo'trā'dhyayanavidhyanu-
mato bhavet । tena yatrā'pi tṛcatrayānukramaṇaṃ nā'sti “trivṛdagniṣṭu- dagniṣṭomaḥ” (tāṃ, brā. 17. 6. 1.) ityādau, tatrā'pi stotrīyā- navakavacanastrivṛcchabdo vijñāyate । na caitanna sambhavati ।

yadyapi “brahmastoma” ityādau samudāyavacanaṃ stomaśabdaḥ, tathā'pi “pañcadaśaḥ stomo bhavatī”ti vede śravaṇāt ḍapratyayāntasya ca pañcadaśaśabdasya vyākaraṇānuśāsanena yājñikaprasiddheśca sto- trīyāsamudāyavacanatvāttatsamānādhikaraṇā'yaṃ stomaśabdaḥ stotrī- yāsamudāyavacano vijñāyate । evaṃ “trivṛdagniṣṭudagniṣṭoma” ityādau trivṛtsamabhivyāhārātstotrīyānavakārthatvameveti nā'nupapannam ।
na ca manuvacanavirodhaḥ, manuvacanasyā'pi laukikaprayogānta- rniviṣṭatvenā'virodhakatvāditi । taduktam—

yatra punarvedaprasiddhārthaparigraho na sambhavatyeva, yathā-‘trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyā''gneyaṃ savanīyaṃ paśumupākaroti” (śa. brā. 4. 2. 4. 11.) ityādiṣu, tatra lokaprasiddhārthasvīkāra eva nyāyyo na tvanyatrā'pī-
ti । evaṃ carvaśvavālaśabdayorapyuktanyāyena vedaprasiddhārthasyaivā'pūrva- sidhyupāyatvam, na laukikasya । tathāca“ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaścaruḥ, “āśvavālaḥ prastaraḥ” iti vidhāya “aditimodanena” iti “te vālāḥ kāśatāṅgatāḥ” iti caudanakāśayostutyavagamādvidhistutyośca samā- naviṣayatvaniyamāttayoreva carvaśvavālaśabdārthatvam ।

na ca gauṇatvāśrayaṇena lokaprasiddhasthālīturagavālastutire- veyaṃ “ādityo vai yūpaḥ” “yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ” “svargo loka āha- vanīyaḥ” iti vadbhaviṣyatīti vaktavyam, yato gatyantarāsambhavena hi tatra tathā''śritam । na hyādityādīnāṃ yūpādirūpatvaṃ sambhavati । iha punarodanasya yāgasādhanatvasambhavāt, kāśasya ca prastararūpatva- sambhavādvākyaśeṣāttadarthanirṇaya eveti । taduktam—

na ca “sandigdheṣu vākyaśeṣānnirṇaya” ityanena tulyārthatvam, yato yatra hi śabdārthasandehe vākyaśeṣānnirṇīyate, tatra tannyāya- viṣayatvameva । iha punartvokavedayostrivṛdādipadeṣvarthadvayasyā'sa-
ndigdhatvena laukikasyā'rthasya vaidikenā'rthena bādha eva na vikalpa iti vyutpādyate । ato na tulyārthatvamiti । taduktam—

lg.l: vaidikyapi tathā svārthe bādhyate na viparyayāt ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: prayojanam—karmasu vikalpena laukikavaidikārthopādānam, yadi pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhānte tu laukikārthabādhena vadikārthopādāna- meveti ।
sūtrantu—“śāstrasthaiva” pratipattirvalīyasī । dharmasyā'pūrvā- tmanaḥ “tannimittatvāt” śāstranimittatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: iti trivṛccarvaśvavālādhaikaraṇam
atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ pikanemādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha yān śabdānnā''ryāḥ kasmiṃścidācaranti, mlecchāstu kasmiṃścitprayuñjate, yathā—pikanemasatatāmarasaśabdāḥ । teṣu kiṃ nigamaniruktavyākaraṇavaśena dhātuto'rthaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ ? uta yatra mlecchā ācaranti sa śabdārthaḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: imaṃ tu sandehaṃ saṅgatilobhātprabhākaro nā'numanyate । ayañca tasyā'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvannigamaniruktavyākaraṇavaśena pikādyarthāva- dhāraṇaṃ sambhavati, yato mantrārthavādeṣu kvacidarthaviśeṣe prayuktānāṃ śabdānāṃ nigamādivaśenā'vayavavyutpattiḥ pratipādyate । na ca pi- kādiśabdānāṃ kvacidarthaviśeṣe vede prayāgo'pi dṛśyata iti na tāvattadvaśenā'rthāvadhāraṇam, nā'pi mlecchaprasiddhivaśena । tasyāḥ pūrvādhikaraṇa eva vedārthāvadhāraṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvasyoktatvāt । ato 'nadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktam—ubhayathā'pyadhyavasāyasambhavāt । tathā hi-ni- gamādivaśenā'pi tāvadihā'rthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatyeva । na ca mantrārtha- vādeṣu kvacidarthaviśeṣe prayoge satyeva paraṃ nigamādibhirarthāvadhāra- ṇamiti vaktavyam । aprasiddhaśabdārthāvadhāraṇe'pi nigamāderupayo- gadarśanāt । tathā hi—“barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi” ityatra lavanasāmānā dhikaraṇyenā'prayuktasyā'pi dāmītyasya padasya vyākaraṇavaśenaiva lavanārthatvamavadhāryate ।

evaṃ bhakṣānuvāke'pi grahaṇasāmānādhikaraṇyenā'prayukta- jyotiṣṭome hutasya somasya śeṣabhakṣaṇaṃ vihitam-“abhiṣutyā- havanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ paretya sadasisomaṃ bhakṣayanti” (tai. saṃ. 6.3. 11.) iti । ṛtvijaḥ abhiṣutya somarasaṃ latāto niṣpīḍya, āha- vanīyākhye'gnau hutvā homaṃ kṛtvā pratyaṅmukhā gacchantassadonāmakama- ṇḍapamāsādya tatropaviśya samavetāḥ taṃ hutaśeṣaṃ somaṃ bhakṣayeyuriti tadarthaḥ । tacca bhakṣaṇaṃ “bhakṣehi mā''viśa dīrghāyutvāya śantanutvāya rāyaspoṣāma varcase suprajāstvāyehi vaso purovaso priyo me hṛdo- 'syaśvinostvā bāhubhyāṃ sadhyāsaṃ” (tai. saṃ. 3.2.5.) ityādi- mantraiḥ kartavyam । te ca mantrā yasminnanuvāke paṭhitāḥ, sa bhakṣānuvāka iti kathyate ।
syā'pi “sādhyāsaṃ” (tai. saṃ. 3.2.5.)iti padasya niruktā- vagatenā'vayavānvayena grahaṇārthatvamavadhāryata iti । tathā mleccha- prasiddhivaśenā'pi pikādyarthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatyeva । na ca pūrvādhi- karaṇanyāyena mlecchaprasiddheśśabdārthāvadhāraṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvamiti vaktavyam । yato balavadāryaprasiddhivirodhena hi tatrā'naṅgatvamuktam । iha tu virodhābhāvānniṣpratipakṣamlecchaprasiddherapi nirṇāyakatva mucitameveti । ato'nadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyābhidhānamaprāmāṇika- syaiveti । tena yathāvārtikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yadyapyatra pikādiśabdeṣu pī- lvādipadeṣvivā''rthaprasiddhivirodho nā'sti, evamavayavaprasiddhervila- mbitārthapratītihetutvena ca samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasī, tathā'pi ni- gamādiśāstrārthavatvādvilambinyapyavayavaprasiddhireva balīyasī । na tu mleccharūpāśrayadūṣitā'sanmūlā samudāyaprasiddhiḥ । taduktam—

kiñca mlecchaprasiddhārthaparigrahe sati draviḍakarṇāṭasiṃhalādi- deśabhedena mlecchabhāṣāvaicitryātsarveṣvevā''ryāprasiddhaśabdeṣu kadā- citkvaciddeśe kenā'pi mlecchenā'yaṃ śabdaḥ kvacidarthe prayukta iti śaṅkāyāṃ nigamādivaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ । atro nigamādivaśenaiva pikādi- śabdānāmarthanirṇaya ityevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyāryaprasidhyavirodhe'pi mlecchaprasi- ddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavet । tathā hi—pikādiśabdāstāvadvedeṣvanuṣṭhe- yārthatayā śrūyante । tena naiteṣāṃ padāpabhraṃśarūpatvaṃ saṃbhavati । nā'- pyanarthakatvam । na caite āryavyavahāre kvacidarthaviśeṣe prasiddhāḥ pratyabhijñāyante । jñāyante ca kokilādyarthaviṣayā mlecchaprayogeṣu । na ca śabdārthasambandhāvadhāraṇe kaścidāryamlecchayorviśeṣo'sti । yatra punarāryairanyatra prayuktaḥ śabdo mlecchairanyatra prayujyate, tatrā''- ryāṇāṃ śabdārthanirūpaṇeṣvabhiyuktataratvāttadvaśena mlecchaprasiddhergau- ṇatvenaivopapatterbhavatvāryaprasiddhārthasya mukhyatvena balīyastvam । na cā'tra mlecchaprasiddhergauṇatvaṃ sambhavati, mukhyabhūtārthāntarābhāvāt ।

na ca niruktādivaśenaivā'tra mukhyārthanirūpaṇamiti yuktam; niruktavaśenā'pyarthaviśeṣāvadhāraṇāsambhavāt । tathā hi—pikaśa-
bdasya tāvannigamavaśenā'rthaviśeṣakathanaṃ nā'styeva । tathā sati sa- ndehābhāvāt । kintvavayavavyutpattyanusāreṇohanīyo'sāvarthaḥ । tatra pibati pāti pacatītyanekadhātusādhāraṇatvādavayavānvayasya nirukta- vaśenā'pi nā'rthaviśeṣāvadhāraṇam । atā niruktaprasiddhirapi na mlecchapraddhivirodhinī, kintu kokilaḥ pivati pāti pacatītyevaṃ mlecchaprasidhyanusāreṇaiveti । yatra punaranviṣyamāṇā'pi mleccha- prasiddhirapi nopalabhyate “sadhyāsami”tyādipadeṣu, tatra niruktādī- nāmeva nirṇāyakatvam । taduktam—

yā tvabhiyuktairanviṣyamāṇā'pyanupalabdhārthāntaraprasiddhiḥ, sā kadācit kvaciddeśe samastīti śaṅkyamānā dhūmasyā'gnisandehe- 'pi sādhāraṇītyupekṣaṇīyaiveti । na caivaṃ sati prasiddhārthapadagocarasya niruktasya vaiyarthyamiti vaktavyam । “ṣaḍaṅgo vedo'dhyetavya” iti vi- dhibalātsarvatraiva nigamaniruktavyākaraṇāvabodhitapadārthasyaivā'nuṣṭhita-
sya phalāpūrvasādhanatvābhyupagamāt । taduktam—
atā mlecchaprasiddhānāmapi pikādipadārthānāṃ grahaṇaṃ yukta- bheveti ।
prayojanaṃ-pūrvapakṣe'niyamaḥ, siddhānte kokilasyaivopādanamiti ।
sūtrantu—mlecchaprasiddhamapi vede “coditaṃ pratīyeta pramāṇena” virodhābhāvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ kalpasūtrādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: iha kalpasūtrāṇyudāharaṇam । māśakaṃ hāstikaṃ kauṇḍinyaka- mityevaṃlakṣaṇakāni kiṃ pramāṇamapramāṇamiti sandigdhāni ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgātilobhādityamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam— kalpasūtrāṇāmapi vedavatsvādhyāyānadhyāyarūpādarāviśeṣādarthāviśe- ṣācca māśakādisamākhyānāṃ ca kāṭhakādivatpravacanato'pyupapatterveda tvam । sati ca vedatve parasparavyāghāto'tra dṛśyate । tathāhi— sarvāsu tithiṣu darśapūrṇamāsāviti kalpasūtram, paurṇamāsyamāvāsya- yoreveti vedaḥ । na cā'tra vrīhiyavavadvikalpassambhavati । asaṅkī- rṇārthayorhi parasparavirodhe vikalpo bhavati । atra sarvāsu tithiṣu darśapūrṇamāsāviti paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayorapi prāptatvādvikalpāsambha- vena viruddhārthayoḥ parasparavyāghātādaprāmāṇyameveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
siddhāntastu—syādevaṃ kāṭhakādivatsamākhyāmātramatra bhavet ।
kintvavicchinnadṛḍhataramaśakādikartṛsmṛtestatkartṛkatvameva । vedatulyā- darastu nāntarīyako vedamiśrāmnānāt । ataḥ kalpasūtrāṇāṃ pauru- ṣeyatvādvedavirodhenā'nādaraṇīyatvameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadetadasambaddham; na hi saṅkīrṇārthayoḥ parasparavirodhenā'prā- māṇyaṃ bhavati । tathā sati “ekā deyā”ityādiṣvapyaprāmāṇyaprasa- ṅgāt । atha tatra phalabhūyastvakalpanayā avirodhaḥ, tathā'trā'pi phalabhūyastvārthameva paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayoḥ śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yathā- vārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvaṃ manvādismṛtimudāhṛtya tulyanyāyatayā kalpasūtrāṇāṃ purā- ṇānāñca śrutimūlatayā prāmāṇye nirūpite idānīṃ kalpasūtramudāhṛ- tya teṣāmeva svātantryeṇa vedavatprāmāṇyamāśaṅkya tannirākaraṇena smṛtyadhikaraṇanyāya eva vyavasthāpyate । na ca vācyaṃ “dharmasya śabdamūlatvādaśabdamanapekṣyaṃ syāt” (jai. sū. 1.3.1.) ityanu- palabhyamānamūlaśabdānāmevā'ṣṭakādismṛtīnāṃ tannyāyaviṣayatvā- t, kathaṃ pratyakṣopalabhyamānamūlānāṃ kalpasūtrāṇāmapi tannyāya-
viṣayatvam । yato na smṛtīnāmapi sarvāsāmanupalabhyamānamūlatvam, upanayanādismṛtīnāṃ mūlabhūtapratyakṣavedopalambhāt । nā'pi ka- lpasūtrāṇāṃ sarveṣāmeva pratyakṣavedamūlatvam । nānāśākhāgatāṅgopasaṃ- grāhiṇāṃ teṣāṃ mūlabhūtakṛtsnavedopalambhābhāvāt । svalpabhūyastve paraṃ viśeṣaḥ । na caitāvatā tannyāyaviṣayatvaṃ bhavati । yattu prathamaṃ kalpa- sūtramātramevodāharaṇamityuktaṃ, tadbhāṣyānusāreṇeti nā''daraṇīyam ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—smṛtīnāṃ purāṇānāṃ kalpasū- trāṇāṃ ca mahājanādaraparigṛhītātīndriyārthaviṣayatvādagnihotrādicoda- nāvadvedatvameva । tathā''cāryavacanaṃ pramāṇamiti vedādevā'vagamyate । taccaiṣāṃ niyatve satyupapadyate । anyathā nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt māśakādisamākhyāyāśca kāṭhakādisamākhyāvatpravacanādevopapatteḥ । kartṛvyapadeśaśca mantrakṛdvyapadeśavadupapatsyate ।

yathāhi-“śiśurvāṅgiraso mantrakṛtā mantrakṛdāsīdi”ti (tāṃ. brā. 13. 3. 24) mantrapravaktari mantrakṛdvyapadeśo vede, tathā pravaktari māśakādau loke kartṛvyapadeśa iti । evañca sati buddhādyāgamānā- mapi vedavadeva tulyanyāyatayā prayogaśāstratvāviśeṣāt dharme prāmāṇyaṃ
pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhimatamityevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra mahājanādaraparigṛhītātīndri- yārthaviṣayatvaṃ vedatvamantareṇopapadyeta । tattūbhayathā'pyupapadyate, veda- tvena vedamūlatvena ca । tatrā'vicchinnadṛḍhatarakartṛsmṛteḥ pauruṣeya- tvena vedatvāsambhavāt smṛtyadhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyena vedamūlatvenaiva vyavasthāpyate ।

yattu nityatve'pi mantrakṛdvyapadeśavatkartṛvyapadeśa ityuktam, tadasaṅgatam; vyapadeśamātraṃ hi mantrakṛdvyapadeśavadyathākathañcitsamā- dhānamadhikṛrute । dṛḍhatarakartṛsmṛtistu nā'nityatāmantareṇa kathañci- tsamādhātuṃ śakyate । na ca sā vede samasti । tathā sati vedasyā'- pyanityatvaprasaṅgāt । evañca sati samākhyā'pi pauruṣeyatvaniba- ndhanā, na tu kāṭhakādivatpravacananibandhanā

yattu “ācāryavacaḥ pramāṇaṃ” iti veda eva kalpasūtrādānāṃ ni- tyatvaṃ pratipādayati, itarathā nityānityasaṃyogavirodhādityaktam,
tadasat; na hyayaṃ vedo maśakādīnāṃ kalpasūtrarūpapravacanaviṣayaḥ, kintarhyācāryavacanaviṣaya evā'yam । ācāryaśca manvādibhi- rukta eva ।

lg.l: sakalpaṃ sarahasyaṃ ca tamācāryaṃ pracakṣate ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: tasya ca vacanaṃ śiṣyaviṣayaṃ pramāṇameveti । taduktam—

nā'pi nityānityasaṃyogavirodhaḥ । ācāryaśabdasya pravṛtti- nimittopādhisāmānyāśrayaṇena pācakādiśabdavannityārthatvāt । atha vā ācinoti śrotṛbuddhimiti vyutpattyā''cāryo veda eveti nā'nu- papannam । ata eva dṛḍhatarakartṛsmṛterbuddhādyāgamānāmapi na svātantryeṇa pramāṇatā ।
iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ—kalpasūtrādīnāṃ vedamūlatvena prāmāṇyam teṣāntvasanmūlatvenā'prāmāṇyameveti ।
prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe—adhotakalpasūtraprasmaraṇe'pi vedaprasmaraṇa- prāyaścittam, siddhānte tvavedatvānneti ।
sūtrantu—“na” vedatvaṃ kalpasūtrādīnāṃ prāgasatāmeva maśakā- dibhiḥ “niyamāt”nibandhanāditi ।।
chapter.head: athā'ṣṭamaṃ holākādhikaraṇam ।।
( viṣayasaṃśayau )
chapter.p: anumānātsmṛterācārāṇāṃ ca pramāṇyamiṣyate । yenaiva hetunā te pramāṇam, tenaiva vyavasthitā eva prāmāṇyamarhanti । tasmāddholā- kādayaḥ prācyaireva karttavyāḥ, āhnīnaibukādayo dākṣiṇātyaireva, udvṛṣabhayajñādaya udīcyaireveti ।
chapter.head: ( prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ )
chapter.p:
atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhādityamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam—
ācārasya prācyādiniṣṭhatvātprācyādipadavadvedānumānameva yuktam । prācyādipadānāṃ cā'rthaviśeṣānavadhāraṇenā'vyavasthitārthatvātprācyā- dipadavatī codanā na vyavasitārthā, na pramāṇamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—bhavedevaṃ yadi prācyādipadavatī codanānumī- yate, kintu sāmānyenaiva holākādikarmamātraviṣayiṇī । sā ca vyavasthitārthaiveti nā'prāmāṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadidamasaṅgatam—tatkimavyavasthitārthaprācyādipadavatī codanā budhyupasaṃhārāsambhavānmūlatvena kalpayitumeva na śakyata ityapramā- ṇam ? kalpitā vā'pramāṇam ? yadyakalpitaiva na pramāṇam, tadā- ko virodhaḥ ? atha kalpitā satī na pramāṇamityucyate, tadasamba- ddham; na hi budhyupasaṃhāramantareṇā''cāramūlatayā codanā kalpayi- tumeva śakyate । tathā kalpitā ca na pramāṇamiti bālajalpitamiti yathā vārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvatra smṛtigataṃ viśeṣaṃ nirūpyedānīmācāragato viśeṣaścintyate ।
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—holākādyācārasya prācyā- disambandhenaivopalambhāttadvaśena śrutiranumīyamānā holākādayaḥ prā- cyādibhireva kartavyā iti viśeṣaśrutirevā'numīyate । taduktam—

nanu prācyādiśabdapravṛttinimittasyaivā'vyavasthitatvānna vyava- sthitaviśeṣaśrutyanumānaṃ sambhavati । tathā hi—na tāvadbrāhmaṇa- tvādijātivatprācyatvādijātirasti । na ca prācyādideśajanyata vyavasthākāraṇam । deśāntaragataprācyapitṛjanitānāmapi holākā- dyācāradarśanāt । nā'pi prācyādideśanivāso vyavasthākāraṇam । anyadeśīyānāṃ taddeśanivāsināmapi tadadarśanāt । atra eva kṛṇṇamṛttikādeśīyatvaṃ lohitākṣatvādikaṃ vā na vyavasthākāraṇam । sarveṣāmeva vyabhicāradarśanāt ।

ucyate—ekaikaśassarveṣāṃ vyabhicāre'pi prācyādisamākhyā tāvatsakalānuṣṭhātṛsādhāraṇī samasti । saiva vyavasthākāraṇaṃ bhavi- ṣyati । tena samākhyāyā eva tāvadvyavasthitānumānahetutvātsamā-
khyāyuktapuruṣaviśeṣaviṣayameva pramāṇaṃ syādityevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi prācyādisamākhyā'tra vyavasthā- kāraṇaṃ bhavet । sā hi pravartamānā pāṇinīyasmṛtyanusāreṇa caturdhā pravartate । tathā hi tatsmaraṇam-“so'sya nivāsaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ, tatra jātaḥ, tata āgata” ( pā. sū. 4. 3. 89; 53; 25; 74.) iti । tadayamarthaḥ—prāci vasati, prāci tiṣṭhati, prāci jātaḥ, prāca āgataḥ prācya ityucyate । taduktam—

na caivaṃbhūtā'pi samākhyā vyavasthākāraṇam । prāci dākṣi- ṇātyajanitasya prāgdeśanivāsino'pi holākādyanuṣṭhānādarśa- nāt । tasyaiva dākṣiṇātyasamākhyānimittābhāve'pyāhnīnaibukā- dyanuṣṭhānadarśanāt ।

atha na vyākaraṇasmṛtinibandhanā samākhyā nimittam, ki- ntūtchṛṅkhalaiva laukikī samākhyā nimittamityucyate, tathā sati dā-
kṣiṇātyasyā'pi sāṅketikaprācyādināmno holākādyanuṣṭhānaprasa- ṅgaḥ । ato vyavasthākāraṇābhāvātprācyādipadayuktaśrutikalpane gauravaprasaṅgāccā'viśeṣaṇaiva holākādikartavyatāpratipādikā śruti- ranumīyate । yattu keṣāñcidasmākamevaitadanuṣṭheyamiti kṛtvā'syā'nu- ṣṭhānamanyeṣāñcā'nanuṣṭhānam, tadbhrāntinibandhanameva । dṛṣṭañcaitatsāmā- nyena pratyakṣaśrutismṛtivihite'pi karmaṇi keṣāñcidanuṣṭhānamananuṣṭhānaṃ cā'nyeṣām । yathā sādhāraṇavidhāne'pi durgotsava eva varāṭādau jambālalīlānuṣṭhānam, vaṅgapāścātyānāṃ tu caitraśuklacaturdaśyā- meveti na kiñcidanupapannamiti ।
prayojanaṃ-pūrvapakṣe prācyādibhireva holākādyanuṣṭheyam, siddhānte tu sarvaireveti ।
sūtrantu—holākādikarma sarveṣāmeva “dharmaḥ” syāt । holā- kādikarma “vidhānasya” sarvadharmatāpratipādakanyāyavatvāditi ।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ vyādhikaraṇādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: gaurgāvī goṇā gopotaliketyevamādayaḥ śabdā udāharaṇam । yathā gośabdassāsnādimataḥ pramāṇam, tathā gāvyādayo'pi, uta neti sandehaḥ । kimatraikaśśabdo'vicchinnapāramparyo'rthābhidhāne, itare tvapabhraśāḥ. uta sarve'nādaya iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāt “na codāharaṇamādaraṇīya”miti bhāṣyakārīyamudāharaṇamanādṛtya “aśvamālabheta”ityādicodanāgato' śvaśabda udāhṛtya vicāritaḥ । lokeśvaśabdasya turage daridre ca prayogo dṛśyate । tatra ca na jñāyate kutrā'yaṃ sādhuḥ, kutra cā'sā- dhuriti । na ca vyākaraṇasmṛtirvinigamanākāraṇam । nirmūlatvena tasyāḥ pramāṇatvāsambhavāt । ataḥ “aśvamālabheta”ityanadhyavasitā- rthāśvapadavatī codanā na pramāṇamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
siddhāntastu—vyākaraṇasmṛteranādiprayogamūlatvena pramāṇatvā-
ttadvaśena tālavyaśakārayukto'yamaśvaśabdasturaga eva sādhuḥ । dantya- sakārayuktaśca ‘na vidyate svamasminni’ti vyutpattyā daridre sādhuḥ, na tālavyaśakārayukta iti“aśvamālabheta”iti codanā'dhyavasitārthatvā- tpramāṇameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadidamayuktama; pūrvapakṣe hi vyākaraṇasmṛternirmūlatvenā'prā- māṇye sati prayogavaśādeva sarvatra sādhutvaṃ vaktavyam । taccobhaya- trā'pyaviśiṣṭamiti turage daridre cā'yamaśvaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ sādhu- reva । tathā ca satyanekārthākṣādiśabdeṣvivā'rthaprakaraṇābhyāmadhya- vasāyasambhavānnā'nadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyamiti yathā vārttikamevā'dhi- karaṇaṃ prastūyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: pūrvaṃ smṛtyācārayordharme prati sarvaprakāraṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirūpyedānīṃ prasaṅgena vyākaraṇasmṛteśśabdasādhutvaṃ prati prāmāṇyamasti nā'stīti ‘sādhubhirbhāṣete’ti sādhuśabdasya dharmaṃ pratyupayogitvena nirūpyate । ayamevā'tra pāramārthikassandehaḥ । bhāṣyakāreṇa tu kiṃ sarve gogā- vyadāyaḥ śabdāssāsnādimatpadārthe sādhavaḥ ? uta gośabda eva sādhu rgāvyādayo'pabhraṃśāḥ ? iti phalabhūtassaṃśayo darśita iti mantavyam ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—gogāvyādiśabdānāṃ sādhva- sādhuviveke vyākaraṇasmṛtiḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavet, yadi manvādismṛtiva- nmūlabhūtaṃ pramāṇamanumātuṃ śakyeta । tatra na tāvatpratyakṣaṃ mūlaṃ sambha- vati, tasya varṇasvarūpātiriktavācakaśaktirūpasādhutvaviṣayatvāsa- mbhavāt । nā'pi vyākaraṇasmṛtisahakṛtam, nirmūlatvena vyākara- ṇasmṛtessahakāritvāsambhavāt । nā'pyanumānam, tatpratibaddhaliṅgā- bhāvāt । nā'pi śabdaḥ, tasya pauruṣeyatve'ndhaparamparādoṣāt । apauruṣeyasya ca pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayatvena siddhaviṣaye prāmāṇyāyo- gāt । upamānantu sādṛśyaikaviṣayatvādanāśaṅkanīyameva । nā'pya- rthāpattiḥ, tasyā apyarthapratipatyanyathānupapattiprabhavatvena gāvyādi- ṣvapyaviśeṣāt । ataḥ pañcapramāṇānutpattyā vyākaraṇasmṛtimūlama bhāvapramāṇaviṣayameveti siddham ।

kiñca svavacanavyāghātādapi vyākaraṇamapramāṇaṃ sādhutve । tathā hi—“janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ” (pā.sū.1.4.30) iti sūtram । atra ja- niśabdena jananameva vivakṣitam । tenā'yamarthaḥ—jananasya kartā jā- yamānastasya yā prakṛtirutpādakastasyā'pādānasaṃjñā bhavati । na ca janiśabdenegantena janamamabhidhīyate, “ikspipau dhātunirdeśa” iti svayameva pratiṣiddhatvāt । tathā janikarturiti samāso'pyanupapannaḥ,
“tṛjakābhyāṃ, kartari ca” ( pā. sṛ. 2.2. 15, 16 ) iti tṛjanta- sya kartṛśabdasya svayameva ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhāt । tathā aka- pratyayāttasyā'pyanenaiva ṣaṣṭhīsāmāsaniṣedhāt “tatprayojako hetuśca” (pā. sū. 1.4.55 ) ityatra sūtre tasya prayojaka iti tacchabdena sahā'kapratyayāntasya prayojakaśabdasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāso'pyanupapannaḥ ।

evamarthaviṣānavadhāraṇadapi na pramāṇam । tathā hi—“bhūvādayo dhātvaḥ” ityatra kiṃ dhātuśabdapravṛttinimittam ? na tāvadgraṇapāṭhaḥ, “bhūsattāyāṃ” ityatra sattāśabdasyā'pi dhātutvaprasaṅgāt । nā'pi kriyāvacanatvam, bhū ityetasyā'pyadhātutvāpatteḥ । ata eva na mili- tayorapi dhātuśabdapravṛttinimittatvam, bhūsattāyāmityatreva kriyāvaca- natvābhāvāt । tasmādarthāniścayādapyaprāmāṇyam ।

evaṃ kārakānuśāsanamapyasambaddhameva । tathā hi—“svatantraḥ karte” ti kartṛlakṣaṇam । atra ca svātantryameva na jñāyate । yadī- cchāprayatnādhāratvaṃ svātantryam, tarhi ‘kāṣṭhāni pacanti, sthālī pacati’ ityatrā'kartṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ । atha dhātūpāttavyāpāratvaṃ kartṛtvam, tarhi pacatītyatra pacidhātunā sthālīsammārjanopakramasya sikthaparī- kṣaṇaparyantasya vyāpāranicayasyopāttatvātsarvakārakāṇāmapi kartṛtva- prasaṅgaḥ ।

evaṃ karmādayo'pyadhikaraṇaparyantāssarva eva durniścayā ityukta- mapi vārtike vistarabhayānnocyate । ato vyākaraṇasya sādhuśabda- “prayogotpattāvaśāstratvā” tadanugateṣveva śabdeṣu sādhutvaṃ nā'vatiṣṭhata iti na sādhutvaṃ prati vyākaraṇasmṛteḥ prāmāṇyamityevaṃ prāpte abhi- dhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi śabdasādhutve vyākaraṇasmṛtiḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavet । na ca nirmūlatvādapramāṇyam, pratyakṣasyaiva mūlatvā- t । tathāhi—sādhutvaṃ nāma kvacidarthaviśeṣe svābhāvikrapratipādanaśa- ktiyoginaḥ śabdasya vilakṣaṇaṃ rūpam । tacca prakṛtipratyayādidvāreṇa vyākaraṇasmṛtyā yasya pratipādyate, tasyaiva vyākaraṇasmṛtisahakṛtena śrotrapratyakṣeṇā'sādhuśabdavyāvṛttaṃ sādhutvarūpaṃ sphuṭataramadyatanaistā- vatpratīyata eva, brāhmaṇatvamiva mātāpitṛsambandhasmaraṇasahakṛtena cākṣuṣapratyakṣeṇa । ratnatatvamiva ratnaparīkṣāśāstrajñānāhitasaṃskāra- sahakṛtena cākṣuṣapratyakṣeṇaiva । tena pāṇinerapi pūrvataravyākaraṇasma- raṇāhitasaṃskārasahitaśrotrapratyakṣeṇaiva sādhutvopalambhānna nirmū-
latvaṃ vyākaraṇasmṛteriti । nā'pyandhaparamparā, smṛtipratyakṣayoḥ paurvāparyānāditvāt । taduktam—

ataḥ smṛtyantarāhitasaṃskārasahakṛtapratyakṣamūlatvādvyākaraṇa- smṛteḥ prāmāṇyameveti । nā'pi “janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ” ityādiṣu svacanavyāghātādaprāmāṇyam । dṛṣṭā hi sarvatraiva sūtrakārāṇāṃ sūtreṣu gauṇalākṣaṇikā eva prayogāḥ । yathā hi jaiminereva nitye vācye autpattikaśabdaprayogaḥ, tathā janiśabdo'pi dhātvarthe, janmani lākṣa- ṇikatvānna doṣamāvahati । tathā “tṛjakābhyāṃ kartari ca”iti ni- ṣiddhaṣaṣṭhīsamāsāśrayaṇamapi niṣedhasya vaikalpikatvapradarśanārthameva ।

yacca “bhūvādayo dhātavaḥ” ( pā. sū. 1.3.1 )ityatra dhātuśabdārthā- parijñānādaprāmāṇyamuktam, tadayuktam; tiṅādipratyayaprakṛtitvameva hi dhātutvam । etadeva “pratyayaḥ, paraśca” ( pā. sū. 3. 1. 1, 2. ) iti sūtrābhyāṃ pāṇininā svayameva darśitam ।

tadapi “svatantraḥ kartā”iti kartṛlakṣaṇaṃ svātantryānirūpaṇāda-
yuktamityuktam, tadayuktam; kriyāsidhyanukūletarakārakaprayoktṛtvaṃ hi svātantry । tacca kvacidaprayuktasya, kvacidanyaprayuktasya । taduktaṃ bhartṛhariṇā—

lg.l: pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā kārakāṇāṃ ya īśvaraḥ ।
aprayuktaḥ prayukto vā sa kartā nāma kārakam ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: yastu ‘kāṣṭhāni pacantī’tyādiṣvacetaneṣu kartṛnirdeśaḥ, sa vaiva- kṣika eveti mantavyam । evaṃ karmādiṣvapīpsitatamatvādyūhanīyam । ataḥ śrotrapratyakṣamūlatvena śabdasādhutvena vyākaraṇasmṛtiḥ pramāṇa- bheveti gavādiśabdā eva sādhava iti । gāvyādiśabdānāṃ punaru- ccāraṇāsāmarthyato mūlaśabdāpabhraṃśānāṃ vivakṣiteṣu mūlaśabdānu- sāreṇā'rthapratipādakattvam, avivakṣiteṣu tu vācakabhrāntyaiveti ।
prayojanam—kratau varaṇabharaṇasaṅkalpādivākyeṣvapabhraṃśenā'pi vyavahartavyam, yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhānte tu-‘sādhubhirbhāṣeta’ iti sādhuśabdenaiveti ।
sūtrantu—“śabde” abhivyajyamāne tadabhivyakteḥ prayatnādhīna- niṣpattikatvāt “aparādhabhāgitvaṃ” apabhraṣṭatvamabhivyañjakadoṣā- deveti bhāvaḥ ।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ lokavedādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha gaurityevamādayaśśabdāḥ kimākṛteḥ pramāṇam ? uta vya- kteḥ ? iti sandehe ucyate । idaṃ tāvatparīkṣyatām—ki ya eva laukikāśśabdāsta eva vaidikāḥ ? uta anye ? iti । yadā ta eva, tadā kiṃ ta evaiṣāmarthāḥ ? uta anye ? iti saṃśayaḥ ।
chapter.head: ( prabhākaramat )
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa ya eva laukikāsta eva vaidikā utā'nya ityasyā'pi vicārasyā''kṛtyadhikaraṇopādghātatāmamyupagatyā'pi sā- kṣātsaṅgatilobhādaprāmāṇyena pūrvapakṣamuktvā pṛthak saṅgatirdarśitā ।
chapter.head: prakākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: sā ceyamatidānarasikatayā jāmātṛsahāyasyā'pi yautukadā- namiva bhāti । yato na hyupodghātasyā'pi pṛthak saṅgatyapekṣā bhavati । prakṛtavicārasidhyarthatayā tatsgatyaiva tasya saṅgatatvāditi yathā vārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p: pūrvādhikaraṇe hi gavādiśabdānāṃ vācakatve nirūpite tatprasaṅgena vācyanirūpaṇamārabhyate-kimeṣāmākṛtirvācyā ? uta vyaktiḥ ? iti । asya ca vicārasya niṣprayojanatvamāśaṅkya tatprayojanavatvāyeda- mupoddhātena vicāryate—kiṃ ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidi- kāḥ,ta evaiṣāmarthāḥ ? uta anye ? iti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“atha śabdānuśāsanaṃ” ittyu- ktvā keṣāṃ śabdānāṃ “lokikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca” ityabhiyuktānāmeva śabdavidāṃ vyapadeśabhedadarśanādbhedastāvadavagamyate ।

tathā rūpabhedādapi bhedaḥ । tathā hi—vede “aṣṭākapālaḥ” iti paṭhanti । loke ca “aṣṭakapāla”iti । tathā vede “agniṣṭomaḥ” iti, loke ca “agnistomaḥ” iti । evaṃ vede “gṛbhṇāmi” iti, loke “gṛhṇāmi” iti ।

tathā'rthabhedo'pi dṛśyate । vede śrūyate—“uttānā vai devagavā vahanti” iti । tathā “suvarṇaparṇo vanaspatiḥ” । evaṃ “ghṛtaṃ madhu” iti । na ca gavādiśabdānāmevaṃbhūto'rtho loke samasti । tena yatrā'pi gavādiśabdeṣu rūpabhedo nā'vagamyate, tatrā'pyarthabhedādeva śabdabhedaḥ
sādṛśyanibandhanaścaikatvādhyavasāya iti । yatrā'pi rūpabhedasta- trā'pi tadbhedādevā'rthabhedo'pi । arthapratipattistu vede laukikaśabda- sādṛśyādeveti । ato loke vede ca śabdārthayorbhinnatvāllaukika- gavādiśabdānāmākṛtivyaktivācitvanirūpaṇaṃ vedaprāmāṇyānupayogi- tvenā'yuktamevetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi laukikavaidikaśabdayorbhedo bhavet । tau tu pratyabhijñānāllokavedayorapyekāveva । ya eva gavādi- śabdā loke pratīyante, ta eva vede'pi pratyabhijñāyante । na cā'ṣṭā- kapālāgniṣṭomagṛbhṇāmītyādiśabdāḥ kiñcidvikārānna pratyabhijñāyanta iti vācyam । yataśchinnalāṅgūlabhagnaviṣāṇagovyaktivatpratyabhi- jñāyamānatvāt । anyathā laukikāvikṛtāṣṭakapālādiśabdānāṃ vaidikāṣṭākapālādiśabdeṣvivā'vikṛtārthāvagamābhāvaprasaṅgāt । bhava- tu vā keṣāñcidanyatvam, na caivamavikṛtapratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ gavādi- śabdānāmapyanyatve kiñcitkāraṇamasti ।

vyapadeśabhedastu—brāhmaṇaparivrājakavadbhinnarūpavaidikavākyānta- rgatinibandhana eva । yattu “uttānā vai devagavā vahanti” iti ta- dapyarthavādamātraṃ, lokasiddhasya gopadārthasyottānavahanarūpakriyāviśeṣa-
pratipādanasya praśaṃsārthatvāt । evamudāharaṇāntaramapi stutyarthameve- ti । taduktaṃ bhāṣye—“ya eva laukikāśśabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ” ( śā. bhā. 1. 3. 10. ) iti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayorākṛtyadhikaraṇānārabhyārambhā- viti ।
sūtrantu—lokavedayośśabdarūpasyā'rtharūpasya caikatvaṃ pratyabhi- jñārūpapratyayāvibhāgāt । evañca sati darśapūrṇamāsādiprayogacoda- nānāṃ bhāvassyāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśamākṛtyadhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: yadā ca laukikā eva śabdāstadarthāśca, tadā sandehaḥ—kimā- kṛtiḥ śabdārthaḥ ? atha vyaktiḥ ? iti । kā punarākṛtiḥ ? kā vyaktiḥ ? dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sāmānyamākṛtiḥ, asādhāraṇaviśeṣo vyaktiriti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhādityamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam—u- ccārite hi gośabdādāvubhayaṃ pratīyate—jātiśca vyaktaści । kāryānva- yitvaṃ ca dvayorapyaviśiṣṭam । yathā hi “gavā yajete”tyatra vyakteḥ kāryānvayaḥ, tathā “śyenacitaṃ cinvīta” ( tai. saṃ. 5. 4. 11. ) ityatrā''kṛterapi, vyaktisādṛśyasyā'śakyasampādanatvāt । na cobha- yorapi śabdavācyatvam, anyatarasyā'pi śabdavācyatve nāntarīyaka- tayā'nyatarāvagamopapatteḥ । atha ca kasya śabdavācyatvaṃ, kasya nānta- rīyakatvamityavadhārayituṃ na śakyata iti gavādipadavatī codanā- 'nadhyavasitārthatvādapramāṇameveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhagrahaṇāśakte- rvyaktyabhidhānāsambhavādākṛtereva vācyatvam, nāntarīyakatvenaika- saṃvidvedyatayo'vagamo vyakteriti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p:
tadetatpūrvāparapratisandhānaśūnyasyaivā'bhidhānam । jātivyaktyo- ranyataravācyatvānavadhāraṇe'pyavagatyaviśeṣādanuṣṭhānāviśeṣācca kuto'- nadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyam ? tathā sati kiṃ nityatvena śrotradeśasthasyaiva
dhvanyabhivyaktasya śabdasyā'rthapratipādakatvaṃ, anityatvena vā vīcī- taraṅgavṛttyā śrotradeśasamāgatasyetyanadhyavasāyādapramāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ ।

tathā jātivyaktyorekasaṃvidvedyatve jātirevā'bhidheyeti siddhā- nto'pyanupapannaḥ । yato'bhidhānakriyājanitajñānaviṣayatvaṃ khalu vā- cyatvam । taccā''kṛterabhyupagamya tasminneva jñāne vyaktiḥ pratibhāsa- mānā nā'bhidhīyata iti citram ।

athocyeta—dvayī hi śabdaśaktirasādhāraṇī sādhāraṇī ca । tatrā'sādhāraṇī śaktirabhidhānarūpā jātigocaraiva । sādhāraṇī tu pratyakṣānumānārthāpattīnāmiva vyaktigocarā'nabhidhānarūpā, tadubhaya- śaktijanitaikajñānaviṣayatve'pi jātivyaktyorasādhāraṇaśaktiviṣaya- tvājjātireva vācyā na vyaktiriti ।

tadetadvādamātram—na hi pramāṇānāṃ prātyātmikīmasādhāraṇa- śaktiṃ vinā pratipādyaviṣayiṇī kācicchaktirasti । tathā hi— pratyakṣasya sambaddhavartamānaviṣayiṇī, anumānasya jñātasambandhavyā- pakaviṣayiṇī, śabdasya vācyaviṣayiṇī, arthāpattestvanupapadyamāno- papādakaviṣayiṇī । pratipādakasādhāraṇye'pi yadi vyaktessādhā- raṇaśaktiviṣayatvādavācyatvam, tadā jāterapyavācyatvaprasaṅgaḥ ।

atha matam—vṛddhavyavahāre vācyavācakasambandhāvadhāraṇakāle
jātivyaktyorekaśabdasāhacaryāvagamādabhidhānakāle vyaktisaṃskāra- syā'pyudbuddhatvātsaṃskāraśabdābhyāṃ samāhārajamubhayaviṣayamekaṃ jñānaṃ janyate pratyabhijñānamiveti ।

tadetacchaṅkhaśuktigataśucitvadarśanānnaraśiraḥkapālādāvapi prā- ṇyaṅgatvena śucitvānumānamivā''bhāti । yataḥ, pratyakṣajñānasyaivā'yaṃ mahimā yadudbuddhasaṃskārendriyābhyāṃ janyamānamindriyāsambaddhamapi pratyabhijñādau viṣayīkaroti, na tvanumānādijñānānāmapi । tāni khalu nyāyasampādanādhīnapravṛttīni । tatrā'numānajñānaṃ tāvadvyāptipa- kṣadharmatāparāmarśavaśālliṅgavaśenopajāyamānaṃ haṃsakṣīrodakanyāyena vyāpakaviśeṣaviṣayamevopajāyate । arthāpattijñānamapyanupapattiparāma- rśādupajāyamānamupapādakaikaviṣayamevotpadyate ।

evaṃ śabdo'pyabhidhānasamaye pūrvāvagatasāmarthyaparāmarśavaśenā'- rthamabhidadhāno yadgocaraivā'sya vācakaśaktiravadhāritā, tadviṣayameva jñānaṃ janayati । pratyakṣajñānaṃ tu na nyāyasampādanāpariśodhitaviṣa- yam, kintvarthendriyasannikarṣavaśādupajāyamānaṃ samasamayabhāvismṛti- hetusaṃskārodbodhavaśādindriyāsambaddhamapi viṣayīkurute । yathā- tattedantārthaviṣayaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ, saṃjñivaṣayañca savikalpakajñānam । ita- rathā tvatpakṣe sambandhasmaraṇahetusaṃskāropasthitatvādvyakteriva samba-
ndhasyā'pi śabdopajanitajñānaviṣayatvāpattiḥ । na kevalaṃ sambandhasya, kintu vyutpattisthānavṛddhavyavahārakriyāyāḥ kriyāvācakaśabdasyā'pi ।

atha vyutpattikāle tayorvyabhicārātsaṃskārādanupasthitiri- tyucyate, evantarhi vyaktīnāmapi vyabhicārādanupasthitiḥ syāt । atha vyaktiviśeṣāṇāṃ vyabhicāre'pi vyañjakatvasāmānyarūpeṇa vyaktimātrasyā'vyabhicārādupasthitiḥ । evaṃ tarhi kriyāviśeṣāṇāṃ tadvācakaviśeṣāṇāṃ ca vyabhicāre'pi kriyāmātrasya tadvācakamātrasya cā'vyabhicārādupasthiterekasaṃvidvedyatvamaviśiṣṭameva prasajyata iti ya- tkiñcidetaditi yathāvārtikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate ।
saṅgatistāvadasya prasaṅgenoktaiva । upoddhātāyātaṃ ca loke vede ca śabdārthayoraikyaṃ nirūpya kimākṛtiśśabdārtho vyaktirveti prastutaṃ nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—vyavahārārthaṃ hi śabdoccā- raṇam । cā''kṛtyā vedalokayoḥ kaścidvyavahāro dṛśyate । na hi vede “vrīhīnavahantī”tyatrā''kṛtiravahanyate । na ca “paśumālabheta”itya- trā''kṛtirālabhyate । na ca loke ‘gā dogdhī’tyatrā''kṛtirduhyate । na ca ‘brāhmaṇāya suvarṇaṃ dīyata’ ityatrā''kṛtirdīyate । evaṃ vyava-
hārānusārātpratītirapi vyaktigocaraiva । tathā vyutpattirapi vṛddhavya- vahāre vyaktiviṣayaiveti । tena sarvathā vyaktireva śabdābhidheyeti ।

nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇādhīnaṃ śabdasyā'rthābhidhānam । na cotpa- nnotpadyamānotpatsyamānavyaktiṣvānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhagrahaṇaṃ sambhavati । ataḥ kathaṃ vyaktirvācyeti । na ca pācakādiśabdavadāna- ntye'pi vyaktīnāmākṛtimevopalakṣaṇīkṛtya sambandhagrahassukaro bha- viṣyatīti vācyam । yatassabhāge pācakādau prakṛtibhāgopanītapaci- kriyāyāḥ karttā pratyayenā'bhidhīyata iti yuktam । gaurityatra tu go- śabdasya nirbhāgasya naivaṃ sambhavati, vibhakterapi prātipadikārthānati- riktārthatvāt ।

ucyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi sarvatra śabdābhihitasyaivopādhitvaṃ bhavet, na caivam; vatsādiśabdeṣvadarśanāt । yathā hi vatsaśabdo go- tvamanabhidhāyaiva gotvopalakṣitaṃ vayoviśeṣamabhidadhāti, yathā vā kiśoraśabdo'śvatvamanabhidhāyaivā'śvatvopalakṣitameva vayoviśeṣama- bhidhatte, yathā vā ācāryaśabda upanayanādhyāpanādikamanabhidhāyaiva tadupalakṣitaṃ brāhmaṇavyaktimabhidhatte, tathā gavādiśabdā apyana- bhidheyāmevā''kṛtimupalakṣaṇīkṛtya vyaktimabhidhāsyantīti sarvatra vyaktivācitvamevetyevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyanavagatāyamākṛtau gavādiśabde- bhyo vyaktyavagamaḥ prakārāntareṇotpapadyeta । na hyanantāsu vyakti- ṣvekasyopalakṣaṇasyā'navagame vyaktyavagamassambhavati । tadatrobhayāva- gamasyā'vaśyaṃ svīkāre kimākṛtimātraṃ śabdenā'bhidhīyate, taddvāre- ṇā'nantā vyaktayaḥ pratīyantām ? ākṛtimeva vā prakārāntaropa- sthitāmupalakṣaṇīkṛtyā'nantā vyaktayaśśabdenā'bhidhīyantām ? iti cintāyāmanantavyaktyabhidhāne śabdasyā'nantaśaktisvīkāraprasaṅgado- ṣādākṛtirevā'bhidhīyata iti nyāyyam ।

kiñcā''kṛteśśabdānabhidhāne prakārāntareṇopasthitirapi tasyā durlabhaiva । yato vyutpattikālāvagatasāhacaryavaśena sahacaritaśabdada- rśanāt sahacaritasmṛtirvaktavyā । na cā'sau niyatarūpā । sahacari- topādhyāyadarśane'pi śiṣyasmaraṇādarśanāt । vyutpannasya tu śabdaśra- vaṇādākṛtivyaktyavagamasya niyatatvāt । na ca śabdārthāvagamakāle sambandhasmṛteravaśyaṃbhāvitvādākṛtyavacchinnāyāṃ ca vyaktau sambandha- grahādākṛtismṛtiravaśyambhāvinīti vaktavyam, yato'nabhyāsadaśā-
yāṃ sambandhasmṛtyapekṣā, abhyāsadaśāyāntu svaśaktyaiva śabdasyā'- rthābhidhānamiti sthitam । taduktaṃ kārikāyām—

lg.l: atra prayukta ityevaṃ budhyante hi cirātkvacit ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: ( ślo. vā. 1. 1. 5. pṛ. 415. cau. saṃ. )

vatsakiśorācāryaśabdādau tu saṃskārādidvāreṇā'pyupalakṣaṇo- pasthitāvanekavyaktyabhidhānamapyagatyā svīkaraṇīyam । na hi tatra gavādyākṛtāvabhihitāyāmapi tathābhūtavyaktyavagama ākṣepataḥ si- dhyati । atha vobhayamapi tatrā'bhidheyameva svīkarttavyam । yadi vā śoṇanyāyena vatsatvādigotvādyanyatarasāmānyamevā'bhyupetavyam । yatra tu gavādiśabdeṣvākṛtyabhidhānameva gatyantaramasti, tatra na ki- ñcidanupapannamiti ।

nanvevaṃ bhavatvākṛtyabhidhānaṃ, vyastyavagatistu kutaḥ ? lakṣaṇa- yeti kecit । tadayuktam; sambandhānupapattyā hi lakṣaṇā bhavati । anupapattiśca kriyākārakasambandhayogyapadārthāvagamanibandhanā । na cā''kṛtiḥ kriyākārakasambandhayogyā । kiṃ tarhi ? vyaktireva । sarva- padānāñcā''kṛtimātrābhidhāne kriyākārakasambandhayogyapadārthānava- gateḥ kasya kutra sambandhānupapatyā lakṣaṇeti । tena kriyāpadasya
lakṣaṇyā vyaktiparatve kārakapade vyaktilakṣaṇā । kārakapadasya ca lakṣaṇyā vyaktiparatve kriyāpade vyaktilakṣaṇetyanyonyāśraya- prasaṅgaḥ ।

tenaitadevā'tra vaktavyam—pūrvapakṣanyāyenaiva sarveṣāṃ gavādipadā- nāṃ vṛddhavyavahārato vyutpattervyavahārasya ca sarvatra vyaktiniṣṭhatvāt vyaktyarthatayaiva vyutpattiḥ, kintu tadvyaktyarthatvamānantyavyabhicāra- bhiyā sākṣādvyaktyabhidhāne na sambhavatīti yathā tatsambhavati ta- daṅgīkaraṇīyam । atra ca gatyantarāsambhavāttatpratītyarthameva tadā- tmabhūtākṛtyabhidhānamaṅgīkṛtam । tenā''kṛtyabhidhānasyaiva vyaktipa- ryantatvādeka evā'yamubhayārthābhidhānalakṣaṇaḥ śabdavyāpāraḥ । yathā hi pācakasyoddiṣṭaudanasya kārakayojanākartṛtvamevaudanakartṛtvaṃ, yathā coddiṣṭasvargasya yāgakartṛtvameva svargakartṛtvam । na hyodane svarge vā puruṣasya kṛtiranyā'sti, yena tatrā'pyasyā'nyakartṛtvaṃ bhavet । tathā vyaktipratipādanoddeśena prayuktasya śabdasyā''kṛtyabhidhānameva vya- ktyabhidhānam ।

iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ—ākṛtessākṣādevā'bhidhānaviṣayatvam, vyaktestvabhidhānoddeśādabhidhānaviṣayatvam, odanasvargayoriva kṛ- tiviṣayatvam । ato vyaktirapi śabdasyā'bhidhāvyāpārapratipādyaiva,
na tu vyāpārāntarapratipādyeti tatvam । taduktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa— “padāni hi svaṃ svamarthamabhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi” iti । abhidhā- vyāpāreṇa pratipādyetyarthaḥ । anenaivā'bhiprāyeṇa vārttikakārapādai- rapyuktam—

ata evā'bhihitānvayaprayāsā'pi vākyārthe vihito vyaktya- nvayābhiprāyeṇaiva । na tvākṛtyabhiprāyeṇa, vākyārthe tasyā ananva- yāt । evaṃbhūtameva vyavahitamabhidhānamākṣepa ityucyate । yastu tatra tatra lakṣaṇetyuktam, tatkiñcidvyavadhānābhiprāyeṇeti mantavyam । na caivaṃ gotvaśabde'pyākṛtyabhidhānasya vyaktiparatvātpratītivailakṣaṇyā- bhāvaprasaṅga iti vācyam । yataḥ “tasya bhāvastatvatalau” ( pā. sū. 5. 1. 119. ) ityunuśiṣṭena tvatalpratyayena vyaktivyatiriktani- ṣkṛṣṭākṛtimātrābhidhānāt vyutpattikāle ca vyaktyarthatvānavagamādvya- ktitātparyābhāvena pratītivailakṣaṇyopapattiriti na kiñcidanupapannam ।

prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe—sāmānyopalakṣitavyaktīnāṃ śabdārthatve sāmānyasya ca śabdānabhidheyatvena saṃskāropasthiteraniyatatvādyadā
saṃskārādanupasthitistadā'nanuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu sāmānyasyā' bhidheyatvābhbhiyamena tadavagatāvanuṣṭhānamiti ।

sūtrantu—“ākṛtireva” gavādiśabdābhidheyā “kriyārthatvāt” “kaṅkacitaṃ cinvīta”ityādiṣu sāmānyadvāreṇa tasyā eva kriyānva- yitvādityarthaḥ । vyaktisādṛśyasyā'śaṅaṅkāsampādanatvenopadeśānarha- tvāditi ।।

lg.l: granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।
matkartṛtāmananukīrtya sa kīrtilopāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāt ।।

chapter.head: * śrī *
atha prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ।।
tatra prathamaṃ nāmadheyaprāmāṇyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “udbhidā yajeta” ( tāṃ brā. 19. 7. 2, 3. ) “balabhidā yajeta” ( tāṃ. brā. 19. 7. 3. ) “viśvajitā yajeta” (tāṃ. brā. 19. 4. 5. ) iti samāmnāyate । tatra sandehaḥ kimudbhidādayo guṇavidhayaḥ ? āhosvitkarmanāmadheyāni ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhādevamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam ।“udbhi- dāyajeta” ityādiṣu na tāvanmatvarthalakṣaṇyā viśiṣṭavidhānaṃ, gauravaprasa- ṅgāt, lakṣaṇādoṣācca । nā'pi pṛthagevobhayavidhānaṃ, vākyabhedāpa- tteḥ । tatrā'nyataravidhāne yadi yāgo vidhīyate, tadopapadavaiyarthyam । nā'pyanyatra vihitaṃ yāgamanūdya vede guṇavidhiḥ sambhavati, sarvatraivopa- padaśravaṇena karmavidhānāsambhavāt । tenā'kāmenā'pi laukika eva gaṇyāge guṇavidhiriti vaktavyam । tathā ca sati pramāṇāntarasāpe- kṣatvena vedasyā'prāmāṇyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—sāmānādhikaraṇyavalādyathābhāṣyaṃ nāmadheya- tvamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatdūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktama; ekārthavidhimapekṣyā'nekārthavidhigauravaṃ doṣamāvaha- ti, evaṃ mukhyārthamapekṣya lākṣaṇikatvam, na tvaprāmāṇyamapekṣya । tadetadvidhigauravamatvarthalakṣaṇābhiyā vedāprāmāṇyāśrayaṇaṃ, bhojanāyā- sabhayena maraṇapakṣāśrayaṇamivā''bhāti । na ca laukikagaṇyayāgāśrapa- ṇe'pi lakṣaṇāto vimokāḥ; vedavihitadevatāyā abhāvena gaṇayāgasya mukhyayāgatvābhāvāt । bhavatu vā yathā kathañcillaukikakarmāśrayo guṇavidhiḥ, tathā'pi nā'prāmāṇyam । “āyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṅkte” itivallaukikarmāśrayaṇe'pi prāmāṇyopapatteriti yatkiñci detaditi yathāvārttikamevādhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p:
prathamapāde hi kṛtsnasyaiva vedasya sakaletaraśaṅkānirāsena dha- rmaṃ prati codanātvena prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpāditam । tasya cā'rthavādamantrā- tmakasya codanānantargatatvena dharmaṃ pratyupayogābhāvādaprāṇyamāśaṃkya dvitīyapāde codanāntargatipradarśanena pratyekamupayogapratipādanāt
prāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpitam । tṛtīyapāde tu smṛtyācāramūlabhūtastathā bhūta eva vedo'stīti nirūpitam ।

idānīṃ vidhyuddeśagatavyena nāmadheyānāṃ sāmānyato nirūpite 'pi dharmaṃ pratyupayoge upayogaviśeṣaḥ pūrvaṃ na pratipādita iti tadarśaṃ punaḥ prastāvanā । atra yadyapi bhāṣye pūrvottarasūtrābhyāmekamevedamadhi- karaṇaṃ pratibhāti, tathā'pi pūrvasūtrasya pūrvapakṣābhimatārthāpratibhānādvi- cāradvayopayogācca vārttikakārapādairanumitapūrvapakṣaṃ vicāradvayamevaitadā- caritam ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatra prathame pūrvapakṣiṇo'yamabhisandhiḥ । vidhyuddeśagatatve'pyu- dbhidādipadānāṃ sādhyasādhanetikarttavyatānupanāyakatvānna tāvadvi- dhyantarbhāvaḥ । vidheyastutyabhāvācca nā'rthavādatvam । vihitasmāraka- tvānupalabdheśca na mantratvam । atastrividhavedabahirbhāvenā'kriyārthatvā- dānarthakyamevodbhidādipadānāmiti । taduktam—
evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: bhavedevaṃ yadyeṣāṃ sādhanāṃśaniveśena kriyārthatvaṃ na bhavet । tathā hyadhyayanavidhiparigṛhītatvādvedatvaṃ tāvadudbhidādipadānāṃ vyavasthitam । vedasya ca kriyārthatvaṃ“āmnāyasya kriyārthatvāt” ( jai.sū. 1.2.1.) ityatroktam । tacca kriyārthatvaṃ yadyapyuktaprakāreṇā'rthavādatvena mantra- tvena ca na sambhavati, tathā'pi vidhyuddeśāntargatatvādvidhyantarbhāva evā'sya pratīyate । sa ca yadyapyapuruṣārthatayā sādhyatvena na sambha- vati, akriyārūpatvena ca netikarttavyatātvena, tathā'pi pāriśeṣyā- tsādhanāṃśaniveśitvādevā'sya kriyārthatvaṃ ( nā'rthavatvamiti(?)) ।
taduktam—
sūtrantu-“uktaṃ samāmnāyaidamarthyaṃ” samāmnāyo vedastasyaidamarthyaṃ kriyārthatvamuktam । “tasmātsarvaṃ”udbhidādi “tadarthaṃ syāt” kriyārthaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyamudbhidadhikaraṇam ।।
chapter.p: atra caikasyaivā'dhikaraṇasya ubhayavicārātmakatvānna pṛthagā- yojanamiti vidhyuddeśāntargatatvena sādhanāṃśaniveśe satīdamidānīṃ vicāryate—kiṃ guṇavidhitvenā'sya sādhanāṃśaniveśaḥ ? athavā nāmadheyatvena ? iti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । prasiddherarthavatvātpravṛttiviśe- ṣakaratvācca guṇavidhitvamevā'sya yuktam । tathā hi—yadyapi loke samudāyaprasiddhirnā'sti, tathā'pi ‘urdhvaṃ bhinattī’ti vyutpatyā kha- nitrādidravyamudbhidādipadātpratīyata eva । tathā sati codbhitpada- syā'rthavatvaṃ bhavati, yajipadārthātiriktārthapratipādanāt । evaṃ bhi- nnārthatvātpuruṣapravṛttāvapi viśeṣo bhavati । taduktam—
nāmadheyatve tvavagatā'pyavayavaprasiddhirhātavyā । tathā yajipa- dārthānatiriktārthatvādānarthavyam । anatiriktārthatvādeva pravṛttāvapi na viśeṣakaratvam ।

nanu guṇo vidhīyamānaḥ phale vidhātavyaḥ, karmaṇi vā । tatra na tāvadgodohanavatphale, praṇayanavat prakṛtāśrayābhāvāt । nā'pi ka- rmaṇi, prakṛtakarmābhāvādeva । na ca dūrasthajyotiṣṭomānuvādenaivā'yaṃ guṇavidhiḥ, dūrasthahomānuvādenā''havanīyavidhivaditi vaktavyam । utpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhena nirākāṃkṣe karmaṇi guṇāntaravidhānāsambha- vāt । āhavanīyavidhāne tvavarodhavirodhābhāvādupapanno vidhi- riti । na ca niṣkṛṣṭayāgānuvādādākāṃkṣāpravṛtterguṇavidhānopapatti- riti vaktavyam । yato'nuvādānāṃ pūrvāvagatārthaviṣayatvāttadanusandhāne ca guṇāntarāvarodhādākāṃkṣāvirahasya tadavasthatvāt । etacca ci- trādhikaraṇa evā'nantaraṃ pratipādanīyamiti ।

kiñca jyotiṣṭome'pi “somena yajeta” iti somarūpaguṇaśravaṇā- dudbhittulyatvameva । ataḥ kathaṃ tadanuvādenā'pi guṇavidhānam । na caivaṃ sati guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhirevā'yamastviti vaktavyam, vidhigaurava- doṣāt, udbhidvateti matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaṅgācca । taduktam—

lg.l: guṇo vidhīyamāno'pi phale karmaṇi vā bhavet ।
viśiṣṭavidhibudhyā vā sarvathā na ca yujyate ।। iti ।।

chapter.p:
ucyate—viśiṣṭavidhirevā'yam । na caivaṃ vidhigauravaṃ matvartha-
lakṣaṇā ca doṣamāvahati, sakalaviśiṣṭavidhyucchedaprasaṅgāt । a- thā'gatyā tatra tathā''śrayaṇam, tadatrā'pi samānam । tena yathā “da- śāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi” tyādiṣvagatyā'pi viśiṣṭavidhānaṃ, tathehā- pyudbhedanasamarthakhanitrādiviśiṣṭakarmavidhānameveti ।
evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevamagatyā matvarthalakṣaṇayā viśiṣṭavidhi- gauravāśrayaṇaṃ, yadi nāmadheyatvena na gatirbhavet । tathā hi-“udbhidā” iti karaṇavācitṛtīyāntapadasya karaṇībhūtayāgasamabhivyāhṛtasya tatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate । tatpratītamapi hīyeta, yadi vrīhiso- mādivadudbhitpadamarthāntare nirūḍhaṃ bhavet । avayavaprasiddhistu ‘ūrdhvaṃ bhinnattī’ti vyutpatyā yathā khanitrādidravye, tathā paśūnāmudbhedanamane- na kriyata iti yāge'pi tena yajisāmānādhikaraṇyādurbhidādi padānāṃ yāganāmadheyatvameva । taduktam—

ato'vayavaprasiddheryāge'pi samānatvādaprasiddhārthatvaṃ yaduktaṃ, ta-
ttāvatparihṛtam । yadapi yajipadārthānatiriktārthatvādānarthakyamuktaṃ, tadapyayuktam; yajiviśeṣapratītihetutvenaiva nāmadheyasyā'rthavatvāt । ata evā'pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvamapi pratyuktam, vidhitsitayāgaviśe- ṣapratipādanenaiva pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvāditi ।

nanvarthaviśeṣapratipādanena hi padāntarasya padāntaraviśeṣakatvaṃ bhava- ti । yathā ‘nīlamutpalaṃ śuklaḥ paṭaḥ’ iti । na ca nāmadheyasya yaji- padārthātiriktamarthāntaramasti । ataḥ kathamasya yāgaviśeṣapratipatti- hetutvam । na ca svātmanaiva nāmadheyaṃ yajiviśeṣaṇamiti vaktavyam, tasya śabdānabhidheyatvāt । śābdāśābdayoścā'nvayāsambhavāt ।

atha nāmadheyaṃ śābdatvasiddhyarthamātmānaṃ lakṣayatītyucyate । tadapi paṅkabhiyā palāyamānasya nūnamaśucipatanasamānam । matvarthala- kṣaṇābhayena hi guṇavidhipakṣamupekṣya nāmadheyatvamabhyupagatam । sā ceyaṃ nāmadheyatve'pi svīkṛtā, kimaparāddhaṃ guṇavidhinā । kiñca guṇavidhau matvarthalakṣaṇāyāmapyautsargikamatvarthaparatvaṃ na parihīṇam, iha tvā- tmalakṣaṇāyāṃ tato'pi jaghanyatvamiti guṇavidhitvameva jyāyaḥ ।

ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi saṃjñā nīlādipadamiva viśeṣaṇī- bhūtasvapratipāditārthopaśleṣadvāreṇaiva saṃjñinaṃ viśinaṣṭīti brūmaḥ । kintu yaḥ khalu śabdaḥ sāmānyavāciśabdasamabhivyāhṛtaḥ tadviśeṣa-
mabhidadhāti, sā saṃjñetyucyate । yathā ‘devadatto brāhmaṇa’ iti । sa ca viśeṣo viśeṣaṇasya kasya citsaṃjñāpadādanupasthitatvādetaccha- bdavācyatvena saṃjñāntaraviṣayavyāvṛtyā upalakṣito vidyamānaviśeṣa- ṇayogyaḥ svamahimnaiva saṃjñāśabdenā'bhidhīyate । tenaivaṃbhūta evā'yaṃ yāgaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate, na tu viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ । tatastathābhūtasya vidyamānaviśeṣaṇānvayāttattadviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭarūpasiddhiḥ । ato na kiñcidanupapannamiti ।

atra yadyapyutpattivākyānāṃ sādhyabhūtadhātvarthaparatvena na guṇa- vidhau matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣo, nā'pi nāmadheyatāhetussāmānādhikaraṇyam, tathā'pyadhikāravākyaikavākyatādaśāyāmudbhidā yāgena svargamityanva- yasambhavādavaśyaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣa ityanenaivā'bhiprāyeṇa bhāṣyakā- reṇā'tra sakalotpattivākyagatipradarśanārthaṃ phalapada nāpanyastamiti ।
prayojanam-khanitrādidravyeṇaiva yāgo yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhānte tu-“avyaktāsu tu somasya”(jai.sū.8.1.16.)ityādiṣu somadravyeṇaiva ।
sūtrantu—“utpattau” prathamajñāne “yadapūrvaṃ” na somādipadava- tkvacidarthe prasiddhamudbhidādi tat “nāmadheyaṃ syāt” । anyatrā'pra- siddhatvena kasyatidguṇasya “avidhāyakatvāt” iti ।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ citrādhikaraṇam ।।
viśayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ” ( tai. saṃ. 2. 4. 6. ) “trivṛdba- hiṣpavamānam” ( tā. brā. 20.1.1. ) “pañcadaśānyājāni” “saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni” ityudāharaṇam । kiṃ citrāśabdaḥ, bahiṣpava- mānaśabdaḥ, ājyaśabdaḥ, pṛṣṭhaśabdaśca guṇavidhayaḥ ? uta karmanā- madheyāni ? iti saṃśayaḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramataṃ taddūṣaṇañca
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇodbhidadidhakaraṇa eva sarveṣāṃ karmasāmānādhi- karaṇyenaiva nāmadheyatve siddhe tattadudāharaṇeṣu viśeṣāśaṅkā vājapeya- paryantādhikaraṇa catuṣṭaye nirākriyata iti caturṇāmadhikaraṇānāmudbhida- dhikaraṇaśeṣatvāttadīyasaṅgatipradarśanenaiva pramāṇalakṣaṇe sarveṣāṃ saṅga- tirupavarṇitā । tenodbhidadhikaraṇasaṅgatidūṣaṇameva sarvatrohanīyamiti yathāvārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p:
udbhidādipadānāṃ yaugikānāṃ kvacidarthaviśeṣe prasiddhirahitānāṃ
nāmadheyatvaṃ nirūpyedānīṃ vrīhyādipadavannirūḍhārthānāṃ citrādipadānāṃ nāmadheyatvaṃ nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—bhavatūdbhidādipadānāṃ kvaci- darthaviśeṣe nirūḍhatvāsaṃbhavena yajisāmānādhikaraṇyādyāganāmadheyatva- m । citrāpadasya tu citrarūpārthaviśeṣe, tathā''jyādipadānāṃ ghṛtā- dirūpārthaviśeṣe nirūḍhatvādvrīhisomavadyāganāmatvāsambhavādguṇavi- dhitvameva yuktam । etacca pūrvādhikaraṇa evoktam—

tathā ca sati prasiddhārthatvamadhikārthatvaṃ pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvañcā' nuruddhaṃ bhavatīti । nanu kutrā'yaṃ guṇo vidhīyate । na tāvatphale, āśrayābhāvāt । nā'pi “dādhi madhu payo ghṛtaṃ dhānā udakaṃ taṇḍulā- statsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatyaṃ bhavati” ( mai. saṃ. 1. 3. 6. ) ityetadvākyavihi- tā prājāpatyeṣṭiḥ sannihitā samasti । tamevā''śrayamāsādya paśurūpe phaleguṇavidhānamiti vaktavyam । tasyā aphalatvenā''śrayatvāyogya-
tvāt । atha tasyāmeva prājāpatyeṣṭau guṇavidhirayamityucyate । maivam; tasyā utpattiśiṣṭadadhyādyavaruddhatvena guṇāntarapraveśā- sambhavāt ।
atrocyate—nā'yaṃ citrāśabdo dravyaparaḥ, kintu citrarūpavarṇa- para evā'yam । na cā'tra varṇāntaraṃ śrutamasti । ato dadhyādibhi- reva vihitacitravarṇairyajeteti vākyārthaḥ ।

etadapyayuktam; paśukāmapadasya vidhyanuvādāsambhavenā''nartha- kyāt । kiñca citrayetyanena strīmatyayāntena padena strātvasamānā- dhikaraṇaṃ citratvaṃ pratipādyate, na tu citratvamātram । tacca prāṇi- dravya eva paraṃ saṃbhavati, na dadhyādau । tena prakṛtaprājāpatyayāge'pi na guṇavidhiḥ । ata eva dadhimadhughṛtavākyotpannaṃ yāgamanūdya citrāpadena yathāsiddhāntaṃ phale vidhānamityetadapi na saṃbhavati, strīpratyayāntena citrāpadenā'prāṇirūpasya yāgasyā'nuvādāsambhavāditi । nā'pi citradravyaviśiṣṭaṃ yāgāntarameva phale vidhīyate । avyavasthitaci- traguṇakadravyopaplave prakṛtiviśeṣānirddhāraṇena vidhyantānupasthiterdde- vatāyā abhāvena yāgatvābhāvāt । kiñca guṇasyā'pradeyasya na tāvadyāgasādhanatvaṃ, dravyalakṣaṇāyāntu lakṣaṇaiva tāvaddoṣaḥ, punarmatva- rthalakṣaṇā, viśeṣaṇavidhikalpanā, utpattividhikalpanā'pi, ci-
trāpadācca nānājātīyadravyopaplavenā'dhyavasāyaśceti na viśi- ṣṭavidhiḥ ।
ucyate—paśuyāgasya prāṇidravyakatvāt “prakṛtau vā dvirukta- tvāt” ( jai. sū.3. 3. 6. 2. ) iti nyāyena sakalapaśuyāgaprakṛti- bhūte'gnīṣomīyapaśuyāge citratvastrītvavidhirayamiti brūmaḥ ।

nanvagnīṣomīyapaśurutpatti śiṣṭakṛṣṇasāraṅgalohitasāraṅgādivarṇā- ntarāvaruddhaḥ puṃstvāvaruddhaśca । tena tatra kathaṃ varṇāntaraṃ liṅgāntarañca vidhātuṃ śakyeta । tathā prāpte karmaṇi kathamanekārthavidhānamutprekṣāpadamapyupayāti । na cā'tra gatyantarāsambhavo'pi, yato'styagnīṣomīyavikṛtibhūtā sāra svatī meṣī । na ca tasyā varṇāntaraṃ virodhakamasti, liṅgāntaraṃ vā । na ca tatrā'nekārthavidhānadoṣo'pi, citratvamātravidhānāt । tena ya- thā'nārabhyādhītamapi sāptadaśyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsākhyaprakṛtau pāñcadaśyāva- rodhena praveśamalabhamānaṃ mitravindādhvarakalpāsu vikṛtiṣu niviśate, tathehā'pi citratvamātravidhānāttatsārasvatameṣīgocarameva bhaviṣyatīti ।

maivam; “citraye” tyatra citratvastrītvaviśiṣṭaṃ karaṇatvaṃ tāvattṛtī- yāvibhaktyā'bhihitaṃ pratīyate । yathā “paśune”tyatra ekatvapaśutvavi- śiṣṭam । tatra meṣīgataṃ yathā strītvaviśiṣṭaṃ karaṇatvamanuvādyaṃ, tathā kiṃ citratvaviśiṣṭamanuvādyaṃ vidheyaṃ vā । na tāvadanuvādyam, meṣī-
gatatvena citratvasyā'prāptatvāt । nā'pi vidheyam, sakṛduccaritāyā vibhakteranuvādyavidheyārthapratipādanāsambhavāt । na caikasminneva prā- tipadike kārakatvaṃ strītvena sambadhyeta, na citratveneti śaṃkyam । na ca gatyantaraṃ nā'sti, agnīṣomīyagatatvenaivopapatteḥ । tena bhaṅgā- bhidhānamanupadakārasyāsaṅgatameveti ।

na cotpattiśiṣṭalohitasāṅgakṛṇṇasāraṅgādiguṇāvarodhena citratvāvidhānaṃ, lohitasāraṅgakṛṣṇasāraṅgayościtratvāvirodhāt । tena yathā “vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ” ( mai. saṃ. 2. 2. 2. ) “sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapet brahmavarcasakāma” ( tai. saṃ. 2. 3. 2. ) ityatrā' tideśalapsyamānayorevālambhananirvāpayoranuvādaḥ, tathaitadvākya- vidhāsyamānacitratvāntargatalohitakṛṣṇavarṇāderayamanuvādaḥ । nā'pi puṃstvāvaruddhe kathaṃ strītvavidhānamiti vaktavyam । “paśunā yajeta” ityatra nityapuṃliṅgasya paśuśabdasya puṃspaśustrīpaśusādhāraṇatvena etadvākyagatastrītvavidhānāvirodhāt, niṣkṛṣṭānuvādena vā vāsaḥ- prabhṛtīnāmiva ekahāyanyavaruddhe'pi kraye vidhānāvirodhāt ।

na ca prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhānaṃ doṣaḥ, citratvastrotvavi- śiṣṭakaraṇarūpaikakārakavidhānāt । paśukāmapadamapi paśusādhanake ka- rmaṇi paśūpādāne arthaprāptakāmanānuvādenopapannamityagnīṣomīya-
gata evā'yaṃ guṇavidhiḥ । taduktam—

tathā “pañcadaśānyājyāni” ityatrā''jyaśabdastāvadghṛte nirū- ḍho na ca stotrasamānādhikaraṇaṃ śrūyate । tenā'sya na stotranāmadheyatvaṃ, kintu “pañcadaśānyājyānī” tyatra pañcadaśasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭājyavidhā- nādatrāpi prāpte stotre nobhayavidhidoṣaḥ ।

atha vā yatrā'nyatkriyāpadaṃ na śrūyate, tatra “astirbhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣe'prayujyamāno'pi” iti kātyāyanasmaraṇātpañca daśasaṃkhyā- viśiṣṭānāṃ ghṛtānāṃ sattā pratīyate । sā ca stutisannidhipratītā stu- tiprayogavacanonneyavidhinā vidhāyate । tathābhūtāyāśca prakaraṇena graha- ṇāt bhavati sattāviśeṣaṇatvena sasaṃkhyasyaivā''jyasya sādhanatvena vidhiḥ । tena sādhanatvāvagatasyaivā''jyasya “ājyaiḥ stuvata” ityatrā'- nuvādaḥ, stutimātraṃ vidhīyata iti । cā''jyasya stutisādhanatvaṃ na saṃbhavati, “agnimupanidhāya stuvata” itivatpātrabhedopakalpi- tapañcadaśasaṃkhyākānāmājyānāmupanidhānenaiva stutihetutvopapatteḥ ।

nanu pañcadaśādyarthe “stome ḍavidhiḥ” (kā.vā. 420. cau.saṃ.)
ityanuśāsanātstomaśabdārthastutisamudāyāvagamātkathaṃ ḍapratyayāntasya “pañcadaśāni” iti padasya ghṛtasaṃkhyāvācitvam । maivam; stutisādhanasamūhavacano hi stomaśabdo na stotrīyāsamūhavacanaḥ । sa ca stutisādhanatvāviśeṣādṛkṣviva ghṛte'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ । tenā'trā'pi guṇavidhānameveti ।

evameva “trivṛdbahiṣpavamānaṃ” ityatra lokaprasiddhaṃ trivṛdauṣadhaṃ dravyaṃ bahiḥsthitaṃ caladrūpaṃ bahiṣpavamānaśabdābhidheyaṃ “bahiṣpavamānaiḥ stuvata” iti vihitastutiprayogavacanonneyavidhinā vidhīyate ।

tathā “saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni”ityatrā'pi lokaprasiddhapṛṣṭhākhyāni prāṇyaṅgānyeva saptadaśasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭāni “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvata” ityetadvi- hitastutiprayogavacanonneyavidhinā vidhīyanta iti sarvatra guṇavidhi- revetyevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīte—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi prāpte karmaṇi citratvaṃ strītvañcā'nāvṛttena vidhi- nā vidhātuṃ śakyate । na ca citratvastrītvaviśiṣṭaikakaraṇatvavidhā- nādanāvṛttiriti vaktavyam । yataḥ karaṇatvasyā'pi prāptatvenā'vidhe- yatvāt । atha prāptatve'pi tasya citratvastrītvāvacchedenā'prāptatvādvi- dhānamityucyate । evantarhi “daghnā juhoti” “payasā juhoti” itya-
trā'pi dadhyavacchinnasya payovacchinnasya ca homaviśeṣasyā'prāptatvena vidhānaprasaṅgaḥ । na ca citratvastrītvaviśiṣṭaṃ karaṇāntarameva vidhīya- te, utpattiśiṣṭakaraṇāntarāvarodhena tasya vidhātumaśakyatvāt । prāpte tu karaṇatve citratvastrītvavidhāne vidhyāvṛttirdurvāraiveti ।
taduktam—

anekavidhiśaktikalpanāgauravaṃ ca suvyaktameveti । tathā utpatti- śiṣṭapuṃstvāvarodhenā'pi nā'gnīṣomīye strītvavidhānaṃ sambhavati । na ca nityapulliṅgatvena sādhāraṇatvātpaśuśabdasya strītvavidhānāvirodha iti vaktavyam । śākhāntare “ajo'gnīṣomīya” ityāmnātena sādhāraṇa- syā'pi paśuśabdasya pulliṅgacchāgaparatvāt । na ca śākhāntaravidhe- rguṇavidhāyakatvātstrotvapuṃstvayorvikalpa iti pūrvapakṣyabhiprāyo vā- cyaḥ । śākhāntare'pi “ajo'gnīṣomīya” ityasya dravyadevatāsamba- ndhāviśeṣeṇotpādakatvāt । sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ karmetyutpattiśiṣṭapuṃ- stvāvarodhena strītvānavakāśāt ।

na ca vaṇāntarāvaruddhe'pi niṣkṛṣṭānuvādena guṇāntaravidhiḥ
śakyata iti vaktavyam । niṣkṛṣṭānuvādasyaivā'śakyatvāt । taduktam-

lg.l: vākyāntaragataiḥ paścānna śuddhā sā hyavāpyata ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: vāsaḥprabhṛtīnāntu guṇāntarāvaruddhe'pi kraye ānatilakṣaṇa- dvārabhedādākāṃkṣāsambhavādvidhānamupapadyata eva । ata eva tatra na vikalpaḥ, kintu samuccaya eveti ।
