tathā paśukāmapadopāttaphalasambandhanimitto'pyaparo vākya- bhedaḥ । yadyapi phalaṃ na vidhīyate, tathā'pi tatra karmavidhānātkarmaṇi ca guṇavidhānātsambandhadvayavidhānasya vākyāvṛttimantareṇā'sambhavā- dvākyabheda eva । na ca paśusādhanake karmaṇyarthaprāptapaśukāmanānu- vādo'yamiti vaktavyam । yataḥ paśukāmapadātkāmyamānatvena pradhā- nībhūtaphalasambandhitayā kāmanā ca gamyate । agnīṣomīye tu paśu- kāmanāyāstādrūpyābhāvānnā'nuvādakatvamityato guṇavidhyabhāvādvici- tranānādravyakaprakṛtaprājāpatyeṣṭināmadheyameva citrāpadam । evaṃ sati citrāpadena prakṛtaṃ karmopasthāpya paśurūpe phale vidhīyata iti । “citra- ye”ti strīliṅganirddeśa śceṣṭyabhiprāyeṇaiveti na kiñcidanupapannam ।

tathā “pañcadaśānyājyānī”tyatrā'pi prāpte stotre na guṇadvaya-
vidhānamupadyate, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । nā'pi pañcadaśasaṃkhyāviśi- ṣṭānyājyāni vidhīyanta iti vācyam । yataḥ kriyā vidhīyate tadvi- śeṣaṇaṃ vā । na cā''jyapadavācyaṃ ghṛtaṃ kriyā, nāpi tadviśeṣaṇam । atā na viśiṣṭadravyavidhiḥ ।

atha yatrā'nyatkriyāpadaṃ na śrūyate, tatra “astirbhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣe aprayujyamāno'pī”tyetadbalādadhyāhṛtaivā'stikriyā sama- sti । saivobhayaviśiṣṭā stutiprayogavacanonneyavidhinā vidhīyata ityucyate । tadapyasat; sarvatra puruṣavyāpāro hi vidhīyate, asti- śabdavācyāyāstu sattāyā vastvātmalābhamātratvenā'vidhiviṣaya- tvāt । “agnimupanidhāya stuvīte”tyupanidhānasya puruṣavyāpārarū- patvena bhavatu vidhānam । na cā'trā'pi pātrabhedopakalpitapañcadaśasaṃ- khyākānyājyānyupanidhāyeti kalpanīyam, kalpanāgauravadoṣādeva । vākyasya cā'nyathā'pyupapatteḥ । tenodbhidadhikaraṇanyāyena “ājyaiḥ stuvata” iti nāmatve siddhe “pañcadaśānyājyānī”tyanenā''jyanā- makastotrānuvādena saṃkhyāmātraṃ vidhīyata iti । evaṃ sati “stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyartha” ityanuśāsanamapyarthavadbhaviṣyatīti । pravṛ- ttinimittañcārthavādāvagatametasmin stotre kriyamāṇe devānāmāji- gamanam । arthavādaśca “yadājimīyustadājyānāmājyatvam” ( tāṃ. brā. 7. 2. 1. ) iti । evaṃ prāpte stotre “trivṛdbīhaṣpavamānami”tyatra
trivṛddravyaṃ bahiḥpavamānarūpaguṇadvayavidhāne ।

tathā “saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni”ityatra saptadaśasakhyākapṛṣṭhadravyavi- dhāne vākyabhedaprasaṅgānna guṇavidhitvam । anyataraviśiṣṭānyataravidhā- nañcobhayaviśiṣṭādhyāhṛtakriyāvidhānañcā''jyodāharaṇadūṣaṇenava ni- rastamityatrā'pi nāmadheyatvameva । tathā ca sati “bahiṣpavamānaiḥ stu- vata” ityetadvākyavihitabahiṣpavamānanāmakastotrānuvādena ṛgāśritā nava khyā stotrāṅgatvena vidhāyate । pravṛttinimittañca bahiṣpavamā- napadayuktamantranirvirttanīyatvameva stotrasyeti ।

tathā “saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni” ityatrā'pi “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvata” ityetadvā- kyavihitapṛṣṭhanāmakastotrānuvādena saptadaśasaṃkhyāmātraṃ vidhīyata iti । nāmapravṛttinimitvañca—apāṃ vāyunā pṛṣṭhe spṛṣṭe rathantarādīni sāmāni jātāni । tasmāttatsādhanakāni stotrāṇi pṛṣṭhāni । tathā cā'rthavā- do'pi “ ta sa vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavarttata” ( tāṃ. brā. 7. 8. 1. ) iti ।
prayojanam—tatra tatra tattadguṇopādānaṃ pūrvapakṣe, siddhānte tu nāmadheyatvapakṣe neti!
sūtrantu—“yasmin” guṇavidhināmadheyatvena sandigdhe sati vākye guṇāntaropadeśaḥ pratīyate, tasminnupapadasya pradhānena karmaṇā nāmadheyatvenaiva “sambandha” iti ।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ tatprakhyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ” “ādhāramāghārayatī”ti ca samāmananti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kimagnihotraśabdaḥ ādhāraśabdaśca gu- ṇavidhiḥ ? uta karmanāmadheyaṃ ? iti । udbhidadhikaraṇe yaugikaśabdā- nāṃ citrādhikaraṇe ca sāṃvijñāyikaśabdānāṃ nāmadheyatvaṃ nirūpyedā- nīṃ yaugikaśabdeṣveva keṣucitkenacidviśeṣeṇa guṇavidhimāśaṃkya nāma- dheyatvaṃ vyutpādyate । tatra ca “agnihotraṃ juhotī”tyutpattivākyamevo- dāharaṇam । adhikāravākyasya phalasambandhaparasya guṇaparatve'pyutpa- ttivākyavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । bhāṣyakāreṇa tu vicāraviṣayāgnihotra- padasambandhitāmātreṇodāhṛtam ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । bhavatūdbhidādipadānāṃ matva- rthalakṣaṇābhayānnāmadheyatvam । agnihotrapadasya tu siddhānte'pi ‘agnaye hotramasminni’ti matvarthasamānārthabahuvrīhisamāsavyutpattermatvarthalakṣaṇa- ṇādoṣābhāvāccaturthyabhihitadevatāvidhitvameva । sati ca guṇavidhitve
“yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti” “yatsūryāya ca prajāpataye ca prātarjuhotī”ti prakaraṇaprāptayorhomayormadhye sāyaṃhome'gneḥ prāpta- tvātprātarhoma evā'gnidevatāvidhānamidam । na ca prātarhomavākya- meva guṇavidhāyakam, agnihotravākyaṃ cotpattiparamiti vaktavyam, yato'trā'nekaguṇānāmupādānaṃ pratīyate । teṣāṃ ca prāpte karmmaṇi vi- dhātumaśakyatvādatraiva viśiṣṭavidhinā karmotpattiragnihotravākya eva ca guṇavidhānamiti ।

nanu prātarhomasyā'pyutpattiśiṣṭasūryaprajāpatidevatāvaruddhatvānnā'. gnidevatāvidhānaṃ sambhavati । maivam; “yatsūryāya ca prajāpataye ce” ti cakāradvayamatra śrūyate । anyatarasamuccayasyaikenaiva cakāreṇa si- ddhatvādagatyā sāyaṃhomavākye cakāradvayasyetaretarasamuccayaparatvam । iha punaragnidevatopanāyakasya vākyasya sadbhāvāttatsamuccayārthatvameva dvitīyacakāraśravaṇasyeti nā'nupapannaṃ devatāntaravidhānam । athavā “yadekayā juhuyāddarvihomaṃ kuryādi”tyetadvākyāvagatadūrasthadevatārahita- darvihoṣvevā'gnidevatāvidhānamiti ।

tathā “ādhāramāghārayatī”tyatrāghāryata ityanayā vyutpatyā kṣaraṇyogyamājyapayaḥprabhṛtyāghāra iti pratīyate । taccā''ghāramiti dvitīyāśrutyā'ghāraṇakriyāsaṃskāryatvenāvagamyamānaṃ bhakṣaṇaprayuktaphala-
camasavadabhiṣavayuktapūtīkavacca prayojanamapekṣate । prakaraṇe cā'śrutadra- vyamupāṃśuyājākhyaṃ karma sākāṃkṣamasti । ataḥ śrutārthāpattikalpita- viniyogavidhinā tatraiva vidhāyata iti । taduktam—

na copāṃśuyājasyā'pi “sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate yaddhru- vāyāmājyaṃ” ( tai. brā. 3. 3. 5. ) ityanyenaivā''jyasya prāpternirā- kāṃkṣatvādanarthakamāghāravākyena dravyavidhānamiti vācyam । yataḥ “sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyata” ityasya vākyasya dravyarahitāṅgapradhā- naviṣayatvena sāvakāśatvāt । asya ca prakaraṇenādravyakapradhānamātra- viṣayatvādanenaivopāṃśuyājadravyavidhānamiti ।

na ca vācyam—dvitīyāśrutiḥ saktumārutaikakapālādiṣu saṃ- skāryatvaṃ vyabhicarati, ataḥ kathaṃ tadbalenājyapayaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ saṃskā- ryatvaṃ ? kathañca tadupapatyarthaṃ kāryāntaropayogitvamiti । yatastatraivaita- dyatra dravyaṃ niranvayavināśātkāryāntaropayogi na sambhavati । atra punarāghāraṇasya dravyaikadeśakṣāraṇarūpatvāt kṣāritaikadeśasya dravya- sya kāryāntaropayogo nā'nupapannaḥ । dṛṣṭaṃ caitallaukike'pi pānādau
upayokṣyamāṇasya dravadravyasya īṣatkṣāraṇasaṃskāra ityupāṃśuyāja eva guṇavidhānam । evañca sati prasiddhārthatvamadhikārthatvaṃ pravṛttiviśeṣa- karatvaṃ cā'nuruddhaṃ bhavatīti guṇavidhānamevetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyagnihotrapadama‘gnaye hotramasminni’ti vyutpattyā caturthīsamāsenaiva pariniṣpādyate । kintvagnerhotramagnau hotra- miti ṣaṣṭhosaptamīsamāsayorapi sambhāvitatvāt sandigdhārthamagniho- trapadaṃ na vidheyībhūtāgnidevatāsamarppakaṃ bhavati । sambhavati tu kutaści- dvākyātprāptamagniṃ devatābhūtaṃ pravṛttinimittīkṛtya homavidhau nāmadheyī- bhavitumiti tadarthaṃ vākyāntaramapekṣate । asti ca mantravākyaṃ vākya- viniyuktam—“agnirjyotirjyoṃtiragniḥ svāheti sāyaṃ juhotī”tyagni- devatāsamarpakam । atastallabdhamevāgniṃ nimittīkṛtyāgnihotrapadaṃ nāma- dheyamiti tadavacchinna eva homo vidhīyate, na tvanyatra guṇo vidhīyate ।

nanu pūrvapakṣī prātarhome guṇavidhiṃ manyate, darvihome vā । prāta- rhome tāvanmantravarṇādagnidevatāprāptirna siddhāntino'bhimatā tridevata- tvaprasaṅgāt । nā'pi darvihome, tasya dūrasthatvena mantrasambandhābhā- vāt । ataḥ kathaṃ tatprakhyaśāstravaśenā'gnihotrapadasya nāmatvamiti ।

ucyate-na brūmo yatra pūrvapakṣavādyabhimato guṇavidhistatrā'sā-
vanyena prāpta iti । kintu yasya guṇasyopādānasāmarthyāddhātvarthādu- ttāryate vidhiḥ, asau śrautadhātvarthavidhāveva śāstrāntaraprāpto nāma- pravṛttinimittatvenānuvadituṃ śakyate । kiṃ śrutiparityāgenetyayameva- tatprakhyaśāstrārthaḥ ।
yaduktam—
ata eva nā'yaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭahomavidhiḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: na cedanyena śiṣṭāḥ syustatprakhyañceti cottaram ।। iti ।।

chapter.p:
ataḥ “agnihotraṃ juhotī”tyetadvākyaṃ nāmāvacchinnakarmotpādakameva, na tu prātarhome । na ca dūrasthadarvihomenā'pi viśiṣṭavidhinā devatāvi- dhāyakamiti । na ca “yadagnaye ce”ti vākyadvayameva homavidhāyakamiti vācyam । asandigdhānanyalabhyaguṇākṛṣṭatvena viśiṣṭavidhigaura- vahetuhomavidhānāsambhavāt । kintvagnihotravākyaprāptahomānuvādena
guṇavidhāyakameva । tatrā'pi prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhānāsambha- vādagnisūryayośca mantravākyaprāptatvāt sāyaṃprātaḥkālayośca “sāyaṃ juhoti, prātarjuhotī”ti vākyadvayalabdhatvāt prajāpatirevaiko devatā tvena vākyadvaye vidhīyate, anyatsarvamanūdyata iti ।

tathā“āghāramāghārayatī”tyatrā'pyāghāryata iti vyutpatyā āghā- raṇyogyamanirūpitaviśeṣaṃ dravadravyameva pratīyate । ataḥ sandigdhārtha- māghāravākyamagnihotrapadamiva nā/?/pāṃśuyājavidheyībhūtāghāradravyavi- śeṣasamarpakaṃ sambhavati । dravyaviśeṣāvagamārthañca prakaraṇanirīkṣaṇe “upastṛṇānabhighārayānājyasyopayajāni”ti vākyabalena vā “sarva- smai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate yaddhruvāyāmājyami”tyanena vā viśeṣe prāpte tābhyāmevāsandigdhābhyāṃ sāvakāśatve'pyupāṃśuyāje dravyaviśeṣaprāpte- retadvidhānaṃ vyarthameva । sandigdhārthatvādeva cā''ghārapadasya nāghāryadra- vyaviśiṣṭamāghāraṇaṃ vidhīyata iti sambhavati । tathā ca “caturgṛhītaṃ vā etadabhūttasyāghāramāghārye”tyanenaivā'trā''jyadravyaprāptestadvidhānavaiya- rthyācca । taduktam—“vidhitsitaguṇaprāpī”ti । sambhavati tu ‘ā- ghāraṇamāghāra’ iti bhāvavyutpattyā karmanāmadheyatvam । atastadavacchi- nnamatrā'pi karmaiva vidhīyata iti । tacca karma “indra ūrdhvo adhvara ityā- ghāramāghārayatī”ti mantraviniyogasāmarthyāllabdhendradevatāsambandham, tathā caturgṛhītavākyāvagatadravyasambandhañca saddhomarūpameva āghāra-
nāmadheyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāṅgamityavadhāryata iti ।
prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe pratarhomasya darvihomasya vā agnidevatatvaṃ, siddhānte neti ।
sūtrantu— “tatprakhyaṃ” tatprāpakamagnihotrapadenā''ghārapadena ca yadvidhātavyaṃ tadvidhāyakamiti yāvat । “anyaśāstraṃ” śāstrāntarañcā- 'sti । tenā'nayornāmadheyatvameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamaṃ tadvyapadeśādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “athaiṣa śyenenā'bhicaranyajeta” ( ṣaḍiva brā. 3. 8. ) “athaiṣa sandaṃśenā'bhicaranyajeta” ( ṣaḍiṃva. brā. 3. 10 ) “athaiṣa gavā 'bhicaranyajeta” iti samāmnāyate । tatra guṇavidhiḥ, karmanāma- dheyamiti sandehaḥ । udbhidadhikaraṇe yaugikānāṃ, citrādhikaraṇe ca sāṃvijñāyikānāṃ nāmadheyatvaṃ nirūpya punaryaugikānāmevodāharaṇa- viśeṣe guṇavidhitvāśaṅkāṃ nirākṛtyedānīṃ sāṃvijñāyikānāmudāhara- ṇaviśeṣe guṇavidhitvāśaṅkā nirākriyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—bhavatu “pañcadaśānyājyānī” tyatra sāṃvijñāyikānāmapyājyādipadānāṃ “ājyaiḥ stuvata” iti prā- pte stotre pañcadaśasaṃkhyāvidhāne, tathā''jyadravyavidhāne ca vākya- bhedāpattibhiyā nāmadheyatvam, iha tu śyenādivākye karmmaṇyanekaguṇa- vidhānābhāvāt śyenapakṣiviśiṣṭameva karmmābhicārarūpe phale vidhī- yate । na caivaṃ sati ‘śyenavatā yāgenā'bhicāraṃ sādhayedi’ti vākyā- rthābhivyaktermatvarthalakṣaṇādoṣaḥ । yāganāmadheyatve'pi śyenasādṛśyasya pravṛttinimittatvādvatyarthalakṣaṇādoṣeṇa lakṣaṇādoṣasya samatvāt ।

kiñca vatyarthalakṣaṇā hi matvarthalakṣaṇāto'pyatijaghanyā, yato vākyavelāyāṃ matvarthalakṣaṇā bhavantī na śyenapadasya śrautasyaivā'rthapa rityāgenārthāntaraparatvamāpādayati, kintu svārthāparityāgenaiva tadvattā- mātraṃ bodhayati । vatyarthalakṣaṇā tu padārthavelāyāmeva śyenasādṛśyena sadṛśe karmaṇyarthāntare padaṃ pravarttayantī śrautārthaparityāgena matvarthalakṣa- ṇāto jaghanyeti । taduktam—
evañca sati prasiddhārthatvamadhikārthatvaṃ pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvañcā'- nuruddhaṃ bhavatīti guṇavidhānamevetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ viśiṣṭavidhinā śyenarūpaguṇavidhānaṃ, yadi sādṛśyapratipādakasyā'rthavādasyopapattirbhavet । evaṃ khalvarthavādaḥ śrūyate-“yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte evamayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nipatyādatte yamabhicarati śyenena” ( ṣaḍiva. brā. 3. 8 ) iti । atra hi vidhe- yasya śyenasādṛśyena stutiravagamyate । bhedādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca sādṛśyam । na ca pakṣirūpaśyenavidhāne bhedābhāvātsādṛśyanibandhanā stutiḥ sambhavati । taduktam—

lg.l: na hi tenaiva tasyaiva stutistadvaditīṣyate ।। iti ।।

chapter.p:
sambhavati tu śyenanāmadheyayāgavidhāne pakṣirūpaśyenasādṛśyena stutiḥ । etadevā'rthavādopadarśitaṃ nipatyādānarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāmadheya- pravṛttinimittañca । ata evā'tra sādṛśyalakṣaṇā vedānumatatvānmatvartha- lakṣaṇātaḥ svarūpato jaghanyā'pi bhavantī na doṣamāvahati ।
kiñca guṇavidhāne sati na kevalaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇā, kintvarthavā- dopadarśitasādṛśyanibandhanastutisiddhaye kālpanikaṃ bhedamāśritya vatyarthalakṣaṇā'pyavaśyāṅgīkaraṇīyā । ato nāmadheyatvameveti । evaṃ “sandaṃśenā'bhicaranyajeta” ityatrāpi sādṛśryapratipādako'rthavādaḥ śrūyate-“yathā sandaṃśena durādānamādatte” (ṣaḍieva. brā. 3. 10. ) evaṃ “gavābhicaranyajeta” ityatrā'pi śrūyate-“yathā gāvo gopāyantī” ti । tenaitayorapi karmanāmadheyatvameveti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe śyenapakṣiṇā yāgo nirvarttayitavyaḥ । siddhānte tvatidiṣṭasomeneti ।
sūtrantu—“tadvyapadeśaṃ” tena prasiddhena śyenādinā sādṛśyani- bandhano'rthavāde vyapadeśo yasya tadapi karmanāmadheyamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ vājapeyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
asti vājapeyo “vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajete”ti । tatra guṇavidhiḥ karmanāmadheyamiti sandehaḥ । udbhidadhikaraṇe yaugikaśa-
bdānāṃ matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣeṇa, citrādhikaraṇe ca sāṃvijñāyikaśabdā- nāṃ vākyabhedadoṣeṇa nāmadheyatve vyutpādite, yaugikasāṃvijñāyikaśa- bdayorevodāharaṇaviśeṣeṣvapavādamāśaṃkya tatprakhyatadvyapadeśābhyāṃ ta- nnirākaraṇe kṛte, idānīmudbhidadhikaraṇacitrādhikaraṇasiddhāntahetvā- kṣepeṇa punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-sāmānādhikaraṇyena hi guṇa- vidhāne matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣo bhavati, na tu vaiyadhikaraṇyena । teneha “vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta”iti tantroccārito'yaṃ yajiḥ ‘yā- gena svārājyaṃ vājapeyena ca yāga’mityevaṃ sambhantsyate । matvartha- lakṣaṇā ca na bhaviṣyati । taduktam—

na caivaṃ sati viruddhatrikadvayāpattilakṣaṇo vākyabhedo'pi । yato guṇatvena pradhānatvena vā ekapadopāttasya punarupādāne padāvṛttilakṣa- ṇo vākyabhedo bhavati । iha tu guṇapradhānasādhāraṇarūpeṇa tantro-
ccāritasyaivobhayarūpaprāpterna padāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ । evaṃ “pañcadaśānyājyānī”tyatrā'pi tantroccāritājyapadopanītasyā''jya- sya stotrapañcadaśasaṃkhyānvayasahiṣṇutvātkuto vākyabhedaḥ ? evañca satyudbhidadhikaraṇacitrādhikaraṇoktamatvarthalakṣaṇāvākyabhedayorasa- mbhavāt prasiddhibalavatvena prayojanavattayā ca pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvena ca guṇavidhitvameva yuktam ।

nanvevaṃ stayudbhidādivākyānyevodāhṛtya vicārayitumucitaṃ, vājapeyodāharaṇantu kutaḥ? satyam; tānyapyatrodāharaṇānyaiva । kintu vājapeyavākyamapi pariśodhitaṃ bhavatītyetadarthamudāhṛtam । tena nāmadheya- tvena siddhāntyabhimateṣu padeṣvavaśyaṃ kasyacidudbhidādiṣu vājapeyalakṣa- ṇasya guṇasya śrutasyā'smaduktanyāyena vidhānamevetyevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyo-bhavedevaṃ yadyatrā'pi yajipadāvṛttilakṣaṇo vā- kyabhedo na bhavet । tathāhi—“vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta” ityatra yadyapi yajinā guṇapradhānasādhāraṇo yāgarūpo'rtho'bhihitaḥ, tathā'pi na tadrūpaṃ vākyārthānvayayogyam । tena vākyārthānvayayogyaṃ yadrū-
pamasya tatparatvameva, yajyuccāraṇasya vaktavyam । tacca rūpaṃ phalasamba- ndhāya sādhanatvena guṇarūpaṃ tāvadavaśyābhyupetavyam । evaṃ vidheyamu- pādeyañca । na ca tena rūpeṇa guṇasambandhaḥ sambhavati, guṇasyā'pi sādhanatvenā'nvayāt । tataśca guṇasambandhāya sādhyatvena pradhānarūpama- pi vaktavyam । evamuddeśryamanuvādyañca । na caikoccāraṇe viruddhagu- ṇapradhānādyubhayaparatvaṃ sambhavatīti yajipadoccāraṇāvṛttau padāvṛttila- kṣaṇo vākyabhedo duṣparihara eva ।

yatra punaḥ pradhānarūpaparaguṇarūpaparaṃ vā ekamevoccāraṇaṃ nānāpa- dārthasambandhayogyaṃ, tatrā'gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvādbhavatu tantratvamuccāraṇasya । yathā—“aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇāti” ( tai. saṃ. 6. 1. 6. ) ityatra dravyaguṇasambandhāya krayasya pradhānatvenaiva tantro- ccāraṇam । yathā ca—“daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi”tyatra daśa- grahasambandhāya sammārgasya guṇatvena tantroccāraṇamiti । taduktam—
prasidhyādayaśca nāmadheyatve'pyaviśiṣṭā eva । ato vājapeyā- dipadānāmapi nāmadheyatvameveti ।

prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe vājapeyaśabdasya yavāgūvacanatvādoṣadhidravya- tvena dārśapūrṇamāsikavidhyantapravṛttiḥ । siddhānte tu nāmadheyatvena dravyadevatābhāvādavyaktacodanātvena saumikaviddhyantapravṛttiriti । bhāṣyakāreṇa punaḥ sarvanāmadheyānāmeva yathāyathaṃ guṇaphalopabandhaḥ prayojanamuktam । taduktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa “nāmā'pi hi guṇaphalopabdhenā- 'rthavat” ( śā. bhā. 1. 4. 5. ) iti ।

sūtrantu-“aikaśabdye”sakṛduccaritaśabdābhidheyatve “parārthavat” parasambandhavat uddeśyatvamanūdyamānatvaṃ pradhānatvañca, svārthatve tūpā- deyatvaṃ vidheyatvaṃ guṇatvañceti viruddhatrikadvayāpattireva sūtriteti prati- pattavyamiti ।
chapter.head: atha saptamamāgneyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
“yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapālo'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cā'cyuto bhavati” ( tai. saṃ. 2.6.3. ) ityevamādayaḥ śrūyante । tatra sandehaḥ—kimā-
gneyo'gnīṣomīya ityevamādayo guṇavidhayaḥ ? karmanāmadheyā- ni ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam । “yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapālo bhavatī”tyatra bhavatyarthaḥ pratīyate । na cā'sau vidhiviṣayaḥ । puṃvyāpārarūpatvābhāvādvidhiviṣayaśca nāmāvacchinno guṇāvacchinno vā vidhīyate । ato guṇavidhināmadheyatvayorasambha- vāttṛtīyaprakārābhāvāccā'pratipādakatayā'prāmāṇyamāgneyacodanānā- miti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu yathābhāṣyameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadidamasaṅgatam; vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena nāmadheyatvenaiva prāmāṇyopapatteḥ । aprāmāṇyapakṣo'yaṃ svapakṣāgrahamātreṇaiveti yathā- vārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate । siddheṣu nāmadheyeṣvidānīṃ tadapa- vādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । “yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapālo bhava- tī”tyatrā'ṣṭākapālaḥ svato bhavatīti vākyārthāsambhavādbhāvanā tāva-
davaśyaṃ kalpanīyā । aṣṭākapālasya cā'puruṣārthatvena bhāvyatvānarha- tvādakriyārūpatvena ca phalasādhanatvāsambhavātphalabhāvanānuraktakri- yākalpanāyāṃ kramapaṭhitayājyānuvākyāsamarpitāgnidevatāvaśenā'ṣṭāka- pāladravyakayāgarūpaiva kriyā kalpyate । sā ca dravyadevatāviśiṣṭā pañcamalakāreṇa vidhīyate । na ca svavākyopāttāgneyataddhitasyaiva deva- tāsamarpakatvam । ‘agnirdevatā, agnerjātaḥ, agnaye hita’ iti vinigama- nābhāvena tasya sandigdhārthatvāt । mantrasya tvanuṣṭheyārthaprakāśakatve- nā'sandigdhārthatvānmantrādeva devatāprāptiḥ । tathā ca satyāgneyapadaṃ tatprakhyanyāyena nāmadheyameveti । yathā—“agnihotraṃ juhotī”tya- trā'gnihotrapadamityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadyatrā''gneyapadamaṣṭākapālapuroḍāśasamānādhikaraṇama- sandigdhadevatābhidhāyitaddhitāntaṃ prathamameva na śrūyeta । na cā'sya sandigdhārthatvaṃ, vidheyībhūtākāṃkṣitadevatāparatve satyanākāṃṅkṣitānuvā- dyārthatvasyā'sambhavāt । tena devatātaddhitāntāgneyapadādeva prathamaṃ dravyadevatāsambandhānumitayāgavidheḥ siddhatvānna tadavadhāraṇena carama- bhāvijaghanyataramāntravarṇikadevatākalpanayā yāgavidhānamāśrityā'na- nyathāsiddhasyā''gneyapadasya nāmadheyatvāśrayaṇaṃ yuktamiti । agni-
hotrapade tu yathā caturthīsamāsasya vidheyībhūtadevatāparatvaṃ, tathā sapta- mīsamāsasyā'pi vidheyībhūtahomādhikaraṇaparatvātsandigdhatvameva ।

na cā'trā'pi “yadāhavanīye juhoti” ( tai. brā. 1.1.10. ) ityanārabhyaśrutavākyenaivā''dhāraprāpterasandigdha eva caturthīsamāsa iti vaktavyam । anāhavanīyāgnimātrāṅgatvapratipādanenaiva vidhyupapatteḥ । tenā'trā'vaśryaṃ sandehavyudāsārthaṃ prakaraṇānusandhānaṃ vaktavyam । tatra ca mantravarṇādeva devatāyāḥ prāptatvāt bhavatvagnihotrapadaṃ nāmadheyaṃ, na tviha tathā, prathamameva devatāvācitaddhitabalena nissandigdhadevatābhā- vāvagamāditi ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe āgneyaśabdasya karmmavacanatvāt “āgneyaṃ caturdhā karoti”( āpa. śrau. 3.3.2. )ityāgneyakarmaṇa eva caturā- vṛttatvam । siddhānte tvāgneyapadasya guṇavacanatvādāgneyapuroḍāśasyaiva caturddhākaraṇamiti ।

sūtrantu—“vidhānārthe”taddhitānta āgneyapade “avibhāgāt” tadavinābhūtatvāddravyadevatāsambandhākṣiptaṃ yāgākhyaṃ karmma guṇā- ścā'gnipuroḍāśādayo viśiṣṭavidhinā vidhīyante । tatkarmma te guṇāḥ “na cedanyena śiṣṭāḥ”vihitā ityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athā'ṣṭamaṃ barhirājyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: barhirājyayoḥ puroḍāśe ca sandehaḥ—kimeṣa saṃskāraśabdaḥ ? uta jātinibandhanaḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhādataḥ prabhṛtyadhikaraṇatrayametadittha- mupavarṇitam । jātinimittasaṃskāranimittayaugikatvānadhyavasāyāda- prāmāṇyaṃ pūrvapakṣe । siddhānte tu yathābhāṣyaṃ prāmāṇyamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktam; vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣanyāyenaiva sarvatrā'dhyavasāyasambha- vāt । ato yatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
idānīṃ karmanāmadheyaprasaṅgena dravyanāmasvapi pravṛttinimittamadhika- raṇatrayeṇa nirūpyate । tatraitadadhikaraṇe tāvadayaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhi-
sandhiḥ । “barhirlunātī”tyatra tadvākyavihitalavanasaṃskṛte kuśe barhiḥ- śabdaṃ yājñikāḥ prayuñjānā dṛśyante । tathā “ājyaṃ vilāpayatī”- tyetadvākyavihitavilāpanasaṃskṛte ghṛte ājyaśabdaṃ, evaṃ “puroḍāśaṃ prayayantī”tyetadvākyavihitaprathanasaṃskṛte piṣṭake puroḍāśaśabdam । tena yathā “yūpaṃ chinattī”tyetadvākyavihitachedanajanitasaṃskāravati kāṣṭhe yūpaśabdaprayogadarśanādyacchidyate sa yūpa iti saṃskāravacanatvaṃ yūpaśa- bdasya, tathā yallūyate tadbarhiḥ, yadvilāpyate tadājyaṃ, yatprathyate sa puroḍāśa iti sarvatra saṃskāravacanatvameva ।

nanu yūpaśabdasyā'laukikārthatvena saṃskṛteṣveva prayogadarśanā- dbhavatu saṃskāravacanatvam । barhirādiśabdānāṃ tu loke'saṃskṛteṣvapi prayogadarśanātkathaṃ saṃskāravacanatvam । maivam; “śāstrasthā vā tannimi- ttatvāt” ( jai. sū. 1. 3. 9. ) iti nyāyena śāstrasthānāmeva yājñikānāṃ prasiddhirbalīyasī । sā tu saṃskṛtagocaraiva । atasta- dvirodhādaśāstrasthaprasiddhergauṇatvenā'pyupapatteḥ saṃskāravacanatvaṃ barhi- rādiśabdānāmityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi śāstrasthāśāstrasthaprayogayorvirodho bhavet । na- caitadasti । tathāhi—yasyāmeva kuśajātau barhiḥśabdamaśāstrasthāḥ
prayuñjate sā jātiḥ śāstrasthaprayoge'pyanapagataiva । tena naivobhayaprayo- gānugataikajātivacanatvenaivāvirodhātsakalaprayogopapattau kvacidgauṇatvaṃ kvacitsaṃskāravacanatvamityupapadyate । taduktam—

evañca sati “barhirlunāti”iti pūrvasiddhabarhiruddeśena lavana- vidhānāt yadbarhistallunātīti yathāvasthitavacanopapattau yallunāti tadbarhiriti vacanavyaktiviparyāso'pi na bhaviṣyati । yūpe tu gatya- ntarābhāvāttathāśritam । taduktam—
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe “barhiṣā yūpāvaṭamavastṛṇātī”ti saṃskṛ- tairevāstaritavyam । siddhānte tu kuśamātreṇaiveti ।

sūtrantu—“barhirājya”padārthayo“rasaṃskāre” asatyapi saṃskāre
“śabdalābhāt” bahirājyaśabdaprayogāt “atacchabdaḥ” asaṃskā- raśabdo barhiḥśabda ājyaśabdaśceti ।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “prokṣaṇīrāsādayatī”ti prokṣaṇīśabdaṃ prati sandehaḥ—saṃskā- raśabdo jātinimitto yaugiko veti ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । barhirājyaśabdavadasaṃskṛtāsya- psu prokṣaṇīśabdaprayogādarśanātsaṃskāravacanatvameveti prathamaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ ।

tadayuktam; mā nāma sarvatra prayujyatām । prayujyate tāvatkeṣuciddeśa- viśeṣeṣvasaṃskṛtāsvapsu । taduktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa—“prokṣaṇībhirudveji- tāḥ sma iti kasmiṃściddeśe bhavanti vaktāraḥ” ( śā. bhā. 1.4.9. ) iti । ato barhirājyanyāyenaiva na tāvatsaṃskāravacanatvam । nā'pi
yaugikārthatvaṃ, ‘prakarṣeṇokṣyate 'nene’tyasya yogasya ghṛtamūtrādisādhā- raṇyena jalajātivinigamanābhāvāt । kiñcopasargadhātupratyayārtha- parāmarśena yaugikapratītirvilambenopajāyate । samudāyaprasiddhistva- kṣaragrahaṇamātrāpekṣiṇī nā'vayavānusandhānamapekṣate । atastato vipra- kṛṣyate'vayavaprasiddhiḥ । taduktam—
ataḥ samudāyāprasiddhibalena barhirājyādivajjātivacanatvame- vetyevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: bhavedevaṃ yadyatra samudāyaprasiddhiḥ klṛptā bhavet । tatraiva hi sā kalpyate, yatrā'vayavārthānusārabyatirekeṇa prayogo dṛśyate । yathā vṛkṣaviśeṣe aśvakarṇaśabdasya । taduktam—
ataḥ samudāyaśakteraklṛptatvātklṛptāvayavaśaktidvāreṇaiva ca prayo- gopapatteḥ prokṣaṇīśabdasya yaugikatvameva ।

nanu ghṛtamūtrādisādhāraṇatvādyogo'tivyāpakaḥ । satyam; lyu- ḍantātprapūrvādukṣaterghātoḥ secanasamarthaṃ dravadravyamātramevā'vagamyate । bahuvacanāntastrīpratyayavaśāttu nityabahuvacanāntastrīliṅgācchabdārtha eva niścīyate । tena “prokṣaṇīrapa āsādaye”ti vākyārthe siddhe yā- gikatvameva prokṣaṇīśabdasyeti siddham ।

prayojanam—vikṛtau yatra śrūyate “ghṛtaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ bhavati” । ( mai. saṃ. 2.1.5.) iti “prokṣaṇīrāsādaya” (tai. brā. 3.2.7.) iti ca /?/ṣo'- tideśaprāptaḥ, tatra yadi saṃskāravacanatvam, tadā ‘prokṣaṇīrāsādaye’ tyavikṛtasyaiva prayogaḥ । atha jātivacanatvaṃ, tadohena ‘ghṛtamāsāda- ye’ti prayogaḥ । siddhānte tu yaugikatvena vācyaliṅgatvāt ghṛtasya napuṃsakaliṅgatvena ‘prokṣaṇamāsādaye’ti prayogaḥ ।
sūtrantu—“prokṣaṇīṣu” yaugikatvaṃ “arthasaṃyogāt” avayavārtha- saṃyogādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ nirmanthyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “nirmanthyeneṣṭakāḥ pacantī”ti saṃskṛte darśanātsaṃskāraśabdo nirmanthya iti । asaṃskṛte'pi dṛśyate ‘nirmanthyamānaya pakṣyāmaha’ iti nirmanthanayogātpūrvavadyaugika iti sthitiḥ ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । nirmanthyaśabdo'yaṃ yājñikaiḥ saṃskṛte prayujyate । na cā'yaṃ saṃskāravacanaḥ, asaṃskṛte'pi kvacidda- rśanāt । nā'pi yaugikaḥ, nirmanthanabhavo hi nirmanthyaḥ । sa ca na- vanītādāvapyaviśiṣṭaḥ, teṣāmapi nirmanthanabhavatvāt । na cā'tra prokṣa- ṇītulyatvam । tatra yogasya ghṛtādisādhāraṇye'pi ṅābantatvātprokṣa- ṇīśabdasya strīliṅganityabahuvacanāntatvācchabdasāmānādhikaraṇyayo- gyatayā bhavatu tadarthaviṣayatvam । iha tu tṛtīyāntasya “nirmanthyene” tipadasyā'gninavanītādisādhāraṇatvānnā'gnivacanatvanirṇayassambha- vatīti jātivacanatvamevetyevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: bhavedevaṃ yadyatrāṃ'gnipratītiranyato na bhavet । evaṃ hi śrūyate— “nirmanthyeneṣṭakāḥ pacantī”ti । tena yogasya sādhāraṇye'pi pāka- saptabhivyāhārādatrā'pyagniviśeṣaprāptau yaugikatvameva ।

prayojanam—saṃskāravacanatve saṃskṛtenā'gnineṣṭakāḥ paktavyāḥ, jātivacanatve'gnimātreṇa, yaugikatve tvaciranirmathitena । atra ya- dyapi sūryakāntādinivarttakatayā'pi nirmmanthyaśabdasyā'rthavatvānnā'- ciranirmathitāgnilābhaḥ, tathā'pi pākākṣepaprāpte'gnau mathanasya pākāṅgatvena lohitoṣṇīṣavadvidhāne'ṅgānāmmukhyadeśakālakartṛkatvā- daciranirmmaṃthitaprāptiriti । taduktam—
sūtrantu-yathā prokṣaṇīśabdasya yaugikatvaṃ, “tathā nirmanthye'- pī”tyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ vaiśvadevādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: cāturmmāsye prathame parvaṇi vaiśvadevesandehaḥ–“vaiśvadavena yajeta” (tai. brā. 1.4.10)iti kiṃ vaiśvadevaśabdo guṇavidhiḥ karmanāmadhe- yamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthatadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam । vai- śvadevaśabdasya na tāvatkarmanāmadheyatvaṃ, vinaiva matvarthalakṣaṇayā ta- ddhitāntatvena guṇavidhāne'pi karmmasāmānādhikaraṇyopapatteḥ । nā' pi guṇavidhānam । prakṛtasakalayāgānāmevotpattiśiṣṭadevatāvaruddha- tvena devatārūpaguṇāntaravidhānāsaṃbhavāt । nā'pi viśvedevaviśiṣṭa- karmmāntaravidhānam । prakṛtaviśvedevaviśiṣṭāmikṣāyāgapratyabhijñānena karmmāntarasya buddhau niveśayitumaśakyatvāt । tasmānna guṇavidhānam, nā'pi karmanāmadheyatvamityanadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu—yathābhāṣyaṃ nāmadheyatvenaiveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktam; vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena guṇavidhitvenaivāddhyava- sāyopapatteryatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate । nāmadheyapañcakaṃ sāpavādaṃ nirūpya prasaṅgenā'dhikaraṇatraye dravya- nāmasu pravṛttinimitte nirṇīte idānīmekadeśagatapravṛttinimittenā- 'pi prakṛtānekakarmanāmadheyatvaṃ bhavatīti pratipādayituṃ punarārambhaḥ ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । vaiśvadevaśabdena hi devatāvi- śiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ pratipādyate । dravyaṃ ca prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu prāptatvānna vidhiviṣa- yaḥ । kintu lohitoṣṇīṣanyāyena viśeṣaṇābhūtāprāptadevatāviṣayo'yaṃ vidhiḥ । na ca devatāyā dravyaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ, matvarthalakṣaṇayā “syāsya deva- te”ti ( pā.sū.4.2.24. ) taddhitasthaiva viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt । ato nā'tra guṇavidhau matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣaḥ । prāpte karmaṇi devatārūpaikaguṇa- vidhānāt na ca vākyabhedo'pi । ekasminnevā''mikṣāyāge viśve- devaprāpteritareṣvaprāptatvānna tatprakhyanyāyena vaiyarthyam । na ca viśvairdevaiḥ śyenavatkasyacitkarmaṇaḥ sādṛśyapratipādakaṃ vacanamasti, yena tadvya- padeśaviṣayatvam । na cā'tra phalopādānamasti, yena vājapeyavadvairū- pyam । ato guṇavidhitvapratipakṣasakalahetvabhāvādguṇavidhitvameva ।

kiñca karmanāmadheyatve kṛtsnameva vākyamanuvādakaṃ sadanarthamevā''- padyeta । na ca “prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta” “vasante vaiśvadevena yajete”ti prayogavākyāpekṣitasamudāyīkaraṇamevā'nuvādaprayojanamiti vaktavyam । etadvākyanyāyena vaiśvadevapadasya prayogavākye'pi samudā- yānuvādakatvasambhavāt । na ca nāmadheyapravṛttinimittamapyasti । pratyekaṃ samudāye ca viśvedevasambandhāprāpteḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: viśve devā na ca prāptāḥ pratyekaṃ saṃhateṣu ca ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: ato gatyantarābhāvādutpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhe'pyā‘narthakyaprati- hatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalami’ti nyāyena vā niṣkṛṣṭayāgānuvādena vā prakṛteṣvāmikṣāyāgavyatirikteṣu viśvedevadevatānāṃ vidhānamiti । ato “vaiśvadevena yajete”tyatra vaiśvadevapade viśvedevavidhānāśrayaṇā- dagnyādibhirviśvedevānāṃ vikalpa ityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: na prakaraṇātpratyakṣavidhānena na hi prakaraṇaṃ dravyasya ।।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevamutpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhe'pi guṇavidhānaṃ pratyakṣavidhānāditi sarvatra sūtrapāṭha upalabhyate ।
yadyagatirbhavet । asti tu tatprakhyanyāyena nāmadheyatvameva gatiḥ । nanu “vaiśvadevena yajete”ti vaiśvadevapadasya prakṛtasakalayāganāmadheya- tvamapekṣitam । na cā''mikṣāyāgavyatirikteṣu yāgeṣu vākyāntareṇa viśvedevaprāptirasti । tatkathaṃ tatprakhyanyāyenā'pi nāmadheyatvamu- cyate । syādevaṃ yadi prakṛteṣu sarvvakarmmasu mukhyameva vaiśvadevapadaṃ brūmaḥ । api tarhi lākṣaṇikam । lakṣaṇā caikadeśadvāreṇā'pi chatrinyāyena samudāye nā'nupapannā । na caivaṃ sati lakṣaṇādoṣādeva guṇavidhitvamiti vācyam । utpattiśiṣṭadevatākhyaguṇāvaruddhe karmma- ṇi viṣamaśiṣṭāṣṭadoṣaduṣṭavikalpāpādakasya devatāntararūpaguṇavidhā- nasya lokaprasiddhacchatrinyāyenā'nuvādagatalakṣaṇāto'tijaghanyatvāt । taduktam—

na ca siddhānte niṣprayojanaḥ sarvānuvādaḥ । “prācīnapravaṇe vaiśva- devena yajete”ti prayogavākyāpekṣitasamudāyakaraṇenaiva prayojanavatvāt । na caitadvākyanyāyenaiva prayogavākye'pi vaiśvadevapadasya samudāyakara- ṇasambhavādvaiyarthyamasyeti vācyam । deśasambandhaparasya prayogavā-
kyasya sati sambhave samudāyāpādakatvenobhayaparatvagauravaśriyaṇā- yogāt ।

kiñca vaiśvadevavākyasyā'sati samudāyakaraṇe deśasambandhaka- raṇena prayojanavataḥ prayogavākyasya mukhyavaiśvadevapadānurodhenaikavaca- nānurodhena caikasyaivā''mikṣāyāgasya deśavidhānenā'rthavatvānna vaiśva- devāvaiśvadevalakṣaṇārthatve kāraṇamasti । anuvādavākyasya tu prayo- janāntarābhāvātsamudāyakaraṇārthaṃ vaiśvadevāvaiśvadevalakṣaṇārthatvaṃ yukta- meva । tasmāt “vaiśvadevena yajete”tyatra lakṣaṇyā vaśvadevāvaiśvade- vaprakṛtasakalayāganāmadheyameva vaiśvadevapadamiti ।
prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe'gnyādibhirviśvedevānāṃ vikalpaḥ । siddhānte tu nityamevā'gnyādidevatāvatvameveti ।

sūtrantu—“na prakaraṇāt” viśvedevānāṃ sarvaiḥ sambandhaḥ । pratya- kṣavidhānenā'gnyādibhiḥ sambandhāt । “na hi prakaraṇaṃ dravyasya” pratyakṣavihitadevatāsambandhabādhane prakaraṇaṃ na samarthamityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ vaiśvānarādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetputre jāte yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati gātriyaivainaṃ brahmavarccasena punāti, yannavakapālastrivṛtaivā'smiṃstejo dadhāti, yaddaśakapālo virājaivā'sminnannādyaṃ dadhāti, yadekādaśakapālastriṣṭubhaivā' sminnindriyaṃ daghāti, yaddvādaśakapālo jagatyaivā'sminpaśūndadhāti, yasmin jāta etāmiṣṭiṃ nirvapati pūta eva sa tejasvyannāda indriyāvī paśumā- nmavati” ( tai. saṃ. 2. 2. 5 ) iti kapālavikalpāḥ śrūyante । tatra sandehaḥ—kimaṣṭatvādayo guṇavidhayaḥ ? utā'rthavādāḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p:
atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam । “yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatī”tyādīnāṃ vihitasmārakatvābhāvānna mantratve- nā'nvayaḥ । bhāvārthasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvānnā'pi nāmadheyatve- na । aṣṭatvādiguṇānvayayogyabhāvārthāsannidhernā'pi guṇavidhi- tvena । na ca vaiśvānarayāge guṇavidhānaṃ, tasya dvadaśasaṃkhyāvaruddha- tvena saṃkhyāntaravidhānāsambhavāt । aṣṭatvādinā vidheyadvādaśasaṃkhyā-
stutyasaṃbhavānnā'rthavādatvena । tena sarvathā vidhyanvayābhāvādaprāmā- ṇyameva “yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatī”tyādīnāmiti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhānta- stvarthavādatvena yathābhāṣyameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktam; vakṣyamāṇapūrṇapakṣanyāyena guṇavidhitvenaivā'nvaya- sambhavāditi yathāvārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate । guṇavidhiprati- yogikaṃ nāmadheyatvaṃ nirūpya prasaṅgenedānīṃ guṇavidhipratiyogikama- rthavādatvaṃ nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: bhaṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । “vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetputre jāta” ityatra dravyadevatāviśiṣṭakarmmavidhānāddvādaśakapā- lavidhānaṃ tāvadvyavasthitameva । nā'pi tadanantaraśrutānāmaṣṭākapā- lādīnāmekādaśakapālaparyantānāmanyā gatirasti । yato na tāvannāma- dheyatvenā'sya gatiḥ । dvādaśakapāle karmmaṇyaṣṭākapālanāmnaḥ pravṛ- ttinimittābhāvāt । nā'pyarthavādatvena । dvādaśakapālasyā'ṣṭākapā- latvena stutyasambhavāt ।

nanu dvādaśakapāle'ṣṭākapālo'pyantargata eva । ato nāmadheya-
tvamarthavādatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyatīti । maivam; mahāsaṃkhyāyāmekatvātiri- ktāvāntarasaṃkhyāyā abhāvāt । apekṣābuddhijanyā hi saṃkhyā । na hi yāvataḥ saṃkhyeyānapekṣya dvādaśasaṃkhyotpadyate tāvata evāpekṣyā- 'ṣṭasaṃkhyā'pyutpadyate । yataḥ saṃkhyāntarotpattau saṃkhyāntarotpattihe- tubhūtabudhyantarābhāvātsaṃkhyāsvabhāvācca । na hi saṃkhyā sattāmātreṇa saṃkhyeyamavacchinatti, kintu saṃkhyāntaravyavacchedenaiveti na dvāda- śasaṃkhyāyāmaṣṭatvādisaṃkhyāntargataḥ । kintu saṃkhyāntarotpattiyo- gyānyadhiṣṭhānāni paraṃ santi । na cā'ṣṭākapālādiśabdenā'dhiṣṭhānā- nyabhidhīyante । yena yathākathañcidapi nāmadheyatvamarthavādatvaṃ vā bhavet ।

abhyupetyavādenā'pyucyate । astu vā mahāsaṃkhyāsvavāntara- saṃkhyā, tathā'pyaṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśo'ṣṭākapāla iti saṃskṛtataddhito'yam । na ca dvādaśakapālavākye'ṣṭatvasya dvādaśa- saṃkhyāpūrakacatuṣṭvanirapekṣasya puroḍāśasaṃskārārthakapālaviśeṣaṇatvama- vagataṃ, kintu catuṣṭvāpekṣasyaiva । tadyadyapyaṣṭākapālavākye'pyaṣṭatvasya catuṣṭvāpekṣasyaivopādānamabhimatam, na ca tatsambhavati । sāpekṣa- tvena samāsataddhitayorutpatyasambhavāt ।

atha catuṣṭvanirapekṣasyaiva dvādakapālāntargatasyā'ṣṭatvasya puro- ḍāśasaṃskārārthakapālaviśeṣaṇatvamucyate । tathā sati dvādaśakapālavā-
kye tathābhūtasyā'ṣṭatvasyā'prāptatvānna nāmadheyatvaṃ nā'pyarthavādatvaṃ, kintarhi guṇavidhitvameva । taduktam—
tathā—

na ca prakṛtasya vaiśvānarayāgasyotpattiśiṣṭadvādaśatvāvaddharutvā- tkathaṃ tatrā'ṣṭatvādiguṇavidhānamiti vācyam । yasmādekamidaṃ vākya- manekasaṃkhyāviśiṣṭavaiśvānarayāgavidhāyakam, ataḥ sarveṣāmevotpatti- śiṣṭatvānna balābale kaścidviśeṣaḥ । ekavākyavihitatve'pi saṃkhyā- svabhāvādeva ca vikalpaḥ । yasyaiva tu dvādaśakapālasya vihitatvā- tpunarvidhānaṃ na sambhavati, tasyaivā'nte kīrttanamanuvādārthameveti । ataḥ “pūrvavanto” viditapūrvamarthamabhidadhati, te “avidhānārthāḥ” । ato'- ṣṭatvādi “samāmnāye tatsāmarthyaṃ” vidhānasāmarthyamevetyevaṃ prāpte
abhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: guṇasya tu vidhānārtha tadguṇāḥ prayoge syuranarthakā na hi taṃ pratyarthavattā'sti ।।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-bhavedevaṃ yadyutpattiśiṣṭadvādaśatvāvaruddhe vaiśvāna- rayāge'ṣṭatvādayo vidhātuṃ śakyeran । na caikavākyatvavaśena sarveṣā- mevotpattiśiṣṭatvānna dvādaśatvenā'varodha iti vācyam । guṇavidhau satyekavākyatvasyaivā'bhāvāt । “arthaikatvādekaṃ vākyaṃ sākākṣaṃ cedvi- bhāge syādi”ti (jai. sū. 2.1.46.) khalvekavākyatvalakṣaṇam । na caikārthatvam, parasparaviruddhānāṃ saṃkhyānāmekabhāvanānvayitvāsambha- vāt । nā'pi vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ, parasparavirodhādevā'nyānyā- kāṅkṣāyā abhāvāt । ato na tāvaddvādaśakapālavaiśvānarayāge guṇavi- dhānaṃ sambhavati । nā'pi vipariṇatavaiśvānarapadānuṣaṅgeṇā'ṣṭākapālo vaiśvānaro bhavatīti guṇaviśiṣṭayāgāntaravidhānaṃ vipariṇatānuṣaṅga- doṣādeva । agatyā hi vipariṇatānuṣaṅgaḥ kriyate । asti cā'rtha- vādatvenaivā'tra gatiriti vakṣyāmaḥ । taduktam—

nanvevaṃ tarhi prakṛtaṃ vaiśvānarayāgamāśritya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pūtatvādi- phale'ṣṭatvādayo vidhīyantām । “gāyatriyaivainaṃ brahmavarccasena punātī” tyasyā'rthavādatvaṃ bhaviṣyati । maivam; “vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetyu- tre jāte” ityupakramyā'nte ca “yaddvādaśakapālo bhavati yasmiñjāta e- tārmiṣṭiṃ nirvapatī” tyupakramopasaṃhārayordvādaśakapālakīrttanāddvādaśaka- pālavidhānaparamekamidaṃ vākyamavagamyate । tatrā'pi yadi “godohanena paśukāmasye”tivadaṣṭākapālādau kāmanopalabandhena palasambandhaḥ sphuṭata- ramavagamyeta, tadā vākyabhedaḥ svīkriyetā'pi । na caivamasti । ato'tra na guṇaphalasambandhaḥ । kintvekavākyatābalādarśavādatvameveti ।

na ca dvādaśakapāle'ṣṭākapālāderabhāvasyoktatvātkathamarthavā- datvamiti vācyam । yataḥ stutirbhavantī na yathābhūtārthakīrttanenaiva bhavati । satā'satā vā'rthena stutyupapatteḥ । tadatrāpi dvādaśakapāle saṃskṛtapuroḍāśasya mahāparimāṇatvādaṣṭākapālādisaṃskṛtapuroḍāśasa- dṛśo bhāgo'stīti sādṛśyanibandhaneyaṃ stutirityarthavādatvenaivopapa- rtterna guṇavidhānaṃ, kintvarthavādatvanaiveti ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe'ṣṭākapālādīnāṃ dvādaśakapālena saha
vikalpenā'nuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu nityaṃ dvādaśakapāle- naiveti ।

sutrantu—“guṇasya tu vidhānārthe”aṣṭākapālādivākyānāṃ guṇavidhiparatve sati“tadguṇā” yāgaprayoge“anarthakāḥ” bhaveyuḥ “na hi taṃ” yāgaprayogaṃ prati teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ “arthavattā'sti” tasya dvāda- śatvāvaruddhatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ tatsiddhyadhikaraṇam ।।
tātsiddhipeṭikā
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ” ( mai.saṃ..3.8.6.) “yajamāna ekakapāla” ( mai.saṃ. 1.1.10. ) ityevamādi samāmnāyate । tatra sandehaḥ— “yajamānaḥ prastara” iti kimeṣa vidhiḥ ? kimarthavādaḥ ? iti । tathā “yajamāna ekakapālaḥ” iti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṃgatilobhātsarvveṣvevodāharaṇeṣvitthamadhika- raṇamupavarṇitam । “yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ” ityādiṣu na tāvadyajamāna- nakārye prastaravidhiḥ, cetanakāryeṣvacetanasyā'yogyatvāt । nā'pi prastarakārye yajamānavidhiḥ, juhvādipadārthāsādanāvarūddhe tasminsa- kalayajamānakāryalopaprasaṅgāt । ato nā'yaṃ guṇavidhiḥ । nā' pyarthavādaḥ, yajamānaśabdasya prastare prastaraśabdasya ca yajamāne pra- vṛttinimittābhāvena stutyasambhavāt । na ca guṇayogaḥ pravṛttini- mittam, etadadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣe gauṇaśabdaprayogākṣepāt । ataḥ pra- tibhāmātrahetutvādevamāderaprāmāṇyameveti pūrvapakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu yathābhāṣyameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadidamanupapannam;vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣaprakāreṇa guṇavidhitvena prāmāṇyopapatteriti yatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate । pūrvamarthavādapāde stutyarthaṃ paratra paraśabdaprayogasya pravṛttinimittamarthavādaprāmāṇyapratipādanaparatayā'bhihitam । idā- nīṃ pūrvādhikaraṇoktaguṇavidhipratiyogikārthavādapratipādanaprasaṅgenā'- bhidhīyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । “yajamānaḥ prastara” iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tāvadatra pratīyate । na caitannāmadheyatvenopapadyate, udbhidādipadavat pravṛttinimittābhāvāt । nā'pyarthavādatvena, na hi pravṛttinimittaṃ vinā paratra paraśabdaḥ stotuṃ prayujyate । nā'pi guṇa- yogaḥ pravṛttinimittam, yajamānaśabdasya guṇānabhidhāyakatvāt । na ca guṇānabhidhāne'pyagniśabdasyeva māṇavake gauṇatvamiti vācyam । sarvagauṇaśabdānāmeva gauṇatvasyaitadadhikaraṇavyutpādyatvāt । ataḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyopapattaye'nyatarasya kāryalakṣaṇāparatvaṃ vaktavyam । tatra “mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokava”diti nyāyena “yo hotā so' dhvaryu”rati vidyajamānaśabdasya mukhyatvādanupajātavirodhitvācca svā- rthaparatvam, prastaraśabdasya jaghanyatvādvirodhācca kāryalaṇāparatvam । tathā satyarthavatvāt pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvācca prastaraśabdalakṣitakārye yajamāno vidhīyata eva, hotevā'dhvaryukārye । na caivaṃ sati sakalaya- jamānakāryocchedaprasaṅgaḥ, sadasyādipratipuruṣadvāreṇaiva yajamānakāryo- papatterityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi prastarakārye yajamānavidhirupapadyeta, na cā'-
sāvupapadyate । sakalayajamānakarmalopaprasaṅgāt । nā'pi sadasyā- dipratipuruṣadvāreṇa yajamānakarmāvirodha iti vācyam । “sūktavāke- na prastaraṃ praharati” “ekakapālaṃ sarvahutaṃ karoti”iti prastaraikakapā- layorāhavanīyaprakṣepaśruteryajamānasyā''havanīyaprakṣepe sati yajamāna- karmalopasya tadavasthatvāt ।

kiñca “yajamānaḥ prastara” ityatra na tāvadvidhiḥ śrūyate । na ca “yo hotā so'dhvaryu” rityādiṣviva gatyantarāsambhavena kalpayituṃ śakyate । “prastaramuttaraṃ barhiṣaḥ sādayati” “ekakapālaṃ sarvahutaṃ karotī” tyetadvidhiśeṣatvenā'rthavādatvenaiva gatisambhavāt । evañca satyekavā- kyatvenaivopapattervākyabhedo'pi na bhaviṣyati । na ca pravṛttinimittaṃ vinā paraśabdaḥ paratra kathaṃ prayujyata iti vācyam । guṇayogasyaiva pravṛttinimittatvāt ।

nanu guṇo'pi na kaścitsādhāraṇo yajamānaśabdenā'bhidhīyata ityuktam । satyaṃ; lakṣaṇayā svābhidheyārthasambandhopasthitamevā'rthaṃ śabdo viṣayīkaroti । yathā gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasambaddhameva tīram । gauṇaḥ punarabhidheyārthasbandhalakṣitaguṇayogenaivā'rthāntaram । yathā— ‘agnirmāṇavaka’ iti । taduktam—
guṇaścā'tra yajamānaprastaraikakapālānāṃ yāgaprayogasiddhikara- tvameva । anena guṇayogena prastaraikakapālayoḥ stutirityarthavā- datvameveti । taduktaṃ sūtre—“tatsiddhi”riti ।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ jātyadhikaraṇam ।।
chapter.p: tathā “āgneyo vai brāhmaṇaḥ” “endro rājanyaḥ” “vaiśyo vaiśvade- vaḥ” ityatra taddhitāntasyā''gneyādipadasya yathākathañcinmukhyabhā- venā'pi brāhmaṇādipadasamānādhikaraṇyasambhavāda‘gnirbrāhmaṇaḥ, indro rājanya;, vaiśyo viśvedevāḥ’ ityetadevodāharaṇaṃ, na tu taddhitāntapa- dāni । atrā'pi pūrvavadeva lakṣitabrāhmaṇakāryye guṇavidhāna- miti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।

siddhāntastu-agneracetanasya brāhmaṇādikāryakaraṇāsambhavā- darśavādatvena copapatterbrāhmaṇādisambandhividhyekavākyatayā guṇavā- denā'rthavādatvameva । pravṛttinimittañca guṇo'gnibrāhmaṇayorarthavādā-
vagataikabrahmamukhotpattiḥ । indrarājanyorbrahmabāhubhyāmutpattiḥ । viśvedevavaiśyayorbrahmamadhyadeśādutpattiḥ । taduktaṃ sūtre—“jā- ti”riti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ sārūpyādhikaraṇam ।।
chapter.p: tathā “yajamāno yūpaḥ” “ādityo yūpaḥ” ityatrā'pyuktanyāyena na lakṣitakārye guṇavidhiḥ, kintu yūpavidhyekavākyatayā guṇa- vādenā'rthavādatvameva । pravṛttinimittañca guṇaḥ yūpasya yajamānena sahordhvatvam । ādityena saha tejasvitvamiti । taduktaṃ sūtre— “sārūpyami”ti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśaṃ praśaṃsādhikaraṇam ।।
chapter.p:
tathā “apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśavo goaśvāḥ” “aya- jño vā eṣa yo'sāmā” “asatraṃ vā etadyadacchandomami”ti । atra paśvā- diśabdalakṣitaṃ kāryaṃ nañā niṣiddhyata iti pūrvapakṣī manyate । tadayu- ktam; paśukāryasya niṣeddhumaśakyatvāt । dvividhaṃ hi tasya kāryaṃ- pramāṇāntarasiddhaṃ dohanādi vaidhañca yāgādi । tatra pramāṇāntarasiddhaṃ tadvirodhādeva na niṣedhyam । nā'pi vaidham, ākhyātayoginañśabdāśrava- ṇāt । ākhyātayoge hi nañniṣedhako bhavati । na cā''paśava itya- trā''khyātaṃ śrūyate, yena ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavadvikalpo bhavet । tena
gavāśvaviṃdhyekavākyatayā'rthavāda evā'yam । tathā ca sati “paśavo goaśvā” ityatra paśuśabdaḥ prāśastyaṃ tadgataṃ lakṣayitvā prāśastya- lakṣaṇaguṇayogena gavāśvasamānādhikaraṇo bhavati-“paśavo goa- śvā” iti । tādṛśameva ca paśuśabdaṃ paśvantareṣu sāmānādhikaraṇye- na tathaiva prāśastyāvagama hetuṃ prayujya gavāśvayoḥ praśastataratvajñāpanārthaṃ nañā tadabhāvaḥ pratipādyate—“apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhya” iti । apraśastā ityarthaḥ । taduktam—

idaṃ tviha vivektavyam-dvividho hi gauṇaḥ śabdo bhavati । yatra paraśabdaḥ paratra prayujyate, tatra sādhāraṇameva guṇaṃ nimittīkṛtya prava- rttate । yathā-‘agnirmāṇavaka’ iti । yatra punaḥ sāmānyavācī śabdo viśeṣaśabdasamānādhikaraṇaḥ prayuktaḥ sannanarthako bhavati, tatra tadga- tameva guṇaṃ lakṣayitvā tatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratipadyate । yathā— “vasiṣṭho brāhmaṇaḥ” iti । tadvadihā'pi paśuśabda iti । kiñcā' nyatra praśaṃsāphalaṃ tatsiddhyādayo guṇāḥ pravṛttinimittāni । iha tu
praśaṃsaiva guṇaḥ pravṛttinimittamityetadapi vivektavyamiti । taduktaṃ sūtre—praśaṃse”ti ।
chapter.head: atha saptadaśaṃ bhūmādhikaraṇam ।।
chapter.p: “sṛṣṭīrupadadhātī”ti vidhiranuvāda iti saṃdehaḥ । “iṣṭakābhira- gniṃ cinuta” ityagnisthāpanārtheṣṭakācayanaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate—“sṛṣṭīru- padadhātī”ti । atra yadyapyupadadhātītyupadhāne vidhiḥ śrūyate, tathā'pi tasyeṣṭakāropaṇarūpasyopadhānasya cayanākṣepalabdhatvātsṛṣṭipadārtha- saṃkrānto vidhiḥ । sṛṣṭipadena ca “tadvānāsāmupadhāno mantra”ityanu- śāsanātsṛṣṭipadavanmantropadheyā iṣṭakā ucyante । na tāsāṃ mantra- sambandhātprāk sṛṣṭipadavācyatvena prasiddhirasti । tataśca prāptāprāpta- vivekena viśeṣaṇībhūtamantravidhirevā'yamiti pūrvvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।

siddhāntastu-na caitatsaṃbhavati । tathā satīṣṭakopadhānamātroddeśena sṛṣṭipadavanmantravidhāne liṅgaprakaraṇaviniyojyānāṃ sṛṣṭipadarahitānāṃ mantrāṇāmānarthakyaprasaṃgāt । na ca gatyantaraṃ nā'sti । bahavo hi mantrāḥ sṛṣṭipadavanta eva śrūyante । anyeṣāmapi tadantargatatvātsṛṣṭi- śabdena sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭipadavanmantropadheyeṣṭakānuvādenā'rthavādatvenaivopapa- tteḥ । dṛśyate caivaṃ loke'pi brāhmaṇabhūyastvena brāhmaṇābrāhmaṇa- grāmasya brāhmaṇagrāma iti । śrutiḥ ।

tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṃ vārtikakārapādā nā'numanyante । vidhyekadeśo hyarthavādo bhavati । na cā'tra vidhiḥ kaścitsannihito'sti । prakṛtacayanavidherapyanekavākyāntaravyavahitatvenā'sya tadekadeśatvābhā- vāt । tenopadhānamevā'tra vidhīyate । sṛṣṭipadena ca sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭipadavanma- ntrakeṣṭakāpratipādanaṃ stutyarthaṃ prathanavidhāviva“uru prathā uru prathasve” ti mantrakīrttanam । na ca cayanārthākṣiptamupadhānaṃ na vidhīyata iti vācyam । ākṣepātprāgeva śīghrapravṛttena pratyakṣavidhinā tadvidhānāt ।
na ca vinā'pi vidhinā prasidhyataḥ kiṃ vidhineti vācyam । yato vidhāne satyādhvaryavavedavihitatvenā'dhvaryukarttukatvaniyamasiddheḥ । taduktam—
anyacca vistarabhiyā nā'bhihitam । taduktaṃ sūtre-“bhūme”ti ।।
chapter.head: athā'ṣṭādaśaṃ liṅgasamavāyādhikaraṇam ।।
chapter.p:
tathā “prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti” “ajyānīpadadhātī”ti । atrā-
'pi pūrvavadiṣṭakācayanameva prakṛtya śrūyate-“prāṇabhṛta upadadhātī”ti । tatra kimayaṃ vidhirutārthavāda iti saṃśayyate ।

tatra pūrvapakṣī manyate—“sṛṣṭīrupadadhātī”tyatra sṛṣṭipadavanma- ntrāṇāṃ bahutvāttanmadhyavarttināmasṛṣṭipadavatāmapi bhavatu stutyarthamupā- dānam, iha tvekasyaiva mantrasya stutyarthamupādānamiti pūrvoktena pūrvapakṣanyāyena mantrarūpaguṇavidhānameveti pūrvapakṣaḥ ।

siddhāntastu pūrvavadeva । tatra liṅgaprakaraṇaviniyojyānāṃ bahūnāṃ mantrāṇāmānarthakyaprasaṅgānna guṇavidhitvaṃ, kintu chatrinyāye- naikadeśasambandhināpi lakṣitasamudāyaguṇayogenaiva samudāyiṣu prāṇabhṛcchabdapravṛtyupapatteḥ pūrvavadarthavādatvameveti । tadetadapi vārttika- kārapādā nā'numanyante । sannihitavidhyabhāvenā'rthavādatvābhāvādeva । tenā'trā'pyupadhānameva vidhīyate । mantrakīrttanaṃ prathananyāyenā'rtha vādārthameveti ।

idantviha vaktavyam । “sṛṣṭīrupadadhāta” “prāṇabhṛta upadadhātī”- tyudāharaṇadvaye'pi lakṣitasamudāyaguṇayogena samudāyipratītyaviśeṣānna sṛṣṭiprāṇabhṛcchabdārthayorbhūyastvālpatvena samudāyiṣu pravṛttinimitte kaścidviśeṣo'stīti vicāradvayamanarthakameveti ।

atrocyate—gauṇo hi śabdaḥ paratra varttituṃ yallakṣayati sa
eva guṇastatpravṛttau nimittam । “sṛṣṭī”riti ca bahutvānyayākṣepādeva samudāyo'vagamyate । ekadeśakālakriyāvacchedena samudāyāpannānāmeva dvitvabahutvādisaṃkhyāyogāt । ato'tra nā'rthāntare varttituṃ lakṣiṇaḥ samudāyo nimittam । kintu samudāyagataṃ sṛṣṭīnāṃ bāhulyameva । tacca yathā kevalasṛṣṭisamudāye samasti, tathā sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭisamudāye'- pīti । tena tatpadavatāmanyeṣāṃ ca samudāyagataṃ bāhulyaṃ lakṣitaṃ samu- dāyāntare pravṛttau nimittamiti । bahuvacanañcā'tra “sṛṣṭī”riti samu- dāyasyaikatve'pi samudāyāntargatasṛṣṭyasṛṣṭisamudāyibahutvāpekṣayā । yathā darśapūrṇamāsaśabdayoḥ samudāyivacanatve'pi tadantargatasamudāya- dvayāpekṣayā “darśapūrṇamāsābhyā yajete”ti dvivacanāntatvam । “prāṇabhṛta upadaghātī”tyatra tu prāṇabhṛnmantrasyaikatvādekasminbahuvacanānupapatyā svasamavetaṃ samudāyaṃ lakṣayati । sa ca samudāyaḥ prāṇabhṛdaprāṇabhṛtsamu- dāyiṣvaviśiṣṭa iti samudāyameva nimittīkṛtya samudāyiṣu pravartata iti pravṛttinimittabhedādevodāharaṇadvayārthavattvamiti । atra ca prāṇabhṛccha- bdasya samudāyadvāreṇa samudāyiviṣayatvātsamudāyasya ca prāṇabhṛ- daprāṇabhṛtsādhāraṇatvātprāṇabhṛcchabdasya gauṇatve'pi svārthāparityā- gaḥ । evaṃ sṛṣṭipadasyāpi samudāyaviṣayatvātsvārthāparityāga eva ।

prayojanam-sṛṣṭiprāṇabhṛlliṅgairevopadhānaṃ karttavyaṃ yadi pūrva-
pakṣaḥ । yadi siddhāntaḥ sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭiprāṇabhṛnmantrairiti । tatsidhyādiṣu pakṣoktameva prayojanamūhanīyamiti । taduktaṃ sūtre-“liṅgasamabāyā” iti । prāṇabhṛtpadavanmantraliṅgasamavāyātsamudāyipratītirityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: iti tatsiddhipeṭikā
athaikonaviṃśaṃ vākyaśeṣādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: “aktāḥ śarkkarā upadadhāti te jo vai ghṛta”miti śrūyate । tatra saṃdehaḥ- kiṃ ghṛtatailavasānāmanyatamena dravyeṇāñjanīyāśśarkarā uta ghṛtenaiveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam । “aktā” ityupakrame'ñcanākṣepādghṛtatailavasānāmanyatapradañjanasādhana- mavagamyate । “tejo vai ghṛta”mityupasaṃhāre ghṛtaṃ stūyate । tatropakra- mopasaṃhārasthayoḥ kataradbalīya iti viśeṣānadhyavasāyādaprāmāṇya- miti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu yathābhāṣyameveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadayuktama; vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena viddhyuddeśabalīyastvenaivā- 'dhyavasāyāditi yathāvārtikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate । stutyupayoga- marthavādasyā'bhidhāyedānīṃ prasaṅgāt sandigdhanirṇayopayogaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ । viddhyuddeśe hi prathamamañja- nasādhanaṃ ghṛtatailavasāsādhāraṇaṃ snehadravyamātramupasthitam । na tadavasā- nasthitajaghanyārthavādānurodhena saṅkocamadhikurute । kintu balavanmukhyā- nurodhenā'rthavāda eva tadanuguṇatayā varṇayitumucitaḥ। śaknoti ca ghṛta- padaṃ lakṣaṇayā viddhyuddeśāvagataṃ snehadravyamātraṃ stotum । taduktam—
tena balavadvidhyanurodhena tailaghṛtavasānāṃ vikalpa evetyevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyata—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi ghṛtastutidarśane sati vidhyuddeśagatamañjanapadaṃ
dravyāntaramañjanasādhanaṃ kalpayitumutsahate । tathā hi—sarveṣveva ‘gā- mānaya śuklā’mityādivākyeṣūpakramāvagatasāmānyaśabdasyā'vasānaga- taviśeṣaśabdavaśādevā'rthaviśeṣanirṇayo bhavati । uktañcā'rthavādānāṃ vidhivākyaśeṣatvam । tena yadyapyaktapadamupakrame'ñja nasādhanadravyamātra- vacanaṃ, tathā'pi tadviśeṣākṣepadaśāyāṃ ghṛtastutidarśanādvidhistutyośca samānaviṣayatvaniyamādghṛtameva nirṇīyate । taduktam—

kiñca śabdabhāvanā hi vidhistasya cā'ṅgaṃ vidheyastutirūpā pra- rocanā । iha ca tailādyupādānapakṣe vidhereva tatra prarocanāśaktiḥ kalpanīyā । klṛptā ca ghṛte prarocanā samasti । tathā ca satyekatra klṛptāṃ gṛhṇannitaratra kalpayanvidhirvairūpyeṇa bhidyeta । tena yatraiva praro- canā sa eva vidhīyata iti nirṇayo bhavati । taduktam—

kiñcā“aktāḥ śarkkarā upadaghātī” ti nā'tra vidhiḥ śrūyate । kintvarthavādavaśādunnetavyaḥ । ato'pi ghṛtaviṣayārthavādadarśanādghṛ- tameva vidhīyate । na ca “chāgo vā mantravarṇādi”tyasya ṣaṣṭhāntyā- dhikaraṇasyā'nena punaruktatvam । mantrasya bhinnavākyatvena pūrvapakṣo- tthānopapatteḥ । na ca tenaivā'sya daṇḍāpūpīyitatvam । anuṣṭheyā- rthapratipādakatvasya vinigamanahetorabhāvenā'tra pūrvapakṣopapatteḥ ।
prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe snehadravyāniyamaḥ । siddhānte ghṛtameveti ।
sūtrantu-ekavākyatve satyupakramopasaṃhārasthayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣa- śabdayoḥ kasya kimadhīnā pravṛttiriti sandehe uktaprakāreṇa vākyaśeṣādevopakramasthaśabdārthanirṇaya iti ।।
chapter.head: atha viṃśaṃ sāmarthyādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
“suveṇā'vadyati svadhitinā'vadyati hastenā'vadyatī”ti śrūyate । tatra sandehaḥ । kiṃ sarvasya sruveṇā'vadātavyaṃ dravasya māṃsasya
saṃhatasya ca, tathā svadhitinā hastena ca sarvveṣām ? athā' rthato vyavasthā-dravāṇāṃ sruveṇa, māṃsānāṃ svadhitenā, saṃhatānāṃ hasteneti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena pūrvottarapakṣau
chapter.p: atra prabhākareṇa saṅgatilobhāditthamadhikaraṇamupavarṇitam । atra sruvasvadhitihastānāmaviśeṣeṇā'vadānasādhanatvaṃ śāstrādavagamyate । avadeyāni ca dravamāṃsasaṃhatāni । na ca tāni sarvāṇyaviśeṣeṇa sru- vādibhiravadātuṃ śakyata iti śabdavastuvisaṃvādenā'naddhyavasāyāda- prāmāṇyamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । siddhāntastu yathābhāṣyaṃ sāmarthyānu- sāreṇaiveti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatadūṣaṇam
chapter.p: tadanupapannam; vakṣyamāṇapūrvapakṣanyāyenā'vyavasthayaivā'ddhya- vasāyopapatteryatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikamevā'dhikaraṇaṃ prastumahe । arthavādasya sandehanirṇāyakatvaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ prasaṅgena sāmarthya- syā'pi sandigdhanirṇāyakatvaṃ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrā'yaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo 'bhisandhiḥ । aviśeṣeṇa sruvādīnāmava-
dānasādhanatvaṃ śabdāvagatam । na ca sruvādīnāṃ māṃsādyavadānasā- marthyābhāvāttanna saṃbhavatīti vācyam । śabdabalenaivā'nyārthasahabhāve- nā'pi sāmarthyamāpādya sādhanatvasaṃbhavādavyavasthaiva sarvaiḥ sarvamavadā- tavyamityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: bhavedevaṃ yadi sāmarthyamatra vyavasthākāraṇaṃ na bhavet । sarvatra khalu vidhirvidheyasāmarthyamapekṣya pravarttate । asamarthasya vidhiśatenā'pi vidhātumaśakyatvāt । tadyatra prākprasiddhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ vyavasthākāraṇaṃ nā'sti, tatra vidhibalenaiva prakārāntareṇā'pi sāmarthyamāpādya vini- yogaḥ kriyetaiva । yatra punaḥ pūrvaprasiddhameva sāmarthyamasti, tatra tadvaśe- naiva vyavasthopapattestadanukūlayaiva viddhyekadeśaḥ kalpyate । taduktam—

lg.l: atha yatreti sandigdhe vākyaśeṣo na vidyate ।

chapter.p:
tasmātsāmarthyakalpitaikadeśamevaṃrūpamevatadvākyatrayam-sruveṇāva- dyati dravāṇāṃ, svadhitinā'vadyati māṃsānāṃ, hastenā'vadyati sahaṃ-
tānām । taduktam—

lg.l: tenaiva caitā na samāmananti sahastrabhāgantu samāmaneyuḥ ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe savaḥ sarvamavadātavyam । siddhānte tu yatho- ktavyavasthayaiveti ।
sūtrantu—“arthāt” sāmarthyādvyavasthākalpanā । sāmarthya- syā'pi śabdaikadeśakalpanānimittatvena śrutaśabdaikadeśatvaditi ।।

lg.l: yo nāma kaścidiha saṃviditaṃ prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadatu svayaṃ vā ।
matkarttṛtāmananukīrttya sa kīrttilopā- nnissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāt ।।

chapter.trailer: iti bālavalabhībhujaṅgāparanāmno mahopādhyāyaśrībhavadevasya kṛtau tautātitamatatilake nāmadheyapādaḥ samāptaḥ ।।

chapter.head: * śrī *
oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya
śrībhavadevanirmitaṃ
tautātitamatatilakam
dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ pratipadādhikaraṇam
chapter.sutra: bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyetaiṣa hyartho vidhīyate ।। 2. 1. 1. ।।
chapter.head: saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p:
prathame'dhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam । tatra vidhyarthavādamantra- smṛtayastattvato nirṇītāḥ । guṇavidhirnāmadheyañca parīkṣitam । tatra sandigdhānāmarthānāṃ vākyaśeṣādarthāccādhyavasānamuktam । tanna pra- smartavyam । anantarañca pradhānāpradhānāni parīkṣiṣyante—bhinnā- nyabhinnāni veti । eṣa evārtho varṇanīyo nānyaḥ । eṣa evādhyā- yasambandhaḥ । tadiha ṣaṅkidhakarmabhedo vakṣyate—śabdāntaram, abhyāsaḥ, saṃkhyā, guṇaḥ, prakriyā, nāmadheyamiti vakṣyamāṇa-
manukīrtyate, pradarśitamucyamānaṃ sukhaṃ grāhayiṣyate, śrotuśca buddhissa- mādhīyate । tadetannānākarmalakṣaṇamityadhyāyamācakṣate । ato'nya- dupoddhātaprasaktānuprasaktañca ।

prathamaṃ tāvadidaṃ cintayate—prathame'dhyāya idamuktam— ‘codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharma’ iti । codanā ca kriyāyā abhidhāyakaṃ vākyam, vākye ca padānāmarthaḥ, tatra kiṃ padena padena dharma ucyate ? uta sarvairekaḥ ? iti । atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ‘prathame'dhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam’ iti saprapañcamabhidhāya ‘anantara pradhānāpradhānāni parīkṣi- ṣyante, bhinnānyabhinnāni vā’ ityanena prathamadvitīyayoradhyāyayorhetuhe- tumadbhāvarūpassambandho darśitaḥ । tatra yadyapi kṛtsnavedārthavicārasyaiva pramāṇalakṣaṇādhīnatvaṃ, tathāpi karmabhedalakṣaṇāpekṣatvādanyeṣāṃ karma- bhedalakṣaṇasya pramāṇalakṣaṇamātrāpekṣatvādidamevānantaramārabdhavyam । tathā ca bhāṣyam— ‘eṣa evārtho varṇanīyo nānyaḥ’ iti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 371. pūnā saṃ॰ )

atra cāpūrvabhedānubandhī karmabhedo'dhyāyārthaḥ । dhātvarthāva- cchinnā ca bhāvanā karmeti lokaprasiddham । tadyadi dhātvarthātphalam,
tadā tadaṃvacchinnāyā eva bhāvanāyā apūrvānubandhāttasyaiva pratipāda- namucitam । atha nāmārthāt, tadā dhātvarthasyaivāpūrvānubandhitvātkiṃ karmabhedapratipādaneneti । tadatra nāmārthasya phalasādhanatvanirākara- ṇena bhāvārthasyaiva phalasādhanatvaṃ pratipādayitumupoddhātabhūtaṃ bhāvā- rthādhikaraṇamārabdhavyam, yadyubhayasādhanatvanirāsenaikasyaiva phalasā- dhanatvam । dvayoḥ phalasādhanatve kasmādekasmāditi sandehābhāvāt । tadarthamupoddhātabhūtaṃ pratipadādhikaraṇameva prathamamārabhyate ।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: tatra “śyenenābhicaran yajeta” ( ṣaḍviṃ. brā., 3. 8. ) “citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ” ( tai. saṃ., 2. 4. 6. 1. ) iti śrutau sandehaḥ—kiṃ padena padena dharma ucyate ? uta sarvairekaḥ ? iti । ayamarthaḥ—kiṃ padena padenābhihitasyārthasya phalasambandhāviśeṣeṇa dharmatvam ? athe- tarānugṛhītasyaikasyaiveti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-“śyenenābhicaran yajeta” ityatra vidhyavaruddhā bhāvanā abhicārarūpaphalasādhanamapekṣamāṇā vākyopāttaṃ nāmārthaṃ dhātvarthañcāviśeṣādubhayameva sādhanamanumanyate । nanu padaśrutyā sannikṛṣṭasya dhātvarthasyaiva phalabhāvanāyāḥ karaṇatvena
prathamamanvayāvagateḥ tadavaruddhāyāñca tasyāṃ viprakṛṣṭasya nāmārthasyānva- yāsambhavāt kathamaviśeṣeṇobhayoḥ samanvaya iti । maivam; syādevaṃ yadi dhātvarthasya karaṇatvaṃ śrutaṃ bhavet, kintu phalabhāvanā- kāṅkṣyā kalpanīyaṃ tat । tena yadyapi svarūpataḥ sannikṛṣṭo dhātvarthaḥ, tathāpi kalpanīyakaraṇabhāvena viprakṛṣṭo'sau । nāmārtho yadyapi svarūpato viprakṛṣṭaḥ, tathāpi tasya karaṇatvena śrutatvāttena rūpeṇa tasya sannikṛṣṭatvameva । tena sannikarṣaviprakarṣāviśeṣāddvayoreva sāpekṣatvātphalasādhanatvam ।

na caivaṃ sati parasparanirapekṣobhayasādhanatvāvagatervibhāgalakṣaṇo vākyabheda iti vaktavyam । aruṇaikahāyanīviśiṣṭakrayabhāvanāvi- dhānavannāmārthadhātvarthaviśiṣṭaikaphalabhāvanāvidhānena samudāye vākya- parisamāptervākyabhedābhāvāt । yathā tatra parasparāpekṣāvaśāt dravyasya guṇāśrayatvena, guṇasya ca dravyāvacchedakatvenānvayaḥ, tathehāpi nāmārthasya dhātvarthāśritasya dhātvarthasya ca nāmārthasahitasya sādhana- tvātparasparāpekṣāyāmanyonyānvaya iti । na caivaṃ satyanekādṛṣṭaka- lpanādoṣo'pi; nāmārthadhātvarthayoryugapadekāpūrvasādhanatvenānekādṛṣṭaka- lpanāpramāṇābhāvāt । bhavatu vānekādṛṣṭakalpanā, tathāpi ‘pramāṇa- vantyadṛṣṭāni kalpyante subahūnyapi’ iti nyāyādanekādṛṣṭakalpa-
nāpi na doṣāyeti । ato'viśeṣāddvayoreva nāmārthadhātvarthayoḥ phalānvaya iti । taduktam—

lg.l: tasmātphalapadenaiva sarvaṃ sambadhyate padam ।। ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 373 )

chapter.p: ityeva prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadyatra karaṇayossamuccayassambhavet । samānakāla- bhāvinorhi samuccayo bhavati । na cātra karaṇībhāvāttayornāmārthadhā- tvarthayossahabhāvassamasti । niṣpannasya hi dhātvarthasya karaṇatvaṃ vaktavyam । nāmārthasya karaṇatvaṃ dhātvarthaniṣpādakatvenaiva । tacca dhātvarthātprāgeva । na hi niṣpanne dhātvarthe dhātvarthaniṣpādakamasti । athocyate—māsya bhavatu nāmārthasya svarūpataḥ sāhityam, kārya- tastu bhaviṣyati । tathāhi—yasminneva kāle nāmārthena dhātvartho janyate, tadaiva tatsāhityamapūrvāntaraṃ janitam, atastaddvāreṇa sāhi- tyasadbhāvādyuktassamuccayaḥ । etacca śabdāvagatakaraṇatvānyathānupapatyā kalpyamānaṃ na doṣamāvahatīti । tadayuktam; syādevaṃ yadi dvayoreva phalabhāvanākaraṇatvaṃ śrautaṃ bhavet, kintu bhāvanākāṅkṣyā tatkalpanī- yam । tatra dhātvarthasya sannikṛṣṭasya karaṇatvaṃ phalabhāvanāsambandhā-
tkalpanīyam । nāmārthasya ca klṝptakaraṇabhāvasya viprakṛṣṭasya phalabhā- vanāsambandhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ । kalpyamānaṃ tadeva kalpayitumucitaṃ yatra nānekādṛṣṭakalpanā bhavati । ubhayakaraṇatvena samuccayasiddhyarthamavaśya- mevāpūrvāntaraṃ kalpanīyamityuktameva ।

na caikasya karaṇatve'nyatarasya vākyānvayo na sambhavati । itarānugrāhakatvenaivetarānvayopapatteḥ । tena yadi sannikarṣalobhena dhātvarthaḥ karaṇam, tadā nāmārthasya karaṇatvaṃ dhātvarthagatameva । atha śrautakaraṇatvalobhena viprakṛṣṭasyāpi nāmārthasya karaṇatvam, tadā dhātvarthasya tadvyāpāratvenaiva samanvayānna karaṇatvamapi kalpanīyam । taduktaṃ bhāṣye—‘yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadartham’ iti ।

na caivaṃ dhātvarthasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ nāmārthasya ca dhātvarthe vidhā- nādvājapeyoktavairūpyaprasaṅgaḥ । atha tatparihārārthaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇāśrīyate, tadā lakṣaṇaiva doṣa iti varamapūrvadvayakalpanaiveti। ucyate-syādevamapūrva- sambandhānusāreṇaiveyaṃ bhavantī matvarthalakṣaṇā yadyapūrvakalpanāto jyā- yasī na bhavet । tathāhi-utpattipūrvakaḥ khalu viniyogaḥ । utpattiśca na dhātvarthasvarūpajñānamātram, viniyogāvasthāyāmapi dhātvarthasvarūpajñā- nāviśeṣāt, kintu bhāvanāsādhyatayā dhātvarthasvarūpajñānam । tatra yadyapyutpattividherapuruṣārthabhūtatvāddhātvarthasya na svāvaruddhā bhāvanā
sādhyatvena paryavasyati, tathāpyasyāsādhitasya sādhanatvāsambhavādbhā- viviniyogavidhisādhyaphalabhāvanākaraṇatvāccānuguṇatayā bhāvanāsā- dhyadhātvarthasvarūpapratipattipara eva bhavati । tathābhūtenaiva dhātvarthena śyenā- dirnāmārtho vinaiva matvarthalakṣaṇayā karaṇatvena sambadhyate । tenāyamartho bhavati—‘śyenena yāgaṃ kuryādityevam’iti। evaṃ sati viniyogadaśāyāṃ gṛhītaśyenādikārakasyaiva yāgāderddhātvarthasya karaṇatvātkaraṇasya karaṇāntarānvayāsambhavātpūrvapratītasambandhānurodhena matvarthalakṣaṇā na doṣamāvahati । tasmādapūrvakkalpanālāghavenaikasmādeva śyenavato yāgāt yāgavato vā śyenādapūrvamiti siddham । taduktam—

lg.l: tadrūpatvopapattau tu na yuktā bahukalpanā ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 373 )
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ bhāvārthādhikaraṇam
saṃśayapūrvapakṣau
chapter.p:
yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadā sandehaḥ—kiṃ bhāvaśabdebhyaḥ ? uta dravyaguṇaśabdebhyaḥ ? iti । atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yadyapi
dhātvarthanāmārthayoraniyamenāpi sambandhādanekādṛṣṭakalpanāparihāro bhavatyeva, tathāpi sakṛduccaritasya śyenādivākyasya kadācinnāmārtha- prādhānyena dhātvarthaguṇabhāvabodhakatvam, kadāciddhātvarthaprādhānyena nāmārthaguṇabhāvabodhakatvam । etacca vairūpyalakṣaṇavākyabhedaprasaṅgānna sambhavati । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 374 )

tasmānniyamenaikasyaikaphalasambandho vaktavyaḥ । tatra siddhasya karaṇatvayogyatvānnāmārthasya siddhatvātkaraṇavācitṛtīyāvibhaktiyo- gitvācca dhātvarthasya sādhyatvena karaṇatvāyogyatvātkaraṇavācitṛ- tīyāvibhaktyabhāvācca nāmārthādeva phalam । na ca vācyam—phala- sādhānatvādāśrayasambandhavidhāne phalasambandhavidhāne ca vākyabheda iti । yathā dhātvarthasyaiva phalakaraṇatve matvarthalakṣaṇayā nāmārthaviśiṣṭa- syaiva phalakaraṇatvānna vākyabhedassiddhānte,tathā nāmārthasyāpi matvartha- lakṣaṇayā dhātvarthaviśiṣṭasyaiva phalakaraṇatvātkuto vākyabheda iti । nanu bhavatu dhātvarthasyāśrayatvam, tathāpi yathā nāmārthasya dhātvarthani- ṣpādakatvameva dṛṣṭopakārakatvaṃ na tathā nāmārthe dhātvarthasya dṛṣṭo- pakārakatvamastīti bhāvārthagatadhātvarthajanyādṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ pratipadapūrvapa-
kṣavadatrāpyadṛṣṭakalpanāgauravameveti । maivam; godohanasyeva praṇaya- nenāsamarthasyāpi dhātvarthena kārakatvasampādanarūpopakārajananāt । niyamādṛṣṭaṃ tu dravyaviśeṣaniyamātsiddhānte'pi samānamityevaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: bhavedevaṃ yadi vidhiśrutiḥ samānapadopāttasya dhātvarthasya prathamaṃ phalabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇatvaṃ na pratipādayet । tathāhi-yajetetyatra vidhya- varuddhabhāvanāviṣayatvena yāgaḥ pratīyate । bhāvanāviṣayatvañca bhāvanā- karmatvameva । bhāvanā ca vidhyavaruddhā puruṣepsitameva bhāvyaṃ gṛhṇāti । karmabhūtamapi dhātvarthaṃ nepsitakarmatvenānumanyate, kintvanīpsitakarmatve- naiva । puruṣasamīhitaphaloddeśenaiva pravṛttā kṛtistadevānīpptitakarmatayā gṛhṇāti, yadetatsādhanabhūtam, odanoddeśapravṛtteva pākaṃ tatsādhanatvam, sādhanāntarānavaruddhe sādhye bhavatu svakāraṇatvameveti । tena yajete- tyatra vidhiśrutito dhātvarthasyaiva phalabhāvanākaraṇatvāvagamāt tṛtīyāntasyāpi nāmārthasya dhātvarthakaraṇatvenaivānvaya iti siddham । taduktam—

lg.l: tasmin phalavatīṣṭe tu nāmno dṛṣṭārthateṣyate ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 388)

nanvevaṃ sati “godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet” “dadhnendriyakā- masya juhuyāt” ( tai. brā., 2. 1. 5. 6. ) ityatrāpi samānanyāyena dhātvarthasyaiva phalakaraṇatvānna guṇaphalasambandhasssāditi । naivam; vidhiśrutireva dhātvarthakaraṇatve pramāṇamityuktam । vidhiścāprāpta- viṣayaḥ । yatra ca phalakaraṇasyaiva dhātvarthasya prakaraṇaprāptasyā- nūdyamānatvānna tasya vidhivyāpāraviṣayatvamiti guṇasaṅkānto vidhiḥ prāptāprāptavivekena prakṛtaṃ dhātvarthamāśritya tatra guṇa eva phale sambandhanīya iti । iha tu dhātvarthasyaiva vidhiviṣayatvādukta- nyāyena tasyaiva karaṇatvamiti vaiṣamyam ।

nanu nāmārthasya phalakaraṇatvanirākaraṇena dhātvarthasya phala- karaṇatvamiha sādhyam । tacca bādaryadhikaraṇasvargakāmādhikaraṇābhyā- meva siddham । tathāhi bādaryadhikaraṇasūtram—‘karmāṇyapi jaiminiḥ phalārthatvāt’ ( jai. sū., 3. 1. 4. ) iti । anena karmaṇāmeva phalasādhanavtamityuktam । tathā svargakāmādhikaraṇasūtram—‘asādha- kantu tādarthyāt’ (jai. sū., 6. 1.2.) iti । anenāpyaphalārthatve sati karmaṇaḥ sādhakapuruṣaśūnyatvaprasaṅgāditi phalasādhanatvameva pratipādyate । na ca nāmārthasya phalakaraṇatvanirākaraṇārthamevedamadhi- karaṇamiti draṣṭavyam, tathāpyarthasiddhatvāt । yadā pratipadādhikaraṇa- pū. mī., 3. 1. 3. pū. mī., 6. 1. 1.
siddhānte ekasya phalasādhanatvamiti nirūpitam, bādarisvargakāmā- dhikaraṇābhyāñca dhātvarthasya phalakaraṇatvamiti pratipāditam, tadā- rthādeva nāmārthasya phalakaraṇatvanirākaraṇāttadarthamidamadhikaraṇamupa- padyata iti । maivam; na hi bādaryadhikaraṇe dhātvarthasya phalakaraṇatvaṃ pratipādyate, kintvetadadhikaraṇasiddhenaiva dhātvarthasya phalakaraṇatvena dṛṣṭopakāradarśananibandhanaṃ dravyaguṇasaṃskārāṇāmeva śeṣatvamiti bādarermataṃ nirākriyate । svargakāmādhikaraṇe caitadadhikaraṇasiddhameva karmaṇaḥ phalasādhanatvamāśritya phalakāmasya karmasvadhikāraḥ pratipā- dyata iti na kiñcidanupapannam । sūtrantu vārtikenaiva vyākhyātam । taduktam—

lg.l: taiḥ kuryādyajinā svargameṣa hyartho vidhīyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 375)
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyamapūrvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: kathaṃ punaridamavagamyate ? asti tāvadapūrvamiti kṛtvā na nāmarthebhyaḥ kintu bhāvārthebhya eveti nirūpitam । idānīmapūrvameva kimasti nāstīti vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvadapūrvaṃ pratyakṣeṇopa- labhyate । nāpyanumānena, tatpratibaddhaliṅgābhāvāt । na ca śabdena । na ca loke'pūrvapratipādakaṃ kiñcitpadamavagamyate । apūrvapadantvanva- rthanāmatayā abhāvapratipādakameva । na cāpadarthībhūtasya vākyārthatva- masti । nāpyupamānena, tasya sādṛśyamātraviṣayatvāt । nāpi dṛṣṭā- rthāpatyā, jagadvaicitryasya svabhāvādevopapatteḥ । nāpi śrutārthāpatyā, śrutasya yāgaphalasādhanatvasyānyathaivopapatteḥ । na hi sarvatra kāryasama- samayabhāvinaḥ kāraṇatvam, kāryakāraṇayoryaugapadyābhāvāt । kintarhi pūrvabhāvina eva । ataḥ pūrvabhāvitvamātreṇa karmaṇaḥ sādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kimapūrveṇa ? na ca vācyam—bhavatvanantarapūrvavṛttasya sādhanatvam, cirātivṛttasya tu kathamapūrveṇa vinā sādhanatvamupapadya- tāmiti । yataḥ prakalpyāpyapūrvaṃ cirātivṛttasyaiva karmaṇaḥ sādhanatvaṃ
vācyam । na hyapūrvaṃ sādhanam, karmaṇa eva sādhanatvāt । nāpi phalam, svargasyaiva phalatvāt । athāpūrvadvāreṇa karmaṇa eva sādhana- tvamityucyate, tataḥ kimapūrvaṃ karmaṇaḥ śaktiḥ ? vyāpāro vā ? na tāvacchaktiḥ; śaktirhi śaktimadāśrayā bhavati । na ca śakti- matyatikrānte śaktissamasti । nāpi vyāpāraḥ; sarvatra khalu vyāpārāviṣṭasya vyāpāriṇa eva sādhanatvaṃ bhavati, na tu vyāpāra- mātrasya । nanu ghṛtapānapūrvānubhavayorapi dhātusāmyaṃ saṃskāro vā pratyakṣādibhiravagamyate । kalpanāhetutvaṃ loke dṛṣṭameva, tathātrāpya- tītasyaiva karmaṇo'pūrvāntaravyāpāradvāreṇa phalasādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣya- tīti । maivam; tatrāpyatītayoreva ghṛtapānapūrvānubhavayorapūrvakalpanāva- datrāpyanyathaivopapatternirastameveti । yattu kṛṣyādau dṛśyata evāntarā- lakāryaṃ, tatra vyavahitapitāmahaprapitāmahādivatkāraṇatvameva na tvanyeṣāṃ tadvyāpāratvam । tena sarvatra pūrvabhāvina eva kāraṇatvam । iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ—kasyacidanantarapūrvabhāvinaḥ, kasyaciccirapūrvabhāvinastadi- ti yathāpramāṇamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti nāstyapūrve kiñcitpramāṇam । taduktam—

lg.l: aṅgāni ca pradhāneṣu janayantīti gamyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 393)
chapter.head: prabhākaramatam
chapter.p:
atra kecit—śabdābhidheyamevāpūrvamiti samādhānamabhidadhati । tathā hi-loke tāvatstanapānādipravṛttiprabhṛtisakalavyavahāreṣveva kā- ryāvagatiḥ pravṛttinimittamiti svasantāne samadhigatam । tena vṛddha- vyavahāreṣu hi śravaṇānantaraṃ cetanapravṛttimavagamya svarganāmā- nusāreṇaitadeva tādvyutpādyamānenāvagatam—yatkāryāvagatireva pra- vṛttinimittaṃ, sā ca tadbhāvabhāvitayā liṅgaśabdena kṛteti । tatra yathā loke kriyākāryameva pravṛttihetutayā samadhigatam, tathā yo hi yatkāmaḥ sa khalvavyavahitameva tadupāyaṃ kāryatayāvagacchati । yathā tṛptikāmo bhojanam । odananiṣpattikāmaśca pākam । evaṃ sarvatra kṛṣyādāvapyūhanīyam । tena yathā yathā kāmanā sambhavati, tathā tathā tadavyahitopāya eva kāryatāṃ sambhāvayatīti vyutpattiḥ । evaṃ ca sati “svarga kāmo yajeta” ityādiṣu svargakāmanāviśiṣṭapuruṣasamba- ndhikāryaṃ liṅādibhiḥ pratipādanīyam । na ca svargakāmaḥ kālāntara- bhāvinaḥ svargasya vyavahitāṃ yāgādikriyāṃ tadupāyatayā kāryatvena boddhuṃ śaknoti । avyavahitopāyasyaiva loke kāryatvenāvagamasyokta- kākhāntarasthāyi mānāntaravedyaṃ pumāṃsamāśritaṃ niyojyānvayayogyaṃ khiṅādiśabdābhidheyamapūrvameva kāryamarthāpattyā kalpyata iti । tacca
yāgasya phalasādhanatvanirvāhāya parairapi kalpanīyam । asmābhiścā- vyavahitakāmyopāyakāryavyutpattibalāttadeva pradhānaṃ phalopāyabhūtaṃ liṅśabdābhidheyaṃ svīkṛtamiti nānupapannam ।

nanvevaṃ satyarthāpattipramāṇakatvenāpūrvatvavyāhatiḥ syāt । satyam; yadyapūrve'rthāpattiḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavet, kintarhi tadviṣayaliṅā- diśabdena tātparyaviṣayatā tadupasthitau na tatra prāmāṇyam । yathā paramata eva viśvajidādau yadyapi svargakāmādipade śrutārthāpattyā ka- lpyamāne tadartho'pi viśeṣaṇatayopasthita eva, tathāpi na tatrārthāpattiḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavet, kintarhi ? vācakaśabda eva । tadvācakaśabde tu sā pramāṇam । tadvadihāpi nāpūrvarūpe'rthe'rthāpattiḥ pramāṇam । kiṃ tarhi ? tadgocaraliṅādiśabdatātparya eva । avadhṛtatātparyaśca liṅā- diśabda eva tatra pramāṇamiti । evañca tatraiva liṅśabdasya mukhya- tvam । na hi sati sambhave'nekārthatvaṃ śabdasya yuktamiti liṅśa- bdasya kriyākāryatvaṃ lākṣaṇikameva ।

nanvagatamukhyārthasyānvayānupapattirhi lakṣaṇākāraṇam । na ca loke liṅśabdasya mukhyabhūto'pūrvo'rtho viditapūrvaḥ । tadanavagame ca kathaṃ lakṣaṇeti । maivam; prāmāṇikānāmuttarakālamayaṃ vivekaḥ,
itareṣāṃ tvapabhraṃśādivat । na ca liṅśabdātiriktapramāṇaṃmapūrvamava- gamyate । kriyā tu pramāṇāntarāvagateti saiva lakṣaṇāviṣayo nāpūrvam । sambandhaśca yadyapi laukikabhojanādikriyayā saha sākṣādapūrvasya nāsti, tathāpi yāgadikriyā tāvadapūrvasambaddhā, tadgataṃ ca kriyātvaṃ bhojanādikriyāsvapyastīti parasparasambandhāllukṣaṇopapattiriti ।

nanu kāmyasvargaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣo vyavahitopāyatayā kriyāṃ vihā- yāvyavahitopāyamapūrvarūpaṃ kāryaṃ pravṛttihetutayā liṅabhidheyaṃ cenmanyate, evaṃ tarhīṣṭopāyataiva pravṛttiheturastu liṅabhidheyā ca, kimānuṣaṅgikakā- ryāvagameneti । ucyate—kasyeṣṭopāyatā pravṛttiheturliṅabhidheyatā ca bhavadabhimatā । na tāvadyāgasya, nāpi kṛteḥ, na dvayorapi, vyavahitatve- nāvyavahitakāmyopāyatvābhāvāt । avyavahitakāmyopāyasyaiva kārya- tvena liṅabhidheyatvasvīkārāt । athāvyavadhānādapūrvasyaiva, tada- yuktam; paramate'pi vidhitaḥ pūrvamapūrvasyānavagatatvāt । liṅādi- śabdenaivāpūrvamabhidhātavyaṃ, tadgateṣṭopāyatvaṃ ca । asmanmate tvapūrvamātra- meva kāryarūpeṇābhidhīyata iti mahānayaṃ viśeṣaḥ । ataḥ śabdābhi- dheyamevāpūrvamiti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatakhaṇḍanam
chapter.p:
atrocyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi vyutpattivirahamahānalajvālāpara-
mparāparihāro na bhavet । tathāhi—yattāvaduktaṃ stanapānādiprabhṛti sakalavyavahāreṣveva kāryāvagatiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ svasantāne samadhi- gatamiti । tadayuktam; vyabhicārāt । kṛtisādhyaṃ hi kāryamitya- vagataṃ loke, kṛtyanantaramutpattumarhatvaṃ loke viṣabhakṣaṇakaṇṭakamarda- nādiṣvapyaviśiṣṭam । na hi viṣabhakṣaṇe kaṇṭakamardane vā kṛtyananta- rotpattyarhatvaṃ na sambhavati । na ca tasya svasantāne pravṛttihetutvamanava- gatam । athāniṣṭopāyatayā na tatra pravṛttiḥ । evaṃ tarhi tadāgamanyā- yeneṣṭopāyataiva pravṛttiheturastu, kiṃ kāryeṇeti ।

yadapi kenāpyuktam—na kṛtyanantarotpattyarhatvaṃ kāryatvam, kintu kṛtiprayojanatve sati kṛtyanantarotpattyarhatvam । prayojanaṃ ca tadevo- cyate—yadavagatamicchāpravṛttau kāraṇam । na ceṣṭopāyataiva paramavagatā satīcchāprasavakāraṇam, kintu iṣṭatadupāyāniṣṭaparihāratadupāyānāṃ caturṇāmevecchāprasavahetutvam । sakalakāryasyaiva cāniyatakāraṇatvā- sambhavādetaccatuṣṭayānugatamevecchotpattikāraṇaṃ vaktavyam, caturṣvanyata- matvameva.... ....etadeva vā kṛtiprayojanatvam । na hi viṣabhakṣaṇe kaṇṭakamardane vā evambhūtakṛtiprayojanatve sati kṛtyanantarotpattya- rhatvamastīti na tena vyabhicāra iti ।

tadetadarthaśūnyaṃ bhrāmakameva paraṃ vacanam । na hīṣṭopāyāti-
riktā'nyā koṭissamasti, aniṣṭaparihārasyāpīṣṭatvādaniṣṭapari- hāropāyasyāpīṣṭopāyatvāt । tatra cecchāprasavahetutvaṃ svabhāvasundara- tvādiṣṭasyaiva paraṃ na tviṣṭopāyasya, apriyatvena svato duḥkhahetutaye- cchotpādakatvāsambhavāt । kintu phalameva svagatāmicchāmutpādya svopāyatayā tatrāpīcchāmutpādayati । etacca lipsādhikaraṇa eva prapañcitam । tena sādhanasyecchājanakatvānna prayojanatvam । ataḥ kathaṃ kṛtiprayojanatvaviśeṣitamapi kāryatvaṃ pravṛttijanakamiti । atha tanmā bhavatviṣṭopāyasyecchājanakatvam, icchāviṣayatvaṃ tāvadasti । na ca viṣabhakṣaṇakaṇṭakamardanayoricchāviṣayatvamasti । tenecchāviṣayatva- viśeṣitameva kāryaṃ pravṛttiheturbhaviṣyatīti । tadapyayuktam; sādhanasya hīcchāviṣayatvaṃ phalajanyamityuktam । tacca phalasādhanatvāvagamādhīna- meveti tadeva pravṛttinimittam । tenecchādvāreṇeṣṭopāyatāyā eva pravṛttihetutvaṃ loke'pīti kāryasya pravṛttihetutve vyutpattiviraha eveti ।

bhavatu vā loke kāryasya pravṛttihetutvam, tathāpi vede'pūrvarūpa- kāryopasthitistu kutaḥ ? tathā hi—kimatra liṅabhidheyaṃ pravṛttini- mittaṃ kāryaśabdenābhimatam, kiṃ kṛtyuddeśyaṃ pradhānaṃ paramparayā kṛti- pū. mī., 4. 1. 1.
sādhyam ? atha sākṣādevānyoddeśapravṛttakṛtyutpādyam ? atra na tāvatpūrvaḥ; tathātve phalasyaiva kāryatvāt । na hi kṛtyuddeśyaṃ pradhānaṃ paramparayā kṛtisādhyaṃ phalātiriktaṃ loke dṛṣṭam । nāpi dvitīyaḥ; tathātve ca dhātvarthasyaiva kāryatvāt । na hi sākṣādanyoddeśapravṛtta- kṛtyutpādyaṃ dhātvarthātiriktaṃ loke samadhigatam, apūrvaṃ tvetadubhayarūpā- bhāvāt kutaḥ kāryaṃm ? ato yaduktamavyavahitakāmyopāyatvameva kāryatvamiti loke samadhigatamiti, tannirastam । etadubhayarūpa- rahitasya kāryatvāsambhavāt ।

yadapi loke svasantānānusāreṇa kāryāvagamaḥ pravṛttiheturityasa- ddhyāropyābhihitam, tadapi sākṣādanyoddeśapravṛttakṛtyutpādyakriyā- rūpakāryameva । vede'pi yadi tathābhūtakāryāvagamaḥ pravṛttiheturabhidhī- yate tadiṣyata eva । na ca vācyam—yadanantaraṃ yanniṣpadyate tadeva taduddeśapravṛttakṛtaniṣpādyaṃ bhavati । tṛptyuddeśapravṛttakṛteriva bhojanam । na ca yāgānantaraṃ phalaṃ niṣpadyate; ato na yāgasya phaloddeśapravṛtta- kṛtisādhyatvamiti । yato lakṣavedhakṣaṇoddeśapravṛttā hi kṛtirjyākarṣaṇa- vimokamātranivṛttā, na ca tadanantaraṃ lakṣavedho niṣpadyate । kintarhi ? vegākhyasaṃskāraparamparayā cireṇaiva । tena kvacidanantarasya, kvacidvyava- hitopāyasyāpi loke kāryasya dṛṣṭatvādavyavahitopāyatvameva kārya- tvamiti nāsti vyutpattiḥ ।

atha tatrāpi lakṣavedhāvyavahitakriyākṣaṇasyaiva kāryatvamityu- cyate; tat kiṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvena kṛtyutpādyatvena vā ? na tāvadudde- śyatvena; lakṣavedhasyaivoddeśyatvāt । nāpi sākṣātkṛtyutpādyatvena; ādyakriyākṣaṇamātrotpādanivṛttatvāt kṛteḥ । tena yathāvāntaravyā- pāradvāreṇa vyavahitopāyasyāpi lakṣavedhasya kāryatvam, tathā yāga- syāpi svīkriyatāṃ kimapūrvakāryasvīkāravyasaneneti । tena phala- dhātvarthātiriktāpūrvākhyakāryasvarūpe vyutpattivirahaḥ । bhavatu vā- pūrvameva kāryam, tathāpi vidhiśabdābhidheyatvaṃ tasya kutaḥ ? tathāhi— svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārānyathānupapattyā avyavahitakāmyopāyarūpe kārye liṅśabdasya śaktiḥ kalpanīyā । tathā ca satyarthāpattiviṣa- yatvāttasyāpūrvatvavyāhatirdurnivāraiva ।

yaduktamarthāpatterupasthāpakatvamātram, apūrvaprāmāṇyaṃ punarli- ṅśabdavācyatva eva । yathā viśvajidādau svargakāmapada- kalpanāyāmiti । tadayuktam; viśvajidādiṣu hi svargarūpasya sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvenāvagatapūrvatayopasthitasya tatsādhyatvābhi- dhāyakaṃ svargakāmapadaṃ viśvajidvākyaśeṣatvena śrutārthāpattyā kalpyata iti yuktam । atra punarapūrvakāryasyānyato'nupasthi- tatvādapūrvatvādarthāpattipramāṇenaivopasthitirvaktavyā । pramāṇaṃ copasthā- payati, atha ca na tatra pramāṇamiti hāsyāspadameva । tatra
yadyarthāpattirapūrve pramāṇam, tatra liṅo'nuvādakatvādaprāmāṇyameva । arthāpattipramāṇādanupasthite'pūrvakārye hi liṅādibhiḥ saha vācya- vācakasambandhānavadhāraṇāt । na ca śabdasahāyāttarkkādevāpūrvopasthi- tiriti vācyam । yataḥ pramāṇopasthite khalvarthe tadviparītā- rthāntaragatāniṣṭaprasaṅgastarkkaḥ । yathā “śyenenābhicaran yajeta” iti । atraivāvagate bhāvārthasya phalasādhanatve nāmārthasyāpi phalasādhanatve adṛṣṭāntarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ । na cātrānyathānupapatteḥ prāk śabdā- dapūrvasyopasthitiriti satyapyapūrvakāryatve sambandhāgraharūpo'paro vyutpattivirahaḥ । tadayaṃ saṃkṣepārthaḥ—

dūṣaṇāntarāṇi tu vistarabhayānnoktāni । tadetatsarvathā'pūrva- kāryābhidhānaṃ vidhiśabdasyābhidhānato yathā yathā nirūpyate, tathā tathā kadalīkāṇḍe'ntassāravicārasamānamevetyalamatisvapnasya vika- tyaneneti yathāvārtikamevāpūrvapramāṇaṃ prastūyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṭṭamatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
arthāpattirevāpūrve pramāṇamiti । tathā hi— “darśapūrṇamāsā- bhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” ityatra viddhyavaruddhā bhāvanā svargakāma-
padopanītaṃ puruṣārthībhūtaṃ svargameva sādhyaṃ parigṛhya sādhanākāṃ- kṣiṇī yāgameva samānapadopāttaṃ sādhanatayā gṛhṇatī kālā- ntarabhāvini svarge bhaṅgino yāgasya sādhanatvamavagatamanupapadyamā- namapūrvarūpaṃ yāgajanyamavāntaravyāpārabhūtaṃ cirasthāyi kalpayati । na ca vācyam—sarvatra vyāpāraviśiṣṭasyaiva vyāpāriṇaḥ sādhanatvaṃ bhavati, na tu nivṛtte vyāpāriṇi vyāpāramātrasyeti । yato dhanu- rjyākarṣaṇamokṣaṇasyātikrāntasyāpyavāntaravyāpāraparamparādvāreṇa ci- reṇāpi lakṣavedhasādhanatvadarśanāt । ata eva yatkenāpyuktam— yadvidyamānavyāpārijanita evāvāntaravyāpāra ityutpattyapūrvavyahitasya paramāpūrvasya nāvāntaravyāpāratvamiti tadapi parāstam; yenāneka- vyāpāraparamparayā vyavahitasyāpyantimavegākhyasaṃskārajanyasya kri- yākṣaṇasya lakṣavedhoddeśapravṛttadhanurjyākarṣaṇamokṣaṇāvāntaravyāpāra- tvadarśanāt । kiñcārthāpatteranyathāpyupapattiranyathaivopapattiriti dūṣaṇa- dvayam । tenānumānadūṣaṇaṃ viśeṣavirodhamabhidadhatā'rthāpattidūṣaṇā- parijñānamevātmanaḥ prakaṭitamiti ।

yadapyuktam—kāryakāraṇayorayaugapadyātsarvatra pūrvabhāvina eva kāraṇatvam, tena yathānantarapūrvabhāvinastathārthāpattyā kvaciccirapūrva- bhāvino'pi yāgasya bhaviṣyatīti । tadayuktam; kāraṇatvaṃ hi kāryotpattiśaktiyogitvam । na cātītasya śaktiyogitvaṃ sambhavati ।
kathaṃ tarhi pūrvabhāvinaḥ kāraṇatvamiti cet—ucyate; dvayī hi kāryasyāvasthā—utpannāvasthā, utpadyamānāvasthā ca । tatrotpannā- vasthāyāṃ kāraṇasya pūrvabhāvitvameva । tadabhiprāyeṇocyate anantara- pūrvabhāvikāraṇamiti । utpadyamānadaśāyāntu kāryotpattiśaktiyogi kāraṇaṃ vidyata eva । sarvatrotpadyamānadaśāyāṃ kāraṇasya vidyamāna- tvāt । kathaṃ cirātivṛttasya kāraṇatvamiti ? tenaiva śabdāvabodhita- sādhanatvānupapattyā tadupapādakamapūrvaṃ kalpyata iti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 390 )
