nanvevaṃ bhavatu kṣaṇikasya yāgasya cirabhāviphalakaraṇatvānya- thānupapattyā phalāpūrvamekam । apūrvāntarāṇi tu kutaḥ ? ucyate— “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” ityatra karaṇatayā parasparasahitā bhaṅginaḥ ṣaḍyāgāḥ pratīyante । tena yathā phalakaraṇatvānupapattyā phalāpūrvamekaṃ kalpyam, tathā kṣaṇikānāṃ sāhityānupapattyotpattyapūrvāṇyapi kalpyanta eveti nānupapannam । te ca ṣaḍyāgāḥ kālasambandhitayā samu- dāyadvayāpannāḥ “darśapūrṇamāsābhyām” iti karaṇavibhaktyā vivakṣita- sāhityāḥ karaṇatayā pratīyante । teṣāṃ ca samudāyadvayāpannānā-
maṅgānyudīcyāni yathā prayājādīni sādhāraṇāni, asādhāra- ṇānyapi tathā bahūni santyeva । tadyathā—“caturhotrā paurṇamāsī- mabhimṛśet, pañcahotrāmāvāsyām” iti caturhotṛpañcahotṛmantrāṇā- masādhāraṇāṅgatvam, tathā “saṃsthāpya paurṇamāsīṃ vaimṛdhamanunirvapati” iti vaimṛdhasya karmaṇaḥ paurṇamāsyaṅgatvamiti । aṅgaṃ ca tadbhavati, yatsvarūpe kārye vopakaroti । tatrodīcyāṅgānāṃ svarūpopayogā- bhāvāt kārya evopayogo vaktavyaḥ । tena sāṅgā paurṇamāsī ekaṃ samudāyāpūrvaṃ janayati । tathaivāmāvāsyā'paraṃ samudāyāpūrvamiti । na ca phalāpūrva eva kārye udīcyāṅgopayoga iti vaktavyam । asā- dhāraṇāṅgopadeśasyāsādhāraṇakāryavyatireke'nupapatteḥ । anyathā eka- phalāpūrvaprayuktatvena prayājādivatteṣāmapi sādhāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt । kiṃ ca yatra vibhinnasamudāyasādhyamekaṃ kāryam, tatra prātyātmikasamudāya- sādhyāvāntarakāryadvāreṇaiva । yathā padātmakavarṇasamudāyānāṃ padārthajñānāvāntarakāryadvāreṇa vākyārthajñānamiti vyutpattivaśādutpa- ttyapūrvāṇāṃ phalāpūrvasādhanatvānupapattyā sāṅgasamudāyadvayajanyamapūrva- dvayameva kalpyata iti ।
chapter.footnote: “pṛthivī hotā” ityādiko mantraścaturhotā । “agnirhotā” ityādiko- mantraḥ pañcahotā ।
chapter.p: nanvevaṃ tarhi samudāyāpūrvadvayamevāvyavahitaphalasādhanamastu, kiṃ paramaphalāpūrvasvīkāreṇa ? ucyate—kartturiṣṭaphalaniṣpādakatā phalā- vyavahitaikakāryadvāreṇaiva, yathā kuvindasya tantusaṃyoganiṣpādanadvāreṇa paṭaniṣpādakatvamiti vyutpatyā samudāyāpūrvadvayasyāvyavahitaphala- sādhanatvānupapatyā phalāpūrvamekaṃ kalpyata ityapūrvanavakasiddhiḥ । tadapūrvanavakaśākhini cāropacārabālavalabhībhujaṅgaḥ saṅgatasopānakaṃ cakre ।

atra ca pratipadādhikaraṇāpūrvādhikaraṇayorbhāvārthādhikaraṇa- parikaratvādbhāvārthādhikaraṇa prayojanenaiva prayojanavatvam । bhāvārthā- dhikaraṇaprayojanañcaivam—yadi dravyaguṇayāḥ phalasambandhastadā apratinidhānam, adṛṣṭakāryatvena tatsadṛśasya dravyādestatkāryatvā- navadhāraṇāt । bhāvārthasya tu phalasādhanatve, dravyābhāve tatsadṛśa- dravyāntarasya dṛṣṭakāryatvena pratinidhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—apūrvaṃ punarasti, yadārambhaścodanā । ārabhyata ityārambhaḥ phalabhāvanaivocyate । saiva codyamānā apūrvasadbhāve pramāṇamityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ tānidvaidhādhikaraṇam ।।
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: avagatametadbhāvaśabdāḥ pradhānakarmaṇo vācakā iti । bahuprakā- rāñca bhāvaśabdāḥ—yajati dadāti juhotītyevaṃprakārāḥ, avahanti dogdhi pinaṣṭi vilāpayatītyevamādayaśca । teṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ sarve pradhānakarmaṇo'bhidhāyakaḥ ? uta kecidnuṇakarmaṇa iti । bhāvārthebhyo'- pūrvamiti vyutpādite sarveṣāmevākhyātapadānāṃ bhāvārthatvāviśeṣātsarvebhya evāpūrvaprasaktāvidānīṃ tadapavādārthaṃ guṇapradhānavivekaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yathā yajati dadāti juhotī- tyādiṣu bhāvanā bhāvyamapūrvameva dhātvarthasya sannidhivaśād gṛhṇāti prayojanatayā sādhyam, tathā'vahanti dogdhi pinaṣṭi vilāpayatītyādi- ṣvapi bhāvanābhāvyamapūrvameva dhātvarthasya prayojanatayā sādhyaṃ yuktam । ataḥ sarveṣāmeva pradhānakarmatvamaviśeṣāt । nanu “vrīhīnarvahanti” ityādiṣu dvitīyāśrutyā vrīhyādīnāmeva samabhivyāhṛtāvaghātādi- kriyāpekṣayā prādhānyamavagamyate । ataḥ kathaṃ karmaṇaḥ prādhānyameva । maivam; lokavedayordvitīyāyāḥ prādhānyābhidhānavyabhicārāt ।
tathāhi—loke tāvat ‘upādhyāyāya gāṃ dadāti’ ityādiṣvanī- psitakarmaṇyapi dvitīyā dṛśyata eva । tathā vede'pi saktumārutaikaka- pālādiṣu, “saktūñjuhoti” “ekakapālaṃ juhoti” ityādiṣu dvitīyā śrūyata eva । na ca saktvādīnāṃ prādhānyamasti । ato nātra dvitīyā- śrutyā vrīhyādīnāṃ prādhānyamavagamyata iti । na ca vācyam— vaituṣyarūpadṛṣṭopakāradvāreṇa sāmavāyikatve sambhavati yāgādivadapūrvadvā- reṇārādupakārakatvamayuktamiti । yato vaituṣyārthatvenāvaghātavidhau sati dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ sāmavāyikatvaṃ ca bhavati, vidheścāprāptaviṣayatvāt । na ca pramāṇāntaraviṣayavaituṣyopāyo vidhiḥ sambhavatītyadṛṣṭārthatvameva । na ca niyamasyāprāptatvānniyamārtho'yaṃ vidhiriti vaktavyam, niyama- syāśrutatvāt । na hyatra niyamābhidhāyakaḥ kaścicchabdaḥ śrūyate । kiñca vaituṣyopāyatvenāvaghātasya prāptatvādupāyāntaranivṛttirūpo niyamo vaktavyaḥ । tathā ca sati śabdāntareṇa parisaṃkhyaivoktā bhavet । sā ca tridoṣatvādayukteti pradhānakarmatvameva ।

athocyate—na vayaṃ niyamasya śābdatvamanyanivṛttirūpatvaṃ vā brūmaḥ । kintarhi ? lokaprāptasyaivāpūrvasādhanatājñāpanam । taccāsya nivṛttiphalatvānniyama ityucyate । tadatrāvaghātasyāpūrvasādhanatvama- bhimataṃ yadvidhijñāpyaṃ kiṃ prayājādivatsākṣādevāpūrvajanakatvam ? apūrvāya vaituṣyajanakatvaṃ vā ? na tāvatsākṣāt; siddhāntinā
tadanabhyupagamāt । nāpyapūrvāya vrīhivaituṣyajanakatvam; tasyāpi lokata eva prāptatvāt । athaivaṃ sati lokānusāreṇa dalanāderapyapū- rvasādhanatvaprāptyai vidhiriti cet—naitat; tathā sati parisaṃkhyāpatterna niyamavidhitvam। tasmāt prayājādivadapūrvārthatvamevāvaghātādīnāmiti। evañca sati ‘yadaikasmādapūrvaṃ tadetarattadartham’ iti nyāyena vrīhyādidra- vyāṇāmavaghātārthatvātsarveṣāmevākhyātānāṃ pradhānakarmābhidhāyitvam, tataścāpūrvabheda evetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedetadevaṃ yadyubhayamatra dravyaṃ kriyā ca vidhīyate । tadā hi dvayoreva prayojanākāṅkṣāyāṃ dravyasya dṛṣṭakriyāniṣpādakatvenaiva prayojanākāṅkṣānivṛttiḥ । karmaṇastu dṛṣṭāsambhavādadṛṣṭārthatvameva kalpyata iti prayuktam । yadā tu vākyāntarapratipāditaprayojanaṃ dravyamupāttaṃ, tadā karmaṇo'pi tadapekṣitadṛṣṭopakāranirvartanenaiva prayojanatvānnādṛṣṭa- kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti । ihāpi “vrīhīnavahanti” ityādau “vrīhi- bhiryajeta” ityādivākyapratipāditaprayojanameva vrīhyādidravyamupāttam, tathā vidhīyamānasyāvaghātādikarmaṇo'pi tadapekṣitataṇḍulādirūpa- dṛṣṭopakāranirvartanenaiva prayojanatvānnādṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti ।
taduktam—

(taṃ. vā. 406) na caivaṃ satyavaghātāderdṛṣṭavaituṣyopāyatvasya prāptatvānna tadarthatayā vidhervaiyarthyamiti vaktavyam । yato vrīhīṇāṃ taṇḍulādi- nirvṛttidvāreṇa yāgasādhanatvāttaṇḍulanirvṛttirūpārthākṣepeṇāvaghātaprā- ptirvaktavyā । na ca śraute vidhau satyākṣepaḥ sambhavati । tenākṣepāt prāgeva śrautasya vidheḥ prāptaviṣayatvam । na ca vināpi vidhinā prāpsyataḥ kiṃ vidhineti vidhivaiyarthyam । aprāptāṃśapūraṇenaivārthavatvāt । tathāhi—nityabhūtā khalu prāptirvidhito'vagamyate, ākṣepataśca pākṣi- kī । anyasyāpi vaituṣyopāyasyākṣepāviśeṣāt । tena yasmin pakṣe nāvaghātaprāptistatpakṣapūraṇenāpūrvopayogitayā vidheḥ sāphalya- miti । ayameva ca niyamaparisaṃkhyayorbhedaḥ—yatpakṣaprāptaviṣayatvā- nniyavidheraprāptāṃśapūraṇameva phalam, arthādanyanivṛttiḥ । parisaṃkhyā- yāntu yugapadubhayaprāpteraprāptāṃśapūraṇābhāvādanyanivṛttireva vidheḥ phalamiti । eṣa ca niyamavidhiprakāro “vrīhibhiryaṃjeta” ityatra dravyavidhāvapyūhanīyaḥ ।

nanvatra kimavaghātādijanyamadṛṣṭamasti na vā ? na tāvannāsti, adṛṣṭamantareṇa niyamānupapatteḥ । athāsti, tadā saṃmārgādivadava- ghātāderapyadṛṣṭārthatvānnāstyadhikaraṇabheda iti । na hyavaghātāderadṛṣṭārtha- tve vidhānamanuṣṭhānaṃ vā, kintu dṛṣṭalolutvādvidhiḥ apekṣitavrīhi- vaituṣyārthameva । tasya cāprāptāṃśapūraṇena yadavaghātāderniyamānuṣṭhānapra- tipādanaṃ tadupapattaye taṇḍulādigatamadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyamānaṃ ‘na nimittaṃ vidhi- rapabādhata’ iti nyāyena na dṛṣṭārthatvamabādhitamadhikaroti । sammārgā- diṣu tu vidhya pekṣitadṛṣṭābhāvādadṛṣṭārthameva vidhānamiti bhedaḥ ।

yattu dvitīyā prādhānyaṃ vyabhicaratītyuktam, tadanantarādhikaraṇe parihariṣyāmaḥ । iha punaradvitīyāntānāmapi bahūnāṃ “prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhighārayati” “maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ prayacchati” “agnestṛṇā- nyapacinoti” “tapte payasi dadhyānayati” ityevamādīnāmapyudāharaṇa- tvādvākyāntaraklṛptaprayojanadravyasambandhena dṛṣṭopakāradarśanameva pramā- ṇamiti । taduktam—

lg.l: “yairdravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate tāni pradhānabhūtāni dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt ”
“yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta tasya dravyapradhānatvāt”

chapter.p: ato dravyaguṇatvādevamādīnāṃ nāpūrvabheda iti ।
prayojanam—vikṛtau praiyaṅgave carāvatideśaprāpto'vaghāto vrīhidravya eva kartavyaḥ, pradhānaśrutadravyāgadravyasyābādhakatvāt । atidiṣṭaprayājājyavaditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: pradhāne hi śrutaṃ dravyaṃ nāṅgadravyasya bādhakam ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 407)
siddhānte tu—priyaṅgūṇāmeva kāryāntaropayuktatvena saṃskārya- tvāttāsāmevāvaghāta iti । taduktam—

lg.l: tena hantyādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃskartavyāḥ priyaṅgavaḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 407) tathā prakṛtāvapi prayojanāni—adṛṣṭārthatve sati sarvaupadhikaṃ kṛṣṇalāvaghātavat sakṛdevāvaghātaḥ kartavyaḥ । evaṃ yavaprayoge'pi avaghātārthaṃ vrīhaya evotpādayitavyāḥ । tathā pradhānadravyavaituṣyaṃ copāyāntareṇāpi kartavyaṃ yadi pūrvaḥpakṣaḥ । siddhānte tu taṇḍulanirvṛttiparyantamavaghāto'bhyasitavyaḥ । yavaprayoge tu yavā evāvahantavyāḥ । prakṛtadravyavaituṣyañca nopāyāntareṇa kartavyamiti ।
sūtrantu—ākhyātāni dvaidhaṃ dviprakāraṃ vidhāyakāni kānici- dguṇakarmaṇaḥ, kānicitpradhānakarmaṇa iti ।

yattu kenāpi gurumatajānatā tanmatamasamyagupanyasya dūṣitam, tadupahāsāspadam । tathāhi—sa khalvevamāha—anyaniṣṭo hi bhāvārtho na vidhiviṣayo nāpūrvaviṣaya ityarthaḥ anyaniṣṭhatvaṃ ca bhāvārthasyāvagatāpūrvasādhanadravyaprayojanatvam । tathāvaghātaprokṣaṇā- diṣu vidyata iti teṣāmapūrvaviṣayatvābhāvādguṇakarmatvameva । ananya- niṣṭhastu bhāvārtho'pūrvaviṣaya eva । ananyaniṣṭhatvaṃ ca bhāvārthasyā- vagatāpūrvasādhanadravyaprayojanatvameva । tacca prayājānuyājādiṣu vidyata iti teṣāṃ pradhānakarmatvameveti । na caivambhūte pradhānakarmatve suvarṇabharaṇadānādhyayanādīni vyabhicārasthānāni bhavanti sarveṣā- mevānārabhyādhītatvenāpūrvasādhanadravyaprayojanatvānavagamāt । nāpi “yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati” itivadapūrvasambandhidravyaprayojana- tvāvagatiḥ suvarṇādīnāṃ vyabhicaritakratusambandhitvādapūrvopā- yatvānupasthiterdvitīyādyanīpsitakarmaṇyapi nānupapannā । evañca satyavaghātādiṣvanyaniṣṭhatvena bhāvārthasyāpūrvaviṣayatvāsambhavādviṣayasya ca pūrvaviśeṣāvagatihetutvādvidhiśabdenāpūrvaṃ pratīyamānaṃ kṛtamevānūdyata iti yuktam । prayājādiṣu tu apūrvasādhanadravyaprayojanatvānavagame viṣayabhāvasyoktatvādyuktā prayājādiviṣayāpūrvāntarāvagatiriti । na caivaṃ satyavaghātādīnāmapūrvāviṣayatvādavidheyatvamiti vācyam । na hyapūrvaviṣayatvaṃ vidheyatvam, kintu apūrvasiddhyarthamupādīyamānatvam ।
taccāvaghātādiṣvapyaviśiṣṭameveti । yadā yattatsiddhyarthamupādīyate tadvidheyamiti tantre vyavahāra iti sarvañcaitadavahitamatibhistattvato nirūpyamāṇamasmanmatābhinnamevāpūrvābhidhānābhidheyayoḥ paraṃ viśeṣaḥ । apūrvābhidhānaṃ cāpūrvādhikaraṇa eva nirākṛtam । alamatiparapakṣaprati- kṣepamātraparatayeti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamaṃ sammārgādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
“snucaḥ sammārṣṭi” “paridhīn sammārṣṭi” “agnīn sammārṣṭi” “puroḍāśaṃ parthagnikaroti” iti śrūyate । tatra sandehahaḥ—kiṃ paryagnikaraṇaṃ sammārjanañca pradhānakarma, uta guṇakarmeti । pūrvādhikaraṇe “tāni dvaidham” ityabhidhāya pradhānakarmaguṇakarmalakṣaṇaṃ
sūtradvayenoktam । idānīṃ kvacidviṣayaviśeṣe sammārgādau pradhānakarmā- pavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-‘yaistu dravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate tāni pradhānabhūtāni dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt’ iti pradhānakarmalakṣaṇamuktam । na ca srugādiṣu sammārgādijanyacikīrṣito vidhyapekṣitaḥ kaścidupa- kāro dṛśyate । ato ‘dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisambandhaḥ’ tathā ‘bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate’ iti nyāyena srugā- didravyāṇāmeva sammārgādirūpakarmārthatvāt prayājādivat pradhāna- karmatvameveti ।

nanu mā nāmāvahantyādivatpramāṇāntareṇa dravyagataṃ cikīrṣita- mavagamyatām, tathāpi dvitīyāśrutirevepsitatamārthābhidhāyinī srugā- digatamadṛṣṭaṃ cikīrṣitamavagamayiṣyatīti । maivam; syādevaṃ yadi dvitīyā īpsitatamatvavācinī bhavet । sā tu “saktūñjuhoti” ityādiṣu vyabhicaratīti pūrvādhikaraṇa evoktam, tathāpi smaraṇamapīpsitānī- psitasādhāraṇam । tathā hi ‘karturīpsitatamaṃ karma’ (pā. sū., 1.4.49) iti smaryate ‘tathāyuktaṃ cānīpsatam’ (pā. sū.,1.4.50) ityāpi । tena kriyājanyatvameva sarvatrāvyabhicārāt dvitīyārthaḥ । tatpradhāna-
karmatve'pyaviruddhameva । nanu vākyāntaraklṛptaprayojanamatra srugādi- dravyam, aklṛptaprayojanañca sammārgādi karma । klṛptaprayojanayośca sambandhaḥ, klṛptaprayojanañca sammārgādi karma । klṛptaprayojanayośca sambandhaḥ, klṛptaprayojanārthatvenaivāklṛptaprayojanaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam । ‘apekṣitavidheranapekṣitavidhānaṃ durbalam’ iti nyāyena dṛṣṭopakārābhāve'pi dvitīyā īpsitatamābhidhānamapyuktanyāyādeva klaptaprayojanasrugādidravyārthatvāt sammārgādīnāṃ ( na ? ) guṇakarmatvaṃ sambhavatīti । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadyaklṛptādhikaraṇaṃ vidhi- ranumanyate । sa hi svarasataḥ sādhyasya sādhanamitikartavyatā- ñcākāṃkṣattadupāyabhūtaṃ dravyādikamapi ākāṃkṣati, tena vinā tada- siddheḥ । yattu dravyagataṃ saṃskārādikaṃ dṛṣṭārthadravyākāṃkṣayā sambadhya- mānaṃ tadapyākāṃkṣotthāpanenānumanyate । na ca “srucaḥ saṃmārṣṭi” ityā- diṣu srugādīnāṃ vrīhīṇāmiva dṛṣṭopakārārthamavaghātādiṣu sammārgā- diṣvapyapekṣā samasti । na ca dvitīyāśrutibalenaiva srugādīnāṃ saṃmā- rgādiṣvākāṃkṣotthāpanenākāṃkṣayā cādhikāravidherapyākāṃkṣotthāpane- nānumatiriti vaktavyam । dvitīyāśruterīpsitānīpsitasādhāraṇatvena sammārgasya saṃskārakarmatve pramāṇābhāvasyoktatvāt । ataḥ sarvathā sammārgādīnāṃ srugādipadārthatve pramāṇābhāvāt dravyacikīrṣābhāvena dharmamātramevañjātīyakaṃ (saṃ) mārgādi prayājādivat pradhānakarmatvenaiva vidhīyata ityevaṃprāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra dvitīyāśrutisamabhivyāhṛta- sammārgādikriyāpekṣaṃ srugādi prādhānyaṃ nābhidadhyāt । sā hi ‘kartu- rīpsitatamaṃ karma’ ityanuśāsanādodanaṃ pacati, kaṭaṃ karoti ityādi- prayogadarśanāccepsitatamatvalakṣaṇaṃ srugādīnāṃ prādhānyamevābhidhatte । tathā ca sati vidheḥ sāmānyenāpratipannaśeṣabhāvādīnāṃ sammārgādīnāṃ srugādisamabhivyāhṛtānāṃ srugādigatameva śeṣitvaṃ bodhayatīti guṇaka- rmatve dvitīyāśrutireva pramāṇāmiti । nanu “saktūñjuhoti” ityādiṣu dvitīyepsitatamatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ vyabhicaratītyuktam । maivam; tatrāpīpsitatamatvarūpaprādhānyāvyabhicārāt । yattu karaṇatvarūpaṃ guṇatvaṃ, tallākṣaṇikameva । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 410) nanu mukhyā'nabhidhāne lakṣaṇā bhavati । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 354)

kathaṃ punaḥ saktuprādhānyaṃ viruddhyate, yena virodhādguṇabhāvo lakṣaṇīyaḥ । ucyate-yasya kvacidupayogo nirvṛtto bhaviṣyatīti vāva- dhāryate tatsaṃskārārthatvāt karmaprādhānyaṃ pratipadyate । na ca saktūnāṃ bhūtabhāvyupayogaḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: saktavo nopayokṣyante nopayuktāśca te kvacit ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ato guṇabhāvalakṣaṇayā saktusādhanakahomavidhānamevaitaditi siddham । sā ca lakṣaṇā mukhyārthatātparyānupapattyā bhavati । iha mukhyārthaparatvasyaivāsambhavāllakṣaṇeti । tenepsitatamatvarūpaprādhā- nyābhidhāyidvitīyābalena guṇakarmatvameva sammārgādīnāmiti ।

nanu karmaṇi dvitīyā smaryate । karmatvantu yathepsitatamasya, tathā- nīpsitasyāpyaviśiṣṭam, ‘tathā yuktañcānīpsitam’ (pā.sū., 1.4.50) ityādyanuśāsanāviśeṣāt । ataḥ kathamīpsitatamatvameva dvitīyā iti । ucyate-na hyalaukikaṃ karmatvarūpamatra pāṇininābhihitam, kintu kriyata iti vyutpattyā manipratyayato'yaṃ karmaśabdaḥ । cetanena ca tadeva kriyate yadīpsitatamam, icchāpūrvakatvāt kriyāyāḥ । atastadeva mukhyaṃ karma । tenoktaṃ ‘karturīpsitatamaṃ karma’ iti । anyeṣāṃ tvanīpsitādīnāṃ kriyāvyāpyatvamātraparo'yaṃ karmaśabdo
dvitīyāprayogārthameva pāṇininā prayukta iti vevektabyam । ataḥ siddhaṃ sammārgādīnāṃ guṇakarmatvamiti ।

yattu prabhākareṇepsitānīpsitasādhāraṇaṃ kriyājanyaphalabhā- gitvameva karmatvaṃ tadeva ca dvitīyārtha ityuktam । tatrāpādānasyāpi vibhāgalakṣaṇasya kriyājanyaphalabhāgitvena karmatvaprasaṅgaḥ । atha mataṃ caturvidhaṃ hi karma—utpādyaṃ, prāptavyaṃ, vikāryaṃ, saṃskāryañceti । ato nānyatkarmatvaṃ kintūtpattiprāptivikṛtisaṃskṛtirūpaphalacatuṣṭaya- bhāgitvameva । tadayuktam—gāṃ dogdhi gopālaka ityatroktotpattyā- dyanyatamaphabhāgitvābhāvādgorakarmatvaprasaṅgāt । tasyāśca karmatvam ‘akathitañca’ (pā. sū., 1. 4. 51) ityena sūtreṇa sūtritam । atha dohe dugdhayuktāvasthābhāvena dugdhaviyuktāvasthāpattyā vikārakarmatvameva gorityucyate, tarhi ‘nagarādgrāmaṃ rājā gacchati’ ityatrā'pi rājaviyuktāvasthāpattyā nagarasyāpi karmatvādapādānatvaṃ na syāditi yatkiñcidetat ।

atra sammārgasya pradhānakarmatve guṇakarmatve cānuṣṭhānāviśeṣāt prakṛtau vicāraprayojanasyādarśanāt bhāṣyakāreṇa vikṛtau varuṇa- praghāse prayojanamuktam । tatra “śamīmayyaḥ snuco bhavanti” iti vidhīyamānā śamī prakaraṇena pradhānībhūtavaruṇapraghāsārthā । tadyadi
pradhānakarmatvaṃ saṃgārgasya tadā tadarthaṃ prakṛtivannānāvṛkṣīyā eva sruca utpādayitavyāḥ, pradhānāṅgānāmaṅgadravyābādhakatvāt । guṇakarma- tve tu pradhānagṛhītānāṃ śamīmayīnāmeva kāryopayogāttāsāmeva sammārga iti ।

tadetadvārtikakārapādā nānumanyante । ayañca teṣāmabhisandhiḥ- yathā “barhiṣi havīṃṣyāsādayati” iti prakṛtau prakaraṇena pradhāna- sambandhinā sāṅgapradhānahavirāsādanārthaṃ, tathātrāpi sruṅmātrānuvā- dena vidhīyamānā śamī pūrvapakṣe'pyaṅgapradhānārthaiveti । taduktam—
atha prakṛtāvayaṃ nyāyaḥ, vikṛtau tu pradhānamātrasaṅgatirevāṅgā- nām । tadā prayājādisrucāmapi prākṛtanānājātyutpādanaprasaṅgaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 414)

kiñca-yadi pradhānasruṅmātrasambandho'pi śamyā bhavettathāpi yathā saumikī triṃśaddhastaparimāṇā mahāvediratideśaprāptadīkṣaṇī- yādisambaddhadārśapaurṇamāsikacaturhastaṃ vedikāryaṃ parimāṇānādareṇa
prasaṅgena sādhayati, tathā pradhānārthopāttaśamīmayasrugbhireva jāti- manādṛtyātideśikanānāvṛkṣīyasrukkāryasiddherna tadarthaṃ nānāvṛkṣīyasru- gupādānamiti ।

atraike samādhānamevamabhidadhati-sarvatra khalvaṅgānāṃ karaṇopakā- rasambandhadvārakārye'ṅgavidhānaṃ sambhavati, tattvapūrvīyanirūḍhakāryatvātsa- nnihitapadārthāśrayatvenaivāṅgavidhirvyavatiṣṭhate । vikṛtau tu prakṛtiklṛpta- karaṇopakārasambandhadvārakāryasyātideśaprāptatvāt, itarathā prakṛtiva- dvikṛtāvapi tasyākalpanīyatvaprasaṅgāt tasminneva vidhiriti sthitam । tadevaṃ sati “śamīmayyaḥ snuco bhavanti” iti vidhīyamānā śamī praka- raṇena pradhānārthā satī prakṛtiklṛptapradhānīyakaraṇopakārasambandhadvāra- kāryameva srukchabdopasthāpitamapekṣyamāṇā prakṛtiprāptaparṇatādinānā- jātīyasruṅnirākāṃkṣasaṃmārgarūpaṃ srukkāryaṃ parityajya tatraiva vidhīyata iti yuktam । na ca sammārgasrucāvapi prakṛtau pradhānīyakaraṇopakārakatvaṃ dīkṣaṇīyāvāi/?/ yamavat srucaḥ saṃmārṣṭityananyagativākyopādānabalena saṃmārgāpūrvagṛhītatvena pradhānāpūrveṇa gṛhītatvāt । ato na tatkārye śamīvidhiriti । tadarthaṃ nānājātyutpādanameva । barhiṣāṃ tu prakaraṇena pradhānāpūrvagṛhītatve'pyaṅgahavirahāsādanasya cāṅgāpūrvagṛhītatvena prākṛ- tānāṃ karaṇopakārakārye vidhānāsambhavād dvayorapyaṅgapradhānahavirāsā- danayorāśrayasākāṃkṣatvāt vākyātprakaraṇabādhena yuktamupakārakatāmā-
trapuraskāreṇobhayārthatvam । na ca “vedyāṃ barhiṣi havīṃṣyāsādayati” ityāśrayanairākāṃkṣye sati prakaraṇātpradhānahavirāsādanasambandha eva barhiṣāṃ nāṅgahavirāsādanasambandha iti vaktavyam । dvayorekavā- kyopāttayorvedibarhiṣoryugapadaṅgapradhānahavirāsādanāśrayatvādavirodhena samuccayena samanvayāt । vikṛtau tu prākṛtāṅgasambandhottarakālīnatvāt vaikṛtāṅgasambandhasya nairākāṃkṣyamiti vaiṣamyam । na cātrāpi vaikṛtapradhānāpūrvagṛhītatve'pi śamyā upakārakatāmātrapuraskāreṇobhayā- rthatvamiti vaktavyam । vaikṛtaprakṛtiklṛptapradhānīyakaraṇopakārasambandha- dvārakāryāśrayatvasya vyavasthitatvātsammārgasya prakṛtiklṝptapradhānīyakara- ṇopakārasambandhisrugdvārakāryatvāsambhavasyoktatvāddīkṣaṇīyāvatpradhā- nāpūrvagṛhītatvātsammārgasrucām ।

kiñca vaikṛto hi śamīvidhiratideśaprāptaparṇatāmabādhamāno niviśate, tatra prakaraṇānurodhena pradhānīyasrukprakṛtidravyabādhenaivopa- pattau nāṅgasrukprakṛtidravyabādhanamapyucitam । na hi saumikamahāvedyu- padeśena dīkṣaṇīyādiṣvātideśikadārśapaurṇamāsikavedibādhaḥ pare- ṇāpi svīkartavyaḥ । tathā sati vediprasaṅgadūṣaṇānavakāśāt । ata eva “ṣaḍibhardīkṣayati” ityatrāpyabādhasambhave sati nātideśika- mantraḥ ṣaḍbādhakaḥ । prakṛtau tu barhiṣāmaṅgapradhānahavirāsādanasamba-
ndhe'pi na kasyacidbādha iti । ato na barhiṣā sāmyam । evaṃ sati srugrūpasya nānājātikāryasya prakṛtau darśanādyadi srugrūpa- parṇatākārye'pi śamyā vidhiḥ, tathāpi sammārgasrucāṃ na śamīmayītvam । yato'nārabhyādhītāyāḥ parṇatāyāḥ srugdvāreṇāṅgapradhānāpūrvagṛhītāyāḥ pṛthagevāpradhānāpūrvīyakaraṇopakārasambandhisrugrūpadvārakāryakalpanānna pra- dhānīyakaraṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryatvam, sammārgīyasrugrūpaṃ parṇatā- kāryasyāpīti ।

kiñca vidherautsargikāvyavahitabhāvārthaviṣayatvātparṇatāṃ lakṣayi- tvā tatkāryatvena svātmani lakṣyamāṇe lakṣitalakṣaṇāprasaṅgācca srukkārye vidhirityucyate । yadyapi parṇatākārye'pi vidhiḥ, tathāpi sammārgasrugvarjanameveti na doṣaḥ । taduktam—‘yatra hmaṅgapradhānārtha eka evopadeśavidhiḥ kāryavidhirapi tatra tathaiva । yatra punarupadeśavidhibhedaḥ kāryavidhirapi tatra prakaraṇātpradhānasyaiveti darśitam-ānarthakyāttadaṅge- ṣviti’ । asyārthaḥ—upadeśavidhiriti grāhakopadeśavidhiḥ । sa yatrāṅge ca pradhāne ca yaḥ sambandhī padārthaḥ, tasmā eka eva grāhako bhavati । vikṛtāvapi tatra prakṛtiklṛptakaraṇopakārasambandha- dvārakārye vidhiraṅgapradhānasādhāraṇa eveti । yathā prakṛtau darśapūrṇamā- sīyagrāhakādhikāravidhigṛhītānāṃ barhiṣāṃ kārye vikṛtau śaravidhiḥ । ata eva prayājādiṣu srucāmapi śamīmayītvam, tāsāmapi barhirvadekaika-
grāhakāpūrvagṛhītānāmu pakārakatā puraskāreṇāṅgapradhānahomarūpadvārakārya- sambandhāviśeṣāt । yatra punarupadeśavidhibheda iti, grāhakāpūrvabhedaḥ । yathā “juhvā juhoti” “snucaḥ sammārṣṭi” iti, vikṛtāvapi tatra sammārgavidhiḥ prakaraṇātpradhānasyeva sammārgasrucāṃ sammārgāpūrvagṛhī- tatvena pradhānagrāhakādhikāravidhisambandhābhāvāt ।

ye tu yatra hyaṅgapradhānārtha eka upadeśavidhirityaṅgapradhānasādhā- raṇa eva viniyogavidhyabhiprāyeṇa pracakṣate, teṣāṃ prakṛtau pṛthagā- dhvaryavacamasākhyayā ṛtviksamākhyayā ca pṛthaṅgapradhānasa- mbandhinyadhvaryukārye ṛtvikārye ca “yo hotā so'dhvaryuḥ” “ye yajamānāsta ṛtvijaḥ” iti vikṛtau na hotṛyajamānasambandho bhavet । grāhakopadeśavidhigṛhītānāṃ vikṛtau karaṇopakāra- sambandhidvārakāryagaveṣaṇe vibhinnasamākhyākalpitānāmapi nānā- kāryaṇāṃ pradhānagṛhītādhvaryusambandhena pradhānīyakaraṇopakāra- kadvārakāryakalpanamucitameva । nāpi saumikavedidakṣiṇānyāyena, prasaṅgādeva pradhānīyasrucāṃ sammārgasiddherna tadarthaṃ nānāvṛkṣī- yasrugupādānam । prayogaprāśubhāvārthe hi prayogavidhiḥ guṇānādareṇāpyanyārthānuṣṭhitasyāpyanyopakārakatvamanumanyate । tena yasyaiva prayogaviddhyākṣiptaṃ prayogāntaḥpatitamupādānam, tasyaivopā- dānaprasaṅgaviṣayatvam, “saumikavedidakṣiṇā” ityādi “saumikavedi-
dakṣiṇayoḥ” ityanto grantho (nālikhiyo ?) ścaivaṃrūpatvādbhavatu prasaṅgeno- pakāratvam । srucāñca dravyārjanavatprayogādbahireva kratuvidhyarthamupādā- nānna prasganyāyaviṣayatvamiti । kiñca santyevāgnihotrārthā dvijāteragnihotriṇo nityaṃ hi nānāvṛkṣīyā prasaṅgā.... ....iti(?) । na ca yajamānagṛhāvasthitatvāttāsāṃ yajñadeśāsambhavācchamīmayī- nāṃ prasaṅga eveti vaktavyam, kenāpyāgantukakāraṇena yajñadeśānayane sati prayojanasambhavāt । atassūktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa srugudāharaṇa- prayojanamiti ।

atrocyate—yo'yaṃ srukchabdopalakṣitakāryadvāreṇopakārasamba- ndhidvārakāryāśrayo vidhiḥ, sa kiṃ prakṛtyavadhāritavidhisvarūpānuro- dhena ? kalpanābhayena vā ? tatra na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ-prākṛtāṅgavidhera- pūrvīyapadārthāśrayatvasvīkārāt । athāṅgānāṃ prakṛtāveva karaṇo- pakārasambandhidvārakāryajanakatvāttatraiva vidhirucita ityavadhāritam । kintu prakṛtau prathamaṃ karaṇopakārasyāklṛptatvādvidherapūrvīyapadārthamātrā- śrayatvam, vikṛtau prakṛtiklṛptasyopakāradvārakāryasyātideśaprāptestatraiva vidhiriti । maivam; cetanapravartanātmako hi vidhiḥ । cetanapravṛttiśca sarvatra puruṣārthasambandhaviṣayiṇī । tadayaṃ vidhiḥ pravartyapuruṣaṃ prati pravṛttiviṣayasya puruṣārthasambandhajñānamavyavahitamevāpekṣate । nanu paramparāsambandhāt, na; apūrvīyakaraṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryajana-
katve'pyaṅgānāṃ taddvāreṇa paramparāpūrvasambandhāt tatparityajya sarvatra puruṣārthībhūtādhikārāpūrvīyaśabdamātramapekṣamāṇo vidhira- pūrvīyapadārthaviṣaya evocitaḥ, dvārakāryasya tu tannirvāhakatvam । ato nocita evāyamaucityabhramo mandānāmiti ।

nāpi dvitīyaḥ—samabhivyāhārānupapattyā hi lakṣaṇā bhavati, yathā ‘gaṅgāṃ ghoṣo vasati’ iti । na cātra srukpadārthasya śamīmayatva- samabhivyāhāro nopapadyate । samabhivyāhṛtapadārthāvagataviśiṣṭārthā- nupapattyā tu yat kalpanīyaṃ talallākṣaṇikam । yathā ‘pīno divā na bhuṅkakte’ ityatra rātribhojanam । kalpanābhayena tu lakṣaṇāyāṃ tasyāpi lākṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tenāpūrvīyaśamīsamabhivyāhārānupa- pattyā prakṛtivadeva srucāmapyapūrvīyatvaṃ lakṣyatām, tadatiriktantu karaṇopakāṃrādikamatrāpi kalpanīyameveti । kiñca srukkārye śamīvidhau padaśruterapyānarthakyaṃ (?) tadvikārabāhulyayorasambhavāt ।

athaitaddoṣaparihārārthamevamabhidhīyate—yattu prakṛtiklṛptakaraṇopa- kārasambandhidvārakāryasādhanasrukpadārthapradhānaprakṛtitvenaiva śamī vidhī- yata iti, tena karaṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryapuraskāreṇa srucāṃ śamī- vidhirityucyate । nanu srugarthaparityāgena nikṛṣṭa eva kāryavidhiriti । evaṃ tarhi sutarāmeva na kāryalakṣaṇā । yataḥ samabhivyāhārānupapattyā
hi lakṣaṇā bhavati । na ca śamīsamabhivyāhāraḥ srukpadārthasya karaṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryalakṣaṇāmantareṇa nopapadyate । apūrvīya- tvamātralakṣaṇayaiva prakṛtivikārābhāvasyopapannatvādeva hyuddeśyagatavi- śeṣaṇāntaragatavivakṣā, tadā vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ syāt । ato na katha- ñcidapi lakṣitakāryāśraye vidhiḥ, kintu yathāprakṛti vikṛtāvapya- pūrvīyapadārthāśraya evāṅgavidhaḥ । tathā ca sati vākyaprakaraṇasāmañja- syānurodhena barhirvadaṅgapradhānārthatvena śamyādividhiriti barhirmudrārthaḥ । bhavatu vā prakṛtiklaptakaraṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryāśrayo vaikṛtāṃśo vidhiḥ, tathāpi homābhinirvṛttisaṃmārgarūpakāryadvayasyāpi prātyātmi- kakaraṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryatvena prakṛtiklṛptatvāt srukkāryamātrasyaiva dvārakāryatvamiti na sammārgasrugvarjanam । na caikarūpyameva paradvārakā- ryavidheḥ, aṅgapradhānagatanānāvidhaṛtvigādikāryeṣu yajamānādi- vidhyabhāvaprasaṅgāt । na ca bhinnāpūrvagṛhītatvānnaikavidhiviṣayatva- miti vācyam । yataḥ prakṛtyanavagatasvarūparyālocanena hi vikṛtau kāryāśrayatvasvīkāraḥ । tatra ca yathā vrīhyādipadārthānuvādena vihitānāmavaghātādīnāṃ karaṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryaniṣpādanena prakṛtāvapūrvīyatvanirvāhāvagamādvikṛtāvapi tasminneva kārye'ṅgavidhiḥ, tathāṅgapradhānasya dhāraṇahavirāsādanādipadārthānuvādena vihitānāṃ barhirādyaṅgānāmaṅgapradhānahaviṣāṃ bhinnāpūrvagṛhītatvena tathākṣiptasādhana-
syāpi bhinnāpūrvagṛhītatve satyapi vākyaprakaraṇānurodhārthamapūrvopa- kārakatāsādharmyeṇāṅgapradhānasādhāraṇahavirāsādanamātrasyaiva barhi- ṣāmapūrvīyanirvāhāya karaṇopakārasambandhidvārakāryatvasvīkāṃrāt vikṛtāvapyaṅgapradhānasādhāraṇasruktvānuvādena vidhīyamānā śamī sammārgasracā aṅgāpūrvagṛhītatve'pyapūrvopakārakatāsādharmyeṇa srakkārya- mātramaṅgapradhānasādhāraṇaṃ srukchabdalakṣitaṃ karaṇopakārasambandhidvāra- kāryamāśrayiṣyati । na ca prakṛtāvaṅgahaviṣāṃ nāṅgāpūrvagṛhītatvaṃ “caturjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāti prayājebhyastadugṛhṇāti” ityādivākyaiścaturgṛhīta- jauhavājyasya dīkṣaṇīyāvāṅniyamanyāyena kevalaprayājārthapratipāda- katvāttadbalena prayājāpūrveṇaiva gṛhītatvāt ।

etaduktaṃ bhavati—prakṛtāvevāṅgavidheḥ kāryadvayaparyantatvamavagataṃ, yatra sādhāraṇānuvādenāṅgavidhiḥ, tatra sādhāraṇameva dvārakāryam । aṅgapradhānasādhāraṇānuvādena punaryatrāṅgavidhiḥ, tatropakārakatāsā- dharmyeṇa sādhāraṇameva dvārakāryamiti lakṣitakāryāśrayatve'pi barhirmu- drārthaḥ । athocyate—aṅgapradhānasādhāraṇe havirāsādanasambandhe barhiṣāṃ na sādhāraṇānuvādamātraprayojanam, kiṃ tarhi ? aṅgākāṃkṣā- pi । na cātra sā samasti, prākṛtajātinirākāṃkṣatvādityuktameveti । tadayuktam; aṅgahavirāsādanasyāpi lokānusāreṇaiva havirāśrayārhavat kiñcitsannihitadravyanirākāṃkṣatvenāsambandhaprasaṅgāt । atha lokaprā-
ptito vaidikaprāpterbalavatvāttadbādhenaiva barhiḥ sambaddhyate, tatkimidā- nīmātideśikaprāpteraupadeśikaprāptirna balavatī, yata aupadeśikena na bādhyeta ।

atha laukikaprāptiraniyatādhāradravyaviṣayatvena sandigdharūpatvā- nnāṅgahavirāsādanasya nairākākṣyam । atideśaprāptestu niyataparṇa- tādiviṣayatvātsatyapi daurbalye nairākākṣyameva sammārgasyeti । tanna; atideśaprāpternirantaramaupadeśikabādhadarśanāt । yāvadupadeśo yogyānupalambho na bhavati, tāvatsandigdhatvāttasyāñcāvasthāyāṃ balavadasandigdhapramāṇena bādha eveti nāstibarhirmudrānirastaraṇam । kiñca yathāṅgapradhānasādhāraṇānuvādenāpi vidhīyamānasya prakṛtilabdha- sādhananirākaṃkṣe'ṅge pradeśo na bhavati, tāvatsāndigdhatvāttasyāṃ cāva- vasthāyāṃ balavadasandigdhapramāṇena bādhāt “ye yajamānāsta ṛtvi- jo yo hotā so'dhvaryuḥ” ityatrāṅgakāryeṣu prākṛtaṛtvigadhvaryunirā- kāṃkṣeṣu yajamāne hotṛsambandho na syāt । tathāca sati varaṇamā- namanārthatvātsaiva na syāt, ‘vipratiṣedhe karaṇaṃ samavāyaviśeṣādita- ramanyasteṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt’ ( jai. sū., 3. 8. 21. ) iti nyāyavirodhaḥ syāt । ato yatkiñcidetaditi । ataevā- tideśikabādhabhayenāpi nopadeśasaṅkocaḥ, tatrāpyaṅgasambandhinyṛtvi- gadhvaryukārye bādhabhayenaiva yajamānahotṛnivṛttiprasaṅgāt । saumi-
kamahāvedividhistu dīkṣaṇīyātithyāderneṣyata eva । “cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt” (jai. sū., 3. 7. 7.) ityatra mahāvediḥ sarvāṅgāpyetajjyo- tiṣṭomārthatvasyaiva vārtikakārapādairuktatvāt । vederapi prasaṅganyā- yastu bhāṣyakāroktaprayojanadūṣaṇāya bhāṣyakāramatenaivoktaḥ । na ca tanmate'pyatideśabādhabhiyā mahāvedividherdīkṣaṇīyādi parityāgaḥ, kintu kvacidbādhakatvaṃ kvacidbādhānapekṣatvaṃ kvacita/?/ptakāryāśrayatvami- tyādividhivairūpyabhayenaiva । evaṃ “ṣaḍibhirdīkṣayati” ityatrāpi nātideśabādhabhayenopadeśasaṅkocaḥ । kintu prākṛtaṣaṇmantrakāryāsu dīkṣādiṣu vaikṛtaṣaṇmantrasambandhe “dvādaśa juhoti” iti vaikṛtā- bhyastāḥ ṣaḍjuhotayaḥ śrūyante । tatra kiṃ vaikṛtaireva mantrairabhyāsaḥ kriyatāṃ ? prākṛtairveti sandehe upadeśābhāvena kalpanīyo'yamabhyāsa- sambandhaḥ. atideśānugrahārthaṃ prakṛtātidiṣṭamantraṣaṭkasyaiva kalpyate । iha tūpadeśata eva sruṅmātrasambandho nātideśabādhabhiyā saṅkocamarhatīti vaiṣamyam ।

yattu kaiścit “yasyobhayaṃ havirārtimārcchet, aindraṃ pañcaśarāvamo- danaṃ nirvapet” ityatra vikṛtāvatideśaprāptasya caturmuṣṭinirvāpasyānyata- rabādhenopapattau nobhayabādha iti muṣṭimātrabādhanamatra dṛṣṭāntatvena darśitam, tadayuktam; na hi tatraupadeśiko bādhaḥ, kiṃ tarhyubhayābādhe caturmuṣṭivrīhīṇāṃ pañcaśarāvaudanāniṣpatterarthāsambhavenāvaśyake'nyatara-
bādhe prāthamyātsaṃkhyānugraheṇa muṣṭimātrabādho yukta eva । atra tvaupadeśikatvādbādhasyātulyatvamiti na kiñcidanupapannamiti । athā- ṅgānāmevātideśikī prāptiḥ, anaṅgānāṃ tu sammārgasrucāṃ vikṛtāvapyau- padeśikī, itarathā pavamāneṣṭerapyatideśaprasaṅgaḥ । tenopadeśayostulya- balatvāddarbalātideśopanītapradhānasrucāmeva bādha iti । maivam; kimatidiṣṭāṅgākṣepalabhyatvādaṅgānāmaupadeśikatvam ? atha sammā- rgoddeśena vihitānāṃ srucāṃ prakṛtivikṛtisādhāraṇa evopadeśa ? iti । na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ—atideśākṣepalabhyasyātideśato'pi jaghanya- tvena sutarāṃ bādhyatvāt । nāpi dvitīyaḥ; tathāca sati vikṛtiśruto'pi prayājoddeśena kṛṣṇalahomaḥ prakṛtāvaprakṛtāvapi prasajyeta । na ca pavamāneṣṭyatideśaprasaṅgaḥ, prakṛtāveva “yadāhavanīye juhoti” iti bahirniṣpannasyāhavanīyasyāṅgatvavidhānādvikṛtāvapi tathābhūtasyaiva tathā prāptatvāt ।

athocyeta—ātideśikatve'pyasti prāptikālavaiṣamyam, yataḥ karaṇopakārasyāṅgajanyatvena prathamaṃ sambandhaḥ, paścādaṅgābhisambandhaḥ । tatra prathamaprāptahomaḥ sruṅnirākāṃkṣo'yaṃ śamīmayīvidhirna caramabhāvi- sammārga srukprāptikālamapekṣata iti, tadayuktam; tathā sati barhi- rvidhirapi grāhakaprakaraṇābhyāṃ prathamaṃ prādhānīyahavirāsādanasyaiva prāptatvādupakāratāmātreṇa caramabhāvinīmaṅgahavirāsādanaprāptimatila-
ṅghyāt । bahiṣāṃ pradhānamātrasambandhaḥ syāt । yathāca tatra tathā- trāpīti prāptikālavaiṣamye'pi ca barhirmudrārthaḥ । viśeṣataścātra prāpti- kālavaiṣamyamapi na sambhavati । yato yenopakārapṛṣṭhabhāvena hyaṅgasamba- ndho bhavan yathābhūtānāmevopakārajananasāmarthyaṃ prakṛtāvavagataṃ, tathā- bhūtānāmevātideśikassambandho vaktavyaḥ । svāṅgasahitasyaiva prakṛtā- vupakārajanakatvāvagamātsahaiva prāpteretadapi yatkiñciditi । etacca sarvaṃ sammārgasrucāṃ dīkṣaṇīyāvāṅniyamavatsammārgāpūrvagṛhītatvamabhyu- petyoktam ।

paramārthatastu—naitatsambhavati, yato'dhikāravidhisannidhiśru- tānāmaṅgānāṃ prathamamanabhivyaktasvāpūrvāṇāmevādhikāravidhigṛhīta- tvātsammārgasrucāmapyadhikārāpūrvīyatvameva । kiñcaikavākyopāttā- nāṃ sarvatraikakāryaparatvavyutpatterekasminneva “snucaḥ sammāṣṭi” iti vākye saṃmārgasya pradhānāpūrvaparatvaṃ srucāṃ sammārgāpūrvaparatvamiti vyutpattyanurodhādapyayuktam । tena sarveṣāṃ pradhānāpūrvaparatvameveti ।

yattu svavākyasthā hi kāryāvagatirbalīyasītyuktam । tadeka- vākyagatasarvapadārthānāṃ śrutyanusāreṇaikakāryaparatvāvirodhe satīti draṣṭavyam । dīkṣaṇīyāyāntu “āgnāvaiṣṇavamekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati dīkṣiṣyamāṇaḥ” iti vākyena dravyadevatāviśiṣṭasyaiva dīkṣaṇīyāyā adhikārāpūrvānvayottarakālaṃ sambhūyopakārajananārthamapūrvāntarābhi-
vyaktau jñātāyāṃ “yāvatyā vācā kāmayate tāvatyā dīkṣaṇīyā- yāmanubrūyāt” ityanena vākyenāntaraṅgalakṣaṇayā apūrvānvayamātra- pareṇa yuktaṃ vāṅiyamasya tanmātrapratiṣṭhitatvam, na ceha tatheti vaiṣamyam । evañca sati sammārgasrucāmapi pradhānā- pūrvīyatvāddhomasrucāmapyaviśeṣācchamīmayītvameveti । yadapi prasa- ṅganyāyanirākaraṇārthaṃ srucāṃ prayogādbahirupādānaṃ saumikavedi- vaidharmyamuktam, tadayuktamuktam; vikalpāsahatvāt । tathāhi— yadetatprayogānupāttānāmapi nānāvṛkṣīyasrucāṃ yajñadeśānayanam, tatkiṃ sammārgārthena prayogavidhyuktam ? sampātāyātā vā ? pūrvasmin kalpe varuṇapraghāsārthānītānāṃ śamīmayīnāṃ tatrāpi prasaṅgo durvāraḥ evamevāgnihotropāttānāṃ yajamānagṛhavartinīnāmapi nānāvṛkṣīyasrucāṃ varuṇapraghāsadeśasammārgānayanaṃ sampātāyātatvaṃ ca nirākaraṇīyamitya- lamativistareṇeti । tasmādyathāvārtikameva srugudāharaṇaprayojana- mabhidhīyate ।

tathāhi—sruksammārgasya prakṛtau kapiñjalanyāyena tisṛbhiḥ srugbhiḥ sādhitatvātpātravivṛddhāvapi prakṛtau paśucāturmāsyeṣu tisra eva sammārṣṭavyāḥ pūrvapakṣe । siddhānte tu prayojanavatvena sarvā eva srucaḥ sammārṣṭavyāḥ saṃskārasya pratipradhānāvṛttitvāt । udāharaṇāntara- prayojanāni tu vārtika eva sugamānīti ।
sūtrantu—avahantyādivaddvitīyāśrutestulyatvāditarairavahantyā- dibhiḥ sammārgādisamānadharma syādguṇakarmetyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ stutaśastrādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: “praugaṃ śaṃsati” “niṣkevalyaṃ śaṃsati” “ājyaiḥ stuvate” “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate” iti । guṇavacanaṃ stavanaṃ śaṃsanañca । yathā “indrasya nu vīryāṇa़i pravocam” iti । yadetadguṇavacanaṃ kriyate, kimetadguṇabhūtaṃ devatāṃ prati ? uta pradhānabhūtamiti । “tāni dvaidham” ityabhidhāya sūtra- dvayena pradhānakarmalakṣaṇaṃ guṇakarmalakṣaṇañcoktam । tatra pūrvādhikaraṇena pradhānakarmalakṣaṇamapodya samprati guṇakarmalakṣaṇāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—‘yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇa- statra pratīyeta tatra dravyapradhānatvāt’ iti guṇakarmalakṣaṇam । tañcātra stotraśastrayorapyaviśiṣṭam । tathāhi—pragītamantrasādhyā stutiḥ sto-
tram । saivāpragītamantrasādhyā śastraṃ ceti । stutiśca guṇaguṇisaṅkī- rtanam, tadguṇasya prakṛtakarmānaṅgatvādekāntena bhavatu stutyarthatvam । guṇinastu prakṛtakarmopayogitvādguṇasambandhitayā tatkīrtanaṃ prakṛta- karmopayuktadevatāsmārakatayā tadarthameva yuktam । taduktam—

lg.l: stotraśastrāṇi tena syuḥ saṃskārā devatāḥ prati ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 416)

nanu stuterdevatāsaṃskāratve jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe māhendragrahayaji- sannidhiśrutasyaindrapragāthasya prakāśyabhūtendrānurodhena yatrendrastatrotkarṣaḥ prasajyeta । na cendrasyaiva mahatvaguṇayuktasya mahendratvādarthābhedādanu- tkarṣa iti vācyam । yato ‘vidhiśabdasya mantratve bhāvaḥ syāt’ (jai. sū. 10.4.23.) ityanena nyāyena yenaiva śabdena devatā vihitā- stenaiva śabdena paraṃ mantrasya devatāprakāśakatvam, na tu śabdāntareṇā । na caindrapragāthe mahendraśabdaḥ samasti । taduktam—

lg.l: śrutyā hi devatā yāge sabhavaiti na rūpataḥ ।

chapter.p: kiñca viśeṣato'trārthabhedo'pyasti । nirguṇādindrātsaguṇa- syārthāntaratvāt । taduktam—

lg.l: manāgapi tato'nyatve devateti na gamyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ.422)

ucyate—siddhe hi vidhyapekṣitastutisādhanamantraliṅgabalena yāgīyadevatāsmārakatve pramāṇabalādutkarṣo bhavanna doṣamāvahati । tathā ca darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇagatānāṃ pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrāṇāṃ pūṣādi- daivatye karmaṇyutkarṣaḥ । tenaindrapragātho yatrendro devatā tatraivotkṛṣya prayoktavyaḥ । maṇḍūkasūktasyāgnau prayogaḥ । tatra “maṇḍūkenāgniṃ vikarṣāta” iti śruteḥ । akṣasūktasya ca rājasūye, tatraiva “akṣairdī- vyati” iti vidhānāt । evamanyadapyūhanīyam । yeṣāntu kusumbha sū- ktādīnāṃ kvacidapi samaveto'rtho nopalabhyate, teṣāṃ vācastome “sarvā ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi sāmāni sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi vācastome pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti” iti vacanabalena dṛṣṭārthatā bhaviṣyatīti । tathā āśvinagrahasambandhi śastrarūpāyāṃ stutau kriyamāṇāyāṃ “yadi sūryo nodiyāt api sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāt” iti stutestatrādṛṣṭārthatayārthavattā bhaviṣyatīti । athavā vacanabalādeva vācastobhe āśvinagrahastutervṛtyantareṇaiva caindrīnyāyena samavetadevatāprakāśanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nānupapannam ।
yattu manotāmantrasthāgniśabdena yathā agnīṣomaprakāśanam, tathendraśabdā- dīnāmapi mahendraprakāśanamanutkarṣakāraṇamuktam, tadapi prauḍhavādamātram । yato “yadyapyanyadevatyaḥ paśustathāpyāgneyyeva manotā kāryā” iti etadvacanabalāttatra tathā kṛtam । na ceha tathābhūtaṃ vacanamastītyutkarṣa eveti । tena sarvatraiva stotraśastrayorguṇakarmatvānmantrāṇāṃ samavetā- rthānāṃ prakaraṇa eva devatāprakāśanam, asamavetārthānāṃ tūtkarṣa eveti yāgīyadevatāsmārakatvādyājyānuvacanavaddṛṣṭārthatvena saṃskārakarmatva- mevetyevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: apivā śrutisaṃyogātprakaraṇe stautiśaṃsatī kriyo- tpattiṃ vidadhyātām ।। 2. 1. 24. ।।
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi stutermantradvāreṇa yāgīyadevatāprakāśanārthatve sanni- dhiklṛptaśrutibādho na bhavet । tathāhi—māhendragrahayāgasannidhau “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvata” iti pṛṣṭhanāmadheyā stutirvidhīyamānā prakaraṇena māhendragrahayāgasādhanam, tathā “rathantaraṃ bhavati” iti śruterdevatāprakā- śanārthatvena guṇakarmatvam, tadā stutisahitasyaiva māhendrayāgādapa- karṣe sannidhiklṛptā śrutirbādhyeta । yadā tu devatāyāḥ stutyarthatvena
stutereva pradhānakarmatvam, tadā prakaraṇāt stutergrahayāgāṅgatvaṃ, kramācca mantrasya stutyaṅgatvamiti śruterabādha iti ।

na ca vācyam—pūṣādyanumantraṇamantravatsannidhibādhena liṅgābā- dhādutkarṣo bhaviṣyatīti । yataḥ sāmarthyarūpaṃ hi liṅgam । tacca sati sāmānyasambandhe kimanena kartavyamiti viśeṣākāṃkṣāyāṃ yaccha- knoti kartuṃ tatkuryādityevaṃ viniyuṅkte । na cātra sāmānyasambandhā- pādakaṃ kiñcitpramāṇamasti । pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrāṇāntu samākhyayā sāmānyena labdhayāgasambandhānāṃ tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ liṅgena pūṣadevatye yāge viniyogo yukta eveti vaiṣamyam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 427)

tena yadyapi mantrasya samavetārthatvaṃ sambhavati, tathāpi “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate” “ājyaiḥ stuvate” ityekavākyavihitānāṃ pṛṣṭhājyastotrāṇāṃ kvacidguṇakarmatvaṃ kvacitpradhānakarmatvamiti vairūpyāsambhavātsarvatra stuteḥ pradhānakarmatvameveti । evañca sati “kavatīṣu stuvate” “indrasya nu vīryāṇi pravocaṃ” “praugaṃ śaṃsati” iti saptamīṣaṣṭhīdvitīyāśrutayaḥ, stautiśaṃsatiśrutī ca svārthavṛttā bhaviṣyanti । stuteśca guṇakarmatve asvārthavṛttaya iti ।
prayojanam—stutaśastrayorguṇakarmatvātpragāthayorutkarṣeṇānuṣṭhā- nam । pradhānakarmatve tvanutkarṣeṇeti ।
sūtrantu—sannidhiklaptaśrutisaṃyogātsaptamyādiśrutisaṃyogājjyo- tiṣṭomaprakaraṇa eva stautiśaṃsatī dve ākhyāte pradhānabhūtastutibhāva- nārūpakarmotpattividhānam kuruta ityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athaṃ saptamaṃ vidhimantrādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: idamāmnāyate—“na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaraḥ nainā amitro vyathirādadharṣati । devāṃśca yābhiryajate dadāti ca jyogittābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha” (tai. brā., 2. 4. 6.) iti । yajate dadāti juhotītyu- dāharaṇam । kiṃ yadvahrahmaṇaśabdo vidhāyakastadvanmantro'pi, uta mantro'bhidhāyaka iti ।

atra bhāṣyakāreṇa mantragatāneva bhāvaśabdānudāhṛtya vicāri- tam । tadayuktam; yato na hi mantre sarve bhāvaśabdā abhidhāyakāḥ । “vasantāya kapiñjalānālabhata” (mai. sa., 3. 14. 1.) ityatra vidhāya- kasyāpi darśanāt । nāpi brāhmaṇe bhāva śabdā sarve vidhāyakāḥ । “yasyobhayaṃ havirārtimārcchet” (tai. brā., 3. 7. 1.) “ya evaṃ vidvā-
paurṇamāsīṃ yajata” ityādiṣvabhidhānamātradarśanāt । tasmādaviśeṣeṇa yathāvārtikamevādhikaraṇaṃ varṇanīyam ।
chapter.head: saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p: adhyāyārthabhūtasya karmabhedasyopodghātabhūtaṃ bhāvārthavicāraṃ sāpavādaṃ parisamāpyedānīṃ mantrabrāhmaṇagatākhyātaśabdānāmukta- guṇapradhānarūpadvaividhyaprasaṅgenedaṃ vicāryate—kiṃ sarvākhyātaśabdānāṃ guṇapradhānakarmavidhāyakatvameva param, asti vā tṛtīyo'pi prakāraḥ karmābhidhāyakatvamātrameveti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—ta eva vidhipratyayavanto bhāvaśabdāḥ kvacidvidhāyakāḥ kvaciccābhidhānakarmamātraparyavasāyina ityayuktam । ekarūpatvena śabdaśaktyaviśeṣāt । na ca yacchabdasanni- ddhyu paghātakarmatvena vidhipratyayayoge'pyavidhāyakatvādabhidhānamātraparya- vasāyitvameveti vācyam । “yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapālo bhavati” ityādiṣu yacchabdayuktasyāpi vidhāyakatvāt । ataḥ sarvatra vidhyuddeśe mantre ca bhāvaśabdānāmekarūpatvādekārthavidhyarthatvam, vidhānasya dvaividhyaguṇa- karmapradhānakarmavidhāyakatvameva param, na tu karmābhidhāyakatvamātra- mapi tṛtīyaprakāro'stītyevaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedetadevaṃ yadi yacchabdādiprayogāt keṣu- cidvidhiśaktyupaghāto na bhavet । tathāhi—sarvatra khalu yacchabdādi- yogādanuvādatā parisphurati । tadyatra kriyāyogāt yacchabdastatra yacchabdena yathāvagatāṃ kriyāmanūdyaṃ tadgatāyāṃ puruṣapravṛttau vidhīya- mānāyāṃ na vidhiśaktistirodhīyate । vidheyabhūtāyāḥ puruṣapravṛtte- rananuvādātkartṛyogini yacchabde yaḥ karotīti pravṛtterevānūditatvā- dbhavati vidhiśaktyuvaghāta iti । tena bhavatu “yasyobhayaṃ havirārti- mārcchet” “ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate” ityādikartṛyogitvā- dyacchabdasya vidhiśaktyupaghātaḥ । “yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapāla” ityādiṣu kriyāyogitvādyacchabdasya vidhiśaktiravyāhataiveti । taduktaṃ paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇe—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 488)

sa ca kartṛyuktayacchabdādyupabandho mantre brāhmaṇe vā aviśiṣṭa
eveti tadvaśena vidhiśaktyupaghāte sati karmābhidhāyakatvamātrabhubhayatrā- pīti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 433)
ato'sti tṛtīyo'pi prakāra iti ।

idantviha vaktavyam—atra yacchabdādyupabandhena mantrabrāhmaṇa- vākyagatākhyātaśabdasyābhidhāyakatvamabhimataṃ padārthe ? vākyārthe vā ? । na tāvatpadārthe; abhidhāyakavākyagatasyākhyātaśabdasya padārthābhi- dhāyakatvāviśeṣāt । nāpi vākyārthe; sarvatraiva vākyārthasya gamyamānatvenānabhidheyatvāt । athaitadeva vākyārthābhidhānaṃ yat sthalaviśeṣe viśeṣaṇānvayayogyapradhānībhūtapadārthābhidhānam, tadā brāhmaṇe yacchabdādyupabandhasya.... ....viśeṣaṇībhūtārthapratipādakatvena tathābhūtārthānabhidhānenābhidhāyakatvamiti । satyaṃ te sarvatrābhidhāyakā ityanena sarvatrābhidhāyakatvamabhimatam, kintu abhidhāyakatvena viśe- ṣārthapratipādakatvamātram । tacca brāhmaṇe mantre ca samānameva । tatra “na tā naśanti” ityatra yacchabdaḥ, “ahe vudhnya mantraṃ me gopāya” ityāmantraṇavibhaktiḥ, “dāmi, gṛhṇāmi” ityuttamapuruṣaḥ, “yadi soma-
mapahareyuḥ” ityatra yadiśabdaḥ, yadityevamādayaḥ । prāyeṇa mantreṣviti sūtre mantropanyāsaḥ ।

kintvetāvānatra viśeṣaḥ—brāhmaṇagatānāṃ svarūpamevopalabhya vidhitvanivṛttau sattyāṃ svarūpādeva karmasu prayogānarhatvāt nimi- ttādiṣvakhyāpanārthataiva । mantragatānāṃ tu dāmi gṛhṇāmi nirva- patītyevamādīnāṃ svarūpamevopalabhya śakyamebhiḥ karma kartumiti viniyogabuddhirbhavati । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 433)
tena saṃśayo'tra kiṃ pradhānarūpakarmavidhāyakatvameva paraṃ sarvatra ? atha vidhāyakatvamapi ? karmaṇi pratipādakatvamapi tṛtīyaḥ prakāro 'stīti mantavyam ।
prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe—vidhāyakatve sarvatrākhyātānāmabhyāsā- tkarmabhede'nuṣṭhānabhedaḥ । siddhānte tu naivam ।
sūtrantu—yacchabdādyupabandhaḥ syāt । mantragrahaṇamupalakṣaṇārtham, tenāyamarthaḥ—yacchabdādyupabandhasahitamākhyātamabhidhānavācakaṃ vidhi- śūnyapratyāyanamātrahetubhūtaṃ prayogasāmarthyāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ mantralakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: mantragato bhāvaśabdo vidhāyako neti parīkṣituṃ ko'yaṃ mantro nāmeti vedavākyagatabhāvaśabdānāṃ guṇakarmapradhānadvaividhye'dhārite tatprasaṅgena karmapratipādakatvarūpaṃ tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ pratipādyedānīṃ prasa- ṅgenaiva vedavākyagatamantrapadasyārtho nirūpyate-ko'yaṃ mantro nāmeti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvanmantrasaṃhitāyāṃ pāṭho mantralakṣaṇam, brāhmaṇamadhye'pi mantrapāṭhadarśanāt । nāpi brāhmaṇa- viniyojyatvalakṣaṇam, liṅgaprakaraṇaviniyojyānāmapi mantratvāt । nāpyasyantādirūpatā mantralakṣaṇam, brāhmaṇe'pi tasya bhāvāt, mantreṣu ca keṣucidabhābāt । tena sarveṣāmeva tadvyabhicārādanekārtha- tvameva mantraśabdasyetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra vṛddhopadeśo na syāt । tathāhi— yeṣu vākyeṣu vṛddhāḥ prayuñjate—‘mantrānadhīmahe’ ‘mantrānadhyāpayāmaḥ’
‘mantrā vartante’ iti । abhiyuktamūlañca śabdārthāvadhāraṇam । tena mantrasaṃhitāpāṭhādīnāṃ vyabhicāre'pyadhyāpakavṛddhā yatra mantraśabdaṃ prayuñjate, te mantrā iti bhavati vyavasthā । taduktam—

lg.l: te mantrā nābhidhānaṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sthitam ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 437)
prayojanañcātra lakṣaṇapratipattilāghavātiriktamanyannāsti । taduktaṃ bhāṣye—

lg.l: prayojanaṃ na vaktavyaṃ yacca kṛtvā pravarttate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (śā. bhā., pṛ. 435 pū. saṃ.)
sūtrantu—tadanuṣṭhīyamānakarmābhidhānaṃ prayojanaṃ yeṣāṃ vākyā- nāṃ tāni tathoktāni । teṣu mantrākhyā mantraśabdaprayoga ityarthaḥ । etadapi prāyikatvātsvādhyāyakālādhyāpakatvayogalakṣaṇameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ brāhmaṇalakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: atha kiṃlakṣaṇam brāhmaṇam । mantrāśca brāhmaṇam । mantrāśca brāhmaṇañca vedaḥ । tatra mantralakṣaṇa ukte pariśeṣasiddhatvād brāhmalakṣaṇamavacanīyam, tallakṣaṇenaiva siddhatvāt । yasyaitallakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tadbrāhmaṇamiti pariśiṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇamiti । vedavākyagatamantra- padasyārthaṃ prasaṅgena nirūpya tatprasaṅgenaiva vedavākyagatasya brāhmaṇa- padasyārtho nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya” (tai. brā., 1.2.1.) iti vede śrūyate । tathā “etadbrāhmaṇakānyetāni yadbrāhmaṇakānītarāṇi” iti vedavākye brāhmaṇapadamapi śrūyate । na cetikaraṇabahulatvamākhyāyikāsvarūpatvaṃ vā brāhmaṇalakṣaṇaṃ bhavi- tumarhati, mantreṣvapi gatatvāt । na ca mantravyāvṛttamanyalakṣaṇā- ntaramasti । ato'nekārthatvameva brāhmaṇaśabdasyetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—mantrabrāhmaṇātmako hi vedaḥ, tena mantralakṣaṇa ukte'rthātpariśiṣṭo vedo brāhmaṇapadasyārtha ityavadhāraṇāt pariśeṣasiddhaṃ brāhmaṇalakṣaṇamavacanīyam । na caitāvatā sūtrapraṇayanaṃ vyarthamiti vācyam, yo hi mantrabrahmaṇātmako veda iti na jānāti tasya tṛtīyarāśiśaṅkānirāsārthatvena sūtrapraṇanayasyārthavatvāditi ।
prayojanam—pūrvādhikaraṇavadeva pratipattilāghavam । sūtrantu subodhameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamamūhādyamantratādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: ūhapravaranāmadheyeṣu saṃśayaḥ । mantrabrāhmaṇātmake vede nirūpite ūhapravaranāmadheyānyapi mantrāntargatatvāt prasaṅgena mantrā neti vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—vikṛtāvatidiṣṭe tu prakṛti- samavetārthābhidhāyipadoddhāreṇa vikṛtau samavetārthābhidhāyi padamūhyate ।
evaṃ ‘pravarayajamānādīn kīrtayet’ iti vacanena yajamānasya pravara- kīrtanaṃ nāmadheyakīrtanañca mantravihitamasti । tatrohitapadasya pravarapadasya nāmadheyapadasya ca mantramadhyapatanāttatsahitasyaiva ca mantrasya vihitārthasmārakatvātteṣāmapi mantratvamevetyevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi mantramadhyapāto vihitārthasmārakatvaṃ vā mantralakṣaṇaṃ brūmaḥ, kintvadhyayanakāle'bhiyuktamantrapadaviṣayatvam । na cohapravaranāmadheyeṣu mantrapadaprayogaviṣayatvamasti । taduktam— ‘svādhyāye paṭhyamāneṣu yeṣu’ iti ।
idānīṃ bhāṣyakārānabhihitamapi prakṛtopayogitayā vicārā- ntaramārabhyate । kimūhapravaranāmadheyānāṃ nikṣepe sarvasyaivāmantratvam, uta nikṣiptasyaiveti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pṛrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yathā adhītasvaravarṇakramapratya- bhijñāne mantratvapratyabhijñānaṃ bhavati । tadanyatve tu mantratvapratyabhijñānā- bhāvādamantratvameveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 437)
tasmādekavarṇāpaye'pyamantratvamevetyevaṃprāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyavayavinaḥ samūhasya vā ekadeśāpā- ye'pi pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ tādrūpyaṃ vihanyeta । na hi gorgaḍuni jāte viṣāṇe vā bhagne gotvapratyabhijñāsiddhiḥ । vane vā katipayavṛkṣopaca- yāpacayābhyāṃ pratyabhijñāsiddheḥ samūhe pratyayo bhavati । tadvadihāpye- kāvayavābhāve'pi padāntaraprakṣepe'pi pratyakṣeṇa cādhyayanakālāvagata- mantrarūpapratyabhijñānāt prakṣiptapadamātrasyaivāmantratvam, na tu sarvasyaiveti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 438 )

atra ca padatvavākyatvayoraniṣṭatvādākṛtigrahaṇaṃ gotvadṛṣṭāntārtha- miti । na ca “na girā gireti brūyādairaṃ kṛtvodgeyam” ityatrāpi girāpadoddhāreṇa irāpadasyāmantratvaprasaṅga iti vācyam । adhyayanakāla evālocyedamavagatam—yat prakṛtau girāpadavānayaṃ mantraḥ, vikṛtāvirāpadavāniti । tena vedapratipāditerāpadasya
bhavatu mantratvam । sūryādipadānāntu nyāyagamyatvāditi vaiṣamyam । taduktam—

lg.l: nyāyena kalpyamāne tu na śakyaṃ tannirūpaṇam ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ.438 )

nanu sarvaśabdāvagamyā codanā iti nyāyādūhādikamapi nyāyagamyaśrutārthāpattikalpitavedagamyatvādirāpada tulyameveti । maivam; niyatasvarakramoccāritameva hi vākyaṃ vedaḥ । taccādhīyamānameva paraṃ tathā bhavati । tena yatkiñcicchutārthāpattyā vede kalpyate tatsarvaṃ vedānumatatvādveda ityucyate । tenohādīnāṃ vedāpratipāditvānnaiverāpadatulyatvam । nanvevamapi “pravaranāmadheyāni kīrtayet” iti pratyakṣavedopadeśātpravaranāmadheyayormantratvaprasaṅgaḥ, na caitat; irāpadasyeva vede pravaranāmadheyayormantratvaprayojya- viśeṣarūpeṇāmnānābhāvāt । atra hi pravaraśabdenāsitadevala- śāṇḍilyādipravarābhidhāyipadakīrttanam, nāmadheyaśabdena ca yajamā- nābhidhāyiviṣṇuśarmādināmakīrtanamabhimatam । teṣāṃ ca vede'nāmnā- tatvānna mantratvamiti । evaṃ tarhi yatra mantre “asāveṣa te piṇḍaḥ, ye cātra tvāmanu yāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā” iti paṭhyate, tatrāpi sarvanāmasthāne piturnāma nikṣipyate, tasya svarūpāmnānābhāvāda-
mantratvaprasaṅgaḥ । naitat; āmnānasamarpitasya hi mantratvam, tadyadi sarvanāmnāṃ tatsthānaśabdāntarasamarpakatvaṃ tadā teṣāṃ mantratvam । athāmnātasya sarvanāmnasteṣāṃ prayoge'prāmāṇyam, tato na mantratvam । tatra tāvat sarvanāmapadaṃ ‘pravaranāmadheyāni kīrttayet’ itivatpramāṇam । kintu pitrādiviśeṣanāmnāmānantyādāmnātumaśakyatvāt pitrādi- viśeṣārthapratipādanārtham, na cāsya svatastatpratipādanasāmarthyamastīti svayaṃ prayogānarhaṃ sadviśeṣaśabdāneva prayogārhānupalakṣayati । ataḥ sarvanāmāmnānamavivakṣitarūpaṃ pitrādyarthaviśeṣaviṣayān pravaraśabdān mantravākyaniveśino darśayatviti tadarthameva sarva- nāmapadamadhyayanavidhinādhyāpitamiti niścīyate । tasmāt pitrādināmnāmapyāmnānaprāyatvāt mantratvameveti ।
prayojanam—amantratve mantrabhraṃśaprāyaścittābhāvaḥ, ‘/?/hṛgrahorbha- śchandasi’ ityādicchāndasavikārābhāvaśca । mantratve dvayorapi bhāva iti ।
sūtrantu—anāmnāteṣu ūhapravaranāmadheyeṣvamantratvam । amnāteṣu ‘mantro'yamidaṃ brāhmaṇam’ ityeṣa vibhāga iti ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśamṛglakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: ṛca ityasti vede “ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya yamṛṣayastraividā viduḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi” ( tai. brā., 1.2.1. ) iti । kathaṃla- kṣaṇikā ṛca iti prāsaṅgikamantravicāraṃ parisamāpyedānīṃ mantraviśeṣaśrutaṛgyajuḥsāmapadārthanirūpaṇamanuprasaṅgena kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yatrārthena pādavyavasthā sā ṛgiti ṛglakṣaṇamuktam, na caitatsambhavati । “agniḥ pūrvebhiḥ” ityatra kriyāpadābhāvenārthāvacchedanibandhanapādavyavasthā- vyatirekeṇāpi ṛgdarśanāt । ato'nirūpaṇameva ṛkpadārthasyetye- vaṃprāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi pādabaddho mantraḥ ṛktvaṃ vyabhicarati । tathā hi pādabaddhe mantre abhiyuktā ṛkchabdaṃ prayuñjate । na laukikapadabandhamātre । atra pādabaddhatvaṃ mantro-
palakṣaṇārthameva । tena “agniḥ pūrvebhirṛṣibhiḥ” ityatra kriyā- padānupādānādarthavaśena pādavyavasthāyā abhāve'pi gāyatryā- dicchandovaśena pādavyavasthāyāmaviruddhamṛktvamiti ।
prayojanam—pūrvavadeva pratipattilāghavamiti ।
sūtrantvarthavaśenetyupalakṣaṇam । vṛttavaśenāpi yatra gāyatryādi- pādavyavasthā sā ṛgiti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ sāmalakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha sāma kiṃlakṣaṇam । idānīmanupraṅgenaiva sāmaśabdārtho nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya yamūṣayastraividā viduḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi” iti mantra-
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ sāmaśabdasya śrūyate । mantraśca varṇātmako na tu gānamātram । kiṃca “sāmnā stuvīta” iti śrūyate । stutiśca guṇagu- ṇisambandhakīrtanam । na ca gānamātreṇa tatsambhavati । tathā ‘sāmā- nyadhyāpayāmaḥ sāmānyadhīmaha’ iti gīyamāna eva mantre'bhiyukto- padeśādgīyamāna eva mantraḥ sāmaśabdābhidheyaḥ, na tu gītimātra- miti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyubhayībhidhānaśaktigauravaṃ na syāt । tathāhi—gītiviśiṣṭamantrābhidhāne viśeṣaṇabhūtā gītistāvadava- śyamagrato'bhidhātavyā । tathāhi “ṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma gāyati” ityṛga- kṣaraniyatavartitvādgānaviśeṣasya tadabhidhānādeva mantrapratītisiddherā- kṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyena gītivacanatvameva sāmaśabdasya । taduktam—

lg.l: viśeṣaṇasya vācyatvaṃ tatra sarvatra jāyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 441)

tatra yadyapi samāśabdādgītiviśiṣṭo mantra eva pratīyate, tathāpi vācakaśaktiḥ sāmaśabdasya gośabdasyeva viśeṣaṇamātra- viṣayā । viśeṣyabhūtamantrapratītistu vyaktivadeva । ato “ga/?/ yajeta” itivat “sāmnā stuvīta” iti svāśrayabhūtargdvāreṇo/?/-
meva stutisādhanatvaṃ gānasya । mantraśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyañca sāmaśabdasya ।
prayojanam—pūrvatpratipattilāghavam ।
sūtrantu—sāmaśabdasya gāne vācakaśaktinirūpaṇa paraṃ subo- dhameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ yajurlakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha yajuṣāṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇamitīdānīmanuprasaṅagena yajuḥśabdārtho nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvat pādasambaddho mantro yajuśśabdārthaḥ, tasyarkcchabdārthatvāt । nāpi gīyamānaṃ, tasya sāmaśabdārthatvāt । etadvyatiriktasya ca lakṣaṇasya sakalayajuśśabdārthavyāpakasyāpratīteranekārthatvameva yajuḥśabdasyeti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyuktarksāmavyatiriktatvameva yajurla- kṣaṇaṃ na bhavet tenaitadeva yajurlakṣaṇam—yanna pādabaddhaṃ na ca gīyamānaṃ tat praśliṣṭapaṭhitaṃ yajuriti ।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ nigadādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha nigadā nāma kiṃ yajūṃṣi ? uta yajurbhyo'nye ? ityṛ- ksāmayajuḥśabdapadārtheṣu nirūpiteṣu nigadānāmanuprasaṅgenaiva “uccairni- gadena” ityevamādivedavākyagatanigadapadārtho nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“upāṃśu yajuṣā” iti yajuṣāmupāṃśudharmaśālitvaṃ pratīyate । asya ca “uccairnigadena” iti viśeṣaḥ śrūyate । sa cāsya yajuṣṭve nopapadyate, vidhyanuvādayorasa-
mbhavāt । vidhitve sati “upāṃśu yajuṣā” iti sāmānyaśāstraprāpta- mupāṃśutvam “uccairnigadena” iti viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhanīyam । bādhaśca gatyantarāsambhave bhavet । tena ‘brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍiḍanyāya’ ityatra kauṇḍiḍanyagatabrāhyaṇatvasya pramāṇāntarasi- ddhatvādbhavatu gatyantarāsambhavena bādhaḥ, yajuṣṭvasya pramāṇāntarasiddha- tvāt ‘śeṣe yajuśśabdaḥ’ iti lakṣaṇasyarksāmanigadaśeṣaparatvenāpi sambhavāttribhyo'nyatvenaivopapatterna bādhasambhavaḥ । na ca yajuṣṭve'pi parasambodharūpatvena nigadānāmarthaprāptamucaiṣṭvam “uccairnigadena” ityanū- dyate । yajuṣṭve sati vācanikenopāṃśutvenārthaprāptasyoccaiṣṭvasya bādhitatvā- danuvādāsambhavāt । kiñca vyapadeśabhedaścāpyabhiyuktānāṃ dṛśyate— ‘nigadā vartante na yajūṃṣi, atha yajūṃṣi na nigadā’ iti । ato na yajūṃṣi nigadāḥ, kintu caturthameva nigadā iti mantrajātamiti । evaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi “uccairnigadena” ityatrānu- vādo na sambhavet । na ca yajuṣṭve satyarthaprāptamuccaiṣṭvamupāṃśutva- vidhinā bādhitatvānnānūdyata iti vācyam, upāṃśutvavidhe-
rnigadeṣu pravṛttyasambhavāt । tathāhi—“agnīdagnīn vihara bardda- stṛṇāhi” ityevaṃrūpā hi nigadāḥ । te ca parasambodhanārthatvena prayo- geṣūccāryamāṇeṣu svakāryakṣamā bhavanti । avayavavyutpatteśca nitarāṃ gadyata iti nigadāḥ । na copāṃśutvenīccāryamāṇāstathā bhavanti । na copāṃśuvidherapyananyagatiḥ, tadvyatiriktayajurviṣayatvenaiva caritārtha- tvāt । ato'yamupāṃśuvidhirnigadetarayajurviṣaya eveti na tena bādhi- tatvāduccaistvasya sambhavaḥ । “ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya, yamṛṣayastrai- vidā viduḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi” ityṛco yajūṃṣi sāmānītyeva- mātmake vede triṣvevargyajussāmasu mantratvamupapannaṃ bhavati । nigadā api mantrā eva । ato 'pādabaddhatvādagītitvācca pariśeṣasiddhaya- jurlakṣaṇayogādyajūṃṣyeva nigadāḥ । uccaiṣṭvadharmabhedaścāsya parasambodhana- kāryasāmarthyaprāpta eva stutyarthamanūdyamāno'nanyatvamāpādayati । upadeśabhedaśca brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena dharmabhedanibandhana eva । ato yajūṃṣyeva nigadā iti । atra yadyapi “vedo vā prāya- darśanāt” (jai. sū., 3. 3. 2.) ityatropāṃśutvādīnāṃ vedadharmatvamā- cakṣate na jātadharmatvaṃ, tathāpi tadīyapūrvapakṣanyāyena jātadha- rmatvamabhyupagamya sāmānyaśāstramayogyaṃ viśeṣaviṣaye na pravartata eveti tatpratipadanārtho'yaṃ vicāraḥ । tenāyameva sāmānyaviśeṣanyā- yādasya bhedo yatsāmānyaśāstraṃ pravṛttiyogyamapi viśeṣaśāstradarśa-
nānna pravartate । atra tu sāmānyaśāstraṃ viśeṣapravṛtyayogyatvādeva na pravartata iti ।
prayojanam—yajuṣṭve sati yajurbhraṃśanimittaṃ “bhuvaḥ svāhā” iti prāyaścittam, ayajuṣṭve neti ।
sūtrantu yajūṃṣyeva nigadāḥ । tadrūpatvāt praśliṣṭapaṭhitatvena yajūrūpatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśamekavākyalakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha praśliṣṭapaṭhiteṣu yajuḥṣu kathamavagamyate iyadekaṃ yajuriti । mantratraividhye nirūpite kiyāneko mantra ityākāṃkṣāyāṃ ṛksāmayoḥ parimāṇasyādhyetṛparamparāsiddhatvātprāśliṣṭapaṭhiteṣu yajuḥṣu kiyadekaṃ yajurityākāṃkṣāyāṃ tatparimāṇalakṣaṇaṃ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvadarthaikatvādekaṃ
vākyam, tathā sati pratipadamarthabhedena vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । nāpi vibhajyamānasākāṃkṣatvam, evañca sati “syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi” (tai. brā., 3. 7. 5.) ityasya “tasminsīda” ityanena sahaikavākyatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi militameka- vākyatvalakṣaṇam, ekaṃ hi padamekārthaṃ na tadvibhajyamānasākāṃkṣam । taccānekārthaṃ pratipadamarthabhedenaikārthyābhāvāt । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 446)
atā “devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastā- bhāmagnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi” ityevamādiyajuṣāmapi niyatopāyādhīna- meva parimāṇaparijñānamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate-bhavedevaṃ yadyabhidheyavacano'yamarthaśabdo bhavet । prayo- janavacanastvayam । tena yāvanti padānyekaprayojanāni vibhāge ca sākāṃ- kṣāṇi tāvantyekaṃ vākyam । tenārthaikatvaṃ vibhajyamānasākāṃkṣatvañca militamevedamekavākyatvalakṣaṇam । ato na pratipadamekaṃ vākyam । pratipadamabhidheyabhūtārthanānātve'pi “devasya tvā” ityevamādiṣu prayoja- bhūtasyārthasyaikatvādekayajuṣṭvameva । “syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi” itya-
sya “tasminsīda” ityanena sahaikavākyatvaṃ vibhajyamānasākāṃkṣatve'pi sadanakaraṇapuroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanarūpaprayojanabhedāt । tathā “bhago vāṃ vibhajatu, aryamā vāṃ vibhajatu” ityevamādiṣu puroḍāśavibhāgarūpaika- kāryatve'pi vibhajyamānasākāṃkṣatvābhāvānnaikavākyatvam । etacca na kevalaṃ yajurmantramātraviṣayaṃ lakṣaṇam, kintu brāhmaṇavākyalaukika- vākyayorapīti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 445)
prayojanam—pūrvavatpratipattilāghavameva । sūtrantu subodhameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśaṃ vākyabhedādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: “iṣe tvojeṃ tvā” (tai. saṃ., 1.1.1) iti, “āyuryajñena kalpatāṃ prāṇo yajñenakalpatām” (tai. saṃ., 1.7.9.) ityādi । tatra saṃśayaḥ— kimevamādiṣu bhinnaṃ vākyam ? utaikam ? iti । pūrvaṃ yajuṣāmevaika- vākyatve pratipādite satīdānīṃ kvacidviṣayaviśeṣe'pavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvat “iṣe tvojeṃ tvā vāyavastha” ityādiṣu pratyekaṃ samavetakriyābhidhāyakamatra padaṃ śrūyate । nāpi kalpayitumapi śakyate, vinigamanāprāmāṇābhāvāt । tenātra samavetārthābhidhānābhāvenāvivakṣitārthatayā uccāraṇamātraikādṛṣṭāprayoja- natayā ekavākyatvaṃ vaktavyam, na tu saṃhatyaikārthābhidhāyakatvena, avivakṣitārtheṣu tallakṣaṇāsambhavāt। kalpyamānañcādṛṣṭaṃ lāghavādekameva kalpayitumucitam । tathā ca satyekādṛṣṭaprayojanatvena vibhajyamāna- sākāṃkṣatvamapyastīti militānāmevaikavākyatvam । nanu “iṣe tveti chinatti ūrje tveti anumārṣṭi” ityādiviniyogabhedāddṛṣṭarūpaprayo- janabhedena vākyabheda eva pratīyate । maivam; mantrasya hyekavākyatva- mālocyate । na ca mantre chedanānumārjanābhidhāyakaṃ padaṃ śrūyate । tenādṛṣṭārthatve sati kṛtsnasyaiva mantrasyādimadhyāntapratīkadvāreṇa punaḥ punarviniyogabhedo nānupapannaḥ । na caivaṃ satyekavākyatve cheda- nānumārjanādirūpaviṣayabhedādadṛṣṭabheda eveti vaktavyam । ekasyai- vādṛṣṭasya chedanānumārjanādiviṣayānukūlajñāpanārthatvenaiva viniyoga- bhedopapatteḥ । klṛptyudāharaṇe'pi yadyapi kalpatāṃ kalpatāmityākhyāta- padamasti, tathāpi tadarthasya karmāsamavetatvenādṛṣṭārthatvameva vaktavyam । tathā sati lāghavāt pūrvavadevādṛṣṭāprayojanatvena vibhajyamānasākāṃkṣa-
tvena caikavākyatvameva । na ca “klṛptīryajamānaṃ vācayati” iti bahuvacanānupapattiḥ । mantraikatve'pi kalpatāmiti punaḥ punaruccarita- klṛptiśabdavatvenaivopapatteḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 449)
ataḥ pratīyamānakarmasamavetārthānāṃ yajuṣāṃ dṛṣṭārthamantrāvadhitaḥ prānekamantratvameveti । evaṃprāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi mantrarūpāvadhāraṇāt prāgevādṛṣṭarūpa- prayojanakalpanaṃ bhavet । na caitadasti; ajñātasvarūpasya viniyogābhā- vāt । aviniyuktasya ca prayojanakalpanānupapatteḥ । tena viniyoga- prayojanakalpanātaḥ prāgeva mantrasya svarūpaṃ nirūpaṇīyam । tacca bhinnameva pratīyate । tathāhi—“iṣe tvā” iti karmābhidhāyidvitīyā- ntaśabdaprayogāt karmaṇaśca kriyāsambandhāvyabhicārāt liṅgā- devaitadavagamyate—iṣe īpsitāya tvāṃ kiñcitkaroti, evamūrje vakhāya tvāṃ kiñcit karotītyetāvataiva bhedabuddhau jātāyāṃ bhedanaiva prayojanaviśeṣākāṃkṣāyāṃ viniyogagaveṣaṇe bhedenaiva “iṣe tveti śākhāṃ chinatti, ūrje tveti anumārṣṭi” iti viniyogadarśanāt । prayo-
janakalpanamapi bhedenaiva । adṛṣṭārthatve'pyadṛṣṭaprayojanabhedāt vibhajya- mānasākāṃkṣatvābhāvācca naikavākyatvam, kintu vākyabheda eveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 450)

tenādṛṣṭārthatve'pi tāvannaikavākyatvam । vastutastu naiṣāmadṛṣṭā- rthatvam, kintu brāhmaṇavākyabodhitadṛṣṭaprayojanatvameva । yattu brāhmaṇabodhitachedanādyabhidhāyipadābhāvānna mantrasya tatra sāmarthya- mastītyuktam । tadayuktam; viniyogabalenaiva tadvācakapadādhyā- hāreṇa chedanādiprakāśarūpadṛṣṭakāryopapatterityevaṃ klṛptyudāharaṇe yadyapyarthaikatvaṃ tathāpi vibhajyamānasākāṃkṣatvābhāvānnaikavākyatvaṃ, nāpyekārthatvam, “klaptīryajamānaṃ vācayati” iti śabdasya punaḥ punaruccāryamāṇatvāt । klṝptiśabdabahutvābhiprāyañca bahuvacanam, śabdānāmarthatantratvasya svabhāvasiddhatvāt । ato'rthabhedādapi bhinnavākyatvameveti । atra yadyapyāyurāśāsanarūpāṇāṃ klṛptīnāma- dṛṣṭārthatvam, tathāpi mantrāṇāṃ tatprakāśane dṛṣṭārthatvameveti ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe “iṣe tvorje tvā” ityādiṣu chedane mārjane ca kṛtsnamantraprayogaḥ । siddhānte tu bhedenaiva । klṛptimantre
ca pūrvapakṣe mantrasyaiva vākyatvānmantradoṣe kṛtsnamantrāvṛttiḥ । siddhānte tu mantrabhede ya eva duṣṭaḥ sa evāvartayitavyo nānya iti ।।
chapter.head: atha saptadaśamanuṣaṅgādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
“yā te agne'yāśayā tanūrvarṣiṣṭhā gahareṣṭhograṃ vaco apāvadhī- ttveṣaṃ vaco apavādhītsvāhā । yā te agne rajāśayā, yā te agne harāśayā” ( vā. saṃ., 5. 8. 8 ) iti । tatra sandehaḥ— kiṃ “tanūrvarṣiṣṭhā” iti sarvatrānuṣaktavyaḥ āhosvillaukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti । atraiṣā viṣayaśuddhiḥ—jyotiṣṭome “tisna eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryā” ityupasannāmāni trīṇi karmāṇi śrūyante । teṣāṃ cāṅgabhūtāstisra iṣṭayo'gnidaivatyā “agnimanīkam” ityevamādivākyavihitāḥ santi । āsāñca krame trayo mantrāḥ samāmnātāḥ । tatra prathamāyā iṣṭeḥ “yā te agne'yāśayā” ityayaṃ mantra- ssampūrṇatvānnirākāṃkṣaḥ । dvitīyāyāstṛtīyāyāśceṣṭeḥ “yā te agne rajāśayā yā te agne harāśayā” ityetāvadasampūrṇatvātsākāṃkṣau ।
tatrāyaṃ sandehaḥ—kiṃ prathamamantrasamāmnātasya “tanūrvarṣiṣṭhā” ityādi- vākyaśeṣasya dvitīyatṛtīyamantrayoranuṣaṅgaḥ, athavā laukikasyā- dhyāhāra iti । pūrvamanupraṅgena yajuḥparimāṇe nirūpite satīdānī- manuprasaṅgenaivāsampūrṇasya yajuṣaḥ kimadhyāhāreṇa pūraṇam ? utānuṅgeṇeti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvat “yā te agne'yāśayā” ityetaccheṣabhūtasya “tanūrvarṣiṣṭhā” ityādeḥ “yā te agne'yāśayā yā te agne harāśayā” ityetaccheṣabhāvassambhavati, pūrvavākyaśeṣatvenaivādhyaya- navidhinādhyāpitatvāt । yathā āhavanīyasya homaśeṣatvāt vedāvaga- tasya“agnimupanidhāya stuvīta” ityatra na stotraśeṣatvenopanidhānam kintarhi. ? laukikasyaivāgneḥ sarvārthasya, tathā laukikasyaiva vākya- śeṣasyottaramantrayoradhyāhāra iti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 453)
tasmānna vaidikaḥ śeṣaḥ, kintu laukika eveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi vākyagatākāṃkṣā sati sambhave
avaidikenāpi pūryeta । tathāhi—vaidikasya vākyasya vaidika eva śeṣaḥ pūraṇakṣamaḥ । tatra vedagataivānveṣaṇocitā । taduktam—

lg.l: svasmin vākye'pi na syāccenmṛgyaḥ prakaraṇe tataḥ ।
yadi prakaraṇe na syānmṛgyaḥ prakaraṇāntare ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 453)
codanālakṣaṇadharmaniyamādiha tu vaidikasyaiva tanūvarṣiṣṭhetyādeḥ sarvārthatvasambhavānna laukikāvasaraḥ sthitaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 453)

yattu vākyāntaraśeṣatvenādhyayanavidhinādhyāpitasya na vākyā- ntaraśeṣatvaṃ sambhavatītyuktam, tadayuktam; sarvaśeṣatvenaikasyaiva vākyaśeṣasyādhyayanavidhinādhyāpitatvāt । na cānantaryaviśeṣā- dhyayanavaśenāpi pūrvavākyaśeṣatvamevāsyonnetumucitam, na tu sarvaśeṣa- tvamiti vācyam । yata ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsannidhayo hi sambandhādi- kāraṇam । sannidhiśca buddhiviparivṛttirnārthāntaram । te cākāṅkṣā- dayakhniṣveva mantreṣvaviśiṣṭā iti sarvārthatvamevāmnānasya । sarvathā-
mnānasyāvaśyakenāpyānantaryeṇa bhavitavyamiti nāntarīyakamā- nantaryaviśeṣopādānam । taduktam—

lg.l: ākāṃkṣā sannidhānaṃ ca yogyatā ceti tattrayam ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 455)
na ca rajāśayetyanena vyavadhānāddharāśayetyanena saha na sambandhaḥ । sambandhipadavyavahitasyāpyanantaritatvādeva ।
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 455)
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe laukikādhyāhṛtapadasyāmantratvānna mantra- nāśanimittaṃ prāyaścittam । siddhānte tvanuṣaktapadānāṃ mantratvānma- ntranāśanimittaṃ prāyaścittamiti ।
sūtrantu—anuṣajyata ityanuṣaṅgo vākyaśeṣaḥ vākyaparisamāpti- raneneti saiva vākyaparisamāptiḥ । sarveṣu tulyayogitvāttulyasa- mbandhādityarthaḥ ।

atheha kathaṃ bhavitavyam ? yatra nirākāṃkṣāṇāṃ sannidhau pari- pūrṇasambandhaḥ śrūyate । yathā “citpatistvā punātu vākpatistvā punātu devastvā savitā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya
raśmibhiḥ” iti । pūrvaṃ sākāṃkṣeṣu śeṣiṣu pratīyamānākāṃkṣasya śeṣa- syānuṣaṅgaṃ pratipādya, idānīmapratīyamānākāṃkṣeṣu śeṣiṣu sākāṃkṣasya śeṣasyānenaiva sūtreṇānuṣaṅgaḥ pratipādyate ।
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—śeṣiṇastāvannirākāṃkṣā- nantaraśeṣisambandhenaiva pūritāḥ । ato nātrānuṣaṅgakāraṇamasti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 457)
tena “devastvā savitā punātu” ityanenaivānantaritena sahācchi- dreṇa pavitreṇetyasya vākyaśeṣasya sambandhaḥ, na tu “citpatistvā punātu” ityetābhyāmapīti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate-bhavedevaṃ yadi “devastvā savitā punātu” ityetasyaiva vākyasyācchidreṇetyayaṃ śeṣo bhavet । kintu karaṇatvena kriyāsā- kāṃkṣamanantarapaṭhitayā punātikriyayā sambadhyate । sā ca triṣvapi vākyeṣu ekaiveti yugapadevāsya mantratrayaśeṣatvam । na caikatve'pi kriyāyāḥ kartṛbhedena bhinnatvādanantaritasavitṛkartṛkapunātikriyā- sambandha evāsyocita iti । syādevaṃ yadi savitrādikartṛbhedo'sya
vāstavo bhavet । kintu darbhayugalena pūrvāgratayā ājyotpavane ekenā- dhvaryuṇā kriyamāṇe mantro'yaṃ paṭhyate । tatra caika evādhvaryuḥ paramārthataḥ kartā, citpatyādyupanyāsaḥ stutyartha eveti na kartṛbhedāt punātvartha- bhedaḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: tata evaṃ bhavedeṣa tvākhyātārthena sarvabhāk ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 457)

na caivaṃ sati prakaraṇāntarīyapunātvarthenāsya sambandhaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ, prakṛtāpūrvagṛhītatvenāsya darśapūrṇamāsabarhirdharmavadanyasambandhāsambha- vāt । na cābhede'pi jyotiṣṭomasya yathā “maitrāvaruṇaṃ śrīṇāti” ityabhyāsāpūrvabhedādeva śrayaṇavyavasthā, tathātrāpi punātvarthasyaika- tve'pi bhinnāpūrvābhyāsavaśenaiva vyavastheti vācyam । tatra bhinnā- bhyāsāpūrvaprayuktatvena dharmavyavasthopapatteḥ । na cātra tatheti vaiṣamyam । nāpyekakriyānvayitvena citpatyādikartṝṇāmapi sarvaśeṣatvam, kartranta- rāvaruddhatvena kartrantarapraveśāsambhavāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 458)
chapter.head: athāṣṭādaśaṃ vyavāyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: “sante vāyurvātena gacchatāṃ saṃ yajatrairaṅgāni saṃ yajñapatirāśiṣā” iti । sannidhipratyudāharaṇasūtramidim । buddhiviparivṛttirhi sannidhi- rityuktam । atra tu “sante vāyurvātena gacchatām” ityeka- vacanāntasyākhyātapadasya “saṃyajatrairaṅgāni” ityanena bahuvacanāntenā- yogyatayānvayāsambhavādavaśyaṃ bahuvacanāntaṃ gacchantāmiti laukikapa- damadhyāhartavyam । tena vijātīyena buddhivicchede sati buddhiviparivṛ- ttirūpasannidhyabhāvādākāṃkṣāyogyatayorvidyamānatve'pi “saṃyajñapati- rāśiṣā” ityatra gacchatāmityasya nānuṣaṅgaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 459)
tenātra laukika eva śeṣo'dhyāhartavyaḥ । prayojanaṃ pūrvamevoktam ।
iti riti । sūtrantu vyaktameveti ।
chapter.head: tautātitamatatilake
dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।
śrīḥ
dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ śabdāntarādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ । tatra śrūyate—“somena yajeta” “dākṣi- ṇāni juhoti” “hiraṇyamātreyāya dadāti” iti । yajatidadāti- juhotayaḥ kiṃ saṃhatya kāryaṃ kurvanti ? uta vihṛtyeti ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena viṣayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: tatra prabhākareṇa śāstrabhedo'dhyāyārtha iti darśitam । ayañca tasyābhiprāyaḥ—prathamādhyāye śāstratvena codanāprāmāṇye nirūpite tadeva śāstraṃ kutra bhinnaṃ kutra cābhinnāmitīyameva cintāna- ntarāṅgatvenocitā, na tu karmabhedagocarā, tasya śāstrabhedaphalatvenā- rthasiddhatvāt । kiñca—uktaprāmāṇyanirvāhako'pi śāstrabheda eva, anyathaikaśāstratvena sarvacodanānāmaśakyānuṣṭhānārthatayāprāmāṇya- prasaṅgāt ।

sa ca śāstrabhedaḥ kvacitsādhyabhedanibandhanaḥ, kvaciccānubandha- bhedanibandhanaḥ । tau cātrānirūpitabhedābhedādeva śāstrādavagatau
śāstrabhedakau । sādhyabhedastāvadutpatti-prāpti-vikṛti-saṃskṛti-kara- ṇopakāra-karaṇāvāntarakāryai-śvaryalakṣaṇādhikārarūpabhedātsaptavidhaḥ । śāstratvañcāsannikṛṣṭārthaviṣayatvam । tadyatra nirapekṣabhinnāsanni- kṛṣṭārthatātparyatvattvaṃ, tatra śāstrabhedaḥ । yatra tu naivam, tatrābheda eva । yathā—“puroḍāśaṃ saṃyauti” ityasya puroḍāśotpatti- śāstrasya “puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā karoti” iti caturdhākaraṇaśāstrādbhedaḥ । anayoreva nirapekṣāsannikṛṣṭārthatātparyavattvāt । “āgneyo'ṣṭā- kapālo bhavati” iti śāstrātpunarabheda eva, tatsāpekṣapuroḍāśo- tpattitātparyavattvāt । evaṃ “payo dogdhi” iti payaḥprāptiśāstrasya payassaṃskāraśāstrādbheda eva । abhedaśca “aindraṃ payaḥ” ityasmātsā- nnāyyaśāstrāt । evaṃ “vrīhīnavahanti” iti vrīhivikṛtiśāstrasya “vrīhīnyāharati” ityasmādbhedaḥ । abhedaśca “vrīhibhiryajeta” itya- smātpradhānaśāstrāt । evaṃ “vrīhīn prokṣati” ityasyāpi saṃskṛti- śāstrasyāvahantiśāstrādbhedaḥ । “vrīhibhiryajeta” iti pradhānaśāstrā- ttvabhedaḥ । tathā “samidho yajati” ityādīnāmitikartavyatā- śāstrāṇāṃ karaṇopakārarūpasādhyatātparyavatvena “āgneyo'ṣṭākapālo bhavati” ityādiśāstrāṇāñca karaṇāvāntarakāryatātparyayogitvena parasparaṃ bhedaḥ । abhedaśca “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” ityasmādadhi- kāraśāstrāt, tatsāpekṣatvātsakaletikarttavyatāśāstrāṇāṃ karaṇa-
śāstrāṇāñca । tathā jīvanādhikārasādhyabhede ca “yāvajjīvaṃ darśa- pūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” itya- nayośśāstrayorbhedaḥ । tathānubandhabhedādapi śāstrabhedaḥ । anubandhatvaṃ niyogaviṣayatvam । tadbhedaśca śabdāntarābhyāsasaṃjñāguṇaprakaraṇā- ntaraiḥ pañcabhiḥ pratipādyamānaḥ pañcavidha eva । saṃkhyāyāstvanu- bandhabhedakatvābhāvānna śāstrabhedakatvam, kintu dhātvarthamātrabheda- katayā prasaṅgenopanyāsa iti । taduktaṃ śālikena—
sūtrañca—śabdāntare karmabhedo'pūrvabhedaḥ śāstrāntarañca kṛtānu- bandhatvāditi ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatakhaṇḍanam
chapter.p:
tadayuktam; sādhyānubandhabhedasyaiva śāstrabhedāvagamamantareṇa pratyetumaśakyatvāt । tathāhi—asannikṛṣṭārthatātparyavatvaṃ śāstra- tvam, tannirapekṣabhinnāsannikṛṣṭārthatātparyavatvañca tadbhedaḥ । na caivambhūtatātparyāvadhāraṇamantareṇa śabdātsādhyabhedo'vagantuṃ śakyate । taccedbhinnatātparyavatvamagrata evāvagataṃ, tadā śāstrabhedo'pyavagata eveti na sādhyānubandhabhedābhyāṃ śāstrabhedo'vagamyaḥ । ato yaduktam—
anavadhāritabhedābhedādeva śāstrādavagataḥ sādhyānubandhabhedaḥ śāstraṃ bhinattīti, tadapyasāram; tātparyabhedāvadhāraṇamantareṇa śabdārtha- bhedāvadhāraṇāsambhavāt । tena śāstrabhedāvagamanibandhana eva sādhyānubandhabhedāvagamoṃ'vaśyaṃ vaktabyaḥ । tadyadi śāstrabhedāva- gamo'pi sādhyānubandhabhedāvagamādhīnaḥ, tadā durnnivāramitaretarā- śratvayam । atha tarkopasthāpitasādhyānubandhabhedaḥ śāstrabhedaheturityu- cyate, sa kiṃ tarkaḥ sandeharūpaḥ ? nirṇayarūpo vā ? tadyadi sandeharūpaḥ, tadā sandigdhanimittakaḥ śāstrabhedo'pi sandigdha eva । atha nirṇayarūpaḥ, tadā nirṇītasādhyānubandhapratipādakatayā śāstrasyā- sannikṛṣṭārthatātparyābhāvānnāsannikṛṣṭārthatātparyavatvarūpaṃ śāstratvamiti ।

kiñca pradhānībhūtādhikāraśāstrādabhinnenāṅgaśāstreṇa svārtho'pi pradhānaśāstrārthādabhinna eva pratipādanīyaḥ । tathā satyaṅgapradhānakarma- ṇoranyonyasaṅkīrṇatvāt bhinnarūpāvagatiḥ kutaḥ ? na tāvattasmādeva śāstrāt, aṅgaśāstrasyābhinnatvena bhinnakāryapratipādanatātparyābhā- vāt । ata eva na śāstrabhedādarthādapi karmabhedasiddhiḥ, aṅga śāstrāṇāṃ pradhānaśāstrābhedāt । na ca vaidikakarmabhedāvagame pramāṇāntaraṃ kramate । atha kramate, tadā sāpekṣatvādaprāmāṇyameva prasajyata ityalamunmattapralapitadūṣaṇeneti yathāvārtikamevādhyā- yārtho'nusandhīyate ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatena saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p: atrāpūrvabhedānubandhikarmabhede'dhyāyārthe vaktavye prathamapāde tadu- poddhātabhūtasaparikarabhāvārthavicārātprasaktānuprasaktāni nirūpyedānīṃ śabdāntarādisahāyotpattividhivyāpārādhīno'dhyāyārthabhūtaḥ karmabheda eva kṛtaḥ । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 461)
tatra prathamaṃ subodhatvācchabdāntaranibandhanaḥ karmabhedaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—dhātvarthāvacchinnā hi bhāvanā karmaśabdenābhidhīyate । nāsau yajatidadātijuhotītyādi- śabdabhedādbhidyate, ekasyā eva tasyāḥ pratyayaikyena nānādhā- tvarthānuraktāyāḥ pratyabhijñātatvāt । nanu kathamekasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ nānādhātvarthānvayaḥ? kiṃ sambhūya samutpādanena ? anūdya guṇavidhānena vā ? na tāvatsambhūyasamutpādassambhavati । ekasya pratyayasya dhātutrayavarttitvābhāvāt । ekasmācca dhātorddhātvarthatrayānabhi- dhānāt । nāpyanūdya guṇavidhānena; ekasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ nānā-
dhātvarthānvaye utpattiśiṣṭaikadhātvarthāvaruddhāyāṃ dhātvarthāntaravidhānānu- papatteḥ । ekena cotpāditāyāmanyena tadanuvādena guṇo vidhātavyaḥ । na cātra kenotpādanaṃ kenānuvāda iti vevektuṃ śakyam। sarvākhyātānāṃ tulyarūpatvāt । ato nānūdya guṇavidhānamapīti ।

ucyate—nātra sambhūyasamutpādanaṃ brūmaḥ, kintvanūdya guṇa- vidhānameva । na cotpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodhādguṇāntarāvidhānam, triṣvapyeteṣu ekapratyayānumānajanitaikabhāvanāpratyabhijñābalena kraya- vākyavanniṣkṛṣṭabhāvanānuvādenaiva dhātvarthāntaravidhānopapatteḥ । tathā “aruṇyā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇāti” ityetadvākyotpanname- kahāyanyavaruddhamapi krayaṃ niṣkṛṣṭamanūdya “vāsasā krīṇāti” ityeva- mādibhirvākyairvāsaḥprabhṛtayaḥ samuccayena vidhīyante, tathehāpīti kimanuphpannam । na ca kutrotpādyate bhāvanā kutrānūdyata iti vinigamanāpramāṇābhāvaḥ, “jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti phalavākyanirīkṣaṇena “somena yajeta” ityasyaivotpādakatvāva- dhāraṇāt ।

yattu kenāpi phalavākyasyaivotpādakatvamāśritam, tadasambaddham; ekasya hi vākyasya dviparatvamagatyāṅgīkriyamāṇaṃ śrutārthāpattikalpita- vākyāntarāśrayaṇena vācyam । tacca vākyaṃ “somena yajeta” ityevaṃ- rūpameva kalpanīyam । na ca pratyakṣaśrute tasmin kalpanāvakāśo'-
stīti vyāmugdhasyaiva tadabhidhānamiti yatkiñciditi । ataḥ “somena yajeta” ityākhyātotpāditāmeva bhāvanāmanūdya dadātijuhotītyādi- mirdhātvarthāntarāṇi vidhīyanta iti karaṇadhātvarthānuraktā indrāyudha- rūpā ekaiva bhāvaneti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavadevaṃ yadi yajata iti padādbhāvanāmātramava- gamyeta, kintarhi ? dhātvarthāntarānvayāyogyaviśeṣarūpeṇaiva bhāvanā- vagatiḥ । tathāhi—dhātvarthaniṣpādanā hi bhāvanetyucyate । saiva coddiṣṭaphalatayā bhāvanā bhavati । sā ca yajyarthānvitaiva pratyayenābhidhīyamānā yāgabhāvanātvena viśeṣarūpeṇāvagamyate । na ca sā homotpādanarūpeṇāvagantuṃ śakyate, pratītivirodhāt । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 464)
(etadevājitākṛtā svīkṛtam—)

lg.l: jñeyabhede yathā jñānaṃ sādhyabhede tathā kriyā ।

chapter.p:
ata eva ca na krayavākyavanniṣkṛṣṭabhāvanānuvādena dhātvarthāntara- vidhānam, tathāvagatāyā bhedena niṣkraṣṭumaśakyatvāt । na ca
pratyayena niṣkṛṣṭaiva bhāvanābhihitā prakṛtyabhihitena dhātvarthenābhi- hitānvayarūpeṇa paramasāvanvīyata iti niṣkṛṣṭānuvādo bhaviṣyatīti vācyam, pratītivirodhāt । na hi yathā ‘devadattaḥ pacati’ iti vibhaktyavagatayoḥ paścādanvayo'vagamyate, tathā pacatītyatra prakṛti- pratyayārthayoḥ kintarhi ? pratyayoccāraṇānantaraṃ hi prakṛtyarthā- nvita eva pratyayārthaḥ pratīyate । kiñcaivaṃ sati ‘pratyayaḥ, paraśca’ (pā. sū., 3. 1. 1. 2) iti prakṛtipratyayapaurvāparyaniyamānuśāsana- mapi viśiṣṭavidhānārthatvena dṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavati । itarayā paurvārphyā- niyame'pyabhidhānopapattau niyamānuśāsanamadṛṣṭārthamāpadyeta । kiñcai- vamabhyupagamyamāne guṇādeva bhedo bhavet, na śabdāntarāt । ayameva guṇaśabdāntarayorbhedaḥ—yatrākhyātabhedaprathamāvagatabhāva- nāvagamyate, tatra śabdāntarādbhedaḥ । yatra tu svavākyasthaguṇā- ntarāvaruddhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ vākyāntaropātto guṇaḥ praveśamalabhamānaḥ karmāntarabuddhiṃ janayati, tatra guṇāntarādbhedaḥ । abhihitānvaye tu dhātvarthāntarāvaruddhatvāt dhātvarthāntarayoge'sati guṇādeva bhedo bhavet, na śabdāntarāditi ।

bhavatu vābhihitānvayaḥ, tathāpi na krayavākyavanniṣkṛṣṭā- nuvādena dhātvarthāntaravidhānaṃ sambhavati । agatyā hi tatraitatsvī- kṛtam । tathāhi—na tāvattatra krayāṇāmutpattiḥ, krayāntara-
vaiyarthyāt । nāpi vikalpenotpattiḥ, bahumūlyālpamūlyadravyāṇāṃ viṣamaśiṣṭatvena vikalpāsambhavāt । tena samuccayo vaktavyaḥ । na cāsau krayāṇāṃ sambhavati । ekadā kraye ekasminmūlye natiprayojanānāmekasmin kraye samuccayo vaktavyaḥ । tatra yadi vākyāntare krayotpattiḥ, tadā tadanuvādenāruṇāvākyenānekaguṇa- vidhānāsambhavādaruṇāvākyotpannāmeva krayabhāvanāmanūdya vākyāntarai- rvāsaḥprabhṛtayo vidhīyanta iti gatyantarāsambhavādāśritam । iha tu karmabhedenaivopapatternāsti gatyantarāsambhavaḥ । bhāvanāpratyabhijñā tu bhāvanābheda'pi sāmānyaviṣayatvenāvirūddheti na kiñcidanupapannam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe sarveṣāmevākhyātārthānāṃ samapradhānatvam । siddhānte tu yāgasyaiva phalasambandhāttasyaiva prādhānyamitareṣāṃ tu guṇabhāvaḥ । tathāca sati vikṛtāvatideśānatideśayorviśeṣaḥ ।
sūtrantu—śabdāntare yajetetyasmājjuhotītyādau karmaṇo bhāvanāyā bhedaḥ kṛtānubandhatvāt kṛtavilakṣaṇadhātvarthāvacchedatvā- dityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyamabhyāsādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: “samidho yajati” “tanūnapātaṃ yajati” “iḍo yajati” “barhirya- jati” “svāhākāraṃ yajati” (tai. saṃ., 2. 6. 1.) ityevaṃ pañcakṛtvo- 'bhyasto yajatiśabdaḥ kimekamapūrvaṃ codayati ? kiṃ vā pratyabhāsa- mapūrvabhedam ? iti । atra śabdāntarānantaraṃ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ karmabhede vaktavye'bhyāsapūrvapakṣasya śabdāntarapratyudāharaṇarūpatvādanantaram- bhyāsārambhaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yuktaṃ pratyayaikatvenaikarūpatayā pratibhāsamāno'pi pratyayārthaḥ prakṛtyarthoparāgātpratidhātu bhidyata iti । iha dhātorapyekatvenaikarūpadhātvarthoparāgātkuto bheda iti । na hi śatakṛtvo'pi karaḥ kara ityukte bhedo'vagamyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 468.)
