na cārthābhede sati dṛṣṭārthādhyayanavidhyupasthāpitasya yajati yajatītyasya pañcadhābhyastasyānarthakyamayuktamiti pratyuccāraṇamarthabheda
eveti vācyam । mantravatprayogavidhiparigṛhītānāmasamavetārthānāmadṛṣṭā- rthānāmadṛṣṭārthatvenaivopapattiḥ । athavā prāthamyānurodhena samidvākye- naiva siddhāntavatsaminnāmāvacchinne karmaṇi vihite taditaraistadanu- vādena tanūnapādādidevatābhidhānādarthavatvaṃ bhaviṣyati । na ca kathaṃ nāmadheyatvamiti vācyam । “samidbhyaḥ svāhā” iti māntra- varṇikadevasambandhanimittattavena samitpadasya nāmadheyatvāt । na caivaṃ sati vākyavihitatanūnapādādidevatābhirdurbalamāntravarṇikadevatā- bādha eveti vācyam । māntravarṇikasamiddevatāmapekṣya saminnāmā- vācchinnayāgānuvādenaiva tanūnapadādidevatāvidhānāt ‘na nimittaṃ vidhirapabādhate’ iti nyāyānna māntravarṇikasamiddevatābādhaḥ ato devatānāṃ vikalpa eveti ।

nanu samidyāgavat “tanūnapāte svāhā” ityādimantrāḥ krama- paṭhitāḥ pratyekaṃ bhidyanta eva, tatra tanūnapādādivākyeṣvapi māntra- vārṇikadevatāprāptinimittanāmāvacchinnakarmavidhānameva yujyate । guṇavidhānantu kutaḥ ? syādevaṃ yadi yajatītyatra prakṛtakarmapra- tyabhijñānabalena ca karmaikatve sati tasyāvidheyatvādyadi guṇamapi na vidadhyāt, vākyamanarthakameva bhavet । tena māntravarṇikīṃ prāptimu- pekṣya prakṛte samidyāge vaikalpikadevatāvidhānārthatvamevottareṣāmiti ।

athavā sarvaireva samidādivākyairupāṃśuyāja eva māntravarṇika-
devatābādhena vaikalpikyaḥ samidādyā devatā vidhīyanta iti । na copāṃśuyājavākyakramāmnātamantrānarthakyam । uttareṇāpi samidādide- vatāprakāśanenārthavatvāt । yatra vā viṣṇavādayo devatāssanti, tatro- tkarṣeṇārthavatvaṃ bhaviṣyati । asmiṃśca pakṣe ‘pañcakṛtvo'bhyasto yajati śabdaḥ kimekamapūrvaṃ codayati’ iti bhāṣyamevaṃ neyam—ekamupāṃśuyā- javākyamapūrvaṃ codayati anugṛhṇātītyarthaḥ । na ca vācyam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 533)

iti caturthīmantravarṇānāmeva devatāpratipādakatvamuktam । tatkiṃ dvitīyāntatanūnapādādipadairdevatāvidhānamiti । yato “viṣṇuṃ yajati” ityādidvitīyāntenāpi devatāvidhānātprāyikamidam । tena pañcadhā- bhyastena yajatiśabdena ekameva samidyāgabhāvanārūpam, upāṃśuyāja- bhāvanārūpaṃ vā karma pratipādyata iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate-bhavedevaṃ yadi pratyabhijñānamātramanuvādakāraṇaṃ bhavet, kintarhi ? anuvādākāṅkṣāpi । sā ca vidheyopapadārthaprāptau bhavati । tathāhi-bhāvanārtho vidhiḥ prathamaṃ bhāvanāmeva dhātvarthānuraktāṃ vidadhātītyucitam । yadā tūpapadārthaṃ lipsate, tadā viśiṣṭavidhigau-
ravabhiyā dhātvarthaṃ parityajyopapadārthameva vidhātumanusandhatte । tatra vidhiyogyopapadārthaprāptau satyāṃ dhātvarthamanuvaditumākāṅkṣati । tāñcākāṅkṣāṃ dhātvarthapratyabhijñā pūrayati । yadi tu vidhiyogyopa- padārthaprāptirna bhavati, nāpi dhātvarthapratyabhijñānam, tadā parāvṛtya bhāvanānurañjakatayā dhātvarthameva vidadhātīti sarvatra sthitam । na cātra vidhirvidhānayogyamupapadārthaṃ paśyati । tathāhi—vidheyatā dravyatvena vā ? devatātvena vā ? na ca tanūnapādādirūpaṃ dravyaṃ kiñcilloke prasiddhamasti । nāpi dvitīyāntena devatā pratipādayituṃ śakyate । “viṣṇuṃ yajati” ityādāvagatyā tathāśritam । na ceha gatyantaraṃ nāsti । māntravarṇikadevatālābhāttatprakhyanyāyena nāma- dheyatvenopapamatteḥ । ato'tra prativākyamabhyasto vidhirguṇānākṣipta- śaktirbhāvanāmeva dhātvarthānuraktāṃ vidadhāti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 469)

na ca vihitasya vidhānaṃ sambhavatīti pratyabhyāsaṃ karmabheda eveti । na cātra varttamānāpadeśarūpatayā vidhyabhyāsa eva nāstīti vaktavyam । “varma vā etadyajñasya kriyate, yatprayājānūyājā ijyante varma yajamānāya bhrātṛvyābhibhūtyai” ( tai. saṃ., 2. 6. 1. 5.)
ityarthavādasambandhena pañcamalakāravidhirnirṇīyate, vidhistutyoreka- viṣayatvāt ।

yattu ‘guṇo vā nāmadheyaṃ vā samidādipadaṃ bhavet । tābhyā- meva ca bhedo'tra kimabhyāsaḥ kariṣyati’ ।। ityuktam, tatra samidādi- padānāmuktakrameṇa guṇa paratvāsambhavādeva guṇasya tāvanna bhedakatvam । nāpi nāmadheyasya, ananyaparavidhyākhyātasamabhivyāhṛtatvāt । na hyatrānyathāsiddhavidhyākhyātābhyāsaḥ, yathā “udbhidā yajeta paśu- kāmaḥ” ityatra, tatra prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya yajiśabdenānūdya paśuphale vidhānenāpi vidhyākhyātābhyāsasāmarthyānna karmāntaratvam । kintarhi ? guṇasyaiva, jyotiṣṭomanāmāvaruddhe nāmāntarasya praveśā- sambhavāttatra nāmadheyameva bhedakam । atra tvananyākṛṣṭatātparyasyā- khyātasyaiva karmāntaramantareṇāsambhavaḥ । vidhyākhyātābhyāsasyaiva bhedakatve siddhe nāmadheyamapi tadviṣayameva vyavatiṣṭhate, na tvagrata eva । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 467)

na caivaṃ sati yathābhyāsādbhedastathā “samidho yajati” iti bahuvacanaśruteḥ saṃkhyāto'pi bhedaḥ prāpnotīti vaktavyam । ananyagā-
minī hi saṃkhyā karmagatā karma bhinatti । yathā—“tisna āhutī- rjuhoti” (tai. saṃ., 2. 3. 9.) “dvādaśa dvādaśāni juhoti” iti । iha punaḥ “samidbhyaḥ svāhā, iḍbhyaḥ svāhā” iti māntravarṇikadevatāsa- mbaddhasya nāmapravṛttinimittatvāddevatābahutvanimittamevaitadbahuvacanam, na caitadbahutvaṃ karmanimittamiti । atra ca vākyāntarāvagatabhāvanā- nuvādena dhātvarthavidhānasya pūrvādhikaraṇe nirastatvāt । svavākyā- vagatabhāvanānuvādasya ca pūrvāprāptatvenānuvādāsambhavādbhāvanābhi- dhānamavaśyāṅgīkaraṇīyam । vidhiścābhyāsasahāyo bhedaka iti sadhā- tvarthāmeva bhāvanāṃ vidhirbhedayati । ato yadbhrāntāḥ kecijjalpanti— dhātvarthabheda evābhyāsato dhātvarthabhedācca bhāvanābheda iti, tadupekṣa- ṇīyameveti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe ekasmin karmaṇi devatānāṃ vaikalpika- tvātsakṛdanuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu pratyabhyāsaṃ karmabhedenānuṣṭhānam ।
sūtrantu—ekasya punaḥśruterevaṃ syāt । yathā śabdāntaraṃ bhedakaṃ tathā syāt, aviśeṣāt । anyathā kañcidviśeṣamanabhida- dhadvākyamanarthakameva syāt ।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
evaṃ samāmanti—“yadāgneyo'ṣṭākapālo'māvāsyāyāṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati” (tai. saṃ., 2. 6. 3. 3.) “tāvabrūtā- magnīṣomāvājyasyaiva nāvupāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajanniti” “tābhyāmeta- magnīṣomīyamekādaśakapālaṃ pūrvamāse prāyacchat” (tai. saṃ., 2. 5. 2. 3.) “aindraṃ dadhyamāvāsyāyām aindraṃ payo'māvāsyāyām” (tai. saṃ., 2. 5. 4. 1.) iti । tathā “āghāramāghārayati” (tai. brā., 3. 3. 7.) “ājyabhāgau yajati” “sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati” “patnīḥ saṃyājayati” “samiṣṭayajūṃṣi juhoti” “ya evaṃ vidvānpaurṇamāsīṃ yajate” “ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate” (tai. saṃ., 1. 6. 9/?/ 1.) iti । tatra sandehaḥ-kiṃ sarvāṇyetāni samapradhānāni ? utāgneyā- dīni payontāni pradhānāni, āghārādīnyupakārakāṅgāni । tathā “ya evaṃ vidvān” ityevaṃsaṃyuktau prakṛtānāṃ karmaṇāmanuvadi- tārau, athavā pūrvayoḥ karmaṇorvidhātārau, tatretare guṇavidhaya iti । pūrvādhikaraṇenābhyāsato bhedamabhidhāyedānīṃ tadapavādaḥ kriyate । atra “ya evaṃ dvivān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate, ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajata” iti vākyadvayameva vicāraviṣayatvenodāharaṇam । yattu
bhāṣyakāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇāpaṭhitāni bahūnyaṅgapradhānavākyā- nyudāhṛtya kiṃ samaprādhānyam ? aṅgaṅgibhāvo veti saṃśayapradarśanaṃ kṛtam, na tadvicāryatvena, kintarhi ? prastutādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasiddhānta- prayojanatveneti mantavyam, śeṣaśeṣivicārasya kariṣyamāṇatvāt ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-vidvādvākyadvayapratipāditayoḥ karmaṇorāghārādibhyastāvadayāgarūpebhyaḥ śabdāntarādeva bhedaḥ, yāga- rūpebhya āgneyādibhyo'bhyāsādeva bhedaḥ । ataḥ pṛthagevaitatkarma- dvayam । nanu vartamānāpadeśasarūpatvātkarttṛyogiyacchabdopabandhenaiva vidhirūpatiraskārānnānayorvidhitvam । vidhyabhyāsaśca bhedaka ityu- ktam । tatkathamanayorvidhyabhāvātkarmabhedapratipādakatvam ? na caivaṃ sati vākyadvayametadanarthakam । “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” ityadhikāravākyāpekṣitasamudāyadvayakaraṇenārthavatvāt ।

ucyate—varttamānāpadeśasarūpatve'pi prayogavacanopasaṃgraheṇa pañca- malakāranirṇayādevāsya vidhitvam । tathāhi—prayogavacanasannidhisa- māmnānena tadekavākyatāpannamidaṃ vākyadvayam । tadekavākyatvañca tada- pekṣitārthapratipādane bhavati । taccāsya mantrārthavādarūpatvābhāvātkarmavi- dhitvenaiva nirṇīyate । na ca kartṛyogiyacchabdaivaṃśabdābhyāṃ vidhitira-
skāraḥ, kriyāviśeṣitakartṛyogī hi yacchabdo viśeṣaṇībhūtakriyā- vidhānaparipanthī bhavati । yathā “yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣomīyaṃ paśu- mālabhate” iti । atra hi dīkṣārūpakriyāviśeṣitakarttṛyogī yacchabdo dīkṣāvidhānaparipanthī bhavati, na tu paśudravyakāgnīṣomadevatāyāga- vidhānaparipanthī । evamihāpi yo vidvāniti vedanakriyāviśeṣita- karttṛyogī yacchabdo vedanakriyāvidhānameva pratibadhnāti, na yāga- kriyāvidhānamiti । tathaivaṃśabdo'pyevaṃ vidvāniti vedanakriyāparā- marśaka eva, na yāgakriyāparāmarśaka ityavyāhatameva vidhitvamiti । na cādhikārāpekṣitasamudāyakaraṇenānuvādasyārthavatvaṃ rājasūyava- tphalavākyenaiva samudāyakaraṇasambhavāt । na caivaṃ sati ‘rājasūyena’ itivat ‘darśapūrṇamāsena’ ityekavacanaprayogaprasaṅgaḥ । ‘supāṃ supo bhavanti’ ityekavacanasthānaprayuktasyaikavacanasamānārthatvāt । ataḥ samidādivadvidhyabhyāsādeva paurṇamāsyamāvāsyānāmāvacchinnamevaita- tkarmadvayaṃ vidhīyate । na ca pravṛttinimittābhāvānna nāmadheyam । agnihotrādānāmiva vidhāsyamānadevasambandhanirīkṣaṇena “paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta” “amāvasyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajeta” iti vākya- dvayavidhāsyamānakālasambandhapravṛttinimittanirīkṣaṇena karmadvaye nāma- dheyatvopapatteḥ । na cāsiddhe nāmni kathaṃ tadullekhena kāla- vidhiḥ, anyonyāśrayāditi vācyam । yataḥ “agnihotraṃ juhoti”
itivatsāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva nāmatve siddhe tadullekhena bhāvikāla- vidhinā pravṛttinimittamātraṃ nirṇīyate iti nānupapannam ।

nanu dravyadevate hi karmaṇo rūpam । na cātra devatāsti । na cāvyaktacodanātvasāmānyena saumikadravyadevatālābhena rūpavatvam । yato nirapekṣo hi vidhiḥ, sāpekṣeṇopajīvyate । atra ca soma- vidherdīkṣaṇīyādyaṅgadvāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsavidhyupajīvitvena karmāpekṣa- tvam । tadyadi darśapūrṇamāsavidherapi tadupajīvanam, tadetaretarā- śrayāpattiḥ। tatkathaṃ karmavidhitvamiti । maivam; “sarvasmai vā etadya- jñāya gṛhyate yaddhruvāyāmājyam” ( tai. brā. 3. 3. 5. 5 ) iti praka- raṇaśrutājyadravyasya dhruvāvākyāddravyaṃ tāvadasti । na caikenaiva vākyenājyasya dhruvāsambandhavidhāne yāgasambandhavidhāne ca vākya- bhedaḥ । “yaddhruvāyāmājyam” ityasya dhruvāsambandhamanūdya yāga- sambandhamātravidhānāt । tadyadyājyadhruvāsambandhabodhakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ śrutamasti, tadā tatprāptānuvādenānuvāda eva । atha nāsti tadaitadarthavādānyathānupapattikalpitavākyalabhyasyaivānuvāda iti nānu- papannam ।

devatāprāptirapi māntravarṇikī । “vārtraghnī pūrṇamāse'nūcyete, vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyām” ( tai. saṃ., 2. 5. 2. 5 ) ityetadvākyā- nvayena vārtraghnīśabdābhidheyamṛgdvayaṃ vṛdhanvatīśabdābhidheyaṃ cargdvayamā-
jyabhāgakramapaṭhitamapi vākyabalena kramaṃ bādhitvaitatkarmasambandhitvena vidhāyate । tayoścaikāgneyī, aparā saumī । tatra caikaikasmin karmaṇi yugapadviniyuktamantradvayena yugapaddevatādvayasamarpaṇāddevatayorekaika- smin karmaṇi samuccaya eva । tathā sati mantrayorapi samuccaya eva । etadanurūpayājyāprāptiśca dāśatayīpāṭhādbhavatīti nānupapannam । tenājyabhāga eva kālavyavasthārthaṃ vākyadvayaṃ yathāsiddhāntameva bhaviṣyati । paurṇamāsyāṃ yāvājyabhāgau tau vṛtrahapadavanmantrakau । amāvāsyāyāṃ yāvājyabhāgau tau vṛdhanvatpadamantrakāviti । maivam; pūrvapakṣe kālavidhāyakavākyadvayaṃ vidvadvākyavidheyakarmadvayasyaikakālavi- dhānāt । ājyabhāgayoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālaprāptau na tadvya- vasthārthatvamiti mantravidhāyakatvameveti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 475 )

ājyabhāgayostu “yasyai kasyaiciddevatāyai havirnirvapan ājyasyaiva nau purastādyajan” iti purākalpasarūpeṇa vākyenāgnī- ṣomayorlābhādatrāpi tayordevatātvam । atra yadyapi sākṣādagnī- ṣomayoḥ śravaṇaṃ nāsti, tathāpi “tābrūtā magnīṣomāvājyasyaiva nau”
ityatra nauśabdena tadupādānavyavasthitatvādatrāpi nauśabdena tayo- revopādānamiti । yājyānumantraṇakramaprāptānabādhitvaiva anuvākyā- yugalamātrasya vākyenānyatra viniyuktatvāt । anuvākyāprāptiśca dāśatayopāṃśukāṇḍādevetyekaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।

athavā āgneyādivākyaireva vidvadvākyotpannakarmadvayasambandhena guṇavidhānādrūpalābho bhaviṣyati । na ca prāpte karmaṇyanekavidhāna- doṣaḥ । “puroḍāśaṃ saṃyunakti” “puroḍāśaṃ paryagni karoti” ityādi- sāṃskāravākyaparyālocanena puroḍāśādidravyaprāptāvagnyādidevatā- mātravidhānāt । yadvā bhinnapadopāttānekārthavidhāne hi vidhyāvṛtti- lakṣaṇo vākyabhedo bhavati । yathā “vāsasā krīṇāti” ityeneno- tpanne kraye'ruṇādivākyenānekaguṇavidhāne । atra tvekenaivāgneyā- dipadenānāvṛttenāgnidevatāviśiṣṭapuroḍāśādirūpadravyopasthānātpratya- yena caikadevatāvidhānānnāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ । yatra tu pṛthakpadena dravyadevatopādānam, yathā “tāvabrūtāmagnīṣomāvājyasyaiva nāvupāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan” ityasya purākalparūpatvenāvidhāyakatvāt । tadevaṃ dvidhā pūrvapakṣaḥ sampadyate । ekatrāgneyādivākyavihitāni ṣaṭ karmāṇi vidvadvākyayugalavihitaṃ ca karmadvayamityaṣṭau karmāṇi । aparatra cāgneyādivākye guṇavidhānādvidvādvākyayugalavihitakarmadvaya- meva । tadevaṃ pūrvapakṣadvaye'pi darśapūrṇamāsopapadasya kasmiṃścitkarmaṇya-
prasiddhatvādyajestu yāgamātraviṣayatvena prasiddhatvādyajisāmānādhi- karaṇyena yajimātranāmatvam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 476)

tathā sati prakṛtayāgānāmeva phale vidhānādrājasūyavatsarveṣāmeva prayājānūyājānāmapi samapradhānatvameveti । nanvevaṃ sati pradhānasyā- natideśātkathaṃ vikṛtau prayājātideśaḥ ? vacanādityucyate— “prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhoti” ityādi । atra prayājānuvādena kṛṣṇalahomavidhānādeveti nānupapannam । atha kasmādetāveva vidvādvā- kyayugalavihitau paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃjñakau.... ....japhale tayoravi- dhānam ? evantarhi samudāyanāmatve'pi tayorapratyabhijñānātsiddhā- nte'pi kathaṃ phale vidhānam ? atha siddhānte na saṃjñādvāreṇa samudāya- dvayopasthāpanam, kintarhi ? kāladvāreṇa । evantarhi etatkarmadvaye'pya- viśiṣṭam—“paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyayā yajeta” amāvāsyāyā- māvāsyayā yajeta iti vākyadvayena kālavidhānasyoktatvāt । tenānayoreva phalavākyena viniyogātkutaḥ samaprādhānyamiti । naitat; kālasaṃyogasyāgneyādīnāmapi ṣaṇṇāmaviśiṣṭatvena kasya yāgadvayasya grahaṇamiti nirṇetumaśakyatvāt ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 477)

na ca vācyam—dvikarmapakṣe tāvadayaṃ parihāro na sambhava- tyeva । aṣṭakarmapakṣe'pyevaṃ sati kāladvāreṇāṣṭānāmeva karmaṇāṃ phale viniyogo na bhaviṣyatīti prayājādibhiḥ saha samaprādhānyamiti । yataḥ, pūrvaprasiddhaṃ hi svayaṃ phalavākyamupādatte । na tu phalasambandha- paraṃ vākyam । upapadasyāpi vṛtyantareṇārthāntarapadatvamāpādayitu- mutsahate tadihāpi kālavacanau darśapūrṇamāsaśabdau lakṣitalakṣaṇa- yā kālayoginau yāgānupasthāpayitumarhataḥ । tenopapadasyāprasiddha- tvātprasiddhārthayajisāmānādhikaraṇyena yajyarthatvameva nirṇīyate । siddhānte tu samudāyānuvādasyaiva phalavākyasthopapadaprasiddhaprayojana- tvādyuktaṃ samudāyasyaiva phalavidhānam । na ceha tathā samastīti pūrvapakṣadvaye'pi samaprādhānyameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ vidhyabhyāsataḥ karmabhedo yadi vidvadvā- kyayugalasya kartṛyuktayacchabdasyaivaṃśabdayogenānuvādakatvaṃ na bhavet ।
yattu vedanakarttṛyogī yacchabdo na yāgakarttṛyogītyuktam । avyabhi- cāreṇaiva vedanakarttṛtvasya prāptatvena yacchabdāviśeṣaṇīyatvāt । “yo dīkṣitaḥ” ityatra tu dīkṣitādīkṣitayorapi yāgakṛttvāviśeṣāt “yo dīkṣita” ityaviśeṣaṇam । na ceha vedanarahitasyācetanasya yāgakarttṛtvamastīti yo vedanakarttā sa yajeteti viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyādyā- gakarttṛviśeṣaṇameva yacchabdaḥ । tatsahacaritaścaivaṃśabdo'pi tathā tada- nuvādakatvādavidhāyakatvameveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 488)

kiñca rūpābhāvādapi na yāgāvidhāyakatvam । tatra bhavatu tāva- dyathākathañciddravyalābhaḥ, devatālābhastu na kathañcidapi sambhavati । na ca māntravarṇikadevatāprāptiḥ । yājyānuvākyāmantrayorājyabhāgakra- mapaṭhitatvena tadarthatvābhāt । na ca vākyena kramaṃ bādhitvā karmadva- yasambandho mantrasya kriyate “vārtraghnī pūrṇamāse'nūcyete vṛdhanvatī amāvāsyāyām” ( tai. saṃ. 2. 5. 2. 5 ) iti mukhyakālavacanayoḥ karmaparatvābhāvāt । taduktam—

lg.l: paścāttu karma tadyogādataḥ kālo'tra gṛhyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 478.)

nāpi kāladvāreṇa lakṣaṇayā karmaparatvam । ājyabhāgayoreva paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālayogena mantravyavasthāpakatayā mukhyārthopa- pattau kramabādhena lākṣaṇikatvasvīkārāsambhavāt । na cājya- bhāgayoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālasya prāptatvānna mantravyavasthāpakatvaṃ vacanasyeti vācyam । yataḥ siddhānte tāvatprayogadvayena sāṅgasyaiva paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākālo labdha eva । tathā pūrvapakṣe'pi sarveṣāṃ samaprādhānyena sahacaritānāṃ madhye'ṣṭānāṃ kālasambandhasya śrutatvā- ditareṣāmapi kālasambandhe kalpyamāne prayogavidhitastatkālasyaiva buddhau viparivṛttestatkālasambandhameva kalpayati । tatra paurṇamāsya- māvāsyākālayorvinigamanāpramāṇābhāvādicchāvaśādanuṣṭhāne sati bhavatyavyavasthārthaṃ vacanam । yadā paurṇamāsyājyabhāgau, tadā vārtraghnī anūcyete, yadāmāvāsyājyabhāgau, tadā vṛdhanvatī anūcyete । ato māntravarṇikadevatāyā abhāvenārūpatvānna karma- vidhitvam । kiñca nāmāvacchinnaṃ hi karmadvayametadvidhātavyam । na ca pravṛttinimittābhāvena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāpadayornāmadheyatvamasti । nāpi kālavidhipare vākye vidhāsyamānabhāvikālasambandhanirī- kṣaṇena nāmadheyatvamiti vācyam । utpattau hi nāmapravṛttinimittatvaṃ kālasya । na ca kālavidhipare vākyadvaye vidvadvākyadvayotpannaṃ karma pratīyate । tena yathābhūtasya nāmasambandho na tathābhūtasya
kālasambandhaḥ, yathābhūtasya kālasambandho na tathābhūtasya nāma- sambandha iti । agnihotrādau tu yathābhūtasyotpattistathābhūtasyaiva “yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti” (mai. saṃ., 1. 8. 7.) ityutpattivākyagatahomasvarūpāvagamādvaiṣamyāditi nānupapannam ।

nanvevaṃ tarhyāgneyādivākyaireva devatāmātravidhānādrūpabhāvo bhavati । maivama; prāpte karmaṇi dravyadevatārūpānekaguṇavidhāne vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । na ca saṃskāravākyaparyālocanena dravyaprāptau devatāmātravidhānānna vākyabheda iti vācyam । dravyavidhānamantareṇa saṃskāratvāsambhavāt । anyathā ‘dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhi- sambandhaḥ’ iti nyāyena pradhānakarmatvāpatteḥ । kiñca bhavatu tāvaddravyaprāptiḥ, tathāpyāgneyapadopāttāgnividhāne'ṣṭākapālapadopā- ttāṣṭatvavidhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ । tena yaduktaṃ tadvidhānaikapadopātta- devatāviśiṣṭadravyavidhānānna vākyabheda iti, tadapi nirastam । aṣṭākapālapadopāttātvasaṃkhyāvidhānasyāvaśyakatvena vākyabhedasya tadavasthatvāt । tathāca sūtram—
“codanā vā guṇānāṃ yugapacchāstrāccodite hi tadarthatvāttasya tasyopadiśyeta” ।। (jai. sū., 2. 2. 6) iti ।

nanu siddhānte caikena vākyena dravyadevatāsambandhakālayāgānāṃ vidhāne vākyabhedassamāna eva । na; sakalaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaikabhāvanā-
mavidhāne bhāvārthato bhāvāt । na caivaṃsati viśeṣaṇānāmavidhānam । viśiṣṭavidhyanyathānupapattikalpitavidhibhireva viśeṣaṇavidhānāt । taduktam—

lg.l: prāpte karmmaṇi nāneko vidhātuṃ śakyate guṇaḥ ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 485.)

nanu yathā viśiṣṭavidhirviśeṣaṇavidhisāpekṣastathā viśeṣaṇavi- dhirapi viśeṣyalābhāya viśiṣṭavidhisāpekṣa evetyanyonyāśrayādvi- śiṣṭavidhirapi na sambhavati । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi viśiṣṭavi- dhirviśeṣaṇavidhyavagamāpekṣapravṛttirbhavet । kintarhyākāṅkṣitasannihita- yogyaviśeṣamātrāvagamāpekṣapravṛttiḥ । tāni ca viśeṣaṇāni viśiṣṭa- vidhivākya eva padapratipāditāni, kintu vidhipratipāditā viśiṣṭaviṣayiṇī karttavyatā na viśeṣaṇānāṃ karttavyatāmanāsādya paryavasyatīti viśeṣaṇakarttavyatāpekṣāyāṃ pūrvasiddhā eva viśeṣaṇa- vidhayaḥ śrutārthāpatyā kalpyante । tena viśiṣṭavidhau viśeṣaṇavi- dhayaḥ pūrvasambandhamātreṇaivopayujyante । yathā—jīvato gṛhābhāve barhirbhāvaḥ । yathā vā-śabdārthavyutpattau vyaktau vyavahāradarśanātprathamaṃ
vyaktyarthatvamavagamyate । tatrākṛttyarthatvaṃ prāganavagatamapi sattāmātro- payogi paścāttvānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ vyakteravācyatvādākṛtervācyatvaṃ niścīyate, na cetaretarāśrayatvam, tathehāpi । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 485 )
tataścāgneyādivākyairviśiṣṭāpūrvabhāvanāvidhau na vākyabhedaḥ । tena tadvākyavihitakarmasamudāyānuvādatvameva vidvadvākyayugalasyeti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 489)

idantviha vaktavyam-kiṃ punaḥ samudāyānuvādasya prayojanam ? taducyate—phalavākye hi “darśapūrṇamāsābhyām” iti vacanāddvayoḥ karaṇatvamupajātam । na ca tatkarmasvarūpāpekṣam, teṣāṃ bahutvāt । nāpi rājasūyatphalāpekṣam, tathā sati ‘rājasūyena’ itivadekavacana- svaprasaṅgāt । na cotpattivākyagatakāladvayāpekṣam । tathāpyantara- viśeṣaṇavidhaścāyamiti mudritapustakapāṭhaḥ । arūpatvāditi mudritapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
ṅgatvenaivaikavacanatvaprasaṅgādeva । yattu ‘supāṃ supo bhavanti’ iti bahuvacanasthāne ekavacanamekasminvākye dvivacanamityuktam, agatyā hyarthasādhutvāsambhavātprayogasādhutvamātrārthaṃ tathāśritam । iha tu vidvadvākyayugalāpāditasamudāyadvitvaśravaṇenaivārthasādhutvasambhave sati na prayogasādhutvamātrāśrayaṇam । tathāhi—trayāṇāmāgneyāgnīṣomī- yopāṃśuyājānāmekapaurṇamāsīkālasambandhāttathā trayāṇāmāgneya ai- ndraṃ dadhyaindraṃ paya ityeṣāmekāmāvāsyākālasambandhāt trayāṇāṃ trayāṇāmekaikakālasambandhānāṃ vidvadvākyayugalena phalavākyāpekṣita- dvitvasidhyarthaṃ samudāyānuvādaḥ prayojanavāneveti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 479 )

nanu paurṇamāsyamāvāsyānāmāvacchinnasamudāyasya kathaṃ darśa- pūrṇamāsaśabdābhyāmupādānam ? atra pūrṇamāsaśabdena tadvikāraḥ paurṇamāsīśabdo lakṣyate । evantarhi darśaśabdena viruddhalakṣaṇyai- vādarśanāccandramaso'māvāsyā pratipādyata ityucyate । tadā kimaparāddhaṃ ‘supāṃ supo bhavanti’ ityanuśāsanabalenaikavacanasthāne dvivacanaṃ bahuva- nasya veti । maivam; samudāyānuvādavākyadvayasyānanyaprayojana- sādhyena vidhinā phalavākyagatadvivacanāntadarśapūrṇamāsapadapravṛtti-
sidhyarthamevādhyāpitatvāt kleśenāpi tadupādānaṃ na doṣāya । pūrvapakṣe tu naivaṃvidhaṃ kiñcidasti nimittamiti vaiṣamyam । evañca ṣaṇṇāmeva phalasambandhena vihitatvāditareṣāmāghārādīnāṃ phalavatsa- nnidhinyāyena tadaṅgatvameva bhavatīti siddhāntasya prayojanam ।

sūtrantu— prakriyata iti prakaraṇam, tenāgneyādikarmābhi- dhīyate । paurṇamāsyāmityanena paurṇamāsyāpadayuktavidvadvākyayugala- mupalakṣayati । tenāyamarthaḥ—asminvākyadvaye prakṛtameva karma prati- pādyam, na tatpūrvakarmadvayam । rūpāvacanāddravyadevatāsambandhaprati- pādakaśabdābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthamupāṃśuyājadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
“jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadanvañcau puroḍaśāvupāṃśuyā- jamantarā yajati” (tai. saṃ., 2. 6. 6.) iti । tathā—“viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭamyo'jāmitvāya prajāpatirupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo'jāmitvāya agnīvo/?/- māvupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo'jāmitvāya” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ viṣṇavā-
diguṇakānāṃ prakṛtānāṃ yāgānāṃ samudāyānuvādakam ? utā- pūrvasya yāgasya ? iti । idānīmadhikaraṇatrayeṇa paurṇamāsyadhi- karaṇoktasamudāyānuvāde karttavye sarvātmanā paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇa- siddhāntopajīvanādupāṃśuyājapūrvapakṣasyānantaramārambhaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yathā paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇe rūpa- vatāmāgneyādīnāṃ sannidhisamāmnātasya vidvadvākyayugalasya rūpābhā- vādāgneyādisamudāyānuvādakatvam, tathehāpi “upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati” ityasya viṣṇavādivākyavihitaprakṛtakarmasamudāyānuvādaka- tvam । tathāhi—viṣṇavādivākyānāṃ tavyapratyayavaśādvidhitvaṃ tāvadrasandigdham, devatā ca viṣṇavādipadaiḥ pratītaiva । dravyamapi dhrauvājyam । upāṃśuyājavākye varttamānasarūpādvidhitvameva tāva- tsandigdham । yathākathañciddhrauvājyaprāptāvapi na devatā samasti । na copāṃśuyājakramasamāmnātamantrasambandhāddevatālābhaḥ, viṣṇavādi- devatāprakāśakā mantrā yāgeṣveva liṅgabalena sambadhyante, nāntarā- vākye । na ca karmānuśiṣṭatavyapratyayena viṣṇavādidevatānāmeva karttavya- tāvagamānna yāgavidhānamiti vācyam । yajatītyādāvupasarjanasyāpi yāgasya prādhānyāvagatadevatāviśiṣṭasyāgatyā prādhānyavidhānāt ।
na cātra gatyantaramasti । antarālavidhyabhāvādrūpābhāvācca karmā- vidhāyakatvasyoktatvāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 489.)

na cāntarālavākyasyānupādeyatvāttasyaiva karmaṇa upādānāda- nupādeyatvenāntarālavākya eva karmaṇo vidheyatvamiti vācyam । buddhivicchede hi satyanupādeyaṃ pratyupādānaṃ prakaraṇāntaranyāyena karmabhedakaṃ bhavati । na cātra buddhivicchedo'sti । viṣṇavādivākyo- tpāditasyaiva sannidhānāt । nanu jāmitopakramamajāmitvāvasānamekaṃ vākyamavagamyate । jāmitvājāmitvayorekaviṣayatvāt । taccaivaṃ sambha- vati-yadyantarālavākyasya vidhāyakatvaṃ viṣṇavādivākyānāñcārthavā- datvam । viṣṇavādivākyānāṃ vidhāyakatve vidhibhedena vākyabhedāda- vagataikavākyatvaṃ vihanyate । ekavākyasambhave hi vākyabhedo doṣa eveti । atra cāntarālavākyasyāvidhāyakatvasyoktatvādviṣṇavā- diyuktānāṃ vidhāyakatvaṃ, tathā sati bhinnavidhiprayojanatvena vākya- bhedasyaiva pramāṇabalādāyātatvānna doṣāvahatvam । yacca jāmitvā- jāmitvayorekaviṣayatvam, tadbhinnavākye'pi jāmitve tasya tvanuṣaṅga-
kalpanayā avaruddhatvam । tena yathā “tanūḥ” (mai. saṃ., 1. 2. 7.) ityasya tantroccāritasyaiva “rajāśayā harāśayā” ityetatsambandhaḥ, tathā jāmitvasyāpi viṣṇavādiyuktavākyatraye'pi tantreṇa sambandhaḥ । na ca vākyasambandhijāmitopakramāttasyāntarālavākyavyavahitasya kathaṃ viṣṇavādivākyaissambandhaḥ । antarālavākyasyāpi tadanu- vādakatvena tadvyavadhāyakatvābhāvāt ।

nanu bhavatu viṣṇavādivākyānāṃ karmavidhāyakatvam । anta- rālavākyasya tu kathaṃ sarvānuvādakatvam ? antarālasyaivāprāptatvena vidhānāt । maivam; jāmitāsaṅkīrtterviṣṇavādivākye'pyajāmitvānu- vādenāntarālakālasyāpi prāptatvāt । bhavati cānuvādato'pi sthānaniyamaḥ । yathā—“na girā gireti brūyāt” iti girāpadani- ṣedhānuvādabalādirāpadasthānaniveśitvamiti na kiñcidetat । anu- vādaprayojanañca “upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati” ityanena viṣṇavādiyu- ktakarmaṇāṃ sarveṣāmupāṃśuyājanāmatvaṃ bhavati । tathāca sati “upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan” iti saṃjñaikadeśenānūditānāṃ paurṇamāsīkāla- sambandhaḥ । tataśca phalavākye sarveṣāmevāpādānamiti । ataḥ tanūvarṣiṣṭhā gahvareṣṭhā ugraṃ vaco'pāvadhīttveṣaṃ vaco apāva- dhītsvāheti mantraḥ ।
paurṇamāsīvat “upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati” ityetadapi vākyaṃ samudāyānuvādakameveti । evaṃ prāpte brūmḥ—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: bhavedevaṃ yadi viṣṇavādivākyairyāgavidhānaṃ bhavet । na caitada- sti । tathāhi—yathā “veśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet” (tai. saṃ., 2. 2. 5. 3.) ityukramya “yaddvādaśakapālo bhavati” ityādinā dvādaśakapālasyava stutidarśanādupakramopasaṃhārayorekaviṣayatve sati tadantargatānāmaṣṭatvādīnāṃ na pṛthagvidhiviṣayatvam, tathātrāpi “jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate” ityupakrame puroḍāśayorjāmitādo- ṣopakramādante ca tadapanayanarūpājāmitvopasaṃhārādekavākyatvam । tacca tadaiva sambhavati, yadyekasyaiva vidhitvamitareṣāmarthavādatvam । upakramasthajāmitvadoṣaścāntarālasambandhikarmavidhānamevāpekṣate । ta- syaiva jāmitvadoṣāpanayanahetutvāt । tathābhūtañca “upāṃśu yājama- ntarā yajati” iti vākyam । tatastadeva vidhāyakaṃ, viṣṇavādiyu- ktānāñcārthavādatvameva nirṇīyate ।

yattūktam—yathā “tanūḥ” iti padasya tantroccāritasyaiva rajāśayāharāśayāvākyasambandhaḥ, tathā jāmitvasyāpi tantro-
ccāritasya viṣṇavādivākyatrayasambandhātpratyekamevopakramopasaṃhārayo- rekaviṣayatvamiti । tadayuktam; tatra hyekavākyabalena viṣṇavādi- yuktānāmantarālayuktavidhiśeṣatvāsambhāvādvākyabhede satyavaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvātpadāntarasambandhasyādhyāhārāttantroccāritapadāntarakalpa- nāyā eva laghutvāttathāśritamiti jānīmaḥ । idantu prathamā- vagataikavākyabalena viṣṇavādiyuktānāmantarālayuktavidhiviśeṣatve- naiva vākyāntaratvāsambhavānnopakramasya tantratvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇa- masti । evañca satyarthavādasambandhādvidhitvamasandigdham । na ca rūpābhāvanna karmavidhitvamiti vācyam । tathāhi—dravyaṃ tāvatsā- dhāraṇaṃ dhrauvamevājyamiti । devatāpi ca māntravarṇikī । upāṃśu- yājakrame hi vaiṣṇavaprājāpatyāgnīṣomīyayājyānuvākyāyugalānyā- mnāyante । taiśca tulyārthatayā vikalpyamānairvaikalpikya eva devatāḥ prāpyante । na hyanyathā kramāvagatā mantrā aṅgabhāvaṃ pratipadyante । samavetārthaprakāśanenaiva mantrasyāṅgatvāt na caikavākyānurodhenārtha- vādasyaiva devatāsamarpakatvamiti vācyam । arthavādānāṃ lākṣa- ṇikastutiparatvena mukhyārthastutiparatvābhāvāt । ubhayatra tātparye vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । na ca gatyantaraṃ nāstīti nārthavādatvena sambandhaḥ । kiñca “viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ” ityādyabhidhānādupasa- rjanībhūtī yāgaḥ pratīyate, viṣṇavādayaśca pradhānatayā । yāgā-
bhyupagame ca viṣṇudevatāko yāgaḥ karttavya iti niṣkṛṣya rūpa- bhaṅgena yāge viṣṇavādayo'pradhānabhūtā ityarthātkalpanīyam । na ca “upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati” iti yāgasya prādhānyena pratyakṣavidhau sati kalpanāmarhati । “viṣṇuṃ yajati” ityādiṣvagatyopasarjanārtha- vidhiparatvamapi svīkṛtam । atra tvantarālavākyasyaiva vidhitvena gatisambhavādvaiṣamyam । ato'ntarālavākyasyaiva, viṣṇavādivā- kyānāntvarthavādatvam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā. pṛ. 491)
atassarvathā viṣṇavādivākyānāṃ vidhitvāsambhavādantarāvā- kyasyaiva karmavidhāyakatvam, na tvarthavādatvamiti siddham ।।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe vaiṣṇavādikarmatrayānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tvekasyaiveti ।
sūtrantu-antarāvākye karmacodanā viṣṇavādivākyānāmavi- dhāyakatvena karmaṇāmaprakṛtatvāditi । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 490)

atra kecit “tāvabrūtāmagnūīṣomāvājyasyaiva nānupāṃśu paurṇamā- syāṃ yajan” ityetadevopāṃśuyājasyotpattivākyamiti vadanti । ayañca teṣāmabhisandhiḥ—atra tāvaddravyadevatākālopāṃśutvaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ pratīyate । vidheścātra vidhyantaraśeṣatvābhāvenānuvādatvāsambha- vātpareṇāpi paurṇamāsīkālavidhānārthamavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ । sa cātra rūpasamānayāgalābhasaukaryyāddravyādiviśiṣṭayāgaviṣaya eva kalpanī- yaḥ । antarālavākye tu karmotpattau dravyadevatādikleśena kalpanī- yam । kiñca paurṇamāsīkālasambaddhāgneyāgnāṣomīyapuroḍāśadvayānta- rālakriyamāṇe upāṃśuyāje āgneyādau ca paurṇamāsīkālasya prāpta- tvāt “tāvabrūtām” iti vākyamanarthakameva bhavet । anena tu viśiṣṭakarmavidhāvantarālasyāprāptatvāttadvidhānenaivāntarālavākyamarthava- diti । tena tāvabrūtāmityetadevopāṃśuyājotpattivākyam । antarā- vākyantvantarālavidhāyakameveti । evañca sati sarveṣāmevotpattau kālasambandhatvāviśeṣādekarūpatayā samudāyānuvādavākyena “ya evaṃ vidvān” ityādinā grahaṇamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ।

tadayuktam; arthavādasarūpaṃ tāvadidaṃ vākyam । sarvatra cānu- vādapūrvaṃ pratātihetugaveṣaṇameva prathamaṃ pramātṝṇāṃ bhavati । tadalābhe rūpabhaṅgena kalpitavidhinānūdyamānatayā pratīyamāno vidhīyata iti sthitam । tatra pūrvapratītiehetugaveṣaṇa “upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati”
iti sannihite pratyakṣayāgavidhidarśanānna tāvadyāgavidhaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate । tena viśiṣṭayāgavidhānāsambhavādeka eva guṇo vidhāta- vyaḥ, prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhāne vākyabhedāt । tatrājyasyāpi dhruvāvākyaprāptatvānna vidhānam । devatā cātra pratīyata eva । agnī- ṣomasambandhe taddhitacaturthyoraśravaṇādagnīṣomāviti prathamādvivacanena prātipadikārthamātravidhānātsatyapi vā devatāpratyaye mantravarṇa- prāptānuvādatvenaivopapattau na vidhitvam । upāṃśutvamapyantarā- vākyaprāptaṃ na vidheyam । na copāṃśuyājapadasya nāmatvānnopāṃśutvamanya- to labdhamiti vācyam । yataḥ samabhivyāhāramātreṇāntarāla- vākye nāmatvaṃ sphurati । vastutastu tatprakhyaśāstrāntarābhāvāt artha- vādasya cāvidhāyakatvāt yājaśabdena nānuvādaḥ, upāṃśutvañca vidhīyata eveti । taduktam—

lg.l: vihitaṃ na hyupāṃśutvaṃ śāstreṇānyena kenacit ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 494)

ataḥ paurṇamāsīkāla evāprāptatvādatra vidhīyata iti yuktam । nanu tasyāpi puroḍāśadvayāntarālavidhānenārthaprāptatvāttadvidhānamapi vyartham । maivam; yadi paurṇamāsīkālavidhirna syāt “upāṃśuyāja- mantarā yajati” ityatra puroḍāśadvayāntarālābhāvādupāṃśuyājo na
bhavet । yadā tvantarālākṣepalabhye'pi paurṇamāsīkāle kevalaṃ paurṇa- māsīkālavidhānam, tenaitajjñāyate—antarālāpekṣa eva paurṇamāsī- kāla upāṃśuyājāṅgāntarālaśabdasya cāgneyottarakālopalakṣaṇatva- miti । tasya ca kālasyaikapuroḍāśāyāmapi paurṇamāsyāṃ sadbhāvā- dyuktamupāṃśuyājānuṣṭhānam । etadeva daśame vakṣyati—‘anapāyo hi kālasya lakṣaṇaṃ hi puroḍāśau’ (jai. sū., 10. 8. 69.) iti । ato vā nāyaṃ kālavidhiriti । evaṃ vadatā nyāyāntaravirodho'- pi nākalitaḥ । evaṃ hi vakṣyati jaiminiḥ—‘tadvañca devatāyāṃ syāt’ iti । anena sūtreṇopāṃśuyāje yathā dravye aniyamaḥ, tathā devatā- yāmapyaniyamaḥ pūrvapakṣe pratipādyate । tadetadubhayamapi nopapadyate । antarālavākye hi karmotpattau dravyadevatayoraniyamaḥ sambhāvyate । tatra dravyadevatayoraśravaṇāt “tāvabrūtām” ityatropāṃśuyājotpattau svavākya eva dravyadevatayorlābhādaniyamāśaṅkā kutaḥ ? tathā— “viṣṇurvā syāddhautrāmnānasāmarthyāt” (jai. sū., 10. 8. 53) iti tathā “dhrauvādvā sarvasaṃyogāt” (jai. sū., 10. 8. 48.) iti ca । siddhānte- 'pi māntravarṇikadevatālābho vākyāntarāvagatadhrauvājyalābhe sati sambhavati, na tūtpattigatadravyadevatālābhe satīti yatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikamantarālavākyamevotpādakamiti sādhīya iti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamamāghārāgnihotrādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: “āghāramāghārayati” (tai. brā. 3. 3. 7) iti śrūyate । tathā—“ūrddhvamāghārayati, ṛjumāghārayati, santatamāghārayati” iti । idañca—“agnihotraṃ juhoti” (tai. saṃ., 1. 5. 9.) tathā— “dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ-kimūrddhvamāghāra- yati dadhnā juhotītyādibhirāghārā homāśca vihitāḥ, teṣām “agnihotraṃ juhoti, āghāramāghārayati” ityetau samudāyānuvādau ? utāpūrvayorāghārahomayorvidhātārāviti । pūrvameva vākyatvānurodhena viṣṇvādiyuktānāmarthavādatvenaivānvayopapatterantarāvākyasyaiva vidhitvaṃ na samudāyānuvādakatvamityuktam । iha tu tathābhūtahetvabhāvātpunaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-“āghāramāghārayati” ityanena saha “ūrddhvamāghārayati” ityādīnāṃ na tāvadekavākyatvaṃ pratīyate । nāpi “agnihotraṃ juhoti” ityanena saha “dadhnā juhoti” ityā- dīnāṃ tāvatstutiḥ prakāśyate । ato nārthavādatvam । tenorddhvā-
diyuktavākyānāmūrddhvādiguṇaviśiṣṭāghārakarmavidhāyakatvam, da- dhyādiyuktānāñca dadhyādiguṇaviśiṣṭahomavidhāyakatvamiti । taduktam—

lg.l: na caiṣāmekavākyatvaṃ na ca stutiparā śrutiḥ ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 497)

tathā satyūrddhvādiyuktavākyavihitānāmāghārakarmaṇāṃ “āghā- ramāghārayati” iti samudāyānuvādaḥ । maivam; kevalasya guṇa- vidhānāsambhavāt । pravarttanātmako hi vidhiḥ kriyāyāmeva puruṣaṃ pravarttayati । guṇaśca na kriyā । ataḥ kathaṃ guṇo vidhīyate ? kiñca na guṇapadasyo vidhiḥ śrūyate, kintu ākhyātapadasyaḥ । sa ca samānapadasyadhātvarthabhāvanāparityāgena na padāntarasthaṃ guṇaṃ vidhātu- mutsahate । na ca guṇasya kārakatayā bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvādbhāvanāsthe- nāpi vidhinā guṇo vidhāsyata iti vācyam । yatastatrāpi kiṃ bhāvanāṃ vihāya niṣkṛṣṭa eva guṇaḥ kārakatayā vidhātavyaḥ ? uta bhāvanākāratayā vā ? na tāvanniṣkṛṣṭo guṇo vidhātuṃ śakyate, vidheḥ kriyāśrayatvasyoktatvāt । bhāvanākārakatayā ca vidhānaṃ bhāvanāmantareṇa na sambhavatīti bhāvanāviśiṣṭo vidhīyata ityupapadyate । tena vastutaḥ śabdataśca sarvatra guṇaviśiṣṭabhāvanāvi-
dhānameva vācyam । na tu kvāpi kevalaguṇavidhānamiti ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 497)

nanūrddhvādivākyeṣu na dravyaṃ nāpi devatā samasti । dadhyādi- yuktavākyeṣu ca dravyasadbhāve'pi devatā nāsti । dravyadevate hi karmaṇo rūpam । ataḥ kathamebhiḥ karmavidhānam ? kathaṃ vā “āghāramāghāra- yati” “agnihotraṃ juhoti” iti vākyadvayena samudāyadvayānuvāda iti niścīyate ? na ca vācyam—“caturgṛhītaṃ vā etadabhūttasyāghāramā- ghārya” ityanenāghāreṣvājyadravyavidhānam । “ita indra ūrdhvo adhvara ityāghāramāghārayati” ityanena vihitamantradvāreṇa māntravarṇikī devatāprāptiḥ, tathā “yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti” “yatsṛ- ryāya ca prajāpataye ca prātarjuhoti” ityetābhyāṃ dadhyādihomeṣu kāla- bhedena devatāvidhānamiti । yato nātratyapūrvapakṣī kevalaguṇavidhānaṃ kiñcidapi paśyati । sarvatraiva vidheḥ kriyāśrayatvasyoktatvāt tena sarvāṇyevaitāni vākyāni guṇaviśiṣṭavidhāyakānyeva, na tu vākyāntarasthakriyānuvādena kvaciddevatālakṣaṇaguṇavidhāyakāni । ato'tra yasminvākye kriyāpadamasti, tatra saiva kriyā guṇaviśiṣṭā
vidhīyate । yatra nāsti tatrādhyahṛtaiva kriyā guṇaviśiṣṭā vidhīyate । na caivaṃ sati viśiṣṭavidhāvapi guṇasyākriyārūpatvena vidhisaṃsparśā- bhāvāt kathañcidviśeṣaṇībhūtaguṇopādānamiti vācyam । yato'tratyaḥ pūrvapakṣyevaṃ manyate-niṣkṛṣṭaguṇavidhānaṃ hi na sambhavati । yadā tu bhāvanāsyo vidhirekenaiva vyāpāreṇa bhavanāvidhānaṃ sakalaviśeṣaṇa- viśiṣṭameva vidhatte, na tu viśiṣṭavidhiṃ kalpayati, tadā na kiñcada- nupapannam । ataḥ kathaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ ? iti ।

ucyate—satyamevam, tathāpyākāṃkṣāvaśātparasparadravyadevatānu- ṣaṅgeṇa sarveṣāmeva vākyānāṃ dravyadevatāviśiṣṭakarmavidhāyakatvāddravya- devatālābho nānupapannaḥ । tena yāni vākyānyāghārāgnihotrayorguṇa- vidhāyakatvena siddhāntino'bhimatāni tāni sarvāṇyanyonyānuṣaṅgadra- vyadevatābhidhāyipadāni viśiṣṭavidhāyakāni । na caivaṃ sati ādhā- rāgnihotravākyayorapi dravyadevatābhidhāyipadānuṣaṅgeṇa karmavidhāya- katvānnānuvādakatvamiti vācyam । yato varttamānāpadeśarūpamidaṃ vākyadvayam । na cāvaśyaṃ pañcamalakāratvena vidhitvābhivyañjakārthavā- dassamasti । na cātrānuvādānarhamūrddhvādisthānīyaṃ dadhyādisthānīyaṃ vā guṇāntaramasti । nāmnaścānūdyamānaviśeṣapratipattihetutvenāpyupa- patteḥ । tenorddhvādivākyavihitakarmasamudāyadvayānuvādaḥ । evañcāghā- rāgni/?/hotravākyābhyāmiti niścīyate । samudāyadvayānuvādaprayojanantu
agnihotre ekasamudāyāpannānāmekavacanena “agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ” tathā “yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt” ityādibhiḥ phalanimittayorvidhānasiddhiriti suṣṭhūktameva । āghāre'gnihotre “pañca prayājānyajati” itivatsaṃjñopabandhārtha evāyaṃ samudāyānuvādaḥ । saṃjñopabandhaprayojanañca siddhāntavadeveti svataḥ parataśca karmavidhitvā- pādakarūpopalambhābhāvādāghārāgnihotravākyayossamudāyadvayārthavādatva- miti । evaṃprāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: codanā vā śabdārthasya prayogabhūtatvāttatsannidherguṇārthena- punaḥ śruti ।। 2. 2. 16. ।।
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi “āghāramāghārayati, agnihotraṃ juhoti” iti vākyadvayena karmadvayaṃ na vidhīyeta । ūrddhvādisaṃyukta- vākyairdadhyādisaṃyuktavākyairvātra guṇo vidhātuṃ na śakyate । tathā- hi-āghārāgnihotravākyābhyāṃ tāvannāmāvacchinnaḥ karmaviśeṣaḥ prati- pādyate । nāsau varttamānāpadeśapañcamalakārasandehānna vidhīyate, prayoga- vacanopasaṅgraheṇaivāsya pañcamalakāratvanirṇayāt । na ca paurṇamāsī- vadyacchabdādyupabandho'nuvādakāraṇamasti । tenānanyākṣiptaśaktirayaṃ vidhiḥ karmaiva vidadhāti । nāpyūrddhvādisaṃyuktairvākyairguṇo vidhātuṃ na śakyate । yataḥ sarvatra bhāvanāsya eva vidhiryogyamupapadārthamī-
kṣamāṇo viśiṣṭavidhigauravāt vākyāntaravihate karmaṇi guṇaṃ vidhatte । na cātra vākye'nekaguṇaśravaṇamasti । na ca prakṛte karmaṇi guṇāvarodho'sti । tenaiṣāmavyāhatameva guṇavidhitvam । na ca vācyam—kriyāviṣayo vidhirguṇaśca na kriyetyuktam । ataḥ kathaṃ guṇavidhānamiti । yato'trāpi kriyaiva viśiṣṭā vidhīyata iti brūmaḥ । na ca prāptatvānna vidhīyate, guṇaviśiṣṭa- bhāvanāyā aprāptatvāt ।

nanu prāpte karmaṇi vidhiścātra guṇasaṅkrāntaḥ, kintarhi guṇa- viśiṣṭakarmaviṣayaḥ ? tenāprāptasvargavidhivatprāpte karmaṇi viśiṣṭa- vidhinyāyenaivānekaguṇavidhānopapatteḥ ‘codite hi tadarthatvāttasya ta- syopadiśyeta’ (“jai. sū., 2. 2. 6.) ityanarthakamāpadyate । maivam; yadi bhāvanāstho'yaṃ vidhirbhāvanāsvarūpaṃ prati pravṛttiprayojanatvena gṛhyate, tadākṣiptaviśeṣaṇavidhau satyavākyabhedo bhavatyeva । yadā tu bhāvanāsvarūpasya prāptatvadguṇaviśiṣṭabhāvanāvidhistadā- 'nekaguṇasannidhāne'pi yasyaiva guṇasya bhāvanayā saha viśeṣaṇa- viśeṣyabhāvapratipādanaparo'yaṃ vidhistasyaiva pratipādayet, neta- rasyāpīti tadarthaṃ vidhyāvṛttau vākyabheda eveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 503)

tena prāpte karmaṇi tadanuvādena guṇo vidhīyata iti yadetat tatra tatrocyate, tadbhāvanāsvarūpasya prāptatvāttadgatavidhitātparyābhāvena guṇa- viśiṣṭāyā aprāptatvāttadgataiveti tātparyābhiprāyeṇeti mantavyam । yattvekasyaiva vidheḥ viśeṣye viśeṣaṇe ca tātparyamityuktam, yato viśeṣyatvaṃ hi pradhānata/?/, viśeṣaṇatvañca tadguṇatvam । na ca sakṛ- cchrūtasya vidhervairūpyaṃ sambhavatīti naikasyobhayatātparyatvamiti । na ca dravyadevatayorabhāvādāghārāgnihotravākyayorhomavidhānamiti vā- cyam । vākyāntaravihitadravyadevatāsadbhāvena homavidhinirvāhāt । tathāhi-āghāre tāvat “caturgṛhītaṃ vā etadabhūttasyāghāramāghārya” iti vacanena caturgṛhītājyavidhānāddravyaṃ prāptameva । “ūrddhvo adhvaro di vispṛśamahuto yajño yajñapaterindrāvānsvāhā ityāghāramāghārayati” iti । vacanena mantravidhānānmāntravarṇikadevatālābhaḥ । tathā agni- hotre'pi dadhyādivākyairdravyavidhānaṃ sphuṭameva । tathā “agnirjyoti- rjyotiragniḥ svāhā iti sāyaṃ juhoti, sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti prātarjuhoti” iti vacanadvayavihitamantradvayavaśena sāyaṃprāta- rhomayormāntravarṇikāgnisūryadevatāprāptiḥ । tathā “yadagnaye ca prajā- pataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti, yatsūryyāya ca prajāpataye ca prātarjuhoti” ।। iti vacanadvayena sāyaṃprātarhomayoreva prajāpatidevatānvayaḥ । tena sāyaṃ home'gniśca prajāpatiśca devatā । prātarhome sūryaśca prajāpatiśca devateti ।

na ca “yadagneye ca prajāpataye ca, yatsūryāya ca” iti vacanadvaye- naivāgniprajāpatyoḥ sūryyaprajāpatyośca sāyaṃ prātarhomayorvidhānamiti vācyam । prāpte karmmaṇyekena vākyena nānekaguṇavidhānaṃ sambhavati । anyaparavidhāne sati agnisūryyayormāntravarṇikaprāptidarśanena prajā- patimātravidhānāt । ato vākyadvaye prajāpatirevaiko vidhīyate । anyatsarvamanūdyata iti ।
prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe-āghārāṇāṃ homānāṃ bahūnāmanuṣṭhānam, si- ddhānte tu naivamiti ।

sūtrantu-āghārāgnihotrayoḥ karmacodanā karmavidhānaṃ bhāvanā- rūpasya śabdārthasya prayogabhūtatvāttatsannidheḥ bhāvanāsannidhānādguṇā- rthena guṇavidhānārthena punaḥśrutirvidheḥ punaruccāraṇamityartaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ paśusomādhikaraṇam
chapter.sutra: dravyasaṃyāgoccodanā paśusomayoḥ prakaraṇe hyanarthako dravyasaṃyogo na hi tasya guṇārthena ।। 2. 2. 17 ।।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate “yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhate” (tai. saṃ., 6. 1. 11.) iti । tathā “hṛdayasyāgre'vadyatyatha jihvā/?/yā atha vakṣasaḥ” (tai. saṃ., 6. 3. 10) iti । tathā “somena yajeta”— “aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti, āśvinaṃ gṛhṇāti” ityevamādi । tatra saṃśayaḥ kimavadyatigṛhṇāticoditānāṃ karmaṇāmimāvālabhatiyajatī samudāyasyānuvaditārau ? athāpūrvayoḥ karmaṇorvidhātārau ? iti । idānīṃ pūrvādhikaraṇavaiṣamyātpunaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—bhavatūrddhvādisaṃyuktadadhyādi- saṃyuktavākyānāṃ prakṛte karmaṇi guṇavidhāyakatvenaivopapatteḥ karmā- nuvādakatvam । iha tu “hṛdayasyāgre'vaghati” ityādivākyeṣu hṛdayādisambandhenāvadānaṃ śrūyate । tatra hṛdayādīnāṃ vākyāntara- vihitatvena saṃskārāvadānarūpaguṇavidhānāsambhavāt hṛdayādisā- dhanakarmotpādakatvameva yuktam । “aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti” ityādi- vākyeṣu rasasambandhena grahaṇaṃ śrūyate । tatra rasasya vākyāntarā-
vihitatvena tatsaṃskāragrahaṇarūpaguṇavidhānāsambhavādrasasādhanaka- karmotpādakatvam । evañca sati “yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣomīyaṃ paśumā- labhate” ityatrāgnīṣomadevatāvidhānāya paśuśabdena lakṣaṇayā hṛda- yādisamudāyānuvādaḥ । dravyadevatāsambandhānumitena yajinā ālambha- vākye hṛdayādisādhanakayāgānuvādaḥ । tathā “somena yajeta” itya- trāpi haviḥprakṛtisomalatāvidhānāya yajinā aindravāyavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatāsambandhānumitayāgasamudāyānuvāda iti । atrāpi paurṇamāsīvatsamudāyānuvādatvameva ।

nanu hṛdayasyāgre'vadyati ityādivākyeṣu na tāvadyajiḥ śrūyate । nāpyanumīyate, dravyadevatāsambandhānavagamāt । hṛdayādisambandha- vaśādavadānasya vatsālambhavadyāgamantareṇāpi sambhavānna yāgānu- māpakatvam । katham ? paśudravyāgnīṣomadevatākayāgavidhānenaiva mukhya- paśuśabdārthopapattau dīkṣitavākye lakṣaṇayā paśuśabdena hṛdayādyanu- vādaḥ । ataḥ paśau tāvatsarvathā pūrvapakṣo na sambhavati ।

tathā “somena yajate” iti pratyakṣayāgavidhau sati kathamaindravā- yavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatāsambandhānumitasya yāgasya vidhānam ? ‘pratyakṣavidhisadbhāvāt labhyate nānumānikam’ iti nyāyaviro- dhāt । aindravāyavādivākyānāṃ cendravāyudevatākaśrautagrahaṇavi- dhānenaivopapannatvāt nāśrutayāgavidhānāśaṅkopapadyate । bhavatu vā
dravyadevatāsambandhenaindravāyavādivākyeṣu yāgavidhānam, tathāpi “somena yajeta” ityatra somadravyakayāgavidhānopapatteḥ kathaṃ yajateryacchabdādyuparāgābhāve'pi yāgānuvādakatvaṃ sambhavati ? ataḥ kathaṃ some'pi pūrvapakṣaḥ ? iti । ucyate—paśau tāvadyadyapi hṛdayādi- sambandhenāvadānaṃ śrūyate, tathāpi “sānnāyyaṃ vā tatprabhavatvāt” (jai. sū, 8. 1. 40) ityanenaiva nyāyenāyamavadyatiḥ sānnāyyā- vadyatiprakṛtiḥ । sānnāyyāvadyateśca yāgīyadravyasaṃskārarūpatvā- detasyāpi yāgīyadravyasaṃskārakatvam । tacca tadaiva sambhavati, yadi hṛdayādīni yāgasādhanāni bhavanti । tena yathāyāgasādhanasaṃ- skārābhiṣavasambandhena pūtīkānāṃ yāgasādhanatvaṃ kalpyate, yathā vā lakṣaṇasambandhena phalacamasasyāśrūyamāṇamapi yāgasādhanatvaṃ kalpyate, tathehāpīti, paśuśabdena hṛdayādīnyanūdyante । yajinā ca tatsamba- ndhinā yāgānanūdya agnīṣomau devatātvena vidhīyete । na ca paśu- śabdasya hṛdayādyanuvādatve lakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ । yato vidhau hi lakṣaṇā doṣamāvahati, nānuvāde । athavā yo dīkṣitavākye devatā- vidhidarśanādeva hṛdayādivākyeṣu yāgānumānam ।

nanu yo dīkṣitavākye devatāviśiṣṭayāgavidhirevāstu kathaṃ devatāmātravidhānam ? maivam; evaṃ hi manyate—avaśyaṃ siddhānti- nāpi hṛdayādigatāvadānasaṃskāravaiyarthyāt paśuśabdasya lakṣaṇayā
hṛdayādiparatvaṃ vaktavyam । tadyadi yodīkṣitavākye yāgotpattiḥ, tadā vidhau lakṣaṇā, sā cāyuktā ‘na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ’ iti nyāyāt । avadyāti vākyānāntu yāgotpādakatve'nuvāde lakṣaṇā, sā na doṣāya । dṛṣṭā ca bhāvinīmapyaṅgaprāptimālocyotpattivyavasthā । yathā saṃkhyādhikaraṇe bhāvinīmātideśikāvadānagaṇaprāptimālocya saptadaśayāgotpattiḥ । tena paśuśabdena hṛdayādīnyanūdya yajatinā tatsambandhinā yāgānanūdyāgnīṣomau devatātvena vidhīyete iti siddham ।
tathā some'pyaindravāyavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatāsambandhena tāvadavaśyaṃ yāgo'numātavyāḥ । na hi dravyadevatāsambandhapratipādakasya yāgaṃ vinā svārthe paryavasānamasti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 510)

nanvevaṃ śrutānumitaikadeśamevedaṃ vākyaṃ niṣyannam—indravāyudaiva- tyena dravyeṇa yajeteti । tathā sati somavākyavihitayāgānuvādenā- gnīṣomavākya iva hṛdayādyanuvādena devatāvidhānamevāstu, kimatra viśiṣṭavidhisvīkāreṇa ? maivam; somavākyotpannayāgānuvādenaindra- vāyavādivākyairddevatāvidhau ekayāgasambandhena khadirapalāśānāmi- vai/?/kasminyāge vikalpaḥ syāt ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 512)

tathā sati “āśvino daśamo gṛhyate tṛtīyo hūyate” iti kramada- rśanam, tathā “daśaitānadhvaryuḥ prātassavane grahān gṛhṇāti” iti samuccayadarśanañca nopapadyate । aindravāyavādivākyānāntu yāgotpāda- katve bhinnayāgasambandhitvāddevatānāṃ samuccaye sati kramasamuccaya- darśanamupapadyate । tathā sati rūpābhāvena yāgavidhānābhāvādyaccha- bdādyabhāve'yaindravāyavādivākyavihitayāgasamudāyānuvāda evāyaṃ “somena yajeta” ityatra yajatiśabdaḥ । somaśabda aindravāyavādi- vākyāvagatarasaprakṛtisomalatāvidhānārtha iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra paurṇamāsīvadvākyāntarotpanna- yāgapratyabhijñānaṃ bhavet । sarvatra khalu pratyabhijñānabalenānuvādo bhavati । punaranuvādasidhyarthaṃ pratyabhijñākāraṇaṃ kalpyate । na cāva- dyatigṛhā/?/tivākyeṣu yāgaḥ śrūyate, yenātra pratyabhijñānam ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 512)

tena yodīkṣitavākya eva dravyadevatāsambandhānumitasya yāgasya vidhānam । somavākye tu pratyakṣasiddhameva dravyaviśiṣṭa- yāgavidhānam । na tra vācyam—paśudravyakasomadravyakayāgotpattau hṛdayādīnāṃ rasasya cāviniyuktatvāttatsambandhinoravadānagrahaṇa- rūpasaṃskārayorvidhānamanarthakameva syāditi । na hi paśusomamātra- pratītiḥ, yato'vadyatigṛhṇātivākyadarśanena tayoravikṛtayordevatoddeśena yāgavidhānāt । kiṃ tarhi ? hṛdayādiparyanto rasaparyantaśca tena somaviniyogena tadantargatapaśuhṛdayasomarasayorapi viniyuktatvādvi- niyuktagocarameva saṃskāravidhānam । yathā-vrīhiśāstrasya taṇḍu- lādiparyantatvāt “taṇḍulān pinaṣṭi” ityādisaṃskāravidhānam । na caivaṃ sati vidhau paśusomaśabdaḥ saṃskārajñāpanārthaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 516)

kiñca viśeṣataḥ paśūdāharaṇe avadyatau yāgaḥ sambhāvayitu-
mapi na śakyate । yadapi hṛdayādyavadānasya sānnāyyāvadāna- prakṛtitvena taddharmalābhe sati yāgīyadravyasaṃskāratvādyāgānumāna- mityuktam, tadapyayuktam; sānnāyyāvadyatereva prakṛtāvacoditatvena dharmasambandhābhāvāt । na ca “dvirhaviṣo'vadyati” ityanena tāva- davadānaṃ vidhīyate । kintarhi ? arthaprāptānuvādena dvitvamātram । etacca sarvapradānādhikaraṇe (pū. mī., 3. 4. 18) vistareṇa vakṣyāmaḥ । bhavatu vā hṛdayādyavadānasya tatprakṛtitvaṃ, tathāpi na yāgasādhana- saṃskārakatvaṃ tasya । itikarttavyatā cātidiśyate, na dharmamātram । ato na tadvaśenāpi yāgakalpanā । pūtīkābhiṣavaphalacamasa- bhakṣaṇayostu yāgasādhanadravyasaṃskārayoreva prakṛtayorvākyapraka- raṇābhyāṃ pūtīkaphalacamasasambandhenopādānamiti vaiṣamyam । yadapi yodīkṣitavākye paśuśabdasya lakṣaṇayā hṛdayādi- patatvamāpādya vidhau lakṣaṇābhāvāt bhāvidevatāsambandhanirīkṣaṇe- nāvadyativākya eva yāgānumānamityuktam, tadapi yāgavidhau paśuśabdasya hṛdayādiparyantatvena mukhyārthasyoktatvānnirastam । paśūdāharaṇaṃ tāvannirapavādam ।

evaṃ “somena yajeta” iti pratyakṣe yajāvaindravāyavādivākyeṣu yāgaḥ sambhāvayitumeva na śakyate । na cāgneyādivākyānāmivaindra- vāyavādivākyeṣvapi na yāgamantareṇa svārthaparyavasānamastīti vācyam ।
yata indravāyudevatoddeśena dravyagrahaṇavidhānenaiva vākyaparyavasānāt । āgneyādivākyeṣu tu puṃvyāpārasya vidhiviṣayatvādbhavatyarthasya cā- puṃvyāpāratvādavaśyaṃ kalpanīye puṃvyāpāre dravyadevatāsambandhena yāga eva kalpyata ityuktam । iha grahaṇarūpasya puṃvyāpārasya śrutatvānnā- paryavasānaṃ vākyasyeti ।

nanu tyajyamānaṃ haviḥ pratyuddeśyatvaṃ devatātvam, na kiñcijjā- tyā samasti । ataḥ kathaṃ grahaṇe devatānvaya ? iti । ucyate—na hīdaṃ grahaṇamarthāntarabhūtam, kintarhi ? yāgāvayavabhūtamevaitat । na hi devatoddeśena tyajyate । na cānyoddeśena gṛhītasyānyoddeśena tyāge yāgassampadyate । tena devatoddeśena gṛhītasyaiva haviṣastyāgo yāga iti na yāgāvayavabhūte grahaṇe devatoddeśo virudhyata iti । evañca yāgāpekṣāyāṃ “somena yajeta” ityayameva pratyakṣaśruto yāgo'stīti nātra yāgakalpanāprayāsa iti । tathā ca sati iyameva yāgaikadeśa- bhūtagrahaṇasambandhinī devatā prakṛtayāge devatāpekṣiṇi sambadhyata iti ।

na caivaṃ sati khādirapālāśādīnāmivaikabandhanārthatve devatānā- mapyekayāgārthatve vikalpa iti vācyam । yato nātra khādirapālāśā- dīnāmiva bandhane, devatānāṃ yāge vākyena vidhānam, yena vikalpa āpadyeta । kintarhi ? grahaṇamukhena devatānāṃ yāgānvayaḥ । graha-
ṇāni tāvadbhinnakāryāṇi yugapadeva prakaraṇinā gṛhītāni bhinna- kāryatvātsamuccetavyāni । tena grahaṇadvārā devatānāmapi samuccayo yuktaḥ । paramayaṃ viśeṣaḥ—grahaṇatyāgayorekā devatā, yena yaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ taduddeśenaiva tyaktavyam । tena pratigrahaṇaṃ somayāgasyābhyāsaḥ । evañca sati triṣavaṇadaśagrahadaśacamasādīnāṃ pratyabhyāsaṃ bhinno yāgaḥ “somena yajeta” ityanena śāstreṇa sakṛdutpādita iti mantavyam । tathā sati “āśvino daśamo gṛhyate tṛtīyo hūyata” iti krama- darśanam, tathā “daśaitānadhvaryuḥ prātassvane grahān gṛhṇāti” iti samuccayadarśanamupapannaṃ bhavatīti somodāharaṇamapyanavadyam ।

prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe hṛdayādīnāmaindravāyavādiyāgānāṃ pṛthaktvā- tsvārthatvādviśeṣacodanāliṅgāttaddharmātideśe sati na sakaladharmaprāptiḥ । siddhānte tu paśuyāgasya somayāgasyaikatvāt vikṛtau sakaladharmā- pattiriti ।

sūtrantu—paśusomadravyasaṃyogātpaśuvākye somavākye ca yāga- codanā yāgavidhānam, yasmātprakṛtayāgeṣvanarthako niṣprayojano dravyasaṃyogaḥ । ‘na hi tasya guṇārthena’ iti sūtrāvayavo bhāṣya- kāreṇa somodāharaṇe somalatāyāḥ pradeyatvena guṇārthatvamāśaṃkya śrautarasāvarodhena tannirākaraṇaparatayā vyākhyātaḥ । ‘na hi tasya guṇāya/?/na’ iti sūtrāvayavatātparyamanākalitaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa । na hi
guṇādhikaraṇaviruddhā pradeyatvena guṇatvāśaṅkā jaiminermanasi sambhāvyate । vrīhiyavavatpradeyaprakṛtitvenaiva tu socitā । taduktam—

lg.l: vrīhyādayo vidhīyante tathā somo vidhāsyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 513)

atraike samādhānamabhidadhati—“āgneyo'ṣṭākapālo bhavati” ityatrāgnidevatāsambandhapuroḍāśapratipādakavākyaśeṣaḥ sambhavati । “puroḍāśaṃ kūrmaṃ bhūtaṃ sarpantamapaśyan tamabruvan indrāya dhriyasva bṛhaspa- taye dhriyasva viśvebhyo devebhyo dhriyasva” ityādi । asya ca stuti- paratve'pi stutyapuroḍāśapratipādanāvarodhātsvavākyasthapuroḍāśa evā- gneyataddhitaparyavasānam । tathā sati kiṃprakṛtikaḥ puroḍāśa iti prakṛtidravyāpekṣāyāṃ “vrīhibhiryajeta” iti yuktaḥ prakṛtitayā vrīhī- ṇāṃ vidhiḥ । atra tu “aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti” iti vākyaśeṣānava- gamātprakaraṇanirīkṣaṇena ca “somaṃ punāti” iti saprakṛtikasyaiva rasasya pratītestatraiva taddhitaparyavasānamiti prakṛtirūpāpekṣā- bhāvānna prakṛtitvena “somena yajeta” iti somalatāvidhiḥ sambhavati । na ca “tvāṣṭraṃ pātnīvatamālabheta” ityatra yathālambhasyā- rthākṣiptālabhyamātre taddhitaparyavasānam, tāta “aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti” ityatrāpi svāvākya eva grahaṇākṣiptagrahamātre taddhitaparyavasānam ।
avyavahitaśruteśca “aṇvyā dhārayā gṛhṇāti” iti vākye gauṇaśabda- syaivāvyabhicārigrahaṇaviśeṣābhidhāyakatvāt, avyabhicaritopasthi- tadravadravyeṇaiva taddhitaparyavasānamiti vaktavyam । (?) yenānyaparaśabdo- panītāvaprāptenārthākṣiptenārthenābhidhānamiti vyutpatteḥ, paramate ca nityaṃ śābdāśābdayorasambandhādarthākṣiptasyāpi tadvācakaśabdakalpanāvya- tirekeṇānvayātprakaraṇe ca “somaṃ punāti” iti ananyaparaśabdopa- nītasya sāmarasasyaiva prāptestatraiva paryavasānam ।

na ca latāvacanatvātsomaśabdasya “somaṃ punāti” ityatra somaśabdo na rasapara iti vācyam । dravadravya........paharaṇā- bhidhāyakasyotpunātiśabdasya latāsamabhivyāhārānupapattau lākṣa- ṇikasvaprabhavarasaparatvasyāvaśyābhyupeyatvāt । na ca prathamāva- gatasomaśabdānurodhenotpunātiśabda eva lakṣaṇāśrayaṇānna somalakṣaṇārthatvaṃ vaktavyam । utpunātiśabdagatalakṣaṇāyāṃ somalatāsambandhocitakriyāviśeṣe vinigamanāpramāṇābhāvāt । somaśabde tūtpavanasambandhocitasvaprabhavarasasyaiva yogyatvādasti vinigamanāyāṃ pramāṇamiti tadgataiva lakṣaṇeti । evaṃ satyu- tpavanapradhānakarmatve cobhayathāpi somaśabdasya rasaparatvātki- maindravāyavamityapekṣāyāmanuṣaṅgātsomarasa eva sambadhyate । na ca dhārāvākyavyavadhānānnānuṣaṅgaḥ, tatrāpi kiṃ dhārayā gahā/?/tītya-
pekṣāyāṃ somarasasambandhāt । yathā “yā te agne rajāśayā” itya- nena sambaddhaṃ “tanūḥ” iti padaṃ harāśayetyatra na vyavadhīyate, tathehāpi somarasasya na dhārāvākyenaindravāyavasambandho vyavadhīyata iti । tathāca sati somarasa eva taddhitaśruteḥ paryavasānātprakṛtidravyāpekṣā- bhāvānna tatprakṛtitayā latāvidhissambhavati । taduktam—‘puroḍāśo hyanirūpitaprakṛtidravyatayāgneyādiṣu pratīyata iti yuktaṃ prakṛtidra vyavidhānām । iha tu nirūpitaprakṛtikaḥ somarasa eva gamyate, na hi bhavati somarasaḥ kiṃprakṛtika ityapekṣā’ iti ।

atrocyate—bhavatu somarasa eva taddhitaśrutiparyavasānam, tathāpi niyamena krayaṇābhiṣavasaṃskṛtasomaprabhavarasahaviṣkayāga- siddhyarthamaṅgatayā somavidhānamarthavadbhaviṣyati । itarathā tvanaṅgasya niyamenopādānābhāvāt pratigrahaṃ krayaṇādisvarasenāpi yāgaḥ kriyeta । na cānaṅgatve'pi prasaṅgādeva krītādabhiṣutātpūtāttathā- bhiplāvitādapi somādudbhūta evāsau rasa aindravāyava iti vaktavyam, vikalpāsahatvāt । kiṃ krayaṇādīnāṃ saṃskārakarmatvamāśri- tyocyate ? pradhānakarmatvaṃ vā ? na tāvadādyaḥ kalpaḥ—tasya vini- yuktagocaratvenāsambhavāt । nāpi dvitīyaḥ—tatrāpi (?) yadyapsu pānaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, tadā krītasomāpacāre'bhiṣavādīnāṃ rasāpacāre ca pradhānasya lopa eveti ।

kiñca—sāmānyaśāstraṃ hi prasaṅgena viśeṣaśāstramapekṣāvaśā- dupajīvati । yathā padakarmaśāstraṃ krayārthānīyamānaikahānyupapada- viśeṣaśāstram । krayābhiṣavādiśāstrāṇāntu lokasiddhasomagrāhitvena tulyatvāt ‘tulyeṣu nādhikāraḥ syāt’ iti nyāyena na prasaṅgaviṣaya- tvamiti yuktaḥ prakṛtitvena somavidhiriti । taduktam—‘somena yajetetyetadvidhimantareṇāpi krayaṇābhiṣavādisaṃskāravidhyupapatteḥ’ । na cāviniyuktatvena somasyānaṅgatvādasaṃskāryatvam । “somaṃ punāti” ityatra saprakṛtikasyaivāvagatasyaindravāyavādivākyeṣu viniyuktatvāt saviśeṣaṇānvayasya kāryopayogitvena tatsambhave sati pratītimātro- payuktasyopalakṣaṇasyānyāyyatvāt । viśiṣṭavidhau ca viśeṣaṇānāmau- pādānikāṅgabhāvasya sarvatra sthitatvāt । na caupādānikasya somāṅgabhāvasya kalpanīyatvātpratyakṣāyāñca śrutau kalpanānavakāśāt, “somena yajeta” iti pratyakṣaśruterevāṅgabhāvapratipādakatvamiti vakta- vyam । yato'bhiyavkte yāge tadanuvādena somavidhirvaktavyaḥ । yāgābhivyaktiśca aindravāyavataddhitasyotpavanavākyāvagatasomaviśiṣṭa- rasasambandhapūrvikā, tatra viśiṣṭaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoraikarūpyam, kintvākāṃkṣayogyatāvaśāddevatā rasasyāṅgabhāvo na somāṅgabhāvama- ntareṇa sambhavatītyaupādānike somāṅgabhāve pṛthagasiddhe tadupajīvī somavidhiḥ pratyakṣo'pyakiñcitkara eveti । na caivaṃ sati latāyā
api pradeyatvaprasaṅgaḥ । na hi sarvatra viśiṣṭavidhau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya- yoraikarūpyam, kintvākāṅkṣāyogyatāvaśāddevatātvenoddeśyatvameva । tatrāpi rasasya pradeyatve'pi tatprakṛtitvenaiva somalatāsambandha iti । athavā somasyāviniyuktatve'pyaṅgabhūtarasopakārakatayā abhiṣavādi- saṃskāryyatvaṃ, vatsasyeva viniyuktadohopakārakatayā “vatsamālabheta” ityatrālambhasaṃskāryatvam, ṛcāṃ vā yathā viniyuktastutyupakāritayā sāmasaṃskāryatvaṃ, svādhyāyasya vā paramate vi niyuktatadarthopakāraka- tayā'dhyanasaṃskāryyatvam ।

nanu somasyāviniyuktatvenānaṅgatvādanaṅgasya cāpratinidheyatvāt, “yadi somaṃ na vindeyuḥ pūtīkānabhiṣuṇuyuḥ” ityatra pūtākānāma- bhāvavidhitvaṃ bhavet, na somapratinidhiniyamaḥ । tathāsati pūtīkā- pacāre tatsadṛśopādānaṃ bhavet na somasadṛśopādānam । ato yuktaḥ somasadṛśopādānārthamayaṃ somavidhiriti vaiṣamyam । na; somarasasya viniyuktatvena tatsadṛśapūtīkāntargatarasaniyamātpratinidhi- niyama eva । athavā anaṅgatve'pi somasya tatprakṛtikarasasyaiva vihi- tatvena rasasyeva rasaprakṛterapi somasya śāstrārthatvāt । śāstrārthasyaiva pratinidhyupayogitvāt । somapratinidhiniyamo'pi yukta eva, kimaṅgatā kariṣyati ? na ca guṇādhikaraṇanyāyena pradeyatvamapyā- śaṅkanīyam । tatra hi “vaiśvadevyāmikṣā” iti svavākyagatāmikṣā-
varodhānna punaḥ “aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti” ityādiṣūtpattivākyeṣu rasasyāpratītatvena vaiṣamyāt । ato yuktā bhāṣyakārasya latāyāḥ pradeyatvāśaṅketi ।

atrocyate—yattāvaduktam—utpavanavākye somarasasyaiva śābdatvāttaddhitaśrutiparyavasānam, tathāca sati na prakṛtitayā soma- vidhānaṃ sambhavatīti । tadayuktam; na tāvadutpavanavākye somarasaḥ śrūyate । nāpyutpavanasamabhivyāhārānupapattyā somaśabdena lakṣyate । saṃskārakarmatve hyutpavanasya latāyāmutpavanarūpasaṃskārāsambhavādraso lakṣaṇīyaḥ । tathā viniyuktatvena somalatārasayordvayorapi saṃskā- ryatvaṃ sambhavati । saṃskāryatvena ca viniyogakalpanāyāmitaretarāśraya- prasaṅgāt । tena bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇanyāyena pradhānakarmatvameva syāt । tathāca sati mukhyārthasyaiva somasya dravadravya (?) kalpāpaharaṇarūpo- tpavanasādhanatvasambhavaḥ । nāsau lakṣaṇā......, na ca dravadravyā- ntarasya kalpanīyatvāt somaśabdasyaiva laśraṇayā rasopasthāpa- katvamiti vaktavyam । pakṣadvaye'pi kalpanāsamānatvāt । utpavana- sādhanatvena rasalakṣaṇāyāmapi pārthivaṃ dravyāntaraṃ kalpanīyameva । iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ—ekatrotpavanāvinābhūtadravyasvīkāreṇa mukhya- somaśabdārthasyotpavanasādhanatvam, aparatra cotpavanāvinābhūtasādha- nasvīkāreṇa somaśabde lākṣaṇikatvam । taccāyuktam ।

athavāstu utpavanavākye śābdī rasāvagatiḥ, na tatra taddhitaparyavasānam । na ca tathāsati somalatāyāmeva taddhitaparyava- sānamiti vaktavyam । dhārāvākyasya vyavadhānenāsambaddhatvāt । dhārāvākye punargrahaṇasya guṇakarmatve pradhānakarmatve'pi vā dhārārhadrava- dravyasyākṣepalabhyatvena tasyaiva gṛhṇāticodanāsāmyāt । ānantaryācca buddhitāratamyācchabdakalpanayāpi tatraiva taddhitavṛttiḥ । tenāyamartho bhavati—aindravāyavaṃ dravadravyaṃ gṛhṇīyāditi । dravadravyañca dvividhaṃ bhavati—niryāsamaniryāsañca । tatra bhavatyākāṅkṣā kiṃ dravadrabyaṃ niryāsarūpaṃ kutaścitprakṛtiviśeṣādupādeyam ? aniryāsaṃ vā kuta- ścittaṭākādijalāśayādupādeyam ? ityapekṣāyāṃ “vrīhibhiryajeta” itivat “somena yajeta” iti prakṛtitayā somavidhirupapanna eveti vrīhimudrārthaḥ ? । bhavatu vā yathākathañcit utpavanavākyagatasoma- prakṛtirasa eva taddhitaparyavasānam, tathāpyaviniyuktasyānaṅgabhūtasya saṃskārābhāvāt krayaṇābhiṣavādisaṃskārasiddhaye somavidhirarthavān bhaviṣyati ।

na ca viśiṣṭavidhānena somo'pi viniyukta eveti vaktavyam । yataḥ śābdatvalobhena sannihitadhārāvākyākṣiptadravadravyaparityāgeno- tpavanavākyalakṣitasomarasena taddhitaparyavasānaṃ yuktam, tatkiṃ rasasyeva somasyāpi lakṣaṇayā śābdatvam ? śrutivṛtyā vā ? na tāvallakṣa/?/-
ṇayā; utpavanakriyāsambandhānupapattibhyāṃ hi lakṣaṇāvṛtyā soma- śabdaḥ sambandhāyogyameva hyātmānaṃ lakṣayatīti hāsyāspadameva । nāpi śrutivṛtyā; ekasya śabdasya sambhavāsambhavakṛtayugapucchuti- lakṣaṇavirodhāt । tena viśiṣṭatvāsambhavādyathā ‘gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasati’ ityatra gaṅgāpadārthalakṣitatīramātrasyaiva nivāsayogyasya lakṣaṇāviṣayatvam, na tvayogyasyāpi jalasya, tathātrāpi somaprakṛ- tyupalakṣitarasasyaiva lakṣaṇāviṣayatvamiti aśābdatvāllatāyā na viśeṣaṇatvena rasāntarbhāvo ghaṭata iti krayaṇādisaṃskārasiddhaye yuktaḥ “somena yajeta” iti prakṛtividhiriti ।

athāviniyuktasyānaṅgasyāpyaṅgabhūtarasopakārakatayā vatsādi- vatsaṃskārārhatvāttatsidhyarthamanarthakaḥ somavidhirityucyate । tadayuktam; upakārakasya hi saṃskāro bhavannavyabhicaritopādānasyaiva bhavati, nityavacchutānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmanityasaṃyogavirodhāt । tena vini- yuktāpūrvīyadohasya prasnavanopāyāntaraniṣedhena vatsopādanasyāvyabhi- cārāt “sāmnā stuvīta” iti stutiviniyuktānāñca sāmnāṃ “ṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma gāyati” iti ṛgadhiṣṭhānāvyabhicārādvatsasya ca ṛcāñca saṃskāro yukta eva । svādhyāyasya tu na viniyuktārtho- pakārakatayādhyayanasaṃskāryatvam, kintvadhyayanasaṃskṛtasyaiva tathā- bhūtārthajñānahetutvāt । tathā ādhānasaṃskṛtāhavanīyaviniyogavat
sāmarthyātsaṃskṛtaviniyoga evāyam । yathā caitattathārthavādādhikaraṇa evoktam । somarasasya tvaviniyuktatve'pi prakārāntareṇāpi tadu- pādānāvirodhena niyamena tadupādānāsambhavātsaṃskṛtaviniyogasya cāsambhavādbhavadanabhimatatvācca na vatsādisāmyam, nāpi svādhyā- yasāmyamiti krayaṇābhiṣavasaṃskārārthaṃ yuktaḥ ‘somena yajeta” iti somavidhiḥ । na ca krayaṇābhiṣavādisaṃskāravākyaireva viniyogabhaṅga- bhiyāṅgabhāvassomasyākṣipyata iti vācyam । pratyakṣe hi somavidhau laiṅgikakalpanāsambhavāt । taduktam—‘sa evāyaṃ yuktaḥ somena yajeta’ iti । na ca vināpi vidhānātsaṃskāravaśādeva somāṅga- bhāvaprāptau kiṃ vidhineti vācyam । yataḥ śakyamitareṇāpi vaktum—“sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ” iti tadadhikārākṣe- pādevotpattiprāptau kiṃ sarvatra vidhineti ।

athāmnānasāmarthyena śrutaśabdāvagatotpatterevānuṣṭhitasya karma- ṇo'pūrvasādhanatvam, tarhyatrāpi śrutaśabdāvagatāṅgabhāvasyaiva somasyā- nuṣṭhānamapūrvasādhanamiti nānupapannam । ato yuktaḥ prakṛtitvenaiva soma- vidhiśaṅkā, na tu pradeyatvena yuktā, tadadhikaraṇavirodhāt । vākyāntaro- pātatve'pi rasasya ekavākyopātte sāvaiśvadevyāmikṣetivat tatra taddhitaparyavasāne pradeyarasāvaruddhatvāviśeṣādityalamativistareṇeti । tena ‘nahi tasya guṇārthena’ iti sūtrāvayavasyāyamarthaḥ—paśau prāpte
karmaṇi dravyadevatobhayavidhānāsambhavānna paśudravyasya guṇārthaṃ vidhānam, nāpi somayāgānuvādena prakṛtitayā somasya, aindravāya- vādivākyānāṃ grahaṇamātraparyavasitatvameva yāgānuvādāsambhavāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ saṃkhyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti vājapeyaḥ—“vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta” iti । tatra prājāpatyāḥ paśavaḥ “saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūnālabhate, saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpaterāptyai śyāmāstūparā ekarūpā bhavanti, evamiva hi prajāpatissamṛdhyai” (tai. bra. 1. 3. 4.) iti । tatra sandihyate— kiṃ saptadaśaitāni karmāṇi ? athavā saptadaśapaśukamekameva karma ? iti । saparikaramabhyāsapramāṇaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ saṃkhyānibandhanaḥ karmabhedo nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—prājāpatyānityatra dvedhā vigrahavākyaṃ pratibhāti । prājāpatyaśca prājāpatyaśceti taddhitāntā- nāmayamekaśeṣaḥ । atha paśuśca paśuśca paśavaḥ, prajāpatirddevataiṣāṃ
prājāpatyā iti kṛtaikaśeṣāṇāṃ prajāpatidevatāsambandhaḥ ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 523)

tadatra kṛtaikaśeṣāṇāmeva taddhitasaṅgatiriti yuktam । yena hi taddhitāntasyaikaśeṣaḥ kriyate । tena prājāpatipaśurūpayoḥ prakṛti- pratyayārthayordvayoreva karaṇīyaḥ, na ca tatra pramāṇamasti । bahu- vacanaṃ hi pramāṇamekaśeṣe । tacca viśeṣyabhūtapratyayārthagatameva pratyakṣamupalabhyate । na tu viśeṣaṇībhūtaprakṛtyarthagatā । tena pratya- yārthabhūtānāṃ paśūnāmekaśeṣaḥ pratīyata iti saptadaśānāṃ paśūnāmeka- prajāpatidevatāsambandhātsaptadaśapaśudravyakamekaṃ karmeti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 523)

evañca sati karmaikatvāt kalpanālāghavaṃ bhavati । nanvaikayāga- paratve'tideśādekadaivaikādaśāvadānagaṇaḥ prāpyate । tasya ca saptadaśasu paśuṣu yadyekasyāvadānagaṇasya sambandhaḥ, tadā ṣaṭsu na syāt । /?/ /?/sya, tadā ṣoḍaśasu paśuṣu na syāditi kathamekakarma-
tvam । maivam; evaṃ hi manyate—nāyaṃ sākṣādyāgadharmaḥ, kintu yāgasādhanabhūtapaśudharmo'yaṃ paśudvāreṇa yāgopakārakaḥ । tadatra yāgenāpi svasādhanībhūtapaśudvāreṇākāṃkṣyamāṇaḥ pratipaśu bhedenaivāva- dānagaṇaḥ sambadhyata iti saptadaśapaśudravyaka eka eva yāga iti । evaṃ prāpte—

abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi kṛtaikaśeṣāṇāṃ taddhitasambandho bhavet । kintarhi ? taddhitāntānāmevāyamekaśeṣaḥ । na ca bahuvacana- sambandhātpratyayārthasya paśorevaikaśeṣo na prakṛtyarthasya prajāpateḥ bahu- vacanasambandhābhāvāditi vācyam । yato bahuvacanasambandhayogya- sya hi tadabhāvenaikārthaparatvābhāvaṃ gamayati । na copasarjanabhūtāyāḥ prakṛterbahuvacanasambandhayogyatā samasti । tenātra bahuvacanasamba- ndhābhāvasyānirṇāyakatvādayamatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ kṛtsnasyaiva prājā- patyaśabdasyāyamekaśeṣaḥ ? atha vā pratyayārthabhūtapaśuśabdasya ? iti । tatra vākyaśeṣagataprakṛtiśabdavaśādeva nirṇayo bhavati । prakṛtau hyekapaśugatasyaikādaśāvadānagaṇasyaikayāgasādhanatvamevāvagatam । tadatra pratyekaṃ saptadaśapaśugatasyaikādaśāvadānagaṇasyaikayāgasādhanatve sati na sambhavatīti pratipaśu yāgabhedo'vagamyate । sa ca taddhitā- ntānāmekaśeṣapakṣe bhavatīti taddhitāntānāmekaśeṣa iti nirṇī- yate । yathoktam—paśudhargo'yamekādaśāvadanagaṇo na yāgadharmaḥ ।
sa ca yāgaikatve satyatideśātpratipaśu sambhantsyate । tadayuktam; tatraikādaśāvadānagaṇaśabde naikādaśāvadyatikriyāgaṇo'bhipretaḥ । kintarhi ? avadīyata iti vyutpattyaikādaśāvadeyapradeyadravyagaṇaḥ । na cāsau paśudharmaḥ, paśusaṃskāratvābhāvāt; kintu yāgasādhanatvā- dyāgadharmaḥ । ataścaikayāgatve sati ekapaśusambaddhaikādaśāvadeyagaṇa- sambaddhaḥ, na tvekapaśusambaddhaḥ । tathā satyekapaśugatasyaikādaśā- vadānagaṇasyaikayāgasādhanatvapratipādakātideśabādhaprasaṅgāt । tena saptadaśapaśūnāṃ yāgasādhanatvasampattaye saptadaśaivaite yāgā iti siddham ।

etattu bhāṣyakāreṇa dravyagatāpi saṃkhyā karmabhediketi pratipādayitumuktam । karmagatasaṃkhyā sakṛcchutādākhyātapadādeka- bhāvanāvidhānātkṛtārthā na bhāvanābhedamāpādayatīti bhāvanābhede pramāṇābhāvādekaiva bhāvanā vidhīyate । nanu homabhedādeba bhāvanā- bhedo bhaviṣyati । homabhedaśca “tisra āhutīḥ” iti pṛthaṅni- veśitvasaṃkhyāsambandhādeva pratīyate । tatkathaṃ bhāvanaikatvamiti ? maivam; prathamaṃ tāvatsvapade ekaiva homabhāvanā pratīyate । paścāttu padāntarasambandhāvagamyamānaḥ saṃkhyābhedaḥ prathamāvagataikatvasaṃkhyā- varodhena “ekādaśa prayājānyajati” itivadabhyāsenaivopapannatvānna bhāvanāsvarūpabhedamāpādayitumalamityekaiva bhāvaneti । evaṃ prāpte—

abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyutpattigateyaṃ saṃkhyā na bhavet । tathāhi—“tisra āhutīrjuhoti” ityetena vākyena tritvaviśiṣṭo homo vidhīyate । na tu vihite home pratyayātsaṃkhyāvat vākyā- ntareṇātra saṃkhyāvidhānam । yāpi juhotītipādādekatvasaṃkhyā pratīyate, sā'pi na homasya । api tarhi kartturiti kartṛsamānā- dhikaraṇe sthāsyati । tenotpattiśiṣṭatritvasambandhāstrayo homāḥ । tatra teṣāṃ bhedāttadanubandhāstisro bhāvanā vidhīyanta iti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe saptadaśapaśūnāmekayāgasādhanatve asakta- tvātsādhanābhāvasya padārthānuṣṭhānasamāpane saptadaśasu paśuṣu dharmānuṣṭhānam । tadvatsaṃskṛta ekasmin paśau vinaṣṭe vyāsaṅgisādha- natvasyāvinaṣṭatvātpaśvantaramupādāya prathamataḥ paśudharmaḥ kartavyaḥ । siddhānte tu yāgabhede pratipaśu sādhanatābhedādekasmin paśau naṣṭe tanmātrasyaiva dharmāvṛttirnetareṣāmiti ।
sūtrantu—pṛthaktvena saha saṃkhyayā ekārthaniveśādutpattiśiṣṭayā saṃkhyayā karmabhedo bhavedityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ saṃjñādhaikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: “athaiṣa jyotirathaiṣa viśvajyotirathaiṣa sarvajyotiḥ” iti । atra saṃśayaḥ—kimebhirnnāmadheyaiḥ prakṛtaṃ saṅkīrttya sahasradakṣiṇādirguṇo vidhīyate ? atha vakṣyamāṇaviśeṣāṇi karmāntarāṇi upadiśyante ? idānīṃ saṃjñāguṇaprakaraṇairbhede vaktavye'lpavicāratayā saṃjñānibandhana eva tāvadbhedo'bhidhīyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-jyotiṣṭomānantaramidam “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” ityādi śrūyate । na cātra dhātvarthabhāvanāvidhyabhidhāyakaḥ kaścicchabdo'vagamyate । yattu “etena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeta” iti vidhyākhyātapadaṃ, tadapi prakṛtasya karmaṇo guṇaphalavidhānenārtha- vaditi na karmāntaramāpādayati । nanu “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” ityatra jyotiḥsaṃjñāśravaṇādarthāntarabuddhau jātāyām “etena yajeta” iti yajisāmānādhikaraṇyādyāgarūpameva tadarthāntaramiti tasyaiva sahasra- dakṣiṇāguṇaviśiṣṭaphalavidhānena karmāntarameveti । ucyate— syādevaṃ yadyeṣa jyotiḥśabdādarthāntarabuddhirbhavet । tathāhi—athaiṣa
jyotiśśabdayostāvatprakṛtaviṣayatvaṃ siddhameva । na caikasya karmaṇo nānāsaṃjñāsambandho na dṛṣṭaḥ, darśapūrṇamāsayoreva dākṣāyaṇayajña- saṃkramaṇayajñasākamprasthāyyarūpanānāsaṃjñāsandarśanāt । loke'pyeka- syaiva hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇirityādinānāsaṃjñāsandarśanāt । viśeṣastu jyotiḥśabdasya vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajetetivat jyotiṣṭo- mopasthāpakatvājjyotiṣṭomādarthāntarasya na vidhānamiti । tena jyotirādiśabdopasthāpitasya jyotiṣṭomasyaiva sahasradakṣiṇādiguṇakaṃ prayogāntaraṃ phale vidhīyate । athavā dadhigodohananyāyena sahasra- dakṣiṇādiguṇasyaiva phale vidhānamityakarmāntaratvamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi jyotirādisaṃjñāśravaṇājjyotiṣṭo- mavyatiriktārthāntarabodho na bhavet । tathāhi-sarvatraiva tāvad ‘anyāyaścānekaśabdatvam’ iti nyāyena śabdāntaraśravaṇādarthāntara- buddhirevotsargato bhavati । sā ca kvacidbalīyasyā pratyabhijñayā bādhyetāpi । yayā dākṣāyaṇayajñādau । tatra cāvicchinna eva darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe yajiḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ prakṛtayāgaviṣaya eva vijñāyate । tatsamabhivyāhārācca dākṣāyaṇayajñādisaṃjñāntaramevāvalambata iti yuktam । iha tu pūrvaprastutajyotiṣṭomavilakṣaṇaṃ saṃjñāntaramuccāryamā- ṇamevātmānurañjitārthāntarabodhameva janayanti । na ca jyotirādi-
śabdānāṃ jyotiṣṭomasaṃjñaikadeśatvena jyotiṣṭomapratipādakatvamiti vācyam । jyotiḥśabdena jyotiṣṭomalakṣaṇayāgaśabdalakṣaṇādoṣāt । “vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta” iti jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇaśrutasyā- gatyā vṛttyantarāśrayaṇaṃ bhavatu nāma, na ceha tathā । avyāpakaṃ caitat; “athaiṣa gauḥ” ityevamādīnāmapyudāharaṇatvāt । tadiha saṃjñānta- reṇarthāntare siddhe ko'sau saṃjñītyanveṣaṇe pūrvavṛttayāgānāṃ jyotiṣṭo- māntarbhūtatvena jyotiṣṭomasaṃjñāviṣayatvānnaitatsaṃjñāviṣayatvam । parastā- dvidhīyamānasya tu saṃjñāntarānavaruddhatvāt “athaitena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeta” ityetacchabdena pūrvasaṃjñāsāmānādhikaraṇyāvagamātsaiva saṃjñeti niścīyate ।

nanūtpattiparo vidhiḥ śabdāntarādisahāyaḥ karmabhedako bhavati । taduktamācāryeṇa ‘vidherutpattibhedaḥ ? । notpannasya punaru- tpattiḥ sambhavati’ iti । na cāthaiṣa jyotirityatra vidhiḥ śrūyate । yaśca parastāt “athaitena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeta” iti vidhiḥ so'pi guṇaphalasambandhavyāpṛtatvāt viniyogaparo bhavitumarhati । kathaṃ saṃjñāyā bhedakatvamucyate । satyam, viniyogaparo vidhiḥ, sa tu na pūrvapravṛttasya jyotiṣṭomasya, tasya jyotirādisaṃjñāntaratvenānupasthā- nāt; kintarhi ? jyotiḥsaṃjñakasyaiva yāgāntarasyāyaṃ viniyojakaḥ । va cānutpannayāgāntarasya viniyogassambhavatīti jyotirādisaṃjñaivo-
tpattividhiṃ parikalpya karma bhinattīti saṃjñāyāḥ karmabhedakatvamiti ।
taduktam—

lg.l: na ca pūrvastamityevaṃ balādarthāntaraṃ gataḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 526)
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe jyotiṣṭomasyaiva phalaviśeṣāya sahasrada- kṣiṇenānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu yāgāntarasyeti ।
sūtrantu—yathotpattisaṃyoginī saṃkhyā karmabhedikā tathaiva saṃjñā- pyutpattisaṃyoginī bhediketyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ guṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve parvaṇi samāmananti—“tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyābhikṣā, vājibhyo vājinam” iti । tatra sandihyate-kimāmikṣāguṇake karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇavidhiḥ ? uta tasmādvājinaguṇakaṃ karmāntaramiti । pūrvaṃ saṃjñānibandhanakarmabhedaṃ
nirūpya idānīṃ guṇaprakaraṇābhyāṃ bhede vaktavye vastutvādguṇani- bandhana eva karmabhedaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“vājibhyo vājinam” itya- vagamyo vājiśabdābhidheyadevatāyā vājinasambandhaḥ pratīyate । aśvaśca vājiśabdābhidheyaḥ । na cāsau devatātvena prasiddhaḥ, nākasa- dāmeva devatātvāt । na ca “vasantāya kapiñjalānālabhate” itivadaśva- syāpi devatātvamiti vācyam । yato'gatyā rūḍhyā tatra tathā- śritam । iha tvavayavaśaktidvāreṇa viśvedevā eva vājiśabdābhidhe- yāssanti । tathāhi—vājo'nnam, āmikṣāpi cānnameva । ana- ntaravācye ca teṣāmevāmikṣāvattayā vājo'syāstīti vyutpannavāji- śabdābhidheyatvāt । pūrva (vākyānumite) yāge viśvedevadevatāke vājinamātraṃ vidhīyata iti । taduktam—

lg.l: viśve devāḥ pratīyante tacca karmeha vājinam ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā. pṛ. 532)

na cotpattiśiṣṭāmikṣāguṇāvaruddhatvena nirākāṅkṣatvat na vākyā- ntaropāttavājinaguṇasambandha iti vācyam । utpattiśiṣṭaguṇāva- rodhe'pi niṣkṛṣyānuvādena krayavadgaṇāntaropapatteḥ । nanu “aruṇayāṃ
piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇāti” ityatra niṣkṛṣṭasyaiva krayasya krīṇātipadenāmnātatvāt “vāsasā krīṇāti” ityādiṣvapi krīṇātipadena niṣkṛṣṭakrayānuvādāttatra yuktaṃ vāsaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ vidhānam । iha tu vākyadvaye'pi yajipadābhāvātkathaṃ niṣkṛṣṭayāgapratipādaka- tvamasti । tathā “vājibhyo vājinam” ityatrāpi dravyadevatāprati- pādakakarmakārakasampradānakārakayoḥ sambandhasya yāgakriyāmantare- ṇāsambhavādyāgakalpanāvasare vājipadasyāmikṣāyāgīyaviśeṣadevatā- paratvādāmikṣāyāgenaiva dravyadevatāsambandhopapattau tatpratipādakameva śrutārthāpattyā vājipadaṃ kalpyate ।

etāvānayaṃ viśeṣaḥ—pūrvasminvākye aprakṛtatvāddravyadevatā- viśiṣṭayāga eva vidhīyate । vājinavākye tu devatāyāḥ prāgasya tu prāptatvātkalpitayajipadena niṣkṛṣṭayāgamanūdya vājinamātraṃ vidhīyata iti । kintu niṣkṛṣṭānuvādasāmye'pyayamatra viśeṣaḥ—bhinnā- natiprayojanatvātkrayeṇa dravyāṇāṃ samuccaya eva, iha tūpakāryatvā- dāmikṣāvājinayorvikalpa eva । na ca “vāruṇyā niṣkāsena tuṣaiścāvabhṛthamavayanti” itivattulyakālatve'pi samuccaya iti vaktavyam । tulyakāryāṇāmapyekavākyopādānena parasparasāpekṣāṇāṃ viśeṣataśca kārakasamuccitānāṃ bhavatu samuccayaḥ । iha tūktanyāyena vaiśvadevavākye dravyadevatāviśiṣṭayāgavidhānam, na vājinavākye
tadanuvādena vājinamātravidhānamiti vākyabhede siddhe bhinnavākya- vihitayostulyakāryayovrīhiyavayorvikalpa eveti । samuccayābhi- dhānantu vārttike prauḍhavādamātreṇeti mantavyam ।

nanu devatāsambandhadvārako hi dravyasya yāgasambandhaḥ । tatrā- mikṣāyāṃ taddhitaśrutyā devatāsambandhaḥ, vājinasya tu vākyena । ataḥ kathaṃ viṣamaśiṣṭayorvikalpa iti । maivam; evaṃ hi manyate— syādevaṃ hi yadi vaiśvadevapadenāmikṣāsambandhaḥ pratīyate । kintarhi ? āmikṣāsamabhivyāhāralakṣaṇādvākyādevāyām । vaiśvadevīpadāt sā- mānyena dravyasambandhe'vagate viśeṣamātramāmikṣāpadātpratīyate, tarhi vājibhya ityatrāpi caturthītaḥ sāmānyena pradeyadravyāvagatau vājina- padādviśeṣāvagama iti nāsti vākyagamyatve kaścidviśeṣa iti । na ca ‘vidhiśabdasya mantratve bhāvaḥ syāt’ (jai. sū., 10, 4. 23.) ityanena nyāyena vājinānuvānena vājiśabdenaiva devatopādānamiti vācyam । vājiśabdasyāmikṣāyāgoyadevatopalakṣaṇatvāt । āmikṣāyāgī- yadevatāyāśca viśvedevaśabdābhihitatvāt viśvedevaśabdenaivopāttasya vājinānvaya iti । na caivaṃ devatānvaye'pi “aindraṃ dadhyamāvāsyāyām” itivatkarmabheda iti vācyam । yatastatra nirapekṣavākyadvayenendrasamba- ndhāvagamāddadhipayodravyakayāgabhedo yuktaḥ iha tu vājipadenāmikṣā- sambaddhapūrvayāgīyaviśvedevasambandhapratipādanātkarmābheda iti । ataḥ
pūrvavākyavihita eva yāge vājinamātraguṇavidhānamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi śrautotpattiśiṣṭāmikṣāvaruddhe karma- ṇi vājinaguṇavidhirupapatsyate । tathāpi—na tāvadvājinasya pūrvasmin karmaṇi samuccayena vidhānaṃ sambhavati, bhinnavākyopātta- yostulyakāryayoḥ samuccayābhāvasyoktatvāt । nāpi vikalpena, viṣamaśiṣṭatvena vikalpāsambhavāt । śrauto hi viśvedevānāmāmikṣā- sambandhaḥ । vājinasambandhastu vākyādutpannaḥ । nanvāmikṣāsamba- ndho'pi vākyīya ityuktam । syādevaṃ yadi viśvedevā devatā asyeti sarvanāmapadena dravyamātramunnīyeta । dravyaviśeṣaviṣayatvātta- ddhitasya taddhitaśrutigamya eva viśveṣāṃ devānāmāmikṣāsambandhaḥ ।
taduktam—

vājibhya ityatra na prātipadikena vibhaktyā vā havirdravyamabhi-
hitam । nāpi tasyaiva devatānvayitvam, kintu vājinapadasamabhi- vyāhāralabhyatvādvākyagamyameveti । taduktam—

lg.l: na prātipadikenoktaṃ na vibhaktyā haviḥ svataḥ ।
na cāsya devatāyoga iti vākyātpratīyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 535.)

nanu “vāruṇyā niṣkāsena tuṣaiścāvabhṛthamavayanti” ityatra śrautāmikṣāsambandhe'pi varuṇasya prakārāntareṇāpi niṣkāsa- tuṣasambandho dṛṣṭa eva, tadvadihāpi vājibhyo vājinasambandho bhaviṣyatīti । maivam; tatrāpyavaśyaṃ kalpanīye niṣkāsatuṣayo- rdevatāsambandhe sannihitadevatāparityāge kāraṇābhāvādagatyā tathā- śritam । atra tu karmāntaravidhānenaivopapatterṣaimyamiti । kiñca— utpattiśiṣṭāmikṣāvaruddhayāgasyotpannaśiṣṭavājinasambandha eva nā- stīti kathaṃ vikalpaḥ ? iti ।

idantviha vaktavyam—kaḥ punarutpattiśiṣṭaguṇāvarodho nāma virodhaprakāraḥ ? tatrocyate—pratipattivirodha evāyam । ākāṅkṣānibandhano hi śabdasyānvayaḥ । na cotpattau guṇaviśiṣṭe karmaṇyavarodhe tatsamānakāryaguṇāntarākāṅkṣā samastīti notpanna- śiṣṭānvayaḥ । yatra tu kāryabhedaḥ, tatrotpattiśiṣṭe'pi dravyāntare utpannaśiṣṭānāmapi dravyāṇāṃ sambandho bhavatyeva । tenotpatti-
śiṣṭaikahāyanyavaruddhe kraye utpannaśiṣṭānāmapi vāsaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ kārya- bhedenākāṅkṣāsambhavātsamuccayo yukta eveti vaiṣamyam । kiñca vājiśabdo hi ‘rūḍhiryogamapaharati’ iti nyāyenāśvameva pratipādayati, na ca viśvāndevān । na ca nākasadāmeva devatātvam, kintu yā yasya haviṣa uddeśyatayā codyate sā tasya devateti śārdūla- vasantādivadaśvasyāpi devatātvamaviruddham । bhavatu vā yaugiko vājiśabdaḥ, tathāpi kathaṃ devatātvaprasaṅgaḥ ? āmikṣāyāge hi teṣāṃ svarūpeṇa devatātvam, vājine tu vājayogitvena । tataścendramahendravaddevatābheda eveti । vājapeyayāgānādareṇa nirni- mittādhikyena lakṣaṇāyāṃ lakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ । tena sarvathā śrauto tpattiśiṣṭāmikṣāvaruddhe karmaṇi praveśamalabhamānaṃ vājidevatākaṃ vājinadravyakaṃ karmāntarameva kalpayatīti siddham । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 532)
guṇaścātra vivakṣito bhedakaḥ-pūrvakarmasambandhānarho'pūrvakarma- sambandhārhaśca । taduktaṃ bṛhaṭṭīkāyām—

lg.l: na śaknoti ca sambaddhuṃ guṇaḥ pūrveṇa karmaṇā ।
apūrvakarmasambandhaṃ yo vārhati sa bhedakaḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p: atra pūrvakarmasaṃyogānarhasya guṇasya prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhā- nāsambhavādbhedakatvaṃ paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇa eva prapañcitatvānneha prapañci- tamiti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe ekasminneva karmaṇyāmikṣāvājinayo- rvikalpaḥ । siddhānte tu bhedena karmadvayānuṣṭhānam ।
sūtrantu—guṇaśca karmabhedakaḥ । apūrvakarmasaṃyoge vākyayoḥ samatvātparasparanirapekṣatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamamindriyakāmādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgayaḥ
chapter.p: agnihotraṃ prakṛtya samāmananti—“dadhnendriyakāmasya juhu- yāt” ityevamādi । tatra sandehaḥ—kimagnihotrahomāddhomāntaraṃ dadhyādihomaḥ ? uta dadhyāderguṇātphalam ? iti । idānīṃ pūrva- pratipāditasya guṇanimittasya bhedasyāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-bhāvārthādhikaraṇe jñe/?/tadavasthi-
tam—ākhyātaśabdāḥ phalapadasambandhino na dravyaguṇaśabdāḥ । tadatrāpi tenaiva nyāyena ‘indriyaṃ bhāvayet’ itīndriyabhāvanā sādhānā- kāṅkṣiṇī samānapadopāttaṃ homa(rūpadhātvartha)meva karaṇatayā gṛhṇāti, na viprakṛṣṭaṃ dravyam । na caivaṃ sati phale homavidhānāddhome ca dadhividhānādvākyabhedaḥ, agatyā “daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” itivaddadhimatā homenendriyaṃ bhāvayediti matvarthalakṣaṇa(yā viśiṣṭa) vidhānenaiva karmāntaravidhānopapatteḥ । nanu bhavatu homātphalam, tathāpi prakṛta eva homaḥ ‘sannidhau tvavibhāgātphalārthena punaḥ śratiḥ’ (jai. sū., 2. 3. 26) iti nyāyena svargayāvajjīvayorivendriyaphale vidhīyatām । maivam; dadhiviśi(ṣṭena) homenotpattivākyagatahoma- svarūpāpratyabhijñānāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 540)

na ca “dadhnā juhoti” iti dadhiviśiṣṭo'pi homo vidyata eveti tatpratyabhijñānamiti vācyam । yato guṇavākyaṃ hyetata । na ca guṇavākyaphalavākyayorutpattivākyāpekṣayoḥ parasparanira- pekṣatvātsambandho'sti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 541)

na cotpattivākyāvagatameva karma guṇavākyāpāditadadhisambaddhaṃ phale vidhāsyatīti vācyam । nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt । evaṃ hyatra vacanavyaktiḥ । yadendriyakāmaḥ syāttadā nityaṃ kevaladadhi- viśiṣṭahomaṃ (bhāvaye) diti dadhi vaikalpikatvena daśame pakṣe samba- dhyate । ato yathābhūto nityadadhiviśiṣṭo homa indriyakāmavākye pratīyate, tādṛśasyāpratyabhijñānāt, anupādeyaṃ phalaṃ pratyupādānā- tkarmāntarameveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 541.)
