na ca prakṛtahomāśritasyaiva dadhnaḥ phale vidhānamasti, kiṃ vidhigauravamatvarthalakṣaṇāśrayaṇeneti vācyam । dadhnaḥ phalasambandha- vidhāne āśrayasambandhavidhāne ca vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । na ca prakaraṇādāśrayalābha iti vācyam । ‘asaṃyuktaṃ prakaraṇāt’ iti nyāyena phalārthasya dadhnaḥ prakaraṇagrahaṇāsambhavāt । na ca vidhi- lakṣaṇaprakaraṇādāśrayalābho bhavatīti vācyam । yataḥ śabdo hi sannidhivaśādviśeṣānvaye pramāṇam । na tu sannidhānaṃ nāma yāgasya pramāsti । na cātra prakṛtāśrayasambandhapratipādakaḥ śabdaḥ kaścidasti । śrautendriyakāmavākyasya ubhayasambandhakaraṇe vākyabhedasyāktatvāt ।
kalpitaśabdasya cāśrayasambandhakaraṇe kalpanaiva doṣa iti śrutasyaiva vākyasya viśiṣṭakarmavidhāyakatvameva yuktam । tenātrendriyakāmavākye phalasya śrutatvātkarmāntarameva vidheyaṃ bhavediti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate-
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi bhāvārthādhikaraṇavadeva bhāvārtha- viṣayo vidhirbhavet । sarvatra khalu bhāvanāstha eva vidhistādarthya- bhedena tatra tatra bhidyate । yatra phalavatīṃ bhāvanomāṃsādya dhātvarthaparo vidhirbhavati, tatra dhārtvameva phalakāraṇaṃ karoti । yatra tu svavākyopāttavidheyaguṇāntaropādānamapyasti, tatra viśiṣṭavidhi- gauravabhiyā guṇamātravidhānalolupo yadi dhātvarthaprāptiṃ paśyati, tadā samastamanūdya guṇamātrameva phale vidhatte । atha na paśyati, tadā viśiṣṭavidhānaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇāñca svīkuruta iti sthitam ।
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 546)

tadihāpi prakṛtadhātvarthapratyabhijñānāttamupekṣya guṇasaṃkrānto
vidhirguṇameva phale vidhatte । dhātvarthastu pratyayaprayogārthaḥ prayuktaḥ । .........ktena dhātunā prakaraṇaprāpto'nūdyate । evaṃ sati matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣo viśiṣṭavidhigauravañca na bhaviṣyati । nanu bhavatu dhātvarthasya homarūpasya prāptatvādanuvādaḥ, dadhihomasambadho- 'pyatra pratīyate । avaśyaṃ pratipattavyaścāsau । na hyanāśritakriyasya phalasādhanatvaṃ sambhavati । tadatra “dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt” iti vākye pratīyamāno dadhihomasambandho na tāvadanūdyate, prāga- prāptatvāt । vidhīyate cet—tadaikasya dadhnaḥ phalasambandhavidhāne homasambandhavidhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ syāditi । ucyate—dadhi- homasambandho'pyatra prāpta evānūdyate । tathāhi—dadhneti tṛtīyayā karaṇatvenopāttaṃ dadhi vidhīyate । kārakatvañca dhātvartharūpakriyā- viśeṣanirvarttakatvam । tatra ko'sau dhātvartharūpaḥ kriyāviśeṣaḥ ? yannirvarttayato'sya kārakībhūtasya phalasādhanatvamityapekṣāyāṃ sannidhiprakaraṇopanītahomarūpa eva dhātvarthassambadhyate । tena kārakī- bhūtadadhipadārthaparāmarśādeva prakṛtahomasambandho'pyasya vākyātpratī- yamāno'nūdyata eva, phalasambandhaḥ paraṃ vidhīyata iti kuto vākyabhedaḥ ? taduktam—“dadhisambandho'pi cāsya prakaraṇādevā- śrayāśrayirūpaḥ prāpto'nuvadiṣyate” (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 548. paṃ. 21) iti ।

na ca vācyam—keyamāśrayasambandhaviśeṣāpekṣā ? kiṃ kāra-
ṇatvena ? itikarttavyatātvena vā ? iti । yato labdhakaraṇabhāvasya yā tadanugrahākāṅkṣā bhavati sā iha kriyāviśeṣānvayirūpaṃ karaṇatva- meva kriyāviśeṣāntarbhāvamantareṇa pratīyata iti karaṇākāṅkṣeyaṃ pravitataretyavadhātavyam ।

idantviha vaktavyam—kiṃ dhātvarthavadbhāvanāpyatra saivānūdyate anyā vā vidhīyate ? na tāvatsaivānūdyate, phalabhedena sādhanabhedena ca tasyāḥ pratyabhijñānāsambhavāt । na cānyā vidhīyate, karmabheda- prasaṅgāditi । ucyate—na hi phalabhedena sādhanabhedena bhāvanā bhidyate, kintarhi ? anubandhabhūtadhātvarthabhedena । tatra tatra agniho- tramityutpattivākyāvagatānubandhabhūtajuhotidhātvarthāvacchinnarūpasya sva- rgakāmavākye yāvajjīvavākye indriyakāmavākye ca pratyabhijñānātsaiva bhāvanā । phalakaraṇādibhedena tu bhedaḥ tasyā upakāraka eva । na ca vācyam—kathaṃ prāptāyāṃ bhānavanāyāmindriyasambandho dadhi- sambandhaśca vidhīyata iti । yato na kvacidapi bhāvanāyāḥ phala- sambandho vidhīyate । lipsādhikaraṇa (4. 1. 1.) nyāyena rāgataḥ prāptaphalasambandhānuvādena sādhanamātravidhānam । taduktaṃ kārikāyām—
ato nātra prakṛtahomāśrayasyaiva dadhnaḥ phale vidhānamiti siddhaṃ karmāntaratvam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe dadhihomatvenāpūrvatvātsakṛdeva kevaladadhi- sādhanakahomānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu homabhedātsāyaṃ prātarabhyasto dadhisādhanako homa iti ।
sūtrantu—karmaphalasambandhaguṇaphalasambandhavākyayoratulyatvā- ttasyendriyaphalasya sambandho guṇe pratīyate । guṇādeva phalamityarthaḥ ।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ revatyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: “trivṛdagniṣṭudagniṣṭomastasya vāyavyāsvekaviṃśamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta” “etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭo- masāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hyetena yajeta” iti । idānīṃ pūrvādhikaraṇā- pavādena guṇanibandhana eva karmabhedaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“trivṛdagniṣṭut” ityupakramya “brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta” ityantenāgniṣṭomayāgaṃ vidhāya, tatraiva “vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam” iti vākyena vāravantīyaguṇaṃ vidhāyedaṃ śrūyate-“etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hyetena yajeta” iti । sarvatra guṇākṛṣṭo vidhiryadi dhātva- rthaṃ pratipaśyati, tadā guṇameva phale vidhatta iti sthitam । tadatrāpi pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyenāgniṣṭudyāgasya prāptatvādrevatīvāravantīyasaṅkrānto vidhistameva phale vidhatte । anyadanūdyate । taduktam—

lg.l: śrūyate phalamatrāpi yāge'to na vidhīyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 552)

etacca vidhivyāpārasthānadarśanaparam, na tu phalasambandhavidhāna- param, phale vāravantīyavidhānasya vakṣyamāṇatvāditi । nanu vāravantīyasya revatīsambandho na prāptaḥ । tena so'pi vidhātavyaḥ phalasambandhaśceti vidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ syāditi । ucyate—kriyādvayamatra vākye śrūyate । ekā revatīṣu vāravantī- yākhyagītikriyāviśeṣaṇabhāvena kṛtyeti tavāpratyayenopāttā ।
aparā revatyādhāravāravantīyena phalakriyāviśeṣyabhūtā yajetetyā- khyātapratyayenopāttā । tenāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—revatīkṛtena vāravantīyena paśūn bhāvayediti । tadtra śrauto vidhirvāravantīyasya phalasamba- ndhaparaḥ kṛtvāśabdākṣiptastu revatīvāravantīyasambandhaparaḥ । na hi revatīṣu vāravantīyābhinirvṛttiravihitā sidhyatīti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 552)

nanu “vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam” iti vacanenāgniṣṭo- mākhyastotrasādhanatvena vāravantīyasāma prāptameva, revatyo na prāptāḥ । tāsāñca vāravantīyasambandho na prāptaḥ । tena tayoranya- tarasya phalasambandhavidhānamucitam, vāravantīyasya tu katham ? atha paśuphalasambandhitvenāprāptatvādvāravantīyasya phale vidhānam । evantarhi yāgasya paśuphalasambandho na prāptastasyaiva vidhiḥ syāditi । ucyate—yadyapi yāgo'pi phalasādhanatvenāprāptaḥ, tathāpi viśeṣa- ṇopādānādgauravabhiyā vidhāyako guṇākṣipto dhātvarthānuvādo viśeṣaṇameva phale vidhatte । viśeṣaṇañcātra kṛtvāśabdena pratipādanī- yam । sa cādhikaraṇanirdeśāt vāravantīyārthā revatīḥ pratipādya dvitīyānirdeśātprādhānyena vāravantīyamevākhyātārthasya viśeṣaṇī- pṛthakaśrutiḥ iti mudritavārtikapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
karoti । tenātra viśeṣaṇapareṇākhyātena revatīḥ prati pradhānasya vāravantīyasyaiva phale vidhānam nānyasyeti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 542)

nanu sādhyā hi kriyā phalasādhanaguṇāśrayā bhavati, dadhna iva homaḥ । na cāgniṣṭudyāgo vāravantīyasāmasādhyaḥ, agniṣṭoma- stotrasādhyatvāt । ataḥ kathaṃ yāgamāśritya vāravantīyasya phalasādhanatvamiti । ucyate—na hi sarvatra sādhyasyaivāśrayatvamiti niyamaḥ । “yadi kāmayeta varṣukaḥ parjanyaḥ syāditi nīcaiḥ sado minuyāt” ityādiṣvasādhyasyāpyāśrayatvāt । atra hi sadomāna- māśritya nīcaistvaṃ phalaṃ sādhayati । na ca sadomānaṃ nīcaistva- sādhyam, tasya sadomānadharmamātratvāt । tena yathāsambhavaṃ sambandha- mātreṇaivāśrayatvam, tadihāpi vāravantīyasya dadhivadayāgakaraṇa- syāpi kṛtvāśabdapratipāditapaurvāparyalakṣaṇayāgasambandhasyākhyāto- pāttavidhiviṣayatvam । tatra ko'sau yāga ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ sannidhi- lakṣaṇaprakaraṇaprāptāgniṣṭudyāga eva sambadhyate । sa eva yajati- nānūdyate । paurvāparyamapi na vidheyam, tasyāpi prāptatvāt । tathāhi—“agnīṣṭomasāma kṛtvā brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta” ityanenā-
gniṣṭomastotrasya tāvadyāgapūrvabhāvitvamavagatameva । tadeva “vārayantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam” ityanena vākyenāgniṣṭoma- stotrasya vāravantīyasādhanatvāvagamādavagatameva paurvāparyaṃ ktvāśabde- nānūdyate । evamagniṣṭomastotrasambandhaśca vāravantīyasya pūrvavākyaprāpta evānūdyate । atra ca yadyapi yāgastotrayoranuṣṭhānapaurvāparyaṃ viparītaṃ, prathamaṃ yāgānuṣṭhānam, tathāpyagniṣṭudvākya evāgniṣṭomasāma kṛtveti pratīyate । paurvāparyapara evāyaṃ ktvāśabdaḥ anuvāde'pi tathaiva draṣṭavya iti । etasyaiveti śabdaśca prakaraṇaprāptayāgasambandhānuvādaḥ । evakāraścāśrayāntaranivṛtyartho'nuvādakaḥ । evaṃ sarvamevānūdyate । revatyādhāravāravantīyamātraṃ phale vidhīyata iti । e prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi vāravantīyāgniṣṭudyāgayorāśrayā- śrayibhāvaḥ kathañcidapi sambhavet । na caitadasti, parasparākāṅkṣā- bhāvāt । tathāhi-sādhyaṃ hi sādhanasyāśrayo bhavati । yathā homo dadhnaḥ । na cāgniṣṭudubhayordravyadevatākarttṛsādhyatvena tadatiriktaṃ sādhanamapekṣate । taduktam—

lg.l: yāgaḥ sādhanamityevaṃ sāmnā naiveṣa sādhyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 553)

sāmasādhyatvenāśrayatvayogyamagniṣṭomastotram, na tasya prakaraṇam, ātideśikatvāt । agniṣṭati stotrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ vinigamanāpramā- ṇābhāvāt । nāpi vāravantīyakriyā phalasiddhaye kriyāntaramapekṣate, svata eva sādhyarūpatvāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556)

nāpyagniṣṭomastotradvāreṇa yāgāśrayatvaṃ vāravantīyasāmno vaktavyam । kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatvena kriyāntarāpekṣāyā abhā- vādeveti mantavyam । tena yadetatpakṣāśrayaṇena nānāvidhavākyabhedā- pādanaṃ vārttikakārapādairdarśitam, tadanatiprayojanatvānneha darśi- tamityavadhātavyam । nanu gītitvena kriyārūpasyāpi saubharasya paśvādiphalasādhanatvena stotrarūpakriyāntarāpekṣā dṛṣṭaiva, tadvadvārava- ntīyasya kriyārūpasyāpi kriyāntarāpekṣeti yāgo vā stotraṃ vāśrayo bhaviṣyatīti । maivam; saubhareṇeti tṛtīyā kriyārūpābhi- bhavena karaṇatvena saubharaṃ viniyuṅkte । tena ca rūpeṇa kriyāntarā- pekṣāyāṃ bhavatu stotramāśritya phalasādhanatvaṃ saubharasya । iha tu “vāravantīyaṃ kṛtvā” iti kriyārūpeṇaiva vāravantīyopādānā- tkriyāvāśca kriyāntarānapekṣatvādvaiṣamyamiti ।

nanu “nīcaiḥ sado minuyāt” ityevamādiṣu asādhyasyāpyā- śrayatvamuktam । maivam; vākyārthānavagamāt । tathāhi trividhaṃ hastamānaṃ śāstroktam—ṣaṭpadasaptapadāṣṭapadabhedāt । tatra pādā- vṛttiḥ kāmyamānā bhavati । tadāṣṭapadaparimitena nīcairhastena ṣoḍaśa- hastādisadomānaṃ karttavyam । tatra hastagatasya nīcaistvasya sado- mānaṃ sādhyameveti na tato'sya vyabhicāraḥ । asādhyasyāpi vā bhavatvāśrayatvam, tathāpi nīcaistvasya dharmatvena nityaṃ dharmisāpekṣa- tvādbhavatu sannihitasadomānākhyadharmisambandhaḥ । vāravantīyagītestu revatyādhāratvenāvagatāyā na prakṛtayāgākāṃkṣā kenāpi rūpeṇāstīti na tadāśrayatvam ।

nanu vāravantīyasya (svabhāve (?) sambandhā) tadgatāpe- kṣāyāmapi kṛtvāśabdavaśādeva yāgāpekṣā bhavati । tathāhi- vāravantīyaṃ kṛtvā yajetetyatra kṛtvāśabdādvāravantīyasya saha yāgena paurvāparyaṃ pratīyate । tatra ko'sau yāga ityapekṣāyāṃ sannidhilakṣaṇa- prakaraṇena pūrvāvagatavāravantīyapaurvāparye'pyagniṣṭudyāga eva pratīyate । nāpekṣitapaurvāparyasambandhādevāśrayāśrayitvam, yajirapi bhūtānuvādaka evetyuktam । maivam; revatyādhāravāravantīyagītiyāgapaurvāparyamatra ktvāpratyayātpratīyate । na vāyavyādhāravāravantīyasambandhaḥ phala- sambandhaśca karttuṃ śakyate । ato yathābhūtaṃ paurvāparyamatra pratīyate,
tathābhūtasyāprāptatvātkathamanuvādaḥ ? na cānenaiva vākyenāgniṣṭu- dyāgasya revatyādhāravāravantīyasambandhaḥ phalasambandhaśca karttuṃ śakyate, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । ata āśrayākāṅkṣāyāṃ bhāvanāśrayatvena prāpto yāgo'nuvadituṃ śakyate ।

kiñca—agniṣṭomastotrasambandho vāravantīyasya kutaḥ prāpto- 'nūdyate ? na tāvadagniṣṭudyāgadvāreṇeti mantavyam, tasyānekastotra- vinigamanāpramāṇābhāvāt । na ca “vāravantīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryam” ityetadvākyaprāpta eva vārantīyasyāgniṣṭomastotrasambandho- 'nūdyate iti vācyam । guṇavākyānāṃ pradhānotpattisāpekṣatvena guṇavākyāntarānapekṣatvasyoktatvāt । na cotpattivākyena eta- dvākyapratipādito vāravantīyasyāgniṣṭomasambandho'nūdyata iti vācyam । kratvarthavāravantīyāgniṣṭomasādhanatvasya puruṣārthavāravantīyasambandhitve- nāprāptasyānuvaditumaśakyatvāt । tenānenaiva vākyena vāravantīya- syāgnīṣṭomastotrasambandho vidhātavyaḥ phalasambandhaścetyaparo vākya- bhedaḥ । ato na guṇātphalam, kintu yāgādeveti siddhaṃ karmā- ntaratvamiti ।

nanu yāgantaravidhāne'pi vākyabhedastadavasya eva । tathāhi— revatīṣu vāravantīyāgniṣṭomastotrasambandho vidhātavyaḥ, phalasambandha- ścetyaparaḥ । sāma kṛtvetyanenāgniṣṭomastotre revatīvāravantīyasambandho
vidhātavyaḥ । sa ca kriyāntaraviśeṣaṇatvānna viśiṣṭayāgo vidhinā vidhātuṃ śakyata iti tadarthaṃ vidhirāvarttanīya iti vidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabheda eveti । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadyagniṣṭomastotraviśeṣaṇa- tvena vāravantīyasambandho vidhīyate । kintarhi ? yāgabhāvanā- viśeṣaṇatvenaiva । tathāhi—kṛtvāśabdārthastāvadihāyāga eva viśeṣaṇam । sa ca kṛtvāśabdārtho bhāvanāviśeṣaṇam । sa ca revatīvāravantīyasambandhāpanayadvāreṇaiva viśeṣyarūpaḥ, yato yāga- viśeṣaṇam । tena revatīvāravantīyasambandhasya yāgabhāvanāviśeṣa- ṇatvādviśiṣṭavidhinaiva vidhānam, na vākyabhedaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556)

tasya revatīvāravantīyasambandhasyāyāgasādhanatvena yadyapi yāgabhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ sākṣānna sambhavati, tathāpyānarthakyatadaṅga- nyāyena tadaṅgabhūtāgniṣṭomastotrasādhanatvadvāreṇa nirvartsyati । tasya ca stotrasya vāravantīyasambandho'tideśaprāpta eva, vāravantīya- dvāreṇa ca revatīsambandhasyāpi prāptatvānna pṛthagvidhānāpekṣeti na kiñcidanupapannam । yadyapi cātra viśiṣṭavidhānanyāyena bahava eva vidhātuṃ śakyante, tathāpyagniṣṭudyāgavikāratvādasyātideśādeva
vāravantīyasāmasādhyāgniṣṭomastotraṃ prāptam । etacchabdaśca “athaiva jyotiḥ” itivatprastoṣyamāṇakarmānuvāda eveti na vidhinā revatīvāravantīyasambandhaviśiṣṭayāgabhāvanā vidhīyate । ākṣipta- vidhinā ca revatīvāravantīyasambandha iti na kiñcidanupapannam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe revatyādhāraṃ vāravantīyamagniṣṭudyāga evānuṣṭheyaṃ paśukāmena । siddhānte tu revatyādhāravāravantīyaka karmāntaramevānuṣṭheyamiti ।
sūtrantu—sameṣu parasparanirapekṣeṣu karmasambaddhameva phalaṃ na guṇasambaddhamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ saubharādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
“yo vṛṣṭikāmo yo'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta, sarve vai kāmāḥ saubharam” iti samāmnāya samāmananti— “hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt, ūrgityannādyakāmāya, ū iti svargakāmāya” iti । tatra vicāryate—kiṃ saubharaṃ vṛṣṭernimittaṃ hīṣityetadaparaṃ dṛṣṭernimittam ? atha saubharameva vṛṣṭernimittam,
tadā hīṣiti saubharasya nidhanaṃ karttavyamiti । evam “ūrgityannādya- kāmāya ū iti svargakāmāya” iti tulyo vicāra iti । asya ca karmabhedābhedanirūpaṇatvābhāve'pi phalasambandhapadaprasaṅgena saṅgatiḥ । atra bhāṣyakārīyamadhikaraṇaśarīropadarśanametadvārttikakārapādānāma- pyanumatameva, kintu “hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt” ityādi- vicāraviṣayānuguṇāvākyatraye vacanavyaktivibhāgena sandeho darśitaḥ- yadā hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāyeti sambandho vivakṣitaḥ, tadā phalaguṇavidhānam । atha hīṣiti nidhanaṃ karttavyamiti sambandhaḥ, tadā nidhanavyavasthārthaṃ śravaṇamiti । tannānumanyante, siddhānta vacanavyaktau vṛṣṭikāmapadavyavadhānena hīṣiti nidhanaṃ kuryāditi sambandhānupapatteḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: hīṣo nidhanasambandho neṣṭo hi vyavadhānataḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 566)

tathā siddhānto'pyanupapannaḥ, saubharasambandhinidhanānuvādena hīṣvidhau vṛṣṭikāmapadamanarthakam । atha vṛṣṭikāmasya yadi saubharaṃ tatsambaddhaṃ nidhanaṃ hīṣ karttavyam, tadā viśiṣṭānuvādāduddiśyamāna- viśeṣaṇavivakṣāyāṃ vākyabhedaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 566)

tasmāddhīṣādipadasya vṛṣṭikāmapadasambandhāparityāgenaivātra saṃśayo varṇanīyaḥ—kiṃ hīṣā vṛṣṭiṃ kuryāditi sākṣādeva hīṣo vṛṣṭiphale vidhānam ? atha vṛṣṭikāmapadena lakṣite vṛṣṭisādhane saubhare hīṣo vidhānam ? iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—śrautārthasyaivānvayopapattau lakṣaṇāśrayaṇaṃ sarvatraivānupapannam । sambhavati ceha hīṣityasya śrauta- vṛṣṭiphalasambandhaḥ । sādhanalakṣaṇāyāṃ vacanena tāvatsaubharamātraṃ lakṣaṇīyam । tathā ca sati hīṣiti padasyānnādyakāmaprayoge'pi prāptau niyamānupapattiḥ । nāpi vṛṣṭiphalaviśeṣitaṃ saubharaṃ lakṣaṇīyam । tathā sati viśiṣṭānuvādena vākyabhedaprasaṅgasya tadavasthatvāt । tena dadhnendriyavat, prakṛtasaubharāśritasya vṛṣṭiphale vidhānam । nanu sādhyaḥ khalvāśrayo bhavati । na cānekapadasādhyā saubharagītirhīṣiti padamātreṇa sādhayituṃ śakyate । ataḥ kathamāśrayatvamiti । ucyate— yadanantaraṃ yanniṣpadyate, tattasya sādhanaṃ bhavati, padārthajñānasyevāntimo varṇaḥ । saubharākhyasāmno hīṣiti padānantarameva niṣpatteḥ tadeva tasya sādhanam, itarāṇi tu padāni tadanugrāhakāṇyeveti yuktamāśrayatvam । evañca sati phalātireko'pi puruṣasamīhito bhavatīti yuktaṃ guṇaphala-
vidhitvam । tena vṛṣṭikāma iti kāmyamānaphalasambandhipuruṣaśruteḥ saubharāśritahīṣnidhanasya kāmyamānaphalasambandha iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: sarvasyoktakāmatvāt tasmin kāmaśrutiḥ syānni- dhanārthā vā punaḥ śrutiḥ ।। 2. 2. 29 ।।
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi saubharasambandhivṛṣṭikāmādipratya- bhijñānamatra bhavet । tathāhi—yaugiko hyayaṃ vṛṣṭikāmādiśabdaḥ । yaugikānāñca sarveṣāṃ vyaktivācitvam । vyaktivacanānāñca prakṛta- vyaktiparatve sambhavati aprakṛtavyaktiparatvasyānyāyatvāt saubhara- sambandhisannihitavṛṣṭikāmādiparatvameva yuktam । na ca tathā sati prakṛtānuvādasya niṣprayojanatvam, saubharasambandhinidhanavyavasthārtha- tvenaivārthavatvāt । tathāhi—saubharasya vyākhyābhedena hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya urgiti ū iti nidhanatrayamāśrīyate । phalatrayañca tatra śrūyate—vṛṣṭirūpamannādyarūpaṃ svargarūpañca । tatra kasmin phale saurabhasya kiṃ nidhanamityapekṣāyāṃ bhavati saubharānuvādena nidhana- vyavasthārthāni vacanāni—“hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryādūrgi- /?/ ū iti /?/” iti ।
taduktam—

lg.l: niyantuṃ nidhanaṃ tasya sa evāyamanūdyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 467.)

nāpi guṇaphalasambandhaḥ sambhavati । prakṛtasya saubharasya hīṣādyasādhyatvenāśrayatvāsambhavāt । na ca tadanantaraniṣpatteḥ padā- rthajñānasyevāntimo varṇaḥ saubharasyāpyantabhūtaṃ hīṣādyeva sādhanamiti vaktavyam । yato hi nirbhāgaṃ hi jñānaṃ tadanantaraṃ niṣpadyate tadeva tasya sādhanamitivat saṃskāradvāreṇa tadanugrāhakamiti yuktaṃ saubharaṃ sabhāgaṃ na hīṣiti padamātrasādhyaṃ bhavitumarhati । na ca vācyam—saubharasya nidhanamevāśritaphalaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti । tasyāprakṛtatvāt । saubharaṃ hi prakṛtam, na tu tadguṇabhūtaṃ nidhanam । ato na prakaraṇādāśrayalābhaḥ । vākye cāśrayasambandhakaraṇe phala- sambandhakaraṇe ca vākyabheda eva । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 567.)

ato'nuvādabhūtamidaṃ vṛṣṭikāmādipadam । na ca hīṣādi- saubharasya samastasya yaḥkāmo'bhihitaḥpurā iti mudrita- vārtikapāṭhaḥ ।
nidhanasambandho vṛṣṭikāme sambhavatītyasambhavena svasambandhayogyaṃ saubharaṃ lakṣayatīti na doṣaḥ ।

nanu vṛṣṭikāmapade saubharamātralakṣaṇāyāṃ niyamānupapattiḥ । vṛṣṭiphalaviśeṣitatvena viśiṣṭānuvādādvākyabheda ityuktam । maivam; syādevaṃ yadi vṛṣṭiphalaviśeṣitaṃ saubharaṃ lakṣaṇaviṣayaḥ, na caita- tsambhavati । svārthalakṣaṇapramāṇābhāvāt । na ca saubharamātraṃ lakṣitaṃ śrautena vṛṣṭiphalena viśeṣṭuṃ śakyate, yugapacchutilakṣaṇāvirodhāt । tena yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣo vasatītyatra gaṅgāpadena tīraṃ lakṣyamāṇaṃ svasamba- ndhyeva lakṣyate, tathātrāpi vṛṣṭikāmapadena saubharaṃ lakṣyamāṇaṃ vṛṣṭi- sādhanaśaktyupetameva lakṣyate । ato na vākyabhedaḥ, nāpyavyavastheti siddhaṃ nidhanavyavasthārthamiti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe vṛṣṭiphalārtho'pi saubhare phalāntarasamīhayā nidhanāntaraprayogaḥ । siddhānte tu hīṣa eva prayogaḥ । ekaiva tu vṛṣṭiḥ kāmayitavyeti ।
sūtrantu-sarvasyaiva saubharasya vṛṣṭyādisādhanasyoktavṛṣṭyādikā- matvāt tasminneva saubharasambandhikāma iyaṃ śrutistadanuvādiketyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.trailer: iti śrībālavalabhībhujaṅgāparanāmno bhaṭṭabhavadevasya kṛtau tautātitamatatilake dvitīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ rathantarādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ—“jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । taṃ prakṛtya śrūyate—“yadi rathāntarasāmā somaḥ syādaindravāyavāgrān, grahān gṛhṇīyāt, yadi bṛhatsāmā śukrāgrān, yadi jagatsāmā āgrayaṇāgrān” iti । tatra sandihyate—kiṃ grahāgratāviśeṣo jyoti- ṣṭomasya vidhīyate ? uta karmāntarasya rathantarasāmno bṛha- tsāmnaśceti । atra tu guṇanimittakarmabhedāpavādādadhyāyasaṅgatiḥ । prakṛtasaṅgatiścāpavādaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“rathantarasāmā soma” iti bahuvrīhisamāso'yamanyapadārthapradhānaḥ । anyapadārthaścātra soma- śabdalakṣito rathantarasāmaviśiṣṭo yāga eva । viśeṣaṇañca svajā- tīyānyayogavyacchedenaiva bhavati । tena rathantarameva sāma asya yāgasyāsau rathantarasāmā yāgaḥ । na ca prakṛtau jyātiṣṭomo rathanta-
raikasāmā । tena rathantaraikasāmatvalakṣaṇasya guṇasya vājinasyeva prakṛtakarmāsaṃyogāt, viśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānamevaitat । taduktam—

lg.l: viśeṣaṇaṃ vyacchettṛ jyotiṣṭome ca nāsti tat ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 571)

nanu yadiśabdasaṃyogānnimittatvamatra pratīyate । tacca pūrva- siddhasyaiva bhavati । ataḥ kathaṃ karmāntaravidhānam ? naivam; na hi pratītamityetāvataiva sarvaṃ kriyate । kiṃ tarhi ? yadyupapadyate । na ca prakṛtamaprakṛtaṃ vā rathantaraikasāmakaṃ karmāsti, yasya yadi- śabdānnimittatvamavagamyeta । tena nimittarūpaprasiddhārthaparityāgena “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” itivadvidhāsyamānakarmaparāmarśaka evāyaṃ yadiśabdaḥ । nipātānāmanekārthatvādevakārārtha evāyam । yathā—yadi vedāḥ pramāṇam tadā avaśyameva yāgāt phalena bhavitavyam । athavā vidhirhi rucimutpādya pravarttayati । tena vidhyākṣiptāyā eva rucernimittatvaṃ yadiśabdo'nuvadati । tena rucipadādhyā- hāreṇāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—yadi rocate tato rathantaraikasāmānaṃ kratuṃ kuryāditi । atra ca pakṣadvaye'pi “aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt” iti vākyāntarameva । tadarthasyaindravāyavāgratāyāstu jyotiṣṭomasya kramāntarayuktagrahaśravaṇena nirākāṅkṣatvāt prakṛtayāgaṅgatvamavāntara- prakaraṇeneti ।

yadi vā ekavākyatvamevāṅgīkṛtya yadiśabdasya vyavadhānenaṃ sambandhaḥ kartavyaḥ—yadyaindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt grahītumi- cchet, rathāntaraikasāmānaṃ kratuṃ kuryādityarthaḥ । atra ca “aindravāya- vāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt” ityayaṃ liṅśabdaḥ kāmapravedane । “rathantarasāmā somaḥ syāt” iti tu vidhāyaka iti ।

athavā hetau hetumati vā liṅśabdaḥ । tatra yadi syāditi liṅśabdo hetutvapratipādakaḥ, gṛhṇīyāditi tu vidhāyakaḥ । tadāyamarthaḥ—aindravāyavāgratāhetubhūtaḥ somayāgaḥ karttavya iti । atrāpi pakṣe kalpitavidhinā aindravāyavāgratāvidhānamiti । atra cobhayatrāpi yadiśabdo rathantaraikasāmayāgasya grahāgratānimittatvā- nuvādakaḥ । ubhayapakṣe'pi yadyevaṃ tadā grahāgratetyasyārthasyāviśeṣā- diti । ekavākyatvapakṣe ca aindravāyavagrahāgratāyā aṅgatvaṃ vākyenaiva । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 574.)

kiñca prātassavane grahāgratā bhavati, mādhyandine rathantaram । na cāniṣpannaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati । ato'pi na rathantaraṃ nimittam, kintu yāga eva । kiñca jagatsāmeti yaduktam tanna jyotiṣṭomavi-
ṣayamityubhayavādisiddhameva । tatsamānanirddeśayorapi rathantarasāmabṛha- tsāmapadayorna jyotiṣṭomaviṣayatvamiti । tena rathantaraikasāmatvalakṣaṇo guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ jyotiṣṭomavyatiriktaṃ gamayet । rathantarasaṃyogasya viśeṣaṇatvena nāviśeṣaṇabhūtatvāt (?) kṛtsnakratusaṃyogāditi । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedeyaṃ yadyatra rathantarasāmatvalakṣaṇo guṇaḥ yadiśabdopabandho nimittatvena pratīyamānaḥ prakṛte karmaṇi na sambha- vet । sambhavati tu “rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati” iti vacanena jyotiṣṭome rathantarasya vihitatvāt । nanu “rathantarasāmā somaḥ” ityatra rathanta- raikasāmatvamavagamyata ityuktam । na ca tathābhūtā jyotiṣṭoma iti kathaṃ tatrāsya nimittārthatayā sambandhaḥ ? iti । ucyate-dvividhaṃ hi viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati-vyāpakamavyāpakaṃ ca । tatra vyāpakaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ sajātīyānya- yogavyavacchedakameva । yathā-nīlamutpalamiti । atrotpalasya nīlatvam । avyāpakantu viśeṣaṇaṃ svāyogavyavacchedenaiva । yathā- daṇḍī puruṣa ityatra puruṣasya daṇḍaḥ । jyotiṣṭome ca “rathantaraṃ
pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati” “bṛhatpṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati” iti vaikalpikatvāt rathantarasya svā- yogavyavacchedenaiva rathantarasya viśeṣaṇatvam । tatra yadyapītarāṇyapi sāmāni rathantarasya sajātīyāni, tathāpi buddhisannihitaṃ vyavacche- dyaṃ vyavacchedakena vyavacchidyate । itarasāmnāñca buddhisannidhānaṃ jyo- tiṣṭomamahāprakaraṇena bahiraṅgam, pṛṣṭhāvāntaraprakaraṇena ca bṛhadrathantarayo- rbuddhisannidhānamantaraṅgam । ato bṛhadvyavacchedenaiva rathantarasya viśe- ṣaṇatvaṃ, rathantaravyavacchedena bṛhato viśeṣaṇatvamiti । atha kratu- viśeṣitasya rathantarasyaiva yadiśabdena nimittatvaṃ pratipādyate, tathāca sati jyotiṣṭomasya rathantaravyāpakatvāt kratvantaravyavacche- denaiva viśeṣaṇatvam । tenāyamarthaḥ-jyotiṣṭomasyaiva rathantaramaindravā- yavāgratānimittam ।

nanu “rathantarasāmā somaḥ” ityatra rathantarasyaiva viśeṣaṇatvaṃ pratīyate, na tu somayāgasya । satyam; samāsapadānna pratīyate, vigrahavākyātpratīyata eva । evaṃ hi vigrahavākyam—rathantaraṃ sāma yasyeti । atra ca ṣaṣṭhyantatvāt kratoreva viśeṣaṇatvamavagamyate । etacca samāsapadādapratīyamānamapi yadiśabdapratipāditanimitta- tvānurodhena jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇānurodhena ca svīkriyamāṇaṃ karmānta- rakalpanāto laghutaramiti na doṣāyeti ।

nanu nimittasyoddeśyatvāt tadviśeṣaṇavivakṣāyāṃ vākyabhedaḥ
syāt । tena rathantarasya nimittatve kathaṃ kratorviśeṣaṇatvam ? kratorvā nimittatve kathaṃ rathantarasya viśeṣaṇatvam ? iti । uddeśyaviśeṣaṇavivakṣāyāṃ hi vākyabhedo bhavati, na punarvi- śiṣṭoddeśe । yathoktam—mṛṣyāmahe havirviśeṣaṇamiti । tena yathā ārtteḥ kevalāyā nimittatvāsambhavāt havirviśeṣaṇabhūtāyā eva nimittatvenoddeśyatvam, tathā ihāpi kevalasya kratorbṛha- drathantarasāmādhārasya vaikalpikagrahāgratānimittatvāsambhavāt, kevalasya rathantarasya kratusambandhe grahāgratānimittatvāsambhavāt yuktaṃ viśiṣṭasyaivauddeśyatvamiti । tacca nimittatvaṃ yadyapi prātassavane grahāgratā mādhyandino rathantaram, tathāpi buddhisvīkṛtasyāpi nimittatvopapatternānupapannam । nanu jagatsāmāśabdasya na jyotiṣṭoma- parāmarśakatvam, tadasambhavāt tathā bhavatu nāma । na hi jyotiṣṭome jagannāma samasti, asti tu viṣuvannāmake karmaṇi । jagatyādhāra- gīyamānaṃ sāma jagatsāma । tena bhavatu tasya tadviṣayatvam, na ceha tatheti vaiṣamyam । ato nātra karmāntaratvamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe rathantaraikasāmno bṛhadekasāmnaśca karmaṇi bhedenānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu jyotiṣṭomasyaiva vaikalpikagrahaṇā- nuṣṭhānamiti ।

sūtrantu—ekasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya tena tena rathantarasāmatvena
bṛhatsāmatvena ca cihnabhedena grahāgratvaguṇavidhānārthamucyeta abhi- dhānaṃ kriyeta ekatvaṃ karmāntaratvaṃ guṇavākyatvāt guṇavidhāna- paratvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyamaveṣṭyakaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti rājasūyaḥ “rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeta” । iti । taṃ prakṛtyāmananti averṣṭi nāmeṣṭim, “āgneyo'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā” iti । evamādikāṃ prakṛtyābhidhīyate “yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvā tamabhighāra- yet, yadi rājanya aindram, yadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevam” iti । tatra sandi- hyate—kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittatvena śravaṇam ? uta brāhma- ṇādīnāmayaṃ prayogo vidhīyate ? iti । idānīṃ guṇanimittakarmabhedā- bhedapratipādanaprasaṅgena prayogabhedaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yaugikaḥ khalvayaṃ rājaśabdaḥ, rājyayukto hi rājeti mahājanaprasiddheḥ । rājyañca janapadapurapirapāla-
nabaliṣaḍbhāgagrahaṇam । tacca sarvavarṇasādhāraṇameva । tena “rājā rāja- suyena svārājyakāmo yajeta” ityatra vidyāgnirahitatvena śūdrasyā- nadhikārāt trayāṇāmeva brāhmaṇādīnāmadhikāraḥ । tathā ca sati “yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta” ityādivākyeṣu pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyena nimi- ttārthameva brāhmaṇādīnāṃ śravaṇamiti ।

nanu rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti hi smaranti । atra hi prākprasi- ddharājaśabdārthasya karma rājyamiti pratīyate, na tu rājyasya karttā rājeti । asti ca prāk prasiddhiḥ । dramiḍā hi kṣatriyajātāveva rājaśabdaṃ prayuñjate । tena barhirājyādhikaraṇanyāyenaikadeśaprasiddherevātra nirṇayahetutvamiti । taduktaṃ tatraiva—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 343)

kiñca rājño'patyaṃ rājanya iti tadapi smaranti । rājanyaśabdaśca kṣatriyajātāveva rūḍhaḥ । tadyadi rājyayogādeva rājā, tadā varṇā- ntarasyāpyapatyaṃ rājanyaḥ syāt, na tvevam । tato'pi kṣatriya eva rājeti । ucyate—mlecchā hi dramiḍāḥ । mlecchaprasiddhe- ścāryaprasiddhirbalīyasīti yavavarāhādhikaraṇa eva darśitam । āryaprasiddhaścātra rājaśabdasya rājyakarttṛtvaviṣayā pratīyate । evaṃ
smaranti-‘na rājñaḥpratigṛhṇīyādarājanyaprasūtitaḥ’ iti । tathā ‘na śū- drarājye nivaset’ iti ca । barhirājyādiṣu viparītaprasiddharasti । tena balavadāryaprasiddheścātra rājaśabdasya na jātivacanatvam । yatra rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti smaraṇam, tadrājyaśabdasya janaparipālane rūḍha- syaiva sādhutvamātrapratipādanārtham । yathā ākṛtiviśeṣe rūḍhasyaiva gośabdasya pratipādānārthaṃ gacchatīti gauriti vyutpattidarśanam, tathā rājño'patyaṃ rājanya ityetadapi rājanyaśabdasya kṣatriyajāti- vacanatvena rūḍhasyaiva sādhutvamātrapratipādanārthameva smaraṇam । ato rājyayoganimitta evāyaṃ rājaśabdaḥ । tena rājasūye traivārṇikasyai- vādhikārāt, tadantargatāyāmaveṣṭau brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptatvāt “yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta” ityādiśravaṇaṃ nimittārthameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi yaugiko'yaṃ rājaśabdo bhavet । kiṃ tarhi ? kṣatriyajātivacana evāyam, draviḍānāṃ kṣatriyajātimātre prayogāt । nanvāryaprasiddhivirodhādapramāṇaṃ mlecchaprasiddhirityu- ktam । naivam; ananyathāsiddhatvenātra mlecchaprasiddherabādhyatvāt । na hi draviḍānāṃ kṣatriyajātau rājaśabdaprayogo'bhidhānaśaktiṃ vinā prakārāntareṇāpi sambhavati । āryāṇāntu jātyantare prayogaḥ kṣatriyadharmakāritayā gauṇatvenaivopapadyate । kṣatriyasya manvā-
dibhiḥ janapadapuraparipālanabaliṣaḍbhāgoddharaṇamabhiṣecanañca vihitam । atastatkāriṇi varṇāntare'pi prayujyamāno gauṇa evāyaṃ rāja- śabdaḥ । evaṃ sati rājñaḥ karma rājyam, rājño'patyaṃ rājanya iti smṛtidvayaṃ niṣpannāvagatāvayavārthaparityāgena sādhutvamātrapratipā- danārthaṃ bhaviṣyati । yattu ‘na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇīyādarājanyaprasūtitaḥ’ iti ‘na śūdrarājye nivaset’ iti ca, tadgauṇarājaśabdārthamabhi- pratyeti mantavyam । ato rājaśabdasya kṣatriyavacanatvādrāja- sūyāntargatāyāmaveṣṭau brāhmaṇādīnāmaprāpteḥ na nimittārthatvam । ataḥ pūrvādhikaraṇoktayadiśabdaparityāgādinā brāhmaṇādikarttṛkaṃ prayo- gāntaramevāveṣṭervidhīyate ।

nanu rājasūyaprayogavākyātiriktamaparamapyaveṣṭervarṇaviśeṣāsa- mbandhavacanaṃ śrūyate—“etayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayet” iti । atra ca varṇatrayasyaiva prāptatvādrājasūyaprayoge nimittārthatvāsambha- ve'pyannādyaprayoge brāhmaṇādīnāṃ nimittārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadyannādyakāmavākyaṃ prayogaparaṃ bhavati, kintu phalopādānāt karmaṇaḥ phale viniyojakaṃ sadanekaparatāgauravabhayā- danyena prayogamapekṣamāṇaṃ rājasūyaprayogamadhyasthametacchabdenopādāya ‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ (jai. sū., 4. 3. 5.) iti nyāye- nānnādyaphale viniyuṅkte । tenāsyāḥ sādhāraṇaṃ svārājyaṃ phalam,
asādhāraṇañcānnādyamiti । sā ca nirjñātakṣatriyakartṛketi nimittārthaṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇamiti ।

nanu rājasūyavākye svārājyaphalaviśeṣitāyāmaveṣṭau rājā karttetyavagataḥ, na tvaveṣṭimātre । ataḥ kathamannādyaphalāyāṃ rājakarttṛ- tvam । naivam; na hi karttā phalena sambadhyate, phalaviśeṣitena vā karmaṇā, kārakāṇāṃ kriyāmātrākāṅkṣitatvāt । tena rājeti karttṛpadasya kriyāmātrākāṅkṣāyāṃ rājakarttṛkāveṣṭikriyetyetāvadavagatam । ato na svārājyaprayoge phalāntarasambandhavirodhaḥ । bhavatu vānnādyavākyasya prayogaparatvamapi, tathāpyetayeti karaṇavibhaktyā yathāvijñānaṃ sannihitāyā evāveṣṭerupādānādirāpadavacchākhāntarīya- prayogavacanopasaṃhṛtāṅgavacca rājño'pi karttṛtvenopādānānna traivārṇikā- vakāśaḥ । ato na kathañcidapi brāhmaṇādiyuktavākyānnimittārtha- tvamiti pūrvādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena yadiśabdaparityāgādinā aveṣṭereva brāhmaṇādikarttṛkaṃ prayogāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti siddham । na ca prāpte karmaṇi kathaṃ brāhmaṇādibārhaspatyādyanekārthavidhānamiti vācyam । viśiṣṭakarmavidhivadviśiṣṭaprayogavidhāne cānekavidhāno- papatteḥ । tathā ca sati rājasūyāntargatāpekṣitaprayogasya svārā- jyaphalenaiva nirākāṅkṣatvādbrāhmaṇādiyuktaprayogatrayasya phalasā-
kāṅkṣatvāt “etayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayet” ityannādyaphalaṃ brāhmaṇā- diyuktaprayogatrayeṇaiva sambaddhyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 587)
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe rājasūyāntargatāveṣṭau brāhmaṇādinimittaṃ bārhaspatyādimadhyavidhānām । siddhānte tu rājasūyaprayogādbahireva brāhmaṇādikarttṛkāveṣṭiprayoge bārhaspatyādimadhyavidhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—aveṣṭau brāhmaṇādiyuktāveṣṭivākye yajeteti yajñasaṃ- yogāt, kratuprādhānaṃ brāhmaṇādīnāmabhidhānaṃ kriyate prayogāntaraṃ vidhātumityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyamādhānādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
idamāmananti “vasante brāhmaṇo'gnīnādadhīta, grīṣme rājasyaḥ/?/, śaradi vaiśyaḥ” iti । tatra sandihyate—kiṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇaṃ nimittārtham, brāhmaṇādayaścedādadhānā vasantādiṣvādadhīramiti ?
uta brāhmaṇādīnāmādhānaṃ vidhīyate ? iti । pūrvādhikaraṇe prāsaṅgikamaveṣṭeḥ prayogabhedaṃ nirūtyedānīṃ prastuta eva guṇanibandhanaḥ karmabhedaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—sarvatropapadaśravaṇe sati upapadārthasaṃkrānto vidhirdhātvarthānuvādamapekṣata iti siddham । tadapi “vasante brāhṇo'gnīnādadhīta” iti vasantādyupapadākṣiptaśaktividhā- yakamādhānuvādamapekṣate । na cādhānamaprāptam, agnihotrādiśruti- bhirevākṣepataḥ prāptatvāt । tathāhi—āhavanīyasādhyāḥ khalvagniho- trādayaḥ “yadāhavanīye juhoti” iti śruteḥ “āhitāgnirāhavanīyaḥ” itvarthavādavaśādāhavanīyaścādhānasādhya ityākṣepādastyevādhanaprāptiḥ । athavā “ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte” ityetasmādevānanyākṣiptaśakte- rvidhāyakādādhānasya prāptatvāttadanuvādena vasantādikālavidhānāya nimittārthaṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇamiti । na cāyaṃ varttamānāpadeśatvānna vidhiḥ । “ya evaṃ sapatnaṃ bhrātṛvyamavartti sahate, ya evaṃ vidvāna/?/- mādhatta” ityarthavādasambandhādvidhitvasiddheḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 588)

nanvādhānaviśiṣṭo brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ vādhānamatra nimittam । ubhayathāpi ca viśiṣṭānuvāde vākyabhedaḥ । ucyate— aprāptavasantavidhau prāptatvādbrāhmaṇādhānayoranuvādaḥ । tatrāpi viśeṣaṇatātparyāt kārakasya ca kriyāviśeṣaṇatvādbrāhmaṇasyaiva ni- mittatvānna vākyabhedaḥ । na ca nimittakālayordvayorapyuddeśyatvena kathamekasmin vākye samāveśa iti vācyam । kālasya kriyānva- yitvānnimittasya ca karttavyatvādvailakṣaṇyena samāveśopapatteḥ । tena yadyādyupabandhavyatirekeṇādhānasambandhena brāhmaṇādyanuvādārthavādatvāt brāhmaṇādinimittaka ādhāne vasantakālavidhānamiti । evaṃ prāpte-
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi yathāśrutasyādhānasyākṣepataḥ prāptirbhavet । atra hi “vasante brāhmaṇo'gnīnādadhīta” ityātma- nepadāt karttṛgāmiphalamādhānaṃ pratīyate । phalañcādhānasyāhavanīyaḥ । tenānuvādapakṣa evāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—karttṛgatāhavanīyaphalamādhānaṃ brāhmaṇena vasante karttavyam । na cāgnihotrādiśrutibhirevākṣepādevaṃ- vidhamādhānaṃ labhyate, yadanūdyeta । āhavanīyo hi tairākṣipyate, na tvādhānānuṣṭhānam । ekenāhitasyānyaiḥ krayaṇādināpyupādāna- sambhavāt । na cānuvādagataviśeṣadarśanāttathābhūtasyaivākṣepa iti vācyam । sandehe satyanuvādadarśanādapi nirṇayo bhavati । yathā
“airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam” ityatrerāpadasya kasmin sthāne niveśa iti sandehe “na girā girā” iti niṣedhānuvādadarśanādirāpadasya girāpadasthānaniveśo nirṇītaḥ । iha tu “āhavanīye juhoti” iti viniyogabalādāhavanīyamantareṇa kratuvidhyasambhavāt bhavatvāhavanīyo- pādanākṣepaḥ । sa ca svataḥ prāptyabhāvādvasantādiviśiṣṭādhānameva ।

nanu mā bhūtkratuśrutyākṣiptasyānuvādaḥ । “ya evaṃ vidvānagni mādhatte” iti pratyakṣameva vacanaṃ vidhāyakamastyātmanepadayuktam । tatra karttṛgāmiphalasyaivādhānasya prāptatvāttadanuvādena vasantādiyukta- vākyeṣu brāhmaṇādinimittaṃ vasantādikālamātraṃ vidhāsyate । maivam; syādevaṃ yadi “ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte” iti vidhirbhavet । kintarhi ? ādhānāṅgabhūtopasarjanādisambhāravidhyekavākyatayā varttamānāpadeśarūpaḥ kṛtsna evāyamarthavādaḥ । evaṃ hi śrūyate— “sa evaṃ sapatnaṃ bhrātṛvyamavartti sahate, ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte apa upasṛjati” iti । kiñcādadhītetyasandigdhaḥ pratyakṣo'tra vidhiḥ śrūyate । tathā satyagnihotrādiśruterākṣepo varttamānāpa- deśasya vidhitvakalpanaṃ vā na sambhavati । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 586)

ataḥ sarvathā prāptyabhāvānna vasantādivākyeṣu brāhmaṇādīnāṃ nimittārthaṃ śravaṇam, kintu karttṛkālānekaguṇasambaddhāni bhinnānyevādhānāni vidhīyante । nanu apaśūdrādhikaraṇa evādhā- nākṣepo “ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatte” ityasya vidhitvaṃ brāhmaṇādi- yuktavākyānāñca nimittārthatvamiti sarvamupanyasyate । ataḥ katha- matrāsya vicāraḥ ? iti । ucyate—tatra hi pradhānabhūtakarmaṇi kamiśru- tervarṇacatuṣṭayasādhāraṇatvāttadbalena śūdrādhikāre sati tadupapatyarthaṃ ka- miśrutibhireva varṇacatuṣṭayasambandhenaivādhānasyākṣepo bhaviṣyati । “agnimādhatta” ityasya varṇacatuṣṭayasādhāraṇādhānavidhāyakatvaṃ vasa- ntādivākyaiśca traivārṇikasyaiva kālaviśeṣavidhānācchūdrasyāniyata- kālīnamevādhānamiti śūdrasyāpyāhitāgneradhikārapūrvapakṣe siddhā- ntitam—kamiśrutestraivarṇikaparatve'pyaviऱodhānnaitadadhikaraṇasiddhavasa- ntādivākyānāṃ viśiṣṭādhānākṣepeṇa śūdrādhikāraḥ sambhavati । tena kamiśrutervarṇacatuṣṭayādhikāraparatvena samadhikaśūdrādhikāraśaṅkā- nirāsārthaṃ tadadhikaraṇam । tatsiddhaṃ caitadadhikaraṇasiddhameva sarvaṃ smāritamityapaunaruktyam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe āhitasyāpyagneḥ krayaṇādilakṣaṇasya karmāṅgatvam । siddhānte tvādhānotpannasyaiva karmāṅgatvam ।

sūtrantu-ādhāne'pūrvavadeva prāpaṇavacanāni na nimittārthāni
ādhānasyāsarvaśeṣatvāt āhavanīyavat karmaśeṣatvābhāvenākṣepābhāvā- dityarthaḥ । dvitīyavarṇake tu sarvaśeṣatvāditi । tatraiṣā vyākhyā— anupasarjanādisarvasambhāraśeṣatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ dākṣāyaṇayajñādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsau prakṛtyāmananti—“dākṣāyaṇayajñena yajeta prajā- kāmaḥ, sākaṃprasthāyīyena yajeta paśukāmaḥ, saṅkramayajñena yajetānnādya- kāmaḥ” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoreva guṇāt phalam ? uta karmāntaramevañjātīyakam ? iti । karmabhedāpavādabhūtā guṇasya nimittārthatā kutrāsti kutra nāstīti nirūpya idānīṃ phalārthatāpi guṇasya karmabhedāpavādabhūtadadhnendriyādhikaraṇapratipāditāpyadhikā- śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ punaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—guṇākṛṣṭo hi vidhiḥ karmapari- tyāgena guṇameva phale vidhatte । yathā-“dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāta”
ityādau । na ceha dadhyādivat pṛthaksiddho guṇaḥ kaścit pratīyate । dākṣāyaṇayajñasākamprasthāyīyasaṅkramayajñaśabdānāṃ kvacidguṇaviśeṣe prasiddhyabhāvāt । tena ‘prasiddhenāprasiddhasya nityamiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇam’ ityanena nyāyena viśvajidādipadavadyāganāmadheyatvamevāmīṣām । tathāca satyavidheyatvānnāmnastadavacchinnaṃ karmaiva phale vidhīyata iti saṃjñāta eva karmabhedaḥ । nanu saṃjñādhikaraṇe pṛthakchutā hi saṃjñā “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” ityādiḥ paścādyajatinā sambadhyamānā bhediketyuktam । yajisamabhivyāhṛtā tu saṃjñā na bhediketyabhyāsādhikaraṇa eva nirū- pitam । ataḥ kathamatra “dākṣāyaṇayajñena yajeta” ityādikā yajisa- mabhivyāhṛtā saṃjñā bhediketi । ucyate—ananyaparākhyātasamabhi- vyāhṛtā hi saṃjñā satyaṃ na bhedikā, ākhyātasyaivānanyaparatvena tatra bhedakatvāt । iha tvākyātasya phalasambandhaparatvena prakṛtakarma- praveśasambhavāt saṃjñaiva saṃjñāntarāvaruddhe karmaṇi praveśamalabhamānā karmabhediketi । etaccaitadadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasiddhameva tatra pratipādita- mityavadhātavyam । tenāyaneṣu dākṣāyaṇayajñādiṣu codanāntaraṃ karmā- ntarameva jyotiṣṭomavikārabhūtaṃ phale vidhīyate, na tu guṇāt phalamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi dadhnendriyavadguṇaṅkrānto vidhirna bhavet । tathāhi-pratyekaṃ tāvadagnihotravaddarśapūrṇamāsākhyaṃ karma pratyabhijñāyate । guṇaśca yadyapi dadhyādivallokaprasiddho na pratīyate, tathāpi vākyāntareṇānuṣṭhānāvṛttiviśeṣasānnāyyapātrasahitaprasthā- nahomadeśasaṃkramaṇalakṣaṇaguṇā darśapūrṇamāsasannidhau vihitāḥ santi । śakyate ca yaugikatvādetaiḥ śabdaisteṣāmupādānam । tathāhi- paunaḥpunyānuṣṭhānotsāhaśālī yajamāno dakṣaḥ । tasyartvijo dākṣāḥ teṣāmayanamanuṣṭhānamāvṛttirūpaṃ dākṣayaṇamucyate । evaṃ saha sannāyyakumbhībhyāṃ prasthānaṃ sākamprasthānamucyate । tathā''havanīyadeśe saṅkramaṇaṃ saṅkrama ucyate । tena yathā vākyāntareṇokthyaśabda- vācye saṃsthāviśeṣe darśite tatsannidhau “paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt” iti lokāprasiddhasyāpyukthyapadārthasya phale vidhānam, evamatrāpīti nānupapannam । nanu nātra dadhnetivaddākṣāyaṇeneti śrūyate । kiṃ tarhi ? dākṣayaṇayajñeneti । tena karmaṇa eva sādhanatvāvagamāt kathaṃ guṇasya phale sādhanatvam ? ucyate—yadyapyevam, tathāpi viśeṣyasya viniyo- gāyogyatvāllohitoṣṇīṣādivadviśeṣaṇapradhānānyeva tāni vacanāni ।
teṣāmeva phalasambandhaṃ pratipādayanti । tathāhi—na tāvat prakṛtaṃ karma phale viniyujyate । “sarvebhyo vai darśapūrṇamāsau” ityanenaiva tattatphalānvayasya prāptatvāt, saṃjñāntaravaiyarthyācca । nāpi karmāntaram, prakṛtapratyabhijñānavirodhāt, viśiṣṭavidhigauravaprasaṅgācca । tena karmaṇo viniyogāsambhavādviśeṣaṇameva guṇaḥ phale vidhīyate । na cai- ṣāmasādhanatvāt prakṛtakarmāśrayatvānupapattiḥ । yataḥ sahaprasthānasaṃkrama- ṇayostāvatkarmasādhanatvaṃ vyaktameva । anuṣṭhānāvṛtterapi puruṣaprayatna- dharmmatvādāvṛttasya ca prayatnasyāvṛttakarmasādhanatvādyuktaṃ karmaṇo guṇāśrayatvam ।

nanu loke tāvadete guṇā dadhyādivanna pratīyante । nāpi vede dākṣāyaṇādiguṇapratipādakāni vacanāni śrūyante । ataḥ kutra prasiddhasya phale vidhānamiti । ucyate-sākaṃ prasthāyye tāvat “ājyabhāgābhyāṃ pracāryāgneyena ca puroḍāśenāgnīdhe srucau pradāya saha kumbhībhirabhikrāmannāha” iti vacanaṃ sahaprasthānalakṣaṇaguṇa- bodhakaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇodāhṛtam । tadgocaratvenaiva nyāyavyutpattau satyāmudāharaṇāntare'pi yadi dṛśyate, tadā kalpanīyam । ato guṇaphalasambandha evāyamiti na kiñcidanupapannam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe darśapūrṇamāsapṛthagbhūtaṃ jyotiṣṭomadharmakaṃ karmāntaramevānuṣṭheyam । siddhānte tu neti ।
sūtrantu—vikāro vā darśapūrṇamāsayorevāvṛttādyavasthāmedaḥ phale vidhīyate । prakaraṇātprakaraṇānugrahādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamamīṣālambhādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
anārabhyādhīyate kiñcit “vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ” “sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ” iti । darśapūrṇamāsayorapyā- mananti—“īṣāmālabheta, caturo muṣṭīrnnirvapati” iti । tatrāyamarthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ—kiṃ dārśapūrṇamāsika ālambhe ālambho guṇavidhiḥ,
yadyapi prakṛtaṃ karma nāsti, tathāpyanārabhyādhītānāṃ prakṛtigāmitvāt prakṛtau ca dārśapūrṇamāsike śakaṭe īṣālambhacaturmuṣṭinirvāpayorvi- hitatvādupādeyasya caruguṇasya dūrasthakarmānuvādenāpi vidhātuṃ śakyatvāt prākṛtālambhanirvāpānuvādenaiva śvetarūpacarurūpaguṇau vidhīyete । tenāyamarthaḥ—dārśapūrṇamāsikī śakaṭeṣā śvetīkṛtyā- labdhavyā । caturmuṣṭibhirnirvāpaścaroḥ karttavyaḥ । caruśabdaścātra lokaprasidhyā vā lakṣaṇayā vā sthālīvācakaḥ । na ca phala- padaśravaṇādvidhīyamāno guṇaḥ phala eva vidhīyatāmiti vācyam, prakṛtāśrayābhāvāt । anenaiva ca vākyena phalasambandhakaraṇe āśrayasambandhakaraṇe ca vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । tena “sarvebhyo darśa- pūrṇamāsau” iti pradhānaphalasyaivāṅgasambandhenānuvādaḥ । tathāca sarvavanaspatīnāmarthavādato vāyudevatākatvādīṣāyā eva vāyavya- mityanuvādaḥ । tathā cāgneyapuroḍāśaprakṛtibhūtānāṃ caturmuṣṭivrīhīṇāṃ tejomayadevatātvāt sauryamiti gauṇo'yamityapyanuvādaḥ । tasmāda- prakaraṇe anārabhya śrūyamāṇa ālambhanirvāpādiḥ saṃskāro guṇavi- dhānārthaḥ syādavidyamānaśabdayogatvāditi prathamaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
atrāparitoṣāddvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣo gṛhyate—

ayamatra pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yadi hi dārśapūrṇamāsikāla-
mbhanirvāpāvanūdya śvetacarurūpau guṇau vidhīyeyātāṃ, tato bhūtikāmo brahmavarcasakāma iti phalapadānuvādo'narthakaḥ syāt । na ca pakṣaprā- ptasya nityavadanuvādo'pi saṅgacchate । na caitatphalapadamālambhani- rvāpaviśeṣaṇam । bhūtikāmasya ya ālambho brahmavarcasakāmasya yo nirvāpastau ca śvetacarurūpau guṇau karttavyāviti vācyam । tathā ca sati viśiṣṭānuvādādvākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । tenālambhanirvāpāveva guṇaphalaviśiṣṭau vidhīyete । vāyusūryayostu devatātvenālambhanirvā- payorevānanvayaḥ । tenāyamarthaḥ—yāvat kiñcicchvetaṃ dravyaṃ tadvāyumu- ddiśyālabdhavyam । carudravyañca sūryamuddiśya nirvāpayitavyam । yattu yāga eva paraṃ devatā tenānvīyata iti tatra tatrocyate tadetadadhikaraṇa- siddhāntasiddhameveti na virodhaḥ । atoyāvaduktālambhanirvāpakarmacoda- naiveyaṃ śrutimūlatvāt śabdapramāṇakatvāditi । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pratīyāmāno dravyadevatānvayo yāgabhāvanāvidhiṃ vinopapadyeta । tathāhi—sarvatra vidherviśeṣaṇapara- tvādvidhirayaṃ vāyavyapadārthe devatāvati dravye saṅkrānto'vagamyate । na ca tyajyamānaṃ haviḥ pratyuddiśyamānāyā devatāyāḥ prāksiddhi-
rasti । tatra dravyaviśeṣaṇabhūtā devatā prāptyabhāvādaśakyānuvādā । sāpyavaśyaṃ vidheyā । na cobhayavidhānamantareṇa tat sambhavati । na cālambhanirvāpabhāvanāvidhau devatāvidhirupapadyate, yāgaikakriyānvayi- tvāddevatāyāḥ । tena dravyadevatāvācipadasaṅkrānto'yaṃ vidhiryāgabhāva- nāmantareṇāparyavasyan kalpitaśabdavāyavyayāgāvacchinnāmeva bhāvanāṃ dravyadevatāviśiṣṭāṃ vidhāya paryavasyatīti viśiṣṭayāgabhāvanāvidhire- vāyam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 600)

nanu kathaṃ tarhyaindravāyavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatāviśiṣṭagrahaṇa- vidhānam ? maivam; na hīdaṃ grahaṇamarthāntarabhūtam, kiṃ tarhi ? yāgāvayavabhūtamevaitat । na hi devatoddeśenāgṛhītaṃ devatoddeśena tyajyate । na cānyoddeśena tyāge yāgaḥ sampadyate । tena devatodde- śenaiva gṛhītasya haviṣastyāgo yāga iti na yāgāvayavabhūte grahaṇe devatoddeśo virudhyate । etañca yāgāpekṣāyāṃ “somena yajeta” ityeva- meva pratyakṣaśruto yāgo'stīti na yāgakalpanāvakāśa hati । etacca paśusomādhikaraṇa eva darśitam । na cātrālambhanirvāpau yāgaika- deśau । nāpi sānnidhiśruto'tra yāgaḥ samastīti vaiṣamyam ।
na ca “āgneyaṃ caturddhā karoti” itivadyāgadvāreṇaivānyataḥ siddhadeva- tānvayasyālambhamātraṃ nirvāpamātraṃ ca vidhīyata iti vācyam । yato dravyasaṃskāre vidhīyamāne devatābhāvasyānapekṣitatvādanyataḥ siddha- devatāsambandhasyāpi bhaveddravyopalakṣaṇatvam । iha tu karmāṅgabhūta- tvena devatāyā vidhīyamānatvānnopalakṣaṇatvam । kiṃ tarhi ? anu- ṣṭheyatvameva । na ca yāgaṃ vinā devatānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavatīti siddhaṃ yāgabhāvanāvidhānam । ālambhanirvāpau tu prakṛtiprāptau pratyayasā- dhutvārthamanūdyete iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe ālambhamātrānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte yāgānuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—ālambhavākye ca yajatiḥ yāgo vidhīyate । dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogāt dravyaphaladevatāsambandhāt yāgakarmaṇaiva teṣāṃ sambandhādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ vatsālambhādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: athātra bhagavānācārya idamudāhṛtya “vatsamālabheta vatsanikāntā hi paśavaḥ” iti imaṃ saṃśayamupanyasyati sma—kiṃ yajatimadabhidhāna evālabhatiḥ ? utālambhamātravacanaḥ ? iti । ālambhanirvāpavākyayo- rdravyadevatāsambandhabhedānumitayāgabhedaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ prasaṅgena devatā- sambandhapratyudāharaṇe pratipādayitavye prathamaṃ spaṣṭatvādālambhe pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—agnihotraṃ prakṛtya dohavi- dhimāmnāya “vatsamālabheta vatsanikāntā hi paśavaḥ” iti śrūyate । tena nātra prakṛtibhūtadaikṣapaśvālambhānuvādena vatsasparśavidhānamātraṃ śaṅkanīyam । ārabhyādhītatvena prakaraṇabādhābhiprāyaprakṛtigāmi- tvāsambhavāt । saṃskāryatvena śrūyamāṇasya viniyogabhaṅgaṃ vinā karmānuvāde vidhānāsambhavācca yāgavidhirevāyamiti haitukaḥ pratya- vatiṣṭhate । tathāhi—“vatsamālabheta” ityatrālabhatidhāturyāgāvabo- dhārthaḥ, vaidikaprāṇikarmālambhakriyāviṣayatvāt । evaṃvidhaḥ sa
yāgāvabodhārtho yathā vāyavyavākyasthālabhatidhāturiti । atra vaidikagrahaṇaṃ ‘kāntāmālabheta’ iti vyavacchettum । prāṇikarmakriyā- viṣayatvagrahaṇam “īṣāmālabheta” iti vyavacchettum । na cāya- masiddhaḥ, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaviśiṣṭānāṃ pakṣadharmatāyāḥ pramāṇasi- ddhatvāt । nāpi viruddhaḥ, sādhyaviparītavyāptyabhāvāt । nāpi sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ, vipakṣavṛttyabhāvāt । nāpyasādhāraṇaḥ, sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasambhavāt । yāgāntaravidhirveti dvedhā pūrvapakṣasambhavaḥ । tatra pūrvasmin kalpe prakaraṇādhītamantraprāptacchāgabādhaprasaṅgāt vikalpasya cāṣṭadoṣaduṣṭasyānyāyyatvāt mantrasya cānyārthatva- prasaṅgāt yāgāntaravidhirevāyaṃ tasya ca devatāprāptiratideśāt । prakaraṇādagnihotrāṅgatvena pṛthakphalakalpanā । tasmāt pūrvādhikara- ṇavat kalpitayajipadena yāgavidhānameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi pūrvādhikaraṇavadālabhatau yajiḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate । tatra hi vidheyārthadevatāpadānurodhena yajiḥ kalpitaḥ na cātra tathābhūtaṃ devatāpadamasti । kiñca yāgavidhipakṣe vatsasya yāgasādhanatvādviniyogabhaṅgena vatsena yāgaṃ kuryāditi vākyārtho varṇanīyaḥ । tathā ca satyagnihotrahomīyadohopayogitayā prayojanavato vatsasya dvitīyāśrutyavagataṃ saṃskāryatvaṃ bādhyeta, īdṛśañcā-
pekṣitaṃ dhenuprasnavanaṃ hīyate । ato'numānamapyetadāgamavādhitaviṣayaṃ nātmānameva labdhumalam । ālambhabhāvanaṃ ca nālabhatau yāgānumā- pakam, devatāsambandhasyaiva yajatyavyabhicārāt । tasminnavyabhi- caritasambandhe sati hiṃsātvavadaprayojakaścāyaṃ heturiti ।

kiñca “vatsanikāntā hi paśavaḥ” iti vākyaśeṣaśca śrūyate । ayañca hetuvannigadārthavādo vatsaprītyarthaḥ sparśanaṃ vidhātumupapadyeta । māraṇārthālambhapakṣe tu vatsapriyatvaṃ paśūnāmucyamānamasambaddhameva syāditi । tena yāvaduktālambhavidhireveti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe vatsasādhanakayāgānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu vatsasaṃskārālambhamātrānuṣṭhānam ।

sūtrantu—pūrvādhikaraṇoktayāgānumānahetorddevatāsambandhasyābhā- vena ‘yāvaduktaṃ vā karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāt’ ityanenaiva pūrvapakṣasūtreṇa siddhāntasiddheḥ liṅgadarśanamātraparaṃ “vatsamālabheta” iti kiṃ yāgavidhiḥ ? uta vatsasaṃskārālambhavidhiḥ ? iti saṃśaye prāyadarśa- nātsaṃskāratvaniścayaḥ, prāyadarśanañcātra bahupradeśāmnānam । yathāgryaprāye likhito'grya iti ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ carūpadhānādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: astyagniḥ । tatra “naivāraścarurbhavati” ityustvā “ya enaṃ caru- mupadadhāti” iti śrūyate । tatra sandihyate—kiṃ caruryāgārtho yāgaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭamupadhātavyam ? athopadhārnā eva ? iti । pūrvamālambha- pratyudāharaṇaṃ pratipādya prasaṅgādidānīṃ nirvāpapratyudāharaṇaṃ vaktavyam । yadyapyatra nirvāpo na śrūyate, tathāpi caturmuṣṭinirvāpasya carāvāva- śyakatvāt adhikadevatāsambandhatāyāścarugocaratvāt yadi caruryā- gārthastadā taddvāreṇa nirvāpo'pi yāgārtha iti carudvāreṇa nirvāpa- pratyudāharaṇaṃ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: rpū/?/pakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yadyapyagnyādhānārtheṣṭakāsyaṇḍi- lavantaṃ kratuṃ prakṛtya śrūyate “naivāraścarurbhavati bṛhaspatervā etadannaṃ yannīvārā ya etaṃ carumupadadhāti” iti, tathāpi “naivāraścarurbhavati” ityatra caroḥ svayaṃ bhavanāsambhavānnaivāraṃ caruṃ bhāvayediti vākyārtho vyañjanīyaḥ । tatra ca kimarthamiti prayojanāpekṣāyāṃ nopādhānārthatvam,
“carumupadadhāti” iti dvitīyāśrutyopādhānasyaiva carvarthatvāvagamāt । nāpīṣṭakāsthalaniṣpatyarthatvam, adṛṣṭārthatvāpatteḥ । nāpi sannidhānāt prakṛtayāgārthatvam, tasya dravyāntarāvaruddhatvenāsyānavakāśāt । tena “bṛhaspatervā etadannaṃ yannīvārāḥ” ityarthavāde nīvāradvāreṇa caru- sambandhitāmātre śrute'pi bṛhaspatiḥ sambandhāntarābhāvāddevatātvena sambadhyate । na ca taddhitacaturthīmantravarṇaireva devatā pratipādyata iti niyamo'sti । tadabhāve'pyapekṣāvaśāt phalamiva rātrisatre deva- tāpyatrārthavādādbhaviṣyati । kiñca śākhāntarārthavāde carusamānā- dhikaraṇe taddhitaśrutirevāsti—“bārhaspatyo bhavati” iti । tenāyamarthaḥ—bārhaspatyaṃ naivāraṃ caruṃ bhāvayediti । na cāyamartho yāgaṃ vinopapadyata iti kalpitayajipadopanīto yāga eva dravyadevatā- viśiṣṭo vidhīyate । tathā sati yāgāvaśiṣṭacarupratipattikarmaiva carūpadhānam । evaṃ sati viniyogabhaṅgo'pi na bhaviṣyatīti carudvāreṇa nirvāpo'tra yāgārtha eveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi carau bṛhaspatirdevatātvena samba- dhyeta । tathāhi—“bṛhaspatervā etadannaṃ yannīvārāḥ” ityarthavādā- nnīvārāṇāṃ bṛhaspatisambandho'vagamyate, na caroḥ । nāpi vidhyuddeśe bṛhaspatiḥ śrūyate । na ca devatāpratipādakataddhitacaturthī-
mantravarṇānāmanyatamaḥ śabdo'tra vidyate । tredhāpyasannocito'yaṃ devatānvayaścaroḥ vinaiva kāraṇaṃ kalpanīyaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 605)

na ca naivāraṃ caruṃ bhāvayet kimarthamityapekṣāyāmitarā- sambhavena yāgārthatve yāgasiṃdhyarthameva devatākāṅkṣāsadbhāvādyathākatha- ñcidarthavādapratītasyāpi devatātvenānvaya iti vācyam । artha- karmatve'pyupadhānasya carumiti dvitīyopapatteḥ । upadhānaṃ khalvatreṣṭa- kāsandhipūraṇāya carunidhānam । tacceṣṭakāsaṃyogādādyaprayojanava- taścaroḥ sthaladeśaprāptirūpasaṃskāreṇaiva sthaṇḍilanirmāṇārthamiti na dvitīyānupapattiḥ । na caivaṃ satyupadhānasya carusaṃskāratvameveti nārthakarmatvam । sthalanirmāṇārthopadhānārthatvavyatirekeṇa prayojanānta- rānavagamāt । tena yathārthajñānārthasyaivādhyayanasyārthākṣiptaścarusaṃskā- ro'nūdyate । evaṃ ca sati “bārhaspatyo vā bhavati” iti śākhāntarī- yārthavādagatataddhitaśrutirapi vidhyuddeśāvagatopadhānārthatvena carorde- vatāvidhānācca (?) kintu “bṛhaspatervā etadannaṃ yannīvārā” iti śākhāntarīyārthavādasya nīvāradvāreṇa carustutyarthatvādasyāpi nīvāradvāreṇa carustutyarthatvameveti । tena yāvaduktaṃ caruvidhirevāyamiti na carudvāreṇa nīrvāpasya yāgīyatvam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe carudravyakabṛhaspatidevatākayāgānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tūpadhānārthaṃ carureva karttavya iti ।
sūtrantu—saṃyuktaścarurarthaśabdena upadadhātīti prayojanaśabdena tadarthaḥ upadhānārthaḥ, evaṃ śrutisaṃyogadityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ pātnīvatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: tvāṣṭraṃ pātnīvataṃ vidhāyāha—“paryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatamutsṛjati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ tvāṣṭrasya paryagnikṛtasyaiṣa utsargo vidhī- yate ? uta tasmādyāgāntaram ? iti । ālambhanirvāpayoḥ pratyu- dāharaṇatvena yajimadabhidhānaṃ nirākṛtyedānīṃ prakṛtodāharaṇe'pi yajimadabhidhānaṃ nirākriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
/?/ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yadyapi “tvāṣṭraṃ pā/?/- /?/” /?/ /?/gaṃ vidhāya taṃ prakṛtya śrūyate-paryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatamu/?/- jati” iti, tathāpi pūrvatra guṇavidhānāsambhavāt karmāntaravidhirevāyam ।
tathāhi—na tāvat pūrvasmin yāge vikalpena pātnīvataśabdopanītā ekā devatā vidhīyate, utpattiśiṣṭadevatāvarodhāt । nāpi paryagni- karaṇam, atideśaprāptatvāt । nāpyutsargaḥ, utpattivākyenopalabdha- tvāt । tena vāyavyavākyavat patnīvacchabdābhidheyadravyadevatānva- yārthasaṅkrānto'yaṃ vidhiḥ kalpitayajiśabdapratipādyaṃ yāgāntarameva dravyadevatāviśiṣṭaṃ devatāguṇasāmānyena pūrvayāgaprakṛtikam, agniṣo- mīyaprakṛtikameva vā vidadhātīti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi prakṛtaguṇavidhirna sambhavet । tatra yadyapyanye guṇā na vidhīyante, tathāpi paryagnikaraṇāntānyaṅgā- nyevātra vidhāsyante । tathāhi—kathambhāvākāṅkṣī tvāṣṭraprayogavacanaḥ prakṛtau klṛptopakārakāṇyaṅgānyapekṣamāṇaḥ paryagnikṛtaśabdopanītānyeva tadantānyaṅgānyaupadeśikāni gṛhītvā caritārtho nātideśalabhyānya- ṅgāntarāṇyapekṣate । nanu “iḍāntātithyā santiṣṭhate” ityādivacca nātra paryagnikaraṇāntāṅgapratipādakaśabdo'sti । ataḥ kathaṃ tadantāṅgavidhānam ? ucyate—paryagnikṛtaśabdo hi nirvṛttayathā- prasiddhaparyagnikaraṇaviśiṣṭaṃ dravyamupādatte । tacca paryagnikaraṇaṃ pūrvāṅgeṣu kṛteṣveva prakṛtau nirvṛttaṃ, tena paryagniśabdo'tra prakṛtacodanāprati- pāditamevāṅgakalāpamupanayati । sa evātrotsṛjatyākhyātavartinā
vidhinotsargānuvādena vidhīyate, naivotsargaḥ । vidhipratyayasannidhi- viśeṣeṇa bhāṣyakāreṇoktam—utsargo vidhīyata iti ।

na ca vācyam—atideśato'pi prāpsyataḥ kiṃ vidhineti । uttarāṅgavyavacchedaphalatvena vidhisāphalyāt । na caivaṃ sati parisaṃ- khyā, atideśaprāpteḥ prāgeva vidhiprāpteḥ । nāpi vācyam—yadutsṛjanti tatparyagnikṛtamityetāvataiva vākyasamāptau punaḥ pātnīvatamiti viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭānuvādāt vākyabhedaḥ syāditi । yato noddeśyaviśeṣaṇaṃ pā- tnīvataśabdārthaḥ vināpi viśeṣaṇaṃ prakaraṇādeva paryagnikaraṇavidheḥ tvāṣṭrasambandhāt । kiñca nityānuvādo'yam । anuvādasya ca yadya- pyanyatprayojanaṃ nāsti, tathāpi bhinnataddhitāntapadābhidheyadevatayoḥ samuccaye ekenāpi taddhitāntena padena tadabhidhānaṃ śakyam, natve- kataddhitāntapadābhidheyayoḥ samuccitadevatayoragnīṣomayoranyatarapadeneti jñāpanārthaṃ prakṛtapratyabhijñādyotanameva prayojanam । ataḥ prakaraṇapratya- bhijñāte tvāṣṭrayāga eva paryagnikaraṇāntāṅgarītividhānamiti siddham । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 607)

nanvevaṃ sati gṛhamedhīyena sahāsya ko viśeṣaḥ ? ucyate—ya/?/tra
devatābhidhānaṃ nirākṛtya guṇavidhitvavyutpādanena sa eva nyāyaḥ sthirīkriyata iti nānupapannaṃ kiñcit ।
prayojanam-pūrvapakṣe kevalapatnīvaddevatākayāgāntarānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte neti ।
sūtrantu—pātnīvate patnīvatpadayuktavākye pūrvavatvādupadeśenaiva prākṛtadharmavatvasambhavāt paryagnikaraṇāntāṅgātiriktāṅgānāmavacchedaḥ phalaṃ vidherityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha navamamaṃśvadābhyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: na kasyacidapi prakaraṇe śrūyate “eṣa vai haviṣā haviryajate, yo'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajate । parā vā etasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti ryo'śuṃ gṛhṇāti” iti । atra sandehaḥ-kiṃ yāgāntarametadguṇakam ? uta jyotiṣṭome yāge guṇavidhiḥ ? iti pūrvaṃ “paryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatamu- tsṛjati” ityasya yajimadabhidhānaṃ nirākṛtyedānīṃ prasaṅgādaṃśvadābhya- vākyayorapi yajimadabhidhānaṃ nirākriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—stutyā tāvadatra vidhiḥ
kalpanīyaḥ । aṃśvadābhyavākye tāvat pradhānatvādyāga eva kalpayitumu- citaḥ । anārabhyādhītatvena tadanuvādena grāhyaviśeṣarahitagrahaṇalakṣaṇa- guṇavidhānāsambhavāt । somāyeti caturthyā somo devatā, dravyamapi “haviṣā haviryajate” ityanuvādāt । tadaiva haviṣā haviryajati yadi somadravyeṇa somameva devatāṃ yajate । adābhyamiti saṃjñā- pyadṛṣṭārthasya pradhānayāsyaivaṃguṇaphalopabandhanatvārthamucitā । na dṛṣṭārthasya grahaṇasya, saṃjñāṃ vināpi tatra vyavahārasambhavāt । soma- dravyakatvācca jyotiṣṭomavikāro'yam । tathā ca sati grahaṇamapi prakṛtiprāptamevānūdyate । tenādābhyavākye tāvatsomadravyakaṃ somadevatā- kañca karma vidhīyata iti siddhaṃ karmanāmadheyatvam । tatra ca grahaṇe saṃskāratvena nāmadheyasambandhāyogyatvāt pratyayārtho'tra saṃjñāvacchinno vidhīyate—aṃśuṃ kuryāditi । grahaṇaṃ tvanūdyate । anuvādasya ca prāptaviṣayatvād grahaṇaliṅgenaiva grahaṇatvamasyonnīyate na jyotiṣṭo- magatātidiṣṭadravyadevatāsambandhāt । yāgarūpaivāṃśusaṃjñikā kriyā vidhīyata iti yathākathañcidatra pūrvapakṣagamaniketi । tasmādaṃśvadābhya- vākyayorapi yajimadabhidhānamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
siddhāntaḥ

abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi grahaṇarūpasaṃskāramātraparyavasito'yaṃ
vidhirbhavet tathāhi—na tāvadatra vidhiḥ śrūyate, kintu kalpanayāsau । yadi viśiṣṭayāgaviṣayo'sau kalpyeta, tadānīmaṃśuviśeṣaṇavidhikalpa- nam, atideśakalpanaṃ, phalakalpanañceti kalpanāgauravamāpadyeta । grahaṇa- svarūpasaṃskāravidhikalpanāyāṃ tu na kalpanāgauravamiti tadvidhireva kalpyate, yāgaścānūdyate । sa ca somadravyaśruteḥ somayāgo nirṇī- yate । nanu somāyeti nāyaṃ dravyanirdeśaḥ । kiṃ tarhi ? devatānirdde- śo'yamityuktam । maivam; vidhau lakṣaṇāprasaṅgāt । kintvanuśāsa- navaśādiyaṃ tādarthye caturthī dravyanirddeśārthā । tenāyaṃ sambandhaḥ— somārthamadābhyasaṃjñakagrahaṇaṃ kuryāditi । sāmānādhikaraṇyāda- dābhyasya grahaṇanāmadheyatvameva । na ca saṃskāre nāmadheyānupayogaḥ । “traidhātavīyā dīkṣaṇīyā bhavati” ityādiṣu traidhātavīyānāmāvacchi- nnasyaiva saṃskārasya dīkṣaṇīyādikārye vidhānopayogadarśanāt । tenātra somasya devatātvābhāvāt “haviṣā haviryajate” ityarthavādādapi na somadravyadevatāsambandhaprāptiriti na yāgaśaṅkāsambhavaḥ । tasmāda- dābhye tāvanna yāgavidhānam । kintu (?) jyotiṣṭomānuvādenā- dābhyasaṃjñakagrahaṇāntaravidhānameveti । aṃśau yajiśabdābhāvāddravya- devatāsambandhābhāvācca vidhirunnīyamānoṃ'śugrahaṇaviṣaya evāvatiṣṭhate । jyotiṣṭomaśabdaśca (?) vaidikagṛhṇātisāmānyena jyotiṣṭomasyaivo- pasthitirniścīyate ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 609)

etattvabhyupagamavādenoktam । vastutastu śrīmattaittirīyaśākhāyāṃ jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa evānayorāmnānamiti sphuṭaṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva grahamavidhānam । tathā ca sati yathā “saptadaśa sāmidhenīranubrūyāt” ityanārabhyavādena sāmidhenīsaptadaśasyotpattirmitravindādhvarakalpāyāṃ prakaraṇādhītena viniyogaḥ, tathātrāpyanārabhyaśrutyotpādakatvamārabhya śrutasya ca viniyojakatvamiti vivektavyam । ato'trāpi guṇa- vidhāyakatvam, na tu yāgavidhāyakatvamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe jyotiṣṭomadharmakaṃ yāgāntaramanuṣṭheyam । siddhānte tu jyotiṣṭoma eva grahaṇāntarānuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—adravyatvāddevatāsambandhidravyābhāvātkevale grahaṇe śrute phalavato jyotiṣṭomasyaiva grahaṇaṃ śeṣo bhavediti ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ cayanādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: astyagniḥ “ya evaṃ vidvānagniṃ cinute” iti । evaṃ vidhā- ya śrūyate—“athāto'gnimagniṣṭomenānuyajanti tamukthena, tamatirā- treṇa, taṃ ṣoḍaśinā” ityevamādi । atra sandehaḥ—kimagniśabdo yāgavacano jyotiṣṭomādibhyaḥ karmāntaraṃ ‘cinute’ ityākhyātena vidhīyate ? uta dravyavacano jyotiṣṭomādiṣu guṇavidhāname- tat ? iti । pūrvamaṃśvadābhyayoryāgavidhinirāsena guṇavidhānaṃ pratipādyedānīm “agniṃ cinute” ityatrāpi prasaṅgena pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ-yadyapi “agniṃ cinute” ityatra yāgo na śrūyate, tathāpyuttaravākye'gniṣṭomokthyaṣoḍaśyatirātrasaṃsthā- vidhipare “athāto'gnimagniṣṭomenaivānuyajati” ityatrāgniśabdasya yajisāmānādhikaraṇyenānuvādadarśanāt “agniṃ cinute” ityatrāpya- gniśabdasya yāganāmatvamiti niścīyate । nāmadheyakaraṇañca tatprakhya- nyāyenaiva, “āhavanīye juhoti” iti śāstreṇāhavanīyaprāpteḥ । tenāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—agnisaṃjñakaṃ yāgaṃ kuryāditi । vacanāt
“iṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinute” ityatra prāptaṃ pratyayaprayogārthamanūdyate । avyaktacodanātvenāsya jyotiṣṭomavikāratvāddravyadevatālābhaḥ । phalañca “ṛdhnotyeva” ityarthavādāvagataṃ ṛddhirūpameva । “eṣa vāva prathamo yajño yajñānāṃ yajjyotiṣṭomaḥ” ityanena (prāptasya) jyo- tiṣṭomapaścādbhāvasyāgniṣṭomādivākyasthenānuśabdenānuvādaḥ । bhavatu vā vyadhikaraṇo'yamagniṣṭomaśabdaḥ, tathāpyagniśabdo'yaṃ yāgasādhanam । evaṃ hi tadā vākyārthaḥ—agniṣṭomenāgnimanuyajatīti । na cāgnerayāgatve'gniṣṭomādibhiranuyajanamupapadyate, tulyarūpāṇāmeva paurvā- paryayogopapatteḥ । yathā gacchati devadatte devadattamanugacchatīti । tadatra sāmānādhikaraṇyapakṣe agnināmadheyayāge'gniṣṭomādivākyairagni- ṣṭomasaṃsthādirūpaguṇavidhānam, eko yāgaḥ । vaiyadhikaraṇya- pakṣe tu “agniṣṭomenāgnimanuyajati” iti yajatisāmānādhikaraṇye- nāgniṣṭomādipadenāgniṣṭomādinānāsaṃsthādiguṇaphalavadupāttajyotiṣṭo- māderagninā sahānuśabdena paurvāparyavidhānāt phalavatsannidhinyāye- nāgnyākhyayāgasya tadaṅgatvameva । ṛdhnotīti phalaśrutirarthavāda eveti vivektavyam । athavā “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” iti vākyapravṛttivelāyāma- nirūpitārthatvāt “ya evaṃ vidvānagniṃ cinute” ityatraitadanuvādena guṇa- vidhānaṃ vā agniṣṭomādisatyajyerodhāt (?) । viniyogabhaṅgasya ca gatyantare satyasambhavāt sambhavamātreṇopanyastaḥ ।

nanu dravyavacano'pyagniśabdo (?) dvitīyāśrutestatsaṃskāracayana- vidhānameva yuktam । na; alaukikāgneranavagatopayogasya saṃskāra- vidhivaiyarthyāt । anārabhyādhītatvena ca prakaraṇābhāvāt । parṇatā- derjuhvādivatkratvavyabhicārābhāvāt । adābhyavacchākhāntare'pi praka- raṇe punaḥ saṃkīrttanānupalabdheśca na kratvanvayyagnisaṃskāratvam । na ca ṛddhirūpaphala eva guṇavidhānam, anārabhyaśrutatvena prakṛtāgnirū- pāśrayābhāvāt । anenaivobhayasambandhakaraṇe vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । tenoktanyāyenāgnisaṃjñāvacchinnayāgavidhirevāyam । evañca sati “agneḥ stotram, agneḥ śastram, ṣaḍupasado'gneścityasya bhavanti” iti yāgāvyabhicāriliṅgadarśanānyupapatsyanta iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate-
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi “agniṃ cinute” ityatra jvalanaṃ parityajyāyamagniśabdaḥ kathañcidapi yāganāmadheyaṃ bhavet । tathāhi- rūḍho hyayamagniśabdo jvalane । na cāsya matvarthalakṣaṇādoṣabhayena nāmadheyatvam, nirūḍhārthasyottaraparatve “somena yajeta” itivanma- tvarthalakṣaṇāyā adoṣatvāt । nāpi rūḍhatve'pi vākyabhedādīnā- manyatamannāmadheyakāraṇamasti । yattu tatprakhyamastītyuktam, tanna; vidhitsitaguṇaprāpiśāstrāntarasadbhāve hi tatprakhyanyāyo bhavati ।
na cātrāgnirvidheyatvena pratīyate । kiṃ tarhi ? kiṃ tarhi ? dvitīyāsaṃyogāccayana- saṃskāryatvena । na cottaravākye yajisāmānādhikaraṇyenāgnipadasya nāmadheyatvanirṇayaḥ, arthāntaraprasiddhasya yajisāmānādhikaraṇyā- sambhavāt । na ca vaiyadhikaraṇye'pyagnimanu yajatītyanuśabdasya sajātīyakriyāsāpekṣatvādagniśabdasya yāganāmadheyatvam । ‘śrāddha- manubhuṅkte’ iti vijātīyakriyāpekṣāyāmapyanuśabdadarśanāt । yatra tvanupāttaḥ kriyāviśeṣaḥ ‘devadattamanugacchati’ ityādau, tatra sajātīyakriyāyā eva buddhisannidhānāt tatkalpanamevocitam । iha tvagnisambandhacayanakriyāyā eva buddhisthībhūtatvānna sajātīya- kriyākalpaneti vaiṣamyam । ata evārthāntaraprasiddhasya yajisāmā- nādhikaraṇyāsambhavāt “athaiṣa jyotiḥ” itivat pūrvavākyepakrā- ntasyotpattisamāptirityetadapi nirastaṃ veditavyam । taduktam—

lg.l: jvalanaṃ na parityajya kraturagniḥ pratīyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 611)

tasmādagniśabdasya prasiddhārthagrāhitvāccinoteśca yāgābhidhānā- śakterdravyadevatābhāvāt dvitīyānurodhāccāgniṃ cayanena saṃskarotītye- tāvataiva codanārtho'vadhāryata iti । nanu cāyaṃ nāgnisaṃskāraḥ kratvarthāgnirnirṇīyate, tathāpyuttaravākye “agnimanuyajati” ityatra
karmapravacanīyadvitīyāyāḥ kriyāntarāpekṣatvāt sannidheśca yajana- kriyaiva sambadhyate । tenāyamarthaḥ—camanasaṃskṛtamagnimanu agniṣṭo- mādibhiryajanam । evañca sati cayanasya kratvarthatvāt “agniṃ cinute” ityatrāpi kratvarthatvādāhavanīyaviṣayatvameva cayanasya niścīyate । “agneḥ stotramagneḥ śāstram” ityādivākyeṣvagniśabdasya dravyapara- tvānupapatterlakṣaṇayā yāgaparatvameva । na cātra vākyadvaye'pyagni- śabdasya mukhyārthatve'pi kācidanupapattirastīti na yāgavidhānam, kintu prakṛtivikṛtyorevāgneścayanasaṃskāraguṇavidhānamiti । na ca vācyam—prakṛtāveva saṃskāro vidhīyatām । atideśatastu vikṛtau prāptirbhaviṣyatīti vyarthaṃ vikṛtau vidhānamiti । yato nirddiṣṭāśrayasya phalasādhanatvābhāvārthaṃ cayanasambandhino guṇāt phalakāmasyā- pravṛttiḥ, upadeśe tu pravṛttiriti yuktamubhayatra vidhānādarthavatvam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe'gnināmāvacchinnayāgāntarānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu prakṛtivikṛtyoścayanasaṃskāramātrānuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—vākyadvaye'pi dravyamevāgniśabdārtho bhavet । cayana- codanāyāstadarthatvādagnyarthatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ prakaraṇāntarādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: kauṇḍapāyināmayane śrūyate—“māsamagnihotraṃ juhoti । māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” ityevamādi । tatra sandihyeta—agnihotre niyatayośca darśapūrṇamāsayormāso vidhīyate kālaḥ ? atha niyatāda- gnihotrānniyatābhyāṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ karmāntaram ? iti । pañcasu bhedapramāṇeṣu paryavasiteṣvidānīmavasaraprāptaḥ prakaraṇāntaranibandhanaḥ karmabhedaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ—agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsanāmnoḥ prasiddhatvāt samabhivyāhṛtasya juhoteryajateśca tadarthatve secanavatprakara- ṇāntare śrutatvenārthāntaraviṣayatvam । lokaprasiddhārthānāmaṅgadādi- śabdanāmapi vede'rthāntaraprasaṅgāt । tena yatra lokaprasiddhārthasya pratyabhijñāyamānasya vede nārthāntaratvam, tatra veda eva prakaraṇāntara- mātreṇārthāntaramiti kuta etat ? taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 613)

ataḥ pūrvasminneva karmaṇi juhotiyajatibhyāmanūdite vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā māsākhyo guṇo vidhīyate । na ca yāvajjīvaśru- tivirodhānmāsarūpaḥ kālo vidhātuṃ na śakyata iti vācyam । kāmyaprayogaviṣayatvenāvirodhāt । athavā yāvajjīvādhikāre'pi samarthāsamarthaviṣatayāpi vyavasthitavikalpenaivopapatteḥ ।
chapter.head: prabhākaramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
atraike siddhāntamevamupavarṇayantī—“upasadbhiścaritvā māsa- magnihotraṃ juhṇati” iti vākyamidam । atropasaduttarakālatvaṃ karttṛba- hutvaṃ māsaścetyaneke guṇāḥ śrūyante । na caite guṇā naiyamikāgnihotre santi । na ca prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhānaṃ sambhavatītyanekaguṇavi- śiṣṭakarmāntaravidhānamevaitat । na caivaṃ sati guṇādeva bhedo na prakara- ṇāntarāditi vācyam । yato'prakṛtatvaṃ hi prakaraṇāntaratvam । apra- kṛtatvañca buddhivicchedalakṣaṇam । yadatra nāmno buddhisannidhāpakatvam, tatpratipakṣabhūtānekaśruternirastam । niraste ca tasmin pratipakṣabhūtaṃ prakaraṇāntarameva bhedakamiti । na ca “māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām” ityatrānekaguṇābhāvānnāyaṃ siddhāntastasyāpīti vācyam । yato nātra pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayormāsarūpakālānvayo homasya darśapūrṇamāsa- yorvā । pūrvatra sāyaṃ prātaḥ kālāvaruddhatvāduttaratra paurṇamāsyamāvā-
syākālāvaruddhatvācca kālāntarāpekṣābhāvāt । kiṃ tarhi ? upa- sadanvayaḥ । tena “māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām” ityatrāpyanuṣaṅgeṇopa- sadanvayitvādevamanvayaḥ—māsamupasadbhiścaritvāgnihotraṃ juhvati, māsa- mupasadbhiścaritvā darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta iti । tenodāharaṇa- dvaye'pi prakaraṇāntarameva bhedakamiti । na ca vācyam—evaṃ sati guṇādapi bhedasiddheḥ kiṃ prakaraṇāntareṇeti । yato nānadhigatagantṛ pramāṇam, kiṃtvanapekṣam । asti cānekaguṇaśrutyabhāve'pi ‘phalaṃ cākarmasannidhau’ ityatrāprakṛtatvamātreṇa karmabhedadarśanam । ataḥ pramā- ṇāntaraṃ siddhamiti ।

tadetadbālajalpitam; evaṃ sati guṇasyaiva bhedakatvāpatteḥ । tathā hi “āgneyo'ṣṭākapālo bhavati” ityādiṣu prāpte karmaṇyane- kaguṇavidhānasyaiva karmabhedakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam, na tu buddhivicchedakatvam । tadatra pratīyamānādṛṣṭasāmarthyaparityāgena dṛṣṭasāmarthyakalpanayā buddhi- vicchedamātropakṣīṇamanekaguṇavidhānaṃ vyavasthāpyamānamanātmavatāmeva manasi paraṃ śobhate । kiñca yatra prakaraṇasannihite'pi karmaṇyanekaguṇa- vidhānasya bhedakatvam, tatra jaghanyanāmadheyamātropanīte karmaṇi guṇasya buddhivicchedamātrahetutvaṃ na karmabhedakatvamiti hāsyāspada- meva । kiñca kathaṃ “māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” ityatrānuṣaṅgeṇo- pasatsambandhaḥ, ākāṃkṣāyā abhāvāt । na cotpattiśiṣṭapaurṇa-
māsyamāvāsyākālanirākāṃkṣe karmaṇi māsākhyakālāsambandhā- nmāsapadākāṃkṣayā sambandhaḥ, yatastithyantaraniyamastithyantarākāṃkṣā- nivarttako bhavati । nanu māsāditadvijātīyakālākāṃkṣānivarttakatvena “māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” ityanvayopapatteranuṣaṅgābhāvenānekagu- ṇavidhānābhāvānnodāharaṇatvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsavākyasyeti । na ca praveśāsambhavo'pi, kriyādvayayogāt, ktvāśrutyopasadviniyogāt, juho- tinā ca māsavidhānāditi । kiñca bhāṣyakāraśrutamapyekaguṇaphala- manādṛtya “māsamagnihotraṃ juhvati” ityetāvanmātramudāhṛtatvāt, tadapi nākalitaṃ bhāṣyaṃ nidrāluneti yatkiñcidetaditi yathā vārttikameva siddhānto'bhidhīyate ।
chapter.head: vārttikakāramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: sarvatra dvividhaḥ khalu karmaṇassambandhī guṇo bhavati—upādayo- 'nupādeyaśca । tatropādeyasya pūrvāvagatayathāsiddhayacchabdopabaddhoddeśya- karmatantratayā vidhiyogyatvāt dūrasthakarmānuvādenāpi yatra karma tatrāyaṃ karttavya ityeṣā vacanavyaktiḥ । anupādeyasya svatantrasya yathāsiddha- syetarasambandhārthaṃ yacchabdenopādānāduddeśyatvam । tenaiṣā vacana- vyaktiḥ—yatraiṣa tatra karma karttavyamiti । taduktam—

sa cāyamanupādeyaṃ prati karmavidhirdeśakālau prati prayojya- tvena tayoḥ prayogāvacchedakatvāt prayogavacchedakatvenaiva yathā saṃskārye vrīhyādāvavaghātādi viniyujyate । yathā vā svarge darśa- pūrṇamāsādi । tayościkīrṣitatvena karmaṇa eva tatra viniyukta- tvāt । nimittasya tu vidhimātrānvayino niyojyaviśeṣaṇatāmātraṃ, na tu karmaṇastatra viniyogaḥ, kārakatvenānāśrayaṇāt, kintu tasmin sati karttavyamityetāvanmātram । tena yatraiṣa tatra karmeti saptamyapi nādhikaraṇaparā, kintūpādeyānuṣṭhānasyānupādeyatantratā- paraiva, phalanimittayorvyabhicārāt । tadetayoḥ prayogaviniyogayoḥ karmotpatyapekṣāyāṃ yadi tathābhūtasyaivotpattiḥ prayogaviniyogasā- pekṣā tadaikavākyatā mahāprakaraṇe sannihitā samasti, tadā ta- devotpannaṃ karma prayujyate viniyujyate cetyakarmārantaratvam । yathā “same darśapūrṇamābhyāṃ yajeta, paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta” ityevamādau । yadā tu yathābhūtotpattiḥ sannihitā nāsti, tadā tasyaivotpattiparatvātkarmāntaratvam । na ceha kuṇḍapāyināmayane tādṛśahomayāgotpattiḥ sannihitā samasti iti karmāntaratvameveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 615)

na ca vācyam—atrāpyagnihotrādināmnaivotpatyupasthiterna karmāntaratvamiti । yato juhvatītyatrāsatvabhūtaḥ pūrvāparībhāvāpanno dhātvarthaḥ pratīyate । nāmapadāttu liṅgasaṃkhyāyogyaḥ siddharūpaḥ । ato nānenotpattipratyabhijñānam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 616)

na ca nāmasamabhivyāhṛtasyākhyātasya guṇabhūtanāmapāratantrya- bhāvaḥ, anupādeyakālānurodhena prakṛtānupasthāpakatvāditi । kiñca na hyekaprasarayornāmākhyātayorekenotpatyupasthāpanamapareṇa prayogaviniyo- gayoranyataravidhānamiti prayojanabhedaḥ sambhavati, kintvekārthatvameva । tatrāpi hyākhyātasya vākyārthībhūtabhāvanābhidhānena prādhānyānnāmnasta- tparatantratvameva । tadatra vidhyākhyātasamabhivyāhṛtasya nāmno yathā- vidhyevārthastāvadavaśyaṃ varṇanīyaḥ । vidheśca prayogaparatvānnāmno'pi prayogārthatvama । na ca tasyaiva sakṛduccaritasyotpatyarthatvamapīti utpa- ttividhikalpanayā karmāntaram । “paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta” ityādau punarutpatteḥ prakaraṇapratyabhijñānānnāmapadasya prayogaikyapara- tvenobhayaparatvābhāvānnāyaṃ doṣa iti ।

yatra tu prakaraṇāntare'pi “atirātraścaturviśaḥ, prāyaṇīyamahaḥ
catvāro'bhaplavāḥ, ṣaḍahāḥ pūrṇa” ityādyabhidhāya “ṛddhikāmāḥ satramāsīran” iti śrūyate, tatrātirātrādiśabdānāṃ pūrvakarmopa- sthāpakatvam । atra sarvatra sarvasya viniyojakākhyātaikavākyatāpanna- sya pūrvopasthitakarmaṇo viniyojakatvamiti upasthāpakaviniyo- jakaśabdabhedāt karmāntaratvam । yadi tu tatrāpyanubandhabhūtayajati- dhātvarthaḥ śrūyate, tadā asatvabhūtatvāttasyātirātrādināmabhiḥ pratyabhijñānābhāvāttatrāpi syādeva karmāntaratvam । tatrāsīran upeyu- rityatrānutiṣṭheyurityavagamyamānakarmāntaram, tathāpi tu bhāvanopasthāpa- katvābhāvāt prakaraṇāntaranyāyena bhāvanā bhinnaiva । sā ca nāmopa- sthāpitapūrvakarmaṇaiva viśeṣitā phalasambandhinīti nirmīyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 617)

“sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭomaḥ” ityatrānāra- bhyādhītatve'pi anupādeyaṃ pratyupādāne'pi na karmāntaratvam । evaṃ hi śrūyate—“ekasmai vānyā iṣṭayaḥ kāmāyāhriyante sarvebhyo darśa- pūrṇamāsau, ekasmai vānye yajñakratavaḥ kāmāyāhriyante sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭomaḥ” iti । atra cānyaśabdārthasyaiva pūrvāvagatapratiyo-
gyantaranirūpaṇīyatvādbhāviviniyogasandarśanena darśapūrṇamāsajyoti- ṣṭomāpekṣa evāyamanyapadārtha iti niścīyate । na ca viniyoga- vākyagatadarśapūrṇamāsāpekṣa evāyamanyaśabdaḥ, samānarūpasyaivānya- śabdārthapratiyogitvāt । na hyanyo brāhmaṇa ityukte pratiyogī śūdraḥ prakāśate । kiṃ tarhi ? brāhmaṇa eva । tadvadatrāpyanyā iṣṭayo'nye yajñakratava iti pūrvāvagatopādānāt, pūrvāvagatapratiyoginirūpaṇīya evāyamanyapadārthaḥ । tenānyaśabdabalenaiva darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomo- tpatterupasthitatvāt “sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau” “sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭomaḥ” ityetayostattatkratuphalaviniyogaparatve'pyutpatyantarākṣepaparatvābhāvānna karmāntaratvamiti । “ya iṣṭyā paśunā somenāgrayaṇena vā yajeta so'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā” ityatrāpi yacchabdopabaddhayajinaiva pūrvotpatyupasthāpanādevākarmāntaratvam । “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā some- na yajeta” ityatra tu svayameva vārttikakārapādaiḥ jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe śrūyate ityabhidhānāt prakaraṇāntareṇa bhedo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ । (?) evaṃ- kṛte nākhyātakīnapūrvakarmāvagatiḥ kṛtāpi nāmadheyaṃ bādhitumutsahate । tasmādanupādeyaṃ pratyupādanabuddhivicchedābhyāṃ viśiṣṭakarmotpatte- rbhedasiddhiḥ । agnihotrādināmadheyaṃ tu nāmnā taddharmātideśā/?/ bhāviguṇayoganirīkṣaṇena gauṇamevādhyayanavidhinā svīkṛtamiti na kiñcidanupapannamiti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe prakṛtibhūtasyaivāgnihotrasya prakṛtayośca darśapūrṇamāsayormāsamanuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu śabdaprayoge māsavi- śiṣṭāgnihotrādikarmāntarānuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—prakaraṇāntare prakaraṇāntaranimittakaṃ prayojanānyatvaṃ karmānyatvamityartaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ phalasaṃskāryādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
anārabhya kiñcicchruyate—“āgneyamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedrukkāmaḥ, agnīṣomīyamekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ, aindrāgnamekādaśa- kapālaṃ nirvapet prajākāmaḥ” iti । tatra sandihyate-kiṃ prakṛteṣvāgne- yādiṣu phalaṃ vidhīyate ? uta prakṛtebhyaḥ karmāntaram ? iti । idānīṃ yo nāma pūrvodāharaṇe prakaraṇāntarakṛtañca karmabhedaṃ manyate, (?) na buddhivicchedānupādeyaṃ pratyupādanayoreva bhedakatvapratipādanārthamida- mārabhyate । tatra pañcasvanupādeyeṣu kāladeśayoranupādeyatvaṃ svabhāvādeva susaṃjñānam । nimittasyāpi nimittatvādeva yasmin deyaniṣpanne
karmaṇyasya kāryatā tannimittam । na ca tadupādeyaṃ sambhavati । tenaiteṣāṃ tulyatvāt pūrvādhikaraṇaviṣayatvameva । tatra kālasyodāharaṇamuktameva । deśasyāpi “dakṣiṇena tīreṇa svarasvatyā āgneyenāṣṭākapālena” “śamyāparāmīyat” ityādi । atra ca yadyapyatirātrādivadyajiśra- vaṇaṃ nāsti, tathāpi dravyadevatāsambandhasya yajyanumānavyatirekeṇā- paryavasānādagnihotrāditulyatvameveti karmāntaratvameva । nimittasyāpi “satrāyāvagūrya viśvajitā yajeta” “sāmyutthāne viśvajit” ityādyapi pūrvādhikaraṇa eva draṣṭavyam । iha tu phalasaṃskāryayoreva vacanīyamastī- ti vicāraviṣayatvam । tatra phalodāharaṇamuktameva । tattulyanyāya- tayā saṃskāryasyāpyanuktamapi draṣṭavyam । “traidhātavīyā dīkṣaṇīyā bhavati” ityādi ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—phalasya tāvat suvyāpāra- niṣpādyatvānnānupādeyatvam । saṃskāryasyāpi yajamānādeḥ kriyāsi- ddhyarthamupādeyatvameva । tenaitayoranupādānābhāvānna karmabhedaḥ । nanu upādeyatve'pyetayoḥ prāptatvenāvidheyatvāt karmaivātra vidhātavyam । tacca na saṃvihitamiti agnihotrāditulyameveti । maivam; agnihotre khalu juhotītyākhyātena nāmāsambaddhaḥ prayogo vidhīyate । nāma- dheyañca tatparatantratvānna pūrvakarmotpatyupasthāpakamiti karmāntaratvam ।
iha tu pūrvāvagatasya karmaṇo dravyadevatāsambandhenaivopasthāpitatvāt tadeva karmaphalasya kāmyamānatvena upādeyasya ca prāptatvenāvidheyatve'pi tasmin vidhīyamānaṃ karma na bhidyata iti vaiṣamyam । evaṃ “traidhātavīyā dīkṣaṇīyā bhavati” ityatrāpi “māsaṃ darśapūrṇamā- sābhyāṃ yajeta” itivadyajyaśravaṇāt traidhātavīyānāmnastatparatantratvā- bhāvāt pūrvasiddhasya sthānasthitatraidhātavīyopasthāpakatvameva । tathāca prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyena pūrvasiddhaiva tredhātavīyā saṃskāryabhūtā yajamānasaṃskāratvenaiva dīkṣaṇīyā....vidhīyate । tena prakaraṇāntara- nyāyasyāpyanupādeyaṃ pratyupādānabuddhivicchedarūpasyābhāvādatrāpya- karmāntaratvameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi deśakālayoriva phalasaṃskārya- yorapi svabhāvasiddhamanupādeyatvaṃ brūmaḥ । kiṃ tarhi ? samabhivyāhṛta- kriyāpekṣam । tathāhi—anyārthamanutpādyatvaṃ hyanupādeyatvam । taddeśakālanimittānāmeva paraṃ svabhāvasiddham । phalasaṃskāryayostu na samabhivyāhṛtakriyārthamutpādyatvam । kiṃ tarhi ? kriyāyā eva tadarthamutpādanamiti tadapekṣamanupādeyatvameva । nāpi pūrvāvagatasya karmaṇo dravyadevatāsambandhenāpasthāpanam । yato hyanumānadvāreṇa dravyadevatāsambandhasya yāgapratipādakatvam । na caikasyaiva
yajipadasya pūrvotpatyupasthāne phalaṃ prati viniyoge caikadā karaṇatvaṃ sambhavatīti phalasamabhivyāhṛtasya karmaṇaḥ śrutasyevānumitasyāpyagni- hotrādivadanupādeyaṃ pratyupādāna......śabdābhyāṃ karmāntaratvameveti । nanu “traidhātavīyā dīkṣaṇīyā bhavati” ityatra na yajiḥ śrūyate । nāpi dravyadevatāsambandhenānumīyate, tadabhāvāt traidhātavīyāpadasyākhyā- taparatantratvābhāvādatirātrādivākyavat pūrvakarmopasthāpakatvamavyāhata- meveti kathaṃ karmāntaratvam । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi sakṛduccari- tatraidhātavīyāpadaṃ pūrvakarmopasthāpanaṃ kāryāntare ca viniyogaṃ kartu- mutsahate । tadatra kāryāntaraviniyogasyāvaśyakatvādanapekṣitapūrva- karmopasthāpanaṃ karmāntarameva viniyuktam । atirātrādivākyeṣu vini- yojakopasthāpakaśabdabhedopapattiriti prāgevaitaduktam । etacca “sāmyutthāne viśvajit” ityatrāpi samānamiti siddhamatrāpi praka- raṇāntarādeva karmabheda iti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe darśapūrṇamāsaprayuktenāpavargasambandhadvayameva phalāntaramiti na pṛthaganuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu darśapūrṇamāsa- prayogādbahirevāgneyadharmānuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—akarmasannidhau śrūyamāṇaṃ phalaṃ karmabhedaṃ karotītyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ prakaraṇāntarapratyudāhāraṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: astyaveṣṭiḥ—“āgneyo'ṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati” ityeva- mādiḥ । tāṃ prakṛtyocyate “annādyakāmaṃ yājayet” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ karmāntaramaveṣṭeḥ ? utāveṣṭireva ? iti । pūrvamasannidhe- ranupādeyaṃ pratyupādānārthaṃ karmabhedaḥ । idānīṃ sarveṣāmevāsannidhānasya pratyudāharaṇaṃ sañjātaśaṅkānirāsena vyutpādayitumidamārabhyate । tatra phalapadamupalakṣaṇārthaṃ, sarvāṇyuddeśādīnyanupādeyānyatrodāha- rttavyāni । tadyathā “sarvāṇyuddeśādīnyanupādeyānyatrodāha- paurṇamāsyā yajeta, yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta, darśapūrṇa- māsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta, śeṣātsviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajati” iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
