chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—anupādeyānāṃ deśādīnāmudde- śyatvaṃ tāvadvyavasthitam । tadyadi karmāṇyanūdyante, tadā tānya- pyuddeṣṭavyāni । na coddeśyānāmuddeśyaiḥ sambandhaḥ sambhavati । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 619)

tenāpūrvameva karmātra deśādisambandhena prayājyatvena phalādi- sambandhena viniyojyatvena vidheyam । na cāpūrvasya karmaṇaḥ prayogo viniyogo vā pūrvakarmotpattimantareṇa bhavatīti prakaraṇa- sannihitāyāḥ pūrvakarmotpatterasatkalpatvātkarmāntarameveti । evaṃ prāpte-
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyapūrvakarmātra vidhīyeta । na ca vihitavidhānāsambhavādapūrvavidhiḥ, vyāpārabhedāt svarūpajñānaparo'pyu- tpattividhirdeśakālanimittasambandhena ca prayogaparaḥ, phalasaṃskārya- sambandhena viniyogaparaḥ । atastasyaiva karmaṇastadbhedena vidhitā- tparyabhedopapatterna vihitavidhānāsbhavāt karmāntaratvam । tathāca sati naikasyaiva vidherubhayaparatvam । agatyā hyetat svīkriyate । atra ca prakaraṇamevotpatyupasthāpakaṃ gatyantaramastīti na tatkarmabhedaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 619)

utpattivināyogayorityutpattiprayogayorityapi draṣṭavyam । tena nimitte'pi karmaprayogavidhānasya cotpattividhyākṣepakatvam । ataḥ prakaraṇasannihitāyāmutpattau phalasaṃskāryau prati viniyogaparatvena
vidhyākhyātasya svarūpaphalatvābhāvāddeśakālanimitte ca prayogaparatvena svarūpaparatvābhāvānna karmāntaratvam । deśakālayostvaṅgenāprāptatvāt prakaraṇotpannakarmānuvādenāpi vidhānopapatteḥ sutarāmakarmāntaratvam । na coddeśyatvāddeśakālayoranūdyatvameva na vidheyatvam, upādeyatvāt karmaṇo vidheyatvameva nānūdyatvam । vidhyanuvādayoraprāptitantratveno- pādeyoddeśyatvamutpatyantarāpekṣāt karmāntaratvameveti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe avyaktacodanātvāt soma eva haviḥ । siddhānte tu puroḍāśa eva haviriti ।
sūtrantu—sannidhau karmotpattissambhavati avibhāgādbuddhivi- parivṛtteḥ phalādyarthenaiva punaḥ śrutirnotpatyarthatvenetyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśamāgneyastutyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ “āgneyo'ṣṭākapālo'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamā- syāṃ cācyuto bhavati” iti vidhāya punarucyate—“āgneyo'ṣṭākapā- lo'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimamāvāsyāyāṃ dvirāgne-
yena yaṣṭavyam ? uta sakṛt ? iti । pūrvādhikaraṇenaiva prakaraṇāntarā- dhikāre paryavasite satīdānīmupādeyopabandhavākyacintāprasaṅgādidaṃ cintyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—anupādeyakālasambaddhasyāgneyasya punaḥ śrutasya ‘sannidhau tvavibhāgāt’ ityanena nyāyenāpavādānmā bhūt prakaraṇāntaranimittako hyāgneyādbhedaḥ, abhyāsanimittakastu bhaviṣyati । tathāhi—na tāvadāgneyayāge kiñcidanena vidhīyate, dravyadevatākālānāṃ pūrvatraiva prāptatvāt । na cāsyārthavādatvam । āgneyavidhāyakavākyasya dūrasthatvena tadekavākyatvābhāvāt । nāpi sannidhānādaindrāgnastutiriyam । āgneyamātrakīrttanenaindrāgnastutya- navagateḥ । vidhitve ca sati vihitavidhānāsambhavādabhyāsādeva3 karmabheda iti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 621)
tenābhyāsoktahetutvādāgneyābhidhānaṃ karmadvayameti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyaindragnastutyartho'yamāgneyārthavādo na bhavet । tathāhi—na tāvadatra vidhiḥ śrūyate । na ca kalpayitumapi śakyate, aindrāgnavidhyekavākyatayā tadarthavādatvenaivopapatteḥ । na cātraindrāgnastutiḥ na pratīyata iti vācyam । kevalāgneyakīrttanāde- vaindrāgnastutiḥ pratīyate । ayaṃ khalvasyārthaḥ—kevalāgnidevatastā- vadāgneyaḥ praśasto jñāta eva । tasmādapīndrayuktāgnidevataḥ sutarāṃ praśasta iti । taduktam—

lg.l: karttuṃ sahendreṇa punaḥ praśaṃsāṃ punaḥ śrutiḥ samyagihāśriyateyam ।।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) iti । (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 623.)
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe āgneyayāgayorbhinnatvātpuroḍāśadvayopā- dānam । siddhānte tvekatvādāgneyasyaikapuroḍāśopādānamiti । sūtrantu—āgneyasya punaḥ śrutiranyārthā āgneyastutyarthetyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.trailer: iti bālavalabhībhujaṅgāparanāmno bhaṭṭaśrībhavadevasya kṛtau tautātitamatatilake dvitīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyapādaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ yāvajjīvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe śrūyate—“yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti” “yāva- jjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ karmadharmābhyāso yāvajjīvakatā ? uta kṛrtṛdharmaniyamo vā yāvajjī- viketi । asyāyamarthaḥ—“agnihotraṃ juhoti” ityutpannasya “agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ” iti phale viniyogaḥ śrūyate । punarapi “yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti” iti śrūyate । tatra kiṃ kāmya eva prayoge yāvadupabaddhajīvanāvacchinnaḥ kālo'ṅgatayā vidhīyate ? tataśca “sāyaṃ juhoti” “prātarjuhoti” ityanena viśeṣita eka eva kāmyaḥ prayogo yāvajjīvamabhyasitavyaḥ । atha yāvajjīvaṃ taduddeśenānya eva prayogo naimittako vidhīyate । tataśca “sāyaṃ juhoti” “prātarjuhoti” ityekavākyatāvaśāt sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāpanīya upā- ttaduritakṣayaphalaḥ, akriyānimittapratyavāyaparihāraprayojano vā yathānimittamanuṣṭheya iti । pūrvatra śabdāntarādisahāyotpattividhi-
pramāṇake karmabhede paryavasite satīdānīṃ śabdāntarādisahāyaprayoga- vidhipramāṇakaḥ prayogabhedo nirūpyate । na ca prayogavidhivyāpārasya caturthādhyāyaviṣayatvādihānirūpaṇīyamiti vācyam । yato'nuṣṭhānaga- tāṅgaparimāṇādiviṣayaḥ prayuktilakṣaṇo vyāpārastatra nirūpaṇīyaḥ, prayogabhedaviṣayastu dvitīyādhyāyaviṣaya eveti na virodhaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—jīvanāvacchinne hi kāle vidhīyamāne prakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kathaṃbhāvākāṅkṣālakṣaṇaṃ prakaraṇa- manugṛhyate, kālasyāṅgatvena grahaṇāt । dṛṣṭañca lakṣaṇayāpi yāvacchabdopabaddhasya kālaparatvam-‘yāvaddohaṃ svapiti’ ityādiṣu । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 624)

evaṃ sati kalpanālāghavaṃ bhavati । itarathā prayogāntarama- pūrvāntarañca kalpyeta । na ca yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaikaprayogatve sati “darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta” iti virodhaḥ । asya sābhiprāyeṇaiva iṣṭveti.......। na cānyatantramadhye kathamanya- syānuṣṭhānamiti । vacanabalādevānyaprayogamadhyānuṣṭhānāvirodhāt ।
na ca yāvajjīvapadasya kālalakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ । siddhānte'pi nimi- ttatvalakṣaṇāyā aviśiṣṭatvāt । na ca ṇamulā nimittatvamabhidhīyate, “abhikrāmaṃ juhoti” ityatra vyabhicārāt । nāpi juhoterabhyāsa- lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ, jīvanāvacchinnakālavidhisāmarthyādevābhyāsākṣepa- siddherlakṣaṇāvaiyarthyāt । na ca kāmyatvena sarvāṅgopasaṃhārāsamarthasyā- dhikarādyāvajjīvañca sarvāṅgopasaṃhārābhāvādaśakyārthopadeśa iti vācyam । aṅgopadeśavaśenodbhūtaśakterevādhikārasvīkārāt । tena yāvajjīvaṃ sāyaṃ prātarudbhūtaśaktiragnihotrādiśāstrārthaḥ । tasmādyā- vajjīvaṃ kāmya eka eva sābhyāso'yamagnihotraprayogo darśapūrṇamāsa- prayogaśca, na tu prayogāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi kālavidhau yāvajjīvajuhoti- śabdayorlakṣaṇāvṛttatvaṃ doṣo na bhavet । tathāhi—na tāvadyāva- jjīvaśabdena kālo'bhidhīyate, sāmastyaviśiṣṭajīvanamātrābhidhā- yitvāt । nāpi juhotiśabdenābhyāso'bhidhīyate, homāvacchinna- bhāvanāmātrābhidhāyitvāt । nāpi jīvanāvacchinnakālavidhi- sāmarthyādevābhyāsākṣepasiddhiḥ, vikalpāsahatvāt । sa kimā-
kṣipyamāṇo'śābdaḥ ? śābdo vā ? na tāvadaśābdaḥ śāstrārtho bhavati । śābdatve ca juhoteratatparatvāddurvāraiva lakṣaṇeti । tena svārthaparityāgena yāvajjīvaṃ juhotītyākhyātābhyāṃ kālābhyāsāveva lakṣitau vidhātavyāviti vidhāveva lakṣaṇā prasajyeta । ‘yāvaddohaṃ svapiti’ ityādiṣu varttamānāpadeśatvena yathāprāptānuvādalakṣaṇeyaṃ gatyantarāsambhavānna doṣāyeti । tena yāvatkratubhāvijīvanameva nimittabhūtaṃ yāvajjīvaśabdena pratipādyate ।

nanu ṇamulā nimittatvābhidhānānnimittatvapakṣe'pi lakṣaṇā- doṣo'bhihitaḥ । naitat; śrautatvānnimittabhāvasya । tathāhi—samāna- karttṛkadhātvarthasambandhe ṇamulo'nuśāsanāt । yathā ‘kāraṃ saṃharati’ iti । jīvanakriyāyā homakriyāsambandhastāvadabhidhānataḥ pratīyate । na ca jīvanasya homasambandhaḥ sādhyatvena, sādhyatāpratipādakaśru- tyādyabhāvāt । nāpi sādhanatvena, yāvacchabdopalabdhasya jīvanasya sāmastyābhāvena sādhanatvāsambhavāt । na caikasyaiva kāmyaprayogasya yāvajjīvamanabhyasyamānatvāt paryāyeṇaiva jīvanānāṃ pratyabhyāsamanvayo bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । tathā sati vidhāvevābhyāsalakṣaṇādoṣasya duṣpariharatvāt । nimittasya tu sādhyasādhanabhāvavyatirekeṇa nimi- tvenaivānvayopapatteryāvadupabaddhasya jīvanasya jīvasamabhivyāhṛtakriyāsambandha-
mātramabhihitam, tathāpi kriyānvayārthatvātsamuccāraṇasya kriyānvayasya ca nimittatāvyatirekeṇāsambhavānnimittatārūpasambandhaviśeṣapratipāda- nārtameva punaḥ samuccāraṇe'dhyayanavidhestātparyamunnīyate । tena yathā ‘gaurgacchati’ ityatra gavādiśabdānāmākhyābhidhāne'pi abhidhānasya kriyāsambandhārthatvāt kriyāsambandhasya ca vyaktivyatirekeṇāsambha- vādabhidhānasya vyaktiparyantatvādvyakterapi śrautatvam, tathātrāpi sambandhamātrābhidhānasya nimittaparyantatvānnimittamapi śrautameva । etaccākṛtyadhikaraṇe vistareṇa pratipāditam । kālasya tu śruti- śabdābhidheyasāmānyavyaktirūpatvābhāvādarthāntaratvena lakṣaṇāviṣaya- tvameveti lakṣaṇādoṣo duṣparihara eva । tathā juhotiśabde cābhyā- salakṣaṇā prāguktaiveti । nimittapakṣe tu pratinimittaṃ kṛtsnaśāstrārtha- samāpteḥ prayogabhedādabhyāsābhāvena nābhyāsalakṣaṇādoṣaḥ । kiṃ tarhi ? dvayoreva śrutivṛttatvamiti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 556) (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 624)

tena “abhikrāmaṃ juhoti” ityādiṣu sambandhāntarapratikṣepakasya yāvacchabdopabandhasyābhāvāditi sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇo'pi sambandho- 'viruddha eva । nanu yāvacchabdopabandho'pi ṇamulo nimittārthatvaṃ
vyabhicaratyeva । yathā ‘yāvajjīvaṃ bhuṅkṣva’ iti । satyamevaṃ, kintu vidhyākhyātasamabhivyāhṛtasya yāvadupabandhasya ṇamulo nimittatvā- vyabhicārasyoktatvāttathābhūtasyaiva nimittārthatvam । tacca nimittatvaṃ na dhātvarthe, na ca bhāvanāyāṃ, nāpi phale, mānāntaravirodhena teṣu nimittatvāsambhavāt । nimitte satyapi teṣāmaniṣpatteḥ । kintu vidheḥ śabdavyāpārātmanaḥ karttavyatāyāśca dhātvarthasambandhe sati, tasyaivāvaśyakarttavyatāvagamāt । na caivaṃ satyāhāravirodhāda- śakyānuṣṭheyatvam, “sāyaṃ juhoti prātarjuhoti” iti sāyaṃprātaḥ- kālāvacchinnasyaiva jīvanasyāpekṣāvaśena nimittatvābhyupagamāt । taduktamācāryeṇa—

tenāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—sāyaṃ prātarjjīvanavānagnihotraṃ juhuyā- devetyavaśyakarttavyatā homasya pratīyate । tadevāvaśyakarttavyaṃ loke'- vagatam, yasyākaraṇe pratyavāyo bhavati । tatrāpyabhāvasya bhāvotpatti- hetutvābhāvāt tatkālīnānyakriyākāraṇasyaiva pratyavāyotpattihetu- tvam । na ca pratyavāyanivṛttiḥ phalaṃ, prāgabhāvarūpatvena sādhyatvā- bhāvāt । kintu prayojanamātrantvatra vidhyavaruddhabhāvanāyāḥ
puruṣasamīhitasādhyākāṅkṣāyāṃ bubhukṣumubhukṣusādhāraṇātvānnaimittika- vidherubhayasādhāraṇamupāttaduritakṣayarūpamaṅgīkriyate ।

na caivaṃ sādhyabhedādbhāvanābheda iti vācyam । agnihotrasya kāmyaprayoge svargaḥ phalam, iha duritakṣaya iti । ‘sannidhau tvavi- bhāgāt’ ityanena nyāyenotpattiparatvābhāvāt punaḥśrutestu prayo- gāntaravidhānenaivārthavatvāt । ..............syaivāgnihotrasya darśapūrṇa- māsayoścaikaḥ kāmyaprayogaḥ । aparastu yāvannimittamavaśyānuṣṭheyaḥ । ata eva kiñcidaṅgahāne'pi na vaiguṇyam । yāvajjīvamavaśyaṃ karttavyaṃ sarvāṅgopetañceti virodhena kiñcidaṅgābhāvasyāpi vidhyanu- matatvāt । tena śrutyanurodhena jīvananimittaḥ prayogabhedo'tra vidhīyata iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe jīvanalakṣitakālasyāṅgatvenāgnihotra- darśapūrṇamāsavikṛtāvatideśaḥ । siddhānte tanneti ।
sūtrantu—karttṛdharmaḥ prayogo vidhīyate “yāvajjīvaṃ juhoti” iti śrutisaṃyogāt śrutivṛttatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ śākhāntarādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: iha śākhāntarāṇyudāharaṇam—kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ paippalā- dakam ityevamādīni । tatra sandehaḥ—kimekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ yatkiñcidagnihotrādi śrūyate tacchākhāntare punaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bhidyate ? uta na bhidyate ? iti । pūrvaṃ prayogabhedaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ bhedāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—‘ekasyaivaṃ punaḥ śrutiraviśeṣādanarthakaṃ hi syāt’ iti nyāyenābhyāsāt karmabhedaḥ pratipādita eva । sa cābhyāso'pyaviśiṣṭa eva । na ca śākhāntare guṇaphalādyarthāntara....... .................rthā punaḥ śrutirbhavet । tena karmaiva vidheyam । tacca vihitavidhānāsambhavāt karmāntarameveti । na ca karmaikatve'pi bhinnādhyetṛbodhanenaiva śākhāntarapunaḥśruterarthavatvānnābhyāsādbheda iti vaktavyam । pratiśākhamadhyetṛbhedaniyame pramāṇābhāvāt । yadyapi “svādhyāyamadhīyīta” iti svādhyāyagatamekatvaṃ śrūyate, svādhyāya-
śabdena ca svavedaśākhābhidhīyate, tathāpi sāmarthyato'rthajñānārtha- tvena prāptasya svādhyāyasyādhyayanena saṃskāravidhāvuddeśyatvāt, uddeśyaviśeṣaṇasya ca “grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” itivadavivakṣitatvādekasya nānāśākhādhyayanamaviruddham । kiñca yadyekasyaikaśākhādhyayana- meva niyataṃ bhavet, tadā vedāntarīyaśākhādhyayanamapi na prāpnoti । tathā ca sati

lg.l: vaidānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam ।

chapter.p: iti vyāhanyeta । tena punaḥ śruterananyārthatvādabhyāsāttāvadbhedaḥ ।

kiñca yatraikasyāmeva śākhāyāṃ kathañcidvicchedamātreṇānupādeyaṃ pratyupādānādagnihotrādīnāṃ karmāntaratvam, tatra śākhāntareṣu sutarā- meva buddhivicchedādanupādeyaṃ phalaṃ pratyupādānāt prakaraṇāntarādapi karmabhedaḥ । tathā kāṭhakādikarmanāmabhedādapi bhedaḥ, ekatraivārthe'neka- śabdasyānyāyyatvāt । tathā guṇādapi bhedaḥ । ekasyāṃ śākhāyā- magnīṣomīyamekādaśakapālamāmananti । aparasyāṃ dvādaśakapālam । taduktam-rūpāt iti । tathaikasyāṃ kārīrīvākyamadhīyānāstaittirīyā bhūmibhojanamācaranti, aparasyāṃ neti । taduktam—dharmaviśeṣāt iti । tathā kasyāñciduditahomanindā, kasyāñcidanuditahomanindā । taduktam—nindāvacanāditi । tathā pratiśākhaṃ nānādharmān saṅkalayya na kaścidvirodhādanuṣṭhātuṃ śaknoti, karmabhede tu śaknotīti ।
taduktam-aśakteśceti । tathā kasyāñcidanuditahomavyatikrame prāyaści- ttamāmananti, kasyāñciduditahomavyatikrame । taduktam—prāyaścitta- viśeṣāditi । tadatra sarvatraiva parasparavirodhāt pūrvatrāsambhavadguṇādeva bhedaḥ । tenātrābhyāsaprakaraṇāntarasaṃjñāguṇairbhāṣyoktapañcaliṅgadarśanaiśca śākhāntareṣu karmabheda eveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidadhmahe—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pratyabhijñānasiddhamatra karmaikatvaṃ na bhavet । tathāhi—śākhāntare'pi saiva saṃjñā, tadeva dravyadaivatam, ta eva guṇādayaḥ, tadeva ca phalam, sa eva dhātvarthāvacchinnabhāva- nāviṣayavidhiḥ । tadevaṃ pratyabhijñāsamūhasiddhe karmaikatva....yadyapi kiñcidadhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vā pratīyeta, tathāpi gorgaḍuni jāte lāṅgūle vā cchinne pratyabhijñāsiddhamekatvaṃ nojbhkati tathātrāpīti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 635)

na cānyad bhedakāraṇamasti । nanvabhyāsa eva bhedapramāṇa- mityuktam । maivam; ekaikā hi śākhā svādhyāyaśabdavācyā pratipuruṣaṃ vyavasthāpyādhyayanavidhinā pramāṇīkṛtā । pramāṇī-
bhūtānekavākya.....taḥ pratīyamānaṃ karmābhyāsato bhidyate । na cobhayaśākhāgataṃ vākyamekasya pramāṇam, yenānarthakyabhiyā karma bhindyāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 635)

nanu sāmarthyato'rthajñānārthatayā prāptaṃ svādhyāyamuddiśyādhya- yanasaṃskāravidhāvekatvamavivakṣitamityuktam । ataḥ kathamekasmin puruṣe śākhāntarasyāprāmāṇyamityucyate । syādevaṃ yadyadhyayanavidheḥ prāksvādhyāyasyārthaparatvaniścayo bhavet, kintu lokānusāreṇa śaktya- vadhāraṇamātram । adhyayanavidhitastūccāraṇatātparyādhīnamarthaparatvamiti arthavādādhikaraṇa eva prapañcitam । tena lokānusāreṇa śaktyava dhāraṇe jāte'pyuccāraṇatātparyamantareṇa svādhyāyasyārthaparatvāniśca- yānna sāmarthyaviniyuktasvādhyāyoddeśenādhyanasaṃskāravidhiḥ, kintu svādhyāyakarmakasyaivādhyayanasyārthajñānaṃ pratyupādīyamānatvāt svādhyā- yasyāpyupādeyatvamiti tadgatamekatvaṃ vivakṣitameveti ekaiva śākhaikasyā- dhyetuḥ pramāṇamiti nābhyāsātkarmabheda iti । vedāntarīyaśākhādhya- yanaṃ tu vacanavaśādeva । na caivaṃ vedāntarīyaśākhāvagatāgnihotrādi- karmaṇāmabhyāsādbhedaprasaṅgaḥ । samuccayāpādakavacanavaśena sutarāma- bhedāvagateḥ । tathā hi—karmāvabodhaṃ prati tatrāpyupādīyamāna
eva samuccīyata ityekaḥ karmaprayogaḥ । tadgatasāhityārthaṃ (?) trivedī- bhelodbhava ekasminneva karmaṇi vedabhedena samuccayāvagamāt । etena prakaraṇāntaraguṇayorapi bhedakatvaṃ pratyuktameva । kāṭhakādisaṃjñā tu na karmaṇaḥ, kintu kaṭhena proktamiti pravacananimittā hi sā । na ca karma procyate, kiṃ tarhi ? grantha eva । bhavatu vā karmaṇaḥ saṃjñā, tathāpyutpatti- saṃyoginī hi saṃjñā bhedikā । taduktam—‘saṃjñā cotpattisaṃyogāt’ iti । na ceyaṃ tatheti na karmabhedikā । liṅgadarśanāni tu sūtrabhāṣya- vārttikānusāreṇa karmaikatvāvirodhena vyākhyeyāni । taduktam—

lg.l: tasmāttadeveti mate na karma bhinnaṃ kathañcitpratiśākhamiṣṭam ।
na kāraṇaṃ saptamamasti cānyadato yathoktaiva tu bhadesiddhiḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 646)
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe yathāśākhaṃ vyavasthitāṅgānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu sarvaśākhāvihitāṅgānuṣṭhānamiti ।
sūtrantu—ekameva karmaphalasaṃyogāddravyadevatadhātvarthabhāvanā- viṣayavidhisaṃjñānāmaviśeṣāt pratyabhijñāsphuṭatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.trailer: iti bālavalabhībhujaṅgāparanāmno bhaṭṭaśrībhavadevasya kṛtau tautātitamatatilake dvitīyo'dhyāyassamāptaḥ ।।

chapter.head: śrī
tautātitamatatilakam
tatra tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
atha prathamaṃ pratijñādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃṅgatī
chapter.p:
nānākarmalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam । anantaraṃ śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ varttayiṣyāmaḥ- kaḥ śeṣaḥ ? kena hetunā śeṣaḥ ? kathañca viniyujyate ? iti । śrutyā- dīni ca viniyoge kāraṇāni vakṣyante । teṣāñca balavadabalavattā । etattātparyeṇānyadapyupoddhātādinā । atra vṛttavarttiṣyamāṇakīrttanā- dadhyāyayorhetuhetumadbhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho darśitaḥ । tatra prabhā- kareṇa nānākarmalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttamiti nānāśāstralakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam । ata- staddhetukaṃ śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ varttayiṣyāma iti vyākhyātam । tadayuktam; śāstrabhedasya lakṣaṇārthatvasya dvitīyādhyāya eva nirākṛtatvāt । na ca karmabhedaśabdena śāstrabhedo'bhidhīyate । na ca śāstrabhedasya vakṣyamāṇaṃ śeṣaśeṣilakṣaṇaṃ prati hetutvamapyasti । atra yayorhi
śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratipādyastayoreva bhedo hetutayā'bhidhīyata ityu- citam । tathāca bhāṣyam—‘nānākarmalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam’ iti । ato yatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttikameva varṇanīyam । tenāyamarthaḥ—atha karmabhedalakṣaṇānantaraṃ karmabhedalakṣaṇahetukaṃ śeṣaśeṣilakṣaṇaṃ prati- pādyata iti । yato vijñātabhedānāṃ khalu padārthānāṃ guṇapradhānabhūta- śeṣaśeṣitvaṃ pratipattuṃ śakyate । tatra yadyapi prayogakramādhikāra- lakṣaṇānāmapi bhedalakṣaṇāpekṣatvaṃ vidyata eva, tathāpi teṣāṃ śeṣalakṣaṇāpekṣatvāccheṣalakṣaṇasya ca bhedalakṣaṇamātrādhīnatvādbhe- dalakṣaṇānantaraṃ śeṣalakṣaṇamevārabhyata iti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 648)

na ca vācyam—śeṣaśeṣiṇorubhayorapi pratipādyatvādubhayoreva lakṣaṇamucitam । prādhānyāccheṣiṇa eva vā । śeṣamātralakṣaṇantu kuta iti । niyataśrutyādīni viniyogavidhervyāpārastṛtīyādhyāya- viṣayaḥ । anenedaṃ sādhyamiti viniyojakasya vyāpāraḥ, atra cedaṃ sādhyamiti na prameyam । anyataḥ siddhasyānuvādāt । aneneti vidhīyate । tena śrutyādisahāyasya viniyogavidheḥ śeṣaviṣayatvā- ccheṣiṇastu śeṣalakṣaṇādevārthasiddhatvāccheṣalakṣaṇamevaitaditi ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 652)
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ śeṣalakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatra kaḥ śeṣa ityākāṅkṣāyāmupakārakatvalakṣaṇameva śeṣatvaṃ pūrvapakṣī bādarirmanyate । ayañca tasyābhisandhiḥ—na tāvadavinā- bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ śeṣatvam, avinābhūtayorapi rūpasparśayorloke vede cāgneyopāṃśuyājayoḥ śeṣaśeṣitvavyabhicārāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 654)
nāpi prayojyatvam, vināpi prayojyatvena puroḍāśakapālāde- stuṣopavāpādau śeṣatvadarśanāt । satyapi prayojyatve naimittikānāṃ nimittaṃ prati śeṣatvābhāvāt । taduktam—

lg.l: nimittairna ca teṣveṣāṃ homānāṃ śeṣatā matā ।। iti

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 655)
na cādhikyameva śeṣatvaṃ—yasmin vihite yadatiriktaṃ vidhī- yate tadadhikaṃ tasya śeṣa iti । pradhānasyāṅgavidhyuttarakālaṃ vidhā- nenādhikye'pi śeṣatvavyabhicārāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 655)

na ca vidhyantatvameva śeṣatvam, vidhyantatvañca yasminvihite yatkathambhāvākāṅkṣāyāṃ parastādvidhīyamānaṃ sambadhyate, taducyate । upakramopasaṃhāramadhyavihitānāmapi kathambhāvākāṃkṣayā sambandha- darśanena vyabhicārāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 655)

nāpi pārārthyameva śeṣatvam, anirūpaṇāt । tathāhi— yadyanyoddeśapravṛttakṛtisamavāyitvaṃ pārārthyam, tadāvaghātādīnāma- cetanatvena kṛtisamavāyābhāvādaśeṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ । athānyoddeśa- pravṛttakṛtisādhyatvam, tarhi karttustadabhāvātkarma pratyaśeṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ ।
athobhayasādhāraṇaṃ paroddeśapravṛttakṛtisambandhitvamātram, tarhi deśakālayostadabhāvādaśeṣatvam । tasmāllokavedasādhāraṇamananyā- rthasya padārthasyānyopakārakatvameva śeṣatvamiti । na caivaṃ sati godohanasya kratūpakārakatayā kratuśeṣatvaṃ, phalārthatvenānanyārtha- tvābhāvāt । nāpi svārthānuṣṭhitānāṃ prayājādīnāṃ prasaṅgena puroḍāśayāgopakārakatvātpuroḍāśayāgaśeṣatvameva । nāpi paśvartha- tvenaiva, ananyārthatvābhāvāt । ata evādhānādhyayanadhanārjanādī- nāmapi na kratūpakārakatayā kratuśeṣatvam । yathākramamāhavanīya- jñānadhanaprāptyarthatvenānanyārthatvābhāvāt । na caivaṃ sati kapālānāṃ puroḍāśārthatvena na tuṣopavāpaśeṣatvamiti vācyam । yataḥ pacya- mānapuroḍāśādhāratvena kapālānāṃ puroḍāśārthatvam । na ca tena rūpeṇa tuṣopavāpārthatvamiti । atrāpyananyārthatvenaiva rūpeṇa tuṣo- pavāpopakārakatvamiti na tasyāpi śeṣatvamanupapannam । na ca maśakārtho dhūma ityādiṣūpakāriṣvapi śeṣatvādarśanānnopakārakatvaṃ śeṣatvamiti vācyam । yato nātra śeṣatvaṃ pratīyate, kintarhi ? nivṛttivacano hyayamarthaśabdaḥ । taduktaṃ jayādityena-“maśakārtho dhūmo maśakanivṛtyarthaḥ” iti । ato'tra śeṣatvābhāvānnānupapattiḥ । kiñca tādarthyamapi vicāryamāṇaṃ nopakārakatvādanyatpratīyate । tenopakāratvameva śeṣatvam ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 656.)
evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pārārthyātiriktamupakārakatva- lakṣaṇaṃ śeṣatvamupapadyate । tathāhi—kimidamananyārthasyānyopakā- rajanakatvam ? na tāvadanukūlavedanāya yatkiñcitkaratvam । “vrīhīna- vahanti” ityatrācetanānāṃ vrīhyādīnāmanukūlavedanābhāvāttān pratya- vaghātādīnāmaśeṣatvaprasaṅgāt, aśeṣasyāpi svāmino garbhadāsaṃ prati śeṣatvaprasaṅgācca । athānanyārthasyāpekṣitakiñcitkaratvamātram, tarhi “paridhau paśuṃ niyuñjīta” ityatrāgniparidhānārthatvarūpeṇaiva śabdo- panītasya paridheḥ paśuniyojanaśeṣatvaṃ gatam । kintarhi ? parārthatvam । na caivaṃ sati ‘kaḥ śeṣa ? kena hetunā śeṣaḥ ?’ iti śeṣaśabdābhidheye hetupraśne parārthatvasyārthasvarūpasya hetutvavirodhāt । tena kaḥ śeṣaḥ kena hetunā śeṣa ityubhayapraśnottaraparañcaitsūtram । dvayamekena sūtreṇa
śrutyarthābhyāṃ nirūpyata iti draṣṭavyam । na ca tannirūpayituṃ na śakyate, parāddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvameva sakalaśeṣasādhāraṇam । tatrācetanānāṃ tāvaddravyaguṇasaṃskārāṇāmanyoddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvaṃ spaṣṭameva । evaṃ deśakālayorapi । tatra deśasya tāvacchāstrabodhita- sādhanatvānuṣṭheyapadārthādhāratvena kṛtyanukūlatvam । tathā kālasyāpi śāstrāvabodhitasādhanānuṣṭhānāvacchedakatvenaiva kṛtyanukūlatvaṃ suvyakta- meva । na hi paurṇamāsīkālavihitaḥ prayogayaḥ paurṇamāsīkālānava- cchinno'nuṣṭhitaḥ phalasādhanaṃ bhavati । tathā karmaphalapuruṣeṣvapi । karmaṇastāvatphaloddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvaṃ phalabhāvanākaraṇatvenaiva suvyaktam । tathā phalasyāpi puruṣabhedoddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvaṃ bhogyatvenaiva sphuṭam । tathā puruṣasyāpi karmoddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvaṃ kartṛtvādeva siddham । tenānyoddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvameva śeṣatvam । evaṃ garbhadāsasyāpi svamyuddeśapravṛttakṛtyanukūlatvameva śeṣatvam ।

na caivaṃ svāmino'pi garbhadāsoddeśapravṛttabharaṇādikṛtyanukūla- tvāccheṣatvaprasaṅga iti vācyam । yato na hi svāmino garbhadāsa- bharaṇaṃ garbhadāsamuddiśya pravarttate । kintarhi ? anena bhṛtyena madīyaṃ kiñcitkaraṇīyamityātmānamevoddiśya । tena tatrāpi svāmyuddeśapra- vṛttakṛtyanukūlatvādgarbhadāsasyaiva śeṣatvam । na ca vācyam—cetano hi garbhadāsaścetanatvādātmoddeśenaiva sarvatra pravartate, tena garbhadāsa-
syātmoddeśapravṛttasvāmimardanādikṛtau svāmino'nukūlatvātsvāmina eva śeṣatvam, na garbhadāsasyeti । yato nityamanapekṣitaḥ svayoga- kṣemaḥ । svāmyuddeśapravṛttirhi garbhadāsa ityucyate । krayaṇādi- bhistasyai bhūtarūpasyaivopādānāt । etacca śeṣatvamupakārakāpakāraka- sādhāraṇameva । maśakārtho dhūma ityatrāpyapakārārthatvena maśako- ddeśapravṛttāyāṃ kṛtāvutpādyate na dhūmasyānukūlatvāt । ataḥ sarva- tropakārakatvātiriktaṃ śrutyādipramāṇameyaṃ pārārthyameva śeṣatvamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—uttarādhikaraṇanibandhanameva ।
sūtrantu—parārthatvādevāvaghātādiḥ śeṣa iti vācyam, na kāraṇāntarāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ vādaryadhikaraṇam
saṅgatiḥ
chapter.p: bādarirācāryo dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣveva śeṣaśabda iti mene, na yāgaphalapuruṣeṣu । idānīṃ pūrvādhikaraṇapūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prayojana- matra nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: ayamatra bādareḥ pūrvapakṣaṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yadyupakārakatvameva śeṣatvam, tadā dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣvevopakārakatvadarśanāccheṣatvaṃ nānyatra । dravyasya tāvatpūrvasiddhasya svabhāvata evotpādakatvena karmopakārakatvam । evaṃ guṇasyāpyaruṇādeḥ karmasādhanībhūtadravyā- vacchedakatvena svabhāvādeva karmopakārakatvam । tathā saṃskāra- syāpyavaghātādeḥ puroḍāśanirvarttakatayā yāgasādhanatvena coditānāṃ vrīhyādīnāmapekṣitavaituṣyaniṣpādanena vrīhyādidravyopakārakatvam । etacca sarvaṃ pramāṇāntarasiddhameva । na ca yāgasya phalaṃ pratyupa- kārakatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa pratīyate, yāgānantaraṃ phalaniṣpatteradarśa- nāt । nāpi śabdādavagamyate, sarvākhyāteṣu sādhyatvenaiva dhātvartha- syāvagamāt । śrutyādīnyapi dravyaguṇasaṃskārāṇāmevopakārakatve pramāṇam, śrutyādīnāṃ teṣveva darśanāt । tathāhi—kāṣṭhaiḥ pace- diti tṛtīyāśrutiryathā śaknuyādityupabandhātpākāpekṣitajvalanopa- kārakāritve kāṣṭhānāṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati ।

nanu bhāvārthādhikaraṇe vidhimeyameva dhātvarthasya phalakaraṇatvaṃ vyutpāditam । ataḥ kathamatra dhātvarthasyaṃ phalānupakārakatvam ? ucyate—sa hi mene, pravarttanātmako hi vidhiḥ svamahimnā paraṃ pravarttayatyeva । na cātra dhātusambandhinī karaṇatvapratipādikā tṛtīyā
sambhavati, dhātoraprātipadikatvāt । na ca svargakāmaśrutireva sādhyatvena svargaṃ pratipādayantī dhātvarthasya karaṇatvamākṣipatīti vācyam । sādhyākāṅkṣāyā abhāvena svargasya sādhyatvenāpratīteḥ । na ca kamisambandhādeva sādhyatvam, ‘brāhmaṇaṃ hantukāmaḥ prājāpatyaṃ caret’ ityatra vyabhicārāt । tena karmaṇaḥ phalopakārakatve pramā- ṇābhāvānna taccheṣatvam । etenaiva phalasyāpi puruṣopabhogyatvena puruṣaśeṣatvaṃ nirākṛtam, puruṣānuṣṭhitakarmasādhyatvābhāvāt । puru- ṣasya tu karma prati dravyatvāccheṣatvamiṣyata eva । śeṣitvantu phalābhāvādevāsya na sambhavati । ato na karmaphalapuruṣāṇāṃ śeṣaśeṣitvena trairūpyam, kintu dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣveva śeṣatvam । ato na palasādhanatayā yāgānuṣṭhānamiti bādariḥ । tacca pūrvādhi- karaṇapūrvapakṣaprayojanamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi vidhiraphale karmaṇi puruṣaṃ pravarttayitumutsahate । tathāhi-cetanapravarttanātmako vidhiḥ । cetanasya pekṣāpūrvikā pravṛttirabhimate tatsādhane ca bhavati । na hi duḥkhasva- rūpaṃ karma sidhyatviti kaścitpravartate । tatra yadyapi phale tatsādhane ca
pravṛttirna bhidyate, kintu yeyamuddiṣṭaphalasādhane pravṛttiḥ saiva phale pravṛttiḥ, tathāpi lipsādhikaraṇanyāyena phalapravṛttessvarasasiddhatvā- dapravṛttapravarttanātmako vidhiḥ karmaṇi pravarttayan phalasādhanabhāvabodha- napurassarameva pravarttayati । tena yeyamuddiṣṭaphalārthā pravṛttiḥ, sā nāntarīyakatayā yadetatsādhanaṣiyatvaṃ tasya karaṇasambandhaḥ phalārtha- tvametatkarmaṇo bodhayatīti karmaṇaḥ phalaśeṣatvam । yadā ca vidhiḥ karmaṇaḥ phalārthatvaṃ bodhayati, tadā kintatphalamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ svarga- kāmapadaṃ svargameva phalarūpaṃ puruṣopabhogyaṃ sādhyatayā samarpayati । na hi svopabhogyaphalamantareṇa vidhiścetanaṃ pravarttayituṃ śaknoti । taduktamācāryeṇa—

ataḥ phalasyāpi puruṣaśeṣatvaṃ vidhisammatameva । taduktam— ‘phalañca puruṣārthatvāt’ (jai. sū., 3. 1., 5.) iti । puruṣasya tanniṣpādakatayā karmaśeṣatvaṃ nirvivādameva । taduktam—‘puruṣaśca karmārthatvāt’ jai. sū., (3. 1. 6.) iti । tena karmaphalapuruṣāṇāṃparamparaṃ śeṣaśeṣitvam । dravyaguṇasaṃskārāṇāntu śeṣatvameva । phalasādhanatve- naiva yāgānuṣṭhānamiti jaiminimataṃ pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntaprayojanamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ teṣāmarthādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: sto darśapūrṇamāsau—“darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tatra śrūyante dharmāḥ—nirvapaṇam, prokṣaṇam, avahanamiti ya auṣadhadharmāḥ, utpavanavilāpanagrahaṇasādanādayo ya ājyadharmāḥ, tathā śākhāharaṇam, gavāṃ prasthāpanamityevamādayo ye sānnāyyadharmāḥ, teṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ sarve auṣadha ājye sānnāyye ca kartavyāḥ ? uta ye yatra kiyamāṇā arthavantaste tatra kartavyāḥ ? iti । kaḥ śeṣa ? kena hetunā śeṣaḥ ? iti prathamādhikaraṇe vicārya tadvicā- raprayojanībhūtānāñca viṣayavyavasthitiṃ dvitīyādhikaraṇena prati- pādyedānīñca kathañca viniyujyata ityayamartho vicāryate । asmin pāde śrutisahāyavidhipramāṇake viniyoge pratipādye samānapado- pādānavidhipratyāsatyavaghātādisaṃskārāṇāmeva tāvatprathamaṃ vini- yogaḥ pratipādyate ।

tatra prathamaṃ siddhāntenopakramate । teṣām—avaghātaprokṣaṇā- dīnāṃ saṃskārāṇāmarthena sambandhaḥ, ye yatra kriyamāṇāḥ śāstreṇaiva prayojanavanto vijñāyante । tadayamarthaḥ—vrīhyādiśabdairhi svābhi-
dheyajātyekārthasamavetamevāvāntarāpūrvasādhanatvaṃ lakṣitam । tadarthatvenai- vāvadhātādayo jñāyamānā nāpūrvāntarasādhanasānnāyyārthā bhavitumarhanti । evaṃ vilāpanaśākhāharaṇādayo'pi draṣṭavyā iti nānyonyaṃ saṅkaro dharmāṇāmiti । evaṃ siddhāntenopakramya pūrvapakṣo'bhidhīyate—

sūtratrayasyāpi bhāṣye yeṣāmanyonyasaṃvirodhaḥ sambhavati, yathā—vilāpanotpavanaśākhāharaṇaprasnavanādayaḥ saṃskārāste'pya- viśeṣeṇodāhṛtāḥ, tathāpi yeṣāmevānyonyasaṅkaraḥ sambhavati ta evātrodāharaṇamiti mantavyam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvadavāntarāpūrvasādhana- lakṣaṇayā dharmāṇāṃ viniyogaḥ sambhavati, yena vyavasthā bhavet । na lakṣaṇā, pramāṇābhāvāt । tathāhi—yadapūrvagṛhītāḥ khalvava- ghātādayo dharmāstadapūrvīya eva vrīhyādau tadapūrvasādhanatvalakṣaṇayā vidhātavyāḥ । paramāpūrveṇaiva hi phalasamatvena pradhānatayā prakara- ṇena prathamaṃ gṛhītā nāvāntarāpūrveṇa, tasyāphalatvenāpradhānatvāt । tena paramāpūrvasambandhapurassaratvāddharmāṇāṃ tatsādhanapadārthasambandha
eva vaktavyaḥ । paramāpūrvasambandhena ca sarveṣāmevājyauṣadhasānnā- yyādīnāmaviśiṣṭatvādavyavasthitatvameva dharmāṇām ।

nanu nāvaghātādeḥ paramāpūrvārthatvamam, kintu vākya- balenāntaraṅgalakṣaṇayā vāṅinayamanyāyenāvāntarāpūrvārthatvameva । ataḥ kathaṃ dharmāṇāmavyavastheti । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi vrīhyāderapi dīkṣaṇīyāyā ivāpūrvasambandhaḥ svato bhavet, kintu yāgasamba- ndhadvārā paramparayā vaktavyaḥ । tatraikasyaiva yāgasya vākyadvaye'pūrva- dvayamavagatam । “āgneyena yajeta” ityatrāvāntarāpūrvam, “darśapūrṇa- māsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” ityatra paramāpūrvam । tataḥ paramāpūrva- syāgrapravṛttatvātphalavatvam । tena ca prayojanavatvāttasyaiva vrīhi- śabdātprathamamupasthiteḥ paramāpūrvasādhanalakṣaṇayaivāvaghātādividhānā- davyavasthaiva dharmāṇāmiti ।

na caivaṃ satyekasyaivāvaghātādeḥ kathaṃ vrīhiyavayordṛṣṭā- rthatvamājyasānnāyyayoścādṛṣṭārthatvamiti vācyam । viniyogo- ttarakālaṃ kalpanīyatvātprayojanasya । ato viniyogabalena dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ svīkriyamāṇaṃ na doṣāya । na ca sāmānyataḥ paramāpūrvagrahaṇama- ntareṇaiva vrāhyādīnāṃ kāryāntaraviniyuktatvādavāntarāpūrvasādhana- lakṣaṇayaivāvaghātādisambandha iti vācyam । “suvarṇaṃ bhāryam” ityatra suvarṇasyāpyapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāprasaṅgāt । “suvarṇaṃ haste
bhavati, atha gṛhṇāti” ityādivākyaiḥ suvarṇasyāpi kratau kāryāntare viniyogadarśanāt । atha tatra bharaṇasyāpyapūrvasambandhānavagamā- danapūrvīyasya ca suvarṇamantraiḥ sambandhāvirodhānna lakṣaṇeti । tadatrāpyavaghātasya paramāpūrvagrahaṇe sati svarūpasambandhāvirodhā- nnāvāntarāpūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāpramāṇamasti । tenāvaśyamagrato'pūrvasa- mbandho vaktavyaḥ । sa ca prakaraṇātpradhānāpūrvasambandha eveti ।

nanvekāpūrvaprayuktatve'pi dharmavyavasthā dṛśyate । yathā “bṛhatpṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati, rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati” iti pṛṣṭhasyaikastotrāpūrvagṛhītatve'pi bṛhadrathantaraistaddharmāṇāñca “bṛhati prastūyamāne cakṣurnimīlayet” “ratha- ntare prastūyamāne samudraṃ manasā dhyāyet” iti vyavasthitā eva cakṣurnimīlanasamudramanodhyānādayo dharmāḥ śrūyante anuṣṭhīyante ca । tatra yathā bṛhadrathantarayościtratvaśūratvaguṇakīrttanavyāpārabhedamāśri- tyaikāpūrvasādhanatve'pi dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthā । tathātra vrīhyājyasānnā- yyādīnāṃ bhedena dharmavyavasthā bhaviṣyati । naivam; na vayamekāpūrva- gṛhītayorbṛhadrathantaravyāpārabhedāddharmavyavasthāṃ brūmaḥ, kintu bṛhadrathanta- rābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhākhyastotradvāreṇa vilakṣaṇamevāpūrvadvayaṃ janyate । na cāpūrvavailakṣaṇya eva pramāṇaṃ nāstīti vācyam । stotraṃ hi pṛṣṭham । stutiśca yathā citratvakīrttanena tathā śūratvakīrttanena । tenātra vilakṣaṇastutisādhyamapūrvaṃ kalpyamānaṃ vilakṣaṇameva kalpyate ।
na caivaṃ sati vilakṣaṇakāryatvātsamuccayaḥ । “bṛhadvā pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati rathantaraṃ vā” iti stutisādhanadvāreṇa vilakṣaṇastutyorapi vikalpasya vācanikatvāt । na ca vācanika evāyaṃ vikalpo na bhavatīti vācyam । bṛhadrathantarādhikaraṇe vārttikakārapādairvācanikasyaiva siddhāntahetutvenoktatvāt । tena tatra bhinnapṛṣṭhaprayuktā dharmavyavasthā । atra tu paramāpūrvaprayuktatvādavaghātādidharmāṇāṃ paramāpūrvasādhanatvasya sarvaṣāmājyauṣadhasannāyyādīnāmaviśiṣṭatvātsarve dharmāḥ sarvatra karttavyā iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi paramāpūrvaprayuktā dharmā bhaveyuḥ, kintvavāntarāpūrvaprayuktā hote । tathāhi—āgneyāpūrvīyapuroḍāśa- prakṛtitvena vrīhayo vihitāḥ । teṣāntāvadāgneyāpūrvīyatvaṃ vyavasthi- tameva । tatsannidhau cāvaghātaprokṣaṇādayo dvitīyāśrutipratipādita- vrīhisaṃskārarūpāḥ śrūyante । saṃskāraśca bhūtabhāvyupayogasambandhi- dravyaviṣayaḥ । tena vrīhisvarūpe'vaghātaprokṣaṇādayaḥ saṃskārā asambadhyamānā vrīhīṇāṃ bhāvyupayogini svarūpe sambadhyamānā āgneyāpūrvīyapuroḍāśaprakṛtidravyatvenāntaraṅgalakṣaṇābalena vrīhi-
śabdopasthāne sambaddhyante । tadayamarthoṃ bhavati—āgneyāpūrvīya- puroḍāśaprakṛtidravyamavahanyāditi । evañca sati yavasyāpi tadrūpa- tvādavaghātādyanvayo nānupapannaḥ । taduktamajitākṛtā—

prokṣaṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭheta tato nātiprasajyate’ iti । etaccopa- lakṣamamātram । tena yatra prakṛtidravyagataḥ saṃskāraḥ śrūyate, tatrā- vāntarāpūrvīyaṃ prakṛtidravyamiti lakṣaṇam । yatra tu pradeyadravyagataḥ saṃskāro vilāpanādiḥ, tatrāvāntarāpūrvīyaṃ pradeyadravyamiti yathā- sambhavaṃ sarvamūhanīyam । na caivaṃ sati “suvarṇaṃ bhāryam” ityatrāpi suvarṇaśabdasyāpūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāprasaṅgaḥ । “suvarṇaṃ haste bhavatyatha gṛhṇāti” ityādivākyavihitāpūrvīyasuvarṇasyāprastutatvenātrānupa- sthiteḥ । tena bharaṇasya saṃskāratvāsambhavātsaktuvadviniyogabhaṅgo yukta eva । na ceha tatheti vaiṣamyam ।

yattu paramāpūrveṇāgrato gṛhītatvātparamāpūrvasādhanamevāvaghātā- disambandhārthaṃ lakṣaṇīyamityuktam, tadayuktam ; vrīhyavaghātādīnāṃ paramāpūrvasambandhe pramāṇābhāvāt । prakaraṇena vrīhyavaghātādīnāṃ paramāpūrvasambandho vaktavyaḥ । tatra na tāvadvrīhyādidravyāṇāmakriyā- rūpatvena prakaraṇena grahaṇaṃ sambhavati । kriyārūpatve'pyavaghātasya
vrīhisaṃyuktatvāt na prakaraṇena grahaṇam । atha na grāhakalakṣaṇam, kintarhi ? sannidhānalakṣaṇam । evantarhyavāntarāpūrvasyaiva sannihita- tvātsarvaviśeṣasambaddhasya ca sāmānyasambandhapūrvakatve'pyāgneyāpūrvī- yavrīhiviśeṣasambandhārthamavaghātasya sāmānyena tatsambandha evāgrato yuktaḥ, paramāpūrvasambandhastu kutaḥ ? na ca tasyāphalatvenāprayoja- katvam, paramāpūrvadvāreṇaiva phalatvāt । anirjñātopāyaparimāṇatvena ca āgneyādisannihitadharmasambandhaḥ । ataḥ sarvathā avāntarāpūrva- prayuktā eva dharmāḥ, tataśca vyavatiṣṭhanta iti siddham ।
prayojanaṃ pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-avaghātādīnāmājyādiguṇa- śāstragamyasyārthasya prayojanasya lopādakarma sthāt ananuṣṭhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamaṃ sphyakapālādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra samāmananti—“sphyaśca kapālāni cāgnihotrahavaṇī ca śūrpañca kṛṣṇājinañca śamyā colūkhalañca musalañca dvaṣañcopalā caitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni” iti । tatra sandihyate—
kiṃ yo ya iha śakyate ebhiḥ kartuṃ tasmai tasmai padārthāyaitāni samāmnātāni ? uta yadyena saṃyuktaṃ tasmā eveti । vidhipratyāsatyā prathamaṃ saṃskāraṇāṃ viniyogavyavasthāṃ pratipādyedānīṃ dravyaguṇayo- rviniyoge pratipādye guṇasya dravyāvacchedakatvena dravyaviniyogā- dhīnaviniyogādanantaraṃ dravyasyaiva viniyogaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—dvāvatra sphyādīnāṃ saṃyogau pratīyete । “etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni” ityekaḥ, “sphyenoddhanti” ityevamādiraparaḥ । tayoścaiko vidhiraparo'nuvādaḥ । tatroddhananādivā- kyānāṃ vidhitve daśāpi vākyāni bhinnāni vaktavyāni । pratyeka- mevāpūrvasādhanalakṣaṇāpi vaktavyā । yajñāyudhavākyasya tu vidhitva ekavākyatvam, nāpyapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇā । tena yajñāyudhavākyasyaiva vidhāyakatvāduddhananādivākyānāñca “yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati” iti vadavayutyānuvādenārthavādatvameva । evañca pratyekayajñakriyānvayena daśa- saṃkhyāpyupapatsyate । nanu vidhiratra na śrūyate । vaiśabdaśca vidhitvapari- panthīti kathamasya vidhitvam ? ucyate-“etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni” ityatrāyudhaśabdasya sādhanavacanatvāt sphyādīnāṃ yajñasādhanatvaṃ pratīyate । na cāyamanuvādaḥ, vākyāntareṇa yajñasādhanatvāprāpteḥ ।
vaiśabdasya ca “vāruṇo vai yajñāvacaraḥ” ityādiṣu vidhitva- pratibandhavyabhicārāt । tenāprāptārthatvāt vidhyadhyāhāreṇāsyaiva vidhāyakatvam । tatra pradeyatvena sākṣādyajñasādhanatvasya ca caturthā- dhyāye nirākariṣyamāṇatvādānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena tadaṅgāvatāre yajñāṅgatvāviśeṣādyathāsāmarthyaṃ sarvārthānyeva syāditi vijñāyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi “etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni” ityatra vidhiḥ śrūyeta । nanvāyu dhaśabdasya sādhanavacanatvātsphyādīnāñca yajña- sādhanatvasya vākyāntarādaprāpteranuvādāsambhavādvidhyadhyāhāreṇaivāsya vidhitvamityuktam । maivam; āyudhaśabdasya yuddhasādhanatvena mukhya- yajñasādhanavacanatvābhāvāt । yajñasādhane gauṇo'yamāyudhaśabdaḥ, gauṇaśca pramāṇāntaraprasiddhaguṇayoganibandhana eva । na ca vidheyo'rthaḥ pramā- ṇāntaraviṣayo bhavati । tena vidhitvābhāvādvaiśabdasya autsargika- vidhitvatiraskāreṇānuvādadyotakatvādyathāprāptaguṇayogādanuvādatvame- vāsya vaktavyam । na ca tadaṅgaṃ sambhavati, yataḥ “sphyenoddhanti” ityādivākyairuddhananādidvāreṇa sphyādīnāṃ yajñasādhanatvamavaga- myate । āyudhānyapi yuddhasādhanāni । tena sādhanatvaguṇayoga- sya sphyādiṣu stutyarthaṃ gauṇa evāyamāyudhaśabdaḥ । uddhananādi-
vākyānāntu pṛthagākhyātayogena pṛthagvidhānasyaiva niṣpratipakṣatvā- duddhananādisambandhena pṛthagvākyavihitānāṃ sphyādīnām “etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni” iti sādhāraṇo'yamarthavādaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 671)
apūrvādhikaraṇanyāyenātrāpi sannihitāvāntarāpūrvasādhanala- kṣaṇāyāḥ siddhatvāt dravyāṇāmapi yathāsaṃyogameva vyavasthitiḥ ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktameva । sūtrantu—dravyamutpattāvevoddha- navādyarthatvenāvagamāt uddhananārthameva codyeta, na kriyāntarārtha- mityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhamaruṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
jyotiṣṭome krayaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate—“aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahā- yanyā somaṃ krīṇāti” iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kimaruṇimā kṛtsna-
prakaraṇe niviśite ? uta kraya evaikahāyanyām ? iti । dravya- viniyogaṃ pratipādyedānīmavasaraprāpto guṇaviniyogaḥ pratipādyate । atrāruṇāpadasya kevalaguṇaparatve piṅgākṣyaikahāyanīpadayośca dravyaparatve sthite vicāraḥ । tadayuktam; piṅgākṣyaikahānīpada- yorapi guṇavacanatvāt । tathāhi—piṅgākṣī ekahāyanīti ca bahuvrīhisamāso'yaṃ matvarthīyapratyayasamānārthaḥ । matvarthīyapratyayasya tadasyāstyasminniti sambandhe'nuśāsanāttatsamānārthasya bahuvrīherapi sambandhavacanatvameva । kiñca gomāniti ekahāyanīti ca viśiṣṭe pratīyete । na cātra gomātramekahāyanamātraṃ vā viśeṣaṇam, asa- mbaddhe viśiṣṭapratyayānutpatteḥ । tena gosambaddhaḥ, ekahāyanasamba- ddho'tra viśeṣaṇam । viśeṣaṇañca pūrvamadhīyate । atassamba- ndho'tra prathamamabhidhātavyaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 673)

tathā ca satyākṛtinyāyena tata eva viśiṣṭapratītisiddhera- nabhidheyameva dravyam । kintu ‘kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ tvatalbhyām’ ityanuśāsanabalātpiṅgākṣītvamekahāyanītvamityatra sambandha evāvaśyamabhidheyaḥ । abhidheyaniṣkarṣe ca tbataloranuśā-
sanam । yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāddravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalāviti । prayogadarśanañca yathā—śābaleyasya gotvamiti । ato'pi piṅgākṣyaikahāyanīśabdābhyāmapi sambandha evābhidhīyate । sa ca tadāgamanyāyena pratyayārtha eveti prādhānyāttasyaiva padārthatvam, na tu dravyasya, ākṣepalabhyatvāt । tena piṅgākṣyaikahāyanīśabda- yorapi sambandharūpaguṇānvitābhidhānānna vicāraviṣayatvam ।

ucyate—syādevaṃ yadyekahāyanyādiśabdaiḥ sambandho'bhidhīyate । na caitadasti, bikalpāsahatvāt । tathāhī-kiṃ sambandhamātramabhidhīyate ? sambandhaviśeṣo vā ? na tābatsambandhamātram, sakalayaugikaśabdānāṃ paryāyatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi sambandhaviśeṣaḥ, tasya sambandhidvayādhī- natvena tadabhidhānamantareṇānabhidhānāt । atha tadarthaṃ dvāvapi samba- ndhināvabhidhīyete, tadābhyāmeva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyabhāvāpannābhyāṃ sa- mbandhapratītisiddheḥ kimabhidhānagauravāśrayaṇena ? taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 675.)
nanvapratītaviśeṣaṇa bhūte sambandhe viśiṣṭabuddhirna bhavatītyuktam । maivam; na hi gomāniti pade sambandho'pi viśeṣaṇam । kintarhi ? gāvaḥ । tāśca goprātipadikena prathamamupāttā eva ।
taduktam—

lg.l: viśeṣaṇañca gāvo'tra na sambandhaḥ kathañcana ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 675)
tatra viśeṣaṇatvaṃ sambandhinaṃ vinā sambhavati, na tu sambandhā- vagatiṃ vinā । na ca yadyena vinā sambhavati tattadavagatimapekṣate । api tvavagate tasminnākṣepalabhyaṃ bhavati । taduktam—

lg.l: tatra kiṃ śakyate vaktuṃ pṛthivyapyabhidhīyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 676)

kiñca vyabhicārādapi na sambandhāvagamo viśiṣṭāvagamani- mittam । tathāhi—pratīyata eva pitāputrādiśabdebhyaḥ sambandho na viśiṣṭāvagamā bhavati । putraśabdāttu viśiṣṭānavagamena niyamena bhavatyeva sambandhāvagamaḥ । tena dravyameva viśiṣṭaṃ piṅgākṣyaikahāyanī- śabdābhyāmabhidhīyate । yattu tvataloḥ sambandhasyābhidhānādabhidhe- yaniṣkarṣe ca tvataloranuśāsanaprayogayordarśanātkṛttaddhitasamāsaiḥ sambaddhamevābhidhīyata ityuktam । tadayuktam; na hyabhidheyaniṣkarṣe tvataloranuśāsanamasti । kintarhi ? dravyasamaveśabdapravṛttinimi- ttaniṣkarṣe । tathā cānuśāsanam—“yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāddravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tatvalau” iti । tena gośabdasya vyakti-
rūpadravye pravṛttau dravyasamavetamabhidheyameva sāmānyaṃ nimittam । atasta- deva tatra gotvaṃ goteti tvatalbhyāṃ niṣkṛṣyata hatyucitam । kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu na dravyasamavetābhidheyasya nimittasyāsambha- vātsambandhasya cānabhidheyasyāpi dravyasamavetasya vastunaḥ śabda- pravṛttinimittatvātsamavetaṃ tvatalbhyānniṣkṛṣyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 673.)

ataḥ piṅgākṣyaikahāyanīśabdābhyāṃ dravyamevābhidhīyata iti siddham । nanu bhavatu piṅgakṣyaikahāyanīśabdayordravyavacanatvam, tathāpyaruṇāśabdasyāpi guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavacanatvena kevala(guṇa)vacana- tvābhāvātkathaṃ vicāraviṣayatvam ? tathāhi-rūparasagandhādiśabdānāṃ khalu kevalaguṇavacanānāṃ matvarthīyapratyayamantareṇa dravyasamānādhika- raṇasyābhāvāt । na hi bhavati ‘rūpaṃ paṭa’ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam, api tarhi ? ‘rūpavān paṭa’ iti । aruṇādipadeṣu vināpi matvarthīya- pratyayena ‘aruṇaḥ paṭo'ruṇā śāṭī’ iti dravyasāmānādhikaraṇyādna- ṇaviśiṣṭadravyavacanatvameva । kiñca ‘guṇavacanebhyaśca’ iti śuklāruṇā- diśabdeṣu matublopānuśāsanāt ‘śuklavān paṭaḥ’ ityasminnevārthe śuklaḥ paṭa iti prayogānuśāsanavaśādvijñāyate । na ca śuklasya
śabdasya vācakatvaṃ sambhavati । yathā.... ....vatteṣūdbhidādipadeṣu pratya- yalopāśuśāsanaṃ prakṛtibhāgasyaivobhayathā pratipādanasāmarthyapradarśa- nārtham । evamatrāpyaruṇādipadasyaiva guṇadravyapratipādanasāmarthya- pratipādanārthaṃ matublopānuśāsanam । ato'pi dravyavacanatvameva । taduktam—

lg.l: śabdānāṃ na hi lopena vākyārthaḥ pratipādyate ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 681)

nāpi guṇavacanatve'pi śuklādipadānāṃ lakṣaṇayā dravyasāmā- nādhikaraṇyam, rūpādiśabdānāmapi lakṣaṇayā dravyasāmānādhika- raṇyād rūpaṃ paṭa iti prayogaprasaṅgāt । kiñca dravyagatasaṃyoge dṛśyate—aruṇaḥ paṭaḥ aruṇā śāṭīti । ato'pi dravyavacanatvam । tena guṇavaddravyavacanatvādaruṇāśabdasya kevalaguṇavacanatvābhāvāda- nupapanno vicāra iti ।

ucyate—guṇavaddravyavacanatve'pi guṇābhidhānasyāvaśyābhyu- peyatvādākṛtinyāyenākṣepādeva dravyapratītisiddherna dravyagocarāpyabhi- dhānaśaktiḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate । tenākṛtinyāyenaivākṣiptadravyadvāreṇa śuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatterna tadvaśena dravyavacanatvam । na caivaṃ sati rūparasādipadānāmapyākṣiptadravyadvāreṇaiva rūpaṃ paṭa iti
sāmānādhikaraṇyaprasaṅgaḥ, śabdaśaktivaicitryāt । tathā hi— keṣāñcicchabdānāṃ keṣucidartheṣvabhidhānavadeva lakṣaṇāśaktirapyanādi- kālapravṛttatvena nirūḍhā । yathā śuklādiśabdānāṃ dravyeṣu । keṣucitkriyate । yathā-rathāṅganāmā cakravākaḥ । keṣucitkarttumapi na śakyate । yathā—sparśarūparasagandhānām । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 683)

na ca sambandhamātranibandhanatvāllakṣaṇāyā evaṃvidhavaicitryā- sambhava iti vācyam । abhidhānaśakteriva lakṣaṇāśakterapi vaicitryopapatteḥ । yathābhidhānavādinaḥ samāne'pi guṇābhidhāne śuklādiśabdā guṇaviśiṣṭaṃ dravyamabhidadhati, rūpādiśabdāstu guṇa- mātram । evaṃ śuklādiśabdā eva guṇamabhidadhānāḥ pradhānabhūtaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyocitaṃ dravyaṃ lakṣayanti, na rūpādiśabdā ityābhidhānavadeva lakṣaṇāvaicitryopapatternānupapannam । na caivaṃ śaktidvayasvīkārādaviśeṣaḥ, abhidhānaśaktervābhidheyāvinābhāvo- pasthitārthatātparyāyā lakṣaṇāśaktiśabdārthatvāt । ata eva matupo lopāmnānaṃ vā, atrānādikālanirūḍhalakṣaṇāvaśādeva । liṅga- saṃkhyayoścākṣiptāśrayabhūtadravyadvāreṇaiva । tathācānuśāsanam—
‘guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti’ iti । guṇavacanatvaṃ copasarjanībhūtārthābhidhānam । kathantarhi vaiyākaraṇānāṃ vaiśeṣikā- divatpratiniyatā guṇāssantīti ? na; rūparasādiśabdeṣu niṣkṛṣṭa- guṇābhidhāyiṣu yathākathañcidāśrayopasthitau prasaṅga iti । ato'ruṇāpadasya guṇavacanatvādupapanno vicāra iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—aruṇayeti tṛtīyānta- maruṇāpadaṃ kevalaguṇavacanaṃ satkārakārthañca pratīyate । na cāmūrtasya guṇasya kārakatvaṃ sambhavati, kriyāsamavāyābhāvāt । dravyāva- cchedakatvenāsya kārakatvam, tathāpi kriyāsamavāyābhāvenāsyā- kārakatvāt । na ca bhūtadravyasbandhamātreṇa kārakavibhaktiyogaḥ । tathāsati vidhāvaupacārikaśabdaprasaṅgāt । na caivaṃ sati jāterapya- kārakatvamiti vācyam । jāterapyudāhaṇatvena vicāraviṣayatvāt । ākṛtyadhikaraṇe ca vācyatvapratipādanaparatayeha siddhameva kriyā- rthavatvamupadarśitam । tenātra dravyagataṃ kārakatvamanūdya guṇo vidheyaḥ । na caivaṃ sati svavākya evaikahāyanīpadasya dravyavacanatvāt hanta ! tṛtīyāpratipāditakārakatvānuvādenaivāruṇaguṇavidhānamiti vācyam । vairūpyalakṣaṇavākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । tathāhi—ekasyaivaikahāyanīpa- dasya krayaṃ prati vidheyaguṇabhūtopadeśārthatvam, aruṇaguṇaṃ pratya-
nūdyamānaprādhānabhūtāddeśyārthatvam । tathā ekahānīpadasya kiyā- sambandhāya kārakavibhaktiyogaḥ, guṇasambandhāya ca sambandha- pratipādakaṣaṣṭhīvibhaktiyogaḥ । etacca sakṛduccārite vaidike'bhyupagamanaṃ pauruṣeyatvamāpādayatīti, tena prakaraṇagatakriyāṅgakaraṇībhūtakṛtsna- dravyagatameva kārakatvamanūdyāruṇāguṇo vidhīyata iti । na caivaṃ sati prakaraṇagatasambandhe'pi vibhāgalakṣaṇavākyabhedadoṣa iti vācyam । vairūpyalakṣaṇavākyabhedasyāpyavaśyābhyupagamanīyatvāt । na hi vibhāgamantareṇa parasparabhinnārthatvaṃ sambhavati ।

kiñca pauruṣeyatvāpādako hi vairūpyalakṣaṇo vākyabhedo mahādoṣamāvahati । na ca vibhāgalakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ pauruṣeyatvāvahaḥ, kintu sahoccaritānāmaucityamātraprāptyaikārthātikramamātrameva । tathā ca “syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi” ityādiṣvarthaikatvābhāvena vibhāga- lakṣaṇavākyabhedasya spaṣṭatvāditi vaiṣamyam । tenāyamarthaḥ—sarvāṇyeva prakaraṇagatakārakāṇi grahādīnyaruṇāni karttavyānīti । nanu vibhajyamānamapyaruṇāpadaṃ svato'vidhāyakamiti kalpitavidhinaiva tadarthaḥ sannidhilakṣaṇaprakaraṇopalakṣite kārake vidhātavyaḥ । sannidhānañcaikahāyanīrūpakārakeṇaiva prakṛṣṭataram । na ca kalpitavidhinā tatsambandhavidhāne viruddhatrikadvayāpattilakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ pauruṣeya- tvāpādako'stītyekahāyanīgatakārakatvānuvādenāruṇaguṇo vidhīya-
tām, na tu prakaraṇagatakārakatvānuvādeneti । ucyate—vidheyā- nvayaparo hi vidhistadevoddeśyamapekṣate, yena vinā vidhātumeva notsahate । taduktam—“haviṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ nobhayatvena”iti । tadatra kārakamātroddeśe vidhyānarthakyājjyotiṣṭomāpūrvīyameva kāraka- muddiśyate । punaścaikahāyanīgatatvena viśeṣaṇavivakṣāyāṃ pauruṣeyatvāvaho vākyabhedo duṣparihara eveti prakaraṇagatasakalakārakasambandha eva guṇasya yuktaḥ ।

nanu śuklāruṇādiśabdānāṃ kevalaguṇavacanatve'pi nirūḍha- lakṣaṇayā guṇopasarjjanadravyapradhānatvamuktam । tena liṅgasaṃkhyā- kārakatvamapi dravyasyaivopādāyāruṇāpadaṃ dravyāntaraṃ kraya eva vidhattām । na caikahāyanyāvarodhāddravyāntarāpraveśaḥ, vibhinnāna- tiprayojanatvena vākyāntaravihitānāmapi vāsaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ samucca- yasvīkārāditi । ucyate—satyamuktam, kintūpasarjanatvaṃ guṇasya padārthavelāyām । tathāhi-śuklaḥ paṭa iti śuklapadaṃ yadyapi nirūḍhalakṣaṇāvaśādākṣiptadravyameva paṭasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhajate, tathāpi lohitoṣṇāṣanyāyenopasarjanībhūtaguṇaparameveti vyutpattiḥ । śuklaḥ śuklau śuklā ityatra tu dravyaparakārakatvañca kriyānvayitvarūpaṃ vākyārtho bhavati, na liṅgasaṃkhyāvatpadārthaparya- vasāyitvam । tenātra kārakatvānvayo guṇasyaiva vaktavyaḥ ।

na ca vācyam-guṇaparatve'ruṇāpadasya kutra liṅgasaṃkhyayoranvaya iti । lakṣitadravya iti cet—tarhi yugapacchjatilakṣaṇāvirodhātkā- rakatvamapi dravyasyaivāstu, yato na śrutyarthānupayogalakṣaṇā, yena svārthapratipādanamavāntaravyāpārīkṛtya lākṣaṇikārthaparyavasāyi padaṃ bhavet । kintu śrutyarthopapatyarthameva । tathāhi—guṇamabhidadhātyaru- ṇādipadam, aguṇasya ca guṇinamantareṇāsambhavātsvārthopapatyarthaṃ guṇinameva dravyaṃ lakṣayati । tena ‘nimittaṃ vidhirapabādhate’ iti svārthaparityāgenaiveyamanādinirūḍhalakṣaṇā । anenaivābhiprāyeṇopasa- rjanībhūtākṣiptadravyapradhāno guṇaḥ śuklāruṇādiśabdebhyaḥ pratīyate, rūpādiśabdebhyaḥ svatantra ityucyate । na tūpasarjanatvenābhiprāyeṇa । na ca śrautārthaparityāgena lākṣaṇikānvayaḥ sambhavatīti guṇasyaiva kārakānvayaḥ । liṅgasaṃkhyānvayastvākṣiptadravyasyaiva, guṇe tasyā- sambhavāt । na caitanna bhavati । dṛṣṭo hi svārthaparasyāpi śabdasya lakṣitenāpi liṅgasaṃkhyānvayaḥ । yathā “rājā rājasūyena” iti tṛtīyayā rājasūyaprātipadikābhihitānāmeva samudāyināṃ kārakatvānvayaḥ, lakṣitasamudāyasya saṃkhyānvayaḥ ।

nanvamūrttatvādguṇasya kārakatvaṃ na sambhavatītyuktam । ataḥ svārthānupayogādeveyaṃ lakṣaṇā । tena kārakatvayogyatvavidita- dravyaviniyojakamevāruṇāpadamāpadyata iti pūrvapakṣābhāvaḥ । ucyate-
evaṃ hyatra pūrvapakṣī manyate—kārakatvānvayastāvadatra guṇasya pratīyate । tatra kiṃ sa eva yathopapadyate tatsvīkriyatām ? atha vā lakṣitadravyaṃ kriyāyāṃ vidhīyatām ? tatra lakṣitadravyavidhāne śrutyarthaparityāgo vidhau ca lakṣaṇā । na ca guṇasya prakṛtakārakā- nvayo nopapadyate । tatra yadyapyutsargataḥ prātipadikārthasya kāra- kībhāvenaiva sambandho yujyate, tathāpyasambhavena tatparityāgātsambandha- mātrameva svīkarttumucitam । tacca kārakatvānuvādena guṇavidhāne na sambhavatīti tadeva svīkriyate । tatrāpyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena karaṇakārakībhūtadravyaviṣayatvam । ato'nuvādasya yathāpratīta- viṣayatvātsarvāṇyeva kārakāṇyaruṇīkarttavyānīti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 680. )

na caivaṃ sati guṇasya karmakārakatvamapi na sambhavatīti vācyam । tasya kriyāsamavāyavyatirekeṇa kriyoddeśyatāmātreṇa sambhavāt । tasmātkaraṇakārakāṇyevāruṇīkāryāṇi, na tu kartrādīnyapīti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi guṇasya kārakatvaṃ nopapadyate । kriyānirvartanaṃ hi kārakatvam । tatkriyāpekṣānibandhanam । yathā ca kriyā dravyaṃ vinā na bhavatīti svaniṣpattaye dravyamapekṣate, tathā guṇānavacchinnasya dravyaviśeṣasya kriyārthamupādātumaśakyatvāt guṇamapekṣata eva । tatrākāṃkṣāvaśādyadi svavākyasthamubhayaṃ paśyati, tadānyonyānugrahādubhayamapi svasādhanatayā gṛhṇāti । atha guṇaṃ na paśyati yathā “paśunā yajeta” iti ( tatra guṇāpekṣayā yaṃ kañcana- guṇaṃ svīkaroti ) tathā dravyāpekṣayā yatkiñciddravyaṃ svīkurute । atra cobhayasvabhāvādubhayamapi sādhanatayā krayakriyā svīkurute । nanu utkṛṣṭaṃ kriyāṃ kurvatkārakaṃ bhavati । guṇasya cāmūrtatvena kriyāsamavāyābhāvāt kathaṃ kārakatvam ? ucyate-na hi pradhānabhūtakriyāsamavāyena karaṇakārakaṃ bhavati, tasyāḥ kartṛmātrasamavetatvāt, kintu tadanukūlavyāpārajananena । tacca guṇa- syāpi dravyāvacchedarūpavyāpārātsambhavatīti tasyāpi kārakatvameva ।

atha dravyasya vyāpāro dravyasamaveto guṇasya vyāpāro na guṇasamaveta ityakārakatvam । guṇasya coktaṃ dravyasamavetavyāpāre- ṇaiva kārakatvaṃ bhavatīti । atha dravye tathaiva dṛṣṭamiti cet-guṇasya na tathā dṛṣṭamiti dravyasyāpyakārakatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tenāsau vyāpāro bhavatu
svasamaveto'nyasamaveto vā । sarvathā kriyānukūlavyāpāreṇaiva karaṇatvam । dravyasya vyāpāro dravyasamaveta eva, guṇasya tvarthāvacche- dakarūpo vyāpāro yadyarthaviśeṣarūpo'sau tadārthasamavetapadārthajñāna- rūpastadā puruṣasamaveta eveti । dṛṣṭañcānyasamavetenāpi vyāpāreṇa karaṇatvam । yāgasyaiva puruṣasamavetenāpyapūrvavyāpāreṇa phalabhāva- nākaraṇatvam । ato nānupapannaṃ guṇasya karaṇatvam । evañca sati svavākyavidhinaiva vidhānopapattau na vidhinaiva kalpanāgauravam । nāpi vākyabhedenāpi pratyayābhihitasya kārakatvasya prakṛtyarthena saha yathākathañcitsambandhāśrayaṇena prātipadikāntarārthānvayitvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ।

na caivaṃ dravyaguṇayorekakrayakriyānvaye sati parasparamanvaya iti vācyam । samabhivyāhāralakṣaṇavākyādevānyonyānvayopapatteḥ । tathāhi—kiñciddravyamavacchindatā aruṇaguṇena mayā krayaḥ sādhayitavya ityaruṇaguṇo dravyamapekṣate । tathaikahāyanīdravyamapi kriyārthamupādānāya kenacidguṇena mamāvacchedakena bhavitavyamiti guṇamapekṣate । na cātrānyatkiñciddravyaṃ guṇo vā samasti । tataśca sannihitātikrame kāraṇābhāvādanayoreva parasparaṃ sambandho'vagamyate ।

kiñca krayo'pyatra na guṇadravyāntarākṣepaṃ sahate । yadi hyasāvaniyatadravyaguṇo bhavet, tadā dravyāntaraṃ guṇāntaraṃ ca
sahetāpi । ekahāyanīdravyako'ruṇaguṇaścāsau śrūyate । ataścaiva.... ....tayā parasparānvitau dravyaguṇāvākarṣan pradhānabhūto'sau tayore- vānvayaṃ sampādayatīti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 693)
na cātra śrutivirodhaḥ, śrutyavagatakratusambandhānuguṇatvā- danyānyāsambandhasya । taduktam—

lg.l: na cātrānuguṇā vṛttiḥ durbalāpi virudhyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 694)

tena tṛtīyāśrutipratipāditakrayāṅgabhāvanirvāhārthameva paraspa- rānvayābhyupagamātsatyamupakāryopakārakabhāvenānyonyaṃ dravyaguṇayora- ṅgāṅgibhāva iti siddhaṃ guṇasyāpi kriyāyā eva karaṇatvamiti । atra ca vāyavyavākyamapyudāharaṇameva । yato'trāpi vāyavyena śvetena yajeteti vākyaṃ vyajyate । pūrvapakṣaścātra guṇapadasya śrutivṛttyanurodhena kevalaguṇaparatvāttasya cāmūrttatvena kriyāsādhanatvābhāvāt prākara- ṇikadravyagatapratyayārthībhūtakārakatvānuvādena guṇamātravidhāyakatvam । siddhāntastu dravyāvacchedakadvāreṇa guṇasyāpi kriyāyāṃ kāraka-
tvamiti । taccātra vāyavyapadena dravyopādānācchvotapadasyāpyaviśiṣṭa- miti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ ।
prayonajanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—arthaikatve dravyaguṇa- yoraikakarmyātkriyārthatvātparasparaniyamaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ grahaikatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
asti somo “ya evaṃ vidbān somena yajate” iti । tatra śrūyate—“daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” iti । tathā agnihotre śrūyate-“agnestṛṇānyapacinoti” iti । tathā darśapūrṇamāsayāśśrūyate- “puroḍāśaṃ paryagni karoti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ-kimekasya grahasyāgneḥ puroḍāśasya ca sammārjanādi karttavyam ? uta sarveṣāṃ grahaṇāṃ, sarveṣāma- gnīnāṃ, sarveṣāṃ puroḍāśānām ? iti । saṃskāradravyaguṇānāṃ yathāsaṃyogaṃ vyavasthayā viniyoge pratipādite idānīṃ kimuddeśyasya saṃyogino viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitam ? utāvivakṣitam ? iti nirūpyate । atra caikatvayuktamityupalakṣaṇam । dvitvabahutvayuktamapyudāhartavyam । tena
“yasya puroḍāśau kṣāyataḥ” tathā “yasya havīṃṣi naśyeyurduṣyeyurvā” ityevamādīnyapi vākyāni vicāraviṣayā eva ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—“graha sammāṣṭi” ityatra grahatvavadekatvamapi śrūyate । na caikapadopāttayorgrahatvaikatvayorgrahatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ naikatvamityatra hetuṃ paśyāmaḥ । tena yathā “paśunā yajeta” ityatraikatvayuktasyaiva paśoḥ karaṇatayā kriyāyāmupādīyamānatvena vivakṣā, tathaikatvayuktasyaiva grahasya karmakārakatayā kriyāyāmuddeśyatvena vidhivivakṣā bhaviṣyati । na ca padaśrutyā grahaviśeṣaṇasyaikatvasya kathaṃ vākyena sammārgānvaya iti vācyam । virodhābhāvāt । paśvekatvayoriva grahaikatvayorapi āśrayāśrayirūpeṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya- bhāvasya padaśrutipramāṇakatvātsammārgabhāvanayā ca saha śeṣaśeṣibhāvasya vākyapramāṇakatvāt । tena paśvekatvasyeva grahasyoddeśyatvena sammārgā- nvaya iti ।

nanu kāryopayuktaṃ hi saṃskriyate । kāryopayogaśca daśānāmapi grahāṇāmaviśiṣṭaḥ । tena daśāpi grahāḥ sammārṣṭavyā iti । maivam; kāryopayogitvāviśeṣeṇa camasānāmapi sammārgaprasaṅgāt । atha camasaśrutyabhāvādgrahasyaiva śrutatvāt grahāṇāmeva sammārgaḥ, evaṃ daśatvasyāśrutatvādekasyaiva sammārgaḥ । na coddeśyagatatvamevāvivakṣā-
kāraṇam, upādeyagatasyāpi viśeṣaṇasyopādeyagatatvenaivāvivakṣā- praṅgāt । kiñca “aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupanayīta” ityatroddeśyagatayora- pyaṣṭavarṣatvapuṃstvayoḥ, tathā “vasante brāhmaṇo'gnīnādadhīta” ityatrāgni- gatabahutvasya, tathā “yūpaṃ chinatti” ityatra yūpagataikatvasyoddeśyaviśeṇa- ṣaṇasyāpi vivakṣādarśanena vyabhicārādapi noddeśyaviśeṣaṇatvamavi- vakṣākāraṇam ।

athocyeta—dvividhamuddeśyaṃ prāptamaprāptañca । tatra brāhmaṇasyā- gnīnāṃ yūpasya cānyato'prāptatvāduddeśyasyāpi viśeṣaṇavivakṣā bhavatu nāma । grahasya tu “grahairjuhoti” ityatra grahāṇāṃ prāptatvādyathā- prāptānāmevoddeśyatvānna viśeṣaṇavivakṣā yukteti । tadayuktam; grahāṇāmapi sammārgasambandhenāprāptatvāt । atha home prāptatvānnā- prāptatvam, tarhi brāhmaṇasyāpi loke prāptatvānnāprāptatvamiti viśeṣaṇa- vivakṣā na syāt । na ca vidhyanapekṣitatvādevāvivakṣitatvam, yato yathā vidhirniruddeśyavidhānāsambhavāduddeśyamapekṣate, tathā kiṃ rūpaṃ taduddeśyamityanuṣṭhānaupayikaṃ tadviśeṣaṇa mapi । tatra yadi svavākyaiḥ saṃkhyādikaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na prāpnoti, tadā prakaraṇāgatamapi viśeṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti । svavākyagataviśeṣaṇalābhe tu nairākāṅkṣyānnānyadapekṣate । tadiha svavākyagataikatvasaṃkhyayā nirākāṅkṣo vidhirna prakaraṇamupasa- rpatīti prātipadikoccāraṇavelāyāṃ grahaśabdātprakaraṇagāmino daśaiva
grahāḥ pratīyante । te ca kāryopayogitvena sarva eva saṃskāramapekṣante । pratyayavaśāttu tadekatvasvīkāre satītarepāṃ prāptānāmapi varjanāt parisaṅkhyaiva doṣaḥ syāt ।

maivam; samabhivyāhāralabhyaṃ hi padavidhiḥ svīkurute, na pratītamātram । tathā satyekahāyanīpadādapi nānāguṇakadravyopasthitau aruṇaguṇo (na) viśeṣaṇe'pi parisaṃkhyā syāt । tena yatra viśeṣalā- bhāya padāntarasamabhivyāhāraṃ vidhirapekṣate, tatra pratyayasamabhivyāhāraṃ nāpekṣata iti kimetat ? na cobhayoddeśe pratyekaṃ vākyāsamāptervākyabheda iti vācyam । uddeśyabhede hi vākyabhedo bhavati । iha tvapekṣāvaśāt “aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupatayīta” itivadviśiṣṭoddeśānna vākyabhedaḥ । tena tathā “daśāpavitreṇa” ityatropādeyagataikatvavivakṣā, tathā grahami- tyatraikasyaiva grahasya śrutisaṃyogāduddeśyamapi grahādikamekatvayuktameva vivakṣitatvena sammārjanīyamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pratītamātraṃ vidhiruddeśyatvena vivakṣyeta । tathāhi—vidheyāropitavyāpāro vidhirniruddeśyavidhā- nāsambhavāduddeśyamapekṣate । uddeśyañca dvividham—prāptamaprāptañca ।
yatrāprāptamuddeśyam, tatra yathāśabdamuddeśyasvīkārātpratītaviśeṣaṇa- parityāge kāraṇābhāvena vidhyākāṅkṣāyā vidyamānatvādbhavatu nāma viśeṣaṇavivakṣā । yathā—“aṣṭavarṣaṃ vrāhmaṇamupanayīta” “agnīnā- da/?/ta” “yūpaṃ chinatti” ityādiṣu prāptoddeśe'pi । yatra viśeṣaṇa- vivakṣāmantareṇoddeśyatvameva na sambhavati, yathā “yasyobhayaṃ havi- rārtimārcchet” ityatrārttigamanasya nimittasya haviṣā viśeṣaṇam । yatra cānanyagatiśabdaśca na saptadaśāratnitāvidhānamapekṣate vāja- peyasyetyanuvādāsambhavāt vājapeye, tatrāpi satyāṃ vidhyākāṅkṣāyāṃ bhavatu nāmoddeśyagataviśeṣaṇavivakṣā ।

na caivaṃ sati “yasyobhayaṃ havigarttim” ityatrāpyubhayatvaviva- kṣāprasaṅgāt ‘prathamaṃ vā niyamyeta’ ( jai. sū., 11. 1. 42. ) ityanena nyāyenāgneyahavirārttinimittatvakramāpanodārthatvenaivāprayojanatvenānanya- gatikatvābhāvāt vidhyākāṅkṣānivṛtteḥ na kevalamuddeśyaviśeṣaṇam । upādeyaviśeṣaṇamapi vidhyākāṅkṣābhāvādavivakṣitameva । yathā— “satrādudavasāya pṛṣṭhaśamanīyena yajeran” ityatra । atra hi yadyapi pratyayenopādeyakartṛgatameva bahutvamiti tathāpi prakṛtyarthaparyālocanena vidhyapekṣitam । tathāhi—“satrādu davasāya yajeran” iti ktvāpra- tyayenodavasānasamānakartṛkatvaṃ yāgasya pratipāditam । udavasānasya ca kriyāvirāmarūpasya pratyekameva samavāyāt pratyekamevodavasānakartṛ-
katvam । tathā ca sati samānakarttṛtvapratipādakena ktvāpratyayena yāge'pyekaikaśa eva karttṛtvapratipādanāttadvirodhe pratyayapratipāditamapi karttṛbahutvaṃ vidhyākāṅkṣitamavivakṣitaṃ bhavati । kintu pracayaśiṣṭakarttṛ- bahutvaṃ yathāprāptaṃ pratyayenocyata iti । tena sarvatra vidhivivakṣāyāṃ vidhyākāṅkṣā kāraṇam, avivakṣāyāñca na vidhānākāṅkṣākṣeti siddham, na tūpādeyagatatvamuddeśyagatatvañceti । tadatra “grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” ityādiṣu na kiñcidvivakṣākāraṇamasti । na tāvada- prāptoddeṣṭuḥ, “grahairjuhoti” ityādinā grahādīnāṃ kāryāntarasādhanatayā prāptatvāt । nāpyekatvaṃ vinā uddeśyatvāparyavasānaṃ, grahamātrasyaivo- ddeśyatvasambhavāt । nāpyekatvasyānanyagatiśabdopādānam, karmatvapra- tipādanāt karmaṇi dvitīyāvibhakterupāttatvāt । tatra ca nāntarīyakatayā pratīyamānamapyekatvamavivakṣāmāpādayitumalam । tena grahamātrameva pūrvaprāptaṃ kāryopayuktamuddeśyamanūdya sammārgo vidhātavyaḥ । anuvādasya ca yathāprāptaviṣayatvāt daśānāmeva grahaṇam । kāryopayuktānāṃ tulyaprāpte- rekatvasya coktanyāyena vivikṣākāraṇābhāvātsammārgākhyaḥ saṃskāro vidhīyamāno daśabhireva grahairaviśeṣātsambadhyata iti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 705.)

upādeyasya tu kāryasādhanatayā prāganavagatasya śabdaikavedya- tvādyathāśabdāpādānameva vidhiviṣayatvamautsargikam । na tu “paśunā yajeta” ityatra pṛṣṭhaśamanīyavatpratyayārthāvarodhakāraṇamasti । tenaika- tvaviśiṣṭasyaiva paśoḥ karaṇatvena śabdopāttatvāt, tathābhūtasyaiva vidhiviṣayatvamiti vaiṣamyam ।

yattu kāryopayogitvenāvagatānāmanuvāde camasānāmapi sammārga- prasaṅga ityuktam, taccamasādhikaraṇa eva nirasanīyam । yattu grahasyāpi sammārgasambandhenāprāptatvādaprāptoddeśa eveti viśeṣaṇa- vivakṣā । atha “grahairjuhoti” iti vākyāntaraprāptatvānnāprāptatvam, tarhi brāhmaṇasyāpi lokaprāptatvādviśeṣaṇāvivakṣetyuktam । tadayuktam; na hi vidheyabhūtakriyāsambandhena prāptiraprāptirvā atra vivakṣāyā- mavivakṣāyāṃ vā kāraṇam, kintu yatkriyāṅgatvena saṃskārasya vidhānaṃ tatkriyāyāmuddeśyasya prāptyaprāptī avivakṣādau kāraṇam । iha ca jyotiṣṭomabhāvanāṅgatvena sammārgarūpaḥ saṃskāro vidhātavyaḥ । tasyāñca jyotiṣṭomabhāvanāyāmuddeśyabhūtasya grahasya “grahairjuhāti” iti vākyāntareṇa prāptatvādbhavati prāptoddeśaḥ । “aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupa- nayīta” ityatra tūṣanayanalakṣaṇasya saṃskārasyādhyayanāṅgatayā vidhānāt tasyāṃ cādhyayanabhāvanāyāmuddeśyabhūtasya brāhmaṇasyaivo- panayanātprāgaprāptatvāt bhavatyaprāptoddeśaḥ । tenātra viśiṣṭasyaivoddeśya-
tvena vidhyapekṣitatvānna vākyabhedaḥ । grahāṇāntu jyotiṣṭomabhāvanāṅga- tvenānyata eva “grahairjuhoti” iti prāptatvāt “grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” ityatra grahoddeśenaiva vidheyāropitavyāpārasya vidheruddeśyākāṃkṣānivṛtteḥ punarekatvoddeśenāpi sammārgavidhāne vidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇastāvadeko vākyabhedaḥ । tathaikatvasya kevalasyoddeṣṭumaśakyatvāttaduddeśena sammārga- vidhānārthaṃ punarapi grahapadamāvarttanīyamiti padāvṛttilakṣaṇo'pyaparo vākyabheda iti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 707 )
tathāca satyadhyayanavidhyadhyāpitavākyocitasamāmnāyānyatvena pauruṣeyatvādaprāmāṇyaprasgaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 708)

kiñca viśeṣaṇatvena vivakṣyamāṇamapyekatvaṃ kiṃ svāyogavyava- cchedena grahaviśeṣaṇam ? sajātīyānyayogavyavacchedena vā ? yadi svāyogavyavacchedena (?) sajātīyānyayogavyavacchedena tathoddeśyatvena daśānāmeva grahāṇāṃ sammārgaprāpterekatvaviśeṣaṇenetaravyāvṛttau durvāraḥ atra granthapāta iti pratibhāti ।
parisaṃkhyādoṣapraṅgaḥ । nanu ‘liṅgaviśeṣanirdeśāt puṃyuktamaitiśāyanaḥ’ (jai.sū., 6.1.6.) ityatraivoddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇavivakṣāyā nirākariṣya- māṇatvādvyarthamidamadhikaraṇam । maivam; na hi tatroddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇa- syāvivakṣā pratipādyate । atraiva pratipāditatvāt, kintūddiśyamāna- viśeṣaṇatvameva । tathāhi—“svargakāmo yajeta” ityatraikavacanānna svargakāmapadāvagatamekatvaṃ tenopādeyārthagatatvātsaṃkhyeva liṅgamapi viva- kṣitavyamiti pūrvapakṣotthānnānniyamena svargakāmapadasyoddiśyamānārtha- tvameva pratipādayiṣyate । saṃkhyāyāstu na svargakāmapadopāttatvena, kintūpādeyakartṛgatatvenākhyātābhidhānāt । ato nāsya tena gatārthatvamiti ।
prayājanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—sarveṣāṃ grahādīnāṃ sammārgā- dikartavyam, grahatvādimātrasyaiva lakṣaṇatvādaviśiṣṭaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ grahatvādi sādhāraṇamityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ camasādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ । tatra śrūyate—“daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” iti । tatraiṣo'rthaḥ samidhagataḥ—sarve grahāḥ sammārjanīyā iti । idamidānīṃ sandihyate—kiṃ camasā api sammārṣṭavyāḥ ? uta na ? iti । uddeśyaviśeṣaṇasyaikatvāderavivakṣāyāṃ pratipādi- tāyāmidānīṃ kimuddeśyagataṃ grahatvamapyavivakṣitaṃ vivakṣitaṃ veti nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—grahasvarūpasambandhisammārga- saṃskāravidhirānarthakyādapūrvīyarūpe vakyavyaḥ । na cātra vrīhiṣvivā- vaghātasya vyavasthākaraṇamapūrvabhedaḥ samasti । tena jyotiṣṭomāpūrvīya- rūpa eva sammārgavidhirvaktavyaḥ । tacca svarūpaṃ grahacamasayoraviśi- ṣṭamiti camasānāmapi sammārgaḥ kartavyaḥ । nanu vrīhīṇāmivāgneyā- pūrvaṃ grahaṇāmapi svasādhyāpūrvamastyeva । tenāntaraṅgalakṣaṇābalena svāpūrvalakṣaṇayaiva vyavasthopapatteḥkathaṃ camasasambandho'pi sammārgasya । ucyate—utpatyapūrvabhede hyantaraṅgalakṣaṇayā dharmavyavasthā bhavati ।
tena vrīhyādiṣvavaghātādīnāṃ bhavatu vyavasthā । iha tu “somena yajeta” ityutpatterekatvādekaivotpattiḥ । ekameva phalāpūrvamapi । tatsā- dhanatvañca somarasādhāratvarūpaṃ grahacamasasādhāraṇameva । tena yathā haviḥprakṛtidravyasādhanabhāvāviśeṣeṇa vrīhiṣu vidhīyamāno'vaghā- tādiryaveṣvapi sambadhyate, tathā somarasādhārarūpasādhanatvāviśeṣā- dgrahe vidhīyamānaḥ sammārgaścamase'pi sambadhyate । na ca vācyam— “payasā maitrāvaruṇaṃ śrīṇāti” ityatra yathā apūrvamātravyavasthitatvaṃ tathā sammārgasya bhaviṣyati । etasmi.... ....tvetadadhikaraṇa siddhānte tatrā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati । tena guṇānāṃ grahacamasayoravyavasthā somarasādhāramātrasaṃskāratvāditi । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: vyavasthā vārthasya śrutisaṃyogāt tasya śabdapramā- ṇatvāt ।। 3. 1. 17. ।।
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi grahacamasayorapūrve bhedo na bhavet । tathāhi—yadyapi “somena yajeta” ityeka eva somayāga- ssakṛdutpannaḥ, tathāpi taddevatoddeśaviśiṣṭagrahaṇabhedādgrahacamasābhyā- mabhyasyamāno'sau svāpūrvasādhanam । grahacamasābhyāsayośca kṣaṇika- tvena svarūpasāhityābhāvādapūrvadvāreṇaiva sāhityam । tena sāhitya- sidhyarthaṃ kalpitāvāntarāpūrvadvāreṇaivāvaghātādivyavasthopapattau na
paramāpūrvaprayuktatvena camaseṣvapi sammārgaḥ । taccābhyāsāpūrvaṃ vibhinnade- vatoddeśaviśiṣṭagrahaṇasādhyatvena । ‘na hi yatsamitsambandhena sādhyate, tattanūnapātsambandhena’ iti nyāyena vibhinnameveti yuktā dharmavyavasthā । tena somarasādhāratvāviśeṣe'pi grahacamasayorabhyāsāpūrvabhedasya vyavasthitatvānna dharmasaṅkaraḥ । vrīhiyavayostu tadabhāvādyukta eva dharmasaṅkara iti ।

nanūtpatyapūrvaṃ hi saṃskāravyavasthāpakaṃ bhavati । yathā-āgneyā- dyapūrvamavaghātasya । utpatyapūrvasiddhyarthaṃ kalpanīyābhyāsāpūrvasya tu saṃskāravyavasthāhetutve “yadyapi caturavattī yajamānaḥ syāt pañcāvattaiva vapā kāryā” ityatrāpi vapāsambandhena śrutasya pañcāvadānasya vapā- bhyāsāpūrvagṛhītatvena hṛdayādisambandho na syāt । ataśca yathā tatrāgnīṣomīyotpatyapūrvagṛhītatvādbhedena hṛdayādyekādaśāvadeyasambandhaḥ, tathā atrāpi somotpatyapūrvagṛhītatvena tadekatvāccamasasambandho'pi durvāra iti । na hi tatra vapoddeśena pañcāvattaviśiṣṭa- mavadānaṃ vidhīyate । ‘yadyapi caturavattī yajamānaḥ’ ityatra yadyapi- śabdenātideśaprāptāvadānamanūdyāvadānāntaravidhānanivṛttiphalatvāt । nāpi vapāviśiṣṭāvadānoddeśena pañcāvattatvam uddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇa- vivakṣāyāṃ vākyabhedagrasaṅgāt । nāpi vapāmātroddeśena pañcāvattatvam, ekasyā vapāyāḥ pañcatvāsambhavāt, pañcāvattahṛdayagatāvadānasamba-
ndhabādhaprasaṅgācca । tenātideśaprāptāvadānamātroddeśena pañcatvamātraṃ vidhīyate । vapāpadaṃ caikadeśānuvādaḥ । ataḥ sarvāṇyeva paśvaṅgāni pañcāvattāni kāryāṇātyarthaḥ । atra tu grahoddeśenaiva sammārgavidhāna- sambhavādvaiṣamyamiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—graheṣveva sammārgasya vyavasthā na camasasambandhaḥ । arthasya grahasya grahamiti śrutyā saṃyogāt, tasya ca sammārgasambandhasya śabdapramāṇakatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha navamamānarthakyataṅgādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: vājapeye śrūyate—“saptadaśāratnirvājapeyasya yūpo bhavati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ saptadaśāratnitā vājapeyasyorddhvapātre'pi niviśate ? uta paśoryūme/?/ nivaśate ? iti । uddeśyadvāreṇa saṃskā- raviniyogagataṃ viśeṣaṃ nirūpyedānīmuddeśyadvāreṇaiva guṇaviniyogagato viśeṣo nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—saptadaśāratnitā hyatra vidhā- nānantaryādvājapeyenaiva sambadhyate, na tu vyavahitaśrutena yūpena । kiñca pradhānasya khalvaṅgasambandho bhavati । pradhānañca vājapeyo na yūpaḥ, nāpi paśuyāgaḥ । tathā prakaraṇañca vājapeyasya, na paśuyāgasya । prakaraṇañcāṅgaviniyogakam । api ca vājapeyasyeti ṣaṣṭhīśrutyā vājapeyasambandhaḥ saptadaśāratnitāyāḥ pratīyate, vākyena yūpasambandhaḥ । śrutiśca vākyādbalīyasī । tena sarvathā vājapeyasambandha eva sapta- daśāratnitāyāḥ, na paśvaṅgayūpasambandhaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 727 )

nanu “saptadaśāratniḥ” ityanyapadārthapradhānabahuvrīhisamāso'yaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavacanaḥ । sa caikavākyopāttena yūpenaiva sāmānādhi- karaṇyātsambandhamarhati, na vājapeyakarmaṇeti kathaṃ vājapeyena sambadhyate ? ucyate—satyaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭadravyavacano'yam, tathāpi dravyasya prāptatvāllohitoṣṇīṣanyāyena guṇavidhirevāyam । tatrāpi vājapeye yūpābhāvena “vājapeyasya” iti ṣaṣṭhīvirodhānna yūpena sambadhyate, kintu vājapeyasyetyākṣiptavājapeyadravyadvāreṇa vājapeye-
naiva । tacca dravyaṃ na grahacamasādi, kintu ṣoḍaśināmadheyamūrddhvapātram । atastasyaivorddhvatvena khādiratvena ca yūpasādṛśyādyūpaśabdenānuvāda- sambhavāttena sāmānādhikaraṇyenāyaṃ yūpaśabdo vṛtyantareṇorddhvapātra- viṣaya eveti । yadi tu saptadaśāratnipadaṃ yūpena saha yathākathañci- tsambadhyeta, tadā vājapeye yūpābhāvena “vājapeyasya” ityanuvādāsa- mbhavādvājapeyaśabdena yūpasambandhī paśuyāgo lakṣaṇīyaḥ । taccāyu- ktam; yato ‘guṇe tvanyāyya kalpanaikadeśatvāt’ (jai. sū. 9.3.5.) iti nyāyena yūpasyaiva vṛtyantarāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam, na tu pradhānayāgābhidhāyino vājapeyaśabdasya । kiñca virodhena hi lakṣaṇā bhavati । na ca prathamoccāritavājapeyaśabdasamaye virodho'sti । asti tu yūpo- ccāraṇasamaye । tena tatraiva lakṣaṇā yuktā । yathā “ye yajamānāsta ṛtvija” ityatra na prathamoccaritaṃ lakṣaṇāvṛttam । kintva- nantaroccaritamṛtvikpadam, tatraiva virodhadarśanāt । tenorddhvapātra eva saptadaśāratnitā niviśata iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi saptadaśāratnitāvyatirekeṇa yūpaśabdo'rthavān bhavet । na corddhvapātralakṣaṇayāsyārthavatvam, lakṣaṇākāraṇābhāvāt । dvedhā hi śabdasya mukhyārthaparityāgenā- nyaparatvaṃ bhavati—viruddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyādvā, yathā ‘agni-
rmāṇavakaḥ’ iti । vaiyadhikaraṇye'pyananyathāsambhavena vā, yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣo vasatīti । na cātra yūpapadasyorddhvapātrapadasāmānādhi- karaṇyam, nāpi vājapeyasyeti ṣaṣṭhīpratipādito vājapeyasambandho yūpasyānanyathāsiddhaḥ । na hyaṅgāṅgisambandhamevaikaṃ ṣaṣṭhī bravīti । kintarhi ? sambandhamātram । taccāṅgāṅgitvenopakārakatayā mukhya- syaiva yūpasyāstīti kiṃ lakṣaṇayā ?
taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 728 )

yaccānantaryaṃ vājapeyasya saptadaśāratnitāsambandhārthamuktam, tadānantaryaṃ yūpe'pyaviśiṣṭam । yadāpi pradhānatvaṃ ṣaṣṭhīśrutiyogi- tvañca vājapeyasya pareṇa sambandhanimittamuktam, tadupakārakabhūta- yūpaśabde'pyaviruddhameva । tenāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ—pūrvapakṣe nirnimittameva yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇāvṛtto'bhyupetavyaḥ । siddhānte tu sarvameva padaṃ mukhyārthamiti । na caivaṃ sati vājapeyaviśiṣṭyūpānuvādena saptadaśāra- tnitāvidhāne viśiṣṭānuvādādvākyabhedaḥ, yūpamātroddeśena tadvidhāne yūpavadyāgamātrasambandha iti vācyam । yata uddiṣṭaviśeṣa vivakṣāyāṃ hi vākyabhedo bhavati, na tu viśiṣṭoddeśe । iha tu yadi vājape-
yoddeśena saptadaśāratnitā vidhīyate, tadā vājapeyasyetyuddeśāparyava- sānādārteriva haviṣā yūpena viśeṣaṇam । atha yūpoddeśena, tadā vājapeyasyetyananyagatiśabdopādānādvājapeyenaiva viśeṣaṇam । na hi yūpamātroddeśena saptadaśāratnitāvidhissambhavati । tena viśiṣṭoddeśe- nātra vākyabheda iti ।

idantviha vaktavyam—svarūpe kārye ca vopayuktamaṅgaṃ bhavati । tatra yūpasya prakṛtau vijñātotpattiprakāratvānna tatsvarūpe saptadaśāra- tnitopayujyate । nāpi paśuniyojanarūpe tatkārye, tasya saptadaśā- ratnitāvyatirekeṇa prakṛtaparimāṇenaiva siddheḥ । tenāpūrvopayoginī sā bhavantī vājapeyāpūrvopayoginī paśvapūrvopayoginī vā । tatra paśvapūrvopayoginīti kecit । nedaṃ yuktam; neha paśuyāgīyatva- puraskāreṇa yūpe saptadaśāratnitā vidhīyate, kintu “vājapeyasya” iti śrutirvājapeyaviśeṣite yūpe vājapeyayāgīyatvapuraskāreṇaiva । tena vājapeyāpūrvaprayuktaiva saptadaśāratnitā nāśrutapaśuyāgāpūrvaprayuktā । ato vājapeyāṅgameva । na ca vājapeyānaṅgatvādyūpasya na tadvāreṇa vājapeyaṅgātvamiti vācyam । yato'nupakāriṇi hi sthito nopakā- rīti na tadartha iti । tena yathānaṅgabhūtavatsāśritasya sānnāyyā- ṅgatvam, tathā saptadaśāratnitāyā apīti nānupapapannaṃ kiñcit ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-pradhāne vājapeye sākṣādyūpā-
bhāvādānarthakyādidaṃ vacanam yastadaṅgepu paśuyāgeṣu yūpastatraiva parimāṇaṃ vidadhātītyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamabhikramaṇādhikaraṇam ।
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prayājavākye śrūyate—“abhikrāmaṃ juhottyabhi- jityai” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ prayājeṣvevābhikramaṇam ? uta kṛtsne prakaraṇe ? iti । saṃskāradravyaguṇānāṃ viniyogaṃ nirū- pyedānīṃ yatkarmasambandhitvena śrūyamāṇamarthātsaṃskāratvaṃ pratipadyate, tat prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atra bhāṣyakāro vākyabhedena pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā ekavākyatvena siddhāntitavān । ayañca tasyābhisandhiḥ—abhikrāmamiti ṇamulayaṃ ktvāpratyayasamānārthaḥ । abhikramyābhikramya juhotīti । atra cābhikramaṇasya homārthatvaṃ pratīyate । na ca kriyāyāḥ kriyārthatvamamūrttatvātsambhavati ācamanāderiva । yattu kriyāyāṃ
karttṛdvāreṇa tatprayojanatvena tadartham । na caikasminvākye homaṃ prati guṇatvenākṣiptasya karturabhikramaṇaṃ prati prādhānyenānvayo bhavitumarhati, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । tena juhotipadādāhatyābhikramaṇaṃ kriyārthena prakaraṇena gṛhītaṃ satkarttṛdvāreṇa prākaraṇikasakalakarmārtham । na cātrāpi vākyabhedo doṣāya, vairūpyalakṣaṇavākyabhedasya pauruṣayatvāpādakatvena vibhāgalakṣaṇavākyabhedasyānatidoṣatvāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
chapter.head: bhāṣyakāramatena siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: siddhāntastu—syādetadevaṃ yadyanenaiva vākyenābhikramaṇasya karttṛsambandho vidhīyate । kintvaruṇaikahāyanīnyāyenoktahomānva- yinoḥ kartrabhikramaṇayoranyonyamupakāryopakārakatayānvayaḥ । śaknoti cāhavanīyasannidhāpanenābhikramaṇaṃ karturupakarttum । apekṣitaśca svakartturāhavanīyadeśasambandhaḥ । tena homoddeśena vidhīyamānamabhi- kramaṇaṃ sannidhivaśātprayājāṅgameveti ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatopakramaḥ
chapter.p:
tadayuktam; na hi dhātusambandhavihitasya ṇamulpratyayasya samabhivyāhṛtajuhotiparityāgena prayogaḥ sambhavati, asādhutvaprasa- ṅgāt । kiñca vibhinnasyāpyasya karttṛsambandho vā ? dhātusambandha eva vā ? na tāvatkartṛsambandhaḥ, tatsambandhiṇamulpratyayasya dhātu-
sambandhānuśāsanavirodhāt । nāpi dhātusambandhaḥ, tathā sati samabhivyāhṛtajuhotiparityāgakāraṇābhāvāt । tena pūrvapakṣastāva- danupapannaḥ । tathā siddhānto'pi nopapadyate । na hi prakaraṇātsa- rvārthasyābhikramaṇasya sannidhau prayājārthatvaṃ sambhavati, prakaraṇā- tsannidhedurbalatvāt । atha bhavatu sannidherasya prayājārthatvaṃ, tathāpi yasyaiva prayājasyānantaraṃ śrūyate tasyaivābhikramaṇamaṅgaṃ syānna tu sakalaprayājānām । kiñcaivaṃ sati rājasūyaprakaraṇagṛhītasya videvanāderapi sannidhiviśeṣādabhiṣecanāyāṅgatvaṃ syāt । ato yatkiñcidetaditi yathāvārttakamekavākyatvāparityāgenādhikaraṇaṃ varṇanīyam ।
chapter.head: vārtikakāramatena pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe “abhi- krāmaṃ juhoti” iti śrūyate । na cātra vākyakṛtaḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ pratīyate, yena dīkṣaṇīyāvāṅniyamavadviśeṣasambandho bhavet । na ca prayājasannidhireva niyāmaka iti vācyam । prakaraṇātsannidherdubala- tvāt । ‘ekasya sannidheraviśeṣito hetuḥ’ iti nyāyātsarvahomārtha- tvamevābhikramaṇasya । athocyeta—mā nāma bhūtsannidhānātpratyayā- rthatvam, prakaraṇantu bhaviṣyati । tathāhi—yathā śāstratvāviśeṣe'pi sāmānyaśāstrānniravakāśaṃ viśeṣaśāstraṃ balavat, tathā mahāprakaraṇā-
dapi avāntaraprakaraṇamiti prayājārthatvamevābhikramaṇasyeti । tadayuktam; avāntaraprakaraṇasyaivābhāvāt । kartavyasya hītikartavyatā- kāṅkṣālakṣaṇaṃ prakaraṇam । itikarttavyatākāṅkṣā ca sādhyasambandho- ttarakālīnā । prayājābhikramaṇabhāvanayostu sādhyākāṅkṣāyāṃ yathā prayājabhāvanā kratūpakāraṃ sādhyatayā gṛhṇāti, tathābhikramaṇabhāvanā- pyaṅgapradhānahomasambandhadvāreṇa kratūpakārakameva sādhyatayā gṛhṇātīti kratūpakārasādhyanirākāṅkṣatvānnābhikramaṇaṃ prayājetikarttavyatākāṅkṣayā prayājopakāraṃ sādhyatayā grahītumarhatīti nābhikramaṇa syāvāntarapraka raṇena prayājārthatvam । na ca krapūpakārakasādhyakalpanātaḥ prāgeva prayājabhāvanāyāḥ sāmānyena sādhyasambandhāditikarttavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāmavāntaraprakaraṇenābhikramaṇasambandho bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । yato yakṣānurūpo balirbhavati । tena sāmānyasādhyasambandhasya sāmānyākṣiptetikarttavyatānirākāṃkṣatvādabhikramaṇasvarūpetikarttavya- tāviśeṣāsambandhāditi । ataḥ karttṛguṇe'bhikramaṇe avāntaraprakara- ṇābhāvena prayājakarmāsambandhādvākyabhedaḥ । na ca prayājavākyenaika- vākyatā syāt, kintu prakṛtahomamātrārthataiveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhi- dhīyate—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ-bhavedevaṃ yadyavāntaraprakaraṇenābhikramaṇaṃ prayājāṅgaṃ
na bhavet । na cāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ nāsti, sandaṃśapāṭhasyānanyathā- siddhatvāt । sannidhimātraṃ hi yatra karttṛvacanasthāne nāntarīyakatayā na vidhikāritaṃ bhavatu tatra viśeṣakam, prayājasandamaśapāṭhastvadhyayana- vidhikāritatvātprayājārthatvamantareṇa homamātrārthatve nopapadyate । tasyānanyapaṭhitasyāpi vākyabalena homamātrārthatvasiddheḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 731)

yattūktam—prayājābhikramaṇa bhāvanayoḥ sādhyākāṅkṣāyāṃ yuga- padeva sādhyatvena kratūpakāragrahaṇāt prayājabhāvanetikarttavyatā- kāṅkṣāyāmabhikramaṇasya (na) prayājāṅgatvam । ataḥ kathamavāntarapraka- raṇamiti । tadayuktam; prayājasandaṃśādhyayanavaśenaivonnītaprayājāṅga- tvasyābhikramaṇasya pradhānasambandho bhavati । ataḥ siddhaṃ sandaṃśābhi- vyaktaprayājāvāntaraprakaraṇenābhikramaṇasya prayājārthatvamiti ।

atra prabhākareṇāvāntaraprakaraṇanirāsārthamidamuktam—kāryaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ । kāryaśca kṛtipradhānam । tasya ca viśeṣaḥ prakṛti- viśeṣādeva । kṛteśca viśeṣaḥ—kā kṛtiḥ, kasya kṛtiriti viṣayaniyojyābhyāmeva । sa ca viśeṣo viṣayasambhave'pi niyojyābhāvenādhikāravākyaṃ na kāryāntarapratipādakaṃ, kintu (?)
yaugikañca na kāryābhidhāyipadānāṃ vyaktivācitvādvyakti- vacanānāñca sannihitavyaktigāmitvādadhikāravākyāvagatakāryānu- vādenaiva prathamamāvirbhavati । taduktam—‘sannihite vidhau vidhirava- gamyamānaḥ sa eva tāvadagantubhucitaḥ’ ( pra. paṃ., pṛ.204. cau. saṃ. ) iti । tenānabhivyakteṣvevāṅgāpūrve/?/ṣu prathamaṃ yatkiñcitsannidhi- samāmnātamavirodhena saṃyuktaṃ tatsarvameva prayojanam । prayojaninā ca nirūpyaidasarthyamātreṇa pradhānavidhipratyayenānanvitamabhidhīyate । tadeva ca grāhakagrahaṇamityucyate । paścātsvarūpasāhityābhāvena kṣaṇikānāṃ sambhūyapradhānagatamahopakārajanānārthamutpatyapūrve kalpite kāryābhidhā- yividhiśabdasadbhāvātprayājādiviṣayakṛtisādhyameva kāryaṃ vidhi- śabdenābhidhīyate । niyojyāntarābhāvācca pradhānāpūrvīyaniyojya- viśeṣitaiva sā kṛtiriti niścīyate । tasyāntu daśāyāmabhi- vyakte'pyaṅgāpūrve yadi nāmāṅgāpūrvāṇāmitikarttavyatākāṅkṣā svarasa- vidhisiddhā bhavet tarhi grāhyābhāvānnāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ grāhakam । bhavati cāṅgāpūrvāṇāmitikarttavyatākāṅkṣā svarasasiddhā । tathā hi—na tāvadapūrvasvarūpa itikarttavyatākāṅkṣā, kintu kāryatvarūpe । tacca rūpaṃ pradhānakāryeṇa sahāṅgānāmekameva, tatkṛtereva tatparyanta- tvāt । na hi sādhyakṛtiḥ sādhanakṛtirna bhavati, yato na hi svargakṛteranyā yāgakṛtiḥ । tenādhikārāpūrvakṛterevāṅgāpūrvaparyantatvā-
nnāṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ pṛthagitikarttavyatākāṅkṣeti nāṅgāpūrvāṇāmavāntara- prakaraṇamiti ।
