tadayuktam; bhavatu tāvat sannihite vidhau vidhireva gamyamānaḥ sa eva tāvadavagantumucitaḥ’ iti samayaparikalpitaṃ prathamamavāntarāpūrvā- nabhidhānam । paścādabhivyaktantu prayojanāpūrvaṃ kimityabhikramaṇagrāhakaṃ na bhavati ? prathamamadhikārāpūrvagṛhītatvena grāhyābhāvāditi cet— naivam; vāṅniyamasyāpi dīkṣaṇīyāpūrveṇa grahaṇāprasaṅgāt । tatrā- pyanuvādāśaṅkayā prathamaṃ dīkṣaṇīyāpūrvānabhivyaktāvadhikārāpūrveṇa vāṅniyamagrahaṇasya vāviśiṣṭatvāt । atha tatra nyāyasampādanopa- sthitadīkṣaṇīyāpūrveṇa saha vākyasambhāvitasambandhavirodhādvāṅni- yamasya cādhikārāpūrvāgrahaṇam, atrāpi nyāyasampādanenopasthita- prayājāpūrveṇa sahāvāntaraprakaraṇasambhāvitasambandhavirodhādabhikra- maṇasyāpi na kāryagrahaṇam । evañca sati yathā tatra dīkṣaṇīyā- pūrvasya svārasiketikarttavyatākāṅkṣāvirahe'pi samabhivyāhāravaśā- dutthāpitākāṅkṣasya vāṅniyamagrahaṇam, tathātra prayājāpūrvasya svārasiketikarttavyatākāṅkṣāvirahe'pi sandaṃśāmnānavaśādutthāpitā- kāṅkṣyaivābhikramaṇagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sarvaṃ samānaṃ anyatra svakapolakalpitamithyāsamayasiddhāntābhiniveśāt । ataḥ siddha- mavāntaraprakaraṇenābhikramaṇasya prayājaśeṣatvamiti ।

prayojanam—pakṣāktam । sūtrantu sākāṅkṣaṃ prayājakarma, tena tadvākyamabhikramaṇavākyena sahaikavākyaṃ syāt । yato'bhikramaṇāpūrve- ṇāṅgajātenāsamāptam । tataścābhikramaṇātparastādapi śrutyādivihita- prayājānāmaṅgatvadarśanāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśamupavītādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ saptamāṣṭamayorbrāhmaṇānuvākayoḥ sāmadhenī- kalpāḥ । navame nividaḥ । daśame kāmyāḥ sāmidhenīkalpāḥ— idaṅkāmasyaitāvatīranubrūyādidaṅkāmasyaitāvatīriti । ekādaśe yajño- pavītamāmnātam—“upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute” iti । tatra sandehaḥ-kiṃ sāmidhenīrevānubruvatopavyātavyam ? uta prakaraṇe sarvāneva padārthānanutiṣṭhatopavyātavyam ? iti । avāntaraprakaraṇasya sthitasyedānīṃ parimāṇaṃ nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—ubhayākāṅkṣālakṣaṇaṃ prakara-
ṇam । pradhānasya cetikarttavyatākāṅkṣasya sandaṃśe'śrutānāñca sādhyākāṅkṣiṇāmapi samakālameva karaṇopakārasādhyasambandhenobhayā- kāṅkṣāyā abhāvānnāvāntaraprakaraṇam । yathā prayājāvāntarasandaṃśa- gṛhītenāpyayogyatayā na pradhānopakāraḥ prathamaṃ sādhyatayā gṛhyate । yato na hyupavītaṃ nāmārthāntaram, kintu vāsovinyāsarūpam । tacca parispandopayuktam । na ca pradhānasya parispandarūpatvam, uddeśatyā- garūpatvāt । tadyadi sannihitaṃ parispandasākāṅkṣaṃ karma na syāt, tadayogyenāpi prakṛtapradhānena sambadhyate tadā ānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena parispandarūpeṣvaṅgeṣu sambadhyetāpi । asti tvavāntaraprakaraṇābhivya- ktagrāhakībhāvamavāntaraprakaraṇenaiva sannidhāpitaṃ spandarūpatvena yogyaṃ sāmadhenyanuvacanameva । tena sandaṃśābhāve'pi sandaṃśaphalasyobhayākā- ṅkṣālakṣaṇasya vidyamānatvātsannihitamupavītamavāntaraprakaraṇenānuvacane- naiva sambadhyate ।

nanvagnisamindhanaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭameva sāmadhenīkāryam । tatra kathaṃ- bhāvākāṅkṣāyāṃ vivakṣitaprayatnatālvādisaṃyogādi dṛṣṭameva kathaṃ- bhāvākāṅkṣāpūrvakaṃ sambadhyate । kathambhāvākāṅkṣā ca prakaraṇam । atastadabhāvātkathamavāntaraprakaraṇaṃ sāmidhenīnāmiti । ucyate— satyamevam, tathāpi agnisamindhanaprakāśanasyānyenāpi siddherniya- mādṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyanuvartata evākāṅkṣā । tasmādastyavāntarapraka-
raṇam । nanu tathāpi nivitpadavyavāyena sāmidhenīprakaraṇasyopavītaṃ yāvadananuvṛtteḥ kathamupavītasyāvāntaraprakaraṇasannidhāpitānuvacanasamba- ndhaḥ ? ucyate—na hyasambandhamātraṃ prakaraṇavicchedakaṃ bhavati । pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrāṇāmapi darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇavicchedakatvaprasa- ṅgāt । atha tatra parastādapi darśapūrṇamāsānuvṛtterasti prakaraṇam, tarhyatrāpi sāmidhenyanuvṛtternānupapannam । athavā nividāmapi sandaṃśena sāmidhenyanuvacanāṅgatvameva । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 733)
tenopavītasya sāmidhenyanuvacanāṅgatvātsāmidhenīrevānubruvāṇa- syopavyānamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi nivitpadavyavahitaṃ sāmidhenī- prakaraṇamanuvarttate । tāvaddhi prakaraṇamanuvartate, yāvadviniyogārhaṃ paśyati । asaṃyuktañca prakaraṇena viniyujyate । iha ca nivitpadāni “deveddho manviddha” ityevamādīni । sāmidhenī ca liṅgenāgnisamindhane viniyujyante । ato na tāvadeṣāṃ sāmidhenyanuvacanāṅgatvam । nāpi pūṣādyanumantraṇavadanaṅgasyāpi
prakaraṇāvicchedakatvam । tataḥ paraṃ sāmidhenyanuvacanasya śrutyādi- bhiraṅgāntaravidhānādarśanāt । darśapūrṇamāsayoranaṅgānāmapi pūṣā- dyanumantraṇamantrāṇāṃ parastādapi darśapūrṇamāsāṅgavidhānadarśanā- dbhavatu prakaraṇāvicchedakatvam, sāmidhenyanuvacanasya śrutyādibhi- raṅgantarāvidhānāt iha na tatheti vaipamyam । taduktam—

lg.l: na hi kāmyaiḥ punaḥkalpaiḥ sandhātuṃ sā hi śakyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 734)

nanu yadi vicchinnaṃ sāmidhenīprakaraṇam, tadā daśame brāhmaṇānuvāke “ekaviṃśatimanubrūyāt pratiṣṭhākāmasya” ityādīnāṃ kāmyasāmidhenīkalpānāṃ prakriyāśrayābhāvātkathaṃ guṇaphalasambandha- vidhānam ? atha vākyenaivāśrayo vidhīyate, tadā vidheyasaṅkhyāḥ phalasambandhakaraṇe āśrayasambandhakaraṇe ca vākyaṃ bhidyeteti । ucyate—syādevam, yadyekaviṃśativākyāderguṇātphalaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu revatīvāravantīyavatsaṃkhyāviśiṣṭamanuvacanāntaramevaitat phale vidhīyate । tatkathamityākāṅkṣāyāmanubrūyāditi śabdasāmānyātsaṃkhyāsambandhācca kratvarthasāmidhenyanuvacanavaditi gamyate । sāmidhenīnāmanyeṣāñca dharmāṇāmatideśātprāptiḥ ।

nanūpakārapṛṣṭhabhāvenātideśo guṇabhūtānāmeva bhavati, teṣāmevo- pakārakatvāt । atra ca dvitīyāśrutyā sāmidhenīnāṃ prādhānyamava-
gamyate, anuvacanasyaiva guṇabhāvaḥ । ataḥ kathaṃ pradhānabhūtānāṃ sāmidhenīnāmatideśa iti । dvirūpāśca khalu sāmidhenyaḥ—anuvacanaṃ prati sāmidhenīprakāśanakāryāpekṣayā pradhānabhūtāḥ, anuvacanasvarūpā- pekṣayā guṇa bhūtāśca । tatra agnisamindhanaprakāśakatvāt tathābhūtameva kāryāpekṣayā prādhānyaṃ dvitīyayā pratipādyate । anuvacanasvarūpa- sidhyarthaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ guṇatvameva । “ekaviṃśatimanubrūyātpratiṣṭhā- kāmasya” ityatra tu kāmyaprayoge'nuvacanaṃ svarūpasidhyarthameveti- karttavyatākāṅkṣyā sāmidhenyatideśānnānupapannam । na ca vācyam— evaṃ sati darśapūrṇamāsāgṛhītatvāddarśa pūrṇamāsaprayogādbahireva kāmyā- nāṃ prayogassyāditi । yato dārśapūrṇamāsikanigadānāmanūdyamā- natvena hyanuvacanatvam । tena kratorvahiḥ prayoge'nuvacanatvameva na syāt । taduktam—

lg.l: na tu kratuprayuktatvātsvātantrye sati labhyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ.735

na caivaṃ sati sannidhānaviśeṣātkābhyasāmidhenyanuvacanāṅga- tvamevopavītasyāstu, kathaṃ sarvārthatvamiti vācyam । yato'sya vikṛtitvenātidiṣṭaprāptaprākṛtadharmanirākāṅkṣasya prakaraṇātsannidhānādvā dharmagrāhakatvaṃ vaktavyam । sannidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīyaḥ ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 736)
ataḥ siddhaṃ mahāprakaraṇenopavītasya sarvārthatvamiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—upavīte sāmidhenyarthatva- sarvārthatvasandehe nivitpadena sāmidhenyanuvacanasannidhāpakaprakaraṇavya- vāyādupavītavākyasya sāmidhenyanuvacanavākyādbhedaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ vāraṇādīnāṃ sarvayajñārthatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
agnyādheye vāraṇādīni pātrāṇyahomārthāni homārthāni ca śrūyante “tasmādvāraṇo vai yajñāvacaraḥ syāt na tvetena juhuyāt । vaikaṅkato yajñāvacarasssājjuhuyādevaitena” iti । na ca vāraṇavaikaṅka- tānāṃ pātrāṇāmagnyādheyena sambandhaḥ । kutaḥ ? yajñāvacaravacanāt । yajñasyaitāni pātrāṇi vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā bhavanti । tatraiṣa sandehaḥ—vāraṇādīni pātrāṇi kiṃ pavamāneṣṭiṣu niviśante ?
uta darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu sarvayajñeṣu ? iti । prasaṅgāgataṃ vicāradvayaṃ- parisamāpyedānīmānarthakyatadaṅganyāyasyāpavādaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhiprāyaḥ—“vāraṇo vai yajñāvacaraḥ” i- tyādhānaprakaraṇe yadyapi vāraṇādīni pātrāṇi śrūyante, tathāpyā- dhānasya sākṣādayajñarūpatvādyajñāvacara iti vākyena yajñasambandhitvena pratīyamānānyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyenādhānāṅgabhūteṣu pavamāneṣṭiṣu yajñarū- peṣu niviśanta iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi pavamāneṣṭayo'pyādhānāṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ । na tvevam, kintu yathādhānaṃ sākṣādagnyarthaṃ tathā pavamāneṣṭayo'pi । na ca samapradhāneṣvaṅgāṅgibhāvo'sti, yenānarthakyatadaṅganyāyo bhavet । tasmādvākyabalena sarvayajñasambandha eva bhavedvāraṇādipātrāṇāmiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—guṇānāmagniguṇānāmā- dhānapavamānahaviṣāṃ pārārthyātparasparamasambandhaḥ syātsamatvāditi ।।

tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṃ vārtikakārapādā nānumanyante । ayañca teṣāmabhisandhiḥ—“vājapeyasya yūpaḥ” ityatra saptadaśā- ratnitāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā vājapeyasambandhāvagamādyuktamānarthakyatadaṅganyāya- viṣayatvam । iha tu vāraṇādipātrāṇāṃ virodhisaṃyuktānāmahīna-
yuktadvādaśopasattāyā iva prakaraṇenāgrahaṇādvākyabalenotkarṣātsa- kalayajñārthatvameva yuktam । tenādhānasambandhasyaivājñātatvātsatyapyā- dhānāṅgatve pavamāneṣṭīnāmānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena sanniveśāsambha- vātpūrvapakṣastāvadaśobhanaḥ । tathā pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ sākṣādagnyarthatve pramāṇābhāvāt ‘phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam’ iti nyāyenā- dhānārthatvasyaiva vyavasthitatvādanutkarṣātsakalayajñārthatvasiddhaye sama- prādhānyasiddhānto'pi nopapanna iti ।

atraike samādhānamevamabhidadhati—jyotiṣṭomasannidhiśrutānāma- pyupasaddvādaśatvādīnāmahīnādisamabhivyāhṛtānāṃ sarvathā sambandhā- bhāvādbhavatūtkarṣaḥ, tadaṅgabhūtānāmapyahīnādīnāmabhāvāt । iha tvādhānāṅgabhūtānāṃ pavamāneṣṭīnāmeva vidyamānatvāttatsambandhenaiva yajñāvacaratopapatterna vāraṇādīnāṃ sarvayajñārthatvam । na ca vājapeyasye- tivat ṣaṣṭhyabhāvenādhānasambandhābhāvānnemānyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyavi- ṣaya iti vaktavyam । yato na hi tatrāpi ṣaṣṭhībalena saptadaśāratni- tāyā vājapeyasambandhaḥ । tathā sati vājapeyasambandhe yūpasambandhe ca vidhīyamāne parimāṇasya vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt, kintu vāja- peyasannidhipāṭhādarthaprāptameva vājapeyasambandhamanuvadati ṣaṣṭhī । tathātrāpyādhānasannidhipāṭha eva svārthavatvāya vāraṇādipātrā- ṇāmapyādhānārthatvaṃ pratipādayiṣyatīti nānupapannam । na ca pava-
māneṣṭīnāṃ yāgarūpāṅgābhāvādyāgarūpāṅgayuktasya cābhidheyatvādayajña- tvam, tathā ca sati yajñāvacaratvena śrutānāṃ pātrāṇāmādhāna- vatpavamāneṣṭisambandhābhāvādutkarṣa eva prāpnotīti vācyam । yata ‘iṣṭiṣu darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ’ iti pavamāneṣṭīnāmapi darśapūrṇamāsavikāra- tvenātidiṣṭaprayājādyaṅgaprāpteryajñatvameva ।

na ca pavamāneṣṭīnāmaṅgatvādaṅgānāñcetikarttavyatākāṅkṣābhāvā- tprayājādyanatideśa iti vācyam । svārasikākāṅkṣābhāve'pi liṅgadarśanotthāpitākāṅkṣāvaśādevātideśasiddheḥ । evaṃ hyaruṇaparā- śaraśākhābrāhmaṇe śrūyate'nuvādasarūpam—“ye darśapūrṇamāsayorddharmāḥ, te sarveṣṭīnāmagnīṣomīyasya ca” iti । atra ca sarveṣṭisambandhena darśapūrṇamāsadharmānuvādāttadaṅgateti । yathā pavamāneṣṭīnāmatideśena darśapūrṇamāsadharmaprāptirasti, tathā pavamāneṣṭiṣveva śrūyate— “vṛdhanvānāgneyaḥ kāryaḥ pāvakavān saumyaḥ” iti । anena cāgneya- saumyājyabhāgānuvādena vṛdhanvatpāvakavatvavidhānaṃ sambhavati, yadyati- deśenātrājyabhāgaprāptirasti । tadubhābhyāmeva liṅgadarśanābhyāmā- kāṅkṣotthāpanādatideśasiddheḥ pūrvapakṣastāvacchobhanaḥ ।

tathā siddhāntabhaṅgo'pi na saṅgacchate । ādhānasyeva pavamāne- ṣṭīnāmapi sākṣādagnyarthatvāt । nanvādhānasyaiva vākyasamadhigamya- m । na tāvatpavamāneṣṭīnāmagnyarthatvaṃ grāhakagrahaṇena vaktavyam ।
grāhakagrahaṇañca prayojanaprayojanibhāvenādhikāraniyogenānvitābhidhā- narūpam । na cāgniradhikārarūpaḥ । tena grāhakagrahaṇābhāvātkuto niṣpramāṇakaṃ pavamāneṣṭīnāmagnyarthatvam ? kutastarāñca sākṣāttvamiti । maivam; prayojanarūpaṃ hi grāhakamiti vyutpattiḥ । adhikāraniyoga- syāpi grāhakatvaṃ nādhikārayogatvena, taccāgnerapyaviśiṣṭam । “yadāha- vanīye juhoti” iti homasādhanatvena prayojanarūpasya tasya dvitīyāva- bodhitasādhyarūpatvāt, tena “agnīn” iti dvitīyāntamagnipadameva sannidhisamāmnātāgniḥ pavamāneṣṭibhirapyanvitaṃ svārthamabhidhatte । prayājādibhiriva darśapūrṇamāsādhikārāpūrvaṃ liṅśabda iti । athavā pavamāneṣṭyapūrvameva svaviṣayānuṣṭhānasiddhyarthaṃ sannidhisamāmnātārtha- vatvātprayojanavadagnyarthatvameva svaviṣayasyākṣipatīti aupādānikameva tāsāmagnyarthatvamiti ।

na caivaṃ satyutpattiśiṣṭādhānāvarodhātphalavatsannidhinyāyena prayājādivadādhānāṅgatvameveti vācyam । upadeśātideśasampratipattyā sākṣāttvasyaiva pratīyamānatvāt । upadeśadaśāyāṃ hi grāhakagrahaṇena vā upādānena vā pavamāneṣṭīnāmagniḥ sādhyabhūta ityavagate kiṃ prayājādivatsādhanāṅgatayā pāramparyeṇa ? ādhānavadeva vā sākṣāt ? iti sandehe darśapūrṇamāsavikṛtitvenāsāṃ tadaṅgagrāhitvāt, tatra ca “yadāhavanīye juhoti” iti sākṣātsambandhāvagateḥ ihāpi
homarūpatvādidānīṃ sākṣātsambandhādādhānasyaivāgnisādhyatvāt । prayājādīnāṃ tvatideśato'pi sākṣāttvānavagaterutpattiśiṣṭāgneyāvaruddhe- 'dhikārāpūrve bhavatu ‘phalavatsānnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam’ iti nyāya- viṣayatvam, na tviha tatheti vaiṣamyam ।

nanūpadeśena balavatātideśanirapekṣeṇa phalavatsanidhinyāyena prayājādivat pāramparyamasandigdhameva prathamamavagataṃ, na tu sa- ndigdham । ataḥ kathamupadeśaviparītātideśapravṛttiriti । maivam; sarvatraiva vaikṛtopadeśasyātideśasāpekṣasyaiva viśeṣaviṣayatvāt । anyathā “sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ” ityatrāpyupadeśabalī- yastvena saurye śūdrādisādhāraṇabrahmavarcasakāmādhikāraprasaṅgaḥ । atha tatrātidiṣṭadārśapūrṇamāsikāhavanīyādyaṅgānurodhenādhikāraviśeṣanirṇa- yaḥ, tathātrāpyatideśaprāptasākṣādagnisambandhānurodhena pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ sākṣādagnisādhyakatvameva nirṇīyata eveti nānupapannam । na ca vācyam—bhavatu sāmānyopadeśasyātideśato viśeṣaviṣayatvamavi- rodhāt, iha tūpadeśataḥ pavamāneṣṭiṃ prati agneḥ pradhānye nirūpite kathaṃ tadvirodhādiha guṇatvenātideśaḥ ? tadabhāve ca kathamupadeśātideśa- sampratipatyā sākṣāttvam ? iti । yato hyatrāgnerādhānapavamāneṣṭija- nyātiśayavato'tideśātpavamāneṣṭiguṇatvaṃ pareṇāpyabhyupagamyate, asa- mbhavādeva । kintvādhānajanyātiśayavata eva ।
tathācoktam—

lg.l: yadā tvetā vidhīyante prakṛtau santi no tadā ।

chapter.p: tathābhūtasya cāgneḥ pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ homarūpatvenādhikaraṇakāraka- tayā guṇatve'pi pavamāneṣṭijanyātiśayaśālitayā prādhānyamavi- ruddhameva । na hi bhāvanāyā dhātvarthaniṣpādakatayā guṇatve'pi phalabhāvanātvena prādhānyaṃ virudhyate । puruṣasya vā yāgaṃ prati karttṛtvabhāktṛtvābhyāṃ guṇapradhānatve virudhyete । athavā bhavatūpa- deśalabdhaprādhānyasya guṇatvavirodhaḥ, tathāpyasambhavaḥ । ‘tuṣārava- ttāvatsamparihīyatām’ iti nyāyena virodhiguṇaparityāgenāpi sā- kṣāttvasvīkāro nānupapannaḥ । na hi “grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” ityatrā sambhavasvīkārasyaikatvasyāvivakṣāyāṃ sambhavino'pi karmatvasyāvi- vakṣā yuktā ।

nanu prākṛtapadārthānāṃ vaikṛtāpūrvaguṇatvenaivātideśaḥ । atathā- bhūtasya ca guṇatvābhāve satyatideśasyābhāvātkathamatideśataḥ sākṣā- ttvamiti । naivam; bhavedevaṃ yadi pratipadārthanirūpaṇenātideśapravṛttiḥ, kintu karaṇopakārajanakapadārthasambandhiviṣayo'sau । tatra cāvarja- nīyatayā so'pi prāpta eva । tathācābhāṇako'pyatra lokasya dṛśyate । tenātideśalabdhatve'pyasambhaviguṇatvaparityāgena sākṣā-
tsvīkāro yukta eveti siddhaṃ samaprādhānyamādhānapavamānahaviṣāmiti । na caivaṃ sati nirapekṣavidhivihitatvenādhānapavamānahaviṣāṃ vikalpa iti vaktavyam । yato nirapekṣavidhivihitānāṃ dvedhā vikalpo bhavati—yathā pramāṇāntarāvagataṃ pratyekakāryajanakatayā dṛṣṭārthānāṃ vrīhiyavānām, samuccayāsambhavenā dṛṣṭārthānāṃ vā yathā ṣoḍaśigrahaṇā- grahaṇādīnām । tatra na tāvadatra pramāṇāntarāvagataṃ pratyekakāryatvam, aṣṭārthatvāt । nāpi samuccayāsambhavo'pi, ekāśrayavidhiniṣedhā- bhāvāt । tenātra yūpadharmāṇāmiva takṣaṇacchedanādīnāmadṛṣṭārthatvāya nirapekṣavidhivihitatve'pi samuccaya eveti nānupapannam । tadyajñasaṃyo- go'gnisannidhiyuktānāṃ śrutānāṃ vāraṇādipātrāṇāmutkarpamagnisambandha- nirvāhānusandhāne tatsādhanībhūtasyāpyayajñatvātsādhanāṅgapavamāneṣṭisa- mbandhena pūrvapakṣoktotkarṣavidhyutpādanāya nirākaraṇīyam । samaprā- dhānye tu agnisādhanībhūtapavamāneṣṭisambandhenaiva sutarāmagnisambandho- papatteḥ samaprādhānyameva hi tasyaiveti (?) devadānakalpitabhāṣyā- kṣarasyaiva bhāṣitam । sa khalvevamāha—agnyādheye vāraṇādi- pātrāṇi śrūyante । tenādhānasādhyasaṃskārārthatvameva pātrāṇāmavaga- myate, na tvagnimātrārthatvam । nāpi pavamāneṣṭijanyaṃ saṃskārārthatvam । na cādhānasambandhe lāghavam । tenādhānāṅgatvanirāsaḥ pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ vāraṇādipātrotkarṣasiddhaye yukta eveti na kiñcidanupapannamiti ।

atrocyate—yattāvatpūrvapakṣabhaṅgasamādhānārthaṃ saptadaśatvavaidha- rmyamuktam, tadvaidharmyamātraṃ viśeṣānāpādakatvāt । tathāhi—kimanena vaidharmyeṇa vāraṇādipātrāṇāmānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena pavamāneṣṭinive- śo'bhimataḥ ? vākyavaśena vā ? na tāvatpūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, vākyāvagata- pradhānasambandhanirvāhāya khalvaṅgāvataraṇamānarthakyataṅganyāyena । na ceha saptadaśāratnitāyā iva vāraṇādipātrāṇāmādhānasambandha- pratipādakaṃ kiñcidvākyamasti । na ca vākyena yajñasaṃyogināṃ vāra- ṇādipātrāṇāmayajñabhūtādhānasambandhapratipādakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sambhavati । ‘asaṃyuktaṃ prakaraṇāditikarttavyatārthitvāt’ iti prakaraṇasya śrutili- ṅgavākyāsaṃyuktaviṣayatvāt । vākyena tu saṃyuktasyāpi sannidhānātpra- dhānāpūrvīyatve dīkṣaṇīyāvāṅniyamasyāpi pradhānāpūrvīyatvaprasaṅgāt । tathā sati tasyāpyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyāviṣayatvāpatteḥ na tāvadāna- rthakyatadaṅganyāyenāṅganiveśaḥ । na ca vākyabalenaiva vāraṇādipātrāṇāṃ pavamāneṣṭiniveśaḥ, vākyasya yajñapātrasādhāraṇatvāt । na ca “vrīhibhiryajeta” itivatsannidhānādapi yāgaviśeṣāvagamaḥ, pava- māneṣṭisannidhāvaśrutatvāt । taduktam‘agnyādheye śrūyante’ iti ।

na cādhānasannidhānādhyayanameva prayojanavattvāya vāraṇādipā- trāṇāṃ tadaṅgabhūtayajñarūpapavamāneṣṭisambandhamāpādayati । itarathā niṣpra- yojanastatsannidhirūpeṇānuvāda iti vācyam । vaiparītyaparicchedāt ।
tathāhi—dvedhā khalvaṅgamātrasambandho dharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ । sandaṃśena vā, yathā-abhikramaṇādayaḥ prayājasya । aṅgābhidhāyakaśabdaviśeṣa- vaśena vā, yathā—dīkṣaṇīyādīnāṃ vāṅniyamādayaḥ । tadatra pātrāṇāṃ pavamāneṣṭimātrāṅgatve yadetatsandaṃśānadhyayanaṃ tadabhidhāya- kaviśeṣaśabdānabhidhānaṃ vā tadanupapannaṃ, pātrāṇāmatatsambandhameva pratipādayati । ādhānasannidhipāṭhastu sakalayajñasādhāraṇatvena yatra kutracitpaṭhanīyasyānārabhyavāde vā nāsti anyaprakaraṇapāṭhe vā kaścidviśeṣaḥ । anyaprakaraṇapāṭenopasaddvādaśatvādīnāṃ prakaraṇāntara- sambandhasya dṛṣṭatvāt । na ca tatrāṅgeṣvapyahīnābhāvaḥ kāraṇam, uktanyāyenāṅgasadbhāvāsadbhāvayorakāraṇatvāt । etena yaduktam— vājapeye'pyanuvādikā ṣaṣṭhīti, tadapi nirastam । ṣaṣṭhyabhāve hyanenaiva nyāyena virodhisaṃyuktāyāḥ saptadaśāratnitāyāḥ prakaraṇe vājapeya- sambandhānavagamāt yūpāvyabhicāropasthitasakalapaśuyāgasādhāraṇa- tvādapyutkarṣa eva prasajyate ।

na caivaṃ sati vājapeyasambandhavidhāne yūpasambandhavidhāne ca vākyabheda iti vācyam । saptadaśāratnitāyā yūpaviśeṣaṇatayā vājapeyāpūrvasambandhamātrajñāpanāt । na ca tathāpyuddiśyamānaviśe- ṣaṇavivakṣayā vākyabheda iti vācyam । yato yatroddiṣṭasya viśeṣa- ṇānvayastatraiva viśiṣṭoddeśena vākyabhedaḥ । yathā “yasyobhayaṃ havi-
rārtimārcchet” ityatra । taduktam—‘mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇam’ iti । tatra yathā kevalārttigamanasya yatkiñcidāśrayasya nityatvena naimittikeṣṭāvuddeśyatvāsahatvena havirviśeṣitasyaivoddeśyatvam, tathā kevalasya vājapeyasyāpi saptadaśāratnirūpaparimāṇaviśeṣavidhāvuddeśya- tvāsambhavādyūpaviśeṣitasyaivoddeśyatvamiti । na caivaṃ sati saurya- sannidhiśrutasya kṛṣṇalahomasyāpi vākyabalena sakalaprayājasambandhaḥ prāpnotīti vācyam । anuvādānāṃ sannihitagāmitvāt । prayājānu- vādena vidhīyamāno'tra kṛṣṇalahomaḥ prakṛtivatpadasannidhāpitaprayājā- nuvādenaṃ caritārtho na sakalaprayājopasarpaṇaṃ sahate ।

na ca vācyam—prakṛtivacchabdena sauryayāgasannidhiriva prayā- jānāṃ na kṛṣṇalahomasannidhiḥ । tena yathātrādhānasannidhisambandhe- 'pi pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ na vāraṇādipātraniveśaḥ, tathātrāpīti । yataḥ prakṛtivacchabdenātra prayājānāṃ sauryasannidhiḥ kalpanīyaḥ । sa ca prakaraṇāmnānātprayājānuvādasahitakṛṣṇalahomānurodhena tathābhūta eva kalpyate, yathā kṛṣṇalahomavidhānayogya eva bhavati । pavamāneṣṭīnāntu vāraṇādipātravyavadhānasya pratyakṣasiddhatvenākalpanīyatvādvaiṣamyamiti na kiñcidanupapannam । ataḥ pūrvapakṣasamādhānaṃ tāvadasamādhānameveti ।

tathā siddhāntasamādhānamapi yatkiñcideva । pavamāneṣṭeḥ grāhaka- grahaṇena upādānena vā agnyarthatve'pyutpattivākyaśiṣṭādhānāvaruddhe
tasmin ‘phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam’ iti nyāyena pāramparyasyaiva siddhatvāt । nanu samāptavaikṛtopadeśānāmatideśamapekṣamāṇānāmeva viśeṣaviṣayatvātprathamamagnyarthatve'vagate paścādupadeśātideśasampratipatyā sākṣāttvanirṇaya ityuktam । ataḥ kathamupadeśataḥ pāramparyam ? naivam, yatropadeśena vinigamanāyāṃ hetussādhāraṇassyāt, tatrā- tideśasāpekṣasyaiva brahmavarcasakāmādau viśeṣaviṣayatvam । iha tūpa- deśasyaiva phalavatsannidhinyāyasahakṛtasya prayājādivatpāramparyasādha- natvaviśeṣaviṣayatvānna durbalātideśāttadvirodhisākṣāttvapratītissa- mbhavati । na hi prayājānāmatideśataḥ sākṣāttvānavagatiḥ pārampa- ryakāraṇam । tathā satyatideśataḥ pāramparyānavagateḥ sākṣātvasyāpi prasaṅgāt । atha tatra phalavatsannidhinyāyasaha kṛtasyaivopadeśasya pāramparyapratipādakatvam, tadatrāpi samānamiti nānupapannam । bhavatu vātideśāpekṣaiva samastavaikṛtopadeśapravṛttiḥ, tathāpi nātrāti- deśataḥ sākṣāttvamavagantuṃ śakyate, virodhāt । upadeśasya hyagniḥ sāmyabhūtaḥ prādhānyenāvagamyate । atideśe copakāradvāreṇa padārtha- prāptirbhavantī guṇatvenaiva bhavati । ataḥ kathaṃ guṇa bhūtāgnisambandha- matideśalabdhaṃ sākṣāttvaṃ pradhānabhūtāgnisambandhamanubhavitumutsahate । na ca sambhavituṃ yāvattāvatsamparihīyatāmiti guṇatvaparityāgena sākṣā- ttvasvīkāra iti vācyam । vikalpāsahatvāt । tatra yadā pavamāna-
janyātiśayavato guṇatvāsambhavaḥ, tadā tathābhūtasya guṇatvāsambha- venātideśasyāpyasambhavātkathaṃ tadanārūḍhaniṣkṛṣṭasākṣātvātideśaḥ ? “grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” ityatra yathābhūtagrahāprāptau satyāṃ kiñcidvivakṣita- miti śakyamabhidhātum । nanu grahasyāprāptau yattuṣārāpaharaṇa- nyāyenāvarjanīyatayā tathābhūtasyaivāhavanīyasyātideśa ityuktam, vikṛtyupakārānarhasya yadetadupakārakatvavijñānaṃ tatkiṃ bhrāntasyā- bhrāntasya vā ? na tāvadbhrāntaṃ prati vicāraḥ sambhavati । na cābhrāntasyāpyevaṃvidhaṃ vijñānaṃ sambhavati । atha sambhavati, tadā paścādapi na guṇatvaparityāga iti kathaṃ tasya pradhānībhūtāgni- sambandhaḥ (?) ṣaḍosya tu yūpapraviṣṭasya bhrāntyāpaharaṇaṃ sambhavatyeve- ti bhrāntabhāṣitameveti ।

atha kevalādhānajanyātiśayavato haviḥprakṣepādhārakāraṇatvena guṇatvasambhavāttathābhūtasyaivātideśatastathābhūtasya prakṛtāviva sākṣā- tvasyāpyavirodhāt । tathāpi na sādhyabhūtāgnisambandhaḥ sākṣāttva- syeti । ato nopadeśātideśasampratipatyāgneḥ sākṣātpavamāneṣṭi- sādhyatvam । tena yadetaduktam—bhāvanāvatpuruṣavaccaikasyāgnerekatra guṇapradhānāvirodha iti taṃ pratyanīkamapi (?) nākalitamevetyalamagni- bhirati । kiñca samaprādhānye satyādhānapavamāneṣṭīnāṃ vikalpo'pi durnivāra eva । na cādṛṣṭārthānāṃ ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavadvidhiniṣedhā-
bhāvātsamuccaya eveti vaktavyam । ekaprayogavacanaparigṛhītānāma- dṛṣṭārthānāṃ vidhiniṣedhakṛta eva vikalpaḥ । tadabhāve punaradṛṣṭārthānāṃ parasparanirapekṣasādhanabhāvāpannānāṃ samuccayakāraṇābhāvādvikalpo durni- vāra eva । itarathā pṛthagadhikāravatāmapyekasvargasādhanānāṃ samu- ccayaprasaṅgāt । na ca chedanatakṣaṇādīnāmivātraikaṃ prayogavacana- manugrāhakamupalabhāmahe ।

nanu svarūpe kārye vopayuktamaṅgaṃ bhavati । na ca pavamāneṣṭīnā- matra nimittarūpādhānasvarūpotpattyupayogitvam, nāpyagnigatādhānajanya- saṃskāraniṣpatyupayogitvam । udīcyāṅgatvena pavamāneṣṭīnāmādhāna- janyasaṃskārasyāgratayā ca siddhatvāt । tenāṅgatvābhāvātsannidherau- padeśikameva sākṣātvam । tataḥ samaprādhānyameveti । ucyate— bhavedevaṃ yadi pavamāneṣṭīnāmādhānakāryopayogo na syāt । dvividhaṃ hi kāryam-avyavahitaṃ vyavahitañca । tatrāvyavahitakāryopayogāsa- mbhave'pi yathā prayājādīnāmāgneyādyutpattyapūrvajanyaparamāpūrvarūpakāryo- payogitvam, tathehāpyādhānajanyāhavanīyākhyasaṃskārotpattyupayogo bhaviṣyatīti kimanupapannam ? ataḥ pavamāneṣṭītyuktam । pavamāneṣṭī- nāmādhānāṅgatve ādhānajanyasyātiśayasya pavamāneṣṭisāpekṣatvātpa- vamāneṣṭīnāñca pavamāneṣṭiṣveva (?) nirdeśādbhaṭṭamate pavamāneṣṭiṣvagnīnā- matideśa eva na syāt । samaprādhānye tvādhānamātrasaṃkṛtasyāgnerati-
deśopapatteḥ samaprādhānyamiti, tadapi pavamāneṣṭīnāmādhānajanyātiśa- yātiriktāhavanīyarūpakāryopayogitvādeva nirākṛtaṃ veditavyam । yātiriktāhavanīyarūpakāryopayogitvādeva nirākṛtaṃ veditavyam ।

nanu sarvatra samabhivyāhṛtadhātvarthasyāvyavahitakarmagocaratvaṃ dvitī- yāvibhakteravagatam, tatkathamādhānajanyasaṃskāravyavahitāhavanīyaviṣaya- tvam ? āgneyādīnāntu bhavatyādipratipādyabhāvanākarmaṇi phalāpūrva- vyavadhānenāpi karaṇatvopapattervaiyarthyamiti, tadayuktam; pareṇāpyavaśyaṃ bhāvanākarmaṇyevāgnīniti dvitīyāsvīkārāt । tathāhi—pavamāneṣṭī- nāmagyarthatvaṃ grāhakagrahaṇena vā upādānena vā vaktavyam । na ca tadubhayamapi dhātvarthakarpaṇyupapadyate, prayojanaprayojanibhāvenānvaya- syāsambhavaparāhatatvāt । na hyādhānajanyasaṃskārasya kvacidvinaniyo- gābhāvātprayojanatvaṃ sambhavati । “yadāhavanāye juhoti” ityāhava- nīyasyaiva viniyogāt । na cāsyāhavanīyatvena viniyuktasyā- dhānaikajanyatvena pavamāneṣṭīnāmananvaya iti vācyam । anāhavanīyatve- 'pi tasyāhavanīyotpatyupayogitvena prayojanatvāt । janyātiśayābhi- matasyāhavanīyotpattiyogitvāttena rūpeṇa tasyaiva sādhyatvamapītītareta- rāśrayapraṅgāt । siddhe hyādhānajanyasaṃskārasyāhavanīyākhyasyāhava- nīyākhyasaṃskārāntarātmanyupayogitve pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ tatprayojanatvam । tatprayojanatve ca sati tadatiriktāhavanīyākhyasaṃskārasiddhiḥ । itarathādhānajanyasaṃskārasyāhavanīyaparityāgakāraṇābhāvāt । dṛṣṭā
ca “agnihotraṃ juhoti” ityādau bhāvanākarmaṇyapi dvitīyā । na hyagnihotranāmadheyasya dhātvarthasya bhāvanākarmatvaṃ sambhavati । ātmā- śrayaprasaṅgāt । tenaitadeva vaktavyam—āhavanīyātiśayaśālino “yadāhavanīye juhoti” iti viniyogāt “āhitāgnirāhavanīya” iti ca śruterāhavanīyarūpātiśayavāniti sthitau śrutyā nirṇīyate । tasya ca sākṣādādadhātidhātvarthakarmatve sati ādhānaprakaraṇaṃ bhrāntā- nām, pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ sarvathā kenāpi prakāreṇānanvayādbhāvanākarma- tvam । tathāca satyuktaprakāreṇa samapradhānyāsambhavātprayājādiva- tphalavatsannidhāvaphalasya tadaṅgatvameva tena vaktavyam । asmanmate'pi bhāvanākarmaṇyāhavanīye dvitīyetyubhayamate'nyataḥ paricchedasyoktatvā- diti nānupapannam ।

sūtrantu pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā vyākhyeyam । tatra hyaṣṭamānuvā- kaśrutasāmidhenyanuvacanasya navamānuvākaśrutābhirnividbhiraṅgāṅgibhāvama- tivyavadhānābhāvādekādaśānuvākaśrutopavyānasya sāmidhenyanuvacanā- daṅgāṅgitvābhāvāvyavadhānānnopavyānasāmidhenyanuvacanayoraṅgāṅgitvami- ti vyutpādyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 738)

tadayamartho bhavati—guṇānāṃ sāmidhenyanuvacananividāṃ parārtha
tvādagnyarthatvāt asambandhaḥ syāditi na kiñcidanupapannamityala- mativistareṇeti ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ vārtraghnyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate—“vārtraghnī paurṇamāsyāmanūcyete, vṛdha- nvatī amāvāsyāyām” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimanuvākyāyugala- sya pradhāne niveśaḥ ? utājyabhāgayoḥ ? iti । ānarthakyatada- ṅganyāyaprasaṅgāgataṃ vicāradvayaṃ parisamāpyedānīmānarthakyatadaṅganyāya vaidharmyeṇa prasaṅgādyathāyogaṃ vyavasthā pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yadyapi paurṇamāsyamāvasyā- śabdau kāle mukhyau, tathāpyanuvākyāyugaladvayasya devatāprakāśa- kasya kālārthatvāsambhavātsvabhāvādeva yāgayogitvāllakṣaṇayā yāgaparatvameva । tatra kiṃ kramānurodhenājyabhāgaparatvaṃ vānayoḥ ? yadi vā prakaraṇā/?/rodhena pradhānayāgaparatvam ? tatra prakaraṇasya
balīyastvātkramabādhena pradhānasambandha evānuvākyādvayasya prakaraṇā- nugṛhītena vākyena pratipādyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 379)
kiñca yathā prakaraṇenājyabhāgayoḥ pradhānārthatvaṃ tathānuvākyā- yugalayorapi । ato'pi pradhānārthatvādanayornānyonyasambandhaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 739)
tasmādājyabhāgakramaṃ bādhitvā vākyena pradhānārthatvaptevānuvā- kyānāmiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyanuvākyādvayasya pradhānakarmaṇyartha- samavāyo bhavet । tathāhi—ekātrānuvākyāgneyī, aparā saumī । paurṇamāsyākhyakarmatraye'pyagnīṣomīye'gnisahitasyaiva somasya devatā- tvam । kevalasya somasya prakāśanaṃ mahendrādhikaraṇanyāyenaiva na sambhavati । na cānuvākyādvayenaivāgnīṣomaprakāśanamiti vācyam । “anuvākyāmanvāha” ityekasmin karmaṇi vivakṣitā/?/nuvākyāgatai-
katvabādhaprasaṅgāt । na cānenaiva vākyena dvitvamapi vidhīyate । prāpte karmaṇi dvitvasya mantraviśeṣasya ca vidhāne vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । “puro'nuvākyāmantāha” ityatra tvanekāsāṃ puro'nuvākyānāṃ kramaprāpta- tvādekatvamātraṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam । atra tu mantraviśeṣasyāpi vivakṣāyāṃ vākyabheda eveti kiñcitkālavacanatvenopapattau kathaṃ lākṣaṇikakarmaparatvāśrayaṇam ? na ca mantrasya kālārthatvāsambhavā- tpaurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayorlakṣaṇayā karmaparatvamiti vācyam । vyavasthārthatvenaiva kālavacanopapatteḥ । tathāpyājyabhāgayoḥ kāmavāda- vadanuvākyāyugaladvayamāmnāyate । ājyabhāgayośca prathamasyāgnirdevatā, dvitīyasya somaḥ । tena kramaliṅgābhyāmājyabhāgārthametadanuvākyā- yugaladvayamavagatam । ājyabhāgau ca pratipradhānaguṇāvṛttinyāyena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyākramasamudāyadvaye āvṛtyā prayoktavyau । tatra cāvyavasthayā mantraprāptau vyavasthārthaṃ vacanam—paurṇamāsyāṃ yāva- jyabhāgau tau vṛtrahapadavanmantrakau, amāvāsyāyāṃ yāvājyabhāgau tau vṛdhanvatpadavanmantrakau prayoktavyāviti । etacca paurṇamāsya- dhikaraṇa eva prapañcitam । ato mukhyakālārthatvenaiva vākyopapattau na liṅgakramabādhena lakṣaṇayā pradhānakarmaparatvāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam । tenānuvākyāyugalasyājyabhāgayoreva niveśa iti siddham ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—mitho'nyonyamanuvākyānāṃ
pradhānayośca darśapūrṇamāsayoraṅgāṅgibhāvenānarthasambandhādarthasambandhā- bhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ hastāvanejanādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“muṣṭīkaroti vācaṃ yacchati, dīkṣitamā- vedayati” iti । tathā “hastāvavanenikte, ulaparājiṃ stṛṇāti” iti । atra sandehaḥ—kiṃ muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaścāvedanārtham ? uta kṛtsna- prakaraṇe niveśaḥ ? iti । tathā hastāvanejanaṃ kimulaparājiṃ staritum ? uta prakaraṇe sarvān padārthān karttum ? iti । anantaroktaḥ kramavi- niyogo'trāpodyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—atra yadyapi mahāprakaraṇena muṣṭikaraṇavāgyamayorhastāvanejanasya ca sarvārthatvameva pratibhāti । tathāpyāgneyādyadhyayanavidhitaḥ samāne'pi prakaraṇe muṣṭikaraṇavāgya- mayoreva dīkṣitāvedanasannidhisamāmnānam । hastāvanejanasya colapa-
rājistaraṇasannidhisamāmnānam । anenaivāṅgāṅgibhāvasteṣāṃ pratīyate । na ca sambandhayogyānāṃ gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītivadasannidhiḥ, yena prakaraṇena ca sambadhyeta । samanvayāpādakayogyatālakṣaṇaliṅga- syānugrāhakasya vidyamānatvāt । tathāhi-yājamānayormuṣṭikaraṇa- vāgyamasaṃskārayoḥ praṇidhānahetutvāt praṇidhānasampādyaṃ kriyā- ntaramapekṣitam । anantarā ca dīkṣitāvedanakriyā śrūyate । abhihitaśca dīkṣitarūpo yajamāno'dhvaryuṇā—‘yatkiñcidāvedya- mānaṃ vatsasya gṛhṇāti’ iti । evañca hastāvanejanamapi hasta- saṃskāro hastābhyāṃ kiñcitkriyamāṇamapekṣate । hastasampādyamulapa- rājistaraṇañcānantaraṃ śrūyate । tadapi naiva sambadhyate । tena yadyapi prakaraṇaṃ sannidherbalavat tathāpi yogyatālakṣaṇaliṅgasahāyena krameṇaiva muṣṭikaraṇavāgyamayordīkṣitāvedanārthatvam, hastāvanejanasya colaparājistaraṇārthatvamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi prakaraṇena sarvārthatvaṃ na bhavet । sarvatra prabalaśrutiliṅgavākyāvāntaraprakaraṇāni mahāprakaraṇasyāpavā- dakāni bhavanti । śrutistāvannāstyeva । na hyatrāvedayitumiti śrūyate । yadi tu śrūyeta, tataḥ ‘tumunevulau kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyām’ ( pā.sū., 3. 3. 10 ) ityekavākyatayā viniyogo bhavedapi । na
tvevamasti । liṅgañca yogyatālakṣaṇamantantarārthatvena sādhāraṇam । athavā sarvātvameva yuktam । yato bahuṣu padārtheṣvatiśayeno- payujyate । ekasmādyathākathañcidapi niṣpādasambhavāt । na ca vākyaṃ samasti । na hi “muṣṭīkaroti, vācaṃ yacchati dīkṣitamāvedayati” ityādīnāṃ bhinnākhyātayogināṃ kenacidyadyādyupabandhena vinaikavākya- tvaṃ sambhavati, yatprakaraṇaṃ bādheta । nāpyavāntaraprakaraṇamatrāsti । sandaṃśena hi tadavagamyate । taduktam—

lg.l: jñāte punaśca taireva sandaṃśena tadiṣyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 741 )

na cātra dīkṣitāvedanolaparājistaraṇayorevaṃvidhassandaṃśo'sti, yenāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ bhavet । na cādhyayanavidhikāritasannidhisamā- mnānarūpakramādevāṅgāṅgibhāvanirṇaya iti vācyam । sannidhisamā- mnānasya nāntarīyakatvenāviśeṣatvāt । avaśyaṃ hi prakaraṇe paṭhyamānaṃ yasya kasyacitsannidhau paṭhanīyam, sarvatrannidhau paṭhitumaśa- kyatvāt । tena nāntarīyakatayā yasya kasyacitsannidhau pāṭhe'pi sarvārtha evādhyayanavidhikārito nirṇīyate । yatra punarākāṅkṣāyā abhāvātprakaraṇagrahaṇaṃ na sambhavati, tatra sannidhernāntarīyakatvāsa- mbhavātsannihitapadārthatādarthyametatsannidhipāṭhasyādhyayanavidhitātparyā-
davadhāryate । yathājyabhāgayārevānuvākyānāmiti । ata eva na liṅgasahāyo'pi sannidhirūpaḥ kramo'trāṅgāṅgitve pramāṇam, prakaraṇa- dvayoraviśeṣavidhāyakatvāt । tena muṣṭikaraṇavāgyamahastāvanejanānāṃ prakaraṇātsarvārthatvamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-evaṃvidheṣvānantaryaṃ sannidhi- samāmnānamacodanā nāṅgāṅgitvacodanamityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ caturdhākaraṇādhikaraṇam ।
chapter.sutra: śeṣastu guṇasaṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyeta mitha- steṣāmasambandhāt ।। 3. 1. 26 ।।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate—“āgneyaṃ caturdhā karoti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimāgneye'gnīṣomīye aindrāgne ca sarvatra caturddhākaraṇam ? utāgneya eva ? iti । sarvatra yathāsaṃyogaṃ vini- yogavyavasthāṃ pratipādyedānīm “āgneyaṃ caturdhā karoti” ityādiṣu kimekadeśadvāreṇāpi saṃyogo bhavati uta neti vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“āgneyaṃ caturdhā karoti” ityatra yadyapya- gnistaddhitena devatātvenaiva samavetaḥ pratipādyate, tathāpi nātrāgniḥ kāryopayogī । kāryopayogī hi yathāśabdamupādīyamānaḥ kāryaṃ bhajate, ayantūpalakṣaṇamātram । upalakṣaṇañca kāryopayogipadārthāva- gatimātraprayojanam । tasya ca samavāyamātreṇaiva siddhatvānna devatā- tvaviśeṣaṇābhāve'pi kiñcidduṣyati । tena yathā “upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati” iti kāryatayā upāṃśuyājaṃ lakṣayituṃ dvau puroḍāśāvupāttau tathāpyekapuroḍāśāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmasatyapyagnīṣomīye āgneyamātra- syaiva kālopalakṣaṇatvam । yathā loke ḍitthaḍabitthayormātā eke- nāpi ḍitthasya mātetyupalakṣyate, tathātrāpyeka evāgnirvināpi devatā- tvaṃ samavāyamātreṇāgnīṣomīyaindrāgnapuroḍāśāvapyupalakṣayiṣyati । tenāgneyacaturddhākaraṇamagnirūpaguṇadvāreṇa puroḍāśasaṃyuktaṃ puroḍāśa- trayasādhāraṇameva bhavet । na cātrāgnidevatātvena kāryopayogitva- masti, kintūpalakṣaṇatvamātramityuktam । na copalakṣaṇatvakāryopa- yogitvayoravinābhāvaḥ, tayoḥ parasparāsambandhāt । ataścaturdhākaraṇaṃ puroḍāśatrayasādhāraṇameveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.sutra: vyavasthā vārthasaṃyogālliṅgasyārthena sambandhālla kṣa- ṇārthā guṇaśrutiḥ ।। 3. 1. 27 ।।
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi parityaktadevatābhāvamagnimātra- matropalakṣaṇaṃ bhavet । tathāhi-āgneyataddhitena tāvadagniviśeṣitaṃ devatātvamupāttam । puroḍāśasya cāgnidevatoddeśena tyaktatvāt । yadyapi tadānīṃ puroḍāśatyāgaṃ pratyuddeśyatvena devatātvasya kāryopa- yogo nāsti, tathāpyatra nirvṛttatvena puroḍāśopalakṣaṇatvamaviruddha- meva । tena nirvṛttatvenopalakṣaṇatvāviśeṣe'pi mukhyasyaiva devatātva- syopalakṣaṇatve sambhavati nāgnimātrasyopalakṣaṇatvamucitam । na ca dvidevatye puroḍāśe'gnirdevatā । na cobhayādhiṣṭhānavyāsaktaṃ devatā- tvamekenāgninā āgneya iti vyapadeṣṭuṃ śakyate । taduktam—

lg.l: nāgnīṣomīya āgneya aindrāgno vā taducyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 743.)

tena yadyapyupalakṣaṇaṃ na kāryopayogi, tathāpyāgneyapadena devatā- tvainaivāgnerupāttatvāttatparityāge kāraṇābhāvānna tenānupalakṣitaṃ
śakyam । upāṃśuyāje tu yamalapuroḍāśābhyāmupalakṣitakālasyaika- puroḍāśāyāmapi paurṇamāsyāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānatvācchakyo'sau grahītum । na hi tatra sattāyā agnīṣomīyapuroḍāśasya kālopa- lakṣakatvam । upāṃśuyāje tatsattābhāvāt । kintarhi ? yogyatā tadutpattihetubhūtakāraṇanirūpaṇīyā । sā ca yogyatā ekapuroḍā- śāyāmapi paurṇamāsyāmastyeveti yuktamupāṃśuyājānuṣṭhānamiti vaiṣa- myam । yattu “āgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajya prāśitramavadyati” iti śrūyate, “āgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajya prāśitramavadyati” iti śrūyate, tatsāmānyavacanena sarvatra prāśitrāvadāne pratipādite satyanenāgneyasya mastakaviśeṣamātraṃ vidhīyate, na tvāgneyopādānakaṃ puroḍāśatrayamupādāya prāśitrāvadānaṃ vidhīyata iti mantavyam । tena yadapi ‘taṃ caturddhā kṛtvā puroḍāśaṃ barhipadaṃ karoti’ iti barhiṣatvaṃ śrūyate, tadapi samānyavacanamanenaivopasaṃhiyate । yastu viśeṣavacanenaivāprāptatvātsāmānyavacanamanarthakamiti manyate, taṃ pratyu- cyate-barhiṣatvakaraṇavidhānārthaṃ tadvacanamiti । atha tadapi “barhiṣi havīṃṣyāsādayati” ityanenaiva vacanena prāptam, tadā caturddhākaraṇaṃ kṛtvā barhipatvaṃ karttavyamiti kramavidhānārthameva vacanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sarvamupapannam ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-caturddhākaraṇasyāgneyapuroḍā- śarūpārthasaṃyogenaiva vyavasthā liṅgasya devatātvasya tenaivārthena
sambandhāt । prāśitre tu yeyamāgneyaguṇaśrutiḥ sā mastakadeśala- kṣaṇārthā, na tu prāśitrāvadānavidhānārtheti ।।
chapter.head: tautātitamatatilake tṛtīyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ।।
atha tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ liṅgādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
iha mantrā udāharaṇam “barhidevasadanaṃ dāmi” ityevamādayaḥ । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ mukhya evābhidheye mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaḥ ? uta gauṇe'pīti । śrautaviniyogaṃ pratipādyedānīmavasaraprāpto laiṅgiko viniyogaḥ pratipādyate । imantu sandehamasahamānaḥ kaścidāha— nanu mukhyagauṇavibhāgavacanaṃ nāsti, sarveṣāmeva śabdādavagamya- mānatvena mukhyatvāt । tathā hi—‘mukhādibhyaḥ’ iti ivārthakaya- tpratyayānto mukhyaśabdaḥ । mukhamiva mukhyamiti prathamāvagamyamāne'rthe varttate । ato'gniśabdātprathamaṃ jvalano'vagamyate yathā, tathā
māṇavako'gnirityatra māṇako'pi । ataḥ so'pi mukhya eveti । na ca gauṇatvaṃ kathañcitsambhavati । guṇāgamananimittaṃ hi gauṇatvaṃ vaktavyam । na cāgnisamaveto yo guṇaviśeṣaḥ sa kadācidapi māṇavake sambhavati । ye tvapare'pyaṣṭau gauṇatvaprakārā bhāṣyavā- rttikayorupanyasya dūṣitāste'titucchatvānneha pradarśitāḥ । ataḥ sarva evānanyagatiḥ śabdārthaḥ । śabdasyābhidhānaśaktiṃ kalpayan mukhya eva bhavatīti nāsti mukhyatvagauṇatvayorviśeṣa iti kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ ?

atrocyate-sarveṣāmeva gauṇaśabdānāṃ śabdāntarasamabhivyāhṛtā- nāṃ sati sādṛśye pratipādanādasati cāpratipānādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ sādṛśyaṃ tāvadavaśyaṃ prathamaṃ pratyetavyam । na tāvadanavagate'gnau tatsā- dṛśyaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyata ityavaśyaṃ prathamamagnerabhidhānam । tataśca tadnatalakṣitapaiṅgalyaguṇayogādeva sādṛśyarūpānmāṇavakapratītisiddherna tadnatavācakaśaktikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamastīti gauṇatvam । tena satya- magnisamaveto guṇaviśeṣo māṇavake nāsti, tathāpi guṇasāmānyaṃ tāvadastyagnipaiṅgalyādirūpam । tasya ca śaktyantarasambaddhasyāpi śaktyantarasambandhāvirodhādyukto gauṇamukhyavibhāga ityupapannassaṃ- śayaḥ । ayaṃ vicāro'rthāttatsiddhisūtrātprāgeva draṣṭavyaḥ । iha siddha- mukhyagauṇabhedādhīnatvāttatra yajamānaprastarādiśabdānāṃ gauṇānāṃ nimittamātrakathanasyeti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi” iti mantro'yaṃ prakaraṇinā gṛhītaḥ sāmarthyāttatsambandhiviśeṣe viniyoktavyaḥ । sāmarthyañca barhiḥśabdasya yathābhidhānataḥ kuśaprakāśane, tathā sādṛ- śyādviniyuktakāśaprakāśane'pi । tenobhayaśeṣo'yaṃ mantraḥ pratipradhānā- vṛttinyāyenobhayalavane'pi prayoktavyaḥ । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 749. )
evañca sati gauṇyā vṛttyā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrāṇāṃ pūṣādyabhā- ve'pyagnyādīnāṃ prakāśanopapatternotkarṣo bhaviṣyatīti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi tulyavanmukhyagauṇārthayojakaḥ śrutyantarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti । evañca sati gauṇārthagocaraṃ vā madhyaprāptamupāyāntaramapi dhyānādikaṃ na bādhiṣyate । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 570 )

evañca sati pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrāṇāmapi liṅgena pūṣādiśeṣa- kimiti bādhyata iti mudritavārtikapāṭhaḥ ।
tvānna durbalaprakaraṇānurodhena vṛtyantarāśrayaṇaṃ bhavatīti । yāgānu- mantraṇasamākhyayā yāgasāmānyasambandhe satyutkarṣātpūṣadevatya- yāgasambandha iti । ataḥ siddhaṃ mukhyārthe liṅgena mantrāṇāṃ viniyoga iti ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-yasmādarthaviṣayābhidhāna- saṃyogānmantreṣu śeṣabhāvo yuktaḥ syāttasmādautpattikena mukhyenaivārthenaiṣāṃ śeṣiśeṣalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho na gauṇena । kutaḥ ? tenaiva mukhyenaivā- vyabhicāritayā nityasambandhāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyamaindryadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
agnau śrūyate—“niveśanaḥ saṅgamano vasūnāmityaindryā gārhapatya- mupatiṣṭhate” (mai. saṃ., 3. 2. 4) iti । tatra sandehaḥ-kimindrasyopa- sthānam ? uta gārhapatyasya ? iti । idānīṃ pūrvādhikaraṇāpavādaḥ kriyate । atra “niveśanaḥ saṅgamano vasūnām” iti mantreṇendrasya devarājasya vasuniveśanasaṅgamanakarttṛtvena yathendro'bhidhātuṃ śakyate, tathā ‘dhruvo'dhvaraśca somaśca viṣṇuścaivānilo'nalaḥ’ iti
hyevaṃ vasurūpasyāgneḥ ‘vasūnāṃ pāvakaścāsmi’ iti śreṣṭhatvakīrttanādvasu- niveśanasaṅgamanakartṛtvenāgnirapyabhidhātuṃ śakyata eva । tathāpi- aindryeti taddhitaśrutyā indrasyaiva prādhānyenābhidhānaṃ vedānumatamiti matvedamudāhṛtam । ata eva vārttike sphuṭodāharaṇapratipādakendrapada- vāneva mantro'tra śākhāntare paṭhyata iti nidarśitaḥ—“kadācana starīrasi nendra saścasi” iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇobhisandhiḥ—yadyapyasya mantrasya śrutyā gā- rhapatyasambandhaḥ pratīyate । śrutiśca liṅgādbalīyasī, tathāpyagneriva seke'śaktasya śrutiśatenāpi viniyoktumaśakyatvānna gārhapatye'sya viniyogaḥ sambhavati । yato nānenendrābhidhāyakena mantreṇa kathañcidapi gārhapatyo'bhidhātuṃ śakyate । na cābhidhānaṃ vinā prakārāntareṇāsya mantrasya gārhapatyaśeṣatvamanena vākyena pratipādyata iti vācyam । upatiṣṭhata ityātmanepadavirodhāt । “upānmantrakaraṇe” ( pā. sū., 1. 3. 25 ) ityupapūrvāttiṣṭhatermantrakaraṇe'rthe ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate । kathaṃ gārhapatyamiti dvitīyeti cet—ucyate, vacanaṃ tāvaddeśavidhānārthameva । dvitīyā ca saktuvadavivakṣitepsitārthā- kārakasāmānyalakṣaṇadvāreṇādhikaraṇamācaṣṭe । tenāpamarthaḥ—gārhapa- tyadeśe sthitvā aindryendropasthānaṃ karttavyamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi pratyakṣa śrutivirodhe'pi mantrāṇāṃ mukhyārthatvamupapadyeta । tathāhi—avaśyaṃ tāvadatraikasyāmukhyārthatvaṃ vaktavyam । tatra kiṃ mantrānurodhena brāhmaṇavākyagatagārhapatyapade vṛtyantaramāśrīyatām ? brāhmaṇānurodhena vā mantragatendrapade ? tatra brāhmaṇasyāprāptavidhitvena svatantratvātprathamapravṛtteścānanyapramāṇake- 'rthe gauṇatvamayuktam । mantrasya tu brāhmaṇavihitārthapratipādakatvena tatparatantrapravṛtterbrāhmaṇapratipāditārthānurodhena gauṇatvameva yuktam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 753)

tena mantragata evendraśabdo yajñasādhanatvaguṇayogādgārhapatyaṃ prakāśayati । athavā—‘idi paramaiśvarye’ iti dhātorayamindraśabdo vyutpannaḥ । agneśca yadyapi paramaiśvaryannāsti, tathāpi svakārye tāvaddāhapākādāvaiśvaryamasti । tenaiśvaryaguṇayogādvā ayamindraśabdo gārhapatye gauṇaḥ । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 755 )

tasmādindraśabda eva gārhapatye gauṇa iti siddham । yattu balā- balādhikaraṇenaiva gatatvādidamanarthakamiti keciccodayanti, tadayuktam ; śrutiliṅgabalābalanirvāhasyaiva tadadhikaraṇādhīnatvāt । tathā hi— śrutivirodhe gauṇānāmapi mantrāṇāṃ mantratvaṃ bhavatītyetadadhikaraṇa- siddhaṃ bhavati yadā, tadā tatra śruterbalavatvaṃ bhavitumarhati, itarathā aśakyārthe viniyogāsambhavāt ‘ānarthakyapratihatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalam’ iti nyāyena śrutirevānyathā nīyeteti na kiñcidanu- papannamiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—vacanādaindrī ayathārthā gauṇārthetyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ haviṣkṛdāhvānādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatrademāmnāyate—‘haviṣkṛdehīti virava- ghnannāhvayati’ iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimeṣa mantro'vahantiṃ prati śrutyā upadiśyate ? uta hantirasya kālaṃ lakṣayati ? iti । evamadhi-
karaṇadvayena yathākramaṃ mukhyārthe mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaṃ kvacidapavādañca nirūpyedānīṃ ka utsargaviṣayaḥ ko'pavādasyetyucyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“haviṣkṛdehi haviṣkṛdehi” iti mantro- 'yam । “iti triravaghnannāhvayati” iti brāhmaṇam । pūrvādhikaraṇe mantrabrāhmaṇayorvirodhe mantrasyaiva mukhyārthatvaṃ na brāhmaṇasyetyuktam । yadyatra haviṣkṛdehītyāhvayatīti sambandhaḥ kriyate, tadāhvānāṅga- tvānmantrasya nāvaghātāṅgatvamiti । athāvaghnanniti kālo lakṣaṇīyaḥ, tadāyamarthaḥ—avaghātakāle'dhvaryuryajamānapatnīṃ haviṣkṛdehi haviṣkṛ- dehītyāhvayatīti । tathāca sati mantrānurodhena brāhmaṇavākyasyaiva mukhyārthatvaṃ syāt । tenāyaṃ sambandho haviṣkṛdehītyavaghnanniti yathā- śrutasyaivāvaghātasya mantro'ṅgam । mantragatahaviṣkṛtpadasyaiva guṇādava- ghātaprakāśakatvam । yo hi haviṣkaroti sa haviṣkṛt । havirutpatya- nukūlaścāvaghāta iti । ehīti padenāpi sannidhiguṇayogādavaghāta eva nirdiśyate । yo hyāgacchati sa sannihito bhavatyeva । avaghā- to'pi kriyamāṇaḥ sannihito bhavatīti brāhmaṇagatatvāt āhvaya- tīti padamanuvādabhūtaṃ paramapratītamagatyaupacārikameva । yo hyāhvayati sa ehīti padamuccārayati । ayamapi mantro'vaghātaprakāśakaṃ gauṇa- mehīti padamuccārayatī tyāhvayatītyucyate । na ca triravaghnanniti prāpte'
vaghāte mantravidhānādāhvānamantrasya ca trirabhyāsavidhānādvākyabheda iti vācyam । śākhāntare haviṣkṛdehīti trirabhyāsapāṭhāt tritvasyāpi prāptasyānuvādāt । ato mantrāvaghātasambandhavidhire- vāyamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi mantrānurodhena brāhmaṇe kāla- lakṣaṇādoṣo bhavet । na caitadasti । tathāhi—liṅgena tāvadayaṃ mantro yajamānapatnyāhvānāṅgaṃ pratīyate । tacca tadaiva hīyate, yadi brāhmaṇagatā kācicchjatirvirudhyeta । tatra viniyoktrī śrutistāvadatra nāstyeva । na cāvaghnanniti kālalakṣaṇāyāmabhidhātrī śrutiḥ pīḍyata iti vācyam । yataḥ ‘karttari kṛt’ (pā.sū.,3.4.67) iti kṛtpratyayo'yaṃ śatṛrūpaḥ karttari vācye'nuśiṣṭaḥ । ‘lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ’ ( pā. sū., 3. 2. 126 ) ityanuśāsane ca kriyānta- ralakṣaṇopādhiviśiṣṭaḥ karttā śatṛvācya ityavagamyate । kartrā ca kriyāntaraṃ kāladvāreṇaiva lakṣyate-yadāyaṃ svapadagate dhātvarthe karttā, tadāyaṃ kriyāntarasyeti । yathā—‘āmnāyaṃ kurvanmaunamācaret’ iti । tena yadi kālo na lakṣyeta, tadā yatkarttuḥ
kriyāntaralakṣaṇārthatvaṃ taddhīyata ityanuśāsanasiddheyaṃ lakṣaṇā śruti- tulyā na doṣāyeti । āhvayatīti padañca mukhyārthameveti na kāci- cchjatipīḍā matpakṣe । tava tu brāhmaṇavākyagatāhvayatipadasyaiva ni- mittamaupacārikatve na yathārthatvamiti mahānayaṃ viśeṣa iti । atra cetaratsarvamanūdya tririti vidhīyate । yato mantrastāvalliṅgādeva yajamānapatnyāhvāne prāptaḥ । tathā havirniṣpādanārthāvaghātakāle yajamānapatnyā haviṣkṛttṛtīyā (?) tatsannidhyupāyatvenāhvānasya haviṣkṛdehītyāhvānamapyarthaprāptam । evaṃ kāryakāle ca tatsannidherapi .... ....davaghātakālo'pyarthaprāpta eva । etena mantrasya trirabhyāsa- parametadvacanam । atha trirabhyāso'pi śākhāntaraprāptastadā dvirabhyā- sasya śākhāntaraprāptatvāt trirabhyāsaniyamārthaṃ vacanamiti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 756 )
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe avaghāte mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ । siddhānte tvāhvāna iti ।
sūtrantu—nāvaghātamantravidhiḥ, kintvaghnanniti padena kāla- vidhiḥ । kālapratipādanantu tritvamātrasya coditatvādarthavaditi ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ vāgvisargādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti—“uttiṣṭhannanvāha agnīdagnīnvihara” iti । tathā “vrataṃ carata” iti । kimutthānaṃ vāgvisarjanañca prati- mantrayorupadeśaḥ ? uta kālārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ ? iti । idānīmudā- haraṇāntare'dhikāśaṅkāṃ nirākarttu pūrvanyāya evātidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—pūrvādhikaraṇe'vaghnannityatrā- nuvāde bhavatu kālalakṣaṇā । iha tu “uttiṣṭhannanvāha” ityanena lakṣitaḥ kālaḥ “agnīdagnīn vihara” iti praiṣāṅgatvena vidheyaḥ । tathā “vrataṃ kṛṇuta”ityatra vijñātakālena mantreṇa lakṣitaḥ kālo vāgvisargāṅgatvena vidheyaḥ । na ca vidheyasyārthasya lākṣaṇikatvaṃ yuktam । kiñca pūrvādhikaraṇe trirabhyāsaparatvādvidhermantro na vidhī- yata ityucitam । na ceha kiñcidanyadvidheyamastītyutpatyā vāgvisargā- ṅgattvena mantravidhirevāyamiti । na ca prakaraṇasāmarthyābhāvānna mantravidhiriti vācyam । aindrīnyāyenāgatyā vṛtyantareṇāpi sāmarthyopapatteḥ । tena mantravidhireveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi liṅgavirodho na bhavet । tathāhi—na tāvadaindrdyetivadviniyogaḥ śrūyate, kintu samabhivyāhā- rādviniyogo'numātavyaḥ । na cāsau samabhivyāhāralakṣaṇādvākyā- lliṅge satyanumātuṃ śakyate । tena gatyantarāsambhavena tāvadavaśyaṃ kālo lakṣaṇīyaḥ । tatra ‘uttiṣṭannanvāha’ ityatra tāvat ‘lakṣaṇa- hetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ’ ityanuśāsane śatuḥ kālalakṣaṇārthatvaṃ nirdoṣamiti pūrvādhikaraṇa eva darśitam । tathā “vrataṃ kṛṇuta” iti vijñāta- kālena praiṣamantreṇa kālo lakṣyate । tenāyamarthaḥ—utthānakāle- 'dhvaryurāgnīdhramṛtvijam “agnīdagnīnvihara” iti preṣayati । tathā “vrataṃ carata” iti praiṣamantreṇa kālo lakṣyate । pāṭhakāle'dhvaryurvācaṃ visṛjediti ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—yathāvaghnannityatra vākye kālalakṣaṇā, tathā utthānavisarjanavākyayorapi । utthānasamabhi- vyāhṛto vidhistathā vāgvisarjanasamabhivyāhṛtaśca vidhirlakṣitakāla- vidhānārtha ityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamaṃ sūktavākādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate—“sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ sūktavākaḥ praharaṇaṃ pratyupadiśyate ? uteyaṃ kālalakṣaṇā ? iti । idānīṃ pūrvādhikaraṇoktakālārthatvāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi sūktavākeneti śrutyā sūktavākasya praharaṇāṅgatvamavagamyate । tathāpi na sūktavākasya praharaṇābhidhā- nāsāmarthyamasti । na cāsamarthasya śrutiśatenāpi viniyogaḥ sambhavati । caindrīmantravacchau/?/taviniyogabalena vṛttyantarāśrayaṇe- nāpi sūktavākasya praharaṇaprakāśakatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । abhidhānena gārhapatyaprakāśanāsambaddhasyaindrīmantrasyopatiṣṭhata iti prakāśane viniyogādadhyayanavidhinā tatra vṛtyantareṇaiva prakāśaka- mātramāśritam । na ceha sūktavākena prastarapraharaṇamupatiṣṭeta, prakāśayedveti śrūyate । kintarhi ? “sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharet” ityetāvanmātram । tatkiṃ kṛtsnasyaiva mantrasya vṛtyantarāśrayato
bhavatvayathārthatvam ? uta sūktavākapadamātrasyeti “bhūyasāṃ syātsa- dharmatvam” iti nyāyena sūktavākapadamātrasyaiva vṛtyantareṇa kāla- paratvamucitamiti vaiṣamyam । kiñca prastarapraharaṇasyāpi pratipatti- karmaṇodṛṣṭārthasya na mantrāpekṣā tadvānyadevatā vā samasti । ato na sūktavākasya praharaṇāṅgatvam, kintu sūktavākasyaiva devatā- prakāśanena kṛtārthasya praharaṇasya ca dhāraṇopayuktaprastarapratipatti- tvena kṛtārthasya “darśapūrṇamāsāviṣṭvā somena yajeta” itivatkā- lārtha eva saṃyuktaḥ । tena sūktavākapadamatra kālalakṣaṇārthameva । yadyapi copapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī, tathāpyuktaprakāreṇa kārakatvāsambhavādagatyā itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇārthaiveyaṃ tṛtīyā varṇanīyā । sūktavākeneti sūktavākopalakṣitaṃ prastaraṃ praharediti । upalakṣaṇa- tvañca sūktavākasya kāladvāreṇaiva । tenāyamarthaḥ—sūktavākaprayoga- kāle prastaraṃ praharediti । atra sūktavākasyāpīṣṭadevatāprakāśanena kṛtārthatvāttallakṣitaḥ kāla eva vidhīyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyupapadavibhakterbalīyasī kārakavi- bhaktistṛtīyātra na śrūyeta । tasyāśca mukhyaṃ karaṇatvamevārthaḥ ।
“anyāyaścānekārthatvam” iti nyāyādanyatra lākṣaṇikatvamiti । na ca mukhye sambhavati lākṣaṇikatvaṃ yuktam । na ca mukhyaṃ karaṇa- tvaṃ praharaṇena sambhavati, yena kālalakṣaṇārthatvamāśrīyeta । nanvagnyādīṣṭadevatāprakāśanasambaddho'yam । ato na prastarapraharaṇa- prakāśanasambaddhaḥ । ataḥ śrutiśatenāpi viniyoktuṃ na śakyata ityuktam । naivam, virodhābhāvāt । tathāhi—yadasya svasāmarthye- neṣṭadevatāprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ prastarapraharaṇe viniyujyamānasya tadanukūla- meva, yataḥ sarvatra kriyātatsādhanābhidhānena mantrasyāṅgatvaṃ bhavati । tatra yadyapi prastarapraharaṇaprakāśanātprāk prasiddhapraharaṇakriyāprakāśanaṃ tadaṅgabhūtadevatāprakāśanaṃ vātra nāsti, tathāpi pratipāditāṅgabhāvasya yatprakāśyaṃ tadeva nūnamasyāṅgamiti viniyogopapattaye kalpyate, na deva- tārthena । sādhanaprayogasambaddhānāmeva devatānāmagnyādīnāmihāpi deva- tārthenaivānvayaḥ । evañca devatābhāvasāpekṣahavissāpekṣatvātprastarasya ca svavākyāttasya “idaṃ havirajuṣata” iti haviṣṭvanirdeśāttatra prastara eva haviṣṭena sambadhyate । svataḥprakṣeparūpo'yaṃ ‘idaṃ haviḥ’ iti dravya- devatāsambandhabalenoddeśatyāgabhāvāpannahomo bhavatu na tu yāgamātram । evaṃ mantro'pi yathā liṅgeneṣṭadevatāsaṃskārārthaḥ, tathā śrutyā prastara- saṃskārarūpahomārtho'pīti । tenāgnyādidevatāprakāśanenaiva sūkta- vākasyobhayārthatvānnāsti śrutiliṅgayorvirodha iti ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 762)

yattu prastarapraharaṇasya pratipattikarmaṇo dṛṣṭārthasya devatāpekṣā mantrāpekṣā vā na samastītyuktam । tadayuktam ; prakaraṇaviniyukta- mantrārthayorupapatyarthameva praharaṇagatākāṅkṣotthāpanenaiva raktapaṭavadanvayo- papatteḥ । na cāsya prathamaṃ pratipattitvamapyavadhāritam, kintu dravya- devatāsambandhena homarūpatve homasvarūpāvadhāraṇottarakālaṃ kimidamartha- karma pratipattikarma veti cintāyāṃ pratipattikarmalakṣaṇayogātpratipatti- karmatvameva । ‘utpattau yena saṃyuktaṃ tadarthaṃ tacchjatihetutvāttasyārthāntara- gamane śeṣatvātpratipattiḥ syāt’ iti hi pratipattilakṣaṇam । a- sya cāyamarthaḥ—utpattau yena dravyādinā saṃyuktaṃ karma taddravyaṃ tṛtīyādiśrutihetutvāttadarthaṃ tasya dravyasya karmāntaragamane śeṣa- tvātkṛtaprayojanatvāttatkarma taddravyapratipattiḥ syāt । praharaṇa- mapi ca “prastare juhūmāsādayati sarvā vā srucaḥ” iti juhvādyāsāda- nakṛtārthaprastarasaṃyogena śrūyamāṇaṃ homarūpatve'pi pratipattirūpameva । na ca pratipattirūpatve homarūpatvaṃ virudhyate, sviṣṭakṛdādīnāṃ homarūpāpannānāmeva pratipattitvadarśanāt । tena dvitīyāpyatra prastaramiti
mukhyārthaiva । na tu saktuvadviniyogabhaṅgena tṛtīyārthā । guṇabhāvastu prastarayāgaṃ prati kalpitaśabdapratipādya eveti nānupapannam ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe sūktavākapāṭhakāle prastarasya prakṣepamātra- manuṣṭhātavyam । siddhānte tu yadyapi prasaṅgena praharaṇakāla eva sūktavākapāṭho'nuṣṭheyaḥ tathāpi homarūpatvāduddeśatyāgāvapyanuṣṭheyāviti ।

sūtrantu—sūktavākasya prastarapraharaṇaṃ prati aṅgaparyāyakaraṇa- tvenaivopadeśaḥ । evañca ‘sūktavāka eva yājyā’ iti yāgasādhanatva- sāmyenaupacāriko yājyāśabda upapanno bhaviṣyati, itarathākasmikaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sūktavākasya vibhajyaviniyogādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ—“sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharati” iti śrūyate । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ kṛtsnasūktavākaḥ prayoktavyaḥ, kṛtsno'māvāsyāyām ? uta yathāsāmarthyaṃ niṣkṛṣya yathāyathaṃ prayogaḥ ? iti । tṛtīyāśrutibalena sūktavākaḥ praharaṇāṅgamiti
sthitam । idānīṃ kṛtsna eva paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāñca prayo- ktavyaḥ, uta vibhajyeti prasaṅgāccintyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapīṣṭadevatāprakāśanāparityāgenaiva sūkta- vākasya praharaṇāṅgatvam, tāśca paurṇamāsyāmagnyādyāḥ, sūktavākaśca bhedenaiva tatprakāśanasambaddha iti yathāsāmarthyaṃ bhedenaiva sūktavāka- prayogo yuktaḥ, tathāpi sūktavākeneti śrutyā kṛtsnasyaiva sūktavākasya praharaṇe viniyogādekadeśaviyoge cāsūktavākatvaprasaṅgātkṛtsna eva paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāñca prayoktavyaḥ । nanu parasparanira- pekṣavibhinnadevatārthatvādbhinnā eva sūktavākāḥ । tena liṅgānurodhena vibhajyaiva prayogo yuktaḥ । kathamubhayatrāpi kṛtsnasyaiva prayogaḥ ? iti । ucyate—bhavedevamarthato bhinnavākyatvam, yadi śabdataḥ prathamameka- vākyatvaṃ nāvagamyeta । sūktavākamantre hi prathamam “idaṃ dyāvā- pṛthivī bhadramabhūt” iti śrūyate । ante ca “asyāmṛdhaddhotrāyāṃ devaṅgamāyām” iti । madhye ca “agniridaṃ havirajuṣata avīvṛdhata maho jyāyo'kṛta” iti । tataḥ punaḥ “agnīṣomāvidaṃ havirajuṣetām” ityevamādīni devatāvanti padānyāmnāyante । tena yathā vaiśvānaravākyasyopakramopasaṃhārayordvādaśa kapālakīrttanānmadhyasthitāṣṭā- kapālādipadānāṃ vākyabhedapratibhāne'pi na bhinnavākyatvam,
tathātrāpyupakramopasaṃhāravarttipadānāṃ tantratvānmadhyabhedapratibhāne'pi na bhinnavākyatvam । tathā sarveṣāmeveṣṭadevatāprakāśanenaikaprayojanatvenai- kārthatvamapyavihatam । tathāpyadhyāpakā adhyetāraśca ‘sūktavāka- madhyāpayāmaḥ’ ‘sūktavākamadhīsaha’ iti kṛtsnameva sūktavākaṃ vyapadiśanti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 765 )

tadvatpaurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyādevatābhidhāyipadānāmamāvāsyāyāñca paurṇamāsīdevatābhidhāyipadānāmānarthakyam । dyāvāpṛthivīpadādivatstu- tyarthatvenaivopapatteḥ । tena praharaṇarūpe home kṛtsnamantraprayoge'pi devatārthatvam । paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāñca iṣṭadevatāprakāśanānu- guṇo veti । tena kṛtsnasyaiva sūktavākasya sūktavākenetyupadiṣṭatvā- dubhayatra paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāñca kṛtsnasyaiva prayoga iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi liṅgābādhena śrutirvyavasthā- payituṃ na śakyate । tathāhi—prayogavartidevatā/?/mabhiśrūyamāṇaṃ
tantrapadopetamiṣṭadevatāprakāśanaṃ kurvadvākyaṃ sūktavāka ityucyate । prayogāsambaddhadevatāpadasāhitye tu duruktavāko bhavati, na sūkta- vākaḥ । tena yāvanti padānyekaprayogavarttidevatāpadasahitānīṣṭa- devatāprakāśanaṃ kurvanti, tāvanyekaḥ sūktavākaḥ tantrapadānāmapi tāvadbhirevaikaprayojanavaśīkṛtaiḥ sambandhopapattau kṛtsnasya tvekaka- lpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt । evañca sati paurṇamāsīprayogavarttidevatā- trayābhidhāyakānyeva padānyabhitastantrapadopetānyekaḥ, evamamāvāsyā- yāmapyaparaḥ sūktavāka iti yathāliṅgameva sūktavākeneti śrutyupa- patterna śrutyā liṅgasya bādhaḥ । yadi tūbhayatrāpi kṛtsnaḥ prayujyeta, tadā asamavetārthapadaprayogeṇāsūktavākatvātsūktavākaśrutipīḍaivāpadyeta । tadevaṃ vyavasthite sati haratirapi yathopapādena sūktavākasyānyatvā- tkṛtsnenaiva sādhito bhavatīti nānupapannam । taduktam—

lg.l: bindau ca samudāye ca toyaśabdo yatheṣyate ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 770 )

na cādhyāpakādhyetṛprayogavirodhaḥ । svādhyāyakāle kṛtsna- syaiva sūktavākatvāt । tathāhi—sarvādau sarvānte ca tantrapadāni śrūyante । tāni prayogasamavetadevatānurodhena tatprakāśakapadavatāmeva sūktavākatvasiddhaye ācchidya sambandhanīyāni । adhyāpanakāle
tu prayogābhāvāt sarvaprākṛtadevatāprakāśakatvāttāvānevaikaḥ sūkta- vākaḥ । anyathākaraṇe'sūktavākatvaprasaṅgaḥ ।
taduktam—

lg.l: paṭhannanyādṛśaṃ tatra taṃ vināśayati dhruvam ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 770 )

tasyāmeva darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtau prayogakāle paurṇamāsyamāvāsyā- samudāyaprayogayorbhedānniṣkṛṣṭatadgatadevatāpadānyevohitasambandhāni ta- ntrapadānyekaḥ sūktavākaḥ । evañcāgneyavikṛtau saurya ekasyaiva sūryasta devatātvādekāgnidevatāpadasthānohitasūryyapadavāneva tantrapadopeta ekaḥ । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 770 )
ataḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayoryathāliṅgaṃ vibhajya sūktavāka- prayoga iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—yathādevatameva sūktavā- kasya praharaṇe prayogaḥ । pradhānīyadevatāprakāśanāparityāgenaiva haraṇe viniyogādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ liṅgakramasamākhyānādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: iha kāmyayājyānuvākyākāṇḍamudāharaṇam । “indrāgnī roca- nā divaḥ” “pracarṣaṇibhyaḥ” “indrāgnī navatiṃ puraḥ” “śnathaduvṛtram” ityādyā ṛcaḥ । brāhmaṇe ca kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ śrūyante—“aindrāgname- kādaśakapālaṃ nirvapedyasya sajātā viyāyuḥ” “aindrāgna mekadaśakapālaṃ nirvapedbhrātṛvyavān” “agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapedrukkā- maḥ” “agnaye veśvājarāya dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet sapatnamabhidhnokṣyan” ityevamādayaḥ । tadetā yājyānuvākyāḥ prati sandehaḥ—kiṃ yāva- tkiñcidaindrāgnaṃ karma tatra sarvatrānenaindrāgneya yājyānuvākyāyugalena bhavitavyam ? utaitasyāmevaindrāgnyāmiṣṭau kāmyāyām ? iti । evaṃ vaiśvānaryo yājyānuvākyāḥ । evaṃ sarvatrotsargāpavādābhyāṃ liṅgasya viniyojakatvaṃ nirūpyedānīṃ liṅgasyaiva viniyojakatvamuta pramāṇāntarasāpekṣasyeti tadgata eva viśeṣaścintyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapyatra yenaiva krameṇaindrāgnīdīni karmāṇi samāmnātāni tenaiva krameṇa taddevatyāni kāmyasamākhyāyuktāni yājyāpuronuvākyāyugalānyapi śrūyante । tathāca sati krameṇa
sāmākhyā ca tadaṅgatvenaiva yājyānuvākyāviniyogo yuktaḥ । tathāpi liṅgasya kramātsamākhyātaśca balīyastvādindrāgnyādiprakā- śanasāmarthyātmakena liṅgena kramasamākhyayorbādhitatvādindrāgnyādi- devatākakarmamātrāṅgatvameva yājyānuvākyānāṃ yuktamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi samānyasambandhanirapekṣaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojakaṃ bhavet । agnyādiprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ hi liṅgam । na cāgnyādisvarūpe viniyogaḥ sambhavati, vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । sambhavati tu teṣāṃ yāgāpūrvīyarūpe । na ca sāmānyasambandhamantareṇa yāgā- pūrvīyatvaṃ labhyate । tena yatra sāmānyasambandhāpādakaṃ vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vā samasti, tatra tadapekṣasyaiva liṅgasya viniyojakatvam । atra tu vākyaprakaraṇayorabhāvādyadi kramasamākhyāpekṣā na bhavet, tadā liṅgasya viniyojakatvameva na syāt । tenātra krameṇa yājyānuvā- kyānāmaindrāgnyādikāmyeṣṭibhissāmānyasambandho vaktavyaḥ । tatra kiṃ kurvato'syāṅgatvamiti viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ svābhidheyasamavetārthaprakā- śane viniyujyate । yatra punaḥ krameṇa sāmānyasambandhe jāte'pyapekṣā, kāryadvayasādhāraṇaṃ hi liṅgaṃ sandigdhatvāt kevalaṃ na viniyogasamarthaṃ, tatra vinigamanāsidhyarthaṃ samākhyāpyāśrīyate । yathā kevalāgnideva- tyasya karmaṇaḥ krama āgneyī ṛkpaṭhyate । tasyāśca liṅgena kārya-
dvayamavagamyate—samidhyamānāgniprakāśanamijyamānāgniprakāśanañca । tatra yadi yājyāsamākhyā nāśrīyeta, tadā prāthamyātsamidhyamānāgni- prakāśanārthatvameva syāt । yājyāsamākhyayā tu ijyate anayetījya- mānadevatāprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ mantrasya kalpyate । yadyapyabhidhānasāma- rthyaṃ na devatārthe, kintu yāgasamanvayisādhāraṇāgnisvarūpamātre । tathāhi—samākhyākalpitayāgaviṣayasāmarthyānurodhenejyamānadevatāpra- kāśana eva liṅgena viniyujyate । taduktam—

lg.l: yena ca kratusambandhastena kāmyārthatā sphuṭā ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 771 )
ataḥ sarvatra sāmānyasambandhapūrvaka eva liṅgaviniyoga iti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—liṅgakramasamākhyābhiḥ kāmyeṣṭisambaddhameva mantrasamāmnānaṃ na sarvatra yātītyarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamamāgneyyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgayaḥ
chapter.p:
jyotiṣṭome śrayate—“āgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhate, aindryā sadaḥ,
vaiṣṇavyā havirddhānam” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ prakṛtābhirevaṃli- ṅgābhirupasthātavyaḥ ? uta dāśatayībhya evaṃliṅgā āgamayitavyāḥ ? iti । sāmānyasambandhāpekṣaṃ liṅgaṃ vinayojakamiti pratipādyedānīṃ liṅgopalakṣitamantraviniyojikāyāḥ śruterapi sāmānyasambandhāpekṣaṃ viniyojakatvaṃ prasaṅgāt pratipādyate । atra bhāṣyānusāreṇa prathamama- prakṛtā dāśatayīkāṇḍapaṭhitā evāgneyyādaya āgnīdhrādyupasthāne viniyuktā iti । tadayuktam; prakṛtaparityāge kāraṇābhāvāt । na ca kāryāntaraviniyoga eva parityāge kāraṇam । dāśatayapaṭhi- tānāmapi kāryāntaraviniyuktatvena parityāgaprasaṅgāt । asti hi tāsāmapi kāryāntare viniyogaḥ—“yasyāśvine śasyamāne sūryyo nodiyādapi sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāt” iti । atha kāryāntara- viniyuktatve'pi tāsāṃ vacanavaśādapi viniyogaḥ, tadatra prakaraṇa- paṭhitānāmapi samānam । yattu prakṛtānāṃ stotraśastrasādhanatvena viśeṣaśāstrāvaruddhatvānna sāmānyaśāstraviṣayatvamityuktam, tadapi dāśatayakāṇḍapaṭhitānāmapi “sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāt” iti viśeṣaśāstrāvaruddhatvātsamānam । ato nātra dāśatayakāṇḍapaṭhitā- nāmeva viniyoga iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—āgneyīśabdena hi mantrāṇāṃ
viniyogaḥ । yathā ca prakṛtā āgneyī tathā dāśatayakāṇḍapaṭhitā api । tena sarvāsāmevāgneyyādiśabdopāttānāṃ prakṛtānāmaprakṛtānā- ñcāgnīdhrādyupasthāne viniyoga iti । nanu ‘sāsya devatā’ ityasmi- nnarthe taddhitāntamāgneyīpadamanuśiṣṭam । āgneyīśabdasya ca prakṛta- parāmarthakatvātprakaraṇapaṭhitā evāgneyyādayo viniyujyanta iti yuktam । ataḥ kathaṃ sarvaviṣayatvam ? ucyate—tatraivāsyeti sarva- nāmapadasya sannihitaviśeṣaviṣayatvam, yatra viśeṣyasya samudāyā- rthasya viśeṣaṇībhūtāvayavārthasambandho vidhīyate । yathā “āgneyo- 'ṣṭākapālaḥ” iti । atra hyagnisambandhasyāprāptatvādviśeṣaṇībhūtā- gnisambandho vidheyaḥ । tenāgnisambandhātprāgevāsyetiśabdaviṣayo nimittāntarasannidhānata eva vaktavyaḥ । yatra tu samudāyārthasya viśeṣaṇībhūtāvayavārthasambandho na vidheyaḥ, kintu prāksiddhāvaya-vā rthasambaddhaḥ samudāya eva kāryāntare viniyujyate, tatra prākprasiddhāva- yavārthasambandhino'rthānāsādya asyeti śrutiścaritārthā na paścādāgatena sannidhānenānyathākarttuṃ śakyate । yathā “āgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhate” ityatraiva । atra hyācā.... ....gnisamartho vidheyaḥ śabdārthasambandhasya lokasiddhatvenāvidheyatvāt । tena prasiddhāgnyādisambandhānāmṛcā- maviśeṣaṇaivāsyaśabdena parāmarthātsarvāsāmeva prakṛtānāmaprakṛtānāṃ vāgnīdhrādyupasthāne viniyoga iti ।

na caivaṃ sati “ekahāyanyā krīṇāti” ityatrāpi prākprasiddhai- kahāyanasambaddhāyā eva kraye viniyogādaviśeṣeṇaiva gomahiṣacchā- gādīnāmekaṃ hāyanamasyā iti bahuvrīhisamāsāntargatāsyaśabde- nopasthānaṃ vaktavyam । yatastatraikahāyanīvākye gopadaṃ śrūyate, tadarthasya ca vākyārthanvayaniyatatvāt gaurevaikahāyanī bhavatīti yuktam । iha tu na tatheti vaiṣamyam । tasmādadhikṛteṣu prakaraṇasthe- ṣvatadākhyeṣu vā prakṛteṣu sādhāraṇyenaiveṣṭatvātsādhāraṇo mantravidhi- riti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi śruterapi sāmānyasambandha- nirapekṣāyā viniyojakatvaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—“āgnīdhramupatiṣṭhate” iti na tāvadāgnīdhrasvarūpe'yamupasthānaviniyogo yuktaḥ, tatsvarūpe vidhyānarthakyāt । kintu jyotiṣṭomāpūrvīyarūpe । na ca jyotiṣṭo- māpūrvīyarūpe āgnīdhre jyotiṣṭomānapūrvīyā ṛgviniyoktuṃ śakyate । na hi sāmānyena śrāddhīyatvenānavagataṃ matsyamāṃsādikaṃ śrāddhaviśeṣe viniyujyate । yathā narabhāravahanayogyatvenānirūpito bhāraviśeṣavahane viniyujyate । tena prathamaṃ dāśatayakāṇḍapaṭhitānā-
māgneyyādīnāṃ jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasambandho vaktavyaḥ । na cānyatsā- mānyasambandhopapādakaṃ vacanamasti । idameva vākyaṃ sāmānya- viśeṣasambandhāpādakaṃ vaktavyam । prakaraṇādhītānāntu “agna āyāhi vītaye” ityādīnāṃ prakaraṇasamāmnānādeva jyotiṣṭomā- pūrvasambandhāvagateḥ । na cārthāttāsāmeva viniyogo yukta iti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 778 )
tena siddhasāmānyasambandhānāmeva prakṛtānāmṛcāmāgnīdhropasthā- ne viniyogo na tu kalpanīyasāmānyasambandhānāmaprakṛtānāmiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-tadākhyo jyotiṣṭomīyatvena ya ākhyāyate tasyaivāyaṃ mantrasya viniyogaḥ prakaraṇāt prakṛta- tvopapatteriti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ bhakṣādhikaraṇam
bhakṣapeṭikā
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: bhakṣamantraḥ śrūyate—“bhakṣehi mā viśa dīrghāyutvāya śanta- nutvāya, ehi vaso purovaso priyo me hṛdo'syāśvinostvā bāhubhyāṃ sadhyāsaṃrāyaspoṣāya varcase suprajāstvāya, nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā deva soma sucakṣā avakhyeṣam, /?/‘hinva me gātrā harivo gaṇānme mā vitītṛṣaḥ śivo me saptarṣīnupatiṣṭhasva mā me vāṅnābhimatigāḥ, /?/‘mandrābhibhūtiḥ keturyajñānāṃ vāgjuṣāṇā somasya tṛṣyatu, vasumadgaṇasya rudravadgaṇasyādityavadgaṇasya soma deva te matividaḥ prātassavanasya, mādhyandinasya savanasya, tṛtīyasya savanasya gāyatracchandasastriṣṭu- pchandaso jagatīcchandaso'gniṣṭata indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmi” ( tai. 3. 2. 5. ) ityevamādi । tatra sandehaḥ—kṛtsna evānupāko bhakṣaṇe vini- yojanīyaḥ ? uta kaścidasyāvayavo'nyatrāpi ? iti । liṅgasya viniyojakatvaṃ sāmānyasambandhasāpekṣamiti pratipādanaprasaṅgena śruterapi sāmānyasambandhasāpekṣaviniyojakatvamiti pratipādyedānīṃ liṅgata eva viśeṣaḥ—kiṃ sākṣādacoditeṣvarthākṣipteṣu liṅgasya viniyojakatvaṃ na veti nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “bhakṣehi” ityupakramasya “sadhyā- sam” ityantasya grahaṇārthatvam, “nṛcakṣasam” ityupakramasya “śrava- khyeṣam” ityantasyāvekṣaṇārthatvam, “hinva me gātrā” ityupakramasya “mā me vāṅnābhimatigāḥ” ityantasya grahaṇārthatvam, “mandrābhibhūtiḥ” ityupakramasya “bhakṣayāmi” ityantasya bhakṣaṇārthatvaṃ pratīyate, tathāpi somarasabhakṣaṇasyaiva vihitatvālliṅgasya vihitaviṣayamantraviniyoja- katvādgrahaṇāvekṣaṇasamyagjaraṇānāñca /?/ bhakṣaṇākṣepalabdhatvena lauṅgikaviniyogāyogyatvātkṛtsna evāyaṃ mantro bhakṣaṇe viniyujyate । kiñcopakrame “bhakṣehi” iti śrūyate । upasaṃhāre ca “bhakṣayāmi” iti । tenopakramopasaṃhārayorbhakṣaṇakīrttanādvaiśvānaravākyavatkṛtsnasyai- vānuvākasyaikavākyatvādbhakṣānuvākasamākhyānācca kṛtsnasyaiva bhakṣa- ṇārthatvam । kiñca grahaṇādīnāmarthapto lokadṛṣṭyā prāptatvāllauki- kyevetikarttavyatā yuktā । tena laukikapadenāpi tatprakāśanasiddherna vaidikamantrāpekṣā । tena grahaṇāvekṣaṇasamyagjaraṇādipadānāmapi viśiṣṭabhakṣaṇaprakāśanārthatvameva । ataścaikavākyatā, ekopakramopa- saṃhāragatabhakṣaṇakīrttanaliṅgādbhakṣānuvākasamākhyānācca kṛtsna eva mantro bhakṣaṇārtha iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavadevaṃ yadyarthaprāptaviṣaye laiṅgikaviniyogo mantrasya na bhavet । tathāhi—yadyapyatra grahaṇādayo na vidhīyante, tathāpi bhakṣaṇasya grahaṇādinā vinā asambhavādbhakṣaṇavidhyākṣipta- meva grahaṇamavekṣaṇañcāvaśyānuṣṭheyam । samyagjaraṇañca bhakṣaṇasyaiva pratipattirūpasya dravyabhakṣaṇaparyantasya vidhānādbhakṣaṇavidhivihitameva yatnāntarasādhyatvātpṛthaganuṣṭheyam । teṣāñcāsmṛtānāmanuṣṭhānāsambhavātte- ṣāmapi vaidikabhakṣaṇavidhyarthamavaśyānuṣṭheyatvenāsti smṛtihetuvaidiko- pāyāpekṣā । śaknoti ca bhakṣetyayaṃ mantro grahaṇādīn prakāśayitum । tena sūktavākavadyathāliṅgaṃ grahaṇādiṣu vibhajyaiva mantraḥ prayoktavya iti ।

yattūpakramopasaṃhārayorbhakṣaṇakīrttanādekavākyatvātkṛtsnasyaiva bha- kṣaṇārthatvamityuktam । tadayuktam; viprakṛṣṭatvāt । tathāhi— upakramopasaṃhāraikarūpyādekavākyatvam, tadanurodhāccāsamarthasya vākya- sya lākṣaṇikasāmarthyarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ kalpanīyam, tato'pi śrutiriti viprakarṣaḥ । grahaṇādyabhidhānasāmarthyātsākṣādeva śrutikalpanamiti sannikarṣādyabhidhānasāmarthyādeva vibhajyaviniyoga iti । samākhyā ca liṅgāddurbalā laukikī caikadeśadvāreṇāpyupapanneti na kiñcidanupa- pannam ।
prayojanam—prakṣoktam । sūtrantu—tasya mantrasya bhāgaśo bhakṣādapakarṣarūpālliṅgādgrahaṇāderupadiṣṭatvācca kathamaśrutasyopadi- ṣṭatvam ? tatrāha—arthasya bhakṣaṇākṣepasya coditatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ mandrābhibhūtyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: bhakṣānuvāke mandrādirbhakṣayāmyanto bhāgaḥ śrūyate । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ mandrādistṛpyatvityanta ekaḥ, vasumadgaṇādiraparaḥ ? uta mandrādirbhakṣayāmyanta eka eva mantraḥ ? iti । pūrvāpavādatveneda- mārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yathā pūrvādhikaraṇe bhakṣa- ṇaprakāśanaliṅgena bhakṣānuvākasya vibhajya viniyogo darśitaḥ, tathā tṛpterapi bhakṣaṇākṣiptatvāttatprakāśanaliṅgena mandrādestṛpyatvi- tyantasya vibhajya tṛptau viniyoga iti । na ca vācyam—
jyotiṣṭomāṅgasya mantrasya kathaṃ jyotiṣṭomānaṅgabhūtā tṛptirdvāramiti । yato na hyaṅgameva sarvatra mantradvāraṃ bhavati । anaṅgībhūtaphalaprakāśakasya mantra- syānaṅgatvaprasaṅgāt । kintarhi ? sambandhamātram । asti cātrā- pyaṅgabhūtabhakṣaṇadvāreṇa sambandha iti । tena mandrādistṛpyatvityanto vibhajya tṛptau prayoktavya iti । evaṃ prāpte—

abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyanuniṣpannāyāstṛpteḥ prakāśanaṃ kenāpyaṃśenopayujyate । tathāhi—anuṣṭhānopayuktamantrasya prakāśana- manuṣṭhānopayogitāvadekānuṣṭheyaphalaprakāśanena ? tadaprakāśanena vā ? yathā khalvanuṣṭheyamaprakāśitaṃ nānuṣṭhīyate, tathā niṣphalamapi nānuṣṭhīyata eva । tena phalaprakāśanamapyanuṣṭhānopayuktameva । tṛptistu nānuṣṭheyā, nāpyanuṣṭheyaṃ phalam । kintūpayuktaviśiṣṭasomarasapratipatyarthamanuṣṭhānā- ṅgabhakṣaṇādanuniṣpannāsau na mantreṇa prakāśanīyeti na tatprakāśa- nārthaṃ vibhajya mantrasya prayoga iti । taduktam—

lg.l: teṣāṃ mantra prakāśyatvaṃ nānuniṣpādināṃ bhavet ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 786 )

tena yadyapi tṛpyatviti pṛthakpadamākhyātārthaḥ svatantraḥ pratīyate, tathāpi pṛthakprakāśanānarhatvātprārthanāyāṃ prāptakālatāyāṃ vā loṭ- pratyayo varṇanīyaḥ । tadayamarthaḥ—anena bhakṣaṇena vāgindriyaṃ tṛptaṃ
bhaviṣyatīti prārthanā । athavānena bhakṣaṇena vāgindriyatṛpteḥ prāptaḥ kāla iti । evaṃ mandrādirbhakṣayāmyanta eka evāyaṃ mantro bhakṣaṇe prayoktavya iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—bhakṣaṇaguṇatvena tṛpteravidhā- nānmandrādirbhakṣayāmyanta eko mantraḥ । tayostṛptibhakṣaṇaprakāśakayo- rbhāgayorevārthasaṃyogādekabhakṣaṇārthasaṃyogādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśamindrapītādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
eṣa eva mantra udāharaṇam । iha ca pradānānyaindrāṇyanaindrāṇi ca vidyante । teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇānyapi santi । tatra sandehaḥ—kimaindreṣva- naindreṣu ca mantraḥ ? utaindreṣveva mantraḥ anaindrāṇāmamantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇa- miti । liṅgasamākhyābhyāṃ bhakṣaṇaśeṣabhūto mantra iti tāvanni- rūpitam । indrādyanekadevatābhyastasya somarasapradānasya śeṣabhakṣaṇā- nyapi pratipradhānamabhyasanīyānītyapi sthitam । tatra kimaindrapradāna-
śeṣabhūtabhakṣaṇa evāyaṃ mantro'ṅgam ? utaindrānaindrabhakṣaṇāṅgamitīdānīṃ prasaṅgāccintyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—tatra khalu mantre “somasya prātassavanasyendrapītasya bhakṣayāmi” iti śrūyate । tatra prātassavana- sya yassomastasyāhaṃ bhakṣayāmīti tāvadvaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ vyavasthitam । indrapītasyeti padasya tu kiṃ somasamānādhikaraṇyam ? uta savana- sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti sandehe savanasāmānādhikaraṇyam—indreṇa pītaḥ somo yasminsavane tadindrapītaṃ savanamiti । (?).... ....raso yaḥ somañcānekapadavikṣiptatvādindreṇa pīta iti tṛtīyāntatatpuruṣa- samāsāddurbalaḥ । tena samāsabalīyastvāt prādhānyācca somasya tasyaivendrapītapadenābhidhānam । na cānaindraḥ soma indrapītaśabde- nābhidhātuṃ śakyata iti liṅgenaindrapradānaśeṣabhūtasomabhakṣaṇa evāyaṃ mantro viniyujyate । na cānaindreṣūhena prayoga iti vaktavyam । prakṛtāvūhāsambhavāt । tenendrapītasyeti liṅgaviśeṣanirdeśātsa- mānavidhāneṣu prakṛtivikārabhāvarahiteṣu pradāneṣvanaindrāṇāmamantratva- miti । evamupakramya pūrvapakṣāntaramabhidhīyate—

asyāyamabhiprāyaḥ—yadyapyanaindreṣu mantro'yamasamavetārthaḥ, tathāpyūhenaiva teṣu prayoktavyaḥ । karmaikatve'pi pradānānāṃ bhinnānāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvopapatteḥ । tathāhi-upādiṣṭadharmo hi sarvaḥ prakṛtirbha- vet । anupadiṣṭadharmaśca sākāṅkṣā vikṛtiḥ । iha ca “indrāya tvā vasumata” iti mantreṇa somagrahaṇamānayoraindrapradānārthatvamevāvagamyate । yatra somastaddharmo'pi tatraivetyanaindrāṇāṃ pradānānāṃ somadharmavatvam, itarāṇi tu sākāṅkṣāṇyatideśena gṛhṇanti । codanāsāmānyātta- dvikāratvena dharmaprāptau satyāṃ yathādevatamūhenaiva mantraprayoga iti । nanu “somena yajeta” ityutpatteḥ sarvendravāyavādigrahaṇasādhāraṇatvātso- maprāpteranaindreṣvapi somaḥ tadvāreṇa somadharmaśca prāpta eva । ataḥ prakṛtivikāratvāsambhavenohābhāvādamantrakamevānaindrāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ mānañca bhaviṣyati । maivam ; sādhanabhūtamantravaśādeva sāmānyaśrutasyāpi somasya niyamopapatteḥ, vidyārūpasādhanavaśādiva tatsādhyabhūta- syāgnihotrādestraivarṇikaniyatatvamiti । tenānaindreṣvatideśādeva soma- dharmaprāptirvaktavyā । tathā ca sati yathādevatamūhenaiva mantraprayogaḥ । ‘tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati’ ityanena sūtrāvayavena liṅgadarśanamuktam । tacca bhāṣyavārttikayoreva suvyaktamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ punarabhyunnītādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atra viṣayabhāṣyamaviṣayatvādvistaratvāccopapādyate । tadartha eva likhyate । jyotiṣṭoma aindrāścamasāḥ । teṣu brahmādīnāmṛtvijāṃ catvāraścamasāḥ । te vaṣaṭkārānuvaṣaṭkārā aindragrahaṇamānābhyā- mindre paryavasitāḥ । apare ca maitrāvaruṇādīnāmṛtvijāṃ ṣaṭ cama- sāḥ । teṣu cendroddeśena vaṣaṭkāramātre hute arddhāvaśiṣṭe ca droṇakala- śānmitrāvaruṇādyuddeśena gṛhītaḥ somaraso'bhyunnītaḥ । tena ca mitrāvaruṇādyā devatāḥ ṣaḍijyante । tāni ca mitrāvaruṇādyuddeśena kriyamāṇāni pradānānīndrapradānavikṛtibhūtānīti pūrvanyāyenaiva siddham । teṣāṃ ṣaṭcamasānāṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇamantre sandehaḥ—kiṃ mitrāvaruṇapītasyetyūhaḥ karttavyaḥ ? utendramitrāvaruṇapītasya ? iti । idānīṃ pūrvapakṣoktanyāyānusāreṇava kṛtvācintayohaviṣaya- viśeṣaścintyate ।

atra siddhāntenopakramate । indroddeśena hutaśeṣavastu camaseṣu devatāntarārthaṃ droṇakalaśādānīya nikṣiptaḥ somarasaḥ punarabhyunnīta ityucyate । tasya devatāntaroddeśena home'pi sati taccheṣatvādūhena sarva evendramitrāvaruṇādaya upalakṣaṇīyā iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi camaseṣvaindraśeṣatvamasti, tathāpi mitrāvaruṇoddeśena prakṣiptarasasaṃrgādekatāpanno rasaḥ kṛtsna eva mitrāvaruṇārthāśrāvaṇapratyāśrāvaṇābhyāmapanītendrasambandhaḥ pradānakāle mitrāvaruṇārtha eva jātaḥ । tena pūrvendrasambandhasyāpanītatvātprakṛtau cāpanītadevatāsambandhasyānupalakṣaṇānnendra upalakṣayitavyaḥ, kintu mitrāvaruṇāveva । tenendrasyāpanayānnendra upalakṣaṇīya iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadīndrasambandho'panīto bhavet । devatāntarasambandhena hi pūrvadevatāsambandho nāpanītaḥ । devatāntara- sambandhaśca droṇakalaśādabhyunnīyamānasyaiva somarasasya । tasyaiva grahaṇavelāyāṃ devatāntarasambandhasya śāstreṇa pratipāditatvāt । yathāgṛhītasyaiva dravyasya devatoddeśena tyāgāt । āśrāvaṇapratyā- śrāvaṇayorapi tadarthatvameva । taduktam—

lg.l: devatāṃ yāṃ yaduddiśya dravyaṃ svatvena gṛhyate ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 790 )

tena yadyapi saṃsargidravyatvena dravyasya vibhāgo nāvagamyate, tathāpi śāstrāgatasya vibhāgasya vidyamānatvādindrārthagṛhītasya vacana- mantareṇa mitrāvaruṇādyarthatvena saṅkalpayitumaśakyatvānnānena samba- ndho'panīta iti indraśeṣasyāpi vidyamāntvātso'pyupalakṣayitavya iti । tasmādindramitrāvaruṇapītasyetyevamūhaḥ karttavya iti ।

nanu prākṛtapadoddhāreṇa tasya sthāne padāntaranikṣepaḥ khalūhaḥ । indramitrāvaruṇapītasyeti tu prayoge prākṛtamindrapadaṃ vidyata eveti kathamūhaḥ ? ucyate—indramitrāvaruṇaśeṣayorbhinnatvādbhedena bhakṣaṇama- ntrasyāpi prayogo bhavet, sa naivocitaḥ । tatrendraśeṣatvalakṣaṇā- rthendrapadasthāne mitrāvaruṇādipadoho naiva yuktāḥ kintu śeṣayormiśri- tatvāt tantre satyubhayorapi tantreṇaivātra prayogaḥ । tatretarapadānāṃ sādhāraṇatvādbhavatu tantroccāraṇam । devatāvācakasya tu yathāvasthi- tendrapadavyavahitamitrāvaruṇapadasyaiva bhinnatvena tantroccāraṇasmabhavā- dūhitānūhitapadayorāvṛttamevoccāraṇamiti na doṣaḥ । tenendramitrā- varuṇapītaṃ bhakṣayāmītyevaṃrūpa eva mantraprayoga iti siddham । kṛtvācintādhikaraṇatvānnātra pṛthak prayojanam ।
sūtrantu—indrārthasya śeṣasya mitrāvaruṇārthamagrahaṇe tatrendrasya devatāyā anapāyaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ pātnīvatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: asti pātnīvato grahaḥ—“yadupāṃśupātreṇa pāntīvatamāgrayaṇāt gṛhṇāti” iti । dvidevatyānāṃ hi śeṣā āgrayaṇasthālīmunnītāḥ, tataḥ pāntīvato gṛhyate । atha hute pātnīvate taccheṣe bhakṣyamāṇe bhavati sandehaḥ—kimaindravāyavādyā upalakṣayitavyāḥ ? uta na ? iti । pūrvāpavādatvenedamārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi jyotiṣṭoma āgrayaṇasthālīnāma- dheyaṃ somapātram, tathāpyabhiṣutaḥ pūtaḥ somaraso droṇakalaśeṣveva nikṣiptaḥ samasti । tatraiva ca dvidevatyānāmaindravāyavādīnāṃ hutaśeṣaḥ somaraso vacanānnikṣiptaḥ । tataḥ śrūyate—“āgrayaṇā- dupāṃśupātreṇa pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇāti” iti । atra vacanenāgrayaṇasamba- ndhinaḥ somarasasya pātnīvate grahaṇaṃ vidhīyate । tatra dvidevatyasa- śeṣabhakṣaṇa indravāyupatnīvatpītasyetyeva ūhena mantraprayogaḥ karttavya- iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavadevaṃ yadyāgrayaṇapātrasambandhitvamatra patnī- sambandhitve nimittamiti śrūyeta, kintvāgrayaṇādityapādānaśruterāgra- yaṇādapetatvamātram । tacca dvidevatyaśeṣasyāpi sampātāyātasyāstīti tadapi patnīvaddevatārthameva । taduktam—

lg.l: śeṣaścaiva tato'paiti tena saṅkalpyate tadā ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 791. )

pūrvādhikaraṇe tu mitrāvaruṇādyarthagrahaṇaṃ bhavet, kintu gṛhītasya paścātsampātāyātasya tatsaṃsargaḥ । ato'napanītapūrvadevatāsa- mbandhasyendraśeṣasya bhavatu pūrvadevatopalakṣaṇam । iha tu patnīvaddevato- ddeśena miśritasyaiva vacanavaśena devatāntarārthagrahaṇādyathāgṛhītasyaiva ca saṅkalpanādyuktaḥ pūrvadevatāpanayaḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: saṃhatena hi saṅkalpaḥ karttavyastatra codyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 791 )
tena patnovatpītasyetyetāvanmātramevohanīyamiti ।
prayojanam-na vaktavyameva । sūtrantu—patnīvadarthaṃ yaddvidevatya- syāpi śeṣasya grahaṇādapanītaṃ dvidevatāsambandhitvamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ tvaṣṭradhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: asti pātnīvataḥ somaḥ । tatra mantraḥ—“agnā i patnīvan sajūrdevena tvaṣṭrā somaṃ piba” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ tvaṣṭopala- kṣayitavyaḥ ? uta na ? iti । tasminneva pātnīvate kiṃ tvaṣṭurapi māntravarṇikaṃ devatātvamasti nāstīti tatprasaṅgāccintyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “upāṃśupātreṇa pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇāti” iti nirapekṣasyaiva patnīvatastaddhitāddevatātvamavagamyate, tathāpyasya mantrasya tāvadayamarthaḥ—he agne patnīvat tvaṃ somaṃ piveti । na ca paramārthataḥ patnīvato'gneḥ somapātṛtvaṃ sambhavati, kintūddeśyatvam । tena sambhavāduddeśyagatameva sahabhāvamavekṣya sa pratipādyata iti gamyate । na ca sahabhāve sati taddhitāvagatanirapekṣapatnīvaddevatāvirodhaḥ । yajetetyākhyātādhigatanirapekṣayajamānakarttṛtvasyeva vacanāt patnyanu- praveśavadupapatteḥ । tena tvaṣṭrā sahitasya patnīvataḥ śeṣaṃ bhakṣayāmītyūhe sati tvaṣṭāpyupalakṣayitavya iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
