ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi taddhitamantrayostulyavaddevatāprati- pādakatvaṃ bhavet । na tvevamasti taddhitena hi devatātvaṃ nirapekṣasya patnīvato'bhidhānenaiva pratipādyate । mantravarṇāttvanupapatyā kalpanīyam । na ca śrautakālpanikayostulyatvamasti । evamapi yathākathañci- tkalpyetāpi yadyanyasāpekṣā taddhitotpattirbhavet । na ca mantrasyā- pi tvaṣṭṭadevatātvārthakalpanāmantareṇānaṅgatvam । patnīvadabhidhānenai- vāṅgatvopapatteḥ । na ca sahapātṛtvanirdeśānyathānupapattyā tvaṣṭurapi devatātvam । sahapātṛtvanirdeśasya taddhitavirodhinaḥ stutyarthatve- nāpyupapatteḥ । nāpyekakriyānvayenaiva sahaśabdaproyogo'yamaikāntikaḥ । ‘sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī’ ityādiṣu vyabhicārāt । tatra hyetāvānartho'vagamyate—sastu daśasu putreṣu saiva gārdabhī bhāraṃ vahati । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 793)

yajetetyatra tvekavacanena kartturekatvamavagamyate । na tu taddhitāntā- divākyanirapekṣatvam । na ca patnīsahabhāvavidhānañcānyathopadarśayi- tuṃ śakyate । tena tatra bhavatu sahabhāvena patnyanupraveśaḥ । iha tu na tatheti vaiṣamyam । ato na tvaṣṭopalakṣaṇīya iti ।।
prayojanam—na vaktavyameva । sūtrantu-atulyatvāttaddhitamantra- yorna tvaṣṭurdevatātvamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ triṃśadadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: tasminneva pātnīvate mantre—“aibhiragne sarathaṃ yāhyarvāṅ nānārathaṃ vā vibhavo hyaśvāḥ । patnīvatastriṃśataṃ trīṃśca devānanuṣva- dhamāvaha. mādayasva” iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kiṃ trayastriṃśato devānāmupalakṣaṇam ? uta na ? iti । pūrvanyāya evodāharaṇāntare adhikāśaṅkāṃ nirākarttumatidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—ayaṃ hyatra mantrārthaḥ—he agne ebhirdevaiḥ sahārvācīnaṃ samaṃ vā rathamāruhyāyāhīti । āṭo vyavahitasambandhaḥ sambhavati । te aśvāḥ prabhāvayuktā bhavanti । āgatya ca patnīvatastra- yastriṃśaddevānanuṣvadhamāvaha, āhūya mādayasva tarpaya ebhirviśiṣṭa iti yāvat । tenātra trayastriṃśaddevānāṃ tarpaṇīyatvena prādhānyāvagamātteṣāṃ devatvameva । pūrvādhikaraṇe tu ‘sahayukte'pradhāne’ (pā. sū. 2. 3. 19)
ityaprādhānyānuśiṣṭatṛtīyānirddeśāttvaṣṭurna devatātvam, kintu stutyartha- tvam । svabhāvakīrttanameveti śeṣaḥ । na cātrāgnerapi pariveṣṭṭatvenā- bhoktṛtvāttvaṣṭṛvadadevatātvamiti vācyam । pariveṣṭṭatvasya bhoktṛtvā- virodhāt । yathā loke'pi gaṇabhoktaiva kaścidbhuktavān bhokṣyamāṇo vā pariveṣṭā bhavatīti । na ca “āgrayaṇātpāttīvataṃ gṛhṇāti”itivadvā kaścidviśeṣo'sti, yenāgnerdevatātvaṃ nānyasyetyevaṃ niścīyate । tena “pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇati” ityatra taddhitena patnīvanmātrasyaiva devatātvābhidhāne sati ko'sau (?) patnīvatsambandhāvagamātsamuccitayorapi devatātvam । tenāgnivattūyastriṃśaddevā apyupalakṣaṇīyā iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi taddhitāntapātnīvatapadamekasminnagnau trayastriṃśati deveṣu ca tulyavatpravartteta । na tvetadasti । tathāhi— patnīvān devatā asyeti yadi vigrahastadā śīghrapratītivaśādeka evāgnierdevatā । atha patnīvanto devatā asyeti vigragaḥ, tadā triṃśato devatānāṃ pratyekasamavetaikaikatvatrayastriṃśato devatāparyālocanena bhinnapadopāttāgniparyālocanenākṣiptavilambitapratītirbhavet । na ca śīghrapratītisambhave vilambitapratītirātmānaṃ labhate । tenāgnireva patnīvaddevateti । na ca mantravarṇāvagatabhoktṛtvānyathānupapatyā trayastriṃśato devānāmapi devatātvam । pāramārthikabhoktṛtvābhā-
vena stutiparatve sati vidhivākyaparyālocanena vihitāgnerevaiśvaryaprakā- śanaparatvenopapatteḥ—evaṃbhūto'yamagniḥ trayastriṃśaddevān bhojayatīti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 795 )
tasmāttvaṣṭṭavadeva trayastriṃśadapi nopalakṣaṇīyā iti ।
prayojanam—na vaktavyam । sūtrantu—triṃśadapi nopalakṣa- ṇīyāḥ parārthatvādvihitāgnistutyarthatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśamanuvaṣaṭkārādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: astyatra vaṣaṭkāradevatā “somasyāgne vīhītyanuvaṣaṭkaroti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimanuvaṣaṭkāradevatopalakṣaṇīyā neti । atrāpi sa eva nyāyaḥ kenacidviśeṣeṇodāharaṇāntare'tidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—bhavatu trayastriṃśato devatānāṃ
devatātvābhāvādanupalakṣaṇam । iha tu “somasyāgne vīhi” ityasya homamantrasya karaṇatvenānuvaṣaṭkāre viniyogādagneścodanayā mantra- varṇāccānuvaṣaṭkāradevatātvamaikāntameva । tasmādanuvaṣaṭkāraśeṣa- bhūtasomabhakṣaṇe agnirapyupalaṇīya eveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi droṇakalaśādanuvaṣaṭkāradevatārthaṃ somo gṛhyate । kintarhi ? pradhānadevatārthena । anuvaṣaṭkāro hi pratipattikarma, tena hi pradhānadevatārthamāhṛtameva dravyaṃ pratipādyate । ato yathā pūrvataḥ pātādhvaryurhotā vā itarapānāntareṇa pratipatti- karmasambandhitvena nopalakṣyate, tathānuvaṣaṭkāradevatāpi । tadā hyupa- lakṣyeta yadi ca prakṛtāvaindrapratipattisambandhina upalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet । na caivamasti । taduktam—

lg.l: aprākṛtaṃ na kurvīta tathaināmapi devatām ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 797)
tena tvaṣṭṭavattrayastriṃśadvadanuvaṣaṭkāradevatāpyagnirnopalakṣaṇīya eveti ।
prayojanam—na vaktavyameva । sūtrantu—pānakarttṛvadanuvaṣaṭ- kāradevatāpi nopalakṣaṇīyeti ।।
chapter.head: atha saptadaśamanaindrāṇāmamantrakabhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: sthitāduttaramucyate । naitadasti, yaduktamūhena mantravadbhakṣaṇaṃ karttavyamiti । dvedhā hi pūrvapakṣitam—amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam, ūhena vā । tatrohapūrvapakṣābhyupagamenaiva pañca vicārān parisamāpyedānī- mūhapūrvapakṣameva nirācaṣṭe ।

ayamatra siddhāntino'bhisandhiḥ—prakṛtivikārabhāve hi satyūho bhavati । na caikasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ sambhavati । na ca grahaṇābhyāsāḥ pṛthakkarmāṇi, yena teṣāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvo bhavet । na ca teṣāṃ madhye keṣāñcideva somasamatva- manyeṣāñca prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ sambhavati । sarveṣāmeva yāgadvāreṇa yugapatsarvadharmatvāt । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 798)

nanu “indrāya vasumate tvā gṛhṇāmi” iti mantrasya grahaṇa- dvāreṇendrapradānārthatvāttadvaśenaindrapradāna eva somadharmaniyamaḥ, āhava- nīyasambandhavaśeneva traivarṇikasyāgnihotrādiniyama ityuktam । maivam ; bhavatvanārabhyotpannasyāhavanīyasya “yadāhavīye juhvati”
ityanenānārabhyavādena sarvahomārthasya traivarṇikamātrasambandhasya homaniyāmakatvam, āhavanīyavyatirekeṇa homāsambhavāt tasya ca traivarṇikamātravyavasthitatvāt । na cāsya tadvatsomārthatvam, yena mantreṇa vinānyaḥ somo grahītumeva na śakyate, kintu liṅgaprakaraṇābhyāmaindrasomārthatvameva mantrasya । tenaindra eva somo mantreṇa gṛhyate । itareṣāñcāmantrakaṃ grahaṇamiti prathama eva pūrvapakṣaḥ sādhīyāniti ।
sūtrantu—pūrvoktaliṅgadarśanasamādhānārthatvācca bhāṣyavārtikayo- ssuvyaktamiti ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭādaśamaindrāgnabhakṣasyāmantrakatvādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: asti tatraindrāgnaḥ somaḥ—“aindrāgnaṃ gṛhṇāti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—mantravadbhakṣaṇamamantrakaṃ veti । aindrāṇāṃ samantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇa- manaindrāṇāmamantrakamiti prathamapūrvapakṣe sthite idānīṃ kṛtvācintayā- vicārāntaramārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—bhavatvanaindrāṇāmamantrakaṃ
bhakṣaṇam । aindrāgne tvindrakarttṛkasya yāgasya vidyamānatvāccheṣabhakṣaṇe mantraḥ prayoktavya eva । nanu dvidevatyasyaikena vyapadeśaḥ caturddhākaraṇa eva nirākṛtaḥ । tathāhi—tatra sāpekṣasyāgnerāgneya iti taddhiteno- panyastatvādagnīṣomīyayoḥ puroḍāśayornāgneyaśabdenopādānam । tathe- ndrapīta iti samāsasyāpi sāpekṣādindrapadānupādānānnāgnisāpe- kṣendraviṣayatvamiti । tenaiva gatatvānnārabdhavyamidamadhikaraṇam । maivam ; evamatra pūrvapakṣavādī manyate—agnirasya devatetyāgneyaḥ । devatātvañcauddeśarūpayajamānasaṅkalpaviṣayatvam । taccāgneyataddhitenāsya nirapekṣāgnerevopāttamiti dvidevatyapuroḍāśaṃ na pratipādayatītyuktam । indreṇa pīta ityatra tu sampradānakṛtayāgarūpavyāpāraviṣayatvam । taccobhayoddeśaparityaktasyāpi svakīyabhāge'nyanirapekṣasyāpi sambha- vatyeva । tathaindrāgne mantraliṅgasadbhāvādindrapītasyeti mantraḥ prayoktavya eveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadīndrapītaśabdo'yaṃ mukhyo bhavet । na caitatsambhavati । devatāyāḥ somarasapānāsambhavāt । pāne'pi caṃ hutāvaśiṣṭasyāpītatvena indrapītavyapadeśānarhatatvāt । na
cānyasmin pīte anyaḥ pīta iti vyapadeṣṭuṃ śakyate । tena lakṣaṇayā saṅkalpaparo'yam । indrapītasyetīndrāya saṅkalpita ityarthaḥ । tathāca sati kṛtsnasyaivendrāya saṅkalpitatvāt śeṣo'pi vyapadeṣṭuṃ śakyata iti । taduktam—

lg.l: yo hi tāvaddhutaḥ somaḥ sa naivamabhidhīyate ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 800 )
na caindrapradānasya miśrasaṅkalpitasyānyataravyapadeśaḥ samāsa- vṛttendrapadena sambhavati । taddhitasāpekṣasamāsaniṣedhāt । tasmādaindrāgnasyāpyamantrakameva bhakṣaṇamiti ।
prayojanam—na vaktavyam । sūtrantu—ekasminnaindre devatā- ntarādagnervicchidya mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ । caturddhākaraṇarūpapuroḍāśa- vibhāga iveti ।।
chapter.head: athaikonaviṃśaṃ bhakṣamantrasya gāyatrānyacchandaske'pi
viniyogādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
tasminneva mantre “gātatracchandasaḥ” ityucyate । tatra sandehaḥ—
kimekacchandasi some mantraḥ ? uta nānācchandasyāpi ? iti । pūrvāpavādatvenedamārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ-yathendrapītasyeti sāpekṣatvadoṣānna sambhavati, tathā gāyatracchandasa ityapi nānācchandasi sāpekṣatvadoṣādeva na sambhavati । tena yadyapi jyotiṣṭome kevalagāyatracchandāḥ somo nāsti, tathāpi yatra kevalagāyatracchandāḥ somo'sti, tatraivāsya mantrasya prayogaḥ । ataḥ chando'pi devatāvannirapekṣameva viśeṣaṇa- miti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi gāyatracchandāḥ kvacidapi vede bhavet । na tvetadasti । trayāṇāmapi vedānāṃ kvacitsādhanāṃśe chandontarasyāvaśyaṃbhāvitvāt । ato rathantarasāmavatastvayogavyava- cchedenaiva gāyatracchandasa iti viśeṣaṇatvam, nānyayogavyavacchedena । tena sāpekṣamasamarthamityetadapi na nityasāpekṣaviṣayam । yatra nairapekṣyamapi sambhavati, tadviṣayamevaitat । taduktam—

lg.l: sāpekṣasyāgrahastatra na tu yatrāpi nāsti tat ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801)
ato'tra kevalagāyatracchandaso'bhāvānnānācchandasvo'pi some prayoktavya evāyaṃ mantra iti ।
prayojanam—na vaktavyameva । sūtrantu—sarveṣu nānācchanda- skeṣu mantraḥ, gāyatryekacchandasaḥ somasyābhāvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha viṃśa indrapītādhikaraṇaśeṣaḥ
indrapītādhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
yaduktamaindrāṇāmamantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇamiti, naitat ; sarveṣāṃ samantrakamiti । yathā samāmnātaśca mantraḥ syāt । evaṃ tāvattṛ- tīyātatpuruṣasamāsāśrayaṇenendrapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamiti kṛtvā ai- ndrāṇāṃ samantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇamanaindrāṇāmamantrakamiti prathamapūrvapakṣani- rāsena pāramārthikaḥ siddhānto'bhidhīyate । ayamabhiprāyaḥ— bhavedevaṃ yadi indrapītasyeti padaṃ tṛtīyāsamāsena somasamānādhikaraṇaṃ
bhavet । kintarhi ? bahuvrīhisamāsāśrayaṇena savanasamānādhikaraṇa- midam । indreṇa pītassomo yasminsavane tadbhavatīndrapītaṃ savanam । tasya savanasya yassambandhī somaḥ so'nindrapīto'pi śakyata evendrapītasyeti vyapadeṣṭumityavikṛta eva mantrassarvaḥ śeṣabhakṣaṇe prayoktavyaḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: tasya yo'nyo'pi sambandhī sa evaṃ vyapadiśyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 802 )

nanu bahuvrīhisamāsasyānekapadavivakṣitatvāttṛtīyāsamāsā- ddurbalatvamityuktam । tatkathaṃ savanasamānādhikaraṇamiti । ucyate—indrapītasya somasyeti ṣaṣṭhyantasya bhakṣaṇakriyāsamba- ndhānupapatteranyabhakṣaṇopadeśāccendrapītasya somasyāvayavaṃ bhakṣayāmī- tvavayavapadamavaśyamatrādhyāharttavyam । na ca bhakṣaṇīyo vidyamānaḥ śeṣa indreṇa pītaḥ, indrāya vā dattaḥ । tena vidyamānatvāccheṣo nendrapītaśabdārthaḥ । na cendroddeśatyaktasya bhāgasyendrapītatvādvidya- mānasya ca tadekadeśatvādavidyamāna evendrapītaśabdenābhidhīyata iti vācyam । yataḥ sambandhasāmānye somasyeti ṣaṣṭhī । na cāvidya- mānasya sambandho'tropalakṣaṇatvenāśrayaṇīyaḥ । na vidyamānasambandhe sambhavati bhūtapūrvasambandhāśrayaṇam ।
kiñca yadyasau kṛsna evaikena bhakṣyate (?) indrapītāvayavatvāt । na hi kapālāvayavo ghaṭāvayavo bhavati । tenaupacārika evāyaṃ tadavayavavyapadeśaḥ । na ca mukhye sambhavatyaupacārikāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam । yadā tvindreṇa pītaṃ yasmin savane tasya savanasya yaḥ soma iti vyutpatyā vidyamānaśeṣa evābhidhīyate, tadā tadavayavabhakṣaṇe sati nātītasambandhopalakṣaṇatvam । nāpyanavayave'vayavaśabda iti bahuvrīhisamāsa eva yuktaḥ । nanu bahuvrīhisamāse'pi mukhyapītaśabde- nendroddeśena tyāgo lakṣaṇīyaḥ, tadatrendroddeśena grahaṇameva lakṣyatām । tathāca sati vidyamānasyāpi śeṣasyendroddeśena gṛhītatvānna pūrvokta- doṣaprasaṅga iti । maivam ; lakṣitalakṣaṇādoṣāt । tathāhi— pānena tyāgo lakṣaṇīyaḥ । tyāgena ca taduddeśena grahaṇam । bahuvrīhipakṣe tu tyāgamātralakṣaṇam । kiñcāpekṣāvaśātprakaraṇāviśeṣā- ccaitadevocitam । tathāhi—dharmapradānānyeva śeṣabhakṣaṇe tatprakāśakaṃ mantramapekṣante । prakaraṇañca jyotiṣṭomasyāviśiṣṭameva । bahuvrīhisamā- sāśrayaṇena sarveṣāmeva samantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇamiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—aindrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ caikamantryamiti aitiśāyanasyācāryasya matam । yataḥ savananirddeśo'- yamindrapītasyeti । anyathāpīta eva gauṇaḥ pītaśabdaprayogaḥ samprasajyeteti ।
chapter.head: iti bhakṣapeṭikā
tautātitamatatilake tṛtīyasyādhyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
atha tṛtīyādhyāsya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
tatra prathamamupakramādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
jotiṣṭome śrūyate—“uccaiṛcā kriyate, uccaiḥ sāmnā, upāṃśu yajuṣā” iti । tatra sandehaḥ-kimṛgādijātimadhikṛtyaite śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ ? athavā vedamadhikṛtya ? iti । evaṃ liṅgaviniyogaṃ pratipādyedānīmavasaraprāpto vākyaviniyogaḥ prastūyate । atroccaistvā- didharmo vidhīyamānaḥ kimṛgādijātiśeṣatayā vidhīyate ? kimṛgve- dādiviṣayatayā ? iti । nanu mantrabrāhmaṇātmako vedaḥ, eka eva ca ṛṅmamtro vedatraye'pi paṭyate । atastasya vedatrayarūpatvādanadhyava- sāyo vikalpo vā bhavet । jātadharmatve tu pādabaddhaṛksamba-
ndhānnānadhyavasāyo nāpi vikalpa iti jātadharmatvameva yuktam । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 804 )

ataḥ sandehābhāvātkathamatra vicāra iti । ucyate— syādevaṃ yadi ṛgvedena yatprakāśyate taduccairuccāriteneti siddhānta- vacanavyaktirbhavet । kintarhi ? yadṛgvedena vidhīyate taduccairiti । ekasya ca mantrasya vedatrayapāṭhe'pi na sarvatra vidhānamasti । yena yenaiva yo mantro vidhīyate taddharmatvameva tasya । atha kaścidvedadvayena vidhīyate, tadā tulyatvādagatyā vikalpa eveti । tadayaṃ sandehārthaḥ—kimṛgjātena yatprakāśyate taduccaiḥsveraṇānuṣṭhātavyam ? uta sāmavedena yadvidhīyate, taduccaiḥ svareṇānuṣṭhātavyamiti । siddhāntayuktibalena tu yājyānuvākyāsu vihitasvarūpeṇaiva svarānuṣṭhānaṃ karmasu ca prakāśakamantradvāreṇaiveti vivektavyam । tadarthañca bhāṣyavārtikayoḥ kāraṇasandeho'yamupanyastaḥ—kimṛkchabdo jāta paraḥ ? athavā vedaparaḥ ? iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—‘teṣāmṛgyatrāthavaśena pādavyavasthā’ ityā-
diṣu ekārthāvacchinnapādasamūhātmako mantra ṛkchabdārthaḥ ekārthā- vacchinnapadasamūhātmakaśca mantro yajuḥśabdārthaḥ । ṛgāśritaḥ svarasamūhātmakaśca gītiviśeṣaḥ sāmaśabdārtha iti nirūpitameva । tena “uccairṛcā kriyata” ityādiṣu śrautaṛgādyuddeśenaivavoccaiṣṭvādidha- rmo vidhīta iti jātadharmatvameva ।

nanvarthavādopakramamidaṃ vākyam । tatra ca prathamaṃ vedaḥ śrūyate । tathā hi “prajāpatirvā idameka āsīt sa tapo'tapyata tasmāttepānā- ttrayo devā asujyanta—agnirvāyurādityaḥ । te tapo'tapyanta, tebhya- stapastepānebhyastrayo vedā asṛjyanta—agnerṛgvedaḥ, vāyoryajurvedaḥ, ādityātsāmavedaḥ” iti । tatra śrūyate—“uccairṛcā kriyate, uccaiḥ sāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā” iti । tenopakramānurodhādṛgādipadaṃ lakṣaṇayā vedaparameva yuktam । na ca lakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ, doṣaḥ, vede upakrame'pi mantraparatvena lakṣaṇāsvīkārāt । kiñca yatropasaṃhārasthārthavādānu- rodhenā'pi “aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti” ityatra vidhyuddeśārthavarṇanam, tatropakramasthārthavādānurodhe sutarāmevocitamiti kathamṛgādipadānāṃ jātaparatvamiti । ucyate—“aktāḥ śarkarā” ityādiko hi vidhyuddeśaḥ sandigdhatayā tatrārthavādamapekṣatām, iha tvṛgādipadānāṃ nissandigdhajātavacanātvānnārthaviśeṣamavadhārayitumapekṣā samasti, yenārthavādamapekṣeran । kiñca vidhiśeṣo hyarthavādo vivakṣitalakṣaṇā-
vṛttaśca । tena pradhānabhūtavidhyuddeśānurodhena tasyaiva lakṣaṇāvṛtta- tvamucitam, na tu vidhyuddeśasya । kiñca “aktāḥ śarkarāḥ” ityatra vidhyuddeśākṣiptāñjanasādhanadravyasāmānyasya, nāpi vidhīyamānāñcana- kriyāyāḥ “tejo vai ghṛtam” iti vākyaśeṣasthaghṛtagrahaṇe kaści- dvirodhaḥ samasti । iha tu vidhyuddeśagatasya ṛgādipadasya svārthapari- tyāgena vedaparatvamiti bhavati virodhaḥ taduktam—

lg.l: yathā ca dravyasāmānyaṃ kriyā vā na virudhyate ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 803 )

kiñca jātadharmatve jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇamapyaviruddhaṃ bhavati । jātarūpasya mantrasya jyotiṣṭome kārtsnyenaiva vidyamānatvāt । vedadharmatve tu mantrabrāhmaṇavākyasamūhātmakasya vedasya jyotiṣṭome kārtsnyenābhāvādanyatrāpi ṛgvedena yadvidhīyate, tadupāṃśa karttavyamiti prakaraṇabādhaḥ । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 804 )
tena ṛgādipadānāṃ śrutyanurodhājjātadharmatvamevoccaiṣṭvādīnā- miti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyupakramasthārthavāde vedaḥ śrūyamāṇo nāvagamyeta । tathāhi—vedastāvadupakrame pratīyate । stutiviṣayaśca sa eva bhavati, yo vidhīyate । yatra vānyādvidhīyate, tatra vedasya svārthapratipādane sāmarthyataḥ prāptatvātkimatra vidheyamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tadekavākyatāpannena “uccairṛcā kriyate” ityanenoccaiṣṭvādi vidhī- yamānaṃ vedasambindhitvenaiva pratīyate । na ca “uccairṛcā kriyate” iti ṛṅmantrāvagamānna vedaviṣayatvamiti vācyam । upakramānurodhena vidhyuddeśagataṛgādipadānāmapi lakṣaṇayā vedaparatvāt ।

nanu viśeṣo hyarthavādo'svārthaparaśca । ataḥ prathamovagate'pi pradhānabhūtavidhyuddeśānurodhena tasyaiva lakṣaṇayā ṛgādimantraparatva- mucitam । viparītantu kutaḥ ? ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi ṛgādi- sambandhenoccaiṣṭvādividhirlabdhātmako bhavet । iha tu prathamaṃ stūya- mā/?/navedāvaruddhabuddhinā vidhyuddeśagatamapi caramaṃ pratīyamānamṛgādipadaṃ vedaparameva pratīyata ityarthavādaviparītārthatvābhāvānnārthavādastha- vedaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā ṛgādiparatvamiti । tena yadyapi vidhyudde- śārthavādayoḥ pradhānaguṇabhāvena balābalamastyeva, tathāpyuktanyā- yenopakramasthavedajñānasyaiva balavatvādvidhyuddeśagataṛgādipadānāmeva vedalakṣaṇārthatvam ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 806 )

yatra punaḥ pūrvajñānanirapekṣamevottaraṃ jñānaṃ pūrvaviparītamutpadyate, tatra pūrvābādhenottarasyātmalābhābhāvādbhavatu pūrvajñānasyaiva bādhaḥ । yathā—śuktāvidaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānayoḥ taduktam—

lg.l: anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ yatra janma dhiyāṃ bhavet ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 806 )

na ca vidhyuddeśe lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ, anuvādagatatvenāduṣṭatvāt । yathā khalvanyatrārthavādānāmanuvādakatvāllakṣaṇāvṛttiraduṣṭā, tathātrārthavādā- vagatavedaviṣayāṇāmṛgādipadānāmapyanuvādakatvāllakṣaṇāvṛttvamaviru- ddham । kiñceyaṃ lakṣaṇā vedenaivāśritā । yathā—“ṛgbhiḥ pūrvāhve divi deva īyate yajurvede tiṣṭhati madhye ahnaḥ, sāmavedenāstamaye mahīyate vedairaśūnyastribhireti sūryaḥ” iti । atra hi yajuḥsāmagata- vedaśabdasāhacaryādante ca vedairiti bahuvacananirddeśādupakramastharkpa- dasyāpi vedaviṣayatvameva nirṇīyate । ato na ṛgādipadebhyo vedapratītivaimukhyam ।

yattu vedadharmatve jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇaṃ bādhyata ityuktam, tadanu-
manyāmaha eva, balavatā vākyena sarvatraiva prakaraṇabādhasyeṣṭatvāt । api ca jātadharmatve “uccaiḥ sāmnā” iti vākyamanarthakameva syāt । “ṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma gāyati” iti sāmnāmṛgāśrayatvena ṛcāmevo- ccaiṣṭvena sāmnāmapyuccaiṣṭvasiddheḥ । vedadharmatve tu ṛgvedenāpyanyadvi- dhīyate sāmavedenāpyanyaditi nāyaṃ doṣaḥ । tadayamartho bhavati— “uccairṛcā kriyate” iti ṛgvedena yatkriyate ṛgyajussāmarūpaṃ taduccaissvareṇānuṣṭhātavyam । atha ca ṛgvedavihito'rtho mantradvāreṇai- voccaiḥsvareṇānuṣṭhātavyaḥ । na tvṛṅmantreṇa yatkriyata iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—prāyadarśanādveda evoccaiṣṭvā- dividhāne ṛgādiśabdairuddiśyate, prāyadarśanādupakrame kīrttanāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ guṇamukhyavyatikramādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
astyādhānam—“ya evaṃ vidvātagnimādhatte” iti । tadyāju- rvaidikam । tatra sāmagānamāmananti—“ya evaṃ vidvān vāravantīyaṃ gāyati, ya evaṃ vidvān yajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati, ya evaṃ vidvān
vāmadevyaṃ gāyati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimādhāne sāmagānamuccaiḥ ? utopāṃśviti । pūrvamuccaiṣṭvādīnāṃ vedadharmatvaṃ pratipāditam । idānīṃ yatra vedāntaravihitasya pradhānasya vedāntaravihitamaṅgaṃ bhavati, tatra katamo vedadharmaḥ syāditi prasaṅgānnirūpyate । atra yadyapi vāmadevyādisāmnāṃ sāmavede pāṭha evotpattiḥ, na tu pṛthagutpattividhirasti, tathāpyutpatti- vidhirastīti kṛtvācintayāyaṃ vicāraḥ । vedāntare'nurūpamaṅgamutpa- dyate vākyena vedāntarīyapradhāne viniyuktaṃ tadīyaprayogavacanena gṛhyate, tatra phaliṣyati ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—pūrvaṃ hi “uccaiḥ sāmnā kriyate” iti sāmavedena yadvidhīyate taduccaiḥ karttavyamiti nirūpitam । vāmadevyagānādīnāñca sāmavedāmnātānāṃ sāmavaidikotpattividhivi- viṣayatvam । yājurvaidikādhānāṅgatvena yājurvaidikapradhānīyaprayoga- vidhiviṣatvam । tatrānyatarasvaraparigrahe kataraḥ svaraḥ parigṛhyatāmiti sandehe utpattividheḥ prathamāvagatatvādasādhāraṇatvācca prayogavidheścara- māvagatatvātsādhāraṇatvācca utpattividheḥ svaraparigraha evocitaḥ । nānāvidhāṅagapradhānasādhāraṇo hi prayogavidhiḥ । utpattividhistu vāmadevyādigānapratyarthapratiniyataḥ । tenaiṣāmutpattividhinimittakaḥ svaro yukta iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyaṅgadharmānuṣṭhāne pradhānadharmabādhadoṣo na bhavet । tathāhi—pradhānamaguṇaṃ bhavatītyaṅgānyanuṣṭhīyante । yadyaṅgadha- rmānurodhena pradhānadharmo bādhyate, tadā yadarthamaṅgānuṣṭhānaṃ tadeva hīyeta । aṅgasya tu vaiguṇye'pi tatsaguṇatvasyācikīrṣitatvātpradhānasaguṇatva- sya ca siddhatvānna kaściddeāṣaḥ । tena yadyapi vāravantīyādisāmnaḥ svarūpasiddhamuccaiṣṭvaṃ yājurvaidikaprayogavidheśca sāmapradhānaviṣayatvena pradhānadvāraprāptamupāṃśutvam, tathāpi tasya pradhānadharmatvenaiva balīya- stvādguṇadharmabādha eveti । taduktam—

lg.l: yatra syāttatra vijñeyaṃ guṇadharmasya bādhanam ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 810 )

nanvevaṃ sati yājurvaidikaprayogavidhivihitānāṃ vāravantīyādi- sāmnāṃ svata evopāṃśutvaprāpteḥ kathaṃ guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyaviṣa- yatvam । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi yājurvaidikaḥ prayogavidhiḥ sākṣātpradhānamivāṅgamapi spṛśet । sa hyaṅgaviśiṣṭaṃ pradhānamanuṣṭheyatayā vidadhadviśiṣṭavidhinyāyena kalpitavidhivihitaviśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭameva pradhānaṃ vidhatte । na ca kalpitaviśeṣaṇavidhīnāṃ yājurvaidikatvam, tatra teṣāmapaṭhitatvāt । pradhānasyaiva svataḥ siddhamupāṃśutvaṃ na tvaṅgānām ।
kathaṃ tarhyaṅgānāmupāṃśutvam ? ucyate—sāṅgasya hi pradhānasya yājurvaidikaprayogavidhivihitatvenopāṃśutvamanuṣṭheyam । yadyaṅgānāṃ nānuṣṭhāyepta, tadā sāṅgasya nānuṣṭhitaṃ bhavatīti pradhānasaguṇatvārtha- mevāṅgeṣvanuṣṭhīyate । anyathā pradhānameva viguṇaṃ bhavatīti । nanvaṅga- dharmāṇāmutpattividhinimittatvena prathamopanipātātpratyātmaniyatatvena cāsādhāraṇatvātprabalapradhānadharmasya tu pradhānadvāreṇa paramparayā prāptatvāccaramabhāvitvācca durbalatvam । atastadeva bādhyata iti yuktam । maivam ; uktamevaitatpūrvādhikaraṇe nirapekṣotpannayorvirodhe vijñānayoḥ pūrvabādhenottarasyotpattyasambhavāccaramabhāvināpyuttareṇa pūrvasyaiva bādhaḥ tenaikasminvākye pūrvapadārthasāpekṣatvāduttarapadārthā- vadhāraṇasya bhavatu pūrvasyaiva balavatvam । iha tu bhinnavākyatvena nirapekṣatvācchuktirajatavaduttarasyaiva balīyastvam । ataḥ pradhāna- dharmeṇopāṃśutvenāṅgadharma evoccaiṣṭvaṃ bādhyata iti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—guṇapradhānadharmayorvirodhe pradhānatvādnaṇasya pradhānārthasambandhivedavaśenaiva guṇasya dharmasambandha iti ।

tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṃ vārtikakārapadā nānumanyante, “aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyāt” ityanenaiva nyāyena gatatvāt । nanu ‘ya iṣṭyā paśunā somenāgrayaṇena vā yajeta so'’māvāsyāyāṃ
paurṇamāsyāṃ vā’ ityanenaikasyaivāmāvāsyākālasya tatra somāṅga- dīkṣaṇīyāṅgatvaṃ pradhānasomayāgāṅgatvañca prāptam । tatra dīkṣaṇīyā- kālānurodhe sati pradhānakālabādha eva bhavet, nāṅgakālaḥ । tatra nyāyaḥ—pradhānaṃ hi saguṇaṃ karttumaṅgaguṇaḥ kriyate । dīkṣaṇīyākālānurodhena ca pradhānakālātikrame pradhānameva viguṇaṃ bhavediti dīkṣaṇīyākāla eva bādhyate । tadihāpyautpattikāṅga- svarānurodhena pradhānasvarabādhe prayogavidhivihitasaṃsargipradhānagato- pāṃśutvātikrame pradhānameva viguṇaṃ bhavediti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ । kiñca “ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati” ityādiviniyogavi- dhayo yājurvaidikā iti bhāṣyakāreṇa svayamudāhṛtāḥ । utpatti- vidhiśca viniyogārthatvādviniyogasya ca prayojanapratyāsattervini- yogavidhivaśenaivautpattikasvarabādhe sati prayogavacanamāśritya guṇa- mukhyavyatikramanyāyopanyāsena svābhihitamapi vismṛtaṃ bhāṣya- kāreṇeti ।

tenetthamidamadhikaraṇaṃ varṇanīyam—kiṃ vāravantīyādi- sāmnāṃ sāmavaidikotpattividhivaśenoccaiṣṭvadharmaḥ ? uta yājurvaidikavini- yogavidhivaśenopāṃśutvamiti । tatra prathamāvagatatvādinā pūrvokta- nyayenotpattisvaro grāhya iti prāpte—

abhidhāyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyutpattividherna viniyogavidhirbalavān
bhavet । tathāhi—anutpannasya viniyoktumaśakyatvādviniyogārthaivo- tpattiḥ । viniyogastu pradhānatvānmukhyaḥ । tena guṇamukhyayorutpa- ttiviniyogavidhyorvirodhe guṇasyotpattividhermukhyabhūtaviniyogavidhya- rthatvānmukhyaviniyogavidhisambandhinā svareṇaiva vāravantīyādīnāmu- pāṃśutvena sambandha iti । prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtraṃ vyākhyā- tameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ jyotiṣṭomasya yājurvaidikatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
yajurvede jyotiṣṭomaṃ samāmananti—“jyotiṣṭometa svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tathā sāmavede'pyevaṃ samāmnātam—“jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । sakṛcca kṛtāyāṃ kriyābuddhau dvitīyaṃ guṇārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati । tatra sandehaḥ-kiṃ yājurvaidikaṃ guṇārtham ? uta vipa rītamiti । pūrvamaṅgeṣvautpattiko vedadharmo viniyogavidhivaśenāpadyata iti pratipādyedānīṃ pradhānameva yatrobhayatvena śrūyate, tatra katarasya vedasya sambandha uccaiṣṭvādidharmo'trānuṣṭhātavya iti sandehe satyadhikāra-
vākyayasyobhayatrāviśeṣādyatrotpattistatraivānuṣṭhātavya iti sthite utpattividhireva kutreti vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—na tāvadekatrotpannasyānyatrā- ṅgasambandhārthaṃ śravaṇam । ubhayatraivāṅgaśravaṇāviśeṣāt । nāpi phale viniyogārthaṃ, phalasyāpyubhayatra śravaṇāviśeṣāt । ato'dhyetṛbhedena vikalpenaivotpādakatvam । yata ekasya nāma vedādhyayanasambhave sati svaśākhā tāvatprathamamasyādhyetavyā । tena yadvedagatā śākhā yena prathamamadhītā sa eva vedastasyotpādaka iti śākhāntaravadveda- samuccayo'pi vyavasthitaye vikalpa eveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyaṅgabhūyastvaśravaṇena viśeṣāvagatirna syāt । yajurvede hi jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīyādiketikarttavyatā bhūyasī śrūyate, na tathā vedāntare । iti karttavyatāyāḥ prakaraṇa- grāhyatvādyatretikarttavyatā tatraiva prakaraṇam । yatra ca prakaraṇaṃ tatraiva karttavyatāvagamādutpattiḥ । itaratra ca guṇārthaṃ śravaṇamiti । taduktam ।

lg.l: tatra tenaiva liṅgena tasya karttavyateṣyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 815 )
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—ubhayaśruti yatkarma tasyā- ṅbhūyastvenotpattinirṇaya iti ।

tadasya yathābhāṣyaṃ siddhāntahetuṃ vārtikakārapādā nānu- manyante । yadi khalvitikarttavyatotpatyavagatau liṅgaṃ tadā tadalpatva- bhūyastvayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ? na hi dhūmatvenāvadhārito'lpīyān dhūmo'gniṃ nānumāpayati । taduktam—

lg.l: tadalpaṃ bahu vā tasya pratītau na viśiṣyate ।। iti ।
sa tādṛgbahuralpo vā vahniṃ gamayati dhruvam ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 816 )

ato yathāvārtikameva siddhāntaheturvarṇanīyaḥ । pratikarma viśeṣasvarūpavijñānamutpattiḥ । dravyadevatena ca karmaviśeṣanirūpaṇaṃ bhavati । jyotiṣṭomasya ca dravyadevataṃ kṛtsnameva yajurvede samānmāyate । tena tatraiva karmotpadyate । itaratra vede karmasvarūpa- mātramanukīrttya stotraśastramātravidhānāt guṇārthameva śravaṇam । nanvaneke'pi guṇāḥ prativedaṃ vidhīyante । teṣāṃ prativākyaṃ karmānuvādena na vidhayaḥ śrūyante । nāpyekena karmānuvādena sarveṣāṃ vidhānamavagamyate । ato na tāvadvākyenānekaguṇavidhānam ।
nāpi prakaraṇenānūdyamānasya, prakaraṇābhāvāt । karttavyasya hītikarttavyatākāṅkṣā prakaraṇam । na cānuvāde karttavyatā sambhavati । ataḥ prakaraṇenāpyaṅgasambandhāsambhavātkathaṃ guṇārthaṃ śravaṇamiti । ucyate—na hi svarūpeṇānūdyamānamitikarttavyatā- kāṅkṣāparipanthi । kintarhi ? vidhātumuddeśyatvenānūdyamānatvam । iha tu yādṛśaṃ karmotpattividhāvavagataṃ tena yadyetaddhetvantare śuddhasyaiva śravaṇamadhyayanavidhikāritaṃ tadasya prayojanam । sa tu sannidhi- samāmnātetikarttavyatāsambandhāvagamārthameveti nirṇīyate । ato yajurveda eva jyotiṣṭomasyotpattiḥ । vedāntare guṇasambandhārthameva śravaṇamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—dravyadevatādivyañjaka- bhūyastvena yajurveda eva jyotiṣṭomasyotpattirubhayavedaśravaṇe'pīti sthitam ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ prakaraṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: uktāni viniyogakāraṇāni śrutirliṅgaṃ vākyamiti । śrutiḥ— “aindryā gārhapamupatyatiṣṭhate” iti dvitīyāvibhaktiḥ । liṅga mantreṣu vacanasāmarthyam—“barhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi” iti । vākyam— “aruṇayā piṅgākṣyā krīṇāti” iti । atha kimetāvantyeva viniyoge kāraṇāni ? uta neti । śrutiliṅgavākyānāṃ viniyojakapramāṇānāṃ svarūpasya viniyogasāmarthyasya ca lokasiddhatvāttadupekṣayā tadgataṃ viśeṣameva paramāpūrvasādhane śrutirviniyuṅkte ? kiṃ vāvāntarīpūrvasādhane ? tathā kiṃ mukhye viniyojakaṃ sāmarthyam ? kiṃ vā gauṇe'pīti । evaṃ kimupasaṃhārāpekṣitārthasamarpaṇenopakramasya tadekavākyatā viparītaṃ veti nirūpyedānīṃ prakaraṇādīnāṃ svarūpasya viniyogasāmarthyasya ca lokāprasiddhatvat tatsvarūpaṃ viniyogasāmarthyañca nirūpyate । viśeṣaṇanirūpaṇañca balābalādhikaraṇa eva bhaviṣyati ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—codanālakṣaṇo hi dharmaḥ । tena śruteḥ śrāvaṇaśabdarūpāyā liṅgasya cārthagataśabdābhidhānasamarthasya vākyasya cākāṅkṣitayāgyārthapadāntarasamabhivyāhārarūpasya śabdāntargatatvād-
bhavatu śeṣaviniyoge prāmāṇyam । prakaraṇādīnāntu śabdānantarga- tvānna śeṣaviniyoge prāmāṇyam ।

nanu prakaraṇamapi śabdāntargatameva । karaṇopakārabhāvenāparya- vasitārthasya sādhyabhāvenāparyavasitānāmaṅgavākyānāṃ parasparākāṅkṣā hi prakaraṇam । atastasyāpi śabdāntargatatvāt kathamapramā- ṇyam ? ucyate—syādetadevaṃ yadyākāṅkṣāmātraṃ sambandhe kāraṇaṃ bhavet । tathā sati prakāraṇāntarāmnātenāpi sambandhaprasaṅgāt । kintu sannidhānamapi । tacca yathāprakaraṇāntarāmnātena saha nāsti, tathānekavākyavyavahitaiḥ prayājādibhirapi darśapūrṇamāsayornāsti ityasambandhānna prakaraṇaṃ pramāṇamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyavyavadhānenaiva sambandho bhavet, vyavadhāneyattāniyamo vā bhavet । na tvetadasti, sarvathā sambandhopa- labdheḥ । kiñcākāṅkṣā'nivṛttau satyāṃ tatpūraṇasamarthenopalabdhenaiva sambandho bhavati । sa cāvyavahitena yathā bhavati, tathaivāsambaddhavya- vāyābhāve sati vyavahitenāpi bhavatyeva । na ca prayājādīnāṃ darśapūrṇamāsāsambaddhapadavyavāyo'sti, yena prakaraṇāntarāmnānatulya- tvaṃ bhavet । tatra yadā pradhānaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ sākāṅkṣamaṅgaṃ pradhānā- kāṅkṣāmutthāpya sambadhyate, tathā pradhānākāṅkṣākalpanāvyavahitaḥ
sambandho na prākaraṇikaḥ, kintu kramanibandhana eva । yadā tu pradhānamaṅgamubhayamapi sākāṅkṣaṃ tadobhayākāṅkṣānibandhanaḥ sambandhaḥ prākaraṇikaḥ śīghraṃ bhavati । na cātrobhayākāṅkṣā nāsti । tathāhi—darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargaṃ bhāvayedityatra kathamityākāṅkṣā- yāmavicchinnāyāmevāśrutaprayojanāni prayājādīni śrūyante । na cānyatkiñcidupakārāntaraṃ prayojanāntaraṃ vānayoḥ pratīyate । na ca kalpayitumapi śakyate, śrutāhānyaśrutakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt । tenobhayoḥ sākāṅkṣayornaṣṭāśvadagdharathavatprākaraṇika eva sambandha iti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 817 )
tena siddhamubhayākāṅkṣālakṣaṇaṃ prakaraṇam । tacca viniyoja- kamiti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe darśapūrṇamāsānaṅgatvātprayājādīnāṃ pra- yogādbahirevānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu darśapūrṇamāsaprayoga eveti ।
sūtrantu—yacchjatiliṅgavākyairasaṃyuktam taditikarttavyatārthitva- lakṣaṇātprakaraṇātprakṛtasya karmaṇo'ṅgamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamaṃ kramādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha kimetāvantyeva viniyogakāraṇāni ? netyucyate । atra kramasyāpi prakaraṇavadeva svarūpasya viniyogāsāmarthyasya ca lokāprasiddhatvāttadeva nirūpyate । viśeṣanirūpaṇañca balābalā- dhikaraṇa eva bhaviṣyati ।

atreyaṃ viṣayaśuddhiḥ—darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ khalu prakaraṇe āgneyādīni karmāṇi krameṇa vihitāni । tenaiva krameṇa mantrakāṇḍe anumantraṇamantrāḥ samāmnātāḥ । tatretareṣāṃ spaṣṭaliṅgānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ prakaraṇena sāmānyasambandhe sati liṅgenaivāgneyādiṣu viniyogaḥ sidhyatīti na kramodāharaṇatvam । dabdhimantrasya tvaspaṣṭaliṅgasyo- pāṃśuyājakramapaṭhitasya liṅgaviniyogābhāvātkiṃ krameṇopāṃśuyāja- śeṣatvamasti ? nāstīti nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇāni viniyogakāraṇānyuktāni । tatrānumantraṇamantrāṇāṃ prakaraṇena sarvārthatvāvagame'pi liṅgasya balavatvādbhavatvitareṣāmāgneyādiviśeṣavi-
ṣayatvam । “dabdhirnāmāsi” ityasya tu viśeṣaliṅgābhāvādasiśabda- sya ca prakaraṇasannihitamātraparāmarśakatvena sādhāraṇatvātpāṭhakrama- mātrasya ca durbalatvena balavati prakaraṇe paripanthinyātmalābhā- sambhavātprakaraṇātsarvārthatvameva । tatra yadāpyāgneyādayaḥ spaṣṭali- ṅgāni, tadā “dabdhirnāmāsi” ityādīnāmanivṛttiyāgabhāvitvenaivā- dṛṣṭārthatvātsamuccayo bhaviṣyati । atha kṛtayāgapratyavakṣaṇena dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ tadā agatyā vikalpo bhaviṣyatīti nāsti kramākhyaṃ viniyojakaṃ pramāṇamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi kramasya viniyojakatvaṃ na bhavet । deśasāmānyalakṣaṇī hi kramaḥ । deśasāmānyañca dvividham— pāṭhasādeśyamanuṣṭhānasādeśyañca । tatra yadyapi “dābdhirnāmāsi” ityasya mantrasya prakaraṇaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ spaṣṭam । kramaśca prakaraṇājjaghanyaḥ, tathāpi yo'sya mantrasyopāṃśuyājena saha pāṭhasādeśyalakṣaṇaḥ kramo'dhyayanavidhikāritaḥ tenāsyopāṃśuyāja- śeṣatvamevonnīyate । na ca balīyasā prakaraṇena sarvārthatvam । mantrasya hi viniyogaḥ prakāśanasāmarthyonmīlanenaiva prakaraṇenāpi karttavyaḥ । tatra yadi sarvasādhāraṇameva sāmarthyamasya prakaraṇamunmī- layet, tadeha vispaṣṭaliṅgānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaviṣayatvena śīghrapravṛ-
ttatvāddabdhimantragatasya cāsiśabdasya sādhāraṇatvena vilambyapravṛtta- tvātsvabhāvato'ṣṭadoṣaduṣṭo vikalpo viṣamaśiṣṭaścāpadyeta । kiñco- pāṃśuyāje matrāntarābhāvāt nityavadasya viniyogaḥ । āgneyādiṣu tu pākṣika iti vaiṣamyañca bhavet । kramasya tu liṅgonmīlakatve sati na vikalpaḥ, nāpi viniyogavaiṣamyam । tenāpekṣitavidhānā- nurodhenāsiśabdo'yaṃ kramasannidhāpitopāṃśuyājaviṣaya eveti nirṇī- yate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 820 )

anuṣṭhānasādeśyalakṣaṇastu kramaḥ paśudharmāṇāmupākaraṇādī- nāmagnīṣomīye paśau viniyojakaḥ, na tu tatra pāṭhasādeśyalakṣaṇaḥ kramaḥ sambhavati । agnīṣomīyasya dīkṣākāle daśamyāmutpatyarthaṃ pāṭhāt aṅgānāṃ caturdaśyāmutpannatvāt, kintvanuṣṭhānārthamagnīṣomī- yasya caturddaśyāṃ pāṭhāttatraivāṅgānāmapi pāṭhe satyanuṣṭhānasādeśyaṃ viniyogasya kāraṇam ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—kramo'pi prakaraṇavadvini- yojakaḥ, deśasāmānyāt samānadeśatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ samākhyādhikaraṇam
saṃśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: atha kimetāvantyeva viniyogakāraṇānīti । netyucyate । atra samākhyāyāḥ prakaraṇakramavadeva svarūpasya viniyogasāmarthyasya ca lokāprasiddhatvāttadeva nirūpyate । viśeṣanirūpaṇañca balābalā dhikaraṇa eva bhaviṣyati ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—ādhvaryavādiśabdā hi karmaviśeṣeṣu vede prayuktāḥ । teṣu ca karttṛviśeṣāpekṣāyāmādhvaryavādisamākhyābhi- radhvaryvādaya eva karttṛtvena viniyujyanta iti hi samākhyāyā viniyojakatvam । na caitatsambhavati । adhvaryoridaṃ karmādhvaryavamiti yaugikatve satyāsāṃ samākhyānāṃ viniyojakatvam । na ca prāgaprasiddhasambandhānāṃ yaugikaśabdānāṃ prayogaḥ । yathā pācaka- pāṭhakādiśabdānām । na cālaukikatvādatra samākhyātaḥ prāk- sambandhāvagatirasti । athāsti tadā tata eva viniyogasiddheḥ kiṃ samākhyā ? atha samākhyāta eva sambandhāvagatiḥ, tathā ca satītaretarāśrayatvaprasaṅgaḥ । siddhe hi sambandhe samākhyāpravṛttiḥ,
samākhyāpravṛttau ca sambandhāvagatiriti । tena rūḍhaiveyamaśva- karṇādivadādhvaryavādisamākhyeti na viniyojiketi ।

nanu rūḍhatve 'pyādhvaryavaśabdasya samākhyayā viniyojakatvaṃ na viruddhameva । tathāhi—ādhvaryavasamākhyayā viniyojakatvaṃ yasmin karmaṇi prayuktaṃ, tasya karmaṇaḥ kartrapekṣāyāṃ varṇasārūpyādadhvaryurevo- patiṣṭhate, nodgātrādiḥ । tena rūḍhatve'pi sārūpyātsamākhyaiva viniyo- jiketi । maivam; vyutpatyabhāvāt । na hi sādṛśyopasthitasya śabdasyā- rthaḥ sadṛśaśabdāntareṇa sambadhyate iti vyutpattirasti । na hi loke hālikamānayetyukte kiṃjātīyo'sāvityapekṣāyāṃ śabdasādṛśyādu- pasthito mālikaḥ sambadhyate । tena prakaraṇenādhvaryavādīnāṃ sarva- karmārthatvādanyavasthayaiva karttṛtvamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi yaugikī samākhyā viniyo- jikā vyavasthākāraṇaṃ na bhavet । tathāhi—sarvatra khalvasambhavaḥ pratīyamānayogaparityāgakāraṇam । yathāśvakarṇādau । na cātrādhvaryu- nāsti, karma vādhvaryukarttṛkaṃ na sambhavati । tenādhvaryoridaṃ karmā- dhvaryavamiti śabdapravṛttinimittayogasambhavādyaugikatvamevādhvaryavādi- śabdānām । na ca prāgaprasiddhasambandhatvānna yaugikaḥ samākhyā- prayoga iti sāmpratam । laukike hi śabdaprayoge paryanuyogo'yaṃ
yujyate, na tu vaidike, anādiśabdaprayogasyaivaṃdhiparyanuyogānarha- tvāt । tena yathāsamākhyāprayogo'nādistathā tatkalpitaḥ samba- ndhā/?/'pyanādireveti yaugikyeveyaṃ samākhyā । tathā cādhvaryoridaṃ karmeti yogavyutpattivaśātparasparāpekṣayā karttṛkriyayoḥ samākhyāpramāṇakaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ sampadyata iti bhavati samākhyāpi viniyojiketi । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 820 )
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—samākhyāpi prakaraṇa- kramavadviniyojikā viniyogārthatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ balābalādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
uktāni viniyogakāraṇāni—śrutirliṅga vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ
sthānaṃ samākhyānamiti । eṣāṃ samavāye kiṃ balīya iti cintyate । śrutyādīni viniyogapramāṇāni pratipādyedānīṃ teṣāmekārthasamavāya- virodhe balābalaṃ nirūpyate । tatra prathamaṃ śrutiliṅgayoreva tāvadbalā- balaṃ vicāryate । tatrodāharaṇam-“kadācata starīrasi nendra saścasi” iti mantraḥ indraprakāśanasamartho'yam “aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate” iti śrutyā gārhapatyaprakāśane viniyuktaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yathā hi śrutirviniyoge pramāṇaṃ, tathā liṅgamapi viniyoge pramāṇamiti pratipāditameva । na ca pramāṇasya pramāṇāntareṇa vādhaḥ sambhavati, tādṛśasya bādhasyābhāsaviṣayatvāt । nanu na svato liṅgasya prāmāṇyam, kintu śrutyanumānadvāreṇa । na ca pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhālliṅgācchjatyanumānaṃ sambhavati । agnīviva śaityānumānam । tenotpatti pratibandhalakṣaṇasya bādhasya vidyamāna- tvānna tulyabalatvam । maivam ; na hi śrutenāpyaśaktasya viniyogaḥ sambhavati । na caindrīmantrasya gārhapatyaprakāśanasāmarthyamasti, kintu śrutivaśātsāmarthyaṃ kalpanīyam । tena yāvatā kālena śrutiraindrī- mantrasya gārhapatyaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ kalpayiṣyati, tāvatā liṅgarūpā- dapi sāmarthyācchjatikalpanāsambhavānnotpattivirodhalakṣaṇo bādha iti tulyabalatvameva ।
taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 831)

ataḥ śrutiliṅgayostulyabalatvodvikalpa eva । tena kasmiṃ- ścitprayoge gārhapatyaprakāśane prayoktavyaḥ, kasmiṃścitprayoge cendra- prakāśana iti । athavā gārhapatyendrobhayaśeṣatvānmantrasya pratipradhānaṃ guṇāvṛttinyāyena samuccaya eva । tenaikasminneva prayoge āvṛtyā mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ । athavā abhyupetyavādonoktaṃ liṅgasya śrutyanu- mānadvāreṇa śrutisāpekṣasya viniyojakatvam । vastutastu śruti- nirapekṣasyāpi viniyojakatve na kiñcidvādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti । śrutestvavaśyaṃ liṅgasāpekṣameva viniyojakatvam । asamarthasya śruti- śatenāpi viniyoktumaśakyatvāt । tena balavatā liṅgenaiva śruterbā- dhitatvādaindrīmantreṇa niyamenendraḥ prakāśanīyo na gārhapatya iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi śrutinirapekṣasya liṅgasya viniyojakatvaṃ bhavet । na tvetadasti । tathāhi—‘codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ’ ityatra codanaiva dharme pramāṇamityuktam । na ca liṅgaṃ codanā,
aśabdarūpatvāta/?/ । tatrendrādiḥ śabdaḥ so'pi svārthamevābhidhatte, na śeṣatvaṃ pratipādayati । kintarhi ? prakaraṇena labdhasāmānyasambandho mantraḥ kathamupakuryādityapekṣāyāṃ sāmarthyaparyālocanenaindraprakāśanasama- rthaścāyaṃ mantraḥ । tenānena mantreṇendraṃ prakāśayediti śrutiravaśyama/?/— māvyā । gārhapatyaśeṣatvantu “aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate” ityakṣaraśru- timātrādeva pratīyata iti śrutikalpanāviprakṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣaśrutyā bādhyata iti ।

nanu śruterapi liṅgānumānaviprakarṣāviśeṣāttulyabalatvamityu- ktam । naitat, viniyoge hi sannikarṣaviprakarṣau balābalaṃ pratyu- payujyete । na ca śruteḥ sāmarthyāvagamasāpekṣaṃ viniyojakatvam, kintu śabdaśravaṇamātreṇāvagate viniyoge paścāttadanurodhena sāmarthya- mapi kalpyate । liṅgasya tu śrutimananumāya viniyojakatvāsambhavā- cchjatyanumānaviprakṛṣṭaṃ viniyojakatvamiti bhavati viprakarṣācchjatito durbalatvam । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 817 )
tenārthaviprakarṣālliṅgameva śrutyā bādhyate । evaṃ liṅgavadvākya- prakaraṇasthānasamākhyā apīti siddham ।

(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 801) atha vākyaliṅgayorvirodhe kimudo/?/haraṇam ? “syonante sadanaṃ karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi । tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ” iti । atra sandihyate— kiṃ kṛtsno mantra upastaraṇe puroḍāśasādane ca prayoktavyaḥ ? uta kalpayāmyanta upastaraṇe, tasminsīdetyayaṃ puroḍāśasādanaṃ prati ?
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu śruteḥ pratyakṣālliṅgādbalīyastvam । liṅgavākyayostvanumīyamānaśrutidvāreṇa viniyojakatvāviśeṣātkathaṃ balābalam । tadiha yathā kalpayāmyantasya sadanakaraṇaprakāśana- sāmarthyaṃ, tasminsīdetyantabhāgasya ca puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanaprakāśana- sāmarthyam, tathā sadanakaraṇasya prayojanāpekṣatvāttasminsīdeti tacchabdasya ca pūrvoktasāpekṣatvātsāpekṣasamabhivyāhṛtānāṃ padānā- mekavākyataiva pratīyate । ato liṅgavākyānurodhenāvṛtta eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpane ca prayoktavya iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi liṅgādervākyasyāvyavahitaṃ śrutyanu- mānaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—sarvatraiva mantre kiñcideva padaṃ prayogasamavetā- rthaprakāśakam । itarāṇi tu dṛśyamānaikavākyatānurodhena samavetārtha-
prakāśanasāmarthyaṃ parikalpya svārthamupasarjanīkṛtya tadviśiṣṭasamavetārtha- prakāśanatayā sambadhyante । tataḥ śrutimanumāya viniyujyante । etaccāvirodhe sati bhavati । iha tu “syonaṃ ta/?/” iti “tasminsīda” iti pūrvottarayorvibhinnārthasāmarthyaṃ kṛtvā yāvadekavākyatvānurodhena pūrvasyottaratra uttarasya ca pūrvatra sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate, tāvadeva pūrvottarayoḥ prasiddhasāmarthyadvayena kalpitaśrutidvāreṇa viniyogasiddheranvayabhedenai- katvabuddhireva bhrānteti kuto viniyojakatvaṃ vākyasyeti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 822. )
tasmācchjatikalpanāyāṃ liṅgaviprakṛṣṭatvādvākyasya liṅgameva balīya iti siddham ।

atha vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇam ? sūktavākanigadaḥ । tatra hi paurṇamāsīdevatāśabdā amāvasyādevatāśabdāśca samāmnātāḥ । te ca bhinnārthatvānna parasparamekavākyatāmupagacchanti । kintu vibhajya yathāyogaṃ paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāñca prayoktavyā iti sthitam । idānīṃ tatsamabhivyāhṛtaviśeṣaṇādiṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ prakaraṇānurodhenobhayatra prayoktavyāni ? uta vākyānurodhena yathāviśeṣyam ? iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu devatāpadānāṃ samavetārthānāṃ yathā- devataṃ liṅgānurodhena vibhajya prayogaḥ । itareṣāntu prakaraṇena sarvārthatvāvagamādubhayatraiva prayoga iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi vākyamananumāya prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakaṃ bhavet । na tvetadasti । svārthabodhasamāptānāmaṅgāṅgi- vākyānāmupakāryopakārakākāṅkṣā hi prakaraṇam । tatrobhayākāṅkṣā- vadekavākyatvaṃ kalpanīyam । tato liṅgam, tataśca śrutiḥ । vākye tu pratyakṣaḥ sambandhaḥ, tenāsya śrutikalpanaṃ liṅgamātravyavahitamiti viprakarṣādbhavati prakaraṇaṃ durbalam, vākyameva balīya iti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 816 )
ataḥ siddhaṃ prakaraṇādvākyaṃ balīya iti ।
atha prakaraṇakramayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇam ? rājasūyamahā- prakaraṇe abhiṣecanīyakrame śaunaśśepākhyānamāmnātam । yadi prakaraṇaṃ balavatsarveṣāṃ tarhyayaḥ śeṣaḥ । yadi kramaḥ, abhiṣecanīyasyaiva ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—rājasūyaprakaraṇasamāmnātaśaunaḥśepākhyānaṃ pra- dhānasākāṅkṣaṃ kramarūpātsannidhiviśeṣādabhiṣecanīyāṅgatvena vijñā- yate । nanu prākṛtāṅganirākāṅkṣo'bhiṣecanīyaḥ । krameṇākāṅkṣāmu- tthāpya tatra śaunaśśepākhyānaṃ sambandhanīyam, rājasūyasya tu svata eva sākāṅkṣatvādubhayākāṅkṣākṛtasya sambandhasya śīghrabhā- vitvātprakaraṇena rājasūyāṅgatvamevocitam । kathamabhiṣecanīyā- ṅgatvam ? ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi rājasūyo'bhiṣecanīyādibhyo- 'rthāntaraṃ bhavet । kintarhi ? abhiṣecanīyādīnāmadhikṛtakarma- samūhātmako'sau । tena yathābhiṣecanīyaḥ prākṛtāṅganirākāṅkṣaḥ, tathā vikṛtyantarasyāpīti rājasūyaprakaraṇābhāvācchaunaśśepākhyā- nasya krameṇākāṅkṣāmutthāpyābhiṣecanīyāṅgatvameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyabhiṣecanīyādyapūrvebhyo rājasūyāpūrvaṃ bhinnaṃ na bhavet । iha tvārādupakārakāṅgasahitābhicaṣenīyādikarma- janyamanyadeva svārājyaphalakaṃ rājasūyāpūrvam । na cābhiṣecanīyā- dyapūrvanairākāṅkṣye rājasūyāpūrvaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati । tena kramāda- bhiṣecanīyāpūrvasyākāṅkṣā kalpanīyā । rājasūyasya tu klṝptā- kāṅkṣatvam । ato yāvatkrameṇābhiṣecanīyasyākāṅkṣā kalpyate,
tāvatprakaraṇena rājasūyasyaikavākyatā । tatā liṅgam, tataḥ śrutiriti sannikarṣātsarvārthatvaṃ śaunaśśepākhyānasyeti siddham । taduktam—

lg.l: tāmapi tvanyato labdhvā śrutirekasya kalpyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 833 )
tenārthaviprakarṣātprakaraṇena kramo bādhyata iti siddham ।

atha kramasamākhyayorvirodhe kimudāharaṇam ? kiñca balavattara- miti । pauroḍāśikamiti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānāyyakrame “śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇe” iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ । tatra sandihyate—kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśa/?/pātrāṇāṃ śundhadhvamiti mantro viniyoktavyaḥ ? atha sānnāyyapātrāṇāmiti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—samākhyāpi śabdarūpatvācchjatitulyaiva । ataḥ kramaṃ bādhitvā samākhyānibandha eva samartho balavāniti । tenātra puroḍāśasyāyamityasminnarthe pravarttamānā pauroḍāśikasamākhyā kramaprāptasāśa/?/yyapātrasambandhaṃ bādhitvā puroḍāśapātraśundhana eva “śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇe” iti mantraṃ viniyukta iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi samākhyā śrutivaccheṣaśeṣisamba- ndhamabhidadhyāt । kalpanāyāmapi vā śeṣaśeṣisambandhaṃ kalpayet । kintvatra pauroḍāśikasamākhyā puroḍāśaviśiṣṭamantramabhidhatte । tadvaśena kalpanā sambandhamātraṃ kalpayati, na tu śeṣaśeṣirūpam । kramastu sādeśyalakṣaṇasambandharūpo vedakalpita eva । tena yāvatsamākhyayā sambandhaḥ kalpyate, tāvatkrameṇa sambandhinyākāṅkṣā, ākāṅkṣayā caikavākyatvaṃ, tato liṅgaṃ, tataḥ śrutirityekāntaritatvena samākhyāyā viprakṛṣṭatvātkrameṇa samākhyā bādhyate । taduktam—

lg.l: anya eva hi sambandhaḥ kalpyate yaḥ samākhyā ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 834)

tadayaṃ saṅkṣepārthaḥ-śrutiḥ pañcānāmapi liṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthāna- samākhyānāṃ bādhikā, samākhyā ca śrutyādipañcakasya bādhyā । liṅgavākyaprakaraṇakramāṇāntu caturṇāṃ pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā bādhyatvamutta- rottarāpekṣayā bādhakatvamiti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 858 )

prayojanam—sarvatraiva pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-vyākhyātameveti । ayañca śrutyādibhirvārttikakārapādairaprāptabādha ityuktam । sāmā- nyaśāskṣasya tu viśeṣaśāstreṇātideśasya copadeśena prāptabādha iti । tadayuktam; sarvatraivāprāptabādhahetorarthaviprakarṣasyāviśeṣāt । yathā hi liṅgaṃ śrutiṃ kalpayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyakṣayā śrutyā apahṛtaviṣayaṃ na pravarttate, tathā sāmānyaśāstramapi samānyadvāreṇa viśeṣāvataraṇapravṛttaṃ viśeṣaśāstreṇāpahṛtaviṣayaṃ na pravarttate । evamatideśaśāstramapīti kathamanayoḥ prāptabādhodāharaṇatvam ? atha sāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣa- śāstrābhāsarūpā viṣayabuddhirjātā bādhyata iti prāptabādha ityucyate । sā kiṃ viśeṣaśāstradarśinaḥ ? tadadarśino vā ? tatra viśeṣaśāstra- darśinaḥ śrutidarśina iva liṅgābhāsabuddhirapi na jāyate eva । atha viśeṣaśāstrādarśinaḥ, tadā pratyakṣaśrutyadarśino liṅgādapyābhā- sabuddhirjāyata eveti ko'nayorviśeṣaḥ ? । ucyate—satyamevamutpa- ttipratibandhalakṣaṇa eva sarvatra bādhaḥ । sa eva kvacitprāptasya । tathāhi—pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe liṅgācchjatikalpanā na pravṛttaiva । tena tatra śāstramaprāptameva । sāmānyaśāstrantu na prāptameva, viśeṣa- śāstrāvaruddhe viśeṣarūpe viṣaye na pravarttata iti prāptabādha eveti vivekaḥ । tena prāptāprāptaśabdo'yaṃ śāstragocara eva na bādhyaviṣaya- gocara ityavadhātavyamiti । taduktamajitākāreṇa—‘yadā tu sāmā-
nyabodhakaṃ śāstraṃ tadrūpā vyaktiriti vyavahitavyaktiviṣayaṃ kalpyate, tadaikameva śāstraṃ tādrūpyaviśeṣāt sarvārthaṃ bhavet ananyagativiśeṣa- śāstradarśanāttaditaraviṣayārthaṃ kalpyata iti na śāstrasyaiva cāprā- māṇyam’ iti ।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamamahīnādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya samāmananti—“tistra eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryāḥ, dvādaśāhīnasya yajñasya savīryatvāya” iti । tatra sandehaḥ— kiṃ dvādaśopasattā jyotiṣṭomasya ? utāhīnasyeti । virodhe sati śrutyādīnāṃ balābalaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodha eva kutrāsti kutra nāstīti vicārāvasare prakaraṇasya tāvacchjatiliṅgavākyaiḥ sahetaḥ prabhṛti pañcādhikaraṇaṃ yāvadyathāsambhavaṃ virodhāvirodhau sampradhāryete । taduktam—

lg.l: virodhaḥ kvāsti nāstīti viṣayaḥ pariśodhyate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 862 )
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“tisna eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryāḥ” ityatra yathā sahāhnā samāpyata iti sāhnaśabdābhihitasya jyoti- ṣṭomasyaivopasatitvaṃ prakaraṇānurodhenāṅgīkṛtam, tathā “dvādaśā- hīnasya” ityatra na kutaścidyajñāddhīna iti vyutpatyā ahīnaśabdena jyotiṣṭomābhidhāyinā sambhavadupasaddvādaśatvamapi prakaraṇānugrahāya jyotiṣṭomārthamevāṅgīkarttumucitam । tena yadyapi ‘ahna khaḥ kratusamūhe’ ityanuśāsanena samūhasambandhe dvādaśāhakratuvacano'pyayaṃ sambhāvyate, tathāpi prakaraṇāvirodhāya nañsamāsāśrayaṇameva yuktam । evañca sati jyotiṣṭome upasaddvādaśatvatritvayorvikalpa eva । na ca kathaṃ viṣamaśiṣṭo vikalpa iti vācyam । “ekā deyā ṣaḍdeyā dvādaśa deyāḥ” itivatṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavacca phalabhūyastvārthitvā- devopapatteḥ । tathā ca sati “tisra evopasadaḥ kāryā” ityeva- kāro'pi pākṣikadvādaśatvavyāvarttaka eva । tenāhīnaśabdo'yaṃ prakaraṇānurodhādahorūpaguṇayogādyaugikaḥ । sa ca jyotiṣṭoma- vacanaḥ । ato dvādaśopasattvamapi tasyaiva vidhīyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi nañsamāsānto'yamahīnaśabdo bhavet । na tvevasti । nañsamāse hi sati naño'vyayatvenodāttasvara- tvam । avyayasya pūrvapadasya prakṛtisvara ityanuśāsanādahīnapadamā- dyudāttaṃ prāpnoti । madhyodāttaṃ caitatsamāmnāyate । tacca khapratyayā- ntatve satyupapadyate । khapratyayasya ca ‘ahnaḥ khaḥ kratusamūhe’ ityahnaḥ samūhasambandhe kratuvacanatvājjyotiṣṭomasya caikāhasādhyatvenānevaṃrū- patvādahīnasyeti ṣaṣṭhīśrutyā ahargaṇasambandhāvagamāt dvādaśopasattva- syotkarṣa eveti । kiñca yadi hi dvādaśopasattāpi jyotiṣṭomasyaiva tadā prakaraṇādevopasattritvadvādaśatvayorjyotiṣṭomārthatvasiddheḥ sāhnasye- tyahīnasyeti ca padadvayamanarthakaṃ syāt । ahīnapadavaśāttvahargaṇasambandhe dvādaśopasatvasyopasattritvasyāpyanuṣaṅgeṇa dvādaśāhakratusambandho mā bhūditi bhramāpanodārthaṃ sāhnasyeti jyoṣṭomavācakaṃ padamarthavaditi śrutibalādutkarṣa eva । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 863)
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-mukhyasya jyotiṣṭomasyā- hīnaśabdenāsambandhāttasmānmukhyajyotiṣṭomādapakṛṣyeteti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ pratipadadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“yuvaṃ hi stha/?/ svarpatī iti dvayoryajamā- nayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt, ete asṛgramindava iti bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva niviśete pratipadau ? uta dviyajñeṣu dvirātrādipūtkraṣṭavyau ? iti । atrāpi śrutiprakaraṇayorviro- dhāvirodhasaṃśaye'dhikāśaṅkāṃ nivarttayituṃ pūrvanyāyo'tidiśyate । yathā jyotiṣṭomasyāhīnaśabdābhidheyatvāsambhavādupasaddvādaśatvavidhā- namutkṛṣṭaṃ, tathā jyotiṣṭome yajamānadvitvabahutvābhāvāttadyuktaṃ pratipadvi- dhānamapyutkṛṣyata iti siddhāntenopakramya pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—na tāvadatrāhīnaśabdavadaprakṛtayajñasabandhā- bhidhāyakaḥ śabdo'sti । na ca “dvayoryajamānayoḥ” ityanenaiva śabdena/?/ yajñāntaropasthitiḥ, śābdāśabdayoḥ sambandhāsambhavena lakṣaṇā- prasaṅgat । nāpi yajamānavaddvitvaśeṣatvenaiva pratipadvidhānam,
vidhyānarthakyaprasaṅgāt । tena yajamānadvitvanimittakaṃ jyotiṣṭoma- prakṛtiyāga eva mantraviśiṣṭapratipadvidhānaṃ vaktavyam । na ca nimittaṃ na sambhavati, naimittikāvaśyakarttavyajyotiṣṭomaprayoge ekasyāśaktau satyāmaṅgāntaravatkartraikyahānena dvikarttṛkatvopapatteḥ । athavā “kṣaume vasānāvagnimādadhīyātām” itivatpatnyabhiprāyeṇa jyotiṣṭomasyaiva dviyajamānatvopapatternotkarṣaḥ । ato naimitika- jyotiṣṭomaprayoge ekasyāśaktau satyāṃ yajamānadvitvasyāsambhavātpra- karaṇa eva mantraviśiṣṭapratipadvidhānamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
bhavedevaṃ yadi yajamānadvitvabahutve jyotiṣṭome kathamapi sambhavataḥ। tathāhi—naimittikakāmyasādhāraṇaṃ yajetetyākhyātopāttamupādīyamā- nakarttṛgatamekatvaṃ vivakṣitamatra pratīyate । na ca tatparityāgakāraṇaṃ kiñcidasti । na ca naimittikāvaśyakartavyajyotiṣṭomaprayoga ekasyāsāmarthe satītarāṅgavadekatvaparityāgena dvibahuyajamānatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । yataḥ śaktyadhīnopādānaṃ khalvaṅgamaśaktyā hīyate । na ca kartturekatvaṃ śaktyadhīnopādānam । tena yathaikaḥ śaknuyāttathā kuryāditi naimittike śaktyadhīnamaṅgahīnatvamitarāṅga-
viṣayaṃ vijñāyate । yathā kālāśaucayorasāmarthye'pi śaktyādhīna- tvādaparityāgaḥ, tathā kartrekatvasyāpīti । nāpi patnyabhiprāyeṇa yajamānadvitvam । apatnīkayāganiṣedhe sati patnīsahabhāvasya nityatvena nimittatvāsambhavāt । na ca “bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ” 8ityatra dvipatnyabhiprāyeṇa । nimittatvādaṃśe ‘sarūpāṇāmekaśeṣaḥ’ ( pā. sū., 1. 2. 64 ) ityanuśāsane virūpāṇāmekaśeṣaniṣedhāt tatra ‘pumāṃstriyā’ ( pā. sū., 1. 2. 67 ) iti smaraṇāt bhavatu yajamānayoriti kathañcidaṃśarūpasyaikaśeṣaḥ । yajamānebhya iti tu ‘pumāṃstriyā’ ityekavacananirdeśāt lakṣaṇānugamābhāvena sambhavatyeva ।

kiñcobhayatrāpi svarasataḥ puṃdvitvabahutvapratītau satyāṃ striyā saha dvitvapratītirlakṣaṇayā vaktavyā । na ca sambhavantyāṃ gatau lakṣaṇāśrayaṇamucitam । “kṣaume vasānau” ityatrāgatyā lākṣaṇika- mapi dvitvamāśritam । na hi tatra dvipuruṣakamādhānaṃ kvacidabhihitam । iha tu kulāyayajñasya “etena rājapurohitau yajeyātām” iti dviyajamānasya kratoḥ prāptatvādbahuyajamānānāñca tritvādīnāṃ vidya- mānatvāttatsambandhena mukhyārthenaivopapattau na lakṣaṇākāraṇamastī- tyutkarṣa eva । kiñca “upāsmai gāyatā naraḥ iti pratipadaṃ kuryāt” iti nityabhūtamapi pratipadantaramatrāsti । tadyadyapatnīkayāganiṣedhena nityaprāptapatnīsāhitye'pi ekapatnīkaprayogasya naimittikatvaṃ, tadā
tasya pratipadantarāvaruddhenāpatnīkaprayogābhāvāt nityabhūtapratipada- ntaravidhānamapyanityameva syāt । nityanaimittikayorviṣamaśiṣṭo vā vikalpa āpadyeta । yattvaprakṛtakratusambandhe'sya pramāṇaṃ nāstī- tyuktam, tanna; pratipacchabdādevāvyabhicārāt pratipadyuktakratūpasthitau satyāṃ yajamānadvitvabahutvavaśena kratuviśeṣapratītisiddhernātra prakaraṇa eva mantraviśiṣṭapratipadvidhānaṃ, kintu dvibahuyajamānakakratugatīti- diṣṭapratipadanuvādenaivotkarṣānmantrayorvidhānamiti siddham ।

nanu yajamānasya dvitvasya ca nityatvenānimittatvānmṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇamitivat dvitvaviśiṣṭasyaiva yajamānasya bhavatu nimitta- tvenoddeśyatvam । kintu pratipadapyatra mantravidhānāyoddeṣṭavyā । tadatroddeśyabhedādāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedaḥ । iha tu pratipadā mantraḥ sambadhyate । yajamānadvitvādīnāṃ nimitte karttavyatā sambadhyate । tadayamarthaḥ—pratipanmantrasya karttavyatā yajamānadvitve nimitte pratyetavyeti । bhinnaviṣayatvāduddeśayorna vākyabhedaḥ । uddeśyatvañca nimittasya । tanna kiñcidvidhānāyopayujyate । kintarhi ? samantraivā- nyatra ? vidhīyamānasyākarttavyatājñānāyeti na kiñcidanupapannam ।
prayojanantu—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—prakṛte jyotiṣṭome pratipadorvidhānāyogāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ jāghanyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate—“jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti” iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kimetadvidhānaṃ darśapūrvamāsayoḥ ? uta paśāviti । prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā śrutibalenotkarṣaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ tadapavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi jāghanyeti tṛtīyāśrutyā jāghanyā guṇabhāvāvagamātpatnīsaṃyājeṣveva jāghanī guṇatvena vidhīyata ityu- citam, tathāpi darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ patnīsaṃyājānāmājyadravyāvaruddha- tvātteṣu ca jāghanīvidhāvaṣṭadoṣaduṣṭavikalpaprasaṅgāt “prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣyabhighārayati” itivadviniyogabhaṅgena jāghanīsaṃskāratvenaiva patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyanta iti । sā ca lokasthā niṣprayojanatvena na saṃskārārhā, nāpi darśapūrṇa māsayoḥ kṛtopayogapaśvekadeśabhūtā saṃskārārha jāghanī samasti । nāpi jāghanyaiva paśvapekṣā, ekadeśa- dravyāṇāmaprayojakatvasya sthitatvāt । tenāgnīṣomīyapaśuyāgagataiva kṛtaprayojanā pratipattirūpasaṃskārasāpekṣā patnīsaṃyājaiḥ pratipādyata
ityutkarṣa eva । kiñcaivaṃ satyagnīṣomīyapaśāvatideśaprāptānāṃ patnī- saṃyājānāṃ jāghanīpratipatyarthatvena dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ sāmavāyikatvañca bhavati । itarathā prakṛtāvivādṛṣṭārthatvamārādupakārakatvañca । adṛṣṭārtha- tvācca dṛṣṭārthatvam, ārādupakārakatvācca sāmavāyikatvaṃ balīyaḥ । tathā jāghanyā patnīsaṃyājavidhāne sannihitasvapadārthaviṣayo vidhirbha- vati । patnīsaṃyājeṣu ca jāghanīvidhāne vyavahitaparapadārthaviṣayo vidhiriti । sannihitārthavidhisambhave ca na viprakṛṣṭārthavidhānamitya- to'pyutkarṣaḥ patnīsaṃyājānām । teṣāmagnīṣomīye paśāvatideśenaiva prāptatvāt, kintu darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrutamidaṃ vākyamagnīṣomīye paśā- vatideśaprāptān patnīsaṃyājān jāghanīsaṃskāratvena vidadhātī- tyutkarṣaḥ । tena darśapūrṇamāsayoradṛṣṭārthameva patnīsaṃyājā/?/ anuṣṭhīyante । agnīṣomīye tu pratipattitvena dṛṣṭārthameva । tasmājjāghanyā utkarṣa- kāraṇamagnīṣomīya eva tasyāḥ kṛtopayogapaśvekadeśatvamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi jāghanī patnīsaṃyājasaṃskāryatve- na pratīyate । kintarhi ? tṛtīyāśrutyā patnīsaṃyājaguṇatvenaivopā-
dīyamānā pratīyate । na ca prayājaśeṣavaddvitīyārthe tṛtīyeti vaktavyam । kṛtaprayojanadravyaikadeśatvānavagamāt । prayājaśeṣo hi kṛtaprayojanadravyairakadeśabhūta eva prayājaśeṣaśabdādavagamyate । tena tasya pratipattirūpasaṃskārāpekṣitvādbhavatu dvitīyārthe tṛtīyā, jāghanī tvatrāpūrvaiva vidhīyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 869)

na ca prakṛtāvājyena saha vikalpabhiyā yatra kṛtaprayojana- dravyaikadeśabhūtā jāghanī paśuyāge tatraivāyaṃ vidhirutkṛṣyata iti vaktavyam । vikalpasyāpi pramāṇabalāyātasya viniyojakabhaṅge- notkarṣakāraṇāsambhavāt । evañca sati pramāṇabalāyātaṃ prakṛtāviva vikṛtāvapyadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ patnīsaṃyājānāṃ na doṣāya । nāpi parapadārtha- vidhānadoṣaḥ । sarvatraiva viśiṣṭavidhigauravabhayātpadārthotkarṣe sati parapadārthavidhānasyālaṅkārārthatvāt । nanu prakaraṇe'pi patnīkartṛka- yāgānuvādena jāghanīvidhāne viśiṣṭānuvādādvākyabhedaḥ prāpnoti । maivam; śabdatātparyaṃ vināpyadhikārādeva patnīsambandhiviśeṣita- yāgaprāpteḥ । tathā ca yatsaṃyājayati, tajjāghanyetyetāvatyeva vidhīyamāne patnīsaṃyājānāmeva prāptatvānna viśiṣṭānuvādadoṣa iti ।

idantviha vaktavyam—kathaṃ sāmānyavihitenājyena viśeṣavi- hitāyā jāghanyā vikalpaḥ ? sarvatra sāmānyaviśeṣaśāstrayorbādhya- bādhakabhāvābhāvaprasaṅgāt । naitat; dvayoreva viśeṣaśāstratvāviśeṣāt । tathāhi—yadi khalvājyavidhau yajñāyetyetāvanmātraṃ śrūyeta atra ca patnīsaṃyājarūpo viśeṣastadā bhavatyeva sāmānyaviśeṣanyāyaḥ । kintu “sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate yaddhruvāyābhājyam” iti yajñāyeti sāmānyamabhidhāyāpi punastatsamānādhikaraṇasarvaśabdo- ccāraṇam । tenaitajjñāyate-tadutpattiśiṣṭadravyānavaruddhaprakṛtasakala- yāgaviṣayatvamevādhyayanavidhyabhimataṃ yajñaśabdasyeti । tena dvayorapi viśeṣaviṣayasyā/?/dvikalpa iti ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe kevalājyadravyakameva darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ patnīsaṃyājānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu jāghanyā saha vikalpenānuṣṭhāna- miti । sūtrantu—jāghanyā eva codanā vidhānamapūrvatvāt prayājaśeṣavaddravyaikadeśatvenāpratītapūrvatvādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ santardanādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome'dhiṣavaṇaṇalake prakṛtya śrūyate—“dīrghasome santṛdyāddhṛtyā” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ santardanaṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva ? ahosviddīrghakāleṣu someṣu ? iti । śrutyā saha prakaraṇasya virodhāvirodhau pratipādyedānīṃ vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhāvirodhau vicāryete । atra yadyapi “dīrghasome santṛdyāt” iti saptamīśruti- rasti, tathāpi śeṣiṇi khalviyaṃ saptamī । na ceyamadhikaraṇābhi- dhāyinī guṇavibhaktiḥ pradhānyarūpaṃ śeṣitvaṃ vadati । adhikaraṇa- tvañca tadabhidheyaṃ na karmaṇassambhavati । ataḥ śruterasamatvāt “amāvāsyāyāṃ pūrvedyurvediṃ karoti” itivadvākyalakṣaṇa evāyamanvaya iti vākyaprakaraṇavirodhāvirodhacinteyamiti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—na tāvatsantardanaṃ nāma prakṛtakarmasambandhā- narhamarthāntaram । kintarhi ? abhipūyamāṇasomādhāraphalakayordī- rghārthamekasyoparyaparasya sthāpanam । tattāvatprakaraṇe sambhavatyeva । na ca prakṛtasya karmaṇo dīrghasomatvaṃ na sambhavati । somo hi jyoti-
ṣṭomaḥ । sa ceṣṭipaśubandhādyapekṣayā dīrghakālatvāddīrgha eva । nanu “asantṛṇṇe bhavataḥ” ityasantardanamapi phalakayoḥ śrūyate । satyam ; ata eva vrīhiyavavadvikalpo bhaviṣyati । evañca sati vākyapraka- raṇayoravirodho bhavati । na ca svalpasomatvājjyotiṣṭomasya phalakayordārḍhyārthamasantardane'pi abhiṣavasambhavātsantardanavidhāna- manarthakamiti vācyam । krayaṇavadupapatteḥ । yathā hi svalpatvena somasyālpamūlyatve'pi ekayāpi gavā krayaṇasiddhau vāsaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ vidhānādabhyudayakārīti vijñāyate, tathā phalakāsantardane'pi somābhiṣavasiddhau santardanavidhānādavagaptyate santardanena dṛḍhīkṛta- yoreva phalakayoḥ somābhiṣavo'bhyudayakārī bhavatīti । tasmā- tsantardanaṃ prakṛtau jyotiṣṭoma eva vidhīyate, na tūtkṛṣyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadīṣṭipaśubandhādyapakṣayā somasya dīrghatvamatra pratīyate । na tvetadasti, vijātīyatvāt । sarvatra khalu sajātīyavyāvartanena viśeṣaṇamarthavadbhavati । vijātīyasya viśeṣasya padopāttajātivyāvarttitatvāt । yathā paṭaḥ śukla iti paṭatvenaiva paṭajātivyāvṛttau kṛṣṇādipaṭāntaravyāvṛttiphalameva śuklaviśeṣaṇam । na cātra somayāgāntarasyābhāvādvijātīyāpekṣayāpi kathañciddīrghatva-
mavadhāryate, yadi śabdā/?/pātta eva vijātīyo bhavet । na cātreṣṭipaśu- bandhādayaḥ kenacicchabdenopāttāḥ pratīyante । tenāgniṣṭomasaṃsthasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya pratītiḥ । etasya dviṣaṣṭyabhyāsarūpatvena svalpatvā- dukthyādisaṃsthāntarāṇāñcādhikagrahaṇavivṛdhyā dīrghatvāt satrādī- nāñca jyotiṣṭomavikārāṇāmanekāhasādhyānāṃ pratyahamāvṛtyā graha- camasānuṣṭhānena sutarāṃ dīrghatvāddīrghasomeṣu vākyena vidhīyamānaṃ santardanaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā teṣvevotkṛṣya vidhīyate । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 872 )

nanu karmadhārayasamāsapakṣe hyevaṃ bhavati । yadā tu dīrghasya yajamānasya somo dīrghasoma iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasamāsāśrayaṇam, tadā prakaraṇa eva santardanavidhānopapatternotkarṣa iti । maivam ; ṣaṣṭhyartha- lakṣaṇāyā vilambitapratītestatpuruṣasamāsātsamānādhikaraṇatvena śīghrapratīteḥ karmadhārayasamāsasya balīyastvāt । tasmātsarveṣveva dīrghasomeṣūtkarṣa iti siddham । nanūkthyādisaṃsthāsu grahapātravivṛddhā- vapi triparvadaśamuṣṭiparamitasyaiva somasyābhiṣavātsantardanamadṛṣṭārthameva bhavet, “dhṛtyā” ityarthavādānupapatteśca । adhikasomābhiṣave hi /?/raṇāśaṅkāyāṃ dhāraṇāśāsanāddhāraṇārthavādopapatteḥ । tena yatraiva
satrādiṣu pratyahaṃ triparvadaśamuṣṭiparimitasya somasyābhiṣavastatraiva santardanasya dṛṣṭārthatvamarthavādopapattiśceti teṣvevotkṛṣya vidhānaṃ yuktamiti । maivam ; tathāhi—somastāvaddvividhaḥ, svalpaparvā dīrghaparvā ca । tayośca prayojanavaśādupādāne pradānavivṛddheśca pradeya- vivṛddhimantareṇāsambhavādarthāddīrghaparvā grahīṣyate । tathā satyabhiṣota- vyasomātirekātsantardanamapi dṛṣṭārtham, arthavādaścopapanno bhaviṣyati । triparvadaśamuṣṭiparimāṇātikramaśca na bhaviṣyatīti kimanupapannam ?

nanvevaṃ tarhi prakaraṇa eva dīrghasomasya vidyamānatvādukthyādi- saṃsthāsveva niveśo'sya bhaviṣyati । kiṃ satrādiṣvanekāheṣūtkarṣagra- haṇeneti । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi saṃsthāsu vyavasthāpakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavet । na tāvatprakaraṇam, agniṣṭomasaṃsthasya hi jyotiṣṭomasya prakaraṇaṃ, na saṃsthāntarāṇām ; teṣāṃ vikṛtitvena prakaraṇābhāvāt । nāpi kramaḥ, tatsannidhipāṭhābhāvāt । vākyasya ca dīrghasomollekhena pravṛttasya sarvasādhāraṇatvāt । tena yathā “ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajeta” ityatronyaśabdo na saṃsthāmātraviṣayaḥ, kintvagniṣṭomavyati- riktasakalasomayāgaviṣayaḥ । tathā dīrghasomaśabdo'pyagniṣṭomavyati- riktasakalasomayāgaviṣaya eveti । taduktam—
( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 875 )
tena yadetadbhāṣyakāreṇoktam—prakaraṇānugrahāya saṃsthāsveva niveśa iti taddhiyameva ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe agniṣṭome'pi santardanānuṣṭhānam । siddhānte tu tadvyatiriktasomayāgeṣviti । sūtrantu—prakṛtajyoti- ṣṭomādutkarṣa eva santardanasya vākyena dīrghasomaviśeṣagrahaṇāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ pravargyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate—“na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyāt dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā pravṛñjyāt” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ jyotiṣṭome sarveṣveva prayogeṣu na pravarjitavyam ? uta prathame prayoge pratiṣedhaḥ ? iti । pūrvaṃ vākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhe prakaraṇāmnātasya vākyenotkarṣātprakaraṇabādhaṃ pratipādyedānīmutkarpe'pi vākyena prakaraṇasya bādhaḥ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“na prathamayajñe pravṛtrjyāt” iti śrūyate ।
/?/dhikaraṇaśca prathamaśabdaḥ “eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānām” ityatra jyotiṣṭomaviṣayo vedenaivābhyanujñātaḥ । prayogavācitve tu prathamaśabda- sya yajñasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ viruddhyeta । na hi prayogo yajñaḥ, tadanu- ṣṭhānarūpatvāt । lakṣaṇāśrayaṇe tu lakṣaṇaiva doṣaḥ । na hi prathama- śabdasyāpi yajñaparatve lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ । evañca sati niṣedhavākyasya prakaraṇena saha sāmañjasyaṃ bhavati । nanu “yatpravargyaṃ pravṛñjanti” iti yadyapyanārabhya śrūyate, tathāpi “purastādupasadāṃ pravargyeṇa pracaranti” iti vākyenāpāditajyotiṣṭomasambandho'yam । niṣedhasya tu sarvaprayogasambandhe sati tasya niravakāśatvameva syāt । maivam ; etadvidhiprāptipūrvakatvānniṣedhasya ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavadvikalpenaivāva- kāśopapatteḥ । tasmātprathamasaṃkhyāyuktaṃ pravargyapratiṣedhanaṃ sarvaprayoga- yuktasyaiva kratorjyotiṣṭomasya prakaraṇe syāditi । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi prathamaśabdo jyotiṣṭomamabhida- dhyāt । kintarhi ? kartturapravṛttasyādyamanuṣṭhānaṃ prathamaśabdenābhidhīyate etacca lokasiddhameva । na hyāvṛtyā bhojanaṃ prathamaṃ bhojanamityucya/?/te,
āvṛtto vā yajñaḥ prathamo yajña ityabhijīyate । tadyogādanyatra prathamaśabdo lākṣaṇikaḥ । tena kratāvapi prathamaśabdaḥ prathamānuṣṭhāna- yogāllākṣaṇika eva । tatra “na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyāt” ityatra kiṃ yajñaśabdānurodhena prathamaśabda eva yajñalakṣaṇārtho bhavatu ? prathamaprayo- gaśabdānurodhena vā yajñaśabda eva prathamānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇārtho bhavatviti sandehe “yo hotā so'dhvaryuḥ” itivatprathamoccaritaprathamaśabdānurodhena yajñaśabda eva prayogalakṣaṇārtho yuktaḥ । na hyanyatra prathamaprayogasya niṣedhanimittatā sambhavati, yena prathamapratīto'pi hīyeta । “eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ yajjyātiṣṭomaḥ” iti jyotiṣṭomasamānādhikaraṇena prathamoccaritena epaśabdena samabhivyāhṛtaḥ prathamaśabdo yuktaṃ yallakṣa- ṇayā'pi karmaparo bhavatīti ।

nanu bhavatu prathamaśabdasyānuṣṭhānavacanatvam, yajñaśabdasya ca lakṣaṇayā tatparatvam, jyotiṣṭomaprathamaprayogatvantu kutaḥ ? prakaraṇasya vākyena bādhitatvāt । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadyayaṃ vidhirbhavet । kintarhi ? niṣedho'yam । sa ca prāptyapekṣaḥ, prāptiśca pravargyasya “purastādupasādāṃ pravargyeṇa pracaranti” iti upasatpūrvabhāvaniyamā- tsomayāgādanyatropasadāmabhāvāttatrāpi ‘prakṛtau vādviruktāt’ ityanena nyāyena jyotiṣṭomaviṣayatvameva । kiñca prāthamyanimittako'yaṃ niṣedhaḥ, prāthamyañca “eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānām” iti vedena jyoti-
ṣṭomasyaiva niyatam । tena vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā jyotiṣṭoma- prathamaprayoga eva pravargyapratiṣedha iti siddham । taduktam—

lg.l: tata evaṃ bhavedeṣa prayogasya tu vācakaḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 877 )

nanu taittirīyaśākhāyāṃ jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa evaṃ śrūyate— “agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti” iti । tasya tarhi kiṃviṣayatvam ? na tāva- dagniṣṭomadvitīyatṛtīyādiprayogaviṣayatvam, tatra ca pravṛṇaktīti sāmānyavacanenaiva prāptatvāt । nāpi prathamaprayogaviṣayatvam, tatrāpi sāmānyavacanenaiva prāpteḥ । aprāptau satyāṃ prāptipūrvakasya niṣedhasyāsambhavāt । nāpi tatraiva vikalpaprayojanenārthavatvam, sāmānyavacanenaiva vikalpasyāpi siddhatvāt । “agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti” iti kathamasyārthavatvamiti vaktavyam । taducyate—agniṣṭoma- prathamaprayoge vyavasthitavikalpārthametadvacanamiti brūmaḥ । na ca sāmānyavacanenaiva tathābhūtavikalpasiddhiriti vācyam । yataḥ pratiṣedhenāgniṣṭomamātraviṣayatvenānumataprāmāṇye'pi sāmānyavidhistā- vadavaśyaṃbhāvanīyaḥ, anyathā vikalpāsambhavāt । tatra yadi pratiṣedho'pi vidhivadekaprayogasādhāraṇaḥ syāt, tadā vidhiniṣedha- postulyaviṣayatvādavyavasthayopādānavarjane syātām । yathā
prathamaikaprayogaviṣayaḥ pratiṣedhastadā tadgatasāmānyavidhibādhenaiva niṣedhasya caritārthatvāt vyavasthitaviṣaya eva vikalpaḥ । prathama- prayoge pravargyānanuṣṭhānam, dvitīyādiprayoge pravargyānuṣṭhānameva । evañca sati “agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti” ityasya dvitīyatṛtīyāgniṣṭoma- prayoge sāmānyavacanenaiva pravargyasya prāptatvāttatra niravakāśamidaṃ vacanam । niṣedhastu tameva prathamaprayogaṃ vikalpārthamālambate । tatra caikaviṣayatvādeva vidhiniṣedhayorvyavasthāyā asambhavātpuruṣabheda- māśritya vyavasthita eva vikalpaḥ paridṛśyata iti । so'pi ca śrotriyānūcānabrāhmaṇaviṣaya eva । evaṃ hi śrūyate—“kāmantu yo'nūcānaḥ śrotriyaḥ syāttasya pravṛñjyāt” iti । atra karttṛviśeṣo- pādānena “agniṣṭome pravṛṇakti” ityasyānyatraivopasaṃhārāttenāgniṣṭoma- prathamaprayoge śrotriyabrāhmaṇasyaiva vikalṣaḥ aśrotriyabrāhmaṇa- kṣatriyāvaiśyānāntu nityaṃ karaṇameva । tasmāt prathamaṃ “yajamāno- 'tirātreṇa yajeta” iti śravaṇādyadyapyatrirātrasyāpi pākṣika- prathamaprayoganimittā niṣedhaprāptiratideśato'sti, tathāpyagniṣṭomanimi- ttasya pravargyavidhānasya nimittatābhāvena tatrāsambhavānnityama- nuṣṭhānameva । anyāsu tu vikṛtiṣu nitmamevānuṣṭhānamiti ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । naimittikaṃ pravargyapratiṣedhanaṃ karttuḥ prathamapravarttakanaimittikam । kasmāt ? liṅgasya prathamaśabdagatābhi-
dhānasāmarthyasya tannimittatvāt । karttuḥ prathamapravartananimittatvāditi sūtrārthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ peṣaṇādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmananti—“taptmā/?/tpūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo'- dantako hi saḥ” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau ? uta vikṛtau ? iti । ayañca vicāraḥ pūrvoktasantardananyāyenaiva gatārthaḥ । yato na hi darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ pūṣā nāma devatā samasti । na ca lakṣaṇayā darśapūrṇamāsadevatavānena pratipādyate । “adantako hi” iti hetuvannigadasamavāyāt । na hyagnyādīnāmadantakatvaṃ vede purāṇe vā kvacitpratītam । pūṣṇastvadantakatvaṃ vede purāṇe ca pratīyate । asti ca vikṛtau tasya tasya haviṣaḥ pūṣā devatā । ato'rthavattvāttatraiva vākyabalena peṣaṇamutkṛṣyate । tadayaṃ pūrvanyāya- siddho'pyartha uttaravicāradvayārthaṃ saṅkīrtyata iti mantavyam ।
sūtrantu—pūrvasambandhipeṣaṇaṃ vikṛtāvutkṛṣyeta । prakṛtau tasyā- codanā avidhānamityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ peṣaṇasya caruviniyogādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau śrūyamāṇaṃ vikṛtāvityuktam । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ carau paśau puroḍāśe ca ? uta carāveva ? iti । prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyabalenotkarṣaṃ pratipādyedānīmutkṛṣṭasyaiva peṣaṇasya prasaṅgādviśeṣaścintyate । atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“tasmātpūṣā pratiṣṭabhāgo'dantako hi” ityaviśeṣapravṛttamidaṃ vākyaṃ yadyatpūṣadevatyaṃ havistatra tatra peṣaṇaṃ vidadhāti । pūṣadevatyaścaruḥ puroḍāśaḥ paśu- śca । tena triyate'sandigdhameva peṣaṇamiti । na cāpiṣṭena puroḍāśā- sambhavāt puroḍāśe peṣaṇavidhānamanarthakam । anyārthapiṣṭakriyārthi- tvenāpi puroḍāśasiddhau prayogagatānuṣṭhānaphalatvenaiva virodhāt । ataścarau puroḍāśe paśau cāviśeṣātsarvatraiva peṣaṇamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhāyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
puroḍāśe paśau ca peṣaṇaṃ na bhavati । tathāhi—puroḍāśe
tāvatprayāgagatānuṣṭhānārthamapi vidhānamanarthakam । atideśādeva prayogagatapeṣaṇasya prāptatvāt । nāpi paśau, (?) avattasyaiva peṣaṇe- na virodhaparihāraḥ, avadānasya pṛthakpadārthatvābhāvāt । na tvavadānaṃ nāma pṛthak padārthaḥ karttavyatvena vidhīyate । kintu sviṣṭakṛdādi- śeṣakāryavaśena ekadeśaprakṣepeṇa pradānāvagamāttasya cāvadānamanta- reṇāsambhavādekadeśapradānākṣiptāvadānānuvādena dvitvamātraṃ vidhī- yate । na pradhānasyaivāyamāropo (?) yadavadānaṃ nāma । na caikasmi- nnupakrānte padārthe padārthāntareṇa vyavadhānaṃ vidhiranumanyate । ato- 'nyatrāvadānānantaraṃ peṣaṇaṃ sambhavatīti hṛdayasyaiva peṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam । tathā ca sati hṛdayāpādānakamavadānaṃ “utsādanadeśādavaghyati” iti vicchedadeśādavadānamiti vipratiṣedhāt na paśāvapi peṣaṇa- miti । nanu carāvapi vipratipedho'sti । viśadaśuddhau- danavacanatvāccaruśabdasya, peṣaṇe ca sati vaiśadyavināśāt । maivam ; anavastrāvitāntarūṣmasiddhatvavacano hi caruśabdaḥ । tena pākaviśeṣasyaiva caruśabdapravṛttinimittatvāttasya ca viśadasiddha- yoraviśeṣātpiṣṭapakvasyāpi carutvāvirodhaḥ । tena prāptivipratiṣe- dhayorabhāvāccarāveva peṣaṇavidhānamiti siddham । na ca vācyam— yathā puroḍāśe tathā carāvapyatideśaprāptameva peṣaṇaṃ na vidheyamiti । yataḥ puroḍāśārthapiṇḍaniṣpattiḥ khalu dvāramasya prakṛtau, na
carustaṇḍulamātreṇa niṣpadyate । tena dvārābhāvātkṛṣṇaleṣvivāvaghātaḥ peṣaṇaṃ nivṛttamapi punaradṛṣṭārthaṃ pratiprastūyata iti nānupapannam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe carau paśau ca peṣaṇam । siddhānte tu carāveveti । sutrantu—carāveva peṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate, na puroḍāśe, ati- deśaprāptatvāt । na paśau, arthavipratiṣedhādityarthaḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ peṣaṇasyaikadevatye niveśādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau bhavati carāvevetyuktam । athedānīmidaṃ sandihyate—kimekadevatye pauṣṇa etadbhavitumarhati ? uta dvide- vatye ? iti । udāharaṇam—rājasūya uttare trisaṃyukte somā- pauṣṇa ekādaśakapāla aindrāpauṣṇaścaruḥ । somāpauṣṇasya puroḍā- śatvenātideśaprāptatvātpeṣaṇasyedaṃ prasaktānuprasaṅgena vicāryate । tatraikasminneva pūṣṇi devatāyāṃ peṣaṇaṃ karttavyam । pūṣetyekavacanenaika- syaiva pūṣṇaḥ saṃyogāt । “āgneyaṃ caturddhā karoti” ityekasminne-
vāgnau devatāyāṃ caturddhākaraṇamiveti । kiñca pūrvapakṣe pākavaiṣamyaṃ bhavet । yataḥ pūṣṇo bhāgastāvadavaśyaṃ piṣṭvā paktavyaḥ । indrasya ca taṇḍulātmaka eva । na ca mṛdukaṭhinayoḥ pākasāmyaṃ samasti । atha vaiṣamyapraśamanārthamindrasyāpi bhāgaḥ piṣyeta, tato bhāgasaṅkara- ssyāt । taduktam—

lg.l: piṣyādarddhaṃ samastaṃ vā dvidevatye carau bhavāna ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 883. )
iti siddhāntenopakramya pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“pūṣā pratiṣṭabhāgaḥ” ityatra pūṣasadbhāvani- mittaṃ hi peṣaṇamavagamyate । na tu pūṣaviśeṣitahavirnimittam । nāpi pūṣaviśeṣitayāgasambandhihavirnimittam । tathā sati dvidevatyasya haviṣo dvidevatyasya vā yāgasyānyasāpekṣadevatābhāvena pūṣṇā viśeṣṭuma/?/śakyatvānna bhavatyeva peṣaṇam । yadā tu pūṣasadbhāvamātrani- mittamidaṃ peṣaṇam, tadā dvidevatye'pi pūṣṇo bhāvāttadupalakṣitasya ‘samaṃ syāt’ iti nyāyenārtharūpasya vidyamānatvāddvidevatye'pi peṣaṇaṃ yuktam ।
taduktam—

lg.l: haviṣo yadi pauṣṇasya tadyāgāṅgasya vā bhavet ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 885 )

na cāgneyacaturddhākaraṇavannirapekṣapūṣadevatāsambandhinyeva haviṣi peṣaṇamiti vācyam । yatastatra taddhitāntamāgneyapadam । na ca sāpekṣā taddhitasyotpattiriti yuktaṃ nirapekṣāgnidevatya eva caturddhā- karaṇam । na ceha taddhitāntatvamastīti vaiṣamyam । nanu “indrapītasya bhakṣayāmi” ityatra samāso'pi sāpekṣasyāniṣiddha eva । “pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāga” iti ca samāsa eva । ataḥ kathaṃ dvidevatyasya grahaṇam । ucyate—prapiṣṭabhāgaśabdo hi samāsānto na tu pūṣeti prathamāntaṃ padam । ataḥ pūṣṇo'samastatvātsāpekṣatve'pi na virodhaḥ । nāpi pauṣṇabhāgapeṣaṇe pākavaiṣamyam । arddhapakve taṇḍule piṣṭanikṣe- peṇa pākasāmyopapatteḥ । athavā asambhavena vibhinnasthālīpākādeva pākasya sāmyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sadvitīye'pi pūṣṇi pūṣasadbhāvamātrani- mittatvātpeṣaṇaṃ kartavyameveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pūṣasadbhāvanimittaṃ peṣaṇaṃ
bhavet । na tvevamasti, nimittasyāpratītatvāt । kintarhi ? “pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ syāt” iti vākyātpūṣabhāganimittametatpeṣaṇaṃ pratīyate । na ca tadapi sambhavati, devatāyā mukhya evāsambhavāt । bhajasevāyāmityasmātkarmasādhano'yaṃ bhāgaśabdaḥ । bhajyate sevyata ityarthaḥ । na ca devatā haviḥ sevate, devatāyā bhoktṛtvasya navame niṣedhāt । tena lākṣaṇiko'yaṃ bhāgaśabdaḥ । yaddhi yaduddeśena tyajyate tattena bhajyata iti lokasiddham । tena mukhyabhajanatvāsa- mbhavāttatpūrvabhāvyuddeśatyāgo lakṣyate । tenāyamarthaḥ—pūṣaṇamuddiśya yaḥ tyajyate sa pūṣṇo bhāgaḥ । na caindrāpauṣṇaṃ haviḥ pūṣaṇamuddiśya tyajyate, indrapūṣavyāsaṅgitvāduddeśasya । tenaitatpeṣaṇaṃ pūṣamātraprayuktaṃ na, nāpi tadbhāgaprayuktam । kintu taduddeśatyāgarūpayāgadvāreṇa yāgāpūrvaprayuktam ।
taduktam—

lg.l: na hyeṣa devatādharmo na tadbhāgasya gamyate ।

chapter.p: ( taṃ. vā., pṛ. 887 )
na cendrapūṣabhāgāpūrvapeṣaṇaṃ karttavyaṃ na tu dvidevatye (?) ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—ekasminneva pūṣṇi /?/vākye'rthaśabdo bhavet । yāgātprathamarūpārthadharmatvāt । kratūbha-
yorindrapūṣṇorddevatve aindrāgnavat । yadvā “āgneyaṃ caturddhā karoti” iti caturddhākaraṇavaddvidevatye aindrāgna (?) iti ।।

lg.l: yo nāma kaścidiha saṃviditaṃ prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।।
sākṛrtṛtāmananukīrttya sa kīrttilopāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhṛyāt ।।

chapter.head: tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ ।।
atha tṛtīyādhyāyasya pañcamaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamamupāṃśuyāje śeṣakāryābhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra śrūyate—“uttarārddhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyati, iḍāmavadyati” iti । tathānyānyapi śeṣakāryāṇi । tatra sandehaḥ—kimājyādupāṃśuyājadravyātsviṣṭakṛdarthamavadātavyaḥ ? tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ upalabdhamātṛkāyāṃ nāsti ।
uta neti । sarvapradānādhikaraṇe śeṣasadbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ । ‘sarvebhyo vā kāraṇāviśeṣāt’ (jai. sū., 3. 4. 44.) ityatra sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ śeṣakāryaṃ kartavyamiti nirūpitam । tasyedānīmatiprasakta- syāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“śeṣātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyati” ityādi- śeṣakāryavidhīnāmaviśeṣapravṛttatvādupāṃśuyājasyāpi yadājyadravyaṃ tatpratipattitvamaviśiṣṭaṃ sviṣṭakṛdādikarmaṇāmiti । nanu nāvaśyaṃ tāvadājyadravyasya sarvārthatvācchjaterapyupāṃśuyājaśeṣatvena pratipattyape- kṣitvam । nāpi jauhavasyājyasya ; “caturavattaṃ juhoti” iti vacanena kṛtsnasyaiva homasambandhāvagamāt । ataḥ kathamupāṃśuyājā- jyasamarthatvaṃ sviṣṭakṛdādānāmiti । ucyate—yadyapi jauhavājyasya “caturavattaṃ juhoti” iti sambandhaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi sviṣṭakṛdādīnāṃ prakaraṇāvagatasakalapradhānasambandhanirvāhāya juhvāṃ kiñciccheṣayitavyam । yathā “camasairjuhoti” ityatra satyapi homasambandhe śeṣakāryavaśena śeṣaḥ sthāpyate, tathātrāpīti । evañca “sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ samavadyati” iti sarvahavissambandhānuvādo'pyupapatsyate । tenā/?/jyādapi sviṣṭakṛdartha- mavadātavyam । aviśeṣeṇa sarvasaṃyogāvagamāditi । evaṃprāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyupāṃśuyājadravyasyājyasya śeṣo/?/ bhavet, tathāhi—dhruvāyāṃ tāvadupāṃśuyājasya śeṣo nāstītyuktameva । na ca juhvāmapyasti । “caturavattaṃ juhoti” iti vacanena kṛtsnasyaiva homasambandhāvagamāt । na ca kṛtsnasya homasambandhe'pi śeṣa- kāryavaśenaiva śeṣasthāpanamiti vācyam । śeṣakāryāṇāṃ pratipatti- rūpatvena dravyasthāpanaprayojakatvābhāvāt । camaseṣu na śeṣakārya- vaśena śeṣasthāpanam । kintu vacanavaśādeva । evaṃ hi tatra śrūyate— “alpaṃ juhoti” iti । na cātra vacanamevaṃbhūtamasti । yattu “sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ samavadyati” ityanuvādadarśanātsarvatraiva śeṣasa- dbhāva ityuktam, tadayuktam ; anuvādatvena sarvaśabdasya yathā- prāptagocaratvāt । ‘sarve brāhmaṇā bhuktavanta’ itivadvidyamānaśeṣaviṣaya- tvenopapatteḥ । ataḥ śeṣābhāvādupāṃśuyājājye nāsti śeṣa- kāryamiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—aśeṣatvāccheṣābhāvā- nnāsti śeṣakāryam । aśeṣatvañca sarvasyaiva homārthamādānāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ sākaṃprasthāyīye śeṣakāryābhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
