chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsau prakṛtya śrūyate—“sākamprasthāyīyena yajeta” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ sviṣṭakṛdasti nāstīti । atrodāharaṇā- ntare'dhikāśaṅkāṃ nirākarttuṃ pūrvoktanyāyo'tidiśyate । iha ca sākamprasthāyīyaṃ nāma karmāntaraṃ na vidhīyate । kintu sānnāyyapātrābhyāṃ dadhipayaḥpūrṇakumbhīmyāṃ saha prasthānalakṣaṇo guṇaḥ paśurūpe phale vidhīyata iti rathantarapāde ‘ayaneṣu codanā/?/ntaraṃ saṃjñopabandhāt’ ityatrādhikaraṇe sthāpitam । idānīṃ śeṣakāryamatrāsti naveti vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—kumbhībhyāṃ saha prasthāna- lakṣaṇo guṇaḥ phalāya vidhīyamānaḥ sānāyyādhikārabhūta iti tāvatsiddham । prakṛtau ca sviṣṭakṛdindrapradānārthasānnāyyādavadīyata ityapi siddham । tadvikāratvādatideśaprāpta ihāpyavadātavyam । na cātropāṃśuyājavaccheṣo nāstīti vācyam । tatra hi dhrauvājyasya sādhāraṇatvājjauhavājyasya ca “caturavattaṃ juhoti” iti vacanena
sarvasyaiva homasambandhāvagamāt yuktaḥ śeṣābhāvaḥ । iha tu sānnāyyasya sādhāraṇatvābhāvātkṛtsnahomavidhānābhāvācca śeṣabhāvā- datideśaprāpteḥ śeṣakāryairbhavitavyamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatrāpi śeṣaḥ sambhavet । tathā hi— yāvaddhotavyaṃ dravyaṃ tāvataiva sahāhavanīyadeśaṃ prati prasthīyata iti yuktam । tadiha homārthaṃ kumbhībhyāṃ saha prasthānavidhānaṃ kumbhīyamiti tasyaiva yadi homasambandho vidhīyate tadaiva paraṃ dṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavati, itarathā tvadṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgaḥ । na cāhavanīyadeśātkumbhībhyāṃ saha prasthāyā- vadāya hotavyamiti vācyam । “agnīdhe srucau pradāya saha kumbhī- bhirabhikrāmannāha” ityavadānasādhanasrukparityāgena gamanavidhānā- sambhavāt । tenāpi kumbhīparimitasyaiva sānnāyyasya homasbandhā- vagamena śeṣābhāvānnāsti śeṣakāryamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu sākaṃprasthāyīye'pyupāṃśuyā- javatsviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ na karttavyamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ sautrāmaṇyāṃ śeṣakāryābhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti sautrāmaṇā । tatra grahāḥ śrūyante āśvinasārasva- taindrāḥ । tatra keṣāñcitpiṣṭaprabhavasurādravyakatvenāgneyavikāratvāccoda- kena sviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ prāptam । athedānīṃ sandehaḥ—kinnivartate ? uta neti । atrāpyudāharaṇāntareṣvadhikāśaṅkāṃ nirākarttuṃ sa eva nyāyo'tidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—keṣāñcit piṣṭadravyaprabhavasurādravyakatvenā- gneyavikāratvāt payodravyakatvena ca sānnāyyavikāratvādatideśāt sviṣṭakṛdādiśeṣakāryaprāptistāvadasti । na ca śeṣo nāsti । jyotiṣṭomasomacamaseṣviva vācanikaśeṣasadbhāvasya pratīyamānatvāt । evaṃ hyatra śrūyate—“ucchinaṣṭi na sarvaṃ juhoti” iti । ataḥ śeṣasa- dbhāvādasti śeṣakāryamiti । nanu śeṣasya pratipattyantaraṃ śrūyate । tatra grahasya tāvat—“brāhmaṇaṃ parikrīṇīyāduccheṣaṇasya pātāram” iti parikrītabrāhmaṇasya pātuḥ, surāgrahaśeṣasyāpi “śatātṛṇṇāyāṃ vikṣāgyanti” iti śatātṛṇṇārūpapātraviśeṣe kṣāraṇamiti balīya-
saupadeśikapratipatyantareṇātideśikapratipatterbādha eveti । maivam ; virodhābhāvāt, sviṣṭakṛdādyanuṣṭhānāvaśiṣṭasyaiva caturddhāpuroḍāśabhakṣa- ṇavat pānavikṣāraṇayorupapatteḥ । tena śeṣaśadbhāvāt karttavyameva śeṣakāryamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi kṛtsnasyaiva śeṣasyaupadeśikapratipa- ttisambandho na bhavet । tathāhi-“payograhān juhoti” iti vacanāt kṛtsnasyaiva homasambandhaḥ pratīyate । tatra yathā “ucchinaṣṭi na sarvaṃ juheti” iti vacanena śeṣasadbhāvaḥ pratipādyate । tathā kṛtsnasyaiva śeṣasya parikrītabrāhmaṇabhakṣaṇaśatātṛṇṇākṣāraṇasambandhenopadeśādevāvagata- tvāt na kiñcitkarttavyamiti na pratipatyantarāpekṣā samasti, yenāti- deśikī pratipattiḥ sambadhyate । puroḍāśe tu “uttarārddhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyati” ityekadeśamātrasyaiva sviṣṭakṛdādyarthatvādavaśiṣṭasya caturddhākṛtasya vacanavaśādbhakṣaṇārthatvamapi । na ceha tatheti śeṣābhā- vānnāsti sviṣṭakṛdādiśeṣakāryamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-sautrāmaṇyāṃ graheṣu śeṣakāryaṃ na karttavyamiti na śāstrādatidiśyata iti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ sarvapṛṣṭheṣṭyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti sarvapṛṣṭheṣṭiḥ—“indrāya rāthantarāya, indrāya vārhatāya indrāya vairūpāya indrāya vairājāyendrāya śākkarāya indrāya raivatāya” iti । tatra puroḍāśo bahūnāṃ karmaṇāṃ sādhāraṇaḥ । tatra sandehaḥ— kiṃ pratikarma sviṣṭakṛdiḍaṃ karttavyam ? uta sakṛdeveti । pūrvaṃ śeṣa- kāryameva nāstīti cintitam । idānīṃ satsu śeṣakāryeṣu prasaṅgena tadviśeṣaścintyate । atraika evendraḥ śrūyate tathāpi rathantaravairūpādiviśe- ṣaṇabhedena devatātadguṇādeva ṣaḍeva karmāṇi bhinnānīti vyavasthitam । tatra yeṣāṃ śākhināṃ pratikarma ṣaḍeva puroḍāśāsteṣāṃ nāyaṃ vicāraḥ । yeṣāntu ṣaṭkarmasādhāraṇa eka eva puroḍāśo rathacakraparimitaḥ śrūyate teṣāmayaṃ vicāraḥ-karmabhedātpratikarma śeṣakāryaṃ karttavyam ? uta dravyaikatvānneti । nanu ‘ekadravye ca saṃskārāṇāṃ vyākhyāta- mekatvam’ ityekādaśādhikaraṇenaiva gatamidam । tatra hyātitthopasada- gnīṣomīyānekakarmasādhane'pi barhiṣi dravyaikatve lavanādisaṃskārāṇāṃ tantratvamiti nirūpitam, tadvadihāpyanekakarmasādhanasyāpyekasya puroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛdādayaḥ saṃskārāstantraṃ bhaviṣyantīti । ucyate-
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā'bhisandhiḥ—sādhāraṇāṅgāmino hi saṃskāre na punaḥ saṃskārāpekṣā samastīti bhavatu tadgāmināṃ saṃskā- rāṇāṃ viśeṣāgrahaṇāttantratvam । iha punarekatve'pi puroḍāśāvayava- bhedenānekakarmasādhanatve sati viśeṣagrahaṇātsaṃskṛte'pyekadeśa ekadeśāntarasya saṃskārāpekṣā samastāti na tantratvam । ato dravyaikatve'pi karmabhedād bhedenaiva sviṣṭakṛtsaṃskāraḥ karttavya iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyayaṃ hūyamānasaṃskāraḥkarmasaṃskāro vā bhavet । tathāhi—avadānadeśadvāreṇa karmaṇā huyamānasya ca saṃskārādavadānadeśasya ca bhinnattvādviśeṣagrahaṇādbhavatyevāvṛttiḥ । na tvetadasti, adṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgāt । kintvatideśaprāpto'yaṃ prakṛtya- nusāreṇa śrutaśeṣasaṃskāraḥ । eka eva cāsau puroḍāśaḥ sarva- sādhāraṇo bhavati । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 996)
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu avibhāgādekatvāccheṣasya sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt sādhāraṇatvāt tantratvameva sviṣṭakṛdādīnā- miti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamamaindravāyave dvirbhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
chapter.sutra: aindravāyave tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāt ।।3.5.18।।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ—“jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tatraindravāyavagrahe sandehaḥ—kiṃ sakṛt bhakṣaṇam ? uta dviriti । atrānantarādhikaraṇapratipādyaṃ somaśeṣabhakṣaṇaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā pūrvā- dhikaraṇāpavādatvenānantaramidamārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ-aindravāyave hi dvirāvṛtto homo dravyaṃ caikameva । tatra pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyena sakṛdbhakṣaṇenaiva śeṣapratipattisiddheḥ sakṛdeva bhakṣaṇamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi bhakṣaṇāvṛttipratipādakaṃ vacanāntaraṃ
na bhavet । evaṃ hi śrūyate—“dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati dvirhyetasya vaṣaṭkaroti” iti । ato vacanabalādbhakṣaṇamapyāvṛttamiti siddham । tadetadyathābhāṣyamadhikaraṇaṃ śrīmadvāttiṃkakārapādā nānumanyante, sandehābhāvāt । na hi pratyakṣavacane sati sandeho bhavati । nanvevaṃ- vidhānyadhikaraṇāni dṛśyanta eva, yeṣu nyāyena pūrvapakṣe vacanena siddhāntaḥ । yathā vārttikakāramate vāyavyapaśāvatideśaprāptā “tvaṃ hyagne prathamo manotā” ityāgneyī manotā । tatra vāyupadohena prayoktavyamiti nyāyāt pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā “yadyaṣyanyadevatyaḥ paśugagne- yyeva manotā kāryā” iti vacanāt siddhāntitam, tathehāpi syāditi । naitatḥ tatraiva tadbhavati yatra pratipādito nyāyo vacanādbādhito bhavati । vacanābhāve sa na syāt । yathā manotāyām । evaṃ hi tatra nyāyaḥ—agnīṣomīye paśau yadyapi samuditayordevatātvaṃ manotā cāgnimātraprakāśikā, tathāpyagneḥ samavetatvānmantrasya ca samavetaprakāśanena sarvatrārthavatvātprakṛtau mantra- prayoge sati agnirahitāyāṃ vikṛtāvūhaḥ karttavya iti । sa caiṣa nyāyo vacanena bādhitaḥ । yatra samuditadevatye prakṛtau karmaṇyanyataraprakāśa- nena samavetārtho mantro vikṛtau anyadevatye karmaṇyūhena prāpnoti, tatra phaliṣyati । iha tu pūrvādhikaraṇenaivāsya nyāyasya siddhatvā- tkimanenādhikaraṇeneti । sūtrantu pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatvenaiva vyākhyeyam ।
tathāhi—evaṃ tatra śaṅakanīyam—“dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati dvihyeṃtasya vaṣaṭkaroti” ityatra hi vaṣaṭkāropalakṣitapradhānabhedā- deva bhakṣaṇarūpapratipattibhedaṃ veda eva pratipādayati । tena sarva- pṛṣṭhāyāṃ satyapi dravyaikatve pradhānabhedātsviṣṭakṛdādipratipattibhedena bhavitavyameveti । tatredamupāttam-aindravāyave tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāditi । asyārthaḥ—nātra pradhānabhedahetukaḥ pratipattihetubhedaḥ pratipādyate । kintarhi ? bācanikaṃ, hetvadhikaraṇe caivaṃvidhānāṃ hetutvasya nirākṛtatvāditi । evañca pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatve sati somabhakṣa- sāmānyavicāramakṛtvā viśeṣavicāravyatikramo na bhaviṣyatīti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ some śeṣabhakṣādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome santi somāḥ । teṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ teṣāṃ śeṣo bhakṣayitavyaḥ ? uta neti । darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śeṣapratipattiṃ vicā- ryedānīṃ prasaṅgena jyotiṣṭomasya somaśeṣabhakṣaṇarūpā pratipatti- rvicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “alpaṃ juhoti” iti vacanādgraha- camasayorasti somaśeṣaḥ, tathāpi bhakṣaṇarūpapratipattiprāpakopadeśā- bhāvānmūlaprakṛtitvena cātideśāsambhavānnāsti bhakṣaṇamiti । nanu caindravāyave tāvat “dviraindravāyavasya bhakṣayati” ityupadeśāt bhakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotītyuktameva । evamanyatrāpi bhakṣaṇapratipādakaliṅgadarśanamasti- “sarvataḥ parihāramāśvinaṃ bhakṣayati” iti । atra prāptabhakṣaṇānuvādena sarvataḥ parihāralakṣaṇaṃ bhakṣaṇasya niḥśeṣatvaṃ vidhīyate । tathā “bhakṣitāpyāyitāṃścamasāndakṣiṇasyāvalambe havirddhāne sādayanti” ityatrāpi prāptabhakṣaṇānuvādena camasasya havirddhānadakṣiṇadeśāsādanaṃ vidhīyate । ekadeśasthamapi ca liṅgaṃ sthālīpulākanyāyena sarvatra prāpakamasti । ato'sti sarvatraiva bhakṣaṇamiti । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā- ‘syādvānyarthadarśanāt’ iti । maivam; pramāṇāntarāvagatārthadyotakaṃ liṅgam, na tu prāpakam । na cātra pramāṇāntaraṃ prāpakamastīti na bhakṣaṇamiti । atha prāpakapramāṇābhāvādeva tānyeva vacanānyaṅgatā- viśiṣṭavidhānādbhakṣaṇaprāpakāṇi, tathāpi yathopadeśameva bhakṣaṇaṃ na sarvatra । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā—‘vacanānyapūrvatvāta tasmādyathopadeśaṃ syaḥ’ iti । yattvāpātataḥ siddhāntasūtratvenaivaitatsūtraṃ bhāṣye pratibhāti, na tattathaiva grāhyam । kintu vārttikānusāreṇa bhāṣyamapyavahitaiḥ
pūrvapakṣānuguṇatvenaiva kāryamiti । ato yāvadvacanameva somabhakṣaṇa- miti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra samākhyādibhedabhinnaḥ sarvatrai- vopadeśo bhakṣaṇasya prāpako na bhavet । tathāhi—camaseṣu tāvat “praitu hotuḥ camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇāṃ pra yajamānasya” ityevamā- dikāḥ praiṣagatāssamākhyāḥ santi । camasasamākhyāścādanārthasya camudhātoḥ prayogādadyate asminnityarthe bhavanti । na capraiṣavelāyāṃ tatra camanaṃ bhūtaṃ varttamānaṃ vopalabhyata iti pāriśeṣyādbhaviṣyaccamana- pratipādaka evopadeśo'numīyate । “alpaṃ juhoti” iti darśanāt someśeṣavantaścamasāḥ preṣitā iti tasyaivāpekṣitā pratipattiriti śeṣasya bhakṣaṇaṃ gamyate । na ca hotrādīnāmeva camasināṃ hotrādi- sambandhenaiva samākhyādarśanāt । kiñca yadi pra yajamānasyeti samākhyayā yajamānasya śeṣabhakṣaṇaṃ prāpyate, tadā “yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet sa yadi somaṃ vibhakṣayiṣet” ityatra phalacamasa- vidhau “na somam” iti somabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhasaṅkīrttanaṃ nāvakalpeta samākhyāvyatiriktasya yajamānacamase bhakṣaṇaprāpakasyābhāvāt । tasmādasti camaseṣu samākhyayā bhakṣaṇamiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe yadi yāvadvacanaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ tadā na hotrādīnāṃ camaseṣu bhakṣaṇam । siddhānte tu samākhyayā hotrādīnāṃ bhakṣaṇamiti । sūtrantu—samākhyābalāccamaseṣvasti śeṣabhakṣaṇaṃ samākhyayā bhakṣaṇaṃ saṃyoganimittatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ sasubrahmaṇyodgātṛbhakṣādhikaraṇ
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ—“jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tatrāsti praiṣaḥ—“praitu hotuścamasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām” iti । atra samākhyānādbhakṣa ityuktam । tatra sandehaḥ—kimeka eva camasamudgotā bhakṣayet ? uta sarve bhakṣayeyuḥ ? atha vā subrahmaṇya- varjitāśchandogā bhakṣayeyuḥ ? athavā saha subrahmaṇyena ? iti । samākhyānimittaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyedanīṃ prasaṅgāt tadgataviśeṣa- ścintyate । atra bahuvacanaśruteḥ prakṛtityayavisaṃvādena sandehaḥ । prodgātṝṇāmityasyaiva vicāraviṣayatvam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—udgātṝṇāmiti bahuvacanaṃ śrūyate । ekaśco-
dgātā, “udgātāraṃ vṛṇīta” iti vacanāt । tatra prakṛtityayayoranya- tarārthaparityāge'vaśyakarttavye saṃkhyāyāḥ saṃkhyeyaguṇabhūtatvād ‘guṇe tvanyāyyakalpanaikadeśatvāt’ iti nyāyena prātipadikārthā- sambhavino bahutvasyāvivakṣitatvādudgātṛśrutisaṃyogādudgātṛcamase eka evodgātā bhakṣayediti । athavā pāśamantraprakaraṇe bahutvaṃ na kenacitprakāreṇāstītyavivakṣā yuktā । iha tu prakaraṇe ṛtvijo bahavaḥ santyeva । śaknoti codgātṛśabda ekakarmasambandhadvāreṇa tān bhakṣayitum । ato lakṣaṇāyāmupapadyamānāyāṃ nāvivakṣā bahutvasyeti udgātṛśabdasya sarvartviksaṃyogāt sarva eva bhakṣayeyuḥ । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā—‘sarve vā saṃyogāt’ (3. 5. 24) iti ।

athavā śrutivṛttau sambhavantyāṃ lakṣaṇāyā ayogāt । sambhavati cātrodgāyantītyudgānasaṃyogādudgānaśabdābhidheyāstrayaḥ— udgātā prastotā pratiharttā ceti । tena subrahmaṇyasya gānayogābhāvā- ttadvivarjitāstraya eva bahutvasaṃyogādbhakṣayeyuḥ । taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa- ‘tatsaṃyogādvahuśruteḥ’ iti । tasmādasubrahmaṇyāstraya eva stotrakāri- ṇo bhakṣeyuriti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyugānanimitto'yamudgātṛśabdaste- pu vartitumarhati । tathāhi—eka evodgātā dvau gātārau । gānaṃ hi
lokavedasādhāraṇaṃ gītimātram । udgānantu dvitīyā sāmno bhaktirutpūrvasyaḥ gāyaterarthaḥ । taccaika evodgātā karoti । gānamātraṃ prastotṛpratihartārau । tena gānayogasyāvyāpitvānna tannimittatvam । vedasaṃyoganimitta evāyaṃ chandogapravacanaṃ hyaudgātraśabdenābhidhīyate । tena ye tasyodgātāra iti audamedhinyāyenānumīyante chandogapravaca- nāt sahasubrahmaṇyāścatvāra eveti, ta eva bhakṣayantīti siddham ।

prayojaman—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—sarva eva sasubrahmaṇyāścha- ndogāḥ pravacanavedasaṃyogāt bhakṣayeyuḥ । yatra tu “viniṣadya udgātāraḥ sāmnā stuvanti” ityādau subrahmaṇyavarjitānāṃ stotrakāriṇāṃ grahaṇam, tatra subrahmaṇyastotrasaṃyogābhāvaḥ kāraṇam । sa hi subrahmaṇyāmṛcaṃ kṛtvaiva karmadeśānnirgataḥ । tadidamuktam—kāraṇā- dekadeśe syāditi । na caitadyuktam । audamedhinyāyasyāveṣṭyadhikaraṇa eva nirākṛtatvāt । tatra hi udamedhipīto udamedha ityanuśāsanā- bhāvena audamedhyudameghayoḥ pramāṇāntaraprasiddhatvādbhavatu yathā- kathañcit prakṛtyanumānam । iha codgātṛtvasyāprasiddhatvādyathānu- śāsanameva śabdārtho'nugantavyaḥ । smaranti codgāturidamityaṇpratyayaṃ, na tu tasya karteti pratyayalopam । ato na yuktametadityanyathā vyākhyāyate । tathāhi—yathā jātinimitto rājā tadyogādrājyam । tadyogādbrāhmaṇādiṣu gauṇo rājaśabdaḥ, tathātrāpi varaṇanimitta
evodgātā, tatsaṃyogāt pravacanamaudgātram । tadyogācca prastotrādiṣu caturṣvapi gauṇa evodgātṛśabdaḥ । tatra caturṇāmeva bhakṣaṇe prāpte subrahmaṇasya sadapi antarvedyāñca bhakṣaṇakāle sannidhānābhāvāttad- vyatiriktā eva bhakṣayeyuḥ । na cāyaṃ karttṛsaṃskāraḥ, yena yatra subrahmaṇyo'sti tatraiva nītvā dīyeta । śeṣasaṃskāro hyasau । tasya ca taditarabhakṣaṇenāpi siddhatvādbahuvacanañca kapiñjalanyāyena triṣveva caritārthamiti ।
sūtrantu—sarva evodgātṛśabdenābhidhīyante, na stotrakāriṇa eva, teṣāmapyasannidhānātkāraṇādekadeśe subrahmaṇyavarjitodgātṛtṛtīye bhakṣaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ grāvastutassomabhakṣādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome grāvastunnāmā hotṛpuruṣaḥ । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ sa somaṃ bhakṣayeduta neti । samākhyānimittaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ nirūpyedānīṃ vācanikameva bhakṣaṇaṃ nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—na tāvad grāvastuto bhakṣaṇapratipādakaṃ
viśeṣavacanamasti । nāpi “yathācamasamanyāṃścamasāṃścamasino bhakṣa- yanti, athaitasya hāriyojanasya sarva eva lipsante” iti sāmānya- vacanena hāriyojanapātre grāvastuto'pi bhakṣaṇaprāptiḥ, tasya camasimātrabhakṣaṇavidhāyakatvāt । tathāhi—ekamidaṃ vākyaṃ pratīyate । asyārthaḥ—yathācamasamanyāṃścamasānekaikaṃcamasino bhakṣa- yanti, athaitasmin hāriyojane sarva eva camasino bhakṣayantīti । tasmāt svavākyāvagatacamasiviśeṣitatvāt sarvaśabdasya na ṛtviṅmātraviṣayatvam । ato nāsti grāvastuto bhakṣa iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi camasibhiḥ sarvaśabdasyārtho viśeṣyeta । tathāhi—sarvatraivāyaṃ sarvaśabdo'dhikāraviśeṣito na viśeṣāntaramapekṣate । yathā asmin bhojye sarve bhuktavanta iti । adhikṛtāśca sarva eva ṛtvijaḥ । atastairevāyaṃ nirākāṅkṣaḥ sarvaśabdo na viśeṣaṇāntaramapekṣate । na ca camasipadasyārthavatvāya camasibhiḥ sarvaśabdasyārtho viśeṣyata iti vācyam । tasyobhayathāpi hāriyojanaśrutyarthatayaivārthavatvāt, śrutisaṅkocaprasaṅgācca । tadayaṃ
vacanārthaḥ—yathācamasamanyāṃścamasāṃścamasino bhakṣayanti, hāriyojane punaḥ sarva evartvijaścamasino'camasinaśca bhakṣayantīti । ato'sti hāriyojane grāvastuto'pi bhakṣa iti siddham ।
sūtrantu—sarveṣāmeva ṛtvijāṃ hāriyojane bhakṣavidhānādasti grāvastuto'pi bhakṣaḥ । camasiśrutistu hāriyojanastutyarthā na tu sarvaśabdaviśeṣaṇārtheti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha kiṃ samākhyaiva bhakṣaṇe kāraṇam ? neti brūmaḥ । vaṣaṭkārācca bhakṣayet । vaṣaṭkāraśca bhakṣaṇanimittam । katham ? evaṃ hi śrūyate—“vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” iti । atra prāpta- bhakṣaṇānuvādena prathāmyamātraṃ vidhīyate, athavā vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṃ prāthamyaviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇāntaramiti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—sarvatra viśiṣṭavidhigauravabhaye-
nopapadasaṅkānto vidhirdhātvarthasya vilambinīmapi yathākathañcitprāpti- mapekṣate । asti ca hoturvaṣaṭkarttṛtvāt “praitu hotuścamasaḥ” iti samākhyayā svacamase bhakṣaṇaprāptiḥ । atastatraiva samākhyāprāptabhakṣa- ṇānuvādena vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṃ prāthamyamātraṃ vidhīyate । tena vaṣaṭ- karttavyanimittakaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ karttavyamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyateḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra samāsānnikṛṣya ca bhakṣaṇama- nuvadituṃ śakyate । tathāhi—na tāvadatra bhakṣaṇamātrānuvādena prāthamyaṃ vidhīyate, anyatrāpi prasaṅgāt । kintarhi ? vaṣaṭkartturyo bhakṣa iti vaṣaṭkarttṛsambandhibhakṣaṇānuvādena । tathā sati vaṣaṭkarttṛ- sambandhasāpekṣasya bhakṣaṇasya prāthamyena saha na samāsaḥ sambhavati, asamarthatvāt । atha prāthamyena bhakṣaṇasya prādhānyācca ‘bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣamya samāsaḥ’ ityanuśāsanādvaṣaṭkartusambandhasāpe- kṣamapi bhakṣaṇaṃ prathamapadena samasyata ityucyate, tathāpi prāthamyaṃ tāvadbhakṣaṇaguṇabhūtaṃ, tadapi vaṣaṭkāranimittakatvādvaṣaṭkarttṛbhakṣaṇasya prāthamyaṃ na nimittāntareṇa । kintarhi ? vaṣaṭkāreṇaiva । tena vaṣaṭkarttṛriti sambandhādguṇabhūtasyāpi prāthamyasya sāpekṣatvāt spaṣṭa eva samāsadoṣa iti । bhakṣaṇaprāthamyayorniṣkṛṣyānuvadituṃ vidhātuṃ vā'śakyatvād vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prāthamyaviśiṣṭamapūrvameva bhakṣaṇaṃ
vidhīyata iti । nanu “ekaṃ sāma tṛce kriyate stotrīyam” iti samāsāpekṣaṃ samāsasthāmapyṛcamanūdya tritvavidhānaṃ dṛṣṭam, tathā prāthamyavidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati । naitat; tatrāpi samāsārthasyaiva vidhānāt, kintu ṛcāṃ sāmāvyabhicāreṇaiva prāptatvāt tritvasya cāprāptatvāttira/?/tvaparo vidhirityucyate । iha tu yāvadvaṣaṭkāraṃ bhakṣaṇasyāprāptatvāt samāsārtha eva vidhestātparyādbhakṣaṇameva viśiṣṭaṃ vidhīyate । tena vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ hotrā sarvatra kṛtvā samākhyānimittakaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ camase karttavyam । na tu tasyaiva prāthamyamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—na kevalaṃ samākhyayā vaṣaṭkarttā svacamasa eva bhakṣayet, kintu vaṣaṭkāranimittakaṃ pātrāntareṣvapi bhakṣayediti ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ homābhiṣavayorbhakṣanimittatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
aparamapi kāraṇaṃ homābhiṣavau । “havirddhāne grāvabhirabhiṣu- tyāhavanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ paretya sadasi bhakṣayānta” iti । pūrvaṃ vaṣa-
ṭkāranimittaṃ vācanikaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ homābhiṣavanimitta- kamapi vācanikaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ-sarvatropapadasaṅkrānto vidhirdhātvarthaṃ prāptamanū- dyopapadārthaṃ vidhatte । asti cātra samākhyāvaṣaṭkārābhyāṃ bhakṣaṇa- prāptiḥ । atastadanuvādenopapadārtha eva vidhātavyaḥ । tatra na tāvaddhomābhiṣavau । tayoḥ sādhanayoreva vacanāntaraprāptatvāt । nāpya- bhiṣavādhāratvena havirdhānaṃ, tasyāpi haviḥsaṃskārādhikaraṇatvena vacanāntaraprāptatvāt । na vābhiṣavahomabhakṣaṇānāṃ kramo'bhidhīyate, arthādeva prāptatvāt । na hyanabhiṣutya homaḥ sambhavati । na cānabhiṣu- tasya pratipattirūpaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ sambhavati । na cābhiṣavahomayornirjñā- taprayojanayorbhakṣaṇāṅgatvena vidhānam । ataḥ pāriśeṣyādbhakṣa- ṇādhikaraṇatvena sada eva vidhīyate । na ca bhakṣaṇasya taddeśatvena tadadhikaraṇatvaprāptiḥ । niyāmakābhāve satīcchayānyatrāpi sthāne bhakṣaprāpteḥ । tena niyamārthatvena sadovidhānamarthavaditi । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi hotrādināṃ sadodeśaparityāgena karmānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavati hotrādināṃ sakalāṅgānuṣṭhānadeśo hi sadaḥ । bhakṣaṇamapyaṅgameva । ataḥ kathamapyanyadeśe na kriyate । atasteṣāṃ
tatraiva karmapravṛttiniyamāt sadasītyetadapi prāptameva । ato homābhi- ṣavanimittakaṃ bhakṣaṇāntaramevātra vidhīyata iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe graheṣu vaṣaṭkartṛbhireva bhakṣayitavyam । siddhānte tu homābhiṣavakartṛbhirapi graheṣu bhakṣayitavyam । sūtrantu— homābhiṣavābhyāmapi nimittabhūtābhyāṃ bhakṣaḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ bhakṣaṇanimittasamuccayādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“praitu hotuścamasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām” iti । tatraiṣa saṃśayaḥ—kiṃ camaseṣu homabhiṣavakarttāro vaṣaṭkarttāraśca bhakṣayeyuḥ ? uta na ? iti । evaṃ samākhyādirūpeṣu nimitteṣu satsu naimittiko bhakṣo bhavatīti nirūpyedānīmeteṣāṃ nimittānāṃ yatra samavāyo bhavati, tatra naimittiko bhakṣaḥ kiṃ vikalpena syāt ? atha vā samuccayena ? iti prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—naimittike bhakṣaṇe vikalpa
iti । kutaḥ ? ekārthatvādbhakṣaṇānām । avaśiṣṭasya havyasya prati- pattirūpaḥ saṃskāraḥ । sa ca sarveṣāmaviśiṣṭa ityato vikalpena bhakṣaḥ syāditi । evaṃ prāpte—

ucyate—na vā/?/vadvikalpaḥ sambhavati । tasyāṣṭadoṣaduṣṭatvenā- nyāyyatvāt । samuccayastarhi bhakṣāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet—so'pi na sambhavati, ekārthatvāt । ekena nimittena bhakṣaṇarūpe kṛte satītaramya niravakāśatvāt । ataḥ pāriśeṣyādbādho'bhyupetavyaḥ । tatra kiṃ samākhyānimitto bhakṣaḥ itarayorvaṣaṭkārahomābhiṣavanimitta- yorbhakṣayorbādhakaḥ syāt ? itarau vā bādhakau ? iti saṃśaye samā- khyānimitta itarayorbādhakaḥ syāt । kṛtaḥ ? praitu hotuścamasa iti viśeṣaviṣayatvāt । itarayośca sāmānyaviṣayatvāt । sāmānyācca viśeṣo balavāniti sa eva tayorbādhaka iti । nanvitarayoḥ pratya- kṣopadiṣṭatvena balīyasvāt asya ca samākhyayā kalpyamānatvena daurbalyāttāveva bādhakau syātāmiti । ucyate—pratyakṣopadiṣṭatvena balīyastvamanayostathāpi ‘ānarthakyapratihatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalam’ iti nyāyena samākhyānimittasyaiva bhakṣaṇasya balīyastvāt sa evetarayorbādhakaḥ syāt । kiñcāvaśyaṃ camasān vihāyānyatra nirava- kāśatvāditarayośca graheṣu sāvakāśatvāt sa eva balīyāniti । tasmāt samasteṣu camasino bhakṣayeyuriti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
camaseṣu vaṣaṭkarttāro homābhiṣavakarttāraśca bhakṣayeṣuḥ bhakṣaṇa- nimittasadbhāvāt । tathāhi ‘vaṣaṭkārācca bhakṣayet’ ityatra vaṣaṭkā- rasya, ‘homābhiṣavābhyāṃ ca’ ityatra homābhiṣavayośca samuditayorbha- kṣaṇanimittatvamuktam । tacca nimittadvayaṃ camaseṣvapyasti । ato nimittasadbhāvāccamaseṣvapi vaṣaṭkārtṝṇāñca naimittiko bhakṣaḥ syāditi । kiñca nivarttakaśāstradarśanāt sarvatra nivṛttirbhavati । na hi kiñciccamaseṣu vaṣaṭkārahomābhiṣavanimittasya bhakṣasya nivartta- kaśāstramasti । “praitu hotuścamasaḥ” ityetadeva nivarttakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet—na; samākhyānimittabhakṣaṇamātraprāptāvevāsya vyāpāro nānyanivṛttau tātparyamasti, tridoṣaduṣṭaparisaṃkhyāprasaṅgāt । nanu ‘praitu hotuścamasa’ iti viśeṣaviṣayatvena pravṛttatvāditarayośca sāmānya- viṣayatvāt samākhyānimittako bhakṣo balavānityuktam । maivam; “vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” ityasyāpi viśeṣaviṣayatvāt । tathāhi— na tāvadvaṣaṭkarttṛsāmānyaṃ kiñcidasti । vaṣaṭkarttṛśabdasya kṛdantatvena yaugikatvāt yaugikānāñca sannihitaviśeṣavācitvāt । ato vaṣaṭkarttṛviśeṣanimittatvena prāthamyaviśiṣṭaṃ naimittikaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ
vidhīyate । tadapi viśeṣavacanameveti samākhyānimitto bhakṣo viśeṣavihitatvāditarayorvādhaka ityasti । kiñca asati sambhave sarvatra bādho'ṅgīkriyate । tena cātraikasmin naimittike bhakṣe kṛte itarayorasambhavo'sti । somasya sāvayavatvena śeṣasadbhāvāt । viśeṣatastiktakaṭukatvādalpaṃ bhakṣayediti vacanācca । ataḥ pratipattyape- kṣāyāṃ satyāṃ yāvanto naimittikā bhakṣāsteṣāṃ pratipattiḥ karttavyeti । tasmādbhakṣaṇaśabdā iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe camaseṣu camasibhireva bhakṣayitavyam । siddhānte tu vaṣaṭkārahomābhiṣavakarttṛbhirapīti ।

sūtrantu—syādvā camaseṣvapi homābhiṣavādinimitto'pi bhakṣaḥ kāraṇasya vacanasya bhāvāt । anirddeśāt, na hi camasināmeva camaseṣu nirddeśaḥ anyeṣāṃ niṣedhaḥ । camasibhakṣaṇakarttavyatāmātra- vidhāyakatvāt, samākhyāvacanikasyeti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśamekapātre hotuḥ prathamabhakṣādhikaraṇam
saṃśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: atha yatraikasmin pātre bahavo bhakṣayeyuḥ kastatra kramaḥ ? ekasmin pātre bahunāṃ bhakṣaṇe siddhe idānīṃ kena krameṇa bhakṣaṇa- miti prasaṅgānnirūpyate । nanu “vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” iti śrūyate । vaṣaṭkarttaiva ca hotā । ato vācanike hotuḥ prathamabhakṣaṇe sati kathaṃ sandehaḥ ? ucyate—
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—somarasastāvadadhvaryoreva haste bhakṣaṇasamaye samasti । adhvaryuṇāpi cāsau homābhiṣavanimittaṃ bhakṣayitavya eva । tadyadyadhvaryurhotre samarpayet hotā ca punaradhvaryave bhakṣaṇārthaṃ samarpayati, tadā prayogo vikṣipyeta । taccāśubhāvāpekṣī prayogavidhirnānumanyate । tena prathamaṃ tāvadadhvaryureva bhakṣayet । tataḥ kena bhakṣayitavyaḥ ? ityapekṣāyāṃ bhavati vacanam—“vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathama- bhakṣaḥ” iti । tenādhvaryuvyariktabhakṣaṇāntarāpekṣameva vaṣaṭkartturbhajña- ṇaprāthamyamiti । tasmādekapātre'nekeṣu bhakṣayatsu kramāt sannidhila- kṣaṇādadhvaryoreva prathamaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ pratīyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—

evaṃ hi mantraḥ śrūyate “hotuścitpūrve haviradyamāśate” iti । asyāyamarthaḥ—hotureva yatpūrvaṃ prathamaṃ adyaṃ adanīyaṃ haviḥ tadagrāvāṇa āśata bhuktavantaḥ । tathā “hoteva naḥ prathamaṃ pāhi” iti । tasyāpyayamarthaḥ—hotā yathā naḥ asmāt prathamaṃ pātaiva, tathā tvamapi pāhītyarthaḥ । kiñca “vaṣaṭkarttuḥ prathamabhakṣaḥ” iti bhakṣakartṛṛtviṅmātrāpekṣayaiva prāthamyaṃ pratīyate, na tat prayogaprāśubhāvānurodhenānyathayituṃ yuktam । tathā nimittakramā- nurodhādapyayamevātra naimittikasya bhakṣaṇasya kramo yuktaḥ । prathamaṃ hi hotā vaṣaṭkaroti, tato'dhvaryurjuhoti । tasmāddhotaiva prathamaṃ bhakṣayatīti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—hotaiva prathamaṃ bhakṣayet mantravarṇāt tasyaiva prathamaṃ bhakṣaṇapratīteḥ ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśamanujñāpūrvakaṃ bhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
chapter.p:
athaikapātre sāmo'nekena bhakṣyate । kintatrānujñāpyānanujñāpya vā bhakṣayitavyam ? utānujñāpyaiveti । ayañca sandeho bhāṣya- kāreṇa “tasmātsomo nānupahūtena peyaḥ” ityasya vacanasya viṣaya-
pradarśanārthaṃ pradarśitaḥ । na tu vicārārtham । pratyakṣe vacane sati sandehābhāvāt । tena sūtramidaṃ vacanagatasyopahūtapadasyānujñā- rūpārthakathanārthamuttaravicāraviṣayapradarśanārthaṃ ceti bodhyam ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ vaidikamantreṇānujñāpanādhikaraṇam
saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: athānujñātenaiva bhakṣayitavyamiti sthite kiṃ laukikena vacane- nānujñāpayitavyam ? uta vaidikeneti ?
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapyatrāmnāto mantrassamasti, tathāpi mantrasya pūrvottarabhāgābhyāmanujñāpanaprakāśananirddhāraṇakāraṇābhāvāt liṅgenānujñāpane viniyoktuṃ na śakyata iti laukikenaiva vacanenā- nujñāpanaṃ karttavyamityevaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra mantrādanujñāpanaṃ na pratīyeta । na ca kṛtsnasya mantrasyānujñāpanāprakāśanādaviniyogaḥ । sarvatra mantraikadeśasyaiva samavetārthaprakāśane satītarapadānāṃ tadanukūlatvenai-
vārthatvāt kṛtsnamantraviniyogasyāpyupapatteḥ । bhavati kṛtsnamantraprayoge- ṇaiva ca sarvathā vaidikenaivānujñānaṃ na laukikeneti siddham ।।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—upahūta upahvayasvetyanenaiva vaidikenānujñāpanamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ vaidikamantreṇānujñādānādhikaraṇam
saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: etadavagatam—“upahūta upahvayasva” ityanena anujñāpayediti । atha prativacane sandehaḥ-kiṃ laukikaṃ prativacanam ? utaitadeva ? iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—kṛtsnasyāpi mantrasyānujñāpane viniyogasambhave- nābhihitatvādanujñāpya prativacanaṃ laukikameva karttavyam । athavānu- jñānujñāpanayormantrayorliṅgādaviśeṣeṇa pratīterubhayatrāpi kṛtsna evāvṛtto mantraḥ prayoktavya iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedavaṃ yadyatra viśeṣagraho na bhavet । tathāhi— samabhivyāhāralakṣaṇādvākyādanyatarabhāgasyānyatarārthatvenātra prayogo
vaktavyaḥ । abhidhānasāmarthyālliṅgādupahūta iti pūrvasya mantrabhāga- syānujñāyām, upahvayasvetyuttarasya tu bhāgasyānujñāpane viniyogaḥ pratīyate । tena liṅgena vākyaṃ bādhitvottarasyānujñāyāṃ prayoga iti siddham ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśamekapātrāṇāmanujñāpya bhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: idaṃ sandihyate—kiṃ yaḥ kaścidanujñāpayitavyaḥ ? uta samāna- pātra iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—na tāvadatrānujñāpyaḥ kaścidviśeṣarūpeṇa śrūyate, kintvanujñāpanamātram । anujñāpanena cānujñāpyamātrākṣepa iti yena kenacidanujñāto bhakṣayediti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyetadanujñāpanamatyantāprāptaṃ vidhīyate । kintu loke prāptamevaitanniyamyate । loke sādhāraṇadravye viniyoga evaṃ pratisambandhicittānukūlanārthamanujñāpanaṃ dṛṣṭam । ekapātre
sthitaśca somo bahūnāṃ sādhāraṇo na bhinnapātrastha iti samānapātrā- ṇāmevādhikabhakṣaṇāśaṅkayānujñāpanaṃ dṛṣṭārthanniyamyata iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—tadanujñāpanamekapātrāṇāmeva samavāyāt sādhāraṇatvādityarthaḥ ।
chapter.head: athaṃ saptadaśaṃ svayaṃ yaṣṭurbhakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ । tatra ṛtuyājeṣu śrūyate—“yajamānasya yājyā so'bhipreṣyati—hotaretadyajeti, svayaṃ vā niṣadya yajati” iti । yadā svayaṃ yajati, tadā sandehaḥ—kimasya bhakṣo'sti ? nāstīti । atreyaṃ viṣayaśuddhiḥ—asti jyotiṣṭome ṛtugrahā- bhyāsaḥ । santi ca tatra yājyāḥ । tāśca yadyapi samākhyayā hotṛprayojyā eva, tathāpyatra yajamānasadasyānāmetatprayogārthaṃ varaṇam । hoturapanīya cānyairapi tāḥ prayoktavyāḥ । tatra yajamānajyāyāṃ pakṣadvayaṃ vihitam—hotre ca pratyarpaṇaṃ, svayaṃ voccāraṇam । yadā svayaṃ samuccārayati tadā sandehaḥ—kiṃ vaṣaṭ-
kāro hotrā karttavyaḥ, tataśca tannimittabhakṣaṇamapi hotraiva karttavyam ? uta yajamānenaiveti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—yājyā hi hotussakāśādvacanenāpanītā, na tu vaṣaṭkārabhakṣau । na ca yājyāpanayenaiva vaṣaṭkārabhakṣayorapyapanayaḥ, tayoryājyāto'rthāntaratvāt । tena yathā yājyāpanaye'pyarthāntarabhūtaṃ pravaraśabdābhidheyaṃ varaṇaṃ nāpanīyate, tathā vaṣaṭkārabhakṣāvapīti । ato yājyāmātroccāraṇamitarartvigvadyajamānena karttavyam । vaṣaṭkā- rastannimittañca bhakṣaṇaṃ hotraiveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi yājyāpanaye bhakṣaṇakāraṇabhūto vaṣaṭkāro nāpanīyeta । tathāhi—nātra “yadamānasya yājyā” ityatāvanmātraṃ śrūyate । kintu “svayaṃ niṣadya yajati” iti । na ca yājyoccāraṇamātreṇejyate । kintarhi ? vaṣaṭkāraparyantena, tasyaiva haviḥpradānārthatvāt । kiñca “anavānaṃ yajati” iti śrūyate । asya cāyamarthaḥ—yājyā ārabhya yāvadyāgo na samāpyate, tāvatparyantaṃ vicchedo na karttavyaḥ । vaṣaṭkāreṇa ca yāgaḥ samāpyate । tadyadi yājyāṃ prayujya viramedyajamānastadā prayatnavicchedameva kuryāt ।
tasmādvaṣaṭkāraprayogasya yajamānakarttavyatvāttannimittameva bhakṣaṇa- mapi yajamānenaiva karttavyam । yacca varaṇavadbhakṣaṇamapi nāpanīyata ityuktam, tadyuktam; yato varaṇaṃ khalu ddoturnāpanīyata ityu- citameva । tasya khalvarthāddhotari pravṛttatvāt । ato yājyāpanaye sati bhakṣaṇaṃ yajamānenaiva karttavyamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—vaṣaṭkāre bhakṣaṇakāraṇasya vaṣaṭkārasya yaṣṭurāgamanāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭādaśaṃ phalacamasādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet sa yadi somaṃ bibhakṣayiṣet nyagrodhastibhinīrāhṛtya tāssampiṣya dadhanyu- nmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchenna somam” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ phalacamasaḥ somabhakṣavikāraḥ ? utejyāvikāraḥ ? iti । prasaktasomabhakṣaṇānuprasaṅgenedānīṃ phalacamaso'pi bhakṣaṇasambandhena śrūyamāṇo vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—somasya tāvadubhayasambandhaḥ pratīyate—yāgasa- mbandho bhakṣaṇasambandhaśca । tatra tāvadyāgasambaddhasya na somasyāyaṃ phalacamaso vikāraḥ । yāgasambandhitvenāsyāśravaṇāt । kiṃ tarhi ? yadi somaṃ vibhakṣayiṣet tataḥ phalacamasamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchediti śrūyerbhakṣaṇasambandhisomavikāra eva । tathāhi—paśo śrūyate— “tryaṅgaiḥ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajati” iti । hṛdayādyekādaśabhiraṅgaiḥ pradhānabhū- taḥ paśuyāgo nirvarttitaḥ । prakṛtau ca sānnāyyayāgaśeṣasyaiva sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pratipāditatvādatrāpyekāśānāmavayavānāṃ madhye yaiḥ kaiścit tribhi- raṅgairiṣṭaśeṣaiḥ sviṣṭakṛdyāgaḥ karttavya iti pūrvapakṣayitvā, yāga sambandhāpekṣasya tritvasyāṅgaiḥ saha samāsāsambhavādekādaśasu madhye trayāṇāmavāntarasāmānyamaṅgānāṃ nirddhārayitumaśakternayāgaśeṣā- ṇāmupādānam । kintarhi ? “doṣṇo dakṣiṇasya pūrvārddhādagnaye samavadyati, gudasya madhyataḥ śroṇyā jaghanataḥ” ityekenāpyuddeśena sambandhātīra/?/ṇyavadhāritāni । taireva viśeṣaiḥ sviṣṭakṛdyāgaḥ karttavya iti siddhāntitam । tena yathā śarairbarhiṣāṃ vikāraḥ, tathehāpījyāśeṣāṇāmanijyāśeṣairvikāra iti । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā— ‘tryaṅgairvā śaravadvikāraḥ syāta’ (jai. sū., 10. 7. 11.) iti । ato- 'trāyanijyāśeṣeṇa phalacamasenejyāśeṣasya somasya vikāro na
virotstyate । evañca satyutpattiśiṣṭaḥ somaḥ pradhānakarmaṇi yāge bādhito na bhaviṣyati । ‘na somam’ ityarthaprāptabhakṣaṇagatasomanivṛtya- nuvādenaiva bādhādatrāpyupapatsyata iti ।

ye tvārādupakārakaṃ phalacamasasādhanaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyata iti pūrvapakṣayanti, taiśca pūrvapakṣavārttikākṣarāṇyanākalitāni । na cāyaṃ pakṣo yuktyāpi saṅgacchate, anekadoṣaduṣṭatvāt । tathāhi—phalacamasāntaṃ bhakṣaṃ prayacchediti viniyogabhaṅgi ? na bhakṣaṇaṃ kuryāditi । tathā somabhakṣaṇasya phalacamasenātulya- kāryatvenānivarttitatvānna somamiti nāyamarthaprāptānuvādaḥ । niṣedhaparatve ca vākyabhedaḥ । vihitasomabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhādvāṣṭa- doṣaduṣṭavikalpāpattiḥ । tathā adṛṣṭakalpānādayaśca doṣā apyabhihitāḥ । siddhāntasamaye pakṣavikalpamātreṇa yaccintitaṃ tadevātra tāḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtamityupekṣaṇīyameveti । tasmādbhakṣaśrutisaṃyo- gādrājanyavaiśyanimittakaḥ phalacamaso bhakṣavikāra iti । evaṃ prāpte- 'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pūrvapakṣe phalacamasaḥ pratipatti- sambandhārho bhavet । dvividhaṃ hi dravyamākārṇakaramiti pratipatti-
mapekṣate । kṛtaprayojanatvādyathā somarasaḥ puroḍāśo vā । prayo- janārthopādānanāntarīyakopādānatvāt yathā “tryaṅgai sviṣṭakṛ yajati” ityādiṣutryaṅgādi । na ca pūrvapakṣe phalacamasaḥ kṛtaprayojanaḥ । nāpi prayojanārthopādānanāntarīyakopādāna iti pratipatyapekṣā- bhāvānna pratipattisambandho ghaṭate । tryaṅgasya tu paśuyāgārthopātta- paśunāntarīyakopādānasyākīrṇakaratvena pratipatyapekṣāyāṃ vacanābhāve puruṣecchādhīnā yā kācit pratipattirbhavet । vacanasadbhāve tu yathāvacanameva pratipattirbhavati । tena yāgīyadravyasaṃskārabhakṣaṇa- sambandhānyathānupapatyā phalacamasasya somavadavaśyaṃ yāgasādhanatvaṃ kalpanīyam । tatrāpi “sa yadi somaṃ vibhakṣayiṣet” iti yajamāna- sambandhibhakṣaṇakīrttanādyāvatttryaṅge'nupayujyamāno yajamānabhakṣaṇasaṃ- skāraḥ pratipadyeta, tāvataiva yajñabhāgenārthāpatyā sambandha iti yajamā- nacamasa eva somaṃ vikaroti, na grahacamasāntareṣviti sthitam । naimittikatvādutpattiśiṣṭasomabādho'pi na doṣaḥ । evañca sati krayābhiṣavādisaṃskṛtenaiva yaṣṭavyamityanyatra pāde pratipādanīyam । evaṃ “yadi somaṃ na vindet pūtīkānabhiṣuṇuyāt” ityatrāpi somābhāve somasambandhino'bhiṣavarūpasaṃskārasya pūtīkeṣu darśanāt pūtīkānāṃ yāgasādhanatvametenaiva nyāyenāvagantavyam ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe yajamānasya camase'pi somenaiva yaṣṭavyam ।
bhakṣaṇamātrantu phalacamasasya । siddhānte tu phalacamasenaiva yaṣṭavyam । sūtrantu—ijyāyāṃ phalacamasena somasya vikāreṇa bhakṣaṇamātraṃ saṃskārasya bhakṣaṇarūpasya tadarthatvāta yāgasādhanadravyārthatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikonaviṃśāmanuprasarpyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti rājasūyaḥ । tatra śrūyate—“śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ bhakṣayanti, daśa daśaikaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpeyuḥ” iti । tatra rājanya- camase sandehaḥ—kiṃ rājanyā anuprasarpeyuḥ ? uta brāhmaṇāḥ ? rājanyacamase phalacamaso rājanyena bhakṣayitavya iti nirūpitam । idānīṃ kvacit kṛtiviśeṣe tadapavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—vākyadvayametat । “śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ bhakṣayanti” ityekam । “daśa daśaikaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpeyuḥ” ityaparam । tatra bhakṣayantīti vartamānarūpatvāt pūrvapasyāvidhāyakatvāduttarasya cānuprasarpeyurityanupahataśaktividhyākhyātasambandhādvidhāyakatvameva ।
nanvevaṃ satyayamasya vākyasyārthaḥ—ye bhakṣaṇārthamekaikaṃ camasamanupra- sarpanti, te daśa daśa prasarpantīti viśiṣṭānuvādvādvākyaṃ bhidyeta । maivam; anuprasarpaṇīyakarmaviśeṣarahitāyā anuprasarpaṇakriyāyāḥ kartturuddeśyatvāyogāt । tena yathaiva.............sambhavāddhavirviśeṣi- tāyā evoddeśyatvaṃ, tathehāpi prasarpaṇakriyāmātrasya sāmānyarūpasyo- ddeśyapratītyayogyatvāt prasarpaṇīyakarmaviśeṣaviśeṣitāyā eva karttā daśasaṃkhyāvidhāvuddeśya iti ।

nanvevaṃ kriyāntarārthamapi ye camasamanusarpanti teṣāmapi daśatvaṃ syāt । bhakṣaṇārthamiti viśeṣaṇe tu sa eva viśiṣṭānuvādo doṣaḥ । maivam; camasamityetāvataiva bhakṣaṇāprāpteḥ । tathāhi— camyate'sminniti camasaḥ । tena camasapadādeva bhakṣaṇasya prāptatvādbha- kṣaṇārthamevānusarpaṇāvagatestadarthakṛtaviśeṣaṇavivakṣā । na ca ekaikamiti pṛthagvivakṣaṇīyam । tathābhūtasyaiva prakṛtitaḥ prāptatvāt । na ca prāpte karmaṇi daśa daśeti daśatvasyārthasya ca vidhānādvākyabheda iti vaktavyam । pratipradhānāvṛttinyāyena praticamasaṃ daśatvaprāpteścānu- vādāt । tenātra daśatvasaṃkhyāmātraṃ vidhīyate । anyat sarvamanūdyate । evañca sati praticamasaṃ yathāprāptabhakṣaṇānvayāddaśatvasya rājanyacamase rājanyatvasyeva prāptatvāt saṃkhyāyāścamasāntaravṛttitvāt rājanyacamase rājanyā eva daśa bhakṣayanti । tathā ca sati “śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ
bhakṣayanti” iti pūrvavākye praticamasaṃ daśatvavidhiḥ avayavaśiṣṭatvā- cchatamityanuvādaḥ ।

tathā brāhmaṇā iti brāhmaṇabhūyastvena brahmaṇapadamanu- vādaḥ । rājanyacamase ca yadyapi phalacamaso'sti na somaḥ, tathāpi somabhūyastvāt somamiti somaphalacamasayoranuvādaḥ । bhakṣayantītyanirdeśaprāptamevānūdyate । na ca sarvānuvāde daśadaśagrahaṇaṃ vyarthamiti । daśagrahaṇasyaivānarthakatvāttatrānuprasarpaṇakarttṛpu daśatvaṃ vidhīyamānamekakālīnatvādrājanyānāmeva । ato rājanyā eva rājanyacamase bhakṣayeyuriti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedyadi “śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ bhakṣayanti” ityetadapi vākyaṃ vidhāyakaṃ na bhavet । tathāhi—agatyā khalu sarvānuvādo bhavati । tatrāpi brāhmaṇeṣu lakṣaṇayā brāhmaṇaśabdasya vṛttirityetadapyagatyā svīkarttavyam । na cātra vidhiśabdo nāsti । bhakṣayantītyetasya pañcamalakāratvena vidhitvopapatteḥ । ato mukhya evātra brāhmaṇaśabdārtho vidhīyate । na ca prāpta- bhakṣaṇānuvādena brāhmaṇavidhānena ca vākyabheda iti vācyam । uttaravākyavihitapraticamasadaśatvavidhisāmarthyenaiva pracayaśiṣṭaprāpta-
tvāt । anuvāde ca brāhmaṇamātravidhānāt । somamiti ca yāgasādhanalakṣaṇayā somaphalacamasayorevānuvādaḥ । na ca saṃkhyāyāḥ samānarūpāyā vṛttitvādarthata eva rājanyajātīyaśabdo- 'pyavadhāritatvādrājanyacamase brāhmaṇyonavakāśa iti vācyam । yata ekaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpantīti camasapadopasthāpitabhakṣaṇakriyā- vadvedenaiva daśasaṃsthāvagamopapatteḥ । ataḥ kiṃjātīyāste bhakṣakā ityapekṣāyāṃ yāvacchutī rājanyakalpanārthaṃ prakramate, tāvatpratyakṣa- śrutivihitairbrāhmaṇaireva nairākāṅkṣyaṃ kriyata iti na rājanyāma- vakāśaḥ । tena rājanyacamase'pi brāhmaṇā eva daśa bhakṣayeyuriti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—rājanyacamase'pi brāhmaṇā eva bhakṣayeyuḥ । tulyena brāhmaṇaśabdena sarvacamaseṣu brāhmaṇāvidhā- nāditi ।।

lg.l: yo nāma kaścidiha saṃvidita prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।
matkarttṛtāmananukīrttya sa kīrtilopāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāta ।।

chapter.head: atha tṛtīyādhyāyasya ṣaṣṭhaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ anārabhyādhītānāṃ prakṛtigāmitvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: anārabhya kiñcit śrūyate—“yasya khādiraḥ snuvo bhavati chandasāmeva rasenāvadyati, sarasā asyāhutayoḥ bhavanti । yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti” ityevamādi । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ khādirādi prakṛtau vikṛtau ca niviśate ? uta prakṛtāveveti । suvarṇabharaṇādārabhyānārabhyavādādivicāre prastute prasaṅgāt sarvapradānavicārataḥ prabhṛti śeṣaviṣayavicāraṃ parisamāpyedānīṃ sa evānārabhyavādaḥ prastuto vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—atra śrutyādipramāṇābhāve'pi khādira- tāparṇatādīnāṃ kratusambandhastāvadaśvapratigrahenyānyena siddhaḥ । yatra vyabhicaritaḥ kratusambandhaḥ, tasyāpyaśvadānasyeva yathā- kathañcitkratūpasthitimātreṇa kratusambandhāpādakatvam, tatrāvyabhi- caritakratusambandhānāṃ sruvādīnāṃ sutarāmeva kratusambandhāpāda- katvam । ataścopadeśātideśābhyāṃ prakṛtikṛtisādhāraṇyāt prakṛti- vikṛtyarthatvamevānārabhyaśrutānāṃ yuktam ।

nanu khādiratādividhānārthapragrato vikṛtāvātideśikī sruvādiprāptirvaktavyā । atideśenaiva sruvādivat khādira- tādirapi vikṛtau prāpnotīti tadvidhāne dviruktidoṣaḥ syaditi । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi vikṛtiṃ vihāva khādiratādyupadeśaḥ prathamaṃ prakṛtigāmī bhūtvā caramaṃ vikṛtigāmī bhavet । sa hi sruvādimukhena kratupraveśaprabhilaṣan sruvādiprāpti- mātramapekṣate । sruvādināñca yathā prakṛtau prāptirupadeśāttathā vikṛtāvapyasti । na ca sruvādināmatideśa evānārabhyādhīta- khādiratāyāḥ prakṛtisambandhamantareṇa na bhavatīti vācyam । evaṃ hi manyate pūrvapakṣī—yadyapyupakāradvāreṇābhi/?/deśataḥ prāptiriti daśamādye sthāsyati, tathāpyupakārasya pratipādarthameva vilakṣaṇa- tvāttadvāreṇa prāptirbhavantī pratyekameva bhavati । sā ca yāvadanārabhya- vādaḥ khādiratādividhānārthaṃ prakṛtivikṛtigatasruvānirikṣaṇaṃ kurute, tādavadupakārakākāṅkṣāvaśādagrata eva pravṛtteti khādiratāvyati- rekeṇaiva sruvasyāpyagrato vikṛtau prāptatvādbhavati sruvadvāreṇa prakṛti- vikṛtisādhāraṇa eva khādiratāvidhiriti । tenāprakaraṇādhītaṃ khādiratādi prakṛtivikṛtyarthameveti । eva prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pratyekamupakārātideśo bhavet । kintu kathamiti mahopakāragateyamākāṅkṣā'tideśakāraṇaṃ prakṛtigata- mahāpakārasambandhapratipādakameva prakṛtivacchabdaṃ kalpayitvā tadvāreṇa padārthasambandhaṃ vikṛtau karoti, na tu pratyekopakārātideśadvāreṇa । tathā satyanekavākyakalpanādoṣāt । mahopakārāvagatiḥ prakṛtāva- pūrvasyānirjñātopāyaparimāṇatvāt śrutismṛtyācāraparyantanirikṣaṇena paryavasyati, naupadeśikapadārthamātreṇa । tatkathamanārabhyaśrutivihitaṃ sruvaprakṛtibhūtaṃ khādiratvamanāsādyaiva mahopakārāvagatipayavasānam ? aparyavasitāyāñca mahopakārāvagatau kuto'tideśato mahopakāraprāptiḥ ? kutastarāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvena sruvādiprāptiriti । taduktam—

lg.l: tata evaṃ bhavedeṣa yugapattu pravarttate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1028)

tenāvaśyamagrato mahopakāre satyeva prakṛtāvanārabhyavihitakhā- diratvādividhānāya dvārabhūtānāṃ sruvādināmatideśataḥ prāptimabhi- dadhatāvaśyaṃ khādiratvādiprāptirapyatideśata eva vaktavyā । tathā sati durnivāro dviruktidoṣaḥ । yeṣāṃ tu vikṛtāvapyatideśata eva dvāraprāptiḥ, teṣāṃ tvanārabhyavādā api prakṛtivikṛtyarthā eva । yathā “/?/ye juhvati” ityanārabhyavi/?/hita evāhavanīyaḥ sarvāsveva
juhotyutpattiṣu yugapadeva sambadhyate । tasmāt prakṛtyartha eva khādiratvādividhiriti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe khādiratvādīnāmupadiṣṭatvāviśeṣeṇa tadvaiguṇye prakṛtau vikṛtau ca prāyaścittasāmyam । siddhānte tūpadi- ṣṭādiṣṭayorvaiguṇye prāyaścittaviśeṣa iti । sūtrantu—prakṛtāveva khādiratādiniveśaḥ, na vikṛtau dviruktidoṣāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ anārabhyādhītasyāpi vikṛtigāmitādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: anārabhya kiñcit sāmidhenīnāṃ parimāṇamāmnātam— “saptadaśa sāmidhenīranubrūyāt” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimeta- tprakṛtai niviśate ? uta vikṛtāviti । idānīmanārabhya śrutānāṃ prakṛtigāmitvamapodyate ।

atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi pāñcadaśyaṃ prakaraṇe śrūyate— tathāpyānārabhya śrutasyāpi sāptadaśyasya pūrvādhikaraṇoktanyāyena prakṛtyarthatvāt sāmidhenyanuvacanādekakaryatvena sāptadaśyapāñcadaśya-
yorvikalpa eveti । nanvanārabhyavādena sāptadaśasya sāmidhenyanu- vacanadvāreṇa tatsambandhikratumātrasambandho'vagamyate । prakaraṇena ca kratuviśeṣasambandhaḥ । tena viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya bādhāt kuto vikalpaḥ ? syādevaṃ yadi vākyameva kratuviśeṣasambandhaṃ pratipādayet । na tvetadasti । dvayoreva vākyayostulyarūpatvāt । kintu prakaraṇena viśeṣasambandho vaktavyaḥ । tacca vākyaddurbalam । tena yāvatpra- karaṇena viśeṣasambandhaḥ kriyate, tāvadvākyadvayena tulyabalena sāptadaśyapāñcadaśyayoḥ prakṛtau vikalpa evāvadhāryata iti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1037)
tasmāt sāptadaśyamapi prakṛtyarthameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyarabhyaśrutānārabhyaśrutavākyayostu- lparūpatvaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—pāñcadaśyaṃ prakaṇena labdhāpūrva- sambandhaṃ vākyena vidhīyamānamapūrvoyānapūrvīyayoḥ sambandhāsa- mbhavādapūrvasāmānyalakṣaṇayā'pūrvīyasāmidhenīsambandhenaiva vidhāyate । sāptadaśyaṃ tvānārabhyaśruta/?/ /?/thamamalabdhāpūrvasambandhenaiva vākyena vidhāyate । ataśca khādiratādivadānarthakyaparihārāya sāmidhenya-
vyabhicāropasthitenāpūrveṇa sambadhyate । na sāmidhenīsvarūpasambandhā- viśeṣe'pi prakaraṇaśrutaṃvākyam । tattvapūrvīyasāmidhenīsambaddhameva pāñca- daśyaṃ vidadhāti । anārabhya śrutantu sāmidhenīsvarūpasambandhameva sāptadaśyaṃ vidadhāti । paścāttu tadupapattyarthaṃ kratvapūrvasambandha iti । ataḥ prathamaṃ pāñcadaśyāvaruddhe kratau sāptadaśyasyānavakāśātkuto vikalpaḥ ? taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1030)

nanu prakṛtāvanavakāśasya sāptadaśyasya kā tarhi gatiḥ ? vikṛ- tāviti cet—na; tatrāpi prakṛtivadatideśaprāptasya sāmidhenyanuva- canasya pāñcadaśyāvaruddhatvena sāptadaśyapraveśāsambhavāt । tenāna- rthakyapratihatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalamiti nyāyena prakṛtāveva vikalpe- nāsyā niveśo'bhyupetavya iti । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi mitra- vindādhvapakalpāsu vikṛtiṣu sāptadaśyasyāvakāśo na bhavet । tāsu khalu prakaraṇaśrutameva sāmidhenīsāptadaśyamasti । atastenāti- diṣṭasya pāñcadaśyasya bādhitatvādbhavati । sāptadaśyasyāvakāśa iti । na ca prakaraṇaśrutenaiva sāptadaśyavidhānādasya vaiphalyamiti vācyam । utpattiviniyogābhyāṃ bhedenārthavatvāt । anārabhyaśrutena hi
vākyena sāptadaśyaṃ sāmidhenīsambandhenotyāditam । prakaraṇa- śrutivākyena ca kratuviśeṣasambandhena viniyujyata iti kimanu- papannam ?
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu-prakaraṇaviśeṣātpāñcadaśyasya kratuviśeṣasambandhāviśeṣatadvirodhisāptadaśyaṃ vikṛtau mitravindā- dhvarakalpāsu bhavediti ।।
chapter.head: aya tṛtīyaṃ naimittikasāptadaśyādeḥ prakṛtyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
darśapūrṇamāsayorāmnātam—“bho/?/dohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet” iti । tathāgnīṣomīye paśau śrūyate —“bailvo brahmavarcasakāmena karttavya” iti । evañjātīyakeṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ prakṛtau niveśaḥ ? uta vikṛtau ? iti । anārabhyaśrutānāṃ yathākramaṃ prakṛtyarthatvaṃ pratipādyedānīmārabhyaśrutānāmeva prakṛtyarthatvamadhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇena prasaṅgāt pratipādyate । atra yadyapi sūtre naimittakasyaiva vicāraḥ । asti ca prakṛtau naimittikaṃ sāmidhenīsāptadaśyam—“saptadaśa
vaiśyasya” iti tadapi vicāraṇīyameva, tathāpi tulyanyāyatayā pūrvapakṣasaukaryeṇa bhāṣyakāreṇa kāmyamevodāhṛtya vicāritam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—ārabhyaśrutānāmapi godohana bailvādīnāṃ svavākyopāttaphalasaṃyogānna tāvatprakaraṇagrahaṇamasti । tasyā- saṃyuktagrāhitvāt । kiñca kāmyānāṃ godohanādīnāṃ prakṛtau praveśaḥ prakaraṇāvagatakratvaṅgabhūtacamasādibādhena vaktavyaḥ । tathā ca sati kratoreva vaiguṇyātkratuphalasiddhistāvannāsti । nāpi viguṇa- kratusambandhino guṇātphalamiti । taduktam—

lg.l: kratvarthāṅgaprahāṇo hi na syāttasya kratoḥ phalam ।
guṇācca na phalaṃ sidhyedviguṇaṃ kratusāśritāt ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1034)

api ca yadapi godohanādīnāṃ praṇayanādi sādhyaṃ tasya cotpattiśiṣṭacamasādinirākāṅkṣatvānna godohanādisambandho vaktuṃ śakyate । ato na tāvadeṣāṃ prakṛtau praveśaḥ sambhavati । nanvanenaiva hetunā vikṛtāvapi praveśo na sambhavati । atidiṣṭacamasādi- virodhasya tatrāpyaviśiṣṭatvāt । ucyate—satyamevaṃ, tathāpyasti viśeṣaḥ । prakṛtau khalūpadiṣṭapadārthānusāreṇopakāro vidhinā svīkṛtaḥ । tenāsāvupadiṣṭacamasādiparityāgena na phalārthopadiṣṭa- godohanādisādhyāmupakārasiddhimanumanyate । vikṛtau tūpakārāva-
dhāraṇapurassaramaṅgāvadhāraṇam । upakārasya ca puruṣārthenāpi godo- hanena sidhyaviśeṣādupekṣata evātideśikamaṅgamiti bādhakasaukaryā- dvikṛtyanvaya eva kāmyānāmiti । evaṃ naimittikasyāpi nityāvaru- ddhatvātprakṛtāvapraveśādetenaiva nyāyena bādhakasaukaryāvagamamātre cama- so vihitaḥ । godāhanantu prāpte camase paśukāmakarttṛkaprayogaviśeṣe vihitaṃ pūrvaprāptasāmānyavihitādbalavattaramiti vyavasthitam ।

kiñca nityabhūtaścamasaḥ paśukāmavyatiriktaprayoge'pi sāvakāśaḥ । godohanantu paśukāmaprayogaikaviṣayamiti niravakāśam । sāvakāśācca niravakāśaṃ balīya ityapi sthitam । tathā kratvartho hi camasaḥ । sa ca paramparayā kratūpakārakadvāreṇa puruṣārthasambaddhaḥ । godohanañca svavākyopāttenaiva paśurūpapuruṣārthena sambaddham । viprakṛṣṭaphalācca sanni- kṛṣṭaphalaṃ balavattaramityapi vyavasthitam । tena viśeṣavihitatvā- danyatrānavakāśatvātpratyāsannapuruṣārthatvādgodohanaṃ sāmānyavihitaṃ sāvakāśaṃ viprakṛṣṭaphalaṃ camasaṃ bādhata eveti । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1037)
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1033)

ataḥ kāmyanaimittikayorapi nityabādhena prakṛtāveva niveśo- papatterna vikṛtigamanam । nanvevaṃ sati kratvarthacamasabādhena kratorvai- guṇyānna kratuphalasiddhiḥ । nāpi viguṇakratusambandhino godoha- nātphalamityuktam । ataḥ kathaṃ camasabādha iti । ucyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi kratvarthameva praṇayanaṃ godohanaṃ nāśrayet । tathāhi—godohanena praṇayediti viśiṣṭavidhigauravabhiyā viśeṣaṇībhūtagodohanasaṅkrānto- 'yaṃ vidhiḥ praṇayanānuvādamapekṣate । sannihitañca camasasādhyaṃ kratvarthaṃ praṇayanamasti । atastadevāśrayamāsādya dadhnendriyādhikaraṇanyāyena phale guṇavidhiḥ paryavasyati । tena camasasādhyasya kratvarthasyaiva praṇayanasya godohanenāśritatvānna kratorvaiguṇyama । nāpi guṇasya viguṇakratusambandhitvam । tena dvayoreva phalasādhanatvamavyāhṛtam । ato yadyapyutpattiśiṣṭacamasanirākāṅkṣaṃ praṇayanaṃ godohanamapekṣate tathāpi godohanameva phalasādhanamagatyā prakṛtaṃ praṇayanamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā camasabādhenaiva niviśate । taduktam—

lg.l: ucyate yo guṇaḥ kāmyaḥ kratvarthena na gṛhyate ।
kratvartha karma gṛhṇāti sa eva svārthasiddhayo ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1035)
ataḥ siddhaṃ kāmyaṃ naimittikañca prakṛtāveveti ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—naimittikamityupala-
kṣaṇam । naimittikaṃ kāmyañca prakṛtāveva niyamyato saṃyogaviśeṣā- tprakṛtisambandhabalīyastvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ pavamāneṣṭyadhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: santi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ—“agneya pavamānāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedagnaye pāvakāya, agnaye śucaye” iti । tāsāṃ prakaraṇe samāmnātam—“vasante brāhmaṇo'gnīnādadhīta” iti । tatra sandehaḥ- kimagnyādheyaṃ pavamāneṣṭyartham ? uta neti । ārabhyānārabhyavāda- prastāvenedānīmārabhyavādapratibhātasyānārabhyavādatā pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—pavamāneṣṭiprakaraṇe hyādhānaṃ śrūyate । prakaraṇātarda/?/meva yuktam । nanvāgnīnādadhīteti vditīyāśrutyāgnyartha- tvamādhānasyāvagamyate । ataḥ kathaṃ prakaraṇātpavamāneṣṭyarthatvam । maivam; iṣṭyarthāgnidvāreṇaivādhānasyeṣṭyarthatvopapatteḥ । yathāvaghātasya darśapūrṇamāsārthavrīhidvāreṇaiva darśapūrṇamāsārthatvam । nanvagneḥ pavamā-
ṣṭyarthatve satyādhānasya tadvāreṇaiva pavamāneṣṭyarthatvaṃ bhavati । vāraṇādhikaraṇa eva pavamāneṣṭīnāmagnyarthatvamuktam । ataḥ kathaṃ tadviparītamabhidhīyate । ucyate—tatra hyānarthakyatadaṅganyāyāpavādene- ṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvamātraṃ nirākṛtam । na tvagnyarthatvaṃ pratipāditam । nanvagnyarthatve sati pavamāneṣṭīnāmādhānasya ca ‘guṇānāñca parārthatvāt’ iti nyāyena pavamāneṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvaṃ nirākriyate । asati tvagnyarthatve pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ prakaraṇātphalavadādhānāṅgatvameveti vāraṇā- dhikaraṇameva bhajyeta । maivam; evaṃ hi tatra manyate—āhitāgni- sādhyā hi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ । na tāsāmagnyarthānāmagnisādhanībhūtādhānā- ṅgatvaṃ sambhavati । tadvaraṃ viśvajinnyāyena kalpitaphalatvameva prakaraṇa- sadbhāvāt । ādhānasyaiva pavamāneṣṭyarthāgnisaṃskāratvena tadaṅgatva- miha pūrvapakṣe pratipādyata iti na tena sahāsya virodhaḥ ।

nanvevaṃ tarhyanenaiva nyāyeneṣṭīnāmādhānāṅgatvasiddheḥ ‘guṇānāñca parārthatvāt’ iti sautro heturanarthakaḥ syāt । naitat; etadarthapara- tvādeva sūtrasya । tadayamarthaḥ—ādhānasyāgnyarthatvādagnīnāñca pavamāneṣṭyarthatvātpavamāneṣṭīnāñca viśvajinnyāyena svargārthatvānna pavamā- neṣṭināmādhānāṅgatvamiti । yattu pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ tatrāgnyarthātvamuktam, tadiha siddhamevādhānāṅgatvasphuṭīkaraṇārthamityavadhātavyam । tena prakaraṇātpavamāneṣṭarthamādhānamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—kalpiphalatvena hiṣṭānāṃ prakaraṇaṃ vaktavyam । na ca kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti । sādhyabhūtāgnisannidhānāttadarthatve sati phalakāṅkṣānivṛtteḥ । na cāgnīnāmeva pavamāneṣṭisādhanatvānnāgniriṣṭīnāṃ sādhya iti vācyam । ādhānapavamānajanyātiśayadvayaśālī vahnirāhavanīyaḥ । tenādhānajanyātiśayavataḥ pavamāneṣṭisādhanatvam । āhavanīyaśabdavācyasya tu sādhyamiti ko virodhaḥ ? yathā cādhānapavamānajanyo'gnirāhavanīyastathā vāraṇadhikaraṇe bhadraṃ pūrvapakṣa evoktamiti neha prapañcyate । tasmādiṣṭīnāmagnyarthatvābhāvādanāra- bhyādhītamevādhānamiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣa darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu nādhānasādhyāgni- raṅgamityanāhitāgnerapyadhikāraḥ । siddhānte tvāhitāgnerevādhikāra iti । na cāgnyādhānamevāṅgamiti pūrvapakṣaḥ, siddhānte ca varṇanīyaḥ—“agnīnādadhīta” iti vākyena labdhaprayojanamā- dhānam । ajñātaprayojanāḥ pavamāneṣṭayaḥ । tena tatprakaraṇādā- dhānārthā eva vijñāyante । na cāgneḥ pavamāneṣṭyarthatvādādhānasya cāgnyarthatvādādhānameva pavamāneṣṭyaṅgam । “āhavanīye juhoti”
iti vākyenopadiṣṭahomānuvādenāhavanāyavidhānāt । pavamāne- ṣṭīnāñca yajurutpattitvena homasyātideśikatvādaupadeśikāti- deśikayośca prāptikālavaiṣamyeṇaikopadeśaviṣayatvāsambhavāt । na cātideśādevāgniḥ pavamāneṣṭyaṅgamiti vaktavyam । prakaraṇalakṣaṇo- padeśena pavamāneṣṭīnāmevādhānāṅgatayāgnyarthatvādādhānabādhitatvādya- thādhānasaṃskṛte'gnau pavamāneṣṭayaḥ kriyante, tathātraivopariṣṭādvakṣyāmaḥ । ato nādhānamiṣṭīnāmaṅgam । tāsāmeva prakaraṇenāṅgatvāt । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā—‘na vā tāsāṃ tadarthatvāt’ iti ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcamamādhānasya prakṛtivikṛtyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: tadevādhānaṃ kiṃ prakṛtyartham ? uta sarvakārmārtham ? iti sandehaḥ । atra ca prakṛtyarthābhidhānamupadiṣṭahomaprakṛtivikṛtyabhiprāyeṇa । siddhe ādhānasyārabhyaśrutatve'gnyarthatve cedānīmagnidvāreṇaiva prakṛtyarthatvā- śahā/?/nirākaraṇena kevalāgnyarthatvaṃ pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yathānārabhyaśrutaḥ khādiratvādiḥ srugādi-
dvāreṇa prakṛtyarthaḥ, tathānārabhyaśrutamapyādhānamagnidvāreṇa dvirukti- doṣahānārthaṃ kevalaprakṛtyarthameva yuktam । nanu srugādīnāṃ laukika- tvāttatsvarūpe khādiratvādividhānamanarthakamiti bhavatvapūrvasādhana- lakṣaṇayā prakṛtyarthatvam । iha tvāhavanīyasyālaukikatvāttadutpa- tyarthatvenaivādhānopapatternāpūrvasādhanalakṣaṇayā prakṛtyarthatvaṃ sambha- vati । ucyate—evaṃ hi manyate—nālaukikārtho'yamāhavanīyaśabdaḥ, kintu srugādivallokasiddhāgnivacana eva । “yadāhavanīye juhoti” iti kratau viniyoge kratvarthāntargatirastyeva । atastadvāreṇa srugā- divatprakṛtyarthamevādhānam ।

bhavatu vā'laukika evāhanīyaśabdaḥ, tathāpi tasyā- puruṣārthatvenāvaśyaṃ kratāveva vidhānaṃ vaktavyam । tatra yathā bhāviviniyogapratisandhānenādhānavidhāne siddhe'pi śeṣitvamāhava- nīyasya, tathā kratupraveśe'pyādhānasya bhāviviniyogapratisandhāne- naivāhavanīyasya dvāratā bhaviṣyati । tasmādetadādhānamitarānāra- bhyavādavatprakṛtyarthamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyāhavanīyasvarūpaprayuktamādhānaṃ na
bhavet । na ca srugādivallokasiddhāgnivacano'yamāhavanīyaśabdaḥ । ādhānajanyasaṃskārarahitāgnimātre loka āhavanīyaśabdaprayogā- bhāvāt । tena laukikānāṃ srugādināṃ khādiratādividheḥ prāgeva “sruveṇāvadyati” ityādivākyairavagatakarmāṅgatvāttadvāreṇa khādira- tvādīnāṃ siddhe kratvarthatve bhavatu prakṛtivikṛtyarthatvavicāraḥ । āhava- nīyasya tvādhānataḥ prāganavatasvarūpatvena kratvaṅgatve pramāṇābhā- vātkathaṃ tadvāreṇādhānasya prakṛtyarthatvam ? taduktam—

lg.l: na tu karmāṅgabhāve'sya pramāṇaṃ kiñcidasti te ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1040)

tena cālaukikatve'pyāhavanīyasya bhāviviniyogapratisandhā- nāttacchepitvavadādhānasya kratupraveśadvāratāpi bhaviṣyatīti vācyam । kratūpayogitvena puruṣārthabhūtasyāhavanīyasyaivālaukikatvena sruvavila- kṣaṇasya prayojakatve sati kratupraveśe kalpanānavakāśāta । atā nāstyagnidvāreṇa prakṛtyarthatvam । kintu pṛthagāddavanīyātpatiprayukta- mevaitadādhānamiti ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe ādhānasya kratvaṅgatvena pradhānaprayogā- ntargatatvāttaddeśatatkālatatkarttṛtvam । siddhānte tu puruṣārthatvādādhā- nasya svakāle svadeśe svakarttṛbhirevānuṣṭheyatvamiti । sūtrantu—sarvārtha-
mādhānaṃ sarvakarmārtham, na tu sarvakarmāṅgabhūtam । siddhānte tasyāgni- niṣṭhatvāt । svakālatvāditi svātantreṇa kālaviśeṣasya paurṇamā- syamāvāsyārūpasya vidhānādityarthaḥ । tena sandehabhāṣye'pi yatsarvā- rthatvābhidhānaṃ tatsarvārthāgnyarthatvābhiprāyeṇeti mantavyam ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ pavamāneṣṭyanatideśādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: santi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ—“agnaye pavamānāya” ityevamādyāḥ । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛte'gnau pavamāneṣṭayaḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta na ? iti । ādhānasya pavamāneṣṭyaṅgatvanirāseneha āhavanīyasva- rūpaprayuktatve sādhite prasaṅgadidānīṃ pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛte- 'pyanuṣṭhānāśaṅkā nirākriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—darśapūrṇamāsavikārabhūtā hi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ tatra yathaiva prayājādayo'tidiśyante, tathā pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛto'pyagniḥ । na ca pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛto'gniḥ pavamāneṣṭibhirvinā sambhavatīti pavamāneṣṭayaḥ pavamāneṣṭiṣvanuṣṭheyā iti । na ca tāsāmapi saṃskṛtāgni-
sādhyatve'parāpareṣṭyapekṣāyāmanavastheti vācyam । anupādeyakāla- ṅgānurodhena yāvatyaḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsye nātikrāmanti tāvatya eva kariṣyanta iti nānavasthā । tasmāttāsāmapi prayājādivatsaṃskṛto- 'gniraṅgamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pavamāneṣṭayo darśapūrṇamāsāṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ । tā hyagnimātraprayuktā na darśapūrṇamāsāṅgamiti । nanvagni- stāvaddarśapūrṇamāsāṅgaṃ pavamāneṣṭiṣvatidiśyate । na ca pavamāneṣṭārvi- nāgniḥ sidhyati । tenāgnisidhyarthameveṣṭayo'nuṣṭhātavyā iti । maivam; upakāreṇa hi vikṛtau prākṛtapadārthaprāptirbhavati । na ca pavamāneṣṭī- nāmagnijanyopakārapekṣā samasti । ato'gnereva pavamāneṣṭisādhyatvā- tteneṣṭividheḥ prāgāhavanīyarūpasyāniṣṭatvāttadvyatiriktapadārthajanya evopakāraḥ pavamāneṣṭiṣvatidiśyata iti na pavamāneṣṭiṣu pavamāneṣṭi- prāptiriti । bhavatu vāgnerapyatideśaḥ, tathāpi pavamāneṣṭijanyasaṃskā- rasya pavamāneṣṭibhyaḥ prāgasiddhatvādāhitamātra evāgniviṣayaḥ kariṣyati । etattvabhyupetyavādenoktam । yato'ṅgaṃ khalvatidiśyate । na cādhānamātrasaṃskṛto'gnirdarśapūrṇamāsāṅgam । ādhānapavamāneṣṭija- nyasthaivāhavanīyasyāṅgatvāt । yata āhite'gnau pavamāneṣṭīnāmanuṣṭhā-
nam । tadyadyādhānāṅgatvasidhyarthamudīcyāṅgabhūtāḥ pavamāneṣṭayaḥ, tadā tajjanyasaṃskārasahitenādhānajanyasaṃskāreṇāhavanīyākhyaḥ saṃ- skāro janayitavyaḥ । sa cāhitāgnyanuṣṭhitābhireva samānadeśatvā- tsidhyatīti yuktaṃ tatrānuṣṭhānam । na tvagneḥ pavamāneṣṭayaṅgatveneti । ato na pavamāneṣṭiṣvapi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ karttavyā iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—na pavamāneṣṭayaḥ pavamāne- ṣṭisaṃskṛte'gnau karttavyāḥ । tāsāmevāgnyarthatvādagniprayojanatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ paśudharmāṇāmagnīṣomīyārthatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
asti jyotiṣṭome paśuragnīṣomīyaḥ—“yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣo- mīyaṃ paśumālabhate” iti । tathā savanīyaḥ ānubandhaśca । santi ca paśudharmāḥ—upākaraṇamupānayanaṃ, niyojanaṃ, saṃjñapanaṃ, viśasanamitye- vamādayaḥ । te kiṃ sarveṣāmagnīṣomīyasavanīyānubandhyānām ? utāgnīṣomīyasya savanāyasya ca ? utāgnīṣomīyasyaiva ? iti । śrutiliṅgavākyaiḥ saha prakaraṇasya virodhāvirādhau nirūpyedānīṃ kramasya śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇaiḥ sahaḥ virodhāvirodhacintāyāṃ
prathamaṃ prakaraṇena saha virodhāvirādhau nirūpyete । atra yadyapi bhaṣyakāreṇa tredhā sandeho varṇitaḥ, tathāpi pakṣāntarasyāpi sambhavādvārtike caturddhaiva darśitaḥ—kimayaṃ paśudharmastrayāṇāmeva ? atha savanīyasyaiva ? athāgnīṣomīyasavanīyayoḥ ? utāgnīṣo- mīyasyaiveti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—jyotiṣṭome aupavasathye'hani caturdaśyāṃ paśudharmāḥ śrūyante । na ca te vākyena kenacitpaśunā sambaddhāḥ pratīyante । nāpyavāntaraprakaraṇenāgnīṣomīyārthāḥ savanīyārthāḥ vā bhavanti । utpatau hi prakaraṇaṃ bhavanti । utpatiścāgnīṣomīyasya dī- kṣākāle somakrayasannidhau daśamyāmeva । aupavasathye tu paśudharmasa- nnidhāvanuṣṭhānamātraṃ śrūyate । tathā savanīyasyāpi sutyākāle amā- vāsyāyāmutpattiḥ । anuṣṭhānaṃ tasyāpi paśudharmasamīpe । aupava- sathye'hani guṇārthaṃ śravaṇam । anubandhyāyāstvaupavasathye notpatti- rnānuṣṭhānam । so'māvāsyānte pratipadyanuṣṭhīyate । tena vākyāvāntara- prakaraṇābhyāṃ kenāpi paśunā'gṛhītatvāt jyotiṣṭomamahāprakaraṇe- naivāgnīṣomīyasyānuṣṭhānasādeśyarūpaṃ kramaṃ bādhitvā jyotiṣṭomā- rthāstāvadvijñāyante । tasya ca somadravyatvānna paśudharmaiḥ prayojanamityā- narthakyatadaṅganyāyeṣvavataranto'ṅgatvāviśeṣāttriṣveva paśuṣu bhavantīti ।

na tāvadavaya pūrva/?/pakṣaḥ sambhavati । paśusambandhena śrutānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirākāṅkṣatvāt । asaṃyuktagrāhiṇā jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇena grahaṇāsambhavāt vāraṇādipātrāṇāmiva yajñasambandhena śrutānāmā- dhānaprakaraṇena । ato nānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena sarvapaśvarthatvam । etacca vāraṇādhikaraṇa eva vivecitam । bhavatu vānyasaṃyuktasyāpi prakaraṇena grahaṇam, tathāpyaupavasathya eva savanīyasyotpatteravāntara- prakaraṇena savanīyārtha eva dharmā bhavanti । na ca savanīyasya sutyākāla evotpatteraupavasathye prakaraṇābhāva iti vācyam । yena “āśvinaṃ grahaṃ grahītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ savanīyaṃ paśu- mupākaroti” iti vākyena sutyākāle savanīyotpattirvaktavyā । tataścāśvinagrahagrahaṇānantaryaṃ raśanātrivṛttvaṃ yūpaparivyāṇaṃ taduttara- kālamupākaraṇañca dravyañca devatā cetyetatsakalaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo yāgo vidheyaḥ । tathā ca sati sutarāṃ viśiṣṭavidhigauravamāpadyeta । asti caupavasathye dravyadevatāviśiṣṭayāgamātravidhāyakam “āgneyama- jamagniṣṭoma ālabhate” iti vākyam । na ca kathaṃ tarhi sutyākāle tasyānuṣṭhānamiti vācyam । tenotpāditasyāpi savanīyayāgasya sutyākāle punarutkarṣaśravaṇāt । evaṃ hyaupavasathye śrūyate— “vapayā prātassavane caranti, puroḍāśena mādhyandine, aṅgaistṛtīya- savane” iti । atra hi prātassavanaśabdena prātaḥkālīno
jyotiṣṭomāvayavo'bhidhīyate । jyotiṣṭomaśca sutyākāle'nuṣṭheyaḥ । tatreva vapādipracāraḥ śrūyate । tenaupavasathyotpannasyāpi savanīyasya vapādipracāradarśanātsutyākāla evānuṣṭhānamiti śrūyate । tatra ca pradhānadeśatvādaṅgānāmiti nyāyenāṅgeṣvapyupākaraṇādiṣvākṛṣṭeṣu kālāniyame prāpte aśvinagrahaṇānantaryamātraṃ vidhīyate । anyatsarva- manūdyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1046)

tenāyamatra sūtrārthaḥ—bhavetsarveṣāṃ tulyaḥ paśudharmavidhiḥ, yadi prakaraṇāviśeṣo bhavet । asti tu prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ । yataḥ sava- nīyasya yatrotpattistatraivopākāraṇādidharmāḥ śrūyante । ataḥprakāraṇā- tsavanīyārthā eva dharmā iti ।

kṣodīyānayamapi pūrvapakṣapāśaḥ । tathāhi—bhavatvevaṃ savanī- pārthā dharmā anuṣṭhānasādeśyalakṣaṇātkramādagnīṣomīyārthā api prāpnuvanti । nanu savanīyotkarṣe sati paśudharmāṇāmapi sutyākāla evānuṣṭhānamityanantaramevoktam । ataḥ kathaṃ dharmāṇānuṣṭhānasāde- śyalakṣaṇātkramādagnīṣomīyārthatvamapīti । na ca sthānasāmarthyabalena tatrāpi dharmānuṣṭhānamiti vācyam । dīkṣākālotpannasyāpyagnīṣo- mīyasyāmnānasāmarthyabalādṛśamyāmapyanuṣṭhānaprasaṅgāt । ucyate—
sarvatra khalvanuṣṭhānasādeśyalakṣaṇaḥ kramaḥ samānadeśānuṣṭhānāvagati- rūpaḥ । taccānuṣṭhānasidhdirūpam । anuṣṭhāne siddhe kramāvagataśeṣatvā- nantarakālabhāvitvāt । paśudharmāṇāṃ caupavasathya āmnānasāmarthyā- danuṣṭhānamavagatameveti kramādagnīṣomīyārthatvamapīti । tena yadyapi savanīyotkarṣe sati pradhānadeśatvādaṅgānāmiti nyāyena savanāyāṅgā- tvena yadanuṣṭhānaṃ tasya bhavatu sutyākālatvam । agnīṣomīyāṅgatvena tvanuṣṭhānasyaupavasathyakālīnatvabādhapramāṇābhāvādabādhitameva dharmāṇāṃ tatkālānamapyanuṣṭhānamiti dīkṣākālaḥ syāt । tasya tvagnīṣomī- yasya yadyapyāmnānasāmarthyenātrānuṣṭhānamavagatameva, tathāpi balavatā vacanenaupavasathye tadutkarṣādanyasya ca tadaṅgatvenāpyanugrahahetorabhāvā- ddīkṣākālāvagatamanuṣṭhānaṃ bādhyata eva । iha tu na tatheti vaiṣamyam । nanu śrutiliṅgādhikaraṇaviruddhamidamabhidhīyate । tatra hi śrutyā gārhapatyārthasyaindrīmantrasya na durbalaliṅgenendrārthatvamiṣyate । tathātrāpi balīyasā prakaraṇena savanīyārthānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ durbalena krameṇā- gnīṣomīyārthatvamiti । ucyate—tatraivaitadyatra śeṣasambandha eva balīyasi pramāṇe pravṛtte durbalapramāṇasya nāvaśyaṃbhāvinī pravṛttiḥ । yathaindrīmantra eva । iha tvagnīṣomīyasya paśudharmairvinā sidhyabhāvā- davaśyaṃ durbalapramāṇe'pi dharmaprāptirvaktavyā । tatra kiṃ sakalopadeśapratya- stamaye pravarttamānādatijaghanyādatideśādbhavatu ? athavopadeśāntargatā-
tkramāditi sandehe satyupadeśarūpātkramādevāgnīṣomīyasya dharmasambandho yuktaḥ । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā ‘sthānācca pūrvasya’ iti । tasmātprakaraṇa- kramābhyāṃ savanīyāgnīṣomīyārthāḥ paśudharmmā iti । evaṃ prāpte'- bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi “vapayā prātassavane caranti” iti । vākyena sutyākālasambandhena pradhānotkarṣe satyapyaṅgānāmu- tkarṣo bhavet । na ca pradhānadeśatvādaṅgānāmiti nyāyena pradhāno- tkarṣe'ṅgānāmapyutkarṣa iti vācyam । yatastatraivaitat yatrānirjñātadeśakā- lānyaṅgāni bhavanti । nirjñātadeśakālānāntu na pradhānadeśakālatvam । yathā jyotiṣṭomāṅgānāmeva dīkṣādīnāṃ viśeṣavihitadaśamyādikā- latvam । atrāpi savanīyāṅgānāmupākaraṇādīnāmaupavasathyakāle vidhānānurodhenānutkarṣaḥ । tenopakāraṇotkarṣo vidhātavyaḥ । tasya cāśvinagrahaṇottarakālaśceti prāpte karmaṇyanekaguṇavidhānādvākyabhedā bhavet । bhavatu vā yathākathañcidvākyabhedaparihāraḥ, tathāpyekasya karmaṇo dvayorutpattivākyatvāsambhavādekenotpattiparasya ca guṇavi- dhānārthaṃ śravaṇamiti vaktavyam । tatra kenotpattiḥ kasya guṇavidhā- nārthatvamiti saṃśaye “āgneyamajamagniṣṭoma ālabhate” ityasya
“vapayā prātassavane caranti” ityādivākyairekavākyatvāpannasya vapāpracārādiguṇavidhānārthameva savanīyānuvādakatvaṃ yuktam । upā- deyasya vapāpracāralakṣaṇasya guṇasya dūrasthasutyākālotpattyaiva savanīyakarmānuvādenāpi vidhānasambhavāt । viśeṣeṇa ca prātassavane sambandhāttatkālīnasavanīyayāgopasthitau satyāṃ sukaraṃ tadguṇavidhā- namityaupavasathyaśrutānyeva “āgneyamajamagniṣṭoma ālabhate” ityupakra- myāpi “vapayā prātassavane caranti” ityādivākyāni guṇavidhāna- parāṇi, sutyākālaśrutantvanupādeyasya kālasya tirohitakarmānu- vādena vidhānāsambhavātprakaraṇanyāyena kālaviśiṣṭakarmavidhānārthame- veti tatraiva karmotpattiriti niścīyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1044)
tenaupavasathye savanīyaprakāraṇābhāvānniṣpratipakṣeṇa sthānasya krameṇa kevalāgnīṣomīyapaśuyāgārthatvam । atideśatastu savanīyā- nubandhyārthatvāmiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe tulyanyāyatayā paśupuroḍāśayāgasyau- pavasthyaśrutasyāgnīṣomadevatāsaṃskārārthatvātsavanīye kevalāgnidai- vatyatvena tayārabhāvānna liṅgavirodhena savanīyārthatvam । siddhānte
tu savanīyasyāgnīṣomīyavikṛtitvādūhenāgnyādisaṃskāratvādatide- śataḥ savanīyārthatvamānubandhyārthatvamapiti । sūtrantu—pradhānotkarṣe tadekadeśatvenopākaraṇādyaṅgotkarṣaḥ । teṣāmaṅgānāṃ nirjñātasvakāla- tvādityabhiprāyaḥ ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ śākhāharaṇādīnāmubhayadohārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: asti sāyaṃdohaḥ prātardohaśca । santi ca dohadharmāḥ—śākhā- haraṇaṃ gavāṃ prasnāvanaṃ dohanamityevamādayaḥ । te kiṃ sāyaṃdohārthāḥ ? utobhayārthāḥ ? iti । kramasya prakaraṇāvirodhaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ tadapavādaḥ pratipādyate । atra yadyapi bhāṣye dohārthatvenaiva vicāraḥ pratibhāti, tathāpi pūrvedyurdohānuṣṭhānapratipādakavacanābhāvādaprasiddhatvena ca śrutikalpanāyā asambhavāddadhipayogata evāyaṃ vicāro bhāṣyakāreṇa dohadvāreṇokta iti mantavyam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “aindra dadhyamāvāsyāyām, aindraṃ
payo'māvāsyāyām” iti dadhipayoyāgāvamāvāsyāyāmevānuṣṭheyau, tathāpi dvayoreva prātaḥ kālānuṣṭheyatvena dadhiyāgasya sadyojātadadhi (?) miśrājyatvāsambhavādavaśyaṃ caturdaśyāmeva sāyaṃkāle dadhiyāgārthaṃ dohānuṣṭhānamarthasiddhama । na tu payoyāgārtham । tasyāmāvāsyāyāṃ prāptaḥkālakṛtadohenaiva niṣpatteḥ । dehadharmā api śākhāharaṇādaya- ścaturdaśyāmeva śrūyante । ato doharūpāṅgadvāreṇa dadhiyāgasya caturdaśyāmevopakrāntatvādanuṣṭhānasādeśyalakṣaṇena krameṇa dadhyarthā eva dohadharmāḥ । tena dohayoścaturdaśyamāvāsyākālabhedācchṛtaśabda- vācyaṃ dugdhaṃ dharmairasaṃyuktaṃ syāditi । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pradhānasya dadhiyāgasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhānaṃ bhavet । tathāpi pradhānasya khalu dharmopadeśaḥ kriyamāṇasya balavatpramāṇāvirodhe sati krameṇa dharmagrāhakatvaṃ bhavati । yathāgnīṣomīyasya paśudharmagrāhakatvam । na ceha dadhi- yāgasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhānam । “amāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajeta” iti sāṅgasyaivāmāvāsyāyāmanuṣṭhānāvagamāt । kintu dadhyarthadohasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhānam । na ca dadhiyāgārthadohasya tatrānuṣṭhāne dadhiyāgasya kramo bhavati । nāpi tatrānuṣṭhīyamānatvena taddohasya
krameṇa dohārthatvameva, dharmāṇāmarthasiddhatvena kramābhāvasyoktatvāt । ataḥ pūrvedyurāmnātānāṃ śākhāharaṇādidharmāṇāṃ krameṇa na dadhi- yāgārthatvam, nāpi dohārthatvam, kintu prakaraṇāvibhāgādubha- yārthatve satyeva keṣāñciddharmāṇāṃ śākhāharaṇādināṃ dadhisidhyarthaṃ pūrvedyuranuṣṭhānamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—prakaraṇāviśeṣādubhayasaṃ- yuktasyaiva śākhāharaṇādeścaturdaśīkāle śāstrameva paraṃ vidhānārthamiti ।।
chapter.head: atha navamaṃ grahadharmāṇāṃ savanatrayārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ “jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tatraindravāyavādyāḥ prātassavane daśa grahā āmnātāḥ । tatra dharmāḥ śrūyante-“upopte'nye grahāḥ sādyante'nupopte dhruvaḥ । daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ sammārṣṭi” iti । santyapare mādhyandine savane apare tṛtīyasavane grahāḥ । teṣu mādhyandinatṛtīyasavanīyeṣu ca sandehaḥ—kiṃ grahadharmāḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta prātaḥsavane ye grahāḥ teṣveva ? iti । adhikāśa- ṅkānirākaraṇārthamudāharaṇāntare pūrvokta eva nyāyo'tidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu dadhiyāgasya caturdaśyāmanuṣṭhīyamā- nasya tatkramabhāvena dohadharmāṇāṃ prakaraṇāviśeṣādubhayadohārthatvam, grahadharmāṇāntu prātassavanānuṣṭheyānāṃ prātassavanānuṣṭhīyamānagrahayāgā- rthatvamanuṣṭhānasādeśyalakṣaṇātkramādyuktam । na ca prakaraṇātkramasya durbalatvātprakaraṇena sarvagrahārthatvamiti vācyam । krameṇa prātassa- vanikagrahārthatve'pi prakaraṇāvirodhāt । ataḥ krameṇa prātassava- nikagrahārthatvemeva grahādharmāṇāmiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi prakaraṇavirodhe kramasya viniyo- jakatvaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—jyotiṣṭomāpūrvagṛhītāḥ khalu grahadharmāsta- tsādhanībhūtagrahasambandhinastatsādhanatvāviśeṣātsavanatrayavarttigrahasamba- ndhino vijñāyante । na ca krameṇa prātassavanikagrahārthatve'pi prakara- ṇāvirodha iti vācyam । apūrvārthatvapratipādakasya prakaraṇasya krameṇaikadeśārthatvaviṣayasaṅkocalakṣaṇabādhaprasaṅgāt । tasmātkramaṃ bādhitvā prakaraṇena savanatrayavarttigrahārthā eva grahadharmā iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—yathā dohadharmā dohadvaya- sādhāraṇāstathā grahadharmā api savanāntarīyagrahasādhāraṇā eveti ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ raśanādharmasādhāraṇyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭome paśuragnīṣomīyaḥ—“yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣo- mīyaṃ paśumālabhate” iti । tatra raśanā śrūyate, raśanādharmāśca “trivṛdbhavati, darbhamayī bhavati, praviṣṭāntā karttavyā” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimete dharmā agnīṣomīyaraśanāyāḥ savanīyaraśanāyāśca sādhāraṇāḥ ? utāgnīṣomīyārthā eva ? iti । prakaraṇakramayorvi- rodhāvirodhau nirūpyedānīṃ śrutikramayorvirodhāvirodhau nirūpyete । atra yadyapi sākṣānna raśanā śrūyate, kintu “yūpaṃ parivyayati” iti yūpaparivyāṇādeva labhyate, tathāpi darbhamayyādiśabdānāṃ yaugikatvena parivyāṇākṣiptaraśanāviśeṣavacanatvādbhāṣye raśanā śrūyata ityaktam । yūpaparivyāṇaṃ “yūpaṃ parivyayati” ityanena yathāgnīṣomīye vidhīyate, tathā “āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvopānaṣkramya yūpaṃ parivyayati” ityanena savanīye'pi vihitam । tena yūpaparivyāṇākṣepādevobhayatraiva raśanāyāḥ prāptatvādraśanādharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ kimagnīṣomīyaraśanārthā eva utāgnīṣomīyasavanīyaraśanārthā iti bhavati sandehaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—agnīṣomīyasya krame caturdaśyāṃ raśanā-
dharmā darbhamayyādayaḥ śrūyante na savanīyasya । tena paśudharmavadagnī- ṣomīyayūpaparivyāṇārthā eva raśanādharmāḥ । nanu śrutyā raśanā- mātrārthāḥ pratīyante । śrutiśca vākyādbalīyasī । satyam; kintu yūpasvarūpasambandha ānarthakyādapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇayā śrutyā vini- yogo vaktavyaḥ । tena yathā śrutyā prakaraṇasahāyabhūtayā barhirdharmāḥ prakaraṇavartibarhirmātrārthāḥ, evaṃ śrutisādhāraṇye'pi na piṇḍapitṛyajñabarhirarthāḥ tathā raśanādharmā api kramasahāyayā śrutyā kramopasthitāgnīṣomīyayūpaparivyāṇaraśanārthā eveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyagnīṣomīyakramaśrutasya “yūpaṃ pari- vyayati” iti parivyāṇasya brīhiprokṣaṇavadyūpadvāreṇa pradhānā- pūrvanirvṛttāvupayogo bhavet । kintu yūpasyālaukikatvenānirjñāto- pāyaparimāṇasya sādhanāpekṣāyāṃ “yūpaṃ parivyayati” iti dvitīyā- śrutyā yūparnirvṛtyupayogitvenaiva parivyāṇasya yūpāṅgatvaṃ vijñāyate । evaṃ savanīye'pi “upaniṣkamya yūpaṃ parivyayati” iti dvitīyā- śrutyā yūpāṅgatayā parivyāṇaṃ śruyamāṇaṃ sādhāraṇasya yūpasyāgnī- ṣomīya eva niṣpannatvāt । yadyapi na yūpasvarūpanirvṛttyupayuktam, tathāpi svarūpe kārye copayogyaṅgaṃ bhavatīti nyāyena yūpakāryapaśu- niyojanopayuktadārḍhyātiśayajananenaivāṅgaṃ bhavati । etacca yūpāṅgaṃ
parivyāṇaraśanātvāviśeṣādubhayaraśanāsādhāraṇā eva bhavanti । na caivaṃ satyagnīṣomīyayūpasyaiva krameṇa sannidhāpitatvātkramasahāya- yā śrutyā tatparivyāṇaraśanārthā eva vijñāyante । prakāraṇasahāyayeva śrutyā barhirdharmā darśapūrṇamāsīyabarhirarthā iti vācyam । yato ya eva hyagnīṣomīyasya yūpaḥ, sa eva savanīyasyāpi । tenāgnī- ṣomīyayūparivyāṇaraśanāsambandhitvena vidhīyamānā dharmāḥ savanāye yūparivyāṇaraśanāsambandhenāpi vihitā bhavanti । piṇḍapitṛyajña- barhiṣo na darśapūrṇamāsabarhirbhyo'nyatvādyuktam । yattvasādhāraṇā dharmā iti tathāpi savanīyotpattivākye “trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīya” ityanuvādo raśanādharmasādhāraṇyādvinānupapadyamāno liṅgaṃ bhavati । tena liṅgadarśanādapi sādhāraṇā raśanādharmā iti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe savanīyaraśanāyā darbhamayādiniyamaḥ । siddhānte'gnīṣomīya eva darbhamayādidharmaniyama iti । sutrantu—raśaneti raśanādharmopalakṣaṇārtham । tenāyamarthaḥ—yadvadagra- hadharmāḥ savanatrayavarttigrahasādhāraṇāḥ, tadvadraśanādharmā api sādhā- raṇāḥ । liṅgadarśanaṃ coktameveti ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ grahadharmāṇāmaṃśvadābhyarthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: dūrādyacchiṣyate jyotiṣṭomasya, yathaupānuvākyākāṇḍeṃ'śva- dābhyau । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ jyotiṣṭome samāmnātā grahadharmāḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta neti । idānīṃ prasaṅgadvākyaprakaraṇayorvirodhāvirodhau vicāryete ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu raśanādharmāṇāṃ yūpaikatvātkrama- nibandhanamavyavasthānam । iha tu grahāṇāṃ bhinnatvādyūpavadgrahadharmā- ścaikena prakaraṇena gṛhītāsteṣveva sammārgādidharmāṇāṃ barhirdharmavat vyavasthopapatternāsti dūrādvihitayoraṃśvadābhyayoḥ sammārgādigrahadharma- sambandha iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: sidhdāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra prakaraṇādvākyasya viśeṣa- katvaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—prakaraṇasya khalvatiprasakte vākye prakṛtā- pūrvasādhānopasthāpakatayā vyavasthāpakatvam । yathā barhirdharmavidhāyaka- vākye darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvosthāpakatvena, tadatrāpi prakaraṇasya
jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasādhanāṅgopasthāpakatvenaiva viśeṣakatvaṃ vaktavyam । jyotiṣṭomāpūrvīyatvaṃ cāṃśvadābhyayorapi grahadharmairbhavitavyameva । yeṣāntu payograhasurāgrahādīnāṃ jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasambandho nāsti, teṣāmeva paraṃ na grahadharmasambandhaḥ । tena prakṛtavyavasthāviśeṣakatvā- dyāvajjotiṣṭomāpūrvīyagrahasambandha eva dharmāṇāmiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—aṃśvadābhyagrahasvarūpamapi grahadharmaiḥ saṃyuktam । tayorapi jyotiṣṭomārthatvāt । śeṣasya ca grahadharmasya tannimittatvāt jyotiṣṭomārthatvanimittatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaṃ dvādaśaṃ citriṇyadhikaraṇam
chapter.p: anārabhyāgnimucyate—“citriṇīrupadadhāti, vajriṇīrupada- dhāti, bhūteṣṭakā upadadhāti” iti । santi ca prakaraṇe iṣṭakādharmāḥ—“akhaṇḍāmakṛṣṇalāñca kuryāta” iti । tathā “bhasmanā iṣṭakāḥ saṃskuryāt” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kima- prakaraṇe samāmnātānāmime dharmāḥ karttavyāḥ (?) uta neti । idānī- da/?/dāhaṇāntare'dhikāśaṅkāṃ nirākarttuṃ prakaraṇe samāmnātā ime dharmāḥ karttavyā iti pūrvokta eva nyāyo'tidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: ayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu grahādipātrāṇāmavyabhicaritajyotiṣṭo- māpūrvānvayānāṃ prakaraṇamanapekṣyāpi vākyena sammārgādisaṃskāravi- dhānādaprakṛtānāmapi sammārgādidharmasambandhaḥ । iṣṭakādīnāntu vyabhicaritāṛ/?/yapūrvasambandhānāmapūrvānvayārthaṃ prakaraṇamapekṣitavyam । ato yāsāmeveṣṭakānāṃ prakaraṇavattitvaṃ, tāsāmeva dharmasambandho na tvanyāsāmiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyanārabhyādhītānāmapīṣṭakānāṃ sthaṇḍi- ladvāreṇāgnyapūrvasādhanatvaṃ vākyena na pratīyeta । yathā khalvaṃśvadā- bhyayoranārabhyaśrutayorapi vākyena jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasambandhe sati sammārgādigrahadharmasambandhaḥ, tathehāpyaprakaraṇaśrutānāmapīṣṭakānāṃ vākyena sthaṇḍilanirmāṇadvāreṇāgnyapūrvārthatvāvagateḥ prakaraṇa- sahāyena vākyenāgnyapūrvasādhaneṣṭakāsu vidhīyamānāḥ dharmāḥ sādhāraṇā eveti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—aprakaraṇe śrūyamāṇā api vākyenāgnyaṅgamiṣṭakā aṃśvadābhyavatsadharmikā iti ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśamabhiṣavādīnāmasamānavidhānatādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśvaṃ vā yājayetsa yadi somaṃ bibhakṣayiṣet, nyagrodhastibhinīrāhṛtya tāḥ sampiṣya dadhanyu- nmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchenna somam” iti । santi ca somadharmāḥ krayo'bhiṣava ityevamādayaḥ । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ samānavidhānā ete dharmāḥ somasya phalacamasasya ca ? uta somārthāḥ phalacamasasya tadvikāratvāditi । pūrvatra tu dharmāṇāṃ samānavidhānatvaṃ pratipāditam । idānīntadapavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrva/?/pakṣaḥ-pūrvamaprakaraṇaśrutatve'pyaṃśvadābhyayorjyotiṣṭomā- pūrvasādhanatvāviśeṣādiṣṭakānāñcāgnyapūrvārthatvāviśeṣātsamāno dharma- vidhirityuktam । tadatrāpi somaphalacamasayorjyotiṣṭomāpūrvasādhana- tvāviśeṣādapūrvasādhanalaṇayā kriyābhiṣavādayo dharmā vidhīyamānāḥ somaphalacamasasādhāraṇā eveti vijñāyante । nanu grahadharmāṇāmiṣṭa- kādharmāṇāñca grahamātrambandheneṣṭakāmātrasambandhena ca vidhīnādbhavatu sādhāraṇyam । somadharmāṇāntu somasambandhenaiva vidhānātkathaṃ soma- phalacamasasādhāraṇyamiti । ucyate—somasvarūpe dharmavidhānānartha- kyādatrāpi jyotiṣṭomāpūrvīyahaviḥprakṛtidravyasambandhena vidhānaṃ
vaktavyam । tacca rūpaṃ somaphalacamasasādhāraṇameva । tena yathā darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvīyahaviḥprakṛtidravyasambandhena vidhīyamānā avaghāta- prokṣaṇādayo dharmā vrīhiyavasādhāraṇāḥ, tathā somadharmā api krayābhiṣavādayaḥ somaphalacamasasādhāraṇā iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi nityānityasaṃyogavirodho na bhavate । tathāhi—krayābhiṣavādayaḥ khalvanityajyotiṣṭomāpūrva- gṛhitā nityadvāramevāśrayante । somaśca nityaḥ, sakalajyotiṣṭoma- prayogabhāvitvāt । tena nityāmnātā dharmā nityasomārthā eveti siddham ।
