idantviha vaktavyam—kathaṃ phalacamase somadharmaprāptiḥ ? ati- deśāditi brūmaḥ । na caikasminneva karmaṇi kathamatideśa iti vācyam । yato nātra karmātideśaḥ, kintu dravyadharmātideśaḥ । dravyayośca somaphalacamasayorekasminnapi karmaṇi bhedānnātideśānu- papattiḥ । tatra yathā avagatakaraṇabhāvaṃ karmātidiṣṭadharmakaṃ kathamityā- kāṅkṣāyāṃ dravyadevatādisārūpyopasthitakarmāntarāddharmān gṛhṇāti, tathā dravyamapagakriyāsādhanabhāvaṃ kathamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ sārūpyo- pasthitadravyāntarāddharmān gṛhṇāti । tadatra phalacamasena yāgaṃ bhāvayet kathamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ somasthānāpattilakṣaṇasya sārūpyasyāntaraṅga
tvātsomavadityavagate somadharmāneva gṛhṇāti । na caivaṃ satyubhayathāpi phalacasame somadharmānuṣṭhānāviśeṣānniṣprayojano vicāra iti vācyam । guṇakāmapravṛttyapravṛttiprayojanena prayojanavatvāt । tathāhi—somaphalacamasayoryadābhiṣavādividhiḥ samānaḥ, tadobhaya- sminnabhiṣavādau guṇakāmāśrayatvanirūpaṇātphalacamasābhiṣave'pyā- śrayapratyabhijñānādguṇakāmena pravṛrttitavyam । asamānavidhānatve'nu- ṣṭhānasambandhina evābhiṣavasyāśrayatvānirūpaṇātphalacamasasambandhenā- śrayapratyabhijñānābhāvānnivṛttirguṇakāmasyeti pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayoḥ prayojanama ।
sūtrantu—naimittikaphalacamasādi nityena somenātulyatvāda- samānavidhānaṃ bhavediti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ mukhyapratinidhyossāmānavidhyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti pratinidhiḥ śrute dravye'pacarite । yathā vrīhyapacāre nīvārāḥ । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ nīvārāḥ samānavidhānāḥ ? uta neti । pūrvāpavādenedamārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—nityaśrutā hyavadhātādayo nityaśrutaivrī- hibhireva sambandhamarhanti na nīvāraiḥ, teṣāmaśrutatvāt । kintu vrīhyapacāre'vaśyaṃ karttavyaṃ nityam, kāmyañca prārabdhamavaśyaṃ samāpanīyam । tatra dravyāpekṣāyāmapacaritadravyasadṛśā nīvārā evopādīyante । tenāsamānavidhānānāmeva vrīhikāryāpatyā phalacamasavadatideśādeva dharmāsambandho bhavatīti । evaṃ prāpte'bhi- dhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi phalacamasavatsvenaiva mahimnā nīvārāḥ karmasādhanaṃ bhaveyuḥ । kintu vrīhiśāstrasyāvayavaparyantatvāt, vrīhyavayavānāñca katipayānāṃ nīvāreṣu vidyamānatvāt tadupā- ditsayā puruṣaḥ pravarttamāno nāntarīyakatayā nīvāratvamupādatte । tadatirekeṇa vrīhyavayavopādānāsambhavāt । te ca vrīhyavayavāḥ “vrīhibhiryajeta” iti pratyakṣaśāstracoditā eveti yuktamavaghātā- didharmāṇāṃ nīvāreṣvapi samānavidhānatvamiti ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe vrīhīṇāmapacāre vrīhisthāne nīvāra- padohaḥ karttavyaḥ । siddhānte tu vrīhipadasyaiva prayogānna tadūhaḥ ।
nanu “vrīhibhiryajeta” iti śāstreṇa vrīhitvajātiḥ sādhanatvena pratipāditā, vrīhyavayavāśca । vrīhitvamantraśca liṅgādvrīhitvajāti- prakāśana eva viniyuktaḥ । tena yathā yaveṣu liṅgābhāvādaprayogaḥ, tathā nīvāreṣvapīti kathaṃ siddhānte vrīhipadaprayogādanūhaḥ prayojanamiti । ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi svarūpeṇāmūrttā jātiryāga- sādhanaṃ bhavet । kintarhi ? āśrayavyaktyavayavopalakṣaṇatvena । teṣāmeva puroḍāśaprakṛtitvenāpekṣitavidhānāt । tena yathā “vrīhibhiryajeta” iti vidhau sādhanabalādvrīhibuddhirvrīhitvopa- lakṣitān puroḍāśaprakṛtibhūtānavayavāneva viṣayīkaroti । evamatra yo'yaṃ vrīhiśabdo vidhyuddeśānurodhī pravarttamānastathābhūtānevā- vayavān viṣayīkaroti । te ca nīvāre'pyaviśiṣṭā eva । tena yadyapi nīvāreṣu vrīhitvāsamavāyaḥ, tathāpi vrīhitvopalakṣitā- nāmevāvayavānāṃ nīvāreṣvapi pratyabhijñānāditareṣāṃ pratinidhya- sambhavādasyaiva vrīhitvopalakṣitatvamapīti sūktaṃ siddhānte'nūhaḥ prayojanamiti ।
sūtrantu—yadvadupadeśena vrīhayo dharmavantaḥ, tadvannāvārā api । vrīhiśāstreṇaiva yāgasiddhiprayojanatvāvagamāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ pratinidhau mukhyadharmānuṣṭhānādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: atha yaḥ pratinidhiḥ, tatra kiṃ samānavidhānam ? uta neti । yathā “yadi somaṃ na vindetpūtokānabhiṣuṇuyāta” iti । idānīṃ pratinidhānāśaṅkānirākaraṇena samānavidhātvameva pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu novārāṇāṃ pṛthak śāstrārthatvābhāvena kāryapratyabhijñānādbrīhidharmāṇāmavahantyādīnāṃ samānavidhānatvam, pūtīkānāntu pṛthakśāstrārthatvāttatkāryāpatyā phalacamasavadasamāna- vidhānatvameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi pūtikānāṃ yāgasādhanatvārthameta- dvacanaṃ bhavet । kintarhi ? somāpacāre tasyāvaśyaṃ karttavyatvena kāmyasya ca prakrāntasya samāpanīyatyena vrīhyapacāra iva sadṛśopā- dānāpekṣāyāṃ satyāmanekasomasadṛśāpādānāvayave sati pūtīko- pādānaniyamārthamidaṃ vacanam । tenāyamartho bhavati—yatsomāpacāre tatsadṛśān somāvayavānupādadīta, tatpūtīkagatāneveti ।
taduktam—

lg.l: tataḥ syātkāryavarttitvaṃ na tvevaṃ sā pravarttate ।। iti ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1059)
tataḥ śrutasyāpi pratinidheraśrutapratinidhisamānatvātsamānavidhā- natvameveti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvādhikaraṇavadeva somasthāne pūtīkapadohaḥ pūrvapakṣe । siddhānte tu somapadaprayoga evetyanūhaḥ । sutrantu—yeyaṃ pūtīkānāṃ yāgaguṇatvena śrutiḥ sā pūtīkāniyamārthā na svarūpavidhā- nārtheti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśaṃ saṃsthādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ । tatra saṃsthāḥ samāmnātāḥ—agniṣṭomaḥ, ukthyaḥ, ṣoḍaśī, atirātra iti । tatra dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ । teṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ sarvasaṃsthaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā uktāḥ ? utāgniṣṭomasaṃsthamabhipretya ? iti । idānīṃ samāna- vidhānāpavādaḥ kriyate । atreyaṃ viṣayaśuddhiḥ—yadyapi saptasaṃstho
jyotiṣṭomaḥ-agniṣṭomo'tyagniṣṭoma ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśyatirātro vāja- peyo'ptoryāma iti, tathāpi tāsāṃ dharmasannidhyāmnānābhāvena samāna- vidhānāśaḍkābhāvātsannidhyāmnātāścatasra evodāhṛtāḥ tatrāpyane- kagrahacamasayāgābhyāronānekasaṃsthasya jyotiṣṭomasyādhyayanakrameṇa prathamamagniṣṭomasaṃsthā phalasambandhena śravaṇātkratvaṅgabhūtaiva । tatra yadyapyagniṣṭome samāmnāte “jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti phalavidhānam, “vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta” iti nimitte vidhā- nam, tathāpi phalanimittasambandhe saṃsthāyā jyotiṣṭomaviśeṣaṇatve- nāśravaṇāt jyotiṣṭomamātrasyaiva ‘ekasya tūbhayatve saṃyogapṛthaktvam’ iti nyāyena phalārthatvaṃ naimittikatvañca । tataḥ “paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, ṣoḍaśinā vīryakāmaḥ stuvīta, atirātreṇa prajākāmaṃ yājayet” iti krameṇa tisro jyotiṣṭomasaṃsthāḥ phalasambandhena śrūyante । tatrāpi jyotiṣṭomasyāpi prātisvikaṃ phalaṃ saṃsthānāntva- dhikaṃ phalamiti dvayoreva phalasādhanatvam । tatra dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ kiṃ jyotiṣṭome ukthyādiṣu ca samānavidhānāḥ ? uta jyotiṣṭomasyaiveti bhavati sandehaḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—dīkṣaṇīyādayo hi dharmā vidhīyamānā jyotiṣṭomasya saṃsthānāñca phalavatvenākāṅkṣāyogyatāsannidhānāviśe-
ṣādubhayorapi samānavidhānā eveti । nanu krayābhiṣavādidharmāṇāṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhātsomaphalacamasayoḥ samānavidhānatvamananta- rameva nirākṛtam ‘naimittakamatulyatvādasamānavidhānaṃ syāt’ ityatra । tatkathaṃ nityajyotiṣṭome anityāsu saṃsthāsu ca dīkṣaṇīyādīnāṃ samānavidhānatvamiti । ucyate—krayābhiṣavādīnāṃ hi prakaraṇena jyotiṣṭomānvayānnityatve siddhe nitya eva somo dvāraṃ nānityaḥ phalacamasa iti yuktam । iha tu jyotiṣṭomasya saṃsthānāñca prakara- ṇāviśeṣādvinigamanāpramāṇābhāvādubhayārthatvameva dharmāṇāmiti na nityānityasaṃyogavirodhaḥ । na cākriyātvena saṃsthānāṃ na prakaraṇa- miti vācyam । yato jyotiṣṭomasyapi na kriyātvena prakaraṇaṃ, kintu phalavatvena । tattu saṃsthānāmapyaviśiṣṭam । tena yathā jyotiṣṭomaḥ phalatvādupajātakathaṃbhāvaḥ sannihitān dīkṣaṇīyādi- dharmān gṛhṇāti, tathā saṃsthā api phalatvādupajātakathambhāvā dharmān gṛhṇantīti samānavidhānatvameva dīkṣaṇīyādidharmāṇāmiti । tena jyotiṣṭomasya saṃsthānāñca prakaraṇāviśeṣāddīkṣaṇīyādidharmāḥ samānavidhānā eveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatrāpi nityānityasaṃyogavirodho
na bhavet । tathāhi—yathā krayābhiṣavādayo dharmāḥ prakaraṇena nityabhūtajyotiṣṭomasambandhānnityameva dvāramākāṅkṣamāṇā nityabhūtena somenaiva sambadhyante, nānityena phalacamasena । tathehāpi dīkṣaṇī- yādayo dharmā nityavadāmnātā nityameva svasambandhinaṃ śeṣiṇamape- kṣamāṇā nityabhūtena jyotiṣṭomena sambadhyante, nānityābhiḥ saṃsthābhiriti । na hi dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ phalacamasavannimitta- sambandhena śrūyante, yenānityā bhaveyuḥ । saṃsthāstu phalasambandhena śravaṇādanityabhūtāḥ । ato nityānityasaṃyogavirodhānna tābhiḥ sambadhyante ।

nanu jyotiṣṭomasyāpi phalasambandhaḥ śrūyate—“jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tathā “vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta” iti nimittasambandhena jyotiṣṭomo'pi nimittasambandhādanitya iti nityānityasaṃyogo'pyaviśiṣṭa eva । naitat; na vayaṃ svarūpato nityatvamanityatvaṃ vā brūmaḥ । kintarhi ? śrutitaḥ । na ca jyotiṣṭo- maḥ kvacitphalasambandhena nimittasambandhena vā śrūyate, “somena yajeta” iti nityavacchutasyaiva phalasambandho nimittasambandhaśca pratīyate । saṃsthānāṃtūtpattāveva phalasambandhena śravaṇātphalānvitā- nāñcānityatvādanityatvenaiva śravaṇamiti na tābhiḥ sambadhyante । nanu “paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt ṣoḍaśinā vīryakāmaḥ stuvītāti-
rātreṇa prajākāmaṃ yātayeta” iti grahaṇastotrayāgānāṃ phalasambandhaḥ śrūyate । kathaṃ saṃsthānāṃ phalasambandha iti । ucyate-sarvatra viśiṣṭa- vidhigauravabhayenāpapadasaṅkrānto vidhirddhātvarthamanūdyopapadārthameva phale vidhatte । athāprāpto dhātvarthaḥ, tarhi viśiṣṭameva dhātvarthaṃ phale vidhatta iti pratipāditam । na cātra dhātvartho na prāptaḥ, grahaṇastotra- yāgānāṃ vākyāntaraireva prāptatvāt । na cokthyādiśabdānāṃ graha- ṇādisāmānādhikaraṇyādudbhidādivadgrahaṇādināmadheyatvameveti vā- cyam । yato'jñātasandigdhārthasya sāmānādhikaraṇyena nāmadheyatvaṃ niścīyate, na punarvrīhisomādivannirūḍhārthasyāpi । iha tūkthyā- diśabdānāṃ smṛtito jyotiṣṭomasaṃsthāviśeṣeṣveva prasiddhatvānna sāmānādhikaraṇyena grahaṇādināmadheyatvādhyavasānamiti saṃsthānā- mukthyādiśabdavācyānāṃ phale vidhānamiti ।

nanu saṃsthā hi samāptiḥ । sā ca kriyoparatirūpatvāda- bhāvarūpeti kathaṃ tasyāḥ phalasādhanatvamiti । ucyate—kenoktaṃ nābhāvo bhāvāntarotpattau kāraṇamiti । pramāṇābhāvasyaivābhāva- jñānotpattihetutvāt । vihitanityanaimittikākaraṇasya ca pratya- vāyahetutvāt । tathāca smaranti—

atha vāstyevātrāpyaudāsīnyasaṅkalpo bhāvarūpa eva । sa saṃsthāśabdavācya ityavirodhaḥ । nanu kathantarhi saṃsthānāṃ dīkṣaṇīyādidharmasambandhaḥ ? na tāvadupadeśena, samānavidhānatvasya nirākṛtatvāt । nāpyatideśena, atideśasya sārūpyanibandhana- tvāt । saṃsthānāñca jyotiṣṭomena saha sārūpyabhāvāt । ucyate—na hi sārūpyamadṛṣṭarūpeṇa dharmātideśopayogi । kintarhi ? dharmavataḥ karmaṇā buddhisannidhāpanena । iha ca phalāya vihitābhirāśrayatvena jyotiṣṭomo gṛhītaḥ । tenāśrayatvapratipattyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya sannihitatvātkimatra sārūpyeṇeti । etacca dadhnendriyakāmādhikaraṇa eva purastātsādhitam—na ca sārūpya- mevaikaṃ kāraṇamiti । ataḥ siddhaṃ dīkṣaṇīyādīnāṃ saṃsthāsva- samānavidhānatvamiti । anuṣṭhānantvasamānavidhānatve'pi sādhāraṇa- meva । jyotiṣṭomārthānuṣṭhitaireva dīkṣaṇīyādībhirdharmaiḥ prasaṅgādeva saṃsthānāmapyupakārasiddheriti ।

prayojanam—phalacamasavadeva guṇakāmapravṛttyapravṛttī । tatrāpi yadeva prākṛtamukthyādisaṃsthānimittaṃ grahaṇaṃ stotraṃ śastrañca teṣu yo dharmaḥ prakṛtagrahastotraśastragato'tideśena prāpnoti, na tu yo guṇa- kāmaḥ । tena pūrvapakṣe saṃsthāsvapi pravartitavyam । siddhānte tu neti । sūtrantu—ukthyādisaṃsthā nityāgniṣṭomasaṃsthāvikṛti-
bhūtā niviśanta iti vikārāḥ, yataḥ kāmasaṃyoge sati tāḥ śrūyante । kāmyaścārtho nityamarthaṃ vikṛtya niviśanta iti sthito nyāyaḥ । tena samānavidhānatvāt nityavadāmnātā dīkṣaṇīyādayā hi dharmā nityasyaivāgniṣṭomasya nityatvena tulyatvāditi ।।

lg.l: yo nāma kaścidiha saṃviditaṃ prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।
matkarttṛtāmananukīrttya sa kīrtilopāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāt ।।

chapter.head: atha tṛtīyādhyāyasya saptamaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ vedibarhiradhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra santi barhidharmā vedidharmāśca । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ barhirādayo barhirdharmāśca pradhānasya ? utāṅgapradhānānā- miti । vākyaprakaraṇavirodhāvirodhadvāreṇa samānāsamānavidhānatva- meva dharmāṇāṃ nirūpyate । na tu vākyena prakaraṇavirodhāvirodhāveva, tayoḥ pūrvameva nirūpitatvāt ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—yadyapi “barhiṣi harvīṣyāsā- dayati, barhirlunāti, vedi khanati” iti vākye viśeṣeṇa ca barhiṣohavirāsādanasambandhastaddharmāṇāñca vedibarhissambandhaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi havirāsādanamātrasambandhena barhirlavanavidherānarthakyāt laukikabarhiṣaśca prasaṅgādavaśyamapūrvasādhanatākāritaḥ sambandho vaktavyaḥ । na cāpūrvasādhanatā prakaraṇamantareṇa labhyate । prakaraṇa- ñca nāṅgānām, kintu pradhānasyaiveti pradhānamātrasambandha eva barhiṣa- staddharmāṇām । tena yadyapi prakaraṇaṃ na viśeṣakaṃ karttṛgrāhakameva,
tathāpyadhikāravidhyākāṅkṣā khalu prakaraṇam । grāhakatvañca tasyaitadeva yadākāṅkṣāvatoradhikāravidhereva grāhakatvam । sa ca pradhānopakārrā/?/- meva sannidhiśrutān dharmānanigṛhṇātīti bhavatyarthādviśeṣaṇaphalamiti । ato bhavati grāhakalakṣaṇavaśādeva vākyasya pradhānagocarameva viniyojakatvamiti । taduktam—“prakaraṇaviśeṣāta” iti । na ca vedyādīnāṃ deśarūpatvāt, deśasya ca prayogāṅgatvenāṅgapradhānārthatvāt, vedyādānāmaṅgapradhānārthatvameveti vaktavyam । yataḥ “same darśapūrṇamā- sābhyāṃ yajeta, pracīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta” iti (?) yāgapradhāne vaiśvadevasyaiva karaṇatvena deśasambandhavidhānāt tadviśeṣa eva nyāyaḥ । vedyādīnāntu prakaraṇaniyatena vākyena pradhānamātrārthatvāvagamāta pradhānarthatvameveti nānupapannam । nāpi dvādaśopasatvavadavirodhisaṃyo- go'pi sarveṣāmeveti vedyādīnāṃ prakaraṇe samāveśāttenopasaddvādaśa- tvavadvākyena virodhyasaṃyuktaṃ varhirādi prakaraṇena pradhānamātrasyaiveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra prakaraṇaṃ viniyojakaṃ bhavet । kintarhi ? vākyameva । asaṃyuktaṃ hi prakaraṇena viniyujyetetyuktam । iha cāṅgapradhānasādhāraṇahavirāsādanasaṃyogenaiva vedibarhiṣī śrūyete ।
taddharmāśca vedibarhirmātrasambandhena । ataḥ kathaṃ prakaraṇavaśena pradhānamātraśeṣatvaṃ vedibarhiṣostaddharmāṇāñca । nanvevaṃ sati praka- raṇasya vākyārthāvyavasthāpakatve vākyamanyatrāpi prasajyeta । tatrānarthakyabhiyā mā nāma laukikaṃ vidadhātu, piṇḍapitṛyajñīye tu dūrasthe havirāsādane vedibarhirvidhitvam । naitadevam; syādevaṃ yadi svatantramatra vākyaṃ viniyojakaṃ bhavet । kintu darśapūrṇa- māsādhikāravidhisannidhisamāmnānavaśena tadekavākyatāpannam । tena darśapūrṇamāsāntargatasyaiva vedibarhirvidhessāṅgasambandhaḥ । ucyate— syādetadevaṃ yadi vedibarhiṣostaddharmāṇāñca sākṣāttadgatavedi- barhiṣoḥ svatantraṃ lavanādidharmavidhiḥ । (?) na ca piṇḍapitṛyajñahavi- rdarśapūrṇamāsavākyāntargatam, yena tatrāpi dharmavidhirbhavet । tathā ca sūtram—‘na tadvākyaṃ hi tadarthatvāt’ iti । darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇagṛhī- tatvena tadekavākyatvaṃ vaktavyam । prakaraṇañca pradhānasyaiveti pradhānasambandhaḥ prāpnoti, kathamaṅgasambandhaḥ ? ucyate—syādevaṃ yadi barhiṣastaddharmāṇāñca sākṣātpradhānasambandho bhavet । kintu pradhānīyahavirāsādanadvāreṇa vedabarhiṣostaddharmāṇāñca pradhānīya- vedabarhirdvāreṇa pradhānasambandho vaktavyaḥ । pradhānīyatvañca dvedhā bhavati—pradhānārthatvena pradhānopakārakatvena vā । tatra yadi pradhānārthahavirāsādanādisambandhaḥ puraskriyate, tadā vākya-
syātisaṅkoco bhavet । pradhānopakārakatāmātrābhyupagame tu na vākyavirodho nāpi prakaraṇavirodhaḥ । sambandhatvāñcopakārakatvameva dharmasambandhe prayojakam, na tu tādarthyam । taduktam— ‘anupakāriṇi hi sthitaṃ nopakaroti na ca tadartham (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1076) iti । tenāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—yaddarśapūrṇamāsopakārakaṃ haviḥ tadvedyāṃ barhiṣi samāsādayati, yā darśapūrṇamāsopakārikā vedistāṃ khanati, yaddarśapūrṇamāsopakārakaṃ barhistallunātīti । darśapūrṇamāsopakāra- katvañca yathā pradhānahaviṣāmevamaṅgaviṣāmapyaviśiṣṭam । pradhānāpūrva- gṛhītānāmapi dharmāṇāmaṅgapradhānārthatvaṃ yuktameveti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—sarveṣāmevāṅgapradhānahavi- rāsādanādīnāṃ vedibarhirādīnāṃ śeṣabhūtāḥ, śeṣatvasya prakaraṇā- prayuktatvādityati ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ yajamānadharmāṇāṃ pradhānārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
jyotiṣṭome keśaśmaśruṇorvapanaṃ, payovratāni, tapaścāmnātāni ।
teṣu sandehaḥ—kimaṅgapradhānārthāni ? uta pradhānārthāni ? iti । asminnadhikaraṇe yeṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yajamānagāmitvaṃ vyavasthāsyate, teṣāmeva viṣayatvam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi yajamānasya dvairūpyamasti—yāga- karttṛtvaṃ phalabhoktṛtvañca, tathāpi karttṛtvāvagamapūrvakatvādbhoktatvāva- gamasya sarveṣāmevāṅgapradhānānāmupakārapekṣitvātkartṛtvādyaṃśopanipāte ca yajamānasya sākṣotprayuktyā ca sāṅgapradhānakarttṛtvena sāṅga- pradhānopakāropapatteḥ karttṛtvāṃśopanipātādaṅgapradhānārthatvameva vapanādi- saṃskārāṇāmiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi karttṛtvāṃśopanipātinaḥ saṃskārā bhaveyuḥ । bhoktṛtvāṃśanipātinaśca te । karttṛtvasya saṃskārairvināpya- dhyayanamātraniṣpattitvenaiva sarvalokasiddhatvāt । phalabhoktṛtvaṃ tu na saṃskārairvinā bhavatīti na pramāṇāntarasiddham । tena phalabhoktṛtvāṃśa- eva yajamānasya yogyatāmādadhānāḥ kriyāḥ saṃskārā ityucyante । phalāpūrvasya ca pradhānajanyatvātpradhānārthā eva yajamānasaṃskārāḥ । tena yathāyānyadṛṣṭorthānyaṅgāni taiḥ phalabhoktṛtvam, na tatra nyāyena pūrvapakṣo viśeṣaṇam (?) dṛṣṭārthānyaṅgāni daikṣādīni phalayogyatā-
mādadhānānyevāṅgāni bhavanti, tathaite'pi saṃskārā iti siddhaṃ yajamānasaṃskārāṇāṃ kevalapradhānārthatvamiti ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe yadyaṅgārthatvamapi saṃskārāṇām, tadā daikṣādayo jyotiṣṭomāṅgāni vikāreṣvapi karttavyāḥ । siddhānte tu neti । sūtrantu—phalabhoktṛtvātsvāmibhūtayajamānasaṃyuktaṃ vapanādi pradhānasyaiveti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ saumikavederaṅgapradhānārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrayate—“triśatprakramā prācī caturviṃśatiragreṇa triṃśajjaghanena iyati śakṣyāmahe” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimevamāda- yo'ṅgapradhānārthāḥ ? uta pradhānārthāḥ ? iti । idānīṃ vicāradvayena pūrvoktapradhānārthatvāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“iyati śakṣyāmahe” iti vākyāccikīrṣā- saṃyogena saumikī mahāvediḥ śrūyate । pradhānatvañca phalavatvāt । tena cikīrṣāsaṃyogena śrutā vediḥ kevalapradhānārthaiveti । evamaparya-
vasita eva vicāre vicārāntaraṃ rvasūtragatasaṃyogāditi padānu- ṣaṅgalobhena prastūyate ।
chapter.head: atha caturthamabhimarśanasyāṅgapradhānārthatādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra śrūyate-“caturhotrā paurṇamāsīmabhi- mṛśet pañcahotrāmāvāsyāyām” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimaṅgapradhā- nārthamabhimarśanam ? uta pradhānārtham ? iti । atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ— paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ pradhānakarmasamudāyadvayārthatyāttayoścāmū- rttatvenābhimarśanāyogyatvāllakṣaṇayā paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoryo- gyatayā svāṅgabhūte haviṣi vṛttirvaktavyā । tathāca sati kevalapradhā- nārthamevābhimarśanamiti । tena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyābhidhānena saṃyogā- dabhimarśanapadābhidheyaḥ sparśaḥ caturhotṛmantreṇa pañcahotṛmantreṇa ca kriyamāṇaḥ pradhānahavissambaddha eva karttaṃvya iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: aparyavasite pūrvavicāre tāvatsiddhānto'bhidhīyate—
siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi pradhānamātraṃ cikīrṣitaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—yadi śakṣyāmahe asyāṃ karttumiti hi cikīrṣā pratīyate । pradhānamātrasya khalvalpaparimāṇavedyāmapi śakyānuṣṭhāna- tvāditi yadi śakṣyāmaha iti yo'yaṃ siddhānte mahāvedyāṃ
cikīrṣānirdeśaḥ, sa sarvāṅgopetajyotiṣṭomārthatva eva vederupapadyate, na pradhānamātrārthatve । pradhānamātrārthatvenāvasite deśe daikṣādi- sakalāṅgayuktasyaiva śakyakaraṇatvāt । teneyaṃ cikīrṣā vederaṅgapra- dhānārthatvameva pratipādayati । na ca vedeḥ sāṅgapradhānārthatvaṃ na sambhavati, deśaviśeṣātmakatvāt । deśakālayogaśca sāṅgapradhāna- prayogaviṣayatvāvadhāraṇāvirodhādvedeḥ sāṅgapradhānārthatvameva । yattu phalaṃ na cikīrṣitamityuktam । tadapyaviruddham, sāṅgasyaiva phalatvena cikīrṣitatvāt । tasmātsarvāṅgopetajyotiṣṭomārthaiva saumi- kamahāvediriti siddham । na ca vācyam—yadyaṅgadhānārthatvameva vederupadeśena, kathantarhi darśapūrṇamāsavikāreṣu dīkṣaṇīyādiṣu mahāvedeḥ prasaṅgenopakārakatvaprayojanañcāṅge vārttikakārapādairuktam । bhāṣyakāreṇa hi tathā vediprasaṅganyāyo dvādaśe darśitaḥ । sa ca nyāyaḥ prayojanabhaṅge'pyaviśiṣṭa iti na kiñcidanupapannam ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe'gnīṣomīyavikāre mahāvedirna karttavyā । siddhānte tu karttavyeti । sūtrantu—tadyukte sarvāṅgayukte phalaśruteḥ phalānvitasyaiva sarvāṅgaprayuktasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya vedyāṃ cikīrṣā syāditi ।।
idānīṃ dvitīyavicārapūrvapakṣe siddhānto'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāprātipadi- kadvayamatra lakṣaṇāvṛttaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—kālakarmatatsamudāyānā- manabhimraṣṭavyatvādavaśyaṃ tāvatpaurṇamāsīmamāvāsyāmityatra prakṛti- pratyayayoranyatareṇa lakṣaṇāvṛttena bhavitavyam । tatra yadyapi prakṛtipratyayayoḥ pratyayārthaḥ pradhānamiti guṇabhūtaṃ prātipadikameva lakṣaṇāvṛttamucitam । tāvatāpi tatsambandhyamāvāsyādiśabde'sati karttavyaviśeṣānavagamātprathamāvagatatvena prātipadikamukhyārthatvasyaivo- citatvātpaurṇamāsyamāvāsyāprātipadikadvayaṃ mukhyakālārthameva । dvi- tīyāvibhaktistu caramabhāvinī lakṣaṇayā saptamyarthe kalpate । paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāmiti tatrādhikaraṇatvameva na karmatvam । abhimarśanakarmaṇo haviṣo'dhikārādeva labdhatvāt । ataḥ kāladvā- reṇa mantradvayavyavasthārthamevedaṃ vākyadvayam—yatpaurṇamāsyāṃ haviḥ taccatuhotrā mantreṇābhimṛśet, yadamāvāsyāyāṃ havistatpañcahotrābhi- mṛśediti । tasmātpaurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsambandhihavirmātrābhimarśanāda- ṅgapradhānārthamevābhimarśanamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayora- dhikaraṇatvarūpaguṇavidhānātpaurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ kāladvayā- bhidhānaṃ sarvahavirabhimarśanārthamiti ।।
chapter.head: athaṃ pañcamaṃ dīkṣādakṣiṇayoḥ pradhānārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome dīkṣā śrūyate—“tisro dīkṣāḥ” iti । tathā dakṣiṇā śrūyate—“tasya dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇā” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ dākṣādakṣiṇamaṅgapradhānānām ? uta pradhānasyeti । idānīmaṅgapradhānārthatvamevātiprasaktamapodyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi “somasya dakṣiṇā” iti vacanā- ddikṣādakṣiṇayoḥ pradhānasambandha evāvagamyate, tathāpi “dīkṣitaḥ somaṃ krīṇāti” ityatra dīkṣitasyopādīyamānatvena vivakṣitadīkṣā- vidhiviśeṣaṇasyaiva yajamānasya somakrayādau karttṛtvena viniyogā- ddīkṣāyāṃ kartṛgāmitvaṃ pratīyate । kartuśca sāṅgapradhānārthatvāddīkṣāyā
api sāṅgapradhānārthatvameveti “somasya dīkṣeti” iti ṣa ṣṭhyabhidhesya sambandhasya sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vā'viruddhatvāddīkṣāyāścāṅgapradhānārtha- tvameva । dakṣiṇayāśca ṛtvigānamanārthatvasya vyaktatvādaṅgapradhānārthatvaṃ suvyaktameva । tamsāddīkṣādakṣiṇamaṅgapradhānārthameveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi “dīkṣā somasya” “dakṣiṇāḥ somasya” iti vacanadvayamanyathopapadyeta । tathāhi—kartṛgāmitvenāṅga- pradhānārthatvasya dīkṣādakṣiṇayornyāyata eva labdhatvāt tenāpi vacanena tadrūpa eva sambandhaḥ pratipādyate tadā vacanadvayamidanarthaka- mevāpadyeta । na ca sākṣātsambandhapratipādakatve sambhavati ṣaṣṭhīśruteḥ paramparāsambandhapratipādakatvamapyucitam । tena “somasya dīkṣā somasya dakṣiṇā” iti ca ṣaṣṭhīśrutyoraṅgapradhānārthatvabādhena dīkṣā- dakṣiṇayoḥ pradhānārthatvameva pratipādayati । nanu samānakarttṛsanni- pātitvena nyāyātsarvayāgārthatvaṃ bhavatu dīkṣāyāḥ, nyāyasya ca vacanabādhitatvāt । “dīkṣitaḥ somaṃ krīṇāti” ityādivacana- vaśātsomakrayādyaṅgārthatvamapi prāpnoti, kathaṃ pradhānamātrārthatvam । ucyate—ananyārthaṃ hi viśeṣaṇaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ viniyujyate, na tvanyārthatvameva pratītamapi । na hi “yajamānasammitaudumbarī bhavati” ityatra phalārthasya yāgasyāpuruṣaviśeṣaṇasyaudambarīsammāne vini-
yogādbhavati । tenātrāpi dīkṣāyā vacanena pradhānārthatvasyāvadhā- ritatvānna somakrayaṇe viniyogaḥ sambhavatīti siddhaṃ kevala- pradhānārthatvam । dakṣiṇāyāśca kevalapradhānārthāyā eva yathā prasaṅge- nāṅgopakārakatayā dvādaśe pratipādanīyam । ataḥ siddhaṃ dīkṣā- dakṣiṇayoḥ kevalapradhānārthatvamiti ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe somāṅgavikāreṣu dīkṣādakṣiṇayoḥ prāptiḥ । siddhānte tu neti । sūtrantu—vyaktārthameveti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣaṣṭhaṃ yūpāvaṭadeśalakṣaṇādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
asti jyotiṣṭome paśuragnīṣomīyaḥ—“yā dīkṣito yadagnī- ṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhate” iti । tatra yūpaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate— “vajro vai yūpo yadantarvedi minuyāttannirddahet, yadvahirvedi avaruddhaḥ syādardhamantarvedi minotyarddhaṃ bahirvedi, anavaruddho bhavati na nirdahati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimantarvedi iti yūpāṅgabhāvena vedirupa- diśyate ? uta “ardhamantarvedi ardhaṃ bahirvedi” iti deśalakṣaṇā- rthamucyate ? iti । idānīṃ pā/?/vanikāṅgatvāpavādenedamārabhyate ।
tatra ‘cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt’ ityatra sāṅgapradhānārthatvaṃ vedeḥ pratipāditaṃ virodhādyūpāṅgatvābhidhānamayuktamityetadadhikaraṇamarthātpūrvaṃ draṣṭavyam । anena tu yūpāṅgatve vedernirākṛte kiṃ kevalapradhānārthā ? uta sāṅgapradhānārtheti yukto vicāraḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“arddhamantarvedi minoti” ityanena vākyena mukhyavedireva yūpamānāṅgatvena vidhīyate, na tu lakṣito deśaḥ, lakṣaṇāprasaṅgādeva । “iyati śakṣyāmahe” iti sāmānya- vacanam । tadapi yūpamānaṃ yūpaviṣayamevopasaṃharttavyam । yūpamānantu iyati śakṣyāmaha iti । tathāca satyāparārddhamānaṃ tasyārthādeva bahiranuṣṭhānaṃ prāptamevocyate arddhaṃ vahirvedītyanena । yathā dīkṣā- dakṣiṇaṃ vacanātpradhānasya, tathā vedirapi yūpamānāṅgatvena vacanena vidhīyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi “arddhaṃ barhirvedi” ityasyānu- vādakatvaṃ kathañcidupapadyeta । tathāhi—yadi yūpamānaṃ nityavadanta- rvedi prasaktaṃ bhavet । arddhasyāntarvedyāṃ prāptatvātpunarvacanaṃ parisaṃkhyārthaṃ bhavediti niyamena tadardhamānasya bahirvedyāmeva prāptatvāttadarddhaṃ bahirve-
dyādyupapadyata eveti nityānuvādaḥ । atha yūpamānaṃ nityameva bahirvedi prasaktaṃ bhavettadāpyarddhasyāntarvedividhāne'rddhāntarasya bahireva sthitatvādbhavatyeva nityānuvādaḥ । na caitadubhayamapyasti । aniyame- nāntarvā yūpamāne'rddhamantarvedītyarddhasyāntarvedimāne vihite'rddhāntarasyā- pyaniyatadeśatvena vedyāmantarvā bahirvā mānaprasaktau bahirarddhamānasya nityātvānupapattiḥ । athārddhaṃ bahirvedītyetadapi vidhīyate, tadā vākya- bhedaḥ । na cārddhamevāntarvedīti vidhyarthaḥ sambhavati । yato vidhīyamānaṃ hi niyamyate, nānūdyamānaṃ vidhīyate । tena tādṛśamavadhāraṇamarddhamarnve- dyāmarddhaṃ bahirvedyāmiti । ato'ntabahirvedītyasya nityānuvādatvāsa- mbhavādantarvedibahirvediśabdābhyāṃ lakṣito deśa eva yūpamānāṅgatvena vidhīyate, na vediriti । tasmādvācanikayūpāṅgatvamiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe vederyūpāṅgatvādaṅgapradhānārthatā nāstīti । antarvedyāṃ śucīnāñca viniyogo'pyatra kāraṇam । (?) na nisargapa- dādīnāṃ viniyujyeta vā na veti । siddhānte na vedyāmaṅgapradhānahavīṃ- ṣyāsādayitavyāni । siddhānte vederyūpāṅgatvābhāvāt ‘cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt’ ityanena nyāyena vedyāmaṅgapradhānahavīṃṣyāsādayitavyāni । sūtrantu—deśa evāntarvedilakṣito vidhīyate na vediḥ । aśiṣyeṇa vidhyanuvādāsambhavādvākyenārddhaṃ bahirvedītyanenaikavākyatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ havirdhānasya sāmidhenyanaṅgātādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭāme śrūyate—“uta yatsunvanti sāmidhenīstadanvāhuḥ” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ sāmidhenīnāmaṅgabhāvena havirddhānaviśiṣṭāḥ sāmidhenyo'nuvaktavyāḥ ? uta havirddhānenāmūṣāmanūcyamānānāṃ deśo lakṣyata iti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yatsunvanti sāmidhenīstanvāhurityasya vā- kyasyāyamarthaḥ—yasmin havirddhāne homābhipavaṃ kurvanti tasmin havirddhāne sāmidhenīranuvadantīti । atra ca sāmidhenyarthavacanā- dhikaraṇatvena havirddhānaviśeṣavibhāgādvācanikameva havirddhānaviśeṣasya sāmidhenyanuvacanāṅgatvaṃ pratīyate । na pūrvavidhyanuvādatvena śeṣo mantrāntaraṃ tatra śrūyate । yena śrutivṛttiṃ parityajya deśalakṣaṇārthatā syāt । havirddhānamātrasyaiva śravaṇāt । na ca havirddhānadvāreṇa viniyuktatvātsāmidhenyanuvacane'pi viniyoge virodhaḥ, “puroḍāśa- kapālena tuṣānupavapati” itivadupapatteḥ । tasmāllakṣaṇākāraṇābhā- vātsābhidhenīsvadarthāṅgarītivacanena havirddhāna eva sāmidhenyaḥ, na
havirddhānamātrasya sāmidhenyanuvacanasambandho vaktavyo bhavet । tadā kasmin havirddhāna iti viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yasmin havirddhāne somābhiṣavaṃ karoti tasmin havirddhāne sāmidhenyanuvacanaṃ karttavya- mityupapadyate viśeṣavidhānañca । na cātra sāmānyasambandho'vagatapūrvaḥ । tena sāmānyasambandho'pi vidhātavyaḥ viśeṣasambandhaśceti vākyaṃ bhidyeta । na ca viśeṣasambandhādeva sāmānyasambandho'pyākṣepātse- tsyatīti vācyam । anyathaiva vacanopapatterarthāpattiparikṣayāt । tathāhi—jyotiṣṭome daikṣapaśuyāge dīkṣaṇīyāyāñca darśapūrṇamāsa- dharmātideśātsāmidhenyanuvacanaprāptiḥ । tasya ca “apareṇa vedim” iti prakṛtāveva śravaṇādvedyupadeśo'pyātideśādeva । jyotiṣṭome havirdhānadvaya- mapyatideśāt । aparedeśo'pi tathā dakṣiṇottarahavirddhānasānnipā- ...................tatra sāmānyenopadeśasambandhaprāptau viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yasminnityanena sannihita evāparadeśo lakṣitasāmidhenyanuvacanāṅga- tvena vidhīyate । kiñca havirddhānasāmidhenyanuvacanayoḥ kṛtārthatvenopa- rinirākāṅkṣatvāddeśopalakṣaṇatvameva yuktam । tathāhi—havirddhānaṃ tāvatsomādihavirddhāraṇenaiva kṛtārthatvadanuvacanamapi nāṅgatvena vidhī- yate । agnisamindhanaprakāśanenaiva kṛtārthamiti nānyagāmitvāpekṣeti deśalakṣaṇārthatvameva yuktam । na tu vācanikamaṃ havirddhānasya sāmidhe- nyanuvacanāṅgatvamiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe havirddhāna eva sāmidhenyo'nuvaktavyāḥ । siddhānte tu tatsamīpadeśa iti । sūtrantu—samīpadeśamātra evānu- vacanaṅgaṃ havirddhānam । yatastasya pratyakṣaṃ sphuṭameva nairākāṅkṣāpādakaṃ somadhāraṇameva prayojanabhūtamiti ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamaṃ yajamānabhinnakartrantarasadbhāvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatamaḥ
chapter.p: iha karmāṇyudāharaṇam—“agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ, darśa- pūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kimetāni karmāṇi svayamanuṣṭhātavyāni ? uta svargakāmaḥ svayaṃ juhūyāt śeṣamanyaḥ svayaṃ vā ? uta śeṣamanya eveti । kramasya śrutyādibhiḥ prakāraṇāntaiḥ saha virādhāvirodhau vicāritau । idānīṃ samākhyāyāḥ śrutyādibhireva kramāntaiḥ saha virodhāvirodhau nirūpyete ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“darśapūrṇāmāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” ityadhikāravidhiriyam । karmajanyaphalabhāgitvamadhikāraḥ । sa ca prakaraṇabalena sāṅgapradhāne prayogakarttṛtvāvagamāttatkālīna ityādhi- kāravidhivākyasyākhyātābhihitasya sāṅgapradhānakarturevākṣiptasya phalānvayaḥ pratīyate । tena yadi kiñcadapyaṅgaṃ yajamānaḥ svayaṃ na kuryāta tadāṅgapradhānakarttṛtvābhāvātphalamevāsya na syāt । tasmātsāṅgameva pradhānaṃ yajamānena karttṛvyamiti । hotrādisamākhyā caikasyaiva yajamānasya tattaddhotrādikarmasambandhanibandhanā bhaviṣyati । hotrādisamākhyā ca na sākṣātkarmaṇāṃ, kintvanuṣṭhitānāmeva tadvāreṇa karmāṇāmitaretarāśrayadoṣavaraṇabharaṇayoścādṛṣṭārthatvameva (?) ataḥ śāstraikapramāṇatvātphalasya śāstragamyaṃ phalaṃ sāṅgapradhāna- prayoktari yajamāna eva yasmādbhavati, tasmātsāṅgaprayāge yajamānaḥ svayameva ca karttā syāditi kartrantarāṇāmabhāvānna samākhyā viniyojiketi pūrvapramāṇaiḥ saha tatsamākhyāvirodhāvirodhavicāro- 'narthaka eveti ।

atha vā “svargakāmo yajeta” ityatra dhātuḥ pradhānakarma- mātrāvācī । tataḥ paravarttinā ca pratyayena pradhānakartturevopādānā- ttasyaiva svargaphalaṃ niyamyate । tena phalaṃ pradhānakarttureva । na ca
karttṛtvaṃ pradhānakarttureveti niyamaḥ । śaktau svayameva karotyaśaktā- vanyadvāreṇāpi । tasmāddevatoddeśatyāgarūpasya yāgasya pradhānatvā- ttanmātra eva phalārthī yajamānaḥ karttā śeṣabhūtāṅgakāriṣu na pradhānasya yaḥ karttā sa evāṅge syāttasmādanyo vetyaniyamaḥ । tathācoktam— ‘utsarge tu pradhānatvāccheṣakārī pradhānasya tasmādanyaḥ svayaṃ vā syāt’ (jai. sū., 3. 7. 19.) iti । niyamena kartrantarāṇāma- bhāvāt na samākhyā viniyojiketyatrāpi pakṣe vyartha eva samā- khyāvirodhāvirodhavicāra iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi “ṛtvijo vṛṇīte” iti vidhānaṃ “dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇā” ityādibharaṇavidhānaṃ ca na syāt । na caitaddṛṣṭārthaṃ, tatkarmasaṃyuktānāmṛtvijāṃ tvapekṣitānatīnāṃ sambandhitvena śravaṇāt । na ca dṛṣṭe karmakāritve sambhavatyadṛṣṭaṃ kalpayitumucitam । tenartvikparikrayārtho'yaṃ varaṇabharaṇādiḥ । yadi tu yajamānaḥ svayamevāṅgānyapi kuryāt, tadā parikrayasyā- tmanyasambhavātparikrayavidhibādhaḥ syāt । athānyo'pi pakṣe kuryāt, tathāpi nityavadāmnānaṃ virundhyāt । nityaparikrayasya nityatāṃ
karttumavaśyaṃ parikrayārhāṇi kartrantarāṇi upādātavyāni । ato yajamānasya pradhānahavirūtsarge sākṣātkarttṛtvameṅgeṣu tu prayukti- dvāreṇa । tenāyamadhikāravākyagatākhyātābhihitā bhāvanā gṛhīta- karttuparikraye prayoge phalārthikarttṛtvamākāṅkṣantī sākṣātprayukti- dvāreṇa yathoktameva karttṛtvamākṣipatīti na virodhaḥ । evamātmane- padasyāpi parikrayavatīṃ bhāvanāmāśrityāsyedṛśenaiva karttṛtvena phalo- pabhogaḥ sāmanakarttṛka iti svargakāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ virotsyata iti na kiñcidanupapannam ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—aṅgeṣvanya eva karttā syāt krayavidhānāt । tasya parikrayasya pratyagātmani virodhāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha navamamṛtviksaṃkhyāniyamādhikaraṇam
saṃśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p:
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa vyaktatvātsandeho na pradarśitaḥ । tenāya- mevātra sandehaḥ—kimaniyamenartvijaḥ kretavyāḥ ? uta niyamena
ṣoḍaśaiveti । yajamānavyatiriktā anye'pi krayopāttāḥ karttāro yatassanti tatasteṣāṃ parimāṇamidānīṃ prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—parikrayavidhyarthavatvāya khalu kartrantara- praveśaḥ । tadarthavatvañcaikasya dvayorvopādānena bhavatīti niyamena ṣoḍaśopādānaṃ na sambhavati । atha “svargakāmo yajeta” ityatra sāmānādhikaraṇyādātmanepadārthakṛtsnaprayogaphalārthinaḥ karttṛtve'vagate yāvanmātramabādhitvā parikrayavidheraśakyasamādhānaṃ tāvanmātrameva bādhitavyam । yajamānavyatiriktaikakartṛpraveśenaiva parikrayavidhirupa- panna ityeka evartvik parikretavyaḥ । tena parikrayavidhisāmarthyā- tkartṛparimāṇamaniyatam । eko dvau trayo vāṅgeṣu karttāraḥ, eka eva vā parikretavya iti yathāvārttikameveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatrāṅgāni bhinnakarmāṇi śrūyeran । tathāhi—“tān puro'dhvaryurvibhajati, pratiprasthātā manthinaṃ juhoti, neṣṭā patnīmabhyudānayati” ityādivākyaistattadaṅgasambandhitvena ṣoḍa- śaiva karttāro jyotiṣṭome śrūyante । prayogavidhinā ca sakartṛkāṇye- vāṅgatvena gṛhītāni ṣa teṣāmaṅgānāṃ tattatkartṛsambandhārthaṃ tāvanta eva
karttāra upādātavyāḥ yāvatsamākhyaṃ kartṛbhedaḥ । pradhānaikatve kartustatra karmasambandha eveti bādha evādhvaryavādisamākhyābhedo bhaviṣyati, kiṃ kartṛbhedābhyupagamena ? taduktama—‘aikasya karmabhedā- diti cet’ iti । ucyate—yadi karmānuṣṭhānavelāyāṃ taduttarakālaṃ vā samākhyāḥ śruyeran । tathāca lāvakādisamākhyāvadekasminnapi bhaveyuḥ prāgeva tattatkarmasambandhādvaraṇavelāyāmeva prayujyante । ‘adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīta’ ityādyāmnānena varaṇāni bhinnānyeva । punaḥ śruterabhyāsādeva bhinnāni । tena yāvadvaraṇaṃ vākyabhedaḥ । na caikasyaiva puruṣasya nānāvaraṇāni bhaviṣyantīti vācyam । yasmāt dṛṣṭārthaṃ varaṇamānatidvāreṇa karmārthamupādanaṃ prayojanam । na caikena varaṇenopāttasya kṛtakaratvātpunarupādānaṃ sambhavati । nanu loke nānākarmakaraṇāya ekasyāpi kartuḥ vibhinnairupādānairvibhinnā- natidvāreṇa punarupādānaṃ dṛśyata eva । evamatrāpi bhinnairvaraṇai- rbhinnānatidvāreṇaikasyāpi punaḥ punarupādānaṃ bhaviṣyati । maivam; syādevaṃ yadi lokavadādhvaryavādikarmakaraṇārthamatra varaṇaṃ bhavet । kintu jyotiṣṭomaprayogavidhiparigṛhītasya varaṇasya “ṛtvijo vṛṇīte” iti ṛtvigdvāreṇa jyotiṣṭomārthatvam । ataḥ karmārtha- dvāreṇa । tatra hyekasya karturvaraṇena jyotiṣṭomārthamupādānaṃ jātameveti varaṇāntareṇa punarupādānaṃ kartavyameveti । kiñca ṛtvijāmetā
ādhvaryavādisaṃjñāḥ, utpattisaṃyogāt । tena yathā ‘saṃjñā cotpatti- saṃyogāta’ ityanena karmaṇāṃ bhedaḥ tathā kartṝṇāmapīti । taduktaṃ sūtrakṛtā—‘notpattau’ iti । tasmātsamākhyayā ṣoḍaśaivartvijo jyotiṣṭoma upādātavyā iti siddham ।
prayojanama—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—ādhvaryavādiśrutibhedā- tpratināmadheyaṃ bhinnā eva karttāro bhaveyuriti ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ camasādhvaryubhedādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: santi jyotiṣṭome camasādhvaryavaḥ “camasādhvaryūn vṛṇīte” iti । teṣu sandehaḥ—kimeta evocyante ? utaibhyo'nye ? iti । idamanuprasaṅgādvicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—‘adhvaryu vṛṇīte’ ityādiṣvādhvaryavādi- śabdānāṃ prākprasiddhārthatvādyāvatsamākhyaṃ bhavatu karttṛbhedaḥ । camasādhvaryava ityatrādhvaryupuruṣāṇāmeva camasasambandhamātrātirekaḥ,
na tu karttṛbhedaḥ । varaṇañca teṣāṃ bhedena ṛtvijāmājñākaraṇārthaṃ yajamānena kriyate, na tu kriyājñākaraṇārthā । tadarthaṃ pūrvameva teṣāṃ vṛtatvāt । tasmātṣoḍaśānāmevā'nyatamāścamasādhvaryava iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi tatropādānaṃ bhavet । tathāhi— “madhyataḥ kāriṇāṃ camasādhvaryavo hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ” iti teṣūpadiśyante । ṣoḍaśasu madhye catvāro madhyataḥ kāriṇo vedanibandhanaśca ṣapṭhyantavyapadeśaḥ । tena daśānāmeva sambandhitvena vyapadeśā bhavanti । teṣāṃ madhye pratisambandhinaścamasādhvaryavaḥ । na cāvasita eva ṣaṭcamasādhvaryava iti vācyam । daśaca/?/masambandhena daśatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt ।
prayojanam—pakṣotkam । sūtrantu—camasādhvaryavo'pyanya eva daśabhiścamasaiḥ sambandhitvena vyapadeśāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikādaśaṃ camasādhvaryūṇāṃ bahutvādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: teṣveva sandehaḥ—kimaniyama eko dvau bahavaḥ ? uta bahava eveti । etadapyanuprasaṅgena vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—camasādhvaryūṇāmuddeśyatvāduddeśyagatasaṃkhyāyā grahaikatvavadavivakṣitvātsaṃkhyāntarānapekṣitvādbhavatvavivakṣā । iha tu camasārdhvayūṇāṃ prāganavagatasaṃkhyākatvātsaṃkhyāyāścāvaśyāpekṣaṇīya- tvācchutatvenaiva bahutvameva parigṛhyate । tasmādbahava eva camasādhvaryava upādātavyā iti । atra ca prāptoddeśyaviśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitamityetadeva vyutpādyata iti vaktavyam । anantarādhikaraṇa eva daśatvasiddherana- rthakamidamadhikaraṇamiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—utpattau prathamaṃ jñātameva “camasādhvaryūn vṛṇīte” iti bahutvaśruterbahava eveti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvādaśaṃ camasādhvaryūṇāmiyattādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome santi camasādhvaryavaḥ । te ca bahava ityuktam । kiyantaḥ punaste bahavaḥ ? iti sandehaḥ । etadapyanuprasaṅgādeva vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapajñaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣa—“camasādhvaryūn vṛṇīte” iti bahutvamātraṃ śrūyate । tacca ‘prathamaṃ vā niyamyeta’ (jai. sū. 11. 1. 42) iti kapiñjalanyāyena triṣveva caritārthamiti traya eva camasādhvaryūva iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi daśatvapratipādakaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavet । tatra hi madhyataḥkāriṇo hotrakāśca ṛtvijaścamasādhvaryūṇāṃ svāmina ityuktameva । tena pratiniyatā daśaiva camasādhvaryavaḥ, tathā camasādhvaryūṇāṃ vyāpāraviṣayāśca daśaiva camasāḥ । na ca trayāṇāṃ daśa svāminaḥ sambhavanti । na caikadā trayāṇāṃ vyāpāraviṣayāśca daśa camasāḥ sambhavanti । tathā jyotiṣṭomavikāre daśapeyayāge daśa camasādhvarvaḥ “daśa daśaikaikaṃ camasamanuprasarpanti” iti । sa cānu-
vādaḥ, prakṛtau camasādhvaryūṇāṃ daśatve sati sambhavet । anuvāda- liṅgadarśanādapi daśaiva camasādhvaryava iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—daśa camasādhvaryavo na tu bahutvaṃ tritve, daśatvameva camasādhvaryūṇāmiti liṅgadarśanādapi ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ śamiturapṛthaktvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti śamitā “śamitā paśuṃ nayati” iti । sa kiṃ kīrtti- tānāmanyamaḥ ? utānyastebhyaḥ ? iti । idānīṃ pūrvāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—autpattiko hi saṃjñapane saṃjñibhedaḥ prakṛtapraveśasambhavena balavatā kvacidapodyetāpi । yathā dākṣāyaṇa- saṅkramayajñādau । na ceha prakṛtapraveśaḥ sambhavati । eṃva hi śrūyate— “klomā cārddha vaikartanañca śamituḥ tadbrāhmaṇāya dadyāt, yadyabrāhmaṇaḥ syāt” iti । na ca ṛtvijāṃ madhye kaścidabrāhmaṇo'sti yathā- vatpaśārvapādyuddharaṇarūpakāryakarttṛtvena śamitetyucyate । ṣoḍaśānāmeva-
rtvijāṃ brāhmaṇatvaniyamāt śamiteti saṃjñābhedāt prakṛtebhyo'nya eva paśoḥ śamiteti । eṃva prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadīyamutpattiyoginī saṃjñā bhavet । yadi “camasādhvaryūna vṛṇīte” itivat ‘śamitāraṃ vṛṇīte’ iti śrūyeta, tadā varaṇabhede sati vṛtasya varaṇāsambhavādutpattāveva bhinnakarttṛsambandhinī (?) deśāt । athavā hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhva- ryava itivadvyapadeśabhedo bhavet । caivamasti । kintarhi ? siddhavat “śamitā paśumupanayati” iti śrūyate । śaknoti cādhvaryuvadeva vihitatvena śamanayogācchamitṛśabdo varttitum । na ca “śamitā paśuṃ gṛhṇāti” iti śravaṇādadhvaryośca vyāpārāntaraniviṣṭatvātkartṛbheda iti vācyam । yato'dhvaryorvyāpṛtatvenāpi tatpratipuruṣāṇāṃ karttṛtvaṃ sambhavati, “itaramanyasteṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt” iti nyāyāt । yattu “yadyabrāhmaṇaḥ syāt” iti liṅgadarśanaṃ, tadayuktam; prāpakapramā- ṇābhāve sati yajamānaviṣatvena tadupapatteḥ traivarṇikasyādhikārāda- brāhmaṇo'pi bhavatyeva । tenāyamarthaḥ—yadyabrāhmaṇo yajamānaḥ syāt, tadā homārthaṃ brāhmaṇāya dadyāditi । tasmātprakṛtānāmevā- nyatamaḥ śamiteti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—prakṛtānāmevānyatamaḥ śamitā । prakaraṇācchamitṛsaṃjñāyā adhvaryvādisaṃjñānāmivotpattisaṃ- yogābhāvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśamupagātṝṇāmapṛthaktvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome—santyupagā nāmartvijaḥ । te kimadhvaryādibhyo- 'nye ? utānyatama iti । pūrvanyāya evādhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ cakāreṇātidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: ayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryava itivanmu- khyaśamiteti prakṛtasambandhitvena vyapadeśābhāvācchamituḥ prakṛteṣve- vāntarbhāvaḥ । iha tu upa samīpe gāyantītyupagāḥ prakṛtaprati- sambandhyapekṣāḥ । tataścamasādhvaryuvattenopadeśabhedātprakṛtebhyo'nya evopagā iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyupagāḥ prakṛtebhyo'nyatvamantareṇa nopapadyeran । gāyantamṛtvijamupagāyantītyupagāḥ । ayañca vyapadeśaḥ
prakṛtamapi gāyantamṛtvijamityupapadyate । tathā liṅgadarśanamapi vinigamanāpramāṇam “nādhvaryurupagāyet” iti prakṛtānāmupagāna- prasaktāvadhvaryorniṣedha upapadyate । ataḥ prakṛtānāmevānyatama upagā iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣotkam । sūtrantu—yathā śamitā tathopagāḥ prakṛtānāmevānyatame, adhvaryupratiṣedharūpaliṅgadarśanāt ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ somavikretuḥ pṛthaktvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: asti somavikrayī । tatra sandehaḥ kimadhvaryvādīnāma- nyatamaḥ ? utaibhyo'nya eveti । pūrvāpavādenāyaṃ vicāraḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ yadyapi somavikrayī sākṣāttadaṅgatvenā- vihitaḥ । na ca vikrayaṃ vinā krayo bhavati । tena krayavidhinaivārthā- kṣipto vikrayavidhiriti so'pi karmāṅgakarttā । sa ca prakṛta evopātta iti prakṛtānāmevānyatamaḥ somavikrayīti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi krayavidhirvikrayavidhimapekṣeta । sa tu rāgaprāptalokasiddhavikrayaprāptyaivopapadyate । na tu tadvidhima- pyākṣipati । tena vikrayasyānaṅgatvena prakṛtartvikkartṛkatvamiti bhavati prakṛtebhyo'nya eva somavikrayīti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—somavikrayī punaḥ prakṛtebhyo'nya eva vikrayasya karmāṅgatvenācoditatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśaṃ sarveṣāmṛtvikchabdāvācitādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: ya ete puruṣā jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyante, te kiṃ sarva evartvijaḥ ? uta kecideṣāmiti । vahavastāvajjyotiṣṭomasya karttāra iti nirūpitam । idānīṃ kiṃ te sarva evartvijaḥ ? uta kecideveti prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—yaugiko'yamṛtvikchabda ṛtuyajanayoganimittaḥ ।
ṛtau yajantīti ṛtvijaḥ । sarva eva carttau yajanti jyotiṣṭomasya karttāraḥ । tena sarveṣāmevartviktvam । nanu “saumyasyādhvarasyartvijaḥ saptadaśa” iti vacanenetareṣāṃ samākhyāto (?) saptadaśaivartvijaḥ pratīyante । naitadevam; parisaṅkhyāyāṃ tridoṣāpatteḥ । vacanantu dvādaśakapāle vidhiyamāne “yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati” ityādivatsa- rveṣāmevartviktve saptadaśānāṃ pratyarthavādatvena śrutyarthenaivopapannam । tasmādṛtuyajanakarmakāritvātsarva evartvija iti । evaṃ prāpto'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi vedena “saumyasyādhvarasya saptadaśartvijaḥ” iti parigaṇanaṃ kriyeta । na ca “yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati” itivatstutyarthaḥ । tatra hi vidheyabhūtadvādaśakapālarūpa- mahāsaṃkhyopādānāddvādaśakapālastutyarthatvaṃ bhavatyaṣṭatvādīnām, iha tu mahāsaṃkhyāyā anupādānātsaptadaśaśabdasya syutyarthatvamanupa- yuktama । tena yathāprāptānuvada evāyaṃ saptadaśartvija iti । tathā ca saptapyṛtuyajanayoge brahmādīnāṃ svāmisaptadaśānāmeva ṛtvi- ktvaprāptiḥ tadanantarādhikaraṇa eva bhaviṣyati । tena jyotiṣṭome saptadaśartvija iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe sarveṣāmevartviktvasambandhaḥ । siddhānte tu saptadaśānāmeveti । sūtrantu—na sarveṣāṃ, kintu svāmisaptadaśā- nāmeva । parisaṃkhyānātparigaṇanāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptadaśamṛtviṅniyamādhikaraṇam
chapter.p: saptadaśartvija iti samadhigatam । kathaṃ saptadaśetīdānīmanuprasa- ṅgannirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—saumyasyādhvarasya saptadaśartvijastathāpi prakṛteṣu madhye ke te saptadaśeti nirdhdāraṇakāraṇābhāvādaniyamena keciditi । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra nirddhāraṇakāraṇābhāvaḥ syāta । tathāhi—“ṛtvigbhyo dadāti” iti nirddiśya dakṣiṇadānakramapare vākye śrūyate—“prathamamagnīdhe dadāti” iti । tato brahmaṇe tato'muṣmai ceti ṣoḍaśaiva dakṣiṇāsaṃyāgena paripāṭhitāḥ । tena ya evāgnīdā-
dayaḥ ta evartvijaḥ prākprasiddhadakṣiṇādānakramapare vākye vedenābhya- nujñānāditi bhavati nirddhāraṇam । tathā satre ‘ye yajamānāsta ṛtvija’ iti yajamānartvikchabdayoḥ samānaviṣayayornirdiśya dīkṣākra- mapare vākye yajamānasaṃskāradīkṣā brahmādiṣu darśayati । eta- tadaivopapatsyate, yadi brahmādaya ṛtvija iti । tathā yaugiko'ya- mṛtvikchabdaḥ । yajanayogaścamasādhvaryusādhāraṇaḥ । ataḥ kathaṃ samāne pravṛttinimitte na camasādhvaryava ṛtvija iti । ucyate—pratyeka- śaśśatkivailakṣaṇyenaiva vyavasthopapatteḥ । tathāhi—gacchatītyatra pratyayaḥ samānapadopāttadhātvarthaviśeṣitāmeva bhāvanāmabhidhatte । pacatītyatra tu taṇḍulāśrayapākarūpadhātvarthaviśeṣitāmeva bhāvanāmabhidhatte । tathā ṛtuyājipadaparatvenākṣiptapratyayaḥ brahmādyavyabhicāriyaṣṭavyārthaviśeṣe karttari sādhuriti prayogadarśananiyamādavadhāryate । tena yaugiko- 'pyayaṃ saptadaśatvena niyata iti ।

athavā yogarūḍho'yamṛtvikchabdaḥ ye ṛtuyajanasamarthā yaja- mānārthakāriṇaḥ, ta evartvijaḥ । teṣveva ṛtvikjāteṣu ṛtvi- kchabdaprasiddheḥ । ṛtuyajanasamarthāśca brahmādya eva । teṣāmeva smṛtito yajiniyamāt । na caivaṃ sati camasādhvaryaveṣvapi prasaṅgaḥ । teṣāṃ satyapyavayavārthatve ṛtvigarthakarmakāritvena vṛtānāṃ yajamānārthakarmakarasvarūpasamudāyārthābhāvāta । na caivaṃ sati vakṣya-
māṇayajanaṛtviktvānupapattiḥ । tasyāpi svārthameva ṛtuyajanaka- raṇāt । yeṣāntu varaṇoptādyamṛtviktvaṃ, teṣāmeva ca ṛtau yajana- niyamavidhānānna rūḍhaṃ takṣaṇādivadavayavārthavaśena yogāpannānāmṛ- tvijāmiti varaṇādyutpādyamalaukikamṛtviktvamāśritaṃ bhaviṣyati yathāvasthitavacanavyaktiviparyāsena vacanavyaktivarṇanaṃ bhaviṣyati । tasmādbrahmādaya eva saptadaśartvijo na camasādhvaryava iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe yeṣu keṣucitsaptadaśartvikṣu karmasambandhaḥ । siddhānte tu brahmādiṣveveti । sūtrantu—brahmādināmevartviktva- niyamaḥ । teṣāmevāhatya dīkṣādakṣiṇāsambandhāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭādaśaṃ yajamānasaptadaśatvādhikaraṇam
saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: etaduktaṃ saptadaśarvija iti । te ca brahmādayaḥ । tatra sandehaḥ— kiṃ teṣāṃ sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ ? uta gṛhapatiriti । idamapyanuprasaṅgādeva nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: ayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—brāhmādiṣoḍaśātiriktāścamasādhvaryyusadasya- yajamānāḥ santi । tatra na tāvaccamasādhvaryūṇāṃ madhye kaścidanyatamaḥ । teṣāṃ bahutvenānyatamanirddhāraṇakāraṇābhāvāt । sadasyayajamānayostu madhye parārthakarmaparatvasāmānyātsamardhapravṛttitvātsadasya eva saptadaśa iti । na cāsya ṛtuyajanakarttṛtvaṃ nāsti । mantrāvekṣaṇenaiva karttṛtvāt । tena sadasyasaptadaśā evartvija iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi sadasyasya ṛtuyajanakarttṛtvaṃ bhavet । na cāvekṣaṇaṃ nāmāṅgapradhānayormadhye kaścitpadārtho yajñe vṛto'sti, yena karttṛtvaṃ bhavet । nāpi brahmādīnāmiva dīkṣā dakṣiṇayorvāsya saṅkīrttanamasti । kintvavekṣaṇamātramasyāsti । na caitāvatā kartṛtvamasti । camasādhvaryuṣveva vyabhicārāt । yajamānasya tu yajanaṃ tāvadasti । tathā dīkṣāvākyeṣu “adhvaryu- rgṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā” ityatra saṅkīrtanamasti । dakṣiṇavākye tvasaṅkīrtanaṃ svārthe karmaṇi dakṣiṇāyā abhāvādevopapannaṃ nartviktvaṃ vyāvartayitumalam । yajamānārthayajanakartṛtvaṃ svayameva yajamānatvāda- styeveti pūrvādhikaraṇa evoktam । tena yajamānasaptadaśā evartvija iti siddham ।
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa siddhāntahetutayā brahmatiriktasadasyo nāstītyuktam, na tattathādartavyam । “sadasyaṃ vṛṇīte” ityutpatti- śiṣṭavaraṇasambandhādevādhvaryvādivatsadasyasyāpi bhedasiddheḥ । tadutkam-
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1102)
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe sadasyasyāpyṛtvigdharmāḥ kartavyāḥ । siddhānte tu neti । sūtrantu—svāmisaptadaśā evatvijo yajamāna- karmakaraṇasāmānyāditi ।।
chapter.head: athaikonaviṃśamṛtvijāṃ niyatapadārthakartṛtvādhikaraṇam
saṃśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p:
svāmisaptadaśā jyotiṣṭomasyartvijaḥ samadhigatāḥ । athedānīṃ sandihyate-kiṃ sarvaṃ puruṣakāryaṃ taiḥ kāryam, agnibhiśca gārhapatyādibhiḥ sarvāgnikāryam ? uta kācidvyavastheti । atra yadyapi vicāradvayaṃ pūrvapakṣasūtramidamabhipretya bhāṣyakāreṇa na vivecitam । svakāla- tvādityasya pūrvapakṣe hetutvāsambhavātsiddhāntāntarānabhidhānāt
pūrvapakṣe'bhimatavicārasiddhamuttarasūtramiti vivektavyam । tatrotpādyā- nubhūtaṃ karttṛbhedaprasaṅgaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ prakṛtasamākhyāyāḥ śrutyādibhiḥ saha virodhāvirodhavicāraḥ kriyate । atra yadyapi bhāṣyakāreṇa sarvaṃ puruṣakāryaṃ sarvaiḥ kartavyamityaviśeṣeṇoktam, tathāpi “purādhvaryu- rvibhajati” iti “maitrāvaruṇaṃ prepyati cānyāha” ityādau vākya eva kartṛviśeṣasambandhaḥ pratīyate । tatra śīghrapravṛttenāpyavaruddhaviṣaye samākhyāyā viniyojakatvāsambhavātsamākhyāviṣayakāryagocara evāyaṃ vicāraḥ ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yatra prakaraṇe vācanika eva kartṛviśeṣasambandhastatra kartṛgatākāṅkṣāviraheṇa liṅgaprakaraṇayo- rvyāpāradvācanikyeva kartṛvyavasthā । samākhyāyāstu vyapadeśamātra- paratvam । vyapadeśaścānekakartṛsambandhinānyatareṇāpi sambhavatyeva । (?) yathādiviṣayormatādikakasyamāneti vyapadiśyate na ca praka- raṇe'pi samākhyā śrūyate । yenotpattāveva yathākathañcitkartṛ- sambandhapratipādanenāpi padārtheṣu nairākāṅkṣyamāpādayet । tena liṅgaprakaraṇābhyāṃ samākhyāṃ bādhitvā sarva eva karttāraḥ sarveṣveva padārtheṣu viniyujyante । sarvapadārthakaraṇārthameva teṣāṃ kartrantareṇa prayuktatvāditi । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayaprabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi samākhyāyāḥ kartṛviśeṣa- sambandhamantareṇārthavatvaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—vedaprayukteyaṃ hotrādi- samākhyā sānyenāpi kartrantareṇa niyamena hautramiti hotṛkartṛtve- naiva vyapadiśyate । loke tu pramāṇāntaraprāptimātropa- yogitvādvyapadeśasya bhavatyanyatareṇāpi vyapadeśaḥ । tanmātreṇāpi tadupapatteḥ । vede tu samākhyāyāḥ kartṛviśeṣasambandhapratipādana- mantareṇa nānyatprayojanamastīti samākhyānyathānupapatyā hotraiva tatkartavyāmiti śrutiranumīyate । na ca liṅgaprakaraṇābhyāṃ virodhaḥ ? viniyogasya vyavasthitavikalpaparihārārthaṃ tābhyāmeva samākhyāyā apekṣitatvāt । tasmādyathāsamākhyameva kartṛbhiḥ padārtho'nuṣṭhātavya iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—samākhyayā tatkartṛsa- mbandhātkarmaṇaḥ kartṛvyavasthā syāt samākhyāvagatakartṛsambandhasyārtha- vatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha viṃśamagnīnāṃ sarvārthatvādhikaraṇam ।
saṃśayaḥ
chapter.p: idānīṃ prasaṅgādagniṣu vicāryate—kimagnayaḥ prakṛtyarthā eva ? uta prakṛtivikṛtyarthāḥ ? iti । tatrādhānādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasūtrameva ‘tatprakṛtyartha yathānyenārabhyavādā’ iti pūrvapakṣe hetutayānumātavyam ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: tatrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatvādhānasyānārabhyaśrutatvenālaukikā- gnyarthatvena kratvaṅgatvābhāvādaprakṛtyarthatvam । agnīnāntu kratvaṅgatvena khādiratvādivata ‘prakṛtau vādviruktatvāt’ ityanena kevala- prakṛtyarthatvameveti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—

ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi khādiratvādiṣvivātra dvirukti- doṣo bhavet । tathāhi-homadvāreṇa hi prakṛtiṣvāhavanīyaprāptiḥ । taddvāraṃ vikṛtiṣvapyudiṣṭameva homarūpamasti । agnyuddeśena hi vikṛtau dvāralābhaḥ khādiratvādau tu dvirutkidoṣo bhavati । na copadiṣṭe home vikṛtiṣvatideśena homadvāraprāptiḥ । tenopadiṣṭahomairyāva- tprakṛtivikṛtyarthatvamevāgnīnāmiti । natu yajatyutpattiṣvapi vikṛtiṣu homarūpadvārasyātideśādeva labhyamānatvāditi ।
taduktam—

lg.l: śāstreṇa coditā ye hi darvihomāḥ svarūpataḥ ।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1104)

prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe'gnitraye guṇakāmaḥ śrūyate । tasya vikṛ- tiṣvapravṛttiḥ । siddhānte tu pravṛttiriti । sūtrantu—agnayaśceti cakāro'yaṃ tuśabdārthaḥ । tenāyamarthaḥ—agnayaḥ prakṛtivikṛtisarva- kāmārthāḥ svakālatvāt । anārabhyavihitatvādityarthaḥ । tenaitatsūtraṃ nyāyapragarśanārthameveti siddham ।।
chapter.head: athaikaviṃśa viśeṣasamākhyayā sāmānyasamākhyābādhādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
kimeṣa evotsargaḥ sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ samākhyātaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kartta- vyamiti । neti brūmaḥ । atra pūrvapakṣasya tucchatvādbhāṣyakāreṇa kimeṣa evotsarga iti praśnenaivopakramya neti brūma iti siddhānto
varṇitaḥ । tenātreyaṃ viṣayaśuddhiḥ—ādhvaryavamiti samākhyāte padārthasamūhe neṣṭrīyamiti padārthaviśeṣasamākhyā, tathā hautramiti samākhyāte asti potrīyamiti padārthaviśeṣasamākhyā । tatra kiṃ viśeṣasamākhyayā sāmānyamākhyāyā vikalpaḥ ? atha viśeṣasa- mākhyayā sāmānyamākhyāyā bādha iti । pūrvāpavādatvenaivaṃ vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—samānyaviṣayaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ viśeṣaviṣayeṇa śīghra- pravṛttena bādhyate । samākhyā tu yaugikatvātsarvatra viśeṣaviṣayā । atastulyabalatvātsamākhyāyā vikalpenaiva kartṛsambandha iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi sāmānyasamākhyāviśeṣasamā- khyayostulyabalatvaṃ bhavet । tathāhi—yadyapi sāmānyasamākhyā yaugikatvena viśeṣaviṣayiṇī, tathāpyanekaviśeṣaviṣayatayā sāmā- nyaśrutikalpanayā vilambinī । viśeṣasamākhyā tu niyataikapadārtha- gocaratvena viniyojakaśrutikalpanayā śīghrabhā/?/vinī । tena balavatvā- dviśeṣaśrutereva sāmānyasamākhyābādha eveti na kartṛvikalpaḥ । yadvyapadeśagrahaṇaṃ sūtre taddṛṣṭāntaḥ । balābalādhikaraṇa evopadeśataḥ
sāmākhyābādhasya varṇitatvāt । tenāyamarthaḥ—yathāpadeśena śīghra- pravṛttena sāmānyasamākhyā bādhyate, tathā viśeṣasamākhyayāpīti । athavottaravicāraprastāvanārthaṃ pūrvokta evopadeśataḥ samākhyābādhaḥ smāritaḥ ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam sūtrantu—sāmānyasamākhyāpratipādi- tasya viśeṣasamākhyāyā narddeśādupadeśenāpavāda iti ।।
chapter.head: atha dvāviṃśaṃ praiṣānuvacanasya maitrāvaruṇakartṛtādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti jyotiṣṭome paśuragnāṣomīyaḥ—“yo dīkṣito yadagnī- ṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhata” iti । tatredamāmananti—“tasmātmaitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānvāha” iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kiṃ sarvānuvacaneṣu praiṣeṣu ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāta ? uta yatrānuvacanaṃ tatra praiṣaḥ ? iti । sāmānyasamākhyāyā viśeṣasamākhyayā bādhe nirūpite idānīṃ yatra vacanena sāmānyasamākhyāyā bādhāḥ sa kiṃ sarvaviṣayaḥ ? utaikadeśaviṣaya iti prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvapakṣastu—sarvapraiṣāṇāmādhvaryavasamākhyayādhvaryukarttṛkatvam । sarvānuvacanānāñca hautrasamākhyāyā hotṛkarttṛtvam । evañca sati praiṣeṣu vacanāni tānyubhayakarttṛkāṇi prāpnuvanti । viśeṣeṇa ca praiṣo vacanata upadeśena maitrāvaruṇopādānaṃ pratīyate । tatra yadyapi “preṣyati cānvāha” iti caśabdātsamuccayo'vagamyate, tathāpyu- ddeśagatatvenāvivakṣitatvātsakalapraiṣānuvacanamātroddeśenaiva maitrāvaruṇo- vidhīyata iti । evaṃprāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra viśeṣo nāvagamyate । tathāhi—vede puronuvākyāvidhitaḥ sapraiṣamanuvacanaṃ pratīyate । taccaikapadārtharūpatvādekena karttavyam । na cānuvacanakarttā hotā praiṣitumarhati । na cādhvaryuranuvacanaṃ karttumarhati । praiṣakarttā hi preṣate । tenaiva puronuvākyānurūpaṃ praiṣānuvacanaṃ kartṛsāpekṣam । tatsannidhau ca “maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānvāha” iti śrūyamāṇapekṣi- tavidhānātsannihitaviṣayamavadhāryate । kiñca sāhacaryavaśādapi yatraivāpekṣitaṃ tatra maitrāvaruṇavidhānamucitam । “maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānvāha” ityatra sahacarita eva praiṣānuvacanaḥ pratāyate, puronu-
vākyayā ca tayoḥ sāhacaryamavagamyate । evaṃ prathamaṃ pratīyate । tena maitrāvaruṇavidhirna kevaleṣvanuvacaneṣviti na sarvatra sāmānyasamākhyā- bādha iti siddham ।
prayojana—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—puronuvākyāsveva maitrā- varuṇavidhiḥ sapraiṣānuvacanatvena tāsāmeva sannidhānāt ।।
chapter.head: atha trayoviṃśaṃ camasahomeṣvadhvaryukartṛtvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: santi camasādhvaryaḥ । teṣu sandehaḥ—kiṃ camasādhvaryavaścama- sāñjuhuyuḥ utādhvaryuriti ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—camasādhvaryuriti viṣayasamākhyeyam—camasā- dhvaryorvyāpāraṃ karotīti । camasādhvaryuvyāpāraścātra homādiḥ । tena ca yadyanye camasena praṇyanāsādanahomādi kuryustadaiva camasādhvaryavo bhaveyuḥ । ādhvaryavasamākhyā tu samānyarūpā grahacamasādinā- nāpadārthaviṣayā । ataḥ sāmānyarūpādhvaryavasamākhyāṃ bādhitvā
camaseṣu camasādhvaryuṇaiva viśeṣasamākhyānāddhomādi karttavyamiti । evaṃ prāpto'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadāyaṃ viśeṣasamākhyā sāmānya- samākhyāṃ bādhitumarhati । sā khalu viśeṣasamākhyā sāmānya- samākhyāṃ bādhate, yā tannirapekṣā pravarttate । “camasādhvaryavo bhaveyuḥ” iti vacavamadhvaryuṃ tatpravṛttiñca pratipādayati । tadyathā- dhvaryureva camasairna juhoti kathaṃ te camasairhoma kuryuriti camasā- dhvaryavo bhaveyuḥ । na ca grahagatādhvaryuvyāpārāpekṣayaiva camaseṣvadhvaryurbha- vatīti camasādhvaryava iti vaktavyam । sāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva vyāpārapratītau satyāṃ vyadhikaraṇavyāpārapratītyayogāta । ato'tra camaseṣu sāmānyasamākhyāprāpto'dhvaryurviśeṣasamākhyayā na bādhyate । camasādhvaryusamākhyā caiṣāmadhvayoṃraśaktau camaseṣu homādikaraṇā- dbhaviṣyati ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—adhvaryuścamaseṣu juhuyā- ttasyaivoktaprakāreṇa nyāyyatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha caturviśaṃ śyenāderanekakartṛtvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: astyaudgātre samāmnātaḥ śyenaḥ, ādhvaryave vājapeyaḥ । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ śyene udgātṛbhireva padārthāḥ karttavyāḥ vājapeye'- dhvaryubhiḥ ? utobhayatra nānāṛtvigbhiḥ ? iti । idānīṃ prasaṅgā- tprakṛtasamākhyayorbādhyabādhakabhāvo nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—śyenastāvadaudgātravede samāmnātatvenāsya ca jyotiṣṭomavikāratvādatideśena nānākarttṛkāḥ padārthāḥ prāptā iti । tena yadyapi sākṣādaudgātrapradhānaprāyavacanena sāṅgasyaikasya vidhānāttadantargatāṅgānyapi vidhiyanta iti tānyapyaudgātrāṇi । ato ‘guṇamukhyavyatikrame tadarthatvānmukhyena vedasaṃyogaḥ’ ityanena nyāyenāṅgeṣūdgataiva kartteti । kiñca prakṛtavedāṅgeṣu sāmākhyāti- kānyeva kartrantarāṇi । tacca samākhyayā vikṛtiṣvadhvaryuṇaiva karttavyamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhāyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi prayogavacanamatideśāddurbalaṃ na bhavet । tathāhi—prayogavacanaṃ tāvatprāptānuvādyarthānupasaṃharati । vikṛtau prākṛtapadarthānāmatideśataḥ prāptirvaktavyā । atideśācca prākṛtasamākhyānikakarttṛsahitā eva prathamaṃ padārthāḥ prāptā iti । tena kartrantarāpekṣābhāvātprayogavacanena tathābhūtameva gṛhyate । tatra kimaudgātrasamākhyā kariṣyati ? na ca vaikṛtasamākhyāyāḥ pratyakṣa- tvātprakṛtaprāptasāmākhyānikakarttṛbādhena niviśata iti vācyam । yataḥ prākṛtī samākhyā klṛptaśrutimūlā, vaikṛtī tu kalpanīyeti na bādhitumarhati । ata eva nātra guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāya- viṣayatvam । prākṛtakarttṝṇāṃ samākhyānumitaśrutiviṣayatvena balava- tvāt । kiñca pradhānasya yājamānatvena samākhyayā karttṛviniyogā- bhāvātkutastadvāreṇāṅgeṣu pradhānakartṛsambandhaḥ ? guṇamukhyavyatikrame tu “upāṃśu yajuṣā kriyate” iti pradhānasyāpi yajurvedavihitatve- nopāṃśusvarasambandhāttaddvāreṇāṅgasambandho'pi । ataḥ prākṛtakartṛ- grahaṇena nānākartṛka eva śyeno vājapeyaśceti siddham । tena yajurvede prākṛtaṃ yatkiñcidapyāmnāyate, tatraiva paraṃ vaikṛtasamākhyā- nibandhanakarttā, na tvanyatrāpīti ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—tadgrahaṇātprākṛtasamā-
khyānikakartṛtvāt aprākṛtakarttṛgrahaṇāchyeno vājapeyaśca tenaiva svadharmaḥ syāt adhikārasāmarthyāt । avyaktaśca vaikṛtasamākhyā- nikakartā śeṣa aprakṛte aṅgairiti ।।

lg.l: yo nāma kaścidiha saṃviditaṃ prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।
matkartṛtāmananukīrtya sa kīrtilobhāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūvāt ।।

chapter.head: iti bālavalabhībhujaṅgāparanāmno bhaṭṭabhavadevasya kṛtau
tautātitamatatilake tṛtīyasya saptamaḥ pādassamāptaḥ ।।
atha tṛtīyādhyāyasyāṣṭamaḥ pādaḥ
tatra prathamaṃ dakṣiṇādānasya svāmikartṛtvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: asti parikrayo jyotiṣṭome dvādaśaśatam, darśapūrṇamāsayoranvā- hāryam । tatra sandehaḥ—kimadhvaryuṇā parikretavyā ṛtvijaḥ ? uta svāmineti । etadapi samākhyāpavādatvena vicāryate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—ādhvaryave hi vede parikraya āmnāyate । tena parikrayo'pyādhvaryava eva । ādhvaryavaṃ yattadadhvaryu- ṇā kartavyam । parikrayo'pyadhvaryukartṛka eva । nanu svīyadravyadā- nena parikrayo bhavati । adhvaryuśca dravyārthameva parārthakarmaṇe pravṛttaḥ । kathaṃ svayaṃ dravyeṇānyārthaṃ parikrayaṃ karotīti sambhāvyate । ucyate— yajamānasahitena parikrayaḥ karttavyaḥ । ato yajamānenaiva laukikopā- yena tasya tathā kartavyam, yathā vākyaśravaṇenaiva parikrayaṃ karttumutsahata iti samākhyānurodhādeva kalpanīyam । etasmādevādhvaryuṇā parikrayaḥ karttavyaḥ iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavadevaṃ yadyadhikāravidhiḥ sāṅgapradhānānuṣṭhātuḥ phalasambandhitvaṃ na pratipādayet । phalārthino hi phalasādhane karttṛtvam । phalasādhanaṃ sāṅgameva pradhānam । tena phalārthinā yajamānena sāṅgameva pradhānaṃ karttavyam । tacca yajamānakarttṛtvaṃ sāṅgapradhāne sākṣāt, aṅgeṣu ṛtvikparikrayadvāreṇeti pratipāditam— “śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt” ityatra । yadā hi parikrayamapi na kuryāt tadādhikāravidhiprati- pāditasāṅgapradhānakartṛtvamevāsya virudhyate । na ca laukikopāya-
dvāreṇa kārayiṣyatīti vācyam । vedavihitaparikrayaparityāgena kālavanniyogopāyāśrayānupapatteḥ । tacca samākhyānurādhādeva kalpanīyamadhikāravidhitastasyā durbalatvādanyatra ca sāvakāśatvāt । taduktam—

lg.l: vaidike dakṣiṇādāne sati kiṃ laukikāśrayaḥ ।। iti ।।

chapter.p: (taṃ. vā., pṛ 1112)

tasmādadhikāravidhibodhitasāṅgapradhānagatayajamāna/?/kartṛtvasāma- rthyādyajamānenaiva parikrayaḥ kartavyaḥ । asmiṃścādhikaraṇe yajamāna- kartṛtvaprasādhanātparikraye ‘anyo vā syāt parikrayāmnānātpratiṣedhāt pratyagātmani’(jai. sū., 3. 7. 20) ityatra iha siddhavatparikrayasya yajamānamāśrityāṅgeṣvanya eva karteti siddhāntitam । tenedamadhikaraṇaṃ tasmātpūrvaṃ draṣṭavyam ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—svāmina eva parikrayaḥ karma, nādhvaryoḥ samastasyaiva karmaṇaḥ svāmyarthatvādadhikāravidhi- balena yajamānakartṛtvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha dvitīyaṃ vapanādīnāṃ yājamānatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭoma śrūyate—“keśaśmaśru vapate, dato dhāvate, nakhāni nikṛntate, snāti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimevañjātīyakā adhvaryuṇā kartavyāḥ ? uta yājamāneneti । idānīmudāharaṇāntare liṅgena samākhyābādho'dhikāśaṅkānirākaraṇena pratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatvadhikāravidhibodhitasāṅgapradhānagata- yajamānakartṛtvabalātsamākhyābādhena parikrayasya yājamānatvam । iha tu dantadhāvanādīnāmaṅgānāṃ parikrītādhvaryukartṛtve tenaiva yaja- mānakartṛtvopapatteḥ ādhvaryavasamākhyayā adhvaryukartṛkatvameva । na cādhvaryugatasaṃskāro'narthaka iti vācyam । ‘ṛtvija upavasanti’ ityādivatkartṛbalādadṛṣṭārthatvenopapatteḥ । nanu ‘phalasaṃyogātsvāmi- yuktaṃ pradhānasya’ ityatra sthita eva yājamānatve dantadhāvanādīnāṃ kartṛsaṃskārakatvaṃ pratipāditameva । ataḥ kathamadhvaryukartṛkatvamā- śrīyate ? ucyate—ihatyameva yājamānatvamaṅgīkṛtya tathā vicā- ritam । tenedamadhikaraṇamarthatastasmārtpūṃ draṣṭavyam । ataḥ samā-
khyānugrahādadhvaryukartṛkāṇyeva dantadhāvanādīni । evaṃ prāpte'bhi- dhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatrāpyadhikāravidhisāmarthyāvagataṃ sāṅgapradhānakartṛtvaṃ yajamānasyopapadyate । tathāhi—dantadhāvanasya saṃskāreṣu pāṭānnādhvaryukartṛtvam । tadyadi svayamapi na kuryāta tadā- dhikārasāmarthyāvagataṃ saṃskāreṣu kartṛtvameva yajamānasya na syāta । tena yatraiva karma prati kartṝṇāṃ guṇabhāvaḥ, tatrānekeṣu guṇabhūteṣu anekakarmanirvṛtyarthamupātteṣu kena kiṃ karttavyamityapekṣāyāṃ bhavati samākhyā niyāmikā, na tvatrāpātato vastuguṇatve tasyā nirddhāra- ṇamiti । na ceyaṃ samākhyā nirodhikā । yajamānasya dantadhāvanaṃ keśaśmaśruvapanaṃ naravanikṛntanañcādhvaryuḥ kariṣyatīti na vācyam । yato yathālokasiddhānāmeva padārthānāṃ vākyārthanvayo'vagamyate । loke ca dantadhāvanasya svakartṛkatvānnakhakṣīlanādīnāñca nāpita- kartṛkatvānnādhvaryukartṛkatvaṃ lokācāravirodhāditi । “ṛtvija- upavasanti” ityatra pratyakṣavacanavaśādupavāsasaṃskṛtānāmevarttvijāṃ ka- rmāṅgatvāvagamādupavāsasaṃskṛtartvikkartṛkapadārthasiddhyarthamevācaraṇāmiti kalpyate । iha tu samākhyāyā adhikāravidhisāmarthyarūpālliṅgā-
ddurbalatvādadhikāravidhisāmarthyena ca yajamānakartṛtvāvagamāt sākṣādeva samākhyābodhitadantadhāvanādīnāṃ yajamānakartṛtvamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—dantadhāvanādayo yajamā- nakartṛkā evetyavagamāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha tṛtīyaṃ tapaso yājamānatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: tapaḥ śrūyate—“dvyahaṃ nāśnāti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimā- rtvijaṃ yājamānaṃ veti । idānīmudāharaṇāntare'dhikāśaṅkāṃ nivarta- yituṃ caśabdena sa eva nyāyā'tidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—bhavatu dantadhāvanādisaṃskāreṣu kartṛpradhā- natvādaviniyojakatvaṃ samākhyāyāḥ । iha dvyahānaśanarūpatapasā duṣkaratvena kartṛpratikūlatvāttadanugrāhakatvarūpaṃ kartṛguṇatvaṃ nāstiti । kartṛtvañca guṇabhūtam । tatra samākhyā niyāmiketi yathāsamākhya- meva tapasi karteti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi dantadhāvanādivattapaso'pyanukūla- bhāvena guṇabhāvo na bhavet । tathāhi—dvividhaṃ kartari karmaṇo'nu kūlatvaṃ bhavati—phalotpatyanukūlaguṇāntareṇa vā yajamānena vā phalotpattipratibandhakapāpāpanayanena vā । karturapi phalaṃ yajamānīyama- pekṣate । tena yathā dantadhāvanādināṃ phalotpatyanukūlaṃ (?) kartuguṇāntarayajamānenānukūlatvātkartṛguṇatvam, tathehāpi yajña- janyaphalāpūrvotpattipratibandhakapāpāpanayena vā karturanukūlatvā- tkarttāraṃ prati phalatvamaviruddhamiti । na ca kathametadava- gamyata iti vācyam । yatastapasastāvatprakaraṇaśrutasyāvaśyaṃ kathañcitkartāraṃ pratyupakārakatvaṃ kalpanīyam । asti ca kratau pratibandhapāpakṣayāpekṣā । śaknoti ca tapo duḥkhahetutvādadharmasya duḥkhaphalatvena duḥkhavināśyatvātsannidhānākāṅkṣāyogyatvairapanetum । yathaiva ‘prāyaścittācaraṇādduḥkhenālpenāpi mahate duḥkhāntarāya pravṛtta- ssannadharmo vināśyate’ iti vacanādgamyate, tathehāpyetāvataiva duḥkhena samastasyāpi kartrātmaphalapratibandhahetoḥ pāpasya vināśa iti niścīyate । tasya ca phalapratibandhahetoḥ pāpasya kṣayātphalārthino yajamānasyaivāpekṣyata iti tapaso yājamānatvameveti siddham । yatra punaḥ pratyakṣaśrutaṃ vacanamasti, yathā “sarve ṛtvija upavasanti” iti
tatra vacanabalādṛtvikkartṛkamapi bhavatīti pūrvamevoktam । tathāca sūtram— ‘vacanāditareṣāṃ syāt’ iti । tena yatra karmaṇi karturguṇabhāvaḥ, tatraiva samākhyayā kartṛviniyogeḥ । yathā yājñikaṃ bārhaspatyaṃ jyotiṣṭo- mādi । tatra kartṛniyamo nānyatreti । tathāca sūtram— ‘guṇatvācca vedena na vyavasthā syāta’ (jai. sū., 3. 8. 12) iti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—tapo'pi yājamānameva lokavatpratipativyudāsena phalasiddhāvanukūlatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha caturthaṃ hiraṇyamālitvādyadhikaraṇam
vivayasaṃśayau
chapter.p:
evaṃ vā—śyene śrūyate—“lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti” iti । vājapeye ca “hiraṇyamālina ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ śyene udgātṛbhirlohitoṣṇīṣatā karttavyā ? vājapeye cādhvaryubhirhiraṇyamālitvam ? uta sarvaiḥ ṛtvigbhiḥ ? iti । ‘guṇatvādvedena na vyavasthā syāt’ iti sūtraṃ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣatayā vyākhyātam । yatra karttā guṇabhūtaḥ, tatra samākhyā niyāmikā । iha tūpavāsasya karttṛguṇatvānna samākhyāhetubhūtena vedena vyavasthā syāditi । etacca vyākhyānaṃ ‘guṇatvena tasya nirddeśaḥ’ityanenaiva
pūrvādhikaraṇasūtreṇa gatatvādanatiprayojanamityudāharaṇāntare'dhikā- śaṅkānirāsārthamanyathā vyākhyāyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—‘vacanāditareṣāṃ syāta’ ityatra yeṣāṃ saṃskā- rāṇāṃ vacanādṛtviksambandhaḥ, tatra ṛtvigbhiḥ karttavyā iti pratipāditam । yadi ca lohitoṣṇīṣatvamudgātṛbhirhiraṇyamālitva- madhvaryubhiḥ kriyate, tatrāpi tatsakartṛkatvamaviruddhameva । na hi durbala- tayā bādhyate, api tarhi virodhena । na cātra samākhyāviṣaya- kartṛkaparigrahe ṛtvikcchabdasya kaścidvirodhaḥ । tena yathā “barhiṣi havīṃṣyāsādayati” iti vākyaṃ prakaraṇānurodhena dārśapau- rṇamāsikahavirviśeṣaviṣayaṃ vyavasthāpitam tathā “lo/?/hitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti” ityapi vākyaṃ samākhyānurodhenodgātṛviṣayameva vyavasthāsyate, hiraṇyamālivākyaṃ cādhvaryuviṣayameva vyavasthāsyata iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra samākhyāvakāśo bhavate । tathāhi—yatrānekāni karmāṇi pradhānabhūtāni karttāraścāneke
guṇabhūtāḥ tatraikenaiva kartrā ekasmin karmaṇi nirvarttite pradhāna- tvātkarmaṇāṃ guṇabhūtakartranurodhena punarāvṛtyasambhavātpratikarma bhavatyapekṣā—kiṃ kena kartavyamiti । tatrāpekṣāyāṃ bhavati samā- khyāyā niyāmakatvam । iha tvṛtvijāṃ pradhānatvāllohitoṣṇīṣatāyā hiraṇyamālitāyāśca pratipradhānaguṇāvṛttinyāyena sarvartviksambandho- papatteḥ kena kartavyetyapekṣābhāvāt avihitaprasarameva vākyaṃ na samākhyayā niyantuṃ śakyate । taduktam—
(taṃ. vā., pṛ. 1117)

“barhiṣi havīṃṣyāsādayati” ityatra haviḥsvarūpamātre barhirvidhā- nānarthakyādavaśyamapūrvasādhanalakṣaṇārthaṃ vākyena prakaraṇamapekṣaṇīya- miti yuktaṃ vyavastheti । na ceha tathā samākhyeti vākyabalā- cchyene vājapeye ca lohitoṣṇīṣatvaṃ hiraṇyamālitvañca sarvartvi- gbhireva kartavyamiti ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—guṇatvāllohitoṣṇīṣa- tāyā hiraṇyamālitāyāśca vedena samākhyādvārā na vyavasthā syāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcayaṃ guṇakāmānāṃ yājamānatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“yadi kāmayeta varṣukaḥ parjanyaḥ syāditi nīcaiḥ sado minuyāt” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ ? uta yājamānaḥ ? iti । pūrvatra ‘vedena na vyavasthā syāt’ iti sūtraṃ pūrvādhikaraṇaśeṣabhūtaṃ manyamānastameva nyāyamudāharaṇāntare 'dhikāśaṅkānirāsārthaṃ tathāśabdenātidiśati ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
pūrvapakṣastu—sadomānaṃ tāvatsamākhyāniyatamadhvaryukartṛkaṃ yadi kāmayeta sado minuyāditi । atra ca kāmanāyāḥ sadomāna- samānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate । tena kāmo'pyādhvaryava eva, na tu yājamāna iti । ātmanepadavaśātsāṅgasyaiva yāgasya phalaṃ yaja- mānagatameva । na ca kāmyamānaṃ phalaṃ bhavati । tena yajamānenaiva kāmayitavyamiti kathamadhvaryoḥ kāmanāśaṅkā ? ucyate—sāṅgasya yāgasya phalaṃ yajamānenaiva nīcamānāśritam (?) । svayaṃ na yāgo nāpi yāgāṅgam, puruṣārthatvāt । tenāviruddhatvātsāmānādhikara- ṇyamupadeśāt । tathāhi—“svarga/?/kāmo yajet” ityatrātpanepadā-
tkṛtsnaprayogagataṃ phalaṃ yājamānasyaiva pratīyate । sadomānañca kratvaṅgam । nīcaistvañca puruṣārthatvādyadyapi na prakṛtakratatvaṅnam, tathāpi kratvaṅgasadomānāśritatvātprakṛtaprayogāntargatameva । prayoga- phalañca yajamānasyeti nīcaistvasyāpi phalaṃ yajamānagatameva । kiñca “nīcaissado minuyāt” iti parasmaipadaṃ dṛśyate । adhva- ryugatatve ca kartrabhipretakriyāphalatvānminvītetyātmanepadaṃ syāt, ñitvāt । atastadetadātmanepadaparasmaipadaśrutivirodhādvākyagamyasā- mānādhikaraṇyaṃ bādhyata eveti vaiyadhikaraṇyenaivātrānvayaḥ—yadi parjanyo varṣediti yajamānaḥ kāmayettadādhvaryurnīcaiḥ sado minu- yāditi । yatra punaḥ spaṣṭameva vacane ṛtviksambaddhe phalaprati- pādakatvamasti, yathā “udgātātmane ca yajamānāya ca yaṃ kāmaṃ kāyamate taṃ kāyamate” iti, tatrodgātareva phalamiti sthitaḥ ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—yathā tapo yājamānaṃ tathā guṇakāmo'pi yājamāna eva, arthasaṃyogāt yajamānasyaiva prayogagataprayojanasambandhāditi ।
chapter.head: athaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ protsāhanamantrāṇāṃ yājamānatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: ihaivañjātīyakā mantrā udāharaṇam—“āyurddā agne'syāyurme dehi varcodhā agne'pi/?/ varco me de/?/hi cakṣurddā agne'si cakṣurme dehi” iti । teṣu sandehaḥ—kimārtvijāḥ ? uta yājamānāḥ ? iti । ihāpyādhikāśaṅkānirāsārthaṃ pūrvoktanyāyastadvacchabdenātidiśyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: pūrvaṃpakṣastu—bhavatu phalāya vidhīyamānasya nīcaistvādeḥ prakṛtaprayogāntargatatvātphalam, yājamānatvena kāmanāyā api yāja mānatvam । āyurdādimantrāṇāṃ tvavidhāyakatvena yathāprāptaphalānuvāda- katvam । phalañca prakṛte karmaṇi yathā yajamānasya svargādirūpamasti, tathartvijāmapi dakṣiṇārūpamastyeva । yajamānaphalānuvādakatvena mantrapadānāṃ mukhyatvam । svargasya phalāsyāyurādipadairanabhidhānāt । yathā ca lakṣaṇayā tadanuvādakatvaṃ, tathartvikphalānuvādakamapi sambhavatyeva । tena samākhyāvagatādhvaryukartṛtvānurodhenādhvaryoreva dakṣiṇālābhātmakaphalamāyurādirūpeṇotsāhanārthamāśāsyate । ta- spādadhvaryuṇaivañjātīyakā mantrāḥ prayoktavyā iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyṛtvijāṃ phalamagneḥ sakāśādāśāsa- namarhet । taddhyagnitaḥ phalametadāśāsmahe । yajamānasya ca phalaṃ karmadvāreṇāgnisambandhinā । ṛtvikphalantu nāgnitaḥ prārthanīyam । yajamānādeva tasya labhyamānatvenāgnisambandhābhāvāt । kiñcotsāha- jananārthamidamāśāsanam yajamānaphalaṃ cātyantādṛṣṭaṃ yathācoditānuṣṭhā- nasādhyam । tadāśāsyamānamutsāhajananaṃ yathācoditaprayogasampatti- heturbhūtvā sidhyatīti tadevāśāsanīyam । ṛtvikphalantu yajamāna- vyāpārakaraṇādeva siddhamāśāsanaṃ prayuṅkte । ato yajamānasyaivā- śāsanayogyarūpaṃ liṅgena samākhyāyā bādhitatvādyajamānenaivāśī- rmantrāḥ prayoktavyā iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—mantrāścākarmakaraṇāyairmantraiḥ karma na kriyate, te'pi yājamānāḥ tadvadnuṇakāmavaditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptamaṃ dvyāmnātānāmubhayārthatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
sto darśapūrṇamāso । tatra dvyānmātā mantrāḥ ādhvaryane kāṇḍe
yājamāne ca । ājyaṃ yairgṛhyate “pañcānāṃ tvā vātānāṃ yantrāya dharttāya gṛhṇāmi” ityevamādayaḥ । tathā srugvyūhane—“vājasya mā prasavenodyābheṇodagrabhīta” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ ta ubhābhyāmapi kartṛvyāḥ ? utādhvaryuṇaiveti । idānīṃ tatra samākhyānibandhanaika- kartṛkatāpavādaḥ kriyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—yadyapi sāmānyasamākhyāto viśeṣasamākhyā balīyasī, tathāpi mantrāṇāmanuṣṭheyaprakāśanenārthavatvātkarmaṇāñca samākhyayā adhvaryukartṛkatvādyenaiva karma kartavyam, tasyaiva karma- prakāśanārthaṃ mantraprayogo'pekṣita ityapekṣātāratamyātsamānyasamākhyaiva balīyasītyadhvaryuṇaiva mantrāḥ prayoktavyāḥ । tena yadetadyājamāna- kāṇḍe samāmnātaṃ tatsvarūpajñānārtham । tasyādhvaryukartṛviniyogārtha- tvamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yājamāne samāmnānamanyathā yadyupapadyeta । tathāhi—na tāvanmantrasvarūpajñānārtham, tasyādhvaryave pāṭhamātra- siddhatvāt । tena yājamāne kāṇḍe'pi samāmnāte anyaprayojana- tvādyajamānaprayogārthameva । na ca yajamānaprayogo niṣprayojanaḥ । yathāhi adhvaryuṇā padārthāḥ kartavyāstathā yajamānena pradānārthaṃ
pratyavekṣitavyam । tenobhābhyāmeva mantraprayogasyāpekṣitatvādu- bhābhyāmeva prayoktavyamiti । yatra tu yājamāne samāmnānaṃ nāsti tatropāyāntareṇa pratyavekṣiṣyate । iha tu vidyamānatvādāśāsana- mantraireveti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—dvayāmnāte ubhāvapyadhvaryu- yajamānau prayojakau । evaṃ sannidhyāmnānasyārthavatvaṃ bhavatīti ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭamamabhijñavācanādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayau
chapter.p: vājapeye śrūyate—“klṛptīryajamānaṃ vācayati । ujjitīryajamānaṃ vācayati” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ jñaścājñaśca sarvo vācayitavyaḥ ? uta jña eveti । idānīṃ samākhyayā vācanasyādhvaryukartṛkatve siddhe vācayitavyaviśeṣaḥ prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“klṛptīryajamānaṃ vācayati” ityatra yaja- mānaviśeṣo na śrūyate । tathāca mantrajño yajamāno'muṃ mantraṃ paṭhediti
prayuṅkte mantreṇa vocyate । tathaiva mantrajño'pi pratipadamuccārya vācayitavyaḥ । (?) ataeva na dvau vācayitavyau । athavā yo mantrajñaḥ sa prayuktimantareṇāpi svata eva mantramuccārayatyeva । tena vācana- vidhānārthavatvāyāvidvāneva vācayitavya iti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi kāmaśrutiparigṛhītamadhyayanaṃ bhavet । tadā hyamantrajño'pi prayogakāle pādaṃ vā khaṇḍaśo vā vācayati । kintvetāvadeva śrūyate—“svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” iti । tathāca satyanyathopalabdhavidyamevādhikariṇamadhyetavya ityāsādya kratuvidha- yaścaritārthāḥ na prayoge śābdamantraśikṣaṇaṃ prayuñjate, anārabhya- śrutādhānāsiddhamagniṃ prāpya labdhavidhayo yathā prayogakāle nādhānaṃ prayuñjate । yattu mantrajñasya vācanamanarthakamiti amantrajña eva vācayitavya ityuktam, satyapi jñāne nāprayukto niyamena brūte । nāgninā viharediti praiṣavacanaṃ mantrajñe'pi vacanasyārthavatvānnājña eva vācayitavya iti । kiñca vācayitīti vacane niyuñjīteti vidhyarthamaśikṣitasya vācanāśakteḥ śikṣayākṣeptavyā । sā cādhyayanavidhinādhyayanopāyenaiva karmavidhiparigṛhītenādhvaryuṇā prayoge śabdataḥ karttavyeti । ato mantrasyaivādhikārānmantrajña eva vāca- yitavya iti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—jñātamantrasyaiva yajamānasya vācanamamantrajñasyādhikārābhāvāditi ।
chapter.head: athaṃ navamaṃ dvādaśadvandvānāmādhvaryavatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra yājamāne karmāṇyāmnātāni dvādaśa dvandvāni—“vatsañcopāvasṛjatyukhāṃ cādhiśrayati, ava ca hanti, dvaṣadupule ca samāhanti, adhi ca vapate, kapālāni copadadhāti, puroḍāśañcādhiśrayati ājyañca, stamvayajuśca harati, abhi ca gṛhṇāti, vediñca parigṛhṇāti, patnīṃ sannahyati, prokṣaṇīścāsādayati, ājyañcaiva etāni vai dvādaśadvandvāni darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ” iti । tatra sandehaḥ— kimetānyadhvaryoḥ karmāṇi ? uta yajamānasyeti । idānīṃ sāmā- nyasamākhyayā viśeṣasamākhyāyā bādhaḥ prasaṅgātpratipādyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—ukhādhiśrayaṇāvahantyādīni dvādaśakarma- dvandvāni adhvaryuvede yājamāne kāṇḍe samāmnātāni । na ca tāni hyā/?/mnātamantreṇa tadubhābhyāṃ kartuṃ śakyante । tatra hi mantraikatve'pi
pāṭhadvayaṃ syāt (?) dānavidhisamarpitasya vidhiyogataḥ sāmarthye prayogaḥ । tayośca prayogavidhiparigṛhītatvātkartṛdvayaṃ sāvakāśam । ukhādhiśrayaṇādikarmaṇāntvanuṣṭhānadvayena kenacitsamarpitamiti sakṛdeva prayogavacanagṛhītāni sakṛdeva karttavyāni । na ca dvādaśakarmaṇāṃ dvandvabhūtānāṃ svarūpamātreṇādhvaryuvedāmnānaṃ dvandvarūpeṇa yājamāna- kāṇḍe samākhyātasāmānyarūpaṃ dvandvaṃ yajamānena kartavyaṃ, karmāṇi cādhvaryuṇeti sambhavati, sāmīpyasyākarmatvena kartṛbhedāsambhavāt । tenaitacchrūyamāṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ na samākhyāsāmānyena kartrantaraprayuktiḥ । tenaikakartṛtve sati adhvaryuvedasamākhyāto yājamānakāṇḍasamākhyāyā viśeṣarūpatvena balīyastvādviśeṣasamākhyāvaśātsāmānyasamākhyāṃ bādhitvā yajamānenaiva karmāṇi karttavyāni । āmnānañcotpatti- viniyogābhyāsenaivopapannamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi karmaṇāṃ vidhānaṃ yājamāna- kāṇḍe bhavet । kintvadhvaryuvedavihitānāmeva karmāṇāṃ dvandvatāmātraṃ yājamāne vidhīyate । “etāni vai dvādaśa dvandvāni darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ” iti yājamānakāṇḍe śravaṇāt । na tu dvandvatārūpaguṇānurodhena karmaṇāmapi pradhānabhūtānāṃ yājamānatvaṃ/?/ sambhavati । aṅgaguṇa-
virodhanyāyavirodhāt । tena karmaṇāmādhvaryavasamākhyayā adhva- ryukartṛkatvāttadanurodhena dvandvānāmāpi karmaṇāmanyonyasāmīpyarūpamadhva- ryukartṛkatvameva । yājamānakāṇḍe tu dvandvātāvidhānaṃ nyāyāttu vistāreṇa yājamānasya smārakameveti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—adhvaryureva dvandveṣu karmasu karttā karmāmeva tasyānuvādakatvādyojamānasamākhyānaṃ tatsmṛtimātraprayojanaṃ nyāyavaśāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha daśamaṃ hātuḥ karaṇamantrānuṣṭhātṛtvādhikaraṇam
chapter.sutra: vipratiṣedhena karaṇaḥ samavāyaviśeṣāditaramanyasteṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt ।। 3. 8. 21 ।।
chapter.head: viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
asti jyotiṣṭome agnīṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ । tasya yūpasya parivyāṇe mantro—eka ādhvaryavaḥ “parivīrasi” iti karaṇaḥ, aparo hetuḥ “yuvā suvāsāḥ” iti kriyamāṇānuvādaḥ । tayoścoda- kaparamparayā kuṇḍapāyināmayanaṃ prāptayorbhavati sandehaḥ । kaḥ punarasau ? tatra/?/ ṛtviksāmasa āmnātaḥ—“yo hotā sā'dhvaryuḥ” iti ।
