kiṃ karaṇamātramādhvaryavaṃ hotā kuryāt ? kiṃ vā hautraṃ kriyamāṇā- nuvādinamiti । idamapi prasaṅgādanantaraṃ nirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“parivīrasi yuvā suvāsāḥ” ityetayoḥ karaṇakriyamāṇānuvādinoradhvaryuṇā hotrā ca prakṛtau yugapatprayuktayoḥ kauṇḍapāyināmayane “yo hotā so'dhvaryuḥ”iti vacanena hotradhvarya- karmaṇorekakarttṛkatvamevāvagamyate । tatrāpi prayāgo/?/panipatitamanu- pajātavirodhaṃ hotṛśabdameva mukhyārtha parigṛhya caramopanipatito virodhadaśāṃ prāpto'dhvaryuśabdaḥ kāryalakṣaṇārtho varṇanīyaḥ । tena hotraiva karaṇakriyamāṇārthānuvādinau mantrau prayoktavyāviti prāpnoti । na cobhayamantraprayogaṃ kartuṃ yugapadekaḥ śaknotītyaniyamena kadācitkaraṇamantrasya kadācitkriyamāṇānuvādino mantrasya hotrā prayogaḥ karttavya iti । athavā “yo hotā so'dhvaryuḥ” ityajahatsva- kāryasyaiva hoturādhvaryavavidhānāt svatantraṃ kriyamāṇānuvādī hotrā prayoktavyaḥ । ādhvaryavaḥ karaṇamantraḥ ।

prayogānvayastu “yo hotā so'dhvaryuḥ”ityetasmādupadeśāt । atideśāccopadeśo balavāniti karaṇamantraḥ eva hotrā prayoktavyaḥ । yattvajahatsvakārya eva hotā ādhvaryaveṇa sambadhyata ityuktam, na hi hotrā yogāddhautram । api tarhi hotuḥ
karma hautram । yathā rājñaḥ karma rājyam, na tu rājyayogādrājeti । tenargvedādhyayanamātreṇaiva yogyatayā hotrānvayasiddheḥ parityaktasvakā- ryasyāpi hoturādhvaryave vidhānopapatteḥ, upadeśasāmarthyāt hotrā karaṇa eva mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ । hotṛpratipuruṣeṇa kriyamāṇānuvādī mantraḥ prayoktavya iti । nanu karaṇasya ‘mantrāntena karmādisannipātaḥ’ (jai. sū. 12. 3. 20) ityanena nyāyena parivyāṇātprāgeva karaṇama- ntrasya prayogaḥ prāpnoti, kriyamāṇānuvādinastu kriyamāṇa eva parivyāṇe prayogaḥ । tena bhinnakālayormantrayorekenāpi hotrā prayujyamānayorna kaścidvirodhaḥ । taduktam—

lg.l: karaṇaḥ prāk kriyātastu parataścetaraḥ sthitaḥ ।। iti ।

chapter.p:
ucyate—kriyamāṇatā hi parivyāṇasyādyaparispandātprabhṛti- samāptiparyantam । tenādyaparispandātprabhṛtyeva kriyamāṇānuvādinaḥ kālaḥ । “yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīrasi” iti mantre'pi asītyanena sannihito yūpo nirddiśyate । raśanācchādanāya parivyāṇāya yūpamupasthitasyāsau yūpaḥ sannihito bhavati । tata evādyaparispa- ndātprabhṛtiparivyāṇavarttamānatvam । ataḥ samakālatvādbhavati virodhaḥ । evañca satyupadeśāt hotṛpratipuruṣeṇaiva prayoktavyaḥ ।
pratipuruṣeṣu madhye yasminviśeṣo gṛhyate prādhānyena vā kāryatāvyagra- tayā vā tenaiva prayoktavya iti ।
chapter.head: ayaikādaśaṃ praiṣapraiṣārthayorbhinnakartṛkatvādhitaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: sto darśapūrṇamāsau । tatra praiṣaḥ samāmnātaḥ—“prokṣaṇīrāsādaya, idhmābarhirupasādaya, sruvañca sruvaśca sammṛḍiḍha, patnīṃ sannahyā- jyenodehi” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kiṃ ya eva praiṣe sa eva praiṣārthe ? utānya iti । prasāṅgikaṃ samāpyedānīṃ prakṛta eva samākhyāyā liṅgena virodhaścintyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—prokṣaṇīrāsadya” ityādipraiṣamantrasya prokṣaṇāsādanādirūpasya praiṣārthesya samākhyayā adhvaryukartṛka- tvameva gamyate । tena dvayoreka evādhvaryuḥ karttā । na cātmani praiṣāsambhavena praiṣarūpaliṅgavirodhādeka evādhvaryavasamākhyābādhena bhinnakartṛkatvamiti vācyam । yato naivāyaṃ praiṣaḥ, kintarhi ? prāpyakālatāyāmayaṃ loṭpratyayaḥ । tatrāpi loṭpratyayānuśāsa-
nāttasya cātra prasambhavāt । tataḥ “prokṣaṇīrāsādya” iti prokṣaṇyāsādanarūpāyāḥ prāptakāla ityartho bhavati । tathā ca satyeka evādhvaryuḥ prāptakālatāṃ nirddiśya prokṣaṇyāsādanaṃ kariṣyati । bhavatu praiṣārthatvaṃ tathāpyeka evādhvaryuḥ śarīriśarīrayo- rarthāntaratvāt bhedamāśritya praiṣakaḥ praiṣaśca bhaviṣyatītyekakartṛkatva- meveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi prāptakālatāyāmatra loṭ- pratyaya upapadyate । tathāhi—“prokṣaṇī/?/rā/?/sā/?/daya” iti madhyama- puruṣanirddeśo'yam । adhamaśca praiṣyo vaktavyaḥ । sa cāntarbhāvita- yuṣmadarthatvātpurovarttikartṛviṣaya eva paraṃ bhavati । yathā ‘māṇavaka samidhamāhara’ iti । prāptakālayāśca kriyāyāḥ prāpta- kālatā vaktavyā । na ca tatra yuṣmadarthaḥ kathañcidapi sambhavati, asannidhānāt ṛcetanatvācca । na ca prāptakāla iti kriyāyā nirddeśassambhavet । tena prāptakālateyaṃ prathamapuruṣa eva kathañci- tsambhavati, na tu madhyamottamapuruṣayoḥ sambhavati । sambhavati tu praiṣārthatve sannihitasya puruṣāntarasya yuṣmadarthatvopapatteḥ । tena praiṣābhidhāyakamantraliṅgavirodhātpraiṣārthayorbhinnakartṛkatvameva । yattu śarīriśarīrayorarthāntarāṇāṃ cābhede satyekasyaiva praiṣakatvaṃ praiṣyatvañca
bhaviṣyatītyuktam, tadayuktam; praiṣasyādṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgāt । vināpi praiṣaṃ śarīriprayatnādeva śarīraceṣṭotpatteḥ gauṇatvaprasaṅgācca । śrutya- virodhe mukhyārthatvameva mantrāṇāṃ na gauṇatvamityavadhāritaṃ guṇa- mukhyādhikaraṇe । tasmādevamapi naikakartṛkatvaṃ praiṣapraiṣārthayāḥ, kintu bhinnakartṛkatvameveti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—praiṣeṣu yaḥ kartā tato- 'nyaḥ praiṣārthaḥ praiṣasya svabhāvato'nyaviṣayatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha vdādaśaṃ praiṣasyādhvaryavatvādhikaraṇam
saṃśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: athaivaṃ gate idaṃ sandihyate—kimadhvaryuragnīdhaṃ preṣyati ? utāgnīdadhvaryumiti । idaṃ prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ-dvayostāvatpraiṣapraiṣārthayoḥ pūrvoktena nyāyenaika- kartṛkatvāsambhavādavaśyamekatra praiṣasamākhyāprāptakartṛsambandho bādha- nīyaḥ । tatra praiṣārthasya pradhānatvātpraiṣasya tadarthatvena tadnaṇatve tadantarbhūtatvāt ‘aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyāta” (jai. sū. 12. 2. 27)
iti nyāyenāṅgabhūte praiṣa evādhvaryukartṛkatvabādho na tu pradhānabhūte praiṣārthe । kiñca bahavo hi praiṣārthāḥ praiṣaścaika eva nigadatvena, ‘bhūyasāṃ syātsadharmatvam’ (jai. sū. 12. 2. 24.) ityanena nyāyena praiṣa evādhvaryubādho yukto na tu praiṣārtheṣu bahuṣu । tathā liṅgadarśa- nādapyamumevādhvaryukartṛkatvaṃ darśayati । evaṃ hi śrūyate—‘yadanvañcaṃ dhārayedvajro vai sphyā/?/, vajreṇādhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvīda/?/’ iti । sphyasya dhāraṇaṃ tāvadekāntenāgnīdhrakartṛkaṃ, tasyaiva tadānīmadhyeyatvāt । yasya ca haste sphyaḥ sa eva preṣyatītyucitam । yato loke yaḥ karmakaraṃ preṣyati, so'vaśyamabhihitārthaṃ saṅkalpya dṛḍhīkaraṇārthañca kiñcidūhādikaṃ dhārayati । adhvaryu..........śceti adhvaryugataduḥkhā- vagamāt agnīdha eva praiṣārthatvamadhvaryuṇaiva karttavyamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedavaṃ yadi mukhyaḥ praiṣo na bhavet । tathāhi—samākhyayā tāvatpraiṣapraiṣārthayoradhvaryukartṛkatvamavagamyate । prathamañcaiva praiṣaḥ karttavyaḥ । tadanantarañca praiṣārtha ityapi vyavasthitam । praiṣādhīnatvātpraiṣārthānuṣṭhānasya । tatrānyatarasyādhvaryukartṛkatvaparigrahe ‘mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat’ (jai. sū. 12. 2. 24.) ityanena
nyāyena praiṣa eva mukhyabhūte'dhvaryukartṛkatvaṃ vyāptam । na hi tayoḥ kaścidviro'dho'sti, yasminnadhvaryuṇā kṛte praiṣārthe virodhādanyaḥ karttā bhavati । sa ca mantraliṅgādāgnīdhraḥ । na cāsyāṅgaguṇavirodha- nyāyaviṣayatvam । praiṣadvāreṇaiva prayojanakasyādhvaryoḥ praiṣatve'pi prayo- jakavyāpāre kartṛtvavirodhāt । adhvaryostu praiṣārthakaraṇe praiṣe (?) antamevādhvaryukartṛkatvasya । yato na hi tenāsau kṛtaḥ kārito vā । na ca praiṣārthasya bahutvādadhvaryukartṛkatvānugrahaḥ, praiṣāṇāmapi bahutvāt । atha praiṣāṇāṃ nigadatvenaikakartṛtā, tadā praiṣārthānāmaṅga- tvenaikakartṛtvānna virodhaḥ । yattvadhvaryuḥ kṣīyeteti liṅgadarśanaḥ, tadayuktam; tatprāpakapramāṇānusāritvenādhvaryukartṛkāritvenāgnādha- mevādhvaryuśabdaḥ pratipādayiṣyatīti tadapyupapannameveti । tasmādadhva- ryupreṣito'gnīdādiḥ praiṣārthaṃ kuryāditi siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—agnīdha eva gauṇā'dhva- ryuśabdaḥ karmasāmānyāt samānakarmakāritvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha trayodaśaṃ karaṇamantraphalasya yājamānatādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayossamāmananti—“mamāgne varṣo/?/ vihaveṣvastviti pūrvamagniṃ parigṛhlāti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimṛtvijaḥ phalamāśā- sitavyam ? uta yajamānasyeti । idamapi mantraprasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe'gnyanvādhāne “mamāgne varco vihaveṣvastviti pūrvamagniṃ gṛhṇāti” iti karaṇamantro'yaṃ vidhī- yate । asya cāyamarthaḥ—he agne mama varcco mama tejo vihaveṣu spardhāsthāneṣvastu bhabatviti । agnyanvādhānañca āhitasyāgneḥ karmānuṣṭhānārthaḥ punarāropaṇam । tacca samākhyayā adhvaryukartṛkamiti vyavasthitam । karaṇamantraprayoge'pyayaṃ pradhānasamānakartṛkatvānurodhe- nādhvaryukartṛka eva । na ca yajamānagāmi phalamadhvaryuṇā mameti svasambandhitayā nirddeṣṭuṃ śakyate । asti cādhvaryorapi tadbhāvabhā- vitayā samyakkarmānuṣṭhānasvarūpam । atastadevādhvaryuprotsāhanārthaṃ mantreṇa prakāśyate । tena karaṇamantreṣu mameti mantreliṅgasyārthavatvā- devādhvaryugatameva phalamāśāsitavyamiti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyagnyanvādhānāṅgaṃ mantro na bhavet । tathāhi—karaṇamantro'yamagnyanvādhānāṅgamiti sthitam । tadaṅgatā ca tatprakāśanena tatsambandhiprakāśanena voditaṃ mantrakaraṇatvānyathā nupapatyā yadanena mantreṇa phala prakāśyate, tamagnyanvādhānasyaiva phala- miti kalpyate । agnyanvādhānasya phalaṃ yajamānagatameva, “darśapūrṇa- māsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta” ityadhikāravākyagatātmanepadaśruti- balena sāṅgapradhānaphalasyaiva yajamānagāmitvāvadhāraṇāt । evañca satyātmanepadaśrutivirodhānna mameti padāvagataṃ mantraliṅgamanyārthaṃ varṇanīyam । mama yajamānasyaivetyadhyāhāreṇa vā madrūpasya yajamānasyeti gauṇatvena vā । tasmātkaraṇamantraprakāśyaṃ phalaṃ yajamānagatameveti siddham ।

liṅgamapyetamevārthaṃ darśayati—“yāṃ vai kāñcana yajñe ṛtvija āśiṣamāśāsate yajamānasyaive sā” iti । yatra punaḥ karaṇama- ntraprakāśyamapi phalaṃ prakṛtaprayogopayogitayā ṛtviggatatvenaiva yajamānasyāpekṣitam, tatra tathābhūtasyaiva kriyāphalasya yajamānaka- rtrabhipretatvenātmanepadaśrutyavirodhādṛtviggāmitvameva । yathā— “agnāviṣṇū mā vāmavakramiṣaṃ vijihāthāṃ mā mā santāptama” iti । atra ṛtviggatapyasantāparūpaṃ yajamānasyāpekṣitam—asantapto-
'dhvaryuḥ sukhaṃ karma karotīti । taduktaṃ sūtre—‘karmārthantu phalaṃ teṣā svāminaṃ pratyarthavatvāt’ prayojanavatvāditi । tathā yatrādhvaryuyajamānayoḥ phalasambandhaḥ tatrādhvaryorapi bhavatyārtvijamapi phalam । tathāhi dakṣiṇahavirddhānasyādhastāścatvāraḥ prādeśā uparavāḥ prādeśāntarālāḥ, tatra hastau praveśyādhvaryuryajamānamāha—kimatreti ? bhadramiti sa pratyāha । adhvaryurāha nau saha iti । tadbhadramāvayoḥ sahitayorityarthaḥ । atrāpyadhvaryorbhadraṃ kalpitaṃ prakṛtaprayogasāmarthyā- rthaṃ yajamānasyāpekṣitameveti । atrāpi yajamānābhipretatvātkriyāpha- lasyātmanepadaśrutyā mantraliṅgasyāvirodha ityṛtviggatamapi phalamiti । taduktaṃ sūtre—‘vyapadeśācca’ iti । adhvaryoḥ sāmrājyasya kratusā- hityavyapadeśādityarthaḥ । tenaitatsūtradvayaṃ pratyudāharaṇatvena pūrvādhi- karaṇaśeṣabhūtameveti nādhikaraṇāntaramiti bhramitavyam ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe varco vihiveṣviti yajamānaphalakāmanā na karttavyā । siddhānte tu karttavyeti । sūtrantu—svāmina eva phalam, tadarthatvātsāṅgapradhānaphalasyeti ।।
chapter.head: atha caturdaśaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prākṛtakāryārthatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayorvarhirddharmāḥ śrūyante । teṣu sandehaḥ—kimaṅga- pradhānārthā ete ? uta pradhānārthāḥ ? iti । ‘sarveṣāṃ vā śeṣatvasyā- tatprayuktatvāta’ (jai. sū., 3. 7. 2.) ityanena nyāyena barhirā- jyadharmāṇāmaṅgapradhānabarhirādyarthatvaṃ siddhamevetyuttarādhikaraṇavivakṣārthaṃ prāptisūtrametaditi bhāṣyakāreṇa pūrvapakṣayitvā vyākhyātam । “barhiṣā yūpāvaṭamavastṛṇāti” “ājyeta yūpamanakti” iti pūrvapakṣa- sūtramevaitaditi yathāvārttikamevādhikaraṇaṃ prastūyate—‘dravyasaṃskāraḥ prakaraṇāviśeṣātsarvakarmaṇām’ । jyotiṣṭome paśuragnīṣomīyaḥ—“yo dīkṣiyo/?/ yadagnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhate” iti । tatra śrūyate— “barhiṣā yūpāvaṭamavastṛṇāni” “ājyena yūpamanakti” iti । tatra sandehaḥ—kimetayorājyabarhiṣorājyabarhirdharmāḥ prākṛtāḥ karttavyāḥ ? uta neti । samākhyāyāḥ śrutyādibhi; saha virodhāvirodhavicāraṃ parisamāpyedānīṃ yadetat ‘sarveṣāṃ vā śeṣatvasya tatprayuktatvāt’ itya- nena barhirādidharmāṇāmaṅgapradhānārthatvamuktam, tatkiṃ prakṛtivadvikṛti- ṣvapi ? uta prakṛtāveveti prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—prakṛtivadvikṛtiḥ karttavyetyanena śāstreṇa vikṛtāvapi bhāvanāyāmājyadharmā barhirdharmāśca prāptā eva । yathā ca te prakṛtau barhirādidravyasaṃskāroḥ sarveṣāmevāviśeṣādaṅgapradhāna- karmasambandhināṃ barhirādīnāmatideśato barhirdharmāścājyadharmāśca karttavyā iti । evaṃ prāpte'bhīdhāyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadyaṅgopadeśa evānuṣaṅgarūpeṇa prakṛtivikṛtisādharaṇo bhavet, athavā śāstramevātidiśet । tathā sati prakṛtivadvikṛtāvapi kalpyamānaḥ śāstrārthaḥ sarvārthatve- nāvadhāryate, na tvetadubhayamapyasti । vyavadhānenānuṣaṅgābhāvādvai- kṛtapradhānāpūrvānapekṣitatvena śāstrātideśasyānāśaṅkanīyatvāt । yato mahopakārākāṅkṣiṇī vikṛtibhāvanā mahopakarameva prākṛtaṃ gṛhṇāti । upakārasidhyarthaṃ cātrāvaghātajanyāni niyamādṛṣṭadvārabhūtāni dṛṣṭāni vaituṣyādīni, adṛṣṭāni ca prokṣaṇaprayājādijanyāvāntara- kāryāṇi gṛhṇāti । tāni ca jñānaparimāṇānyeva prāpnuvanti । taiścātmasidhyarthaṃ padārthāḥ pratyātmaniyatā eva prāpyante । na ca prakṛtau yūpāvaṭastaraṇaṃ nāma barhiḥkāryaṃ vijñātam । yena vikṛtau
tadvāreṇa yūpāvaṭāstaraṇe barhirdharmā bhaveyuḥ । kiñcāpūrvamevedaṃ vikṛtau yūpāvaṭāstaraṇārthaṃ barhiḥ । ato nāsya prākṛtakāryasambandhābhāvā- tprākṛtadharmagrahaṇamiti । evaṃ “ājye/?/ta/?/ yūpamanakti” ityatrāpi yūpajanyasādhanasyājyasya na prākṛtasvadharmagrahaṇamiti । nanu mā nāma vaikṛtabhāvanāgatamahopakārākāṅkṣādvāreṇa yūmāvaṭāstaraṇabarhiḥ prākṛtabarhirdharmān gṛhṇātu, yūpāñjanādyarthajyamājyadharmān, tathāpi svākāṅkṣayaiva vaikṛtaṃ barhirbarhirdharmān vaikṛtañcājyamāyaṃ/?/dharmān pragrahī- ṣyati, yathā ca phalacamasaḥ somadharmāniti । maivam; apekṣāvaśena hi sarvatrātideśāddharmagrahaṇaṃ bhavati । tatra phalacamasena yajetetyatra kiṃ somavaddravībhūtenābhiṣavasvarūpeṇa vetyapekṣāyāṃ somasthānīya- dravyeṇātideśāddharmagrahaṇam । “barhiṣā yūpāvaṭamavastṛṇāti” ityatra tu svarūpeṇaiva barhiṣasstaraṇasādhanatvam । tasya lokasiddha- tvānnāstyapekṣeti nātideśāddharmalābha iti vaiṣamyam ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—nirddeśātprākṛtakāryasa- mbandhenaiva dharmāṇāṃ nirddeśāt । prākṛtakāryāpannasya barhiṣa ājyasya ca dharmasambandhaḥ nādhikāraḥ syāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha pañcadaśaṃ lavanasyāsarvārthatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: darśapūrṇamāsayorāmananti—“samāvapracchinnāgrau darbhau prādeśa- mātre pavitre kurute” tathā—“arantimātre vidhṛtī karoti” iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kiṃ vedistaraṇārthasya barhiṣo vidhṛtī pavitre ? utānyataḥ ? iti । idānīṃ prakṛtāvapi barhirdharmāṇāṃ na sarva- barhirarthatvamiti prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“barhirlunāti” iti lavanavidhau prayojana- viśeṣāśravaṇādyāvatprakaraṇavarttibarhiḥkāryārthameva lavanamavadhāryate । vidhṛtī pavitre api barhiḥkārye । tena tadarthamapi lavanamiti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra viśeṣo na gṛhyeta । tathāhi— lūnaṃ barhistṛṇātīti dhātuśabdena staraṇamabhidhīyate । tena lūnasya barhiṣaḥ sakalasyaiva vedistaraṇārthatvānnānyatra viniyogaḥ sambha- vatīti । ato'sarvārthatvaṃ barhiṣaḥ, vidhṛtipavitrārthaṃ darbhagrahaṇamiti siddham ।

prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—lūnasya kṛtsnasyaiva barhiṣaḥ śrutiviśeṣādvedistaraṇe viniyogādvidhṛtipavitrārthaṃ na tatra grahaṇe virodhādavyaktaḥ sāmānyabhūto vidhṛtipavitrārthadarbhavidhiḥ śeṣe paribhojanīyobhidhāne barhiṣīti ।।
chapter.head: atha ṣoḍaśaṃ śeṣanidhānādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate—“puroḍāśaśakalamaindravāyavapātre nidadhāti, dhānā āśvinapātre payasyāṃ maitrāvaruṇapātre” iti । tatra sandehaḥ— kimanyata eṣāṃ kriyā ? uta prakṛtebhyaḥ ? iti । pūrvāpavādārthamida- mārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—puroḍāśaśakalāṃdīnāmaindravāyavādipātre nidhānaṃ pātrasaṃskārārtham । na ca prakṛtānāṃ savanīyayāge vini- yuktānāṃ pātrasaṃskārarthatvaṃ sambhavatīti anyata evaindravāyavādi- pātranidhānārthaṃ puroḍāśaśakalādaya utpādayitavyā iti । evaṃ prāpte
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyayaṃ pātrasaṃskāro bhavet । kintarhi ? dvitīyānirddeśātkṛtaprayojanapuroḍāśaśakalādisaṃskāra evāyam । ato'tra saṃskārapakṣe śaknudviniyogabhaṅgopapatteḥ savanīyayāgārthapuroḍāśādiśeṣāḥ pratipattyapekṣiṇaḥ । ataste- ṣāmevaindravāyavādipātranidhānamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—prakṛtapuroḍāśadravyāderevai- kadeśasyaindravāyavādigrahaṇaṃ vidyamānasambandhasyaiva dvitīyāśrutibalena nyāyyatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: atha saptadaśamupāṃśutvasya pradhānārthatvādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p:
idaṃ samāmananti—‘yajñātharvaṇa vai kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ tā upāṃśu karttavyāḥ’ iti । tatra saṃśayaḥ—kimaṅgapradhānārthamupāṃśutvam ? uta- pradhānārthamiti । pūrvaṃ vikṛtāvatideśātprāptānāṃ barhirājyadharmāṇā- maṅgapradhānārthatvaṃ prasaṅgātsāpavādaṃ nirūpyedānīṃ vikṛtāvevopadiṣṭa-
dharmāṇāṃ kimaṅgapradhānārthatvamuta kevalapradhānārthatvamiti praṅgā- nnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ-prakṛtau vidhīyamānāḥ sāṅgapradhānārthāḥ । ataḥ vikṛtāvapyupāṃśutvādayo dharmāḥ sāṅgapradhānārthā eva । na ca kāmyā iṣṭaya ityanena pradhānamātropādanamiti vaktavyam । sāṅgasyaiva pradhānasya kāmasādhakatvāt । aṅgānāmapi kāmyatvenopādānā- viśeṣāt । tasmādvikṛtāvapi yathāprāptakṛtsnakārya evopāṃśutva- vidhiriti । evaṃ prāpte'bhidhīyate—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi prākṛtabarhirdharmavidhitulyatvamasya bhavet । tatra hi prakaraṇātpradhānārthatve prāpte balīyastvādaṅgapradhānā- rthatvaṃ dharmāṇāmavadhāritam । iha tu kāmyā iṣṭaya iti śravaṇādvākya- meva pradhānārthatvaṃ pratipādayati । na ca sāṅgasya kāmopāyatvenāṅgā- nāmapi kāmyaśabdavācyatvamiti vaktavyam । yato'ṅgānāṃ khalu pradhānopakāradvāreṇa paramparayā pradhānopāyatvam, pradhānasya tu sākṣā- deva । na tu sākṣātsambhave paramparāśrayaṇamucitamiti pradhāneṣṭīnāmeva mukhyakāmyaśabdavācyatvāttāsāmevopāṃśutvamiti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe aṅgamantreṣvapyupāṃśutvaṃ karttavyam । siddhānte tu pradhānamantreṣveva sūtrantu—mukhyārtha evāyamupāṃśu- tvavidhiraṅgasya kṛte acoditatvāditi ।।
chapter.head: athāṣṭādaśaṃ dṛtinavanītājyādhikaraṇam
viṣayasaṃśayasaṅgatayaḥ
chapter.p: śnene śrūyate—“dṛ/?/tinavanītamājyam” iti । tatra sandehaḥ— kiṃ navanītaṃ pradhānasya ? utāṅgānāmiti । pūrvāpavādārthamidamāra- rabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p:
atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—dṛtau navanītamiti mukhyasāmānādhikaraṇyā- sambhavādavaśyamatrājyaśabdo virodhāllakṣaṇāvṛttau vaktavyaḥ । sa kiṃ kāryalakṣaṇārtho vā ? saṃskāralakṣaṇārtho vā ? prakaraṇānurodhā- tsaṃskāralakṣaṇārthatvameva yuktam । tena yatra vilāpanotpavanādi- saṃskārairājyaśaktitai (?) viśiṣṭaṃ navanītam । ātideśikasamavā- yitvasya (?) sambadhyate । kāryalakṣaṇāyāntvaṅgārthatvātpradhā-
nasannidhānalakṣaṇaṃ vādhyate । tasmātpradhānārtha eva dṛtinava- nītavidhiriti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p: abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadyatra dravyasya viśeṣaṇavidhānamupapadyeta । tathāhi—kriyā khalu viśiṣṭā vidhīyate, na dravyam । kārakāṇāṃ parasparāsambandhena kriyāviṣayatvādeva viśiṣṭavidhiḥ । kiñca sarvatra viśiṣṭavidhigauravabhayādapyekārthaparatvameva । ājyaśabdasya kāryala- kṣaṇāyāṃ tadanuvādenaikadaiva samāsārthabhūto dṛtinavanītapadārtho vidhī- yate । na ca viśiṣṭadravyaviṣayatvena gauravaṃ vidheranyāyyamāśritaṃ bhaviṣyati । tasmānnānāśāstravihitātideśasannidhāpitasamastājya- kāryānuvādenaiva dṛtinavanītavidhiriti siddham ।
prayojanam—pakṣoktam । sūtrantu—pradhānasambandhāsambhave tadaṅgāmeva dṛtinavanītavidhiḥ । teṣāṃ sannidhānaviśeṣāditi ।।
athaikonaviṃśaṃ śyenāṅgānāṃ dṛtinavanītājyatādhikaraṇam tatkāle ca liṅgadarśanāt ।।
chapter.head: saṃśayasaṅgatī
chapter.p: idānīṃ sandihyate—kiṃ sutyākālānāmaṅgānāṃ navanītam ? uta sarveṣāmiti । navanītavidhau siddhe tadviśeṣaḥ prasaṅgānnirūpyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo'bhisandhiḥ—aviśeṣaśrutasya dṛtinava- nītavidherautsargikaṃ pradhānagāmitvaṃ nyāyataḥ parityajya bhavatvaṅga- gāmitvam । pradhānasannidhiparityāge tu na kāraṇamasti । sannidhi- kālānuṣṭheyasya pradhānasya mukhyakālīnānyaṅgāni bhavanti sannihi- tāni । ataḥ pradhānasambandhānurodhāttatkālīnāṅgānāmevājyakārye navanītavidhiriti । kiñca śyene yadviśeṣavihitaṃ mukhyakālīnameva dṛṣṭam, yathā “saha paśūnālabhata” iti paśūnā sahālambhaḥ, tathaitadapi ।
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavedevaṃ yadi sannidhānādvākyaṃ balavanna bhavet । tathāhi—dṛtinavanītamājyeneti ‘sarveṣā vā śeṣatvasyātatprayuktatvāt’ 1 atra granthapātaḥ । adhikaraṇasamāptigrantho'śuddho'nanvitaśca ।
ityanena nyāyenāṅgapradhānārthatvaprasaktau pradhānasya somadravyakatvenā- jyakāryābhāvāttatra mā bhavatu dṛtinavanītavidhānam, śyenasambandhisa- kalāṅgasambandhe tu na pramāṇamastīti vākyabalīyastvātsakalāṅga- sambandhitvameveti navanītavidheriti siddham । yattu liṅgadarśanaṃ tannyāyaśāstraṃ yadi vayāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ śrutyā sahabhāvaḥ śrutyā kāle śrūyate tadā sarveṣāmeva paśū..............nātikramo bhavate । agnīṣomīye tu (?) ānubadhyāyāstu sthāne sahārambhe, kriyamāṇe'nya- tarasya sutyaikakālīnasavanīyanāntariyakatvādanyatarameva vyavadhānaṃ bhavet । tathāca sūtram—‘nyāyokte liṅgadarśanam’ iti । sūtrantu— śrutyā dṛtinavanītaṃ sambhavatīti na tasya savanīyakālāṅgārthatvamiti prayojanāviśeṣātsavanīyasambandho naivāsya coditi iti ।
chapter.head: atha viṃśaṃ savanīyahaviṣāṃ māṃsamayatvādhikaraṇam
chapter.p:
śākyānāmayanaṃ ṣaṭiṃtraśatsaṃvatsaram । tatredaṃ samāmananti— “saṃsthite saṃsthite'hani gṛhapatirmṛgayāṃ yāti, sa tatra yān mṛgān hanti teṣāṃ tarasāḥ puroḍāśāḥ savanīyā bhavanti” iti । tatra
sandehaḥ—kiṃ savanīyānāmanyeṣāñca sambhavatāṃ puroḍāśānāṃ sthāne tarasāḥ ? uta savanīyānāmeveti । pūrvāpavādenedamārabhyate ।
chapter.head: pūrvapakṣaḥ
chapter.p: atrāyaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ—“savanīyā bhavanti” iti śrūyate । tatra savanīyatvaviśiṣṭapuroḍāśoddeśena tarasavidhiḥ sambhavati । uddiśya- mānaviśeṣaṇavivakṣāyāṃ vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt । anyataroddeśena ca tarasavidhau sannikarṣaviśeṣātpuroḍāśoddeśenaiva yuktaḥ na tu vyavahita- savanīyoddeśaḥ । savanīyapadaṃ tu lakṣaṇayā savanīyapuroḍāśānuvāda- kamavayutyānuvādo veti । tena ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsarākhyāyāṃ vikṛtau māṃsavidhirayaṃ savanīyapuroḍāśaviṣaya eveti । evaṃ prāpte—
chapter.head: siddhāntaḥ
chapter.p:
abhidhīyate—bhavedevaṃ yadi savanīyaśabdaḥ pramādapāṭho bhavet । tathāhi—yadā puroḍāśoddeśena māṃsavidhānaṃ tadā savanīyaśabdaḥ savanīyapuroḍāśeṣu lākṣaṇiko vaktavyaḥ । lakṣaṇā ca sambandhavidhinā । na ca savanīyapuroḍāśānāṃ savanīya- śabdopāttaiḥ puroḍāśadhānādibhiḥ kaścitsambandho'sti, yena lakṣaṇā bhavet । tathāca śrutyanuvādatvaṃ savanīyaśabdasya puroḍāśāḥ savanīyā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteḥ । jātiguṇāvayava-
dvāreṇa samānaviṣayayorhi śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya bhavati । yathā gauḥ śuklā iti, na tu gāvaḥ śukla iti nānājātīyā vā puruṣā brāhmaṇā iti । savanīyoddeśena tarasavidhau puroḍāśasya dhānādeśca savanīyatvaṃ na sambhavatīti chatrinyāyena puroḍāśaśabdasya savanīyaśabdopattipu puroḍāśadhānādipu lakṣaṇayā vṛttiriti । na ca pūrvapakṣe savanīyapadasyānuvādaprayojanamapyasti । siddhānte tu havirvyatiriktāgāmānyeṣāmapi savanīyatvāt haviḥparatvajñā- panārtho yuktaḥ puroḍāśapadenānuvāda iti । kiñca prakṛtau “puroḍāśānalaṅkuru” iti praiṣe puroḍāśaśabdasya lakṣaṇāvṛttatvaṃ dṛṣṭam । ato jaghanyatvātpuroḍāśaśabdasyaiva lākṣaṇikatvaṃ- mucitam । na tvapratītalakṣaṇamucitam । na ca pratītalakṣaṇādṛte (?) savanīyaśabdasya naikasavanīyavarttināṃ puroḍāśadhānādīnāṃ sthāne tarasavidhiriti siddham ।
prayojanam—pūrvapakṣe savanīyapuroḍāśānāmeva kārya māṃsena kartavyam । siddhānte tvekasyaiva savanīyasya puroḍāśasya bhānādināṃ veti । sūtrantu—savanīyapuroḍāśādīnāṃ kārye māṃsacodanāviśeṣāditi ।।

lg.l: yā nāma kaścidiha saṃviditaṃ prameyaṃ granthāntare likhati vā vadati svayaṃ vā ।
matkartṛtāmananukīrttya sa kīrttilobhāt nissantatirjagati janmaśatāni bhūyāt ।।

chapter.p: iha sakalatantraṭīkārahasyamākṛṣya īṣadantaravacanaiḥ pañcaśatādhi- kadaśabhiḥ sahastrairnibaddhamiti (?) ।।
